40001001	Heiya Abraham Sa Kapaisa, David Sa Kapaisa Jisu Christa om pu pa rui om chongdip e.
40001002	Abraham na Isaac ting ponne, Isaac na Jacob ting ponne, Jacob na Judah le bau banao rwan ding ponne.
40001003	Judah le Tamar na Perez khatle Zerah ding ponne, Perez na Hezron ding ponne, Hezron na Aram ding ponne.
40001004	Aram na Amminadab ting ponne, Amminadab na Nahshon ding ponne, Nahshon na Salmon ding ponne.
40001005	Salmon le Rahab na Boaz ting ponne, Boaz le Ruth na Obed ting ponne, Obed na Jesse ding ponne,
40001006	Jesse na krwang David ting ponne, krwang David le Uriah mei to ngaaknu mannuna Solomon ding ponne.
40001007	Solomon na Rehoboam ding ponne, Rehoboam na Abijah ding ponne, Abijah na Asa ding ponne.
40001008	Asa na Jehoshaphat ting ponne, Jehoshaphat na Joram ding ponne, Joram na Uzziah ding ponne.
40001009	Uzziah na Jotham ding ponne, Jotham na Ahaz ting ponne, Ahaz na Hezekiah ding ponne.
40001010	Hezekiah na Manasseh ding ponne, Manasseh na Amon ding ponne, Amon na Josiah ding ponne.
40001011	Bani ding kraan bina Babylon la nam thou damnu kaan bi Josiah na Jeconiah le bau banao rwan ding ponne.
40001012	Babylon la bani ding kraan bina nam thou damnu nung, Jeconiah na Shealtiel ding ponne, Shealtiel na Zerubbabel ding ponne.
40001013	Zerubbabel na Abiud ting ponne, Abiud na Eliakim ding ponne, Eliakim na Azor ding ponne.
40001014	Azor na Zadok ting ponne, Zadok na Achim ding ponne, Achim na Eliud ting ponne.
40001015	Eliud na Eleazar ding ponne, Eleazar na Matthan ding ponne, Matthan na Jacob ting ponne.
40001016	Jacob na Christa diga kounu Jisu ding ponnu Mary basan Joseph ting ponne.
40001017	Atiga Abraham khouna David tangga mikin bing nga mikin somga bali ye, David khouna bani ding kraan bina Babylon la nam thou damnu tangga mikin somga bali ye khatle bani ding Babylon la kraan bina nam thou damnu bina Christa tangga mikin somga bali ye.
40001018	Jisu Christa ding atiga pon thang ngaake: Banu Mary ding Joseph lang munchat thangnu nung, barwei pat ni hung karung mak aangnu meithaan Katha Bathiangnu paan bina maan pum rit rwe dinu thei ngaake.
40001019	Atiyeda babasan Joseph heiya bazenu mi briakpina khatle bating mi nun meithaan bi pi kazak kaat briakpina bating inthimthwei toga bathan sat lang baning ngaake.
40001020	Atiyeda maanna heiba lang bi kakhan ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, Pukraangba om tambaan chonglangna bamang la pi mu thangga rinne, “David sa kapaisa Joseph, Mary ding namei lang lou lang kachi mako, balangbe maan pum rit ongnu ga Katha Bathiangnu khou naye.
40001021	Maan Sa Kapaisa khat ponlune, nangna Bameng JISU diga kou lang nge, balangbe Maanna Bami nun ding bani noh bina kan thanglune.”
40001022	Thiamting paan bina Pukraangba na rin chaak thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang hei bing nga swak ngaak rwe:
40001023	“Phaang ngo, reizuni ga pum ritluga Sa Kapaisa khat ponlune khatle banina Bameng Emmanuel diga koulune,” bakabana “Ani le ong bachamnu Rikrwang” dinuwe.
40001024	Haba nung, Joseph in ong bina barak swakluga, Pukraangba om tambaan chonglangna bakhou zathang pi thang damnu ga zei rwe khatle Mary ding bamei toga lou rwe,
40001025	atiyeda maanna natainu Sa Kapaisa pon thang mak basaan Mary le thei kale mak ngaake. Atiga maanna Bameng JISU diga kou rwe.
40002001	Herod krwang kaan bi Judea om Bethlehem bi Jisu ding pon thangnu nung phaang ngo, lumik swak pek lana Magi rwan Jerusalem bi hungluga
40002002	rinne, “Jihudi rwan Krwang toga pon thangnu Maan gazo ingaipai ambo? Balangbe anina lumik swak pek la Baom insi phaangmuga Bating kalum lang hungnuwe.”
40002003	Herod krwangna heiya theisunu kaan bi maan khatle Jerusalem bi ongnu mi bing sung katop rwe.
40002004	Maanna takopuba rwan le mi nun om chongtan bachuthangnu rwan ding kou kadoiluga Christa zo ingaipai pon thang ngaak tingbo diga maanna bani khou ngai rwe.
40002005	Banina bakhou rinne, “Judea om Bethlehem biye, balangbe thiamtingna hiak thang ngaaknu ga heiye:
40002006	‘Judah taram bi amnu Bethlehem nang, Judah taleipuba rwan lak pi sin kataknu make; Balangbe Ami Israel rwan ding sian thang dingnu Bapuba khat nakhouna hunglune.’”
40002007	Habei ga Herod na Magi rwan ding inthimthwei toga kouluga insi ga impei dat pi swakpo dinu bani khouna thei rwe.
40002008	Atiga maanna bani ding Bethlehem la bathan thangluga rinne, “Sero, Naosen ding ga zong chuiga zongro, nanina Bating zongsunu kaan bi ei le hungluga Bating kalum lang akhou cham pi thei hung latro.”
40002009	Krwang chong ngaisuluga bani thou drwe; atiga phaang ngo, banina lumik swak pek la phaangmu ngaaknu insi ga Naosenna ongnu riak pi hung han mak basaan bani meithaan se ong ngaake.
40002010	Banina insi ga phaangmunu kaan bi tasiatnu karok karo ngaake.
40002011	Banina insung bi khutnu kaan bi Naosen le Banu Mary ding mu rwe khatle banina in bakhup taluga Bating kalum rwe. Atiga banina bani om lan bu lat swakluga Balaang leithwan toga kachaak, frankincense khatle myrrh kat thang rwe.
40002012	Habei ga bani ding Herod kim bi se lat mak lang bani mang la rin chaak thang briakpina, bani lampui katei lana bani talei zon drwe.
40002013	Banina thou damnu nung phaang ngo, Pukraangba om tambaan chonglang khatna Joseph khou mang la pi mu thangga rinne, “Thouro, Naosen le Banu ding kalwangluga Egypt la paktro, Eina nakhou rin mak basaan ha la ga ong ngo; balangbe Herod na heiba Naosen ding nga to braan lang zonglu rwe.”
40002014	Atiga maanna thouluga Naosen le Banu ding kalwangluga zingphana Egypt la pen thou dam ngaake.
40002015	Herod thi mak basaan maan habei ga ong ngaake, haga thiamting paan bina Pukraangba na rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang naye, “Eina Egypt pina Asa Kapaisa ding kou swak ngaake.”
40002016	Herod na bating Magi rwanna minam rwe dinu theinu kaan bi balung pwan tak ngaak rwe; maanna Magi rwan khouna theinu bakaan nung suiga Bethlehem khatle habei amqwatnu namlwan bing bi amnu kapaisa naosen sangwan kani bina bathwei tanu bing ding pi athat sat rwe.
40002017	Atiga thiamting Jeremiah na rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang rwe:
40002018	“Ramah bi khwan khat ngaisu ngaake, Kakounu, chapnu khatle chunto lo sia taknu, Rachel na basa rwan langna chap rwe, Bathem thangnu za mak ngaake, Balangbe bani maak rwe.”
40002019	Herod na thi damnu nung phaang ngo, Egypt pi Pukraangba om tambaan chonglang khatna Joseph mang la pi mu thangga
40002020	rinne, “Thouro, Naosen le Banu ding kalwangluga Israel talei la sero, balangbe heiba Naosen om kum ding tobraan lang zong ongnu nun ga thi drwe.”
40002021	Atibriakpina maanna thouluga Naosen le Banu ding kalwangluga Israel talei bi hung rwe.
40002022	Atiyeda Archelaus na Judea bi bapa Herod hut krwang toga paan ongme dinu theinu kaan bi maan ha la ga se lang kachi ngaake khatle bamang la Rikrwang na bakhou pi thei thangnu nung suiga maan Galilee taram la thou dam ngaake.
40002023	Atiga maan Nazareth tiga kounu nam bi hung ong rwe, haga thiamting rwanna rin damnu, “Bating Nazareth rwan Mi diga koulune” dinu ga hung tang lang naye.
40003001	Haba kaan bi baptize to thangnu John na hungluga Judea om ramhaang bi sacham kasamga
40003002	rinne, “Sung lero, balangbe tambaan krwang talei nai rwe!”
40003003	Balangbe thiamting Isaiah na rin thang damnu maan ga heiya rwe, “Khwan khatna ramhaang bi pao ongme, ‘Pukraangba lampui ga daanno; Balampui bing ga to bazeyo.’ ”
40003004	John maan bahak ut munna bachanu pon sin basoi ngaake, bakong bi zan mun kongkhaak khaake; baom thaisaakna takhao le nilai lak khwei tui ngaake.
40003005	Habei ga Jerusalem, Judea talei bing khatle Jordan taram bing lana mi nun bakim bi hung rwe
40003006	khatle bani noh rin indaoluga Jordan tuiqwa bi John na bani ding baptize to thang rwe.
40003007	Atiyeda Pharisee le Sadducee rwan inzana baptize to lang hungnu maanna muluga bani khou rinne, “He barun kik taat rwan ga! Hung dingnu balung pwan bina pak dwak lang nani khou tuna rin basi thanggabo?
40003008	Atibriakpina sung lenu om khopsanu kraa ga kraawo,
40003009	nani ‘Abraham ma ani pa ye’ diga rin ratne diga baning mako. Balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Rikrwang na heiba lung bing bina Abraham lang sa nao rwan pi cha swak ngamme.
40003010	Atun le thingkung ri bing bi rei bachu thangluga ongme. Atibriakpina kasanu kraa kraa maknu thingkung bing ding pun satluga mei bi bazwan thang nge.
40003011	Sung lenu paan bina eina nani ding tui bi baptize to thang nge atiyeda anung la hungnanu Maan ga ama lian inkuwe, Baom sandal ga hakna sut lang ei khop make. Maanna nani ding Katha Bathiangnu le meina baptize to thanglune.
40003012	Bakut pi zam amme, Baom loulaak riak ka Maanna to bathiangluga Baom inta bi gehu ga khom thoulune atiyeda Maanna saang raang ding ga mit lat maknu mei bi bati satlune.”
40003013	Jisu na Galilee lamangna Jordan tuiqwa bi John kim bi baptize lou lang hung rwe.
40003014	Atiyeda John na Bating khaamluga rinne, “Nangna ating baptize to thang lang bathaang amnuwe, Nang akhou hungnuwa pa-aam langbo?”
40003015	Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou katak e, “Atunbe haga za thangro, balangbe ririak senu om chwan bing ga pi hung tangnuwa ani lang sanuwe.” Haba nung bi John na Bating za thang rwe.
40003016	Maan baptize to taangnu nung, Jisu tui bina kakhap tinule; phaang ngo, Balaang tambaan lat thang rwe khatle Rikrwang om Katha na banphi danga zwangtaluga Balu chung bi tatwangnu ga Maanna mu ngaake.
40003017	Haba kahan bi tambaan lana tanu khwan khatna rinne, “Heiya Eina kriangnu Asa Kapaisa ye, Ei Balu chung bi pem tak rwe.”
40004001	Haba nung bi Diabol na Jisu ding bathem dam lang Katha na Bating ramhaang la kalwang swak rwe.
40004002	Maan thamlai sombali zingpha sombali kalumsan hungnu nung Maan chaam ngaak rwe.
40004003	Atiga bathemnu gana Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dabe, heiba lung bing ding nga uilu pi imbei lang zathang piyo.”
40004004	Atiyeda Jisu na katake, “Heiya hiak thangluga amme, ‘Uilu zana mi ring lang make atiyeda Rikrwang mun bina swaknu chongkaang bing paanna ring lang zung nge.’ ”
40004005	Habei ga Diabol na Bating bathiangnu namlian la kalwang ka rwe khatle Bating kalum in om inton lan la pi han thangluga
40004006	Bakhou rinne, “Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dabe Napum bahak kachak tawo. Balangbe heiya atiga hiak thang nge, ‘Nating ngaak thang lang Baom tambaan chonglang rwan khou Maanna chongtan pi thanglune’ khatle ‘Lung bi Naket kadeng mak lang, Bani kutna Nating pon kadou thanglune.’ ”
40004007	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Heiya le hiak thang late, ‘Nangna Pukraangba Narikrwang ding bathem mak ting gaye.’ ”
40004008	Diabol na Bating basaang taknu rammwan khat la kalwang kaluga talei chung bi krwang talei bing le bani om lwat bing Bakhou pi mu thang rwe.
40004009	Atiga Diabol na Jisu khou rinne, “Nangna in bakhup taluga ating kalumme dabe eina hei bing nga Nalaang pine.”
40004010	Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Seitaan, nang se swak tro! Balangbe heiya hiak thangluga amme, ‘Nangna Pukraangba Narikrwang ding kalum ding gaye khatle Batingza nangna chwanlaang to ding gaye.’ ”
40004011	Haba nung bi Diabol na Bating bathan thangsialuga thou drwe khatle phaang ngo, tambaan chonglang rwanna hungluga Bating chwanlaang to rwe.
40004012	John ding qwan in bi thang drwe dinu Jisu na theinu kaan bi Maan Galilee la thou dam ngaake.
40004013	Maan Nazareth bathan thangluga Capernaum la ong ngaake, heiya Zebulun le Naphtali taram om tuipui paan la amnu namlianne.
40004014	Heiya thiamting Isaiah na rin damnu ga hung tang lang nge,
40004015	“Zebulun om taram, Naphtali om taram, Tuipui paan, Jordan raan la Gentile rwan om Galilee taram,
40004016	Kazingnu riak pi ongnu mi nun gana tasiatnu baan ding ga phaangmu rwe, Khatle thinu talei le thinu lim bi ongnu mi nun lu chung bi Babaan baan thang rwe.”
40004017	Haba kaan bina thouga Jisu na kasam thouga rinne, “Sung lero, balangbe tambaan krwang talei ga nai rwe.”
40004018	Jisu na Galilee tuipui paan bi se hungnu kaan bi unao pat ni, Peter diga le kounu Simon le banao Andrew tuipui bi kalang sat ong ngaaknu mu rwe; balangbe barwei ga ngaa namnu mi nun ngaake.
40004019	Maanna barwei khou rinne, “Anung suiyo, Eina narwei ding mi namnu mi pi to thangne.”
40004020	Haba kahan bina barwei kalang bing ga thangsialuga Banung sui drwe.
40004021	Habei gana se hungnu kaan bi unao katei pat ni, Zebedee sa kapaisa James le banao John, bapa Zebedee le diga li sung bi kalang photka ong ngaaknu ding Maan mu ngaake khatle Maanna barwei ding kou rwe.
40004022	Haba kahan bi barweina li khatle barwei pa ding thangsialuga Banung sui drwe.
40004023	Jisu na bani om synagogue bing bi bachu thangga krwang talei om sacham kasamga khatle mi nun lak pi naanu bachaat bing le tanat bachaat bing ding pi sa thangga Galilee taram bing bi se chang ngaake.
40004024	Atiga Balang bi Syria taram bing thei chang thou dam ngaake khatle banina tanat bachaat bingna naanu, riangre khaangnu nun, ri kasia khutnu, sensari phunnu khatle kut ke lwamnu bing ding Bakim bi phun hung ngaake khatle Maanna bani nun ding pi sa thang ngaake.
40004025	Galilee, Decapolis, Jerusalem, Judea khatle Jordan raan la mi khang puina Banung sui ngaake.
40005001	Mi khang ding phaangmunu kaan bi Maan rammwan la ka ngaake, Maanna badung tanu kaan bi Baom potroi rwan Bakim bi hung rwe.
40005002	Maanna bani khou bachu thangga rinne,
40005003	“Katha bi talu tanu nun ga aih saye, Balangbe tambaan krwang talei ga bani lang nge.
40005004	Chunto lo sia ongnu nani nun ga aih saye, Balangbe bani ding pi lozaang sa thanglune.
40005005	Sung bazaangnu nun ga aih saye, Balangbe banina talei ram ma lousulune.
40005006	Ririak senu lang chungna chaam taraan ongnu nun ga aih saye, Balangbe bani ding pi imba thanglune.
40005007	Kriang thang theinu nun ga aih saye, Balangbe bani kriang thang theinu lousulune.
40005008	Sung bathiangnu nun ga aih saye, Balangbe banina Rikrwang ding mulune.
40005009	Tabat tonu nun ga aih saye, Balangbe bani ding Rikrwang sa rwan diga koulune.
40005010	Ririak senu lang chungna rainu dounu nun ga bani aih saye, Balangbe tambaan krwang talei ga bani lang nge.
40005011	“Banina nani ding rin basiatnu, rainu khatle Ameng lang chungna nani maitwang bi koiga, kasianu bing impu thangnu dounu nani ga aih saye.
40005012	Karowo khatle lozaang sawo, balangbe tambaan la nani om taswan lianne, balangbe nani meithaan la am ngaaknu thiamting rwan ding banina atiga rai ngaake.
40005013	“Nani talei ram om bachiye; atiyeda bachi gana bathum ga braan dam mebe, haga tatoga pi thum lat langbo? Haga bazwan satluga mi nun ketna kadim kataanu makka bathaang maak rwe.
40005014	Nani talei ram om babaanne. Rammwan chung bi amnu namlian ga inkamnu ngam make.
40005015	Minunna thaomei taanluga ha ding ga luklei thwei bi thang make atiyeda bathaang riak pi thangluga insung bi amnu mi bing khou pi baan thang nge.
40005016	Haga danga, mi nunna nani om kasanu chwan ga muluga tambaan la ongnu nani Pa lwat pi lian lang mi nun meithaan bi nani om babaan ga pi baanno.
40005017	“Ei Chongtan mak tabe thiamting rwan om chongdip ting to braan lang hungnuwe diga nani baning mako. Ei to braan lang hungnu make atiyeda pi hung tang thang lang hungnuwe.
40005018	Balangbe Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tambaan le talei ram braan mak basaan Chongtan bina sin kataknu hiak khat mak tabe hiak swan khat hakna pum brumza hung tang mak basaan braan bilaye.
40005019	Atibriakpina tudannu heiba zathang om sin kataknu khat ting zei maknu khatle mi nun ding zathang zei mak lang bachu thang nge dabe, bating tambaan krwang talei la sin kataknu diga koulune; atiyeda tudannu zathang ga zeiluga haga bachu thang ongnu bating ga tambaan krwang talei la kaliannu diga koulune.
40005020	Balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, nani om ririak senu gana chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwan om ririak senu ma inku mak tazoba nani impha ni beida tambaan krwang talei la khutlaye.
40005021	“Kama meithaan mi nun khou atiga rin thang ngaaknu ga nanina theiye, ‘Nani mi that mi to mak ting gaye, tudannu mi athatnu maan ga chongsem om riangrenu ga doulune.’
40005022	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, tudannu khatna bau banao le balang maakka balung pwannu maan ga chongsem om riangrenu ga doulune. Tudannu bau banao ding, Raca!’ diga kounu maan ga thampei om riangrenu ga doulune. Atiyeda tudannuna, ‘Nang kapangnu!’ diga kouwe dabe maan meikhun bi mei om riangrenu ga doulune.
40005023	“Atibriakpina nangna rikhaang riak pi naom leithwan phun hungnu kaan bi nau nanaona naom maitwang bi pem maknu amnu ga baningsunu amme dabe,
40005024	naom leithwan ga rikhaang riak meithaan bi thangsialuga nau nanao khou seluga maan le diga kasa to kamawo khatle haba nung hungluga naom leithwan ga kato.
40005025	“Nating munanu ga nang le lampui bi se bacham ong bi maan le barapka kasa to kaleyo ati make dabe nating munanu gana nating chongsempuba khou pi swaklune, atiga chongsempuba gana nating ngam amnu khou bachoi thangluga nating qwan in bi thanglune.
40005026	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nangna kakhamnu sian pi loi mak basaan nang habei gana khatchale swak latnu zalaye.
40005027	“Kama meithaan mi nun khou atiga rin thang ngaaknu ga nanina theiye, ‘Nani lungkoi lungmaan mak ting gaye.’
40005028	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, tudannuna kamaisa khat ting rangwang ga phaangnu maan gana balungning bi kamaisa ding ga lungmaannuwe.
40005029	Namik inchangna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga ran swakluga nakhouna asat tammo; balangbe napum bing meikhun bi bazwan thangnu ma napum naat khat braannu gana nalaang sa inkunuwe.
40005030	Nakut inchangna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga tanchatluga nakhouna asat tammo; balangbe napum bing meikhun bi bazwan thangnu ma napum naat khat braannu gana nalaang sa inkunuwe.
40005031	“Atiga le rin damme, ‘Bamei kanoinu maan gana bakhou mei kanoi chonghiak pi ding gaye.’
40005032	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, tudannu bameina lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonu makka bamei ding kanoinu maan gana bamei ding lungkoi lungmaannu chwan pi to rwe khatle tudannuna kanoi satnu kamaisa ding lounu maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe.
40005033	“Kama meithaan mi nun khou atiga rin thang ngaaknu ga nanina theiye, ‘Nani baze makka chong karen mak ting gaye atiyeda naom karen thang damnu ga Pukraangba khou pi hung tang ding gaye’
40005034	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, tambaan ding kaisingga khatchale karen mako, balangbe haga Rikrwang om krwang takung riake;
40005035	talei ram ding le kaisingga karen mako, balangbe haga Baket kadim riake; Jerusalem ding le kaisingga karen mako, balangbe haga Krwang kaliannu om namlian ne,
40005036	nalu ding kaisingga karen mako, balangbe nangna nasam sang khatcha ding hakna pi ngounu mak tabe pi bumnu ngam make.
40005037	Atiyeda nani om ‘O’ dinu ga ‘O’ diyo mak tabe nani om ‘Make’ dinu ga ‘Make’ diyo. Balangbe habeina inkunu bing ga sa maknu khou naye.
40005038	“Atiga rin thang ngaaknu ga nanina theiye, ‘Mik khat hut lang mik khat khatle nga khat hut lang nga khat.’
40005039	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, sa maknu mi ding ga kakhang mako. Atiyeda tudannuna nakabiang inchang pek la kabeng nge dabe, babaang khat ka le bakhou kanei thangbiyo.
40005040	Tudannuna nating chongtok in bi chong phun thangluga naom talathu lou nwamme dabe, naom talathu pui ga le balaang lou dam ding ngo.
40005041	Tudannuna nating mile khat se bacham lang nam ga rinne dabe, maan le diga mile kani se bacham thangbiyo.
40005042	“Nakhou ninu balaang ga pi thangbiyo khatle nakhouna puk nwamnu bakhou ga za maknu to thang mako.
40005043	“Atiga rin thang ngaaknu ga nanina theiye, ‘Na innai lounai ding nangna kriang ding gaye khatle nating munanu ding ga batanno.’
40005044	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, nani ding munanu nun ding kriang ngo, nani ding sengnu nun khou rithoi pi thangbiyo khatle nani ding batannu nun lang kasanu chwan to thangbiyo, nani ding batanga tonu khatle rainu nun lang kalum thangbiyo,
40005045	heiya tambaan la ongnu nani Pa om sa rwan to lang nge, balangbe Maanna kasanu le kasianu lu chung bi Baom lumik pi swak thang nge khatle ririak senu le ririak se maknu lu chung bi khwa pi sun thang nge.
40005046	Balangbe nanina nani ding kriangnu batingza kriang nge dabe, nani lang pa-aam taswan amgabo? Ramkhai khomnu rwan tangga haga le bachamga tonu makpo?
40005047	Nanina nani unao rwan za ding kadou chongkaang kabiaye dabe, katei rwan ma nanina pa-aam to chuinu amgabo? Ramkhai khomnu rwan ga tangga hadanga tonu makpo?
40005048	Atibriakpina tambaan la ongnu nani Pa na khopsanu ga danga nani le khopsanu towe.
40006001	“Nani om phaangkriang chwan ga mi nunna mu dam lang bani meithaan bi to mak lang cheksinno. Cheksin make dabe tambaan la nani Pa khouna nani lang taswan amlaye.
40006002	“Atibriakpina mi nun khouna lwat ka banina lousu lang sathot tonu nunna synagogue pi khatle lampui kom bi tonu danga nangna phaangkriang chwan tonu kaan bi nameithaan bi trumpet sem mako. Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, bani om taswan ga bani phang drwe.
40006003	Atibriakpina nanina phaangkriang chwan tonu kaan bi nakut inchangna to ongnu ga nakut imbei ding pi thei mako,
40006004	heiya naom kriangnu chwan ga inthimga to langnaye khatle inthimthwei ding mu ongnu nani Pa na nani lang taswan ga indaoga pi thanglune.
40006005	“Nanina kalumnu kaan bi sathot tonu nun dan mak ting gaye. Balangbe mi nunna bani ding mu dam lang banina synagogue pi khatle lampui kom bi hanluga kalumnu bathaiye. Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, bani om taswan ga bani phang drwe.
40006006	Atiyeda naniba, nanina kalumnu kaan bi nani insung kaa bi khutro, nanina inkhaan khaanluga inthimnu riak pi ongnu nani Pa khou hweiniyo khatle inthimthwei ding mu ongnu nani Pa na nani lang taswan ga indaoga pi thanglune.
40006007	Nanina kalumnu kaan bi Gentile rwanna tonu danga bakaba maaknu bi kalum han lat lat mako. Balangbe bani chong tamnu gana bani kalum ga ngai thanglune diga banina baning nge.
40006008	Atibriakpina bani dan mako. Balangbe nanina Bakhou ni mak baleina nani lang bathaang amnu ga nani Pa na theiye.
40006009	“Atibriakpina hei danga kalummo: Tambaan la ongnu ani Pa, Nameng bathiangnu to ding ngo.
40006010	Nakrwang talei hung ding ngo. Tambaan la Nangna baningnu tonu danga talei ram bi le to ding ngo.
40006011	Ani lang kani khat lang khopnu thaisaak, Aniya pi thang ngo.
40006012	Anina ani khou lei chaaknu nun ding kok thangnu danga, Ani lei le kok thang ngo.
40006013	Ani ding bathemnu bi pi ta thang mako, Atiyeda kasianu bina ani ding kan thang ngo. Balangbe krwang talei, ngam khatle lwat khwa seiga Naom me. Amen.
40006014	“Balangbe nanina mi nun ding bani om koi maan kok thang nge dabe, tambaan la ongnu nani Pa na le nani ding kok thanglune.
40006015	Atiyeda nanina mi nun ding bani om koi maan kok thang make dabe, nani Pa na nani om koi maan ga le kok thanglaye.
40006016	“Nanina kalumsannu kaan bi sathot tonu nunna riangrenu man pi munu dan mako. Balangbe banina bani kalumsan ongme dinu mi nunna mu dam langna bani mai kum ga pi kabeiye. Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, bani om taswan ga bani phang drwe.
40006017	Atiyeda naniba nanina kalumsannu kaan bi nani lu bi thao teiyo khatle nani mai kum ga kaphi sato,
40006018	hagana nanina kalumsan ongnu ga mi nun khou pi mu mak lang nge atiyeda inthimnu riak pi ongnu nani Pa khou pi mu lang nge khatle inthimthwei ding mu ongnu nani Pa na nani lang taswan ga indaoga pi thanglune.
40006019	“Sum trina khatle tasona to braannu khatle in baruk mi nunna to railuga barunu talei ram bi nani lang lan ri thang mako;
40006020	atiyeda sum trina khatle tasona to braan maknu khatle in baruk mi nunna torailuga baru ngam maknu tambaan la nani lang lan ri thang ngo.
40006021	Balangbe nani om lan amnu riaklaga nani sung le amlune.
40006022	“Pum om thaomei ga mik e. Atibriakpina namikna saye dabe, napum bing le baannuna siplune.
40006023	Atiyeda namikna siaye dabe, napum bing ga zingnuna siplune. Atibriakpina nakhou amnu babaan ga zing nge dabe, haba om zingnu ga intia lang tasiatnubo!
40006024	“Mi khatchanale bapuba kani ding chwanlaang tonu ngam make; balangbe maanna pakhat ting munaluga katei ding krianglune mak tabe maanna pakhat ting takungluga pakhat ting thou to mak lune. Nanina Rikrwang khatle lan ding chwanlaang tonu ngam make.
40006025	“Atibriakpina Eina nani khou rinnuwe, nani kum langna nani pa-aam sa dingbo mak tabe pa-aam in dingbo khatle nani pum lang zana pa-aam sin basoi dingbo diga sung katop mako. Nani kum ga thaisaak ma khatle pum ga sin basoi ma inkunu makpo?
40006026	Basaang la zwangnu basaa nun ding ga phaang ngo, bani tachi bwan make, aat le aat make; inta bi le hung thang make; atiyeda tambaan la ongnu nani Pa na bani ding thak thang nge. Nani bani ma baman tam inkunu makpo?
40006027	Nani lak pi tudannu sung katop kana baom kum bi kutki khat pi sei thangnu ngambo?
40006028	“Atibriakpina nanina paaam toga pon naat lang sung katopnubo? Loupuk om lily rei nun ding ga, bani tatoga thou kabo bachak phaang ngo: bani chwan to make, la le thun make;
40006029	atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Solomon hakna baom lwat bingna heiba reipaan khat tanga tapon to dam make.
40006030	He balumsat sinnu nani! Aniya thou ongnu atiyeda inswan mei bi sat thang dam dingnu loupuk om lou kung ding tangga Rikrwang na atiga tapon to thang nge dabe, Maanna nani lang inkuga tapon to thangbilabo?
40006031	“Atibriakpina ‘Ani pa-aam sa dingbo?’ mak tabe ‘Ani pa-aam in dingbo?’ mak tabe ‘Ani paaam sin basoi dingbo?’ diga nani sung katop mako.
40006032	Balangbe Gentile rwanna hei bing ding nga zong nge. Balangbe hei bing nga nani lang bathaang amme dinu tambaan la ongnu nani Pa na theiye.
40006033	Atiyeda Rikrwang om krwang talei le Baom ririak senu ding ga kamaga zong ngo khatle hei bing nga nani lang pi thang sonlune.
40006034	Atibriakpina inswan lang nani sung katop mako, balangbe inswan lang inswan baraantoza katop tamlune. Kani khat katopka kani khat lang khop rwe.
40007001	“Nani ding chong kasem mak lang chong kasem mako.
40007002	Balangbe nangna chong to damnu gana nating le chong tolune khatle nangna badat tamnu chaang gana nakhou le badat latlune.
40007003	“Nangna namik pi amnu thingtum ding ga thei makka nau nanao mik pi amnu tamchin ding ga pa-aam to lang phaangnubo?
40007004	Nangna nau nanao khou tatoga ‘Namik pi tamchin ga asat thangde’ diga rinnubo? Phaang ngo, namik bahak pi thingtum amme.
40007005	Sathot tonu! Namik pi thingtum ga asat kamawo, haba nung nau nanao mik pi tamchin ga asat lang nangna bathiangga mulune.
40007006	“Bathiangnu pot ka ui nun khou pi mako khatle nani om baman kungnu lung ga bok nun meithaan bi bazwan thang mako, balangbe banina haga baketna kadim kataalune khatle kanei khutluga nani ding eih katup satlune.
40007007	“Niyo khatle haga nani lang pi thanglune; zong ngo khatle nanina zongsulune; inkhaan bachuwo khatle haga nani lang lat thanglune.
40007008	Balangbe ninu mi bingna lousuwe, zongnu maan gana zongsuwe khatle inkhaan bachunu balaang ga lat thanglune.
40007009	“Mak tabe basa kapaisana uilu ninu kaan bi balaang lung pi dingnu tatonu manpa nani lak pi amgabo?
40007010	Mak tabe ngaa ninu kaan bi maanna balaang barun pi lu dingbo?
40007011	Nanina sia ngaak peida nani sa rwan lang kasanu leithwan pi lang theiye dabe, tambaan la ongnu nani Pa na Bakhou ninu nun khou kasanu pot ka intia tamga pi thang dingbo!
40007012	Atibriakpina nanina mi nun ding nani khou pi to thang nwamnu bing ga bani khou le to thangbiyo, balangbe heiya Chongtan khatle Thiamting rwan om chong nge.
40007013	“Barumnu kapanmun bi khuto; balangbe braannu riak pi ta thangnu kapanmun ga lianne khatle lampui ga bazaaye khatle habei ga khutnu mi tamme.
40007014	Balangbe ringnu bi kai thang dingnu kapanmun ga barumme khatle lampui ga kung nge khatle haga zongsunu mi tomme.
40007015	“Zao mun sinluga nani khou hungnu atiyeda basung la bani rou sianu tangiya nun dannu baze maknu thiamting rwan ding ga cheksinno.
40007016	Bani om kraa bina nanina bani ding theilune. Mi nunna kaling kung bina drakha kraa mak tabe kaling lak pina tacham kraa raigabo?
40007017	Hadanga kasanu thingkung bingna kasanu kraa kraaye atiyeda kasianu thingkungna kasianu kraa kraaye.
40007018	Kasanu thingkungna kasianu kraa kraanu ngam make mak tabe kasianu thingkungna kasanu kraa kraanu ngam make.
40007019	Kasanu kraa kraa maknu thingkung bing ding pun satluga mei bi bazwan thang nge.
40007020	Atibriakpina bani om kraa bina nanina bani ding theilune.
40007021	“Ating ‘Pukraangba, Pukraangba’ diga kounu mi bing zana tambaan krwang talei khutlang make atiyeda tambaan la Apa na baningnu to ongnu maan gana khutlune.
40007022	Ha ni ga mi inzana Akhou rinlune, ‘Pukraangba, Pukraangba, anina Nameng bi chong rin swak tamnu makpo, Nameng bi ri kasia nun ding bathou satnu makpo khatle Nameng bi tasiatnu chwan tamga to thang damnu makpo?’
40007023	Haba kaan bi Eina bani khou rinlune, ‘Chongtan thouto makka ringnu nani! Ei nani ding khatchale thei make; Akhouna se swak tro.’
40007024	“Atibriakpina Eina rin ongnu hei bing nga ngaisuluga tonu bating Eina lung pui chung bi in tonu ningtingnu mi ga le rin bachak thanglune:
40007025	khwa sunta rwe, tui lian hung rwe, thiraang raang hung rwe khatle haba in ding ga hung tun rwe; atiyeda in ga bao make, balangbe haga lung pui chung bi to kanuwe.
40007026	Atiyeda Eina rin ongnu hei bing nga ngaisuluga to maknu mi bing ga lungtasi chung bi in to thounu kapangnu mi ga le rin bachak thanglune:
40007027	khwa sunta rwe, tui lian hung rwe, thiraang raang hungluga haba in ding ga hung tun rwe, in ga baota rwe khatle in ga bao basiat takka bao rwe.”
40007028	Jisu na hei bing nga kabia taangnu kaan bi Maanna bachu thangnu bi ga mi khang loh lo ong ngaake,
40007029	balangbe Maanna chongtan bachuthangnu rwan dan makka atiyeda ngam amnu mi khat tan ga bani khou bachu thang ngaake.
40008001	Maan rammwan lana tanu kaan bi mi khang puina Banung suizon ngaake.
40008002	Atiga imphaannu manpa khatna hungluga Bating kalumga rinne, “Pukraangba, Nangna za thangnuwe dabe, Nangna ating to bathiang thangnu ngamme.”
40008003	Jisu na Bakut balaan swakluga bating banaan thangga rinne, “Eina za rwe; bathiangro.” Haba kahan bina imphaannu ga bathiang drwe.
40008004	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Heiya nang pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako; atiyeda nangna seluga napum ga tako khou pi muwo khatle Moses om zathang nung suiga bani khou sake lang leithwan katro.”
40008005	Jisu na Capernaum bi khutnu kaan bi kraanmi razapuba pakhatna Bakim bi hungluga Bating kalumga
40008006	rinne, “Pukraangba, aswak pakhat in la kut ket lwam ga riangre takka ongme.”
40008007	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Ei hungluga bating pi sa thangne.”
40008008	Kraanmi razapuba gana katake, “Pukraangba, Nang ain insung bi kaamkhut lang ei khopnu make. Atiyeda chongkaang khatcha kabia thang nge dabe aswak ka sa damlune.
40008009	Balangbe ei le kangamnu pakhat thwei bi amnu athwei bi kraanmi rwan am ongnu zung nge. Atiga eina heiba pakhat ting, ‘Seyo,’ diga rin dabe maanna seye; katei pakhat ting ‘Hung ngo,’ diga rin dabe maanna hung nge; aswak khou ‘Heiya towo’ diga rin dabe maanna haga towe.”
40008010	Jisu na haga ngaisunu kaan bi Maan loh loga Banung suinu rwan khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Israel bi hei danga balumsat liannu Ei dou mak aang nge!
40008011	Eina nani khou rinnuwe, mi tamga lumik swak khatle lumik taak lana hungluga tambaan krwang talei la Abraham, Issac khatle Jacob le diga sa in lang ongta bachamlune.
40008012	Atiyeda heiba krwang talei sa rwan ding ngabe kazingnu riak la bazwan swaklune. Habei ga chapka khatle ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune.”
40008013	Haba nung bi Jisu na kraanmi razapuba khou rinne, “Sero; nangna balumsanu danga haga nalaang to thanglune.” Atiga baswak ka haba chakrin bi gana sa drwe.
40008014	Jisu Peter in bi hungnu kaan bi bamei nu bakhun ga naaga in ongnu ding Maan mu rwe.
40008015	Maanna bakut pi banaan thangnu kaan bi bakhunnu ga sa drwe. Atiga maanna thouluga bani ding chwanlaang to rwe.
40008016	Khwazinren tanu kaan bi ri kasia khutnu mi taswang khak ting Bakhou kalwang hung ngaake. Atiga Maanna katha nun ding ga chongkaangna kazun sat rwe khatle naanu bing ding pi sa thang rwe.
40008017	Heiya thiamting Isaiah na rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang naye, “Maan Bahakna ani om kason kaong bing phun thang rwe, Ani om kasa kanaa bing ding khaang thang rwe.”
40008018	Jisu na Bating ong qwat ongnu mi khang pui ding munu kaan bi Maanna tuipui raan khat la takan swak lang zathang pi rwe.
40008019	Habei ga chongtan bachuthangnupa khatna hungluga Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Nangna senu riak bing bi ei le Nanung suisene.”
40008020	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Lousa ui nun lang bain amme khatle basaang la basaa nun lang le bani kabu amme atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisa langba balu inbei ta lang bariak maake.”
40008021	Baom potroi pakhatna le Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, apa ding rise kama lang ating za thang ngo.”
40008022	Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Anung suiyo, thinu nunna bani om kathinu nun ding ga kairi dam ding ngo “
40008023	Maan li khat pi khutnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwan le Banung sui ngaake.
40008024	Atiga thei mak daakka tuipui bi kanatnu thiraang thirwei hung briakpina li ga tui kabaap nuna lem hung rwe. Atiyeda Maan ba inthi ong ngaake.
40008025	Baom potroi rwanna Bakim bi hungluga Bating bathouga rinne, “Pukraangba, ani ding kan thang ngo! Ani thi ding rwe!”
40008026	Atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “He balumsat sinnu nani! Pa-aam to lang nani kachinubo?” Maanna thouluga thiraang le tuipui ding twei rwe khatle habei ga rim rim ta drwe.
40008027	Mi nunna loh loga rinne, “Thiraang le tuipuina tangga Bachong zei ongnu Maan heiya tatonu Mi ngaak tingbo?”
40008028	Maan tuipui raan khat la Gergesenes om taram la se hungnu kaan bi thaanmwan lana hungnu ri kasia khutnu manpa pat nina Bating kadou ngaake, barwei ga heitia lang sia briakpina pakhatcha hakna haba lampui ga seraang mak ngaake.
40008029	Haba kahan bi ga barweina paoga rin rwe, “Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa Jisu, Nang le ani pa-aam barui bazem ambo? Nang abeiya bakaan tang mak balei ani ding rai lang hungnubo?”
40008030	Bani khouna impaan saam saamga bok nun tam taknu khat basaak timsa ong ngaake.
40008031	Atiga ri kasia nun gana Bakhou hweiga rinne, “Nangna ani ding kazun sate dabe ani ding bok nun khou khut lang za thang ngo.”
40008032	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Sero.” Habei ga banina swakluga bok nun khou khut rwe. Atiga haba kahan bi bok nun ga batok bariak thei makka rakanga pak tasuk taluga tuipui bi thi loi drwe.
40008033	Haba nung bi bok nun ding siannu nun ga nampui la hungluga ri kasia khutnu manpa pat ni khou swak tamnu ga le suiga pum brumza hung pu thang rwe.
40008034	Atiga phaang ngo, nam bi mi bingna Jisu ding kadou lang swak rwe khatle banina Bating munu kaan bi bani om taram bina se swak tam lang hweini rwe.
40009001	Maan li sung bi khutluga tuipui takanluga Banam la hung ngaake.
40009002	Atiga phaang ngo, ria bi in ongnu pum baang thinu manpa pakhat ting banina Bakim bi pon hung rwe. Atiga Jisu na bani balumsat ka munu kaan bi pum baang thinu manpa khou Maanna rinne, “Sa kapaisa, karowo; nanoh bing ga kok thang rwe.”
40009003	Haba kahan bi chongtan bachuthangnu rwan mi kasem bani cham, “Heiba Manpana Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat rwe!” diga rin ngaake.
40009004	Atiyeda Jisu na bani sung baning ga theiluga rinne, “Nani sung bi pa-aam to lang kasianu baningnubo?
40009005	Balangbe ‘Nanoh bing ga kok thang rwe’ diga rinnu le ‘Lon thouluga sero’ dinu le ingaana bai inkubo?
40009006	Atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisana talei ram bi noh bing kok thang lang ngam amme dinu nanina thei lang nge.” Haba nung bi Maanna pum baang thinu manpa khou rinne, “Lon thouro, nakain riak ka lou thouluga nain la sero.”
40009007	Habei ga maan lon thouluga bain la se drwe.
40009008	Mi khangna haga munu kaan bi bani loh lo rwe khatle misa khou heipai ngam pi thangnu Rikrwang ding lwat pi lian ngaake.
40009009	Jisu na habei gana se swaknu kaan bi Matthew diga kounu manpa pakhat ramkhai khomnu riak pi badung ongnu Maanna mu rwe. Atiga Maanna bakhou rinne, “Anung suiro.” Habei ga maan lon thouluga Banung sui drwe.
40009010	Atiga Jisu na in khat pi sa in lang ong ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, ramkhai khomnu rwan taswang khak le noh mi nun hungluga Maan khatle Baom potroi rwan le diga sa in lang ongta rwe.
40009011	Pharisee rwanna haga munu kaan bi banina Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Nani lang Bachuthangnupa na pa-aam lang ramkhai khomnu rwan le noh mi nun le diga sa in bacham ongnubo?”
40009012	Jisu na haga ngaisunu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Pum sanu mi nun lang kathiam bathaang maake atiyeda naanu nun langbe bathaang amme.
40009013	Atiyeda seluga ‘Eina kriang thang theinu ding bathaiye, rikhaang pot ting ga make,’ dinu pa-aam kababo dinuwa bachuwo. Balangbe Ei ririak senu mi nun ding kou lang hungnu make atiyeda noh mi nun ding sung pi le langna kou lang hungnuwe.”
40009014	Haba nung bi John om potroi rwanna Bakim bi hungluga ngaiye, “Ani le Pharisee rwanna kalumsan katupe atiyeda Naom potroi rwanna pa-aam lang kalumsan maknubo?
40009015	Habei ga Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Tazwanpa baan rwan gana tazwanpa le diga ong bacham basaan bani chunto lo sia ong ding gabo? Atiyeda tazwanpa ding ga bani khouna lou thou dam dingnu kaan ga hunglune; haba kaan bi bani kalumsanlune.
40009016	“Pakhatchanale charut maknu pwan kathan tutna pwan raan bi phot thang kale make; atiye dabe baraan ding ga kai charutluga re basiatlune.
40009017	Pakhatchanale drakha tui kathan ding zan mun khao raan bi thang make, atiye dabe zan mun khao ga bakluga drakha tui ga lwang sat tamlune khatle khao ga le braanlune. Atiyeda banina drakha tui kathan ga zan mun khao kathan bi thang nge khatle kani rwei ga ri thang nge.”
40009018	Maanna hei bing nga bani khou rin ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, kai thangnu pakhatna hungluga Bating kalumga rinne, “Asa kamaisa atunna thi drwe atiyeda hungluga balu chung bi Nakutna banaan thang nge dabe maan ringlune.”
40009019	Atiga Jisu na thouluga banung sui hung rwe khatle Baom potroi rwan le sui hung rwe.
40009020	Atiga thei mak daakka sangwan somga kani thi se ongnu mannu pakhatna nung la se hungluga Bapwan hum banaan ngaake.
40009021	Balangbe maanna baraanto baning ngaake, “Eina Bapwan za beida banaan suwe dabe ei salune.”
40009022	Atiga Jisu na kanei swakluga bating munu kaan bi Maanna rinne, “Asa kamaisa! karowo; nabalumsat paanbina nating pi sa thang rwe.” Haba kahan bina kamaisa ding ga pi sa thang rwe.
40009023	Jisu na kaithangnupa in bi khutnu kaan bi tamrwang semnu nun khatle kasao kabao ongnu mi nun ding mu rwe.
40009024	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Se swak tammo, balangbe rangaaknuwa thi make atiyeda in ongnu zung nge.” Atiyeda banina Bating choi banui ngaake.
40009025	Mi nunna langkaang la swak tamnu kaan bi Maan insung la khutluga bakut choi rwe khatle rangaaknu ga lon thou rwe.
40009026	Heiba cham ma haba taram bing bi thei chang thou dam ngaake.
40009027	Jisu habei gana se swaknu kaan bi mik chonu manpa pat ni Banung sui hungluga pao rakanga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa, arwei ding phaangkriang thang ngo!”
40009028	Maanna insung la khutnu kaan bi mik chonu manpa pat ni gana Bakim bi hung rwe. Habei ga Jisu na barwei khou rinne, “Eina heiya tonu ngamme dinu narwei balumsabo?” “O, Pukraangba” diga barweina Bakhou rin rwe.
40009029	Maanna barwei mik banaan thangluga rinne, “Narwei balumsat nung suiga narwei khou haga ati dingro.”
40009030	Habei ga barwei mik mu ngaak rwe. Atiga Jisu na barwei khou katip thangga rinne, “Heiya pakhatchanale thei mak ting ngo.”
40009031	Atiyeda barweina se swaknu kaan bi Balang bi cham ga haba taram bing ga pi thei chang thou dam ngaake.
40009032	Barweina se swak tamnu kaan bi phaang ngo, chong swak maknu ri kasia khutnu manpa khat ting banina Bakhou phun hung rwe.
40009033	Jisu na ri kasia ding ga kazun sat thangnu nung chong kabia ngam mak ngaaknu ga chong kabia rwe. Habei ga mi khang gana loh loga rinne, “Israel bi hei dannu impha ni beida mu mak aang nge!”
40009034	Atiyeda Pharisee rwanna rinne, “Maanna ri kasia nun ding ga ri kasia nun om bapuba paan bina kazun satnu zung nge.”
40009035	Haba nung bi Jisu na nampui bing le inmwan bing bi seluga bani om synagogue bing bi bachu thangga krwang talei om sacham kasam thangse ngaake khatle mi nun lak pi kasa kanaa bing khatle tanat bachaat bingna naanu mi nun ding pi sa thang ngaake.
40009036	Atiga Jisu na mi khang ding ga munu kaan bi Maan bani ding kriang rwe, balangbe bani riangre rwe khatle sian thangnu maaknu zao nun danga se imphaang ong ngaake.
40009037	Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Batak takka lou lwak lang tamga amme atiyeda chwantok mi ba tomme.
40009038	Atibriakpina Baom lou lwak pi chwantok mi tamga lang hung thang lang lou lwak om Pukraangba khou hweiniyo.”
40010001	Maanna Baom potroi pat somga kani ding Bakim bi kou hungluga bathiang maknu katha nun ding kazun sat lang, kasa kanaa bachaat bing ding pi sa thang lang khatle tanat bachaat bingna naanu mi nun ding pi sa thang lang Maanna bani lu chung bi ngam pi thang rwe.
40010002	Chonglang pat somga kani meng ga: kamanu bi, Peter diga kounu Simon khatle banao Andrew; Zebedee sa kapaisa James le banao John;
40010003	Philip le Bartholomew; Thomas le ramkhai khomnu Matthew; Alphaeus sa kapaisa James, Thaddaeus tiga kounu Lebbaeus;
40010004	Canaan rwan Simon khatle Bating pi swaknu Judas Iscariot hei rwanne.
40010005	Jisu na heiba pat somga kani ding lang thangluga zathang piga rinne, “Gentile nun lak pi se mako khatle Samaria rwan om nampui bi khut mako.
40010006	“Atiyeda Israel inkhun om braan damnu zao nun khou seyo.
40010007	Nanina senu kaan bi ‘Tambaan krwang talei ga nai rwe’ diga kasammo.
40010008	Naanu ding pi sawo, imphaannu nun ding to bathiang ngo, thinu ding pi ring thouwo khatle ri kasia nun ding kazun sato. Nanina bathaam lousunu ga bathaam pi swako.
40010009	Nani sian khao bi kachaak, tangka khatle thinzin phun mako.
40010010	Nani lamsek lang bazin khao, talathu kani, sandal khatle sungrwan phun mako; balangbe chwantok mi ga baom thaisaak phang lang khopnuwe.
40010011	Nanina namlian mak tabe nampui bi khutnu kaan bi khopsanu mi ambo dinu zong ngo khatle nanina namlian bi gana se swak lat mak basaan habei ga ong ngo.
40010012	Nanina in bi ga khutnu kaan bi kadou chong kabiawo.
40010013	Inkhun ga khopsanu ngaake dabe, habei ga nani om dai bazaangnu ga haba in inkhun biga am ong dam ding ngo. Atiyeda inkhun ga khopsa make dabe, nani om dai bazaangnu ga nani khou han hung lat ting ngo.
40010014	Tudannuna nani ding lou thang make dabe khatle nani chong ngai thang make dabe, nanina haba in mak tabe nampui bi gana se swaknu kaan bi nani ket pina kaphut kathing tabasiawo.
40010015	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, chongsem lumik pi ga Sodom le Gomorrah taleina haba namlian ma inkuga laak thangnu ga khaangsalune!
40010016	Phaang ngo, Eina nani ding tangiya nun lak pi zao danga bathan thangnuwe. Atibriakpina barun danga ningting ngo khatle banphi danga sung bathiang ngo.
40010017	Atiyeda nani mi nun ding ga cheksinno, balangbe banina nani ding thampei in bi pi swaklune khatle bani om synagogue bing bi nani ding bweilune.
40010018	Bani khou khatle Gentile rwan meithaan bi sake toga nani ding Alaang chungna taleipuba rwan le krwang nun meithaan bi phun hung lune.
40010019	Atiyeda nani ding banina pi swaknu kaan bi nanina tatoga mak tabe pa-aam kabia dingbo dinu lang bi sung tam mako. Balangbe haba chakrin bi ga nanina pa-aam kabia dingbo dinu nani lang pi thanglune.
40010020	Balangbe kabia ongnu ga nani make atiyeda nani khou kabia thang ongnu nani Pa om Katha naye.
40010021	“Banaona batang ding khatle bapana basa ding thi lang pi swaklune, sa nao rwanna nu pa rwan maitwang bi katwak thoulune khatle bani ding thi lang pi swaklune.
40010022	Atiga Ameng lang chungna mi bingna nani ding batanlune. Atiyeda kakhamnu tangga khaangnu bating ga kan thanglune.
40010023	Nampui khat pi banina nani ding raiye dabe, katei la pak pen dammo. Balangbe batak sekka Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Misa Sa Kapaisa gana hung maknu meithaan nanina Israel om namlian bing bi se chang ngamlaye.
40010024	“Potroi khatna baom bachuthangnupa ma liannu make mak tabe swak khatna bainpuba ma liannu make.
40010025	Potroi khatna baom bachuthangnupa dannu khatle swak khatna bainpuba dannu heiyana khop rwe. Banina inpuba ding ga Beelzebub diga kouwe dabe bain inkhun mi bing ding ga intia lang siaga koulu dingbo!
40010026	Atibriakpina bani ding kachi mako. Balangbe indao swakla dingnu, inkam thangnu khatchale maake khatle thei swakla dingnu, inkam thangnu khatchale maake.
40010027	Eina nani khou zingnu bi rin damnu ga babaan bi kabiawo khatle nani kanaa bi ngaisu damnu ga in chung bina kasammo.
40010028	Pum ding athatnu atiyeda katha ding athatnu ngam maknu bani ding ga kachi mako. Atiyeda katha le pum ding meikhun bi to braan ngamnu Bating ga kachiyo.
40010029	Basak kani ding peisa khat lang zwannu makpo? Nani Pa na baningnu sui makka bani nun lak pi khat hakna talei bi bukta bilaye.
40010030	Atiyeda nani lu bi sam sang bing ga tangga basing sem thang nge.
40010031	Atibriakpina nani kachi mako; naniba basak taswang khak ma bakung tonuwe.
40010032	Tudannu mi nun meithaan bi Ating indao thangnu bating ga Eina le tambaan la ongnu Apa meithaan bi indao thanglune.
40010033	Atiyeda tudannu mi nun meithaan bi Ating za maknu bating ga Eina le tambaan la ongnu Apa meithaan bi za thanglaye.
40010034	Eina talei ram bi dai bazaangnu phun hungnuwe diga baning mako. Ei dai bazaangnu phun hungnu make atiyeda kachaak chem phun hungnuwe.
40010035	Balangbe Eina hungnuwa ‘Sa kapaisana bapa maitwang bi, sa kamaisana banu maitwang bi khatle bamouna bani maitwang bi pi ong lang’ hungnuwe
40010036	khatle ‘Mi khat om munanu ga bain inkhun bahak ka lune.’
40010037	“Pa mak tabe nu ding Ating ma kriang inkunu maan ga Aomme di lang khop make. Sa kapaisa mak tabe sa kamaisa ding Ating ma kriang inkunu maan ga Aomme di lang khop make.
40010038	Atiga baom cross phunluga Anung sui maknu maan ga Aomme di lang khop make.
40010039	Bakum ding lousunu maanna haga braanlune khatle Ameng langna bakum braannu maanna haga lousulune.
40010040	“Nani ding loukhut thangnu maan ga Ating loukhut thangnuwe khatle Ating loukhut thangnu maan ga Ating lang hungnu Bating loukhut thangnuwe.
40010041	Thiamting khat ting thiamting khat om meng bina loukhut thangnu maan ga thiamting om taswan ga lousulune. Atiga ririak senu mi pakhat ting ririak senu mi pakhat meng bina loukhut thangnu maan ga ririak senu mi om taswan ga lousulune.
40010042	“Tudannuna heiba kasinnu mi nun lak pi pakhat ting potroi khat om meng bi tui sik ngai khatcha beida pi thang nge dabe, Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, maan baom taswan ga impha ni beida braanlaye.”
40011001	Jisu na Baom potroi pat somga kani khou zathang pi thang taang bi Maanna bani om namlian bing la bachu thang lang khatle kasam thang lang haba riak ka bathan sat ngaake.
40011002	Christa om chwan lang bi John na qwan in bina theisunu kaan bi maanna baom potroi pat ni ding lang thangga
40011003	Bakhou ngaiye, “Hung dingnu Khat ka Nangbo mak tabe anina katei Pakhat ting ngaak lang maangbo?”
40011004	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina seluga nanina ngaisunu khatle munu ga John khou bapuro:
40011005	Mik chonuna mu lat rwe, ket thoknuna se lat rwe; imphaannu rwan ga bathiang lat rwe khatle kana setnuna ngaisu lat rwe; thinuna ring thou lat rwe khatle lungsianu nun khou sacham kasam thang rwe.
40011006	Atiga Ariak pina ket basui maknu maan ga aih sanuwe.”
40011007	Banina thou damnu kaan bi Jisu na mi nun khou John lang bi rin thou rwe, “Nanina ramhaang la pa-aam ding phaang lang swaknubo? Thiraangna raang kaling ongnu tou kung ding gabo?
40011008	Mak tabe nani pa-aam ding phaang lang se swaknubo? Banemnu pwan sin basoinu manpa ding gabo? Batak takka banemnu pwan sin basoinu mi nun ga krwang nun in bing la amme.
40011009	Atiyeda nani pa-aam ding phaang lang se swaknubo? Thiamting khat tingbo? O, Eina nani khou rinnuwe, thiamting ma le inkunu bating nge.
40011010	Balangbe balang bi hiak thang ngaaknu ga heiye, ‘Phaang ngo, Eina Nameithaan bi Nalampui bacha thang dingnu Achonglang ding lang thang nge.’
40011011	“Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, kamaisa nunna ponnu lak pi baptize to thangnu John ma lian inkunu khatchale maak maang nge; atiyeda tambaan krwang talei la sin kataknu maan gana bama lian inkuwe.
40011012	Baptize to thangnu John kaan bina atun tangnu bi tambaan krwang talei ya bathot sianu nun thwei bi riangre khaang ongme khatle bathot sianu nunna ha ding namga choi ongme.
40011013	Balangbe thiamting bingna khatle chongtanna John kaan tangga rin basaam thang ngaake.
40011014	Nanina ha ding ga lou nwamme dabe hung dingnu Elijah ga maan ga rwe.
40011015	Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo!
40011016	“Atiyeda Eina heiba mikin ding nga pa-aam le diga rin kaba dingbo? Bani ga keithian bi badungluga bani baan rwan ding kou ongnu naosen rwan ga dannuwe,
40011017	banina rinne, ‘Anina nani lang tamrwang sem thang nge, Atiyeda nanina laam make; Anina nani lang lungchung thang nge, Atiyeda nanina kakou make.’
40011018	Balangbe John ga sa in makka hung ngaake khatle banina rinne, ‘Bakhou ri kasia khut rwe.’
40011019	“Misa Sa Kapaisa ga sa inlu ga hung nge khatle banina rinne, ‘Phaang ngo, taraonu le zu kalonuwe, ramkhai khomnu khatle noh mi nun baanne!’ Atiyeda ningting ding nga bataknuwe dinu basa rwanna indaowe.”
40011020	Haba nung bi Maanna Baom tasiatnu chwan lian to thang damnu namlian inza ding twei thou rwe, balangbe bani sung le mak ngaake,
40011021	“Chorazin, nang aih sianuweda! Bethsaida, nang aih sianuweda! Balangbe nani khou to damnu tasiatnu chwan ga Tyre le Sidon bi to thang ngaake dabe banina bora pwan sin basoiluga khatle kaphut lak pi badungluga kamana sung le ngaak tingnuwe.
40011022	“Atiyeda chongsem lumik pi Tyre le Sidon na nani ma khaangsalune.
40011023	Capernaum, tambaan tangga kai basaang ka thangnu nang, kathi ram bi kaita thanglune; balangbe nakhou to thang damnu tasiatnu chwan bing ga Sodom bi to thang ngaake dabe haga aniya tangga am ngaak tingnuwe.
40011024	Atiyeda Eina nakhou rinnuwe, chongsem lumik pi Sodom taleina nalaang ma laak thangnu ga inkuga khaangsalune.”
40011025	Haba kaan bi Jisu na rinne, “He Apa, tambaan le talei om Pukraangba, Eina Nating swankaye, balangbe hei bing nga Nangna ningtingnu le katheinu mi nun khouna inkam thang rwe khatle baniga naosen rwan khou indao thang rwe.
40011026	O, Apa, balangbe haga Namikphaang bi pemnuwe.
40011027	“Apa na pot bingza Akhou bachoi thang rwe, Sa Kapaisa ding ga Pa zana makka pakhatchanale thei make. Hadanga Pa ding ga Sa Kapaisa zana makka khatle Sa Kapaisana indao thang nwamnu tudannu maan gana makka pakhatchanale thei make.
40011028	“Chwan riangrega tonu le potrit phunnu bing Akhou hung ngo, Eina nani ding lo pi basak thangne.
40011029	Aringok heiya nakhou phunno khatle Akhouna bachuwo, balangbe Ei sung bazaangnuwe khatle sung banemnuwe, atiga nani katha lang chungna lo basaknu lousulune.
40011030	Balangbe Aringok heiya phun baiye khatle Apotrit heiya zaang nge.”
40012001	Sabbath ni Jisu louzam bi serwan hung ngaake. Atiga Baom potroi rwan ga chaamruga gehu ui sa lang bazui thou rwe.
40012002	Pharisee rwanna haga munu kaan bi banina Bakhou rinne, “Phaang ngo, Naom potroi rwanna Sabbath ni to sannu chwan to ongme!”
40012003	Atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “David na maan le ong bachamnu rwanna chaamnu kaan bi maanna pa-aam to dambo dinu nani pa makchungbo?
40012004	Maanna Rikrwang in bi khutluga tako rwan zana makka maan khatle maan le bachamnu mi nunna sanu za maknu kat thangnu uilu ga sa damme.
40012005	Mak tabe Sabbath ni tako rwanna kalum in bi Sabbath ngaak mak peida koi make dinu chongtan bi nani pa makchungbo?
40012006	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, heiba riak piya kalum in ma lian inkunu Pakhat amme.
40012007	Atiyeda ‘Ei phaangkriang ding bathaiye, rikhaang pot ting make,’ dinu kaba heiya pa-aambo dinu nanina thei ngaake dabe, nanina koi maaknu mi nun ding ga koi pi ta mak ngaak tingnuwe.
40012008	Balangbe Misa Sa Kapaisa heiya Sabbath om Pukraangba le rwe.”
40012009	Maan habei gana se swakluga bani om synagogue pi khut rwe.
40012010	Phaang ngo, habei ga kut lwamnu manpa pakhat am ngaake. Banina Jisu ding koi impu thang langna Bakhou ngaiye, “Sabbath ni kanaanu pi sa thangnu zabo?”
40012011	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani lak pi manpa khat om zao khat Sabbath ni khun bi ta thang nge dabe ha ding ga khun bina kai thou thangla dingnu tu ambo?
40012012	Misana zao ma intia lang kung inkunubo? Atibriakpina Sabbath ni kasanu chwan to lang zaye.”
40012013	Haba nung bi Maanna manpa khouga rinne, “Nakut ka balaan swako.” Maanna balaan swaknu kaan bi bakut ka babaang khat ka danga sa bathiang drwe.
40012014	Habei ga Pharisee rwanna se swakluga Bating tatoga athat za dingbo diga Balang bi chong katu rwe.
40012015	Atiyeda Jisu na haga theinu kaan bi Maan habei gana se swak trwe. Atiga mi khang puina Banung suizon se ngaake khatle Maanna bani nun bing ding naanu pi sa thang rwe.
40012016	Atiyeda Maan tubo dinu rin indao swak mak lang Maanna bani khou katip thang ngaake,
40012017	heiya thiamting Isaiah na rin thang damnu ga hung tang lang nge,
40012018	“Phaang ngo! Eina kathang swaknu Aswak, Akatha na pem thangnu Aom kriangnu, Eina Balu chung bi Akatha ong thangne, Maanna Gentile rwan khou bazenu chongtok ka rin indaolune.
40012019	Maan kae kanaalaye khatle paolaye, Pakhatchana hakna lampui bi Bakhwan ngaisulaye.
40012020	Bazenu gana kraan ngam mak basaan, Maanna bazamnu tou ga to roplaye, Khatle meikhut ongnu dosi ga Maanna to mitlaye;
40012021	Atiga Bameng bi Gentile rwanna balumsa lune.”
40012022	Haba nung bi ri kasia khutnu, mik chonu khatle chong swak maknu pakhat ting Bakim bi kalwang hung ngaake. Jisu na bating pi sa thangga mik chonu khatle chong swak maknu manpa ga chong kabia rwe khatle mu rwe.
40012023	Atiga mi khang bingna loh loga rinne, “Heiya David Sa Kapaisa ga makpo?”
40012024	Pharisee rwanna haga theisunu kaan bi banina rinne, “Heiba manpana ri kasia nun om bapuba Beelzebub paan bina makka ri kasia nun ding kazun sat make.”
40012025	Atiyeda Jisu na bani baning ga theiluga bani khou rinne, “Bani bahak om maitwang bi khak langnu krwang talei bing braan lune khatle bani bahak maitwang bi khak langnu nampui mak tabe inkhun bing ga hannu ngamlaye.
40012026	“Seitaan na Seitaan ding kazun sate dabe, maan bahakna bating maitwangga khak langnuwe. Ati dabe bakrwang talei ga tatoga hannu ngam dingbo?
40012027	Eina Beelzebub paan bina ri kasia nun ding kazun sate dabe, nani sa kapaisa rwanna bani ding tu paan bina kazun satnubo? Atibriakpina bani ga nani om chongsempuba rwan tolune.
40012028	Atiyeda Eina ri kasia nun ding Rikrwang Katha paan bina kazun sate dabe, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nani khou hung rwe.
40012029	“Ati mak tabe kanatnu manpa ding ga karak kama makka, tatoga bain bi khutluga baom pot bing kapumnu ngam dingbo? Atiga karak taangnu nung maanna bain ga kapumnu ngamlune.
40012030	Ei le diga karung maknu maan ga Amaitwang bi ongnuwe khatle Ei le diga khom karung bacham maknu maan gana to imphaangnu miye.
40012031	“Atibriakpina Eina nani khou rinnuwe, mi nun om noh bing khatle Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatnu bing ding kok thanglune, atiyeda Katha ding rin basiatnu mi ding ga kok thanglaye.
40012032	“Tudannu Misa Sa Kapaisa maitwang bi chong kabianu bating ga kok thanglune; atiyeda tudannu Katha Bathiangnu ding rin basiatnu bating ga atun om bakaan mak tabe hung dingnu bakaan bi le bating ga kok thanglaye.
40012033	“Thingkung ga pi sawo khatle bakraa ga salune mak tabe thingkung ga pi siawo khatle bakraa ga sialune; balangbe bakraa bina thingkung ding bapu theiye.
40012034	“He barun om kik taat, nani nun sia briakpina tatoga kasanu kabia langbo? Balangbe sung bi sip ongnu bi gana munna kabiaye.
40012035	“Kasanu mina basung bi thang kadoi ongnu kasanu bi gana kasanu phun swake khatle kasianu mina basung bi thang kadoi ongnu kasianu bi gana kasianu phun swake.
40012036	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, mi nunna thou to makka kabia swak tamnu chongkaang om lang bi chongsem lumik pi banina hung katak lune.
40012037	Balangbe nachongkaangna nating pi baze thanglune khatle nachongkaangna nating pi koi thanglune.”
40012038	Haba nung bi chongtan bachuthangnu rwan kasem le Pharisee rwanna katake, “Bachuthangnupa, Nakhouna badannu khat anina mu nwamme.”
40012039	Atiyeda Maanna bani khou katake, “Sa maknu khatle rwan mei rwan basan laannu mikinna badannu ding rakanga zong nge atiyeda thiamting Jonah om badan ga makka badannu khatchale pi thanglaye.
40012040	Balangbe Jonah na ngaa pui bon sung bi thamlai inthum khatle zingpha inthum ong ngaaknu ga danga, Misa sa Kapaisa ga le talei sung bi thamlai inthum khatle zingpha inthum onglune.
40012041	“Chong kasemnu kaan bi Nineveh mi rwanna heiba mikin le han bachamlune khatle heiba mikin ding koi impu thanglune, balangbe Jonah om kasamnu bi bani sung le ngaake atiga phaang ngo, Jonah ma lian inkunu Pakhat abeiya amme.
40012042	Chongsem bi kathwei pek la ramaanuna heiba mikin le han bachamlune khatle heiba mikin ding koi impu thanglune, balangbe maanna talei kalan lana Solomon om ningting ding ngai lang hung ngaake khatle phaang ngo, Solomon ma lian inkunu Pakhat abeiya amme.
40012043	“Bathiang maknu katha khatna mi khat khouna swak tamnu kaan bi maan tui maaknu riak inza serwanga basak riak zong ngaake atiyeda dou make.
40012044	Habei ga maanna rinne, ‘Ei ong ngaaknu ain la ga han lat tam rwe.’ Maanna han hungnu kaan bi in ga barwang toga, than bathiang thangluga khatle kakam chui thang ngaaknu hung dou rwe.
40012045	Haba nung bi maanna seluga bama sia inkunu katha katei siari ding kalwang hung rwe, banina khutluga habei ga ong rwe khatle haba manpa om kakhamnu thot ka meithaan om gong ma sia inku rwe. Atiga sa maknu mikinna le ha khak khak lune.”
40012046	Jisu na mi khang khou chong kabia ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, Banu le Banao kapaisa rwanna Bating kabia lang langkaang la han ong ngaake.
40012047	Habei ga pakhatna Bakhou rinne, “Phaang ngo, Nanu le Nanao kapaisa rwanna Nating kabia lang langkaang la han ongme.”
40012048	Atiyeda Maanna Bakhou rin thangnu pakhat khouga rinne, “Anuzo tubo khatle Anao kapaisa rwanzo tubo?”
40012049	Maanna Baom potroi rwan pek la Bakut balaan swakluga rinne, “Phaang ngo, abeiya Anu le Anao kapaisa rwan amme!
40012050	Balangbe tudannu tambaan la ongnu Apa na baningnu to ongnu maan ga Au Anao, Asannu khatle Anu rwe.”
40013001	Ha ni ga Jisu haba in bi gana se swakluga tuipui paan bi ong ong ngaake.
40013002	Habei ga mi khang pui Bakim bi hung rwe, atiga Maan li khat pi khut ongta rwe khatle mi khang gana tui paan la han ong ngaake.
40013003	Haba nung bi Maanna mi nun khou chongchak taswang khak kabiaga rinne, “Phaang ngo, tachi bwannu mi khatna tachi bwan lang se swak ngaake.
40013004	Atiga maanna tachi bwannu kaan bi tachi kasemna lampui paan bi ta thang rwe; haga basaa nunna hungluga kachung sa damme.
40013005	Kasemna talei ti tomnu lung lak pi ta thang rwe; haga talei thuk mak briakpina bani ga barapka mongka rwe.
40013006	Atiyeda nisat nat kanu kaan bi baniga phouchaan ta damme khatle bakamong ta mak briakpina baniga baowei ta damme.
40013007	“Atiga kasemna kaling kung lak pi ta thang nge, kaling kung rwan gana thou kaluga bani ding namdan damme.
40013008	Atiyeda katei rwanna talei kasanu riak pi ta thangga bakraa kraa rwe: kasemna saruk raza, kasemna somruk, kasemna somthum kraa rwe.
40013009	Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo!”
40013010	Atiga potroi rwanna hungluga Bakhou ngaiye, “Nangna pa-aam lang bani khou chongchakna kabianubo?”
40013011	Maanna bani khou katake, “Tambaan krwang talei om inthim chong ga thei dam lang nani khou ningting pi thangnuwe atiyeda bani khoube haga pi thang make.
40013012	“Balangbe tudannu ka amnu bakhou ga inkuga pi thanglune khatle maanna inkuga amlune; atiyeda maaknu bakhouna baom ka amnu ga hakna lou sat tamlune.
40013013	Atibriakpina Eina bani khou chongchakna kabianuwe, balangbe banina phaang beida mu make, ngai peida bani ngaisu make khatle bakaba le thei make.
40013014	“Isaiah na atiga rin basaam thang ngaaknu ga bani khou hung tang rwe, ‘Nanina ngaisu ting tinglune atiyeda bakaba theilaye, Nanina mu ting tinglune atiyeda bakaba theilaye;
40013015	Balangbe heiba mi nun om sung nga indeh rwe. Bani kanaa nat rwe, Khatle bani mik le inmu drwe, Ati mak ngaake dabe bani mikna mu ngaak tingnuwe, Bani kanaana ngaisu ngaak tingnuwe, Bani sungna bakaba theiluga han hung ngaak tingnuwe, Atiga Eina bani ding pi sa thang ngaak tingnuwe.’
40013016	“Nani mik ka aih saye balangbe nani mikna muwe, nani kanaa ga aih saye, balangbe nani kanaana ngaisuwe.
40013017	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nanina munu ga thiamting khatle ririak senu inzana mu nwam ngaake atiyeda banina ha ding mu dam make, nanina ngaisunu ga banina ngaisu nwam ngaake atiyeda banina ngaisu dam make.
40013018	“Atibriakpina tachi bwannu om chongchak ka ngaiyo:
40013019	Tudannu pakhatna krwang talei om chong ga ngaisuluga bakaba thei maknu kaan bi kasianu pakhat kana hungluga basung bi bwan thang damnu tachi ga lou sat tamme. Heiya lampui paan bi bwan thang damnu tachi gaye.
40013020	Lung lak pi ta thangnu mu maan gana, chongkaang ga ngaisuluga barapka karoga lou thang nge;
40013021	atiyeda bakhou bakamong tathuk mak briakpina bakaan kasemza ring thang nge. Sacham lang chungna bakhou riangrenu mak tabe rainu hungnu kaan bi maan barapka ket basuiye.
40013022	Kaling lak pi ta thangnu tachi maan gabe chongkaang ngaisunu maan gaye khatle talei ram om sung katop khatle lan om minamnu gana chongkaang ding ga namdan damme khatle maan bakraa kraa lan rwe.
40013023	“Atiyeda talei kasa bi ta thangnu tachi gabe chongkaang ga ngaisunu khatle theinu maan gaye, maanna saruk raza, somruk khatle somthum kraa rwe.”
40013024	Maanna bani khou chongchak katei khatle rinne, “Tambaan krwang talei ga balou bi tachi kasanu bwan thangnu manpa pakhat ka dannuwe;
40013025	atiyeda mi nunna inthi thou damnu kaan bi bating munanu gana hungluga gehu mu lak pi loumu bwan thangluga thou dam ngaake.
40013026	Tachi ga thou kaluga saang ui swaknu kaan bi loumu kung bing ga le mu bathiang swak rwe.
40013027	“Atiga bapuba om swak rwanna hungluga bakhou ngaiye, ‘Bapuba, nangna nalou bi tachi kasanu bwan thangnu makpo? Ati dabe loumu bing nga inlamna hungnubo?’
40013028	“Maanna bani khou rinne, ‘Heiya munanuna tonuwe.’ Swak rwanna bakhou ngaiye, ‘Anina seluga haga mai satnu nangna bathaibo?’
40013029	“Atiyeda maanna rinne, ‘Mai sat mako, balangbe nanina lou kung mai satnu kaan bi gehu ga le mai satnu zaye.
40013030	‘Lou aat dat tang mak basaan kani rwei atiga thou ong dam ding ngo, lou aatnu dat pi Eina lou aat mi nun khou rinne, “Lou kung bing nga khom kadoi kamaluga mei thaang lang bakhwap toga karako atiyeda gehu ga aom inta bi hung thang ngo.” ’ ”
40013031	Maanna bani khou chongchak katei khatle rinne, “Tambaan krwang talei ga manpa khatna balou bi bwan thangnu ancham mu khat tannuwe,
40013032	haga tachi khon bina sin kataknuwe; atiyeda hagana thou kanu kaan bi anpek kung rwan katei ma lian inkuluga thingkung imbei rwe, atiga basaang la zwangnu basaa nunna le zwang hungluga bakachang bi kabu kai rwe.”
40013033	Maanna bani khou chongchak katei khatle rinne, “Tambaan krwang talei ga mannu pakhatna khai louluga sukdi luklei inthumna pwangka mak basaan habei ga ri thangnu khai ga le bachamme.”
40013034	Hei bing nga Jisu na mi khang khou chongchak toga rin thang ngaake; Maanna chongchak sui makka bani khou rin thang mak ngaake,
40013035	haga thiamtingna rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang nge, “Ei Abao aang thouluga chongchak ka rinlune; Talei dam bina inthim thang ngaaknu inkam thangnu balang bing Eina pao swaklune.”
40013036	Haba nung bi Jisu na mi khang ding bathan satluga insung la khut rwe. Atiga Baom potroi rwanna Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Lou bi loumu kung om chongchak bakaba ga ani khou rin chui thang ngo.”
40013037	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Kasanu tachi bwannu maan ga Misa Sa Kapaisa ye.
40013038	Lou ga talei ramme, kasanu tachi ga krwang talei om sa rwanne atiyeda loumu kung bing gana saka maknu pakhat om sa kapaisa rwanne.
40013039	Ha rwan ding bwan thangnu munanu gana Diabol ne, lou aat dat kana talei ram loinu ding nge khatle lou aat mi nun gana tambaan chonglang rwanne.
40013040	Atibriakpina lou kung bing ding ga khom kadoiluga mei bi bati satnu ga danga talei ram loinu kaan bi le hadanlune.
40013041	Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Baom tambaan chonglang rwan ding lang swaklune khatle mi nun ket pi basui ongnu bing, chongtan thouto makka ringnu mi nun ding banina Baom krwang talei bina lou satlune
40013042	khatle bani ding meikhun bi bazwan thanglune. Habei ga bani chapka ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune.
40013043	Atiga ririak senu mi nun gana bani Pa om krwang talei la lumik tanga baan onglune. Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo!
40013044	“Tambaan krwang talei ga lou bi inkam thangnu lan ga dannuwe. Manpa khatna douluga inkam rwe khatle haga karo briakpina maanna seluga baom ka am bing zwan satluga haba lou ga kalei rwe.
40013045	“Tambaan krwang talei ga baman kungnu lung ding zongnu langgonnu manpa pakhat tannuwe.
40013046	Maanna baman kungnu lung khat dounu kaan bi seluga baom ka am bing zwan satluga haga kalei rwe.
40013047	“Tambaan krwang talei ga tuipui bi satluga ngaa chaat bing ding khom thounu kalang ga dannuwe,
40013048	kalang ga sipnu kaan bi banina tui paan la kai swakluga bani badung taluga kasanu ngaa bing ga luklei bi thang rwe atiyeda kasianu bing ga bazwan sat tamme.
40013049	Talei ram loinu kaan bi le hadanlune. Tambaan chonglang rwan hungluga ririak senu nun lak pina kasianu nun ding khok lang swaklune
40013050	khatle bani ding meikhun bi bazwan thanglune. Habei ga chap barung hingga khatle ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune.”
40013051	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani hei bing nga bakaba theirubo?” “Thei rwe, Pukraangba,” diga banina Bakhou katak rwe.
40013052	Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atibriakpina tambaan krwang talei lang bi bachu thangnu lousu damnu chongtan bachuthangnu rwan bing ga baom inta bina lan kathan le braan bing phun swaknu inpu ga dannuwe.”
40013053	Jisu na heiba chongchak bing nga rin taangnu kaan bi Maan habei gana se swak trwe.
40013054	Maanna Banampui la hungnu kaan bi Maanna bani om synagogue pi bachu thang ngaake, habei ga banina loh loga rinne, “Heiba Manpana inlampaina heiba ningting khatle tasiatnu chwan bing nga lousunubo?
40013055	Heiya thing chwan tonu manpa sa Kapaisa ga makpo? Banu meng Mary diga kounu ga makpo? Atiga banao rwan James, Joses, Simon khatle Judas makpo?
40013056	Banao kamaisa rwan le ani kim bi ongnu makpo? Atiyeda heiba Manpana inlampaina hei bing nga lousunubo?”
40013057	Bani nun Bakhou ket basui rwe. Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Thiamting pakhat ting bataleina khatle bain inkhun bahakna makka bariak thin takhwang to maknu make.”
40013058	Banina balumsa mak briakpina Maanna habei ga tasiatnu chwan tamga to thang mak ngaake.
40014001	Haba kaan bi Herod Tetrarch na Jisu lang bi ngaisuluga
40014002	baswak rwan khou rinne, “Heiya baptize to thangnu John ga rwe; maan thi bina ring thou drwe atibriakpina heiba ngam bing nga bakhou am ongnuwe.”
40014003	Balangbe Herod na banao Philip mei Herodias lang chungna John ding namluga bang thang ngaake khatle bating qwan in bi thang ngaake.
40014004	Balangbe John na bakhou atiga rin ngaake, “Nangna bating lou lang za make.”
40014005	Herod na bating athat nwam ngaak peida maan mi nun ding kachi ngaake, balangbe mi nunna John ding thiamting khate diga basing chak thang ngaake.
40014006	Atiyeda Herod ting ponnu bangei lumik hung tangnu kaan bi Herodias sa rangaaknuna bani meithaan bi laamluga Herod ting pi pem thang rwe.
40014007	Atibriakpina maanna chongren suiga maanna ninu bing ga balaang pine diga karen thang ngaake.
40014008	Atiga banuna kathot thangga maanna rinne, “Baptize to thangnu John lu ga heiba butheng bi thangluga alaang piyo.”
40014009	Habei ga krwang basung riangre rwe; ati ngaak peida bachongren khatle maan le ong bachamnu mi nun lang chungna haga balaang pi lang zathang pi ngaak rwe.
40014010	Maanna mi langluga qwan in bi John ring pi tan rwe.
40014011	John lu ga butheng bi thangluga pon swak rwe khatle rangaaknu khou pi rwe, atiga maanna haga banu khou phun hung rwe.
40014012	Haba nung bi John om potroi rwanna hungluga bapum ga lou thouluga ri thang drwe khatle seluga Jisu khou bapu rwe.
40014013	Jisu na haga ngaisunu kaan bi Maan li hwanluga habei gana mi chiknu riak la Baraanto se pen drwe. Atiyeda mi nunna cham ga ngaisunu kaan bi namlian lana ketna Banung sui hung ngaake.
40014014	Jisu na tui paan hung tangnu kaan bi Maan mi khang pui ding mu rwe; Maan bani ding kriangnuna sip rwe khatle bani om kasa kanaa ding pi sa thang rwe.
40014015	Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Heiya mi chiknu riak chung nge, rei le rei rwe. Mi khang ding nga banina tanam la seluga balaang balaang thaisaak kalei dam lang pi sedro.”
40014016	Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Bani se lang bathaang maake. Nanina bani lang sa lang kasem pi thangbiyo.”
40014017	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Ani khou abeiya uilu impaang le ngaa kani za amme.”
40014018	Maanna rinne, “Haga Akhou lou hung ngo.”
40014019	Habei ga Maanna mi khang ding lousam bi badung ta lang zathang pi rwe. Maanna uilu impaang le ngaa kani ga louluga tambaan la phaangkaluga rithoi thang rwe khatle uilu ga thiak bakluga potroi rwan khou pi rwe; atiga potroi rwanna mi khang khou pi rwe.
40014020	Bani khangsung saluga imba rwe khatle banina balei thangnu katup ka luklei somga kani sipka khom thou ngaake.
40014021	Haga sa damnu mi nun ga kamaisa le naosen rwan ding pa makka kapaisa mi raching impaang khak ngaake.
40014022	Jisu na mi khang ding bathan sat ongnu kahan bi Maanna Baom potroi rwan ding li bi pi khutluga Bameithaan se dam lang tuipui raan khat la pi takan swak ngaake.
40014023	Maanna mi khang ding bathan satnu nung, Maan Baraanto rammwan la kalum lang ka ngaake. Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Maan habei ga Baraanto ong ngaake.
40014024	Atiyeda li ga tui kabaapnuna phunluga tuipui zai la am ngaake, balangbe thiraangna bani maitwang bi raang ngaake.
40014025	Atiga zingpha om balinu rangkaan dat pi Jisu tuipui chung bi ketna seluga bani kim la hung rwe.
40014026	Maanna tuipui chung bi ketna se hungnu ga potroi rwanna munu kaan bi bani kachi takka rinne, “Heiya to bathaanu ri zung nge!” Atiga banina kachi briakpina pao rwe.
40014027	Haba kahan bi Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Sung raang ngo, Ei zung nge; kachi mako.”
40014028	Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nang nge dabe tui chung bi Nakim la se hung lang akhou zathang pi thang ngo.”
40014029	Habei ga Maanna rinne, “Hungro.” Peter li bina taluga Jisu kim la se lang tui chung bi se hung rwe.
40014030	Atiyeda maan kanatnu thiraang ding ga munu kaan bi kachi ngaake khatle tui bi imphum ta thou briakpina maanna paoga rinne, “Pukraangba ating kan thang ngo!”
40014031	Haba kahan bi Jisu na Bakut balaan swakluga bating kai kadouluga bakhou rinne, “He balumsat sinnu nang, pa-aam to lang balumsianubo?”
40014032	Atiga barweina li sung bi khutnu kaan bi thiraang ga raang lan drwe.
40014033	Habei ga li sung bi ongnu nun gana hungluga Bating kalumga rinne, “Batak takka Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa zung nge.”
40014034	Banina tuipui ga takan swakluga Gennesaret taram la hung rwe.
40014035	Haba riak pi ongnu mi nunna Bating bapu theinu kaan bi haba taram bi am qwat ongnu bing khou cham ga kasam thou drwe khatle kasa kanaa bing ding Bakhou phun hung rwe.
40014036	Atiga banina Bapwan hum za beida banaan su lang Bakhou hweini ngaake. Atiga Bapwan banaan sunu mi bing ding pi sa thang ngaake.
40015001	Haba kaan bi Jerusalem lana chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna Jisu kim bi hungluga rinne,
40015002	“Naom potroi rwanna pa-aam toga patso rwan om chaang ding zei maknubo? Balangbe banina uilu sanu kaan bi bani kut kasin make.”
40015003	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Nanina le pa-aam toga nani chaang lang chungna Rikrwang om zathang ding zei maknubo?
40015004	Balangbe Rikrwang na zathang piga rinne, ‘Nanu napa ding takung tazeiyo’ khatle ‘Tudannu banu bapa ding rin basiatnu bating ga to that ting gaye.’
40015005	“Atiyeda nanina rinne, ‘Tudannu pakhatna banu mak tabe bapa khou, “Nang akhouna phang dingnu dam ga Rikrwang khou pi drwe” diga rinne dabe,
40015006	maan banu bapa ding takung tazei lang bathaang maake.’ Atiga Rikrwang om zathang ding nani om chaang gana bathaang maaknu pi to rwe.
40015007	Sathot tonu nun, Isaiah na nani lang bi bathiangga rin thang nge,
40015008	‘Heiba mi nunna bani mun zana Akhou banai hung nge, Bani munna Ating takung nge, Atiyeda bani sung ba Akhouna namlaaga amme.
40015009	Mi nun om zathang ding zekrin danga bachu thangga, Banina Ating bathaang maaknu bi kalumme.’ ”
40015010	Maanna mi khang ding Bakim bi kou hungluga bani khou rinne, “Ngaiyo khatle bakaba theiyo,
40015011	bao bi khut tamnu gana misa ding to tanaatnu make; atiyeda mun bina swaknu gana misa ding to tanaatnuwe.”
40015012	Habei ga Baom potroi rwanna hungluga Bakhou rinne, “Rin ongnuwa Pharisee rwanna ngaisunu kaan bi bani ket basui rwe dinu Nang theibo?”
40015013	Atiyeda Maanna katake, “Tambaan Apa na ling thang maknu thingkung bing ding ga phok satlune.
40015014	“Bani rang to dam ding ngo. Bani mik chonu nun ding lampui kai thangnu mik chonu mi nunne. Atiga mik chonuna mik chonu ding lampui kaiye dabe, pat ni rwei khun bi ta thanglune.”
40015015	Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Heiba chongchak kaba heiya ani khou rin chui thang ngo.”
40015016	Habei ga Jisu na rinne, “Nani le atun tangga bakaba thei mak aangbo?
40015017	Bao bi khut tamnu bing ga bon bi taluga habei gana langkaang la swak lat tamme dinu nani thei makpo?
40015018	Atiyeda mun bina swaknu bing ga sung lana swaknuwe, hagana misa ding ga to tanaate.
40015019	Balangbe sung lana sa maknu lungning, mi athatnu, rwan mei rwan basan laannu, lungmaannu, barusanu, kakoinu sake pinu khatle rin basiatnu hei bing nga swake.
40015020	Hei bing ngana mi khat ting to tanaatnuwe atiyeda kut kasin makka sanu gana mi khat ting to tanaatnu make.”
40015021	Habei gana Jisu na swakluga Tyre le Sidon taram la pen thou dam ngaake.
40015022	Atiga phaang ngo, haba taram lana Canaan rwan zwan khatna hungluga Bakhou paoga rinne, “He Pukraangba, David Sa Kapaisa, ating phaangkriang thang ngo, asa kamaisa ding ri kasianuna rai basiat takka ongme.”
40015023	Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou chong khatchale katak make. Atiga Baom potroi rwanna hungluga Bakhou rakanga rinne, “Heiba mannu ding pi sedro, balangbe maan ani nung la paoga ongme.”
40015024	Atiyeda Maanna rinne, “Israel inkhun om braan damnu zao rwan langza Ating lang hungnuwe.”
40015025	Atiga haba mannu gana hungluga Bating kalumga rinne, “Pukraangba, ating paang thang ngo!”
40015026	Atiyeda Maanna rinne, “Naosen rwan om uilu ga louluga ui swan nun lang bazwan thangnu sa make.”
40015027	Mannu gana rinne, “O, Pukraangba, atiyeda bapuba om table bina kadaak tanu uilu katupka ui swan nunna le kachung sa dabo.”
40015028	Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “He kamaisa, nabalumsat heiya lianne! Nangna baningnu ga ati dingro.” Haba chakrin bi ga basa kamaisa ding pi sa thang rwe.
40015029	Jisu na habei gana swakluga Galilee tuipui paan bi se hung rwe khatle rammwan la kaluga habei ga ong ong ngaake.
40015030	Habei ga mi khang pui Bakim bi hung rwe, atiga ket thoknu, mik chonu, chong swak maknu, kut ket lwamnu khatle katei inza ding banina Jisu ket kim bi hung thang rwe khatle Maanna bani ding pi sa thang rwe.
40015031	Atiga chong swak maknuna chong swak latnu, kut ket lwamnuna sa latnu, ket thoknuna se ngam latnu khatle mik chonuna mu latnu ga mi khangna munu kaan bi bani loh loga Israel om Rikrwang ding banina swan rwe.
40015032	Jisu na Baom potroi rwan ding Bakim bi kou hungluga rinne, “Ei heiba mi khang ding nga kriang rwe, balangbe bani Ei le ong bacham hungnu ni thum rwe khatle bani sa lang khatchale maak rwe. Atiga bani ding bon chaamga bathan thangnu Ei bathai make, balangbe bani lampui bi tathiat ponnu le zaye.”
40015033	Habei ga Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Ramhaang biya heiba mi khang pui lang sakhop lang uilu anina inlampaina lousu dingbo?”
40015034	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani khou uilu inza ambo?” Banina, “Uilu siari le ngaa swan kasem amme” diga katak rwe.
40015035	Atiga Maanna mi khang ding talei bi ongta lang zathang pi rwe.
40015036	Maanna uilu siari le ngaa ga louluga swanka thang rwe khatle haga thiak bakluga Baom potroi rwan khou pi rwe; atiga potroi rwanna mi khang lang kasem thang rwe.
40015037	Atiga bani khangsung saluga imba rwe khatle balei thangnu bakatup ka banina luklei pui sipnu siari khom thou ngaake.
40015038	Habei sa damnu nun ga kamaisa le naosen rwan ding pa makka kapaisa rwan mi raching bali ngaake.
40015039	Atiga Maanna mi khang ding bathan thangluga li bi khut rwe khatle Magdala taram la hung rwe.
40016001	Pharisee rwan le Sadducee rwanna hungluga Bating tamga tambaan lana badannu khat Maanna bani khou pi mu thang lang rin ngaake.
40016002	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Khwazinren tanu kaan bi nanina rinne, ‘Khwa salune balangbe saangbaan senne’
40016003	khatle louthwan thou bi nanina rinne, ‘Aniya khwa salaye balangbe saangbaan senne khatle khwa dweiye.’ Sathot tonu nun ga, nanina saangbaan om thot ting rin basaamnu ngamme, atiyeda bakaan om badan bing ding ga nanina rin basaamnu ngam make.
40016004	Sa maknu khatle rwan mei rwan basan laannu mikinna badannu ding rakanga zong nge atiyeda Jonah om badan ga makka bani khou badan khatchale pi thangla rwe.” Atiga Maanna bani ding bathan thangsialuga thou drwe.
40016005	Baom potroi rwanna tui raan khat la hungnu kaan bi bani uilu phun banim ngaak rwe.
40016006	Habei ga Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Pharisee rwan le Sadducee rwan om khai lang bi cheksinno.”
40016007	Atiga banina bani cham lak pi kathuiga rinne, “Heiya anina uilu phun mak briakpina Maanna rinnuwe.”
40016008	Atiyeda Jisu na ha ding theiluga bani khou rinne, “He balumsat sinnu naniga, paaam lang nani cham nanina uilu phun hung mak briakpinaye diga kathui ongnubo?
40016009	“Mi raching impaang lang uilu impaang khatle nanina luklei inza khom thoubo dinu nani atun tangga thei mak aangbo mak tabe baningsu makpo?
40016010	Mak tabe mi raching bali lang uilu siari khatle luklei pui inza nanina khom thou dambo?
40016011	Eina uilu om lang bi nani khou rinnu make dinu tatoga nanina bakaba thei maknubo? Atiyeda Pharisee rwan le Sadducee rwan om khai lang bi cheksinno.”
40016012	Habei ga banina uilu om khai lang bi cheksinno diga Maanna rinnu make atiyeda Pharisee rwan le Sadducee rwan om bachu thangnu lang bi cheksin lang rinnuwe dinu thei ngaake.
40016013	Jisu na Caesarea Philippi taram la hungnu kaan bi Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou ngaiye, “Misa Sa Kapaisa Ating mi nunna Tu we diga rinbo?”
40016014	Banina katake, “Kasemna baptize to thangnu John ne diye, kasemna Elijah ye, kateina Jeremiah mak tabe thiamting rwan lak pi pakhate diye.”
40016015	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atiyeda nanina Ei ya Tu we dibo?”
40016016	Simon Peter na katake, “Nang ringnu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa Christa gaye.”
40016017	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Simon Bar- Jonah, nang aih saye, balangbe heiya thi le pumna nakhou indao thangnu make, atiyeda tambaan la ongnu Apa naye.
40016018	“Eina le nakhou rinnuwe, nang Peter ye, heiba lung pui chung bi Eina Aom rupkathan to thoulune khatle kathi ram om kapan inkhaan nunna ha ding maitwang ngamlaye.
40016019	Eina nakhou tambaan krwang talei om taapthing rwan ga pi thanglune atiga talei ram bi nangna bang thangnu ga tambaan la le bang thanglune khatle talei ram bi nangna sut thangnu ga tambaan la le sut thanglune.”
40016020	Habei ga Maan Jisu wa Christa ye dinu pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mak lang Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou zathang pi thang rwe.
40016021	Haba kaanbi gana thouga Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou Maan Jerusalem la se dingnu khatle riangrenu taswang khak khaang dingnu atiga patso rwan, takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna za mak tingnu, Bating athat tingnu khatle ni thum ni ring thou lat tingnu lang bi pi mu thang thou rwe.
40016022	Habei ga Peter na Jisu ding tei kalwang swakluga Bating tweiga rinne, “Pukraangba, haga Nakhouna namlaaga am ding ngo; heiya Nakhou khatchale swak mak ting ngo!”
