40016023	Atiyeda Maanna kanei swakluga Peter khou rinne, “Seitaan, Anung la thoudro, nang Alaang ket basui riak to rwe, balangbe nangna Rikrwang om lang bi kakhan make atiyeda mi nun om lang bi kakhanne.”
40016024	Haba nung bi Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Tudannuna Anung sui nwam me dabe, baraanto bating za mak ting ngo khatle baom cross ka lou thouluga Anung sui ding ngo.
40016025	Balangbe tudannuna bakatha ding kan nwamnu maan ga baraanlune atiyeda Alaang chungna bakatha braannu mi gana bakatha lousulune.
40016026	Balangbe mi khatna talei ram bing balaang lousuluga bakatha braanne dabe, balaang pa-aam tongnu ambo? Mak tabe mi khatna bakatha lang chungna pa-aam le takhenebo?
40016027	“Balangbe Misa Sa Kapaisa ga Bapa om lwat le Baom tambaan chonglang rwan le diga hunglune, habei ga Maanna bani mi bing lang bani om chwan nung suiga taswan ga pi thanglune.
40016028	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Misa Sa Kapaisana Bakrwang talei la hungnu mu mak basaan thinu batemla dingnu mi kasem abeiya han ongme.”
40017001	Ni karuk nung bi Jisu na Peter, James khatle banao John ding kalwangluga bani raanto basaangnu rammwan la ka ngaake.
40017002	Atiga Maan bani meithaan bi man gon swak rwe. Bamai kum ga lumik tanga baan ngaake khatle Bapwan ga babaan danga ngou ngaake.
40017003	Phaang ngo, bani khou Moses le Elijah ding pi mu thang rwe, bani Maan le diga chong kabia ong ngaake.
40017004	Peter na Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, ani abeiya ongnuna sa rwe; Nangna za thang nge dabe, anina pwan in inthum: Nalaang khat, Moses lang khat atiluga Elijah lang khat bacharizo.”
40017005	Maanna kabia ongnu kahan bi phaang ngo, kabaannu tambu khatna bani ding hwam lem rwe khatle tambu lak pina khwan khatna rinne, “Heiya Eina kriangnu Asa Kapaisa ye, Bakhou Ei pem tak rwe. Bachong zeiyo!”
40017006	Potroi rwanna khwan ga ngaisunu kaan bi bani mai talei bi kunta rwe khatle bani kachi tak ngaake.
40017007	Atiyeda Jisu na hungluga bani ding banaanluga rinne, “Thouro, kachi mako.”
40017008	Banina phaangkanu kaan bi Jisu ding makka mi katei pakhatcha ding le mu mak ngaake.
40017009	Banina rammwan lana tanu kaan bi Jisu na bani khou zathang piga rinne, “Misa Sa Kapaisana thi bina ring thou lat mak basaan pi mu thang damnu ga pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako.”
40017010	Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou ngaiye, “Ati dabe tatoga chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Elijah hung kama lang nge diga rinnubo?”
40017011	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Batak takka Elijah na hung kamaluga pot bing nga pi hanchin thanglune.
40017012	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Elijah ba kamaga hung taang drwe khatle banina bating thei thang make atiyeda banina to nwamnu ga bakhou to drwe. Hadanga Misa Sa Kapaisa ga le bani kut pi riangre khaang ding rwe.”
40017013	Habei ga Maanna baptize to thangnu John lang bi rinnuwe dinu potroi rwanna thei ngaake.
40017014	Banina mi khang khou hungnu kaan bi manpa khatna Bakim bi hungluga Bameithaan bi kekhok detaluga rinne,
40017015	“Pukraangba, asa kapaisa ding phaangkriang thang ngo, balangbe maan sensari phunluga naa rakan takka ongme; balangbe maan mei bi katupka balum thang nge khatle tui bi katupka buktaye.
40017016	“Eina bating Naom potroi rwan khou phun hung nge atiyeda banina bating pi sa thangnu ngam make.”
40017017	Habei ga Jisu na rinne, “He balumsat maaknu khatle lampui maannu mikin ga, Ei nani le diga inchan tangga ong bacham lang maangbo? Ei nani le inchan tangga khaang ong lang maangbo? Bating Akhou phun hung ngo.”
40017018	Atiga Jisu na ri kasia ding tweinu kaan bi haga bakhouna swak trwe khatle naosen ga haba chakrin bina sa drwe.
40017019	Habei ga potroi rwanna Jisu khou inthimthwei toga hungluga rinne, “Anina pa-aam to briakpina ha ding ga bathou satnu ngam maknubo?”
40017020	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani om balumsat sin briakpinaye; balangbe Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, ancham mu tiaza beida nani balumsat ka amme dabe nanina heiba rammwan ding nga rinlune, ‘Abeina ula ga ong kale dammo’ atiga haga ong kale damlune khatle nani lang ngamla dingnu khatchale amlaye.
40017021	Atiyeda heipaiya hweininu le kalumsannuna makka swaklaye.”
40017022	Banina Galilee bi ong bacham ongnu kaan bi Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Misa Sa Kapaisa ding mi nun kut pi pi swak lang nai rwe,
40017023	atiga banina Bating athatlune khatle Bating ni thum ni pi ring thou thang latlune.” Habei ga bani sung riangre tak ngaak rwe.
40017024	Banina Capernaum bi hungnu kaan bi, drachma kani om ramkhai khomnu mi kasemna Peter kim bi hungluga ngaiye, “Nani om Bachuthangnupa na drachma kani om ramkhai pi makpo?”
40017025	Maanna rinne, “Piye.” Atiga maan insung la khutnu kaan bi Jisu na kamaga bakhou ngaiye, “Simon, nang pa-aam baningbo? Talei krwang nunna tukhouna pot om ramkhai khatle mi sing semnu om ramkhai loubo, bani sa kapaisa rwan khou namo mak tabe man ram rwan khouna lounubo?”
40017026	Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Man ram rwan khou naye.” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Ati dabe bani sa kapaisa rwan ga pi lang bazek swak make.
40017027	“Ati ngaaklena anina bani ding ket pi basui mak lang tuipui la sero, khoi kairo khatle man kama kataknu ngaa ga louwo. Atiga babao khok aangnu kaan bi nangna shekel khat doulune; haga louluga Alaang le nalaang bani khou pi thang biyo.”
40018001	Haba kaan bi potroi rwanna Jisu kim bi hungluga ngaiye, “Tambaan krwang talei la tuna lian kataknubo?”
40018002	Habei ga Jisu na kasinnu naosen khat ting Bakhou kou hungluga bani lak pi bating pi badung thangluga
40018003	rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nanina sung leluga kasinnu naosen rwan dan make dabe, nani impha ni beida tambaan krwang talei la khutlaye.
40018004	Atibriakpina tudannu heiba kasinnu naosen danga sung bangiamnu maan gana tambaan krwang talei la lian kataknuwe.
40018005	Tudannuna heiba kasinnu naosen dannu pakhat ting Ameng bina lou thang nu maan ga Ating lou thang nuwe.
40018006	Atiyeda tudannuna Ating balumsanu heipai kasinnu pakhat ting noh pi tonu bating ga baring bi saang tak lung khit thangluga kathuknu tuipui bi bazwan thang damme dabe hana balaang sa inku dingnuwe.
40018007	“Ket basuinu riak tamga amnu talei ram ma aih sia yeda! Balangbe ket basuinuwa hunglune atiyeda ket pi basuinu manpa ga aih sianuweda!
40018008	Nakutna mak tabe naketna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga tanchatluga nakhouna asat tammo. Kut kani mak tabe ket kani amga khatchale mit lat maknu meikhun bi bazwan thangnu ma, ket thokka ati mak tabe kut ket bachang makka ringnu kum lousunu gana nalaang sa inkuwe.
40018009	Namikna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga ran swakluga nakhouna asat tammo. Mik kani amga chok ongnu meikhun bi khutnu ma, mik khatcha phunluga ringnu kum lousunu gana nalaang sa inkuwe.
40018010	Heiba kasinnu naosen rwan pakhat ting thou to maknu to mak lang nani cheksinno, balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, tambaan la bani om tambaan chonglang rwanna tambaan bi ongnu Apa mai kum ding chat makka mu ongme.
40018011	Balangbe Misa Sa Kapaisa ga braan damnu ding kan thang langna hungnuwe.
40018012	“Nani pa-aam baningbo? Manpa khat om zao raza amnu lak pina khat poi braan damme dabe, maanna zao somkaqwaga kaqwa ding rammwan bi thangsialuga poi braan damnu khat ting ga zong lang selabo?
40018013	Maanna ha ding ga zongsuwe dabe, Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, poi braan maknu zao somkaqwaga kaqwa lang ma haba zao lang gana maan karo inkulune.
40018014	Hadanga heiba kasinnu naosen rwan lak pina pakhat braan dingnu ga tambaan la ongnu nani Pa om baningnu make.
40018015	“Nau nanao pakhatna namaitwang bi noh towe dabe, seluga narwei chamza kadouluga baom koi maan ga bakhou inthim toga rin thang biyo. Maanna nachong ga lou thang nge dabe, nangna nau nanao ding ga lousunu rwe.
40018016	Atiyeda maanna nachong ga lou thang make dabe, ‘Sake pat ni mak tabe pat thum om paanna chongkaang bing ga pi tip thang lang’ mi pakhat mak tabe pat ni ding kalwangluga seyo.
40018017	Maanna bani chong ga le lou thang make dabe, haga rupkathan khou rin thang ngo. Maanna rupkathanna rinnu tangga lou thang make dabe, bating ga Gentile le ramkhai khomnu khat tanga chak thang ngo.
40018018	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, talei ram bi nanina bangnu ga tambaan la le banglune khatle talei ram bi nanina sut thangnu ga tambaan la le sut thanglune.
40018019	Eina nani khou rin late, talei ram bi nani lak pi pat nina sung kazonga pa-aam ngaakle niye dabe, haga tambaan la ongnu Apa na bani lang to thanglune.
40018020	Balangbe Ameng bi pat ni mak tabe pat thumna kadoinu riak pi, Ei bani lak pi sui ongme.”
40018021	Haba nung bi Peter na Bakim bi hungluga ngaiye, “Pukraangba, au anaona amaitwang bi katupka noh towe dabe ei bating kok thang leng inza langbo? Leng siari langbo?”
40018022	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina nakhou leng siariyo dinu make atiyeda somsiari ga leng siariyo dinuwe.
40018023	Atibriakpina tambaan krwang talei ga baswak rwan le diga sian paak pa bacham nwamnu krwang khatle bachamme.
40018024	Maanna sian paak ka chak thounu kaan bi baom talent raching som chaaknu manpa pakhat ting bakim bi phun hung rwe.
40018025	Atiyeda maanna baom lei ga thun ngam mak briakpina bapuba na haga thunnu ngam lang bamei le basa rwan khatle baom ka am bing zwan satluga lei ga thun lang zathang pi rwe.
40018026	Atibriakpina swak kana bameithaan bi in bakhup taluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, ating bakaan kasem ngaak thang kammo, eina nalaang bapum brum ga thunne.’
40018027	Habei ga swak om bapuba gana bating kriang thangga bating bathan thang rwe khatle baom lei bing ga kok thang rwe.
40018028	Atiyeda haba swak kana se swaknu kaan bi baom denari raza chaaknu swak to bachamnu pakhat ting kadou rwe; maanna bating bweiluga baring hung somluga rinne, ‘Nangna chaaknu ga akhou thunro!’
40018029	Swak to bachamnu maan gana baket pi in bakhup taluga bakhou hweiga rinne, ‘Ating bakaan kasem ngaak thang kammo, eina nalaang bapum brum ga thunne.’
40018030	Atiyeda maanna za makka bating namluga lei ga thun mak basaan qwan in bi thang rwe.
40018031	Maanna to damnu bing ga swak to bachamnu rwanna munu kaan bi bani sung sok rwe khatle hungluga swak tamnu bing ga bani om bapuba khou pu thang rwe.
40018032	Habei ga bapuba gana bating kou hungluga rinne, ‘Sa ka maknu swak! Nangna akhou hwei briakpina eina naom lei bapum brum ga kok thang rwe.
40018033	Eina nating kriang thangnu danga nangna le swak to bachamnu bating ga kriang thang za makkabo?’
40018034	Bapuba ga balung pwanga bating balei chaak bapum brum ga maanna thun mak basaan bating rainu mi nun khou pi thang rwe.
40018035	Atiga nani mi bingna le bani unao ding sung kalan lana kok thang make dabe, tambaan la ongnu Apa na le nani khou hadanga to thanglune.”
40019001	Jisu na hei bing nga kabia taangnu nung Maan Galilee bina swakluga Jordan raan la amnu Judea taram bi hung rwe.
40019002	Atiga mi khang puina Banung sui se ngaake khatle Maanna haba riak pi ga bani om kasa kanaa ding pi sa thang ngaake.
40019003	Pharisee rwan le Bakim bi hungluga Bating tamga Bakhou ngaiye, “Manpa khatna titcha lang bina bamei ding kanoinuwa zabo?”
40019004	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Nani heiya pa makchungbo? Hagazo bani ding dam thangnu Maanna thoutan bi ‘kapaisa le kamaisa ding dam thang ngaake,’
40019005	Maanna rinne, ‘Atibriakpina kapaisana banu bapa ding asat thangsialuga bamei le diga karung ding gaye khatle barwei pat ni ga pum khatcha tolang nge.’
40019006	Atiga barwei ga pat ni latlan rwe atiyeda pum khatcha to rwe. Atibriakpina Rikrwang na kai karung thang damnu ga mi khatchanale to kapaang lat mak ting ngo.”
40019007	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Ati dabe mei kanoi chonghiak pi luga mei kapaang lang nge diga Moses na zathang pi thangnu ga pa-aam langbo?”
40019008	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani sung nat briakpina Moses na nani ding mei kanoi lang za thangnuwe atiyeda thoutan binaba haga ati make.
40019009	Eina nani khou rinnuwe, tudannu bameina lungmaannuna makka bamei ding kanoi satluga kamaisa katei ding lounu maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe khatle tudannu kanoi satnu kamaisa ding lou latnu maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe.”
40019010	Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Kapaisa le bamei om gong nga atinu amme dabe mei katha maknuna sa inkuwe.”
40019011	Atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “Hei rin ongnuwa mi bing zana lou thangnu ngam make atiyeda heiya pi thang damnu mi nun zana lou thangnu ngamme:
40019012	Balangbe bani nu bonpui lana basa semnu toga ponnu le amme, mina sem nu basa semnu nun le amme khatle tambaan krwang talei lang chungna bani raanto zana semnu basa semnu nun le suiye. Lou thang ngamnu maan gana lou thang ding ngo.”
40019013	Haba nung bi kasinnu naosen rwan ding Jisu na bani lu chung bi Bakut kaising thangluga kalum thang langna Bakhou kalwang hung ngaake atiyeda potroi rwanna bani ding twei ngaake.
40019014	Atiyeda Jisu na rinne, “Kasinnu naosen rwan ga Akhou hung ding ngo, bani ding khaam mako; balangbe tambaan krwang talei ga hei rwan dannu nun lang nge.”
40019015	Maanna bani lu chung bi Bakut kaising thangnu nung habei gana se swak trwe.
40019016	Phaang ngo, tudannu pakhatna hungluga Bakhou rinne, “Kasanu Bachuthangnupa, ringzoknu kum lousu lang eina pa-aam kasanu chwan to langbo?”
40019017	Maanna bakhou rinne, “Nangna pa-aam lang Ating kasanu diga kounubo? Pakhat tak pakhatcha amnu Rikrwang ga makka kasanu pakhatchale maake. Atiyeda nangna ringnu bi ga khut nwamme dabe zathang bing ga zeiyo.”
40019018	Maanna Jisu khou rinne, “Hazo tatonu zathangbo?” Jisu na rinne, “ ‘Nang mi athat mak ting gaye,’ ‘Nang lungkoi lungmaan mak ting gaye,’ ‘Nang barusa mak ting gaye,’ ‘Nang kakoinu sake pi mak ting gaye,’
40019019	‘Nanu napa ding takung tazeiyo’ khatle ‘Na innai lounai rwan ding nazan bahak ting danga kriang ding gaye.’ ”
40019020	Katangpa gana Jisu khou rinne, “Hei bing nga ei naosen badona zei hung rwe. Ei pa-aam baat maangbo?”
40019021	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna khopsanu to nwamme dabe, sero, naom ka am bing ga zwan satluga lungsianu nun lang piyo ati dabe tambaan la nalaang lan amlune khatle hung ngo, Anung suiyo.”
40019022	Atiyeda rin ongnu chong ga katangpa gana ngaisunu kaan bi maan sung riangrega thou drwe, balangbe maan lan tam takka am ngaake.
40019023	Habei ga Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, lungsanu pakhatna tambaan krwang talei la khut lang kung nge.
40019024	Eina nani khou rin late, lungsanu mi khatna Rikrwang om krwang talei khutnu ma ut khatna kaphin kana bi lon brwannuna bai inkuwe.”
40019025	Baom potroi rwanna haga ngaisunu kaan bi bani taswang khak lang loh loga rinne, “Ati dabe tuna kanthangnu lousu ngam dingbo?”
40019026	Jisu na bani ding phaangluga rinne, “Misa lang heiya hung tanglanuwe atiyeda Rikrwang khou pum brumza hung tang nge.”
40019027	Habei ga Peter na Jisu khou rinne, “Phaang thang ngo, anina pum brumza bathan satluga Nanung sui se ongme. Atibriakpina ani pa-aam amlu dingbo?”
40019028	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, hung dingnu bakaan bi Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Baom lwat liannu krwang takung riak pi ongnu kaan bi Anung suinu nani nun le krwang takung riak som ga kani bi ongluga Israel om phum som ga kani ding chong kasemlune.
40019029	Atiga Ameng lang chungna in mak tabe unao rwan mak tabe nu mak tabe pa mak tabe mei mak tabe basa rwan mak tabe taram bathan satnu mi bingna, badam raza inkuga lousulune khatle khwa sei ringnu lousulune.
40019030	Atiyeda kamanu inzana kakhamnu tolune khatle kakhamnuna kamanu tolune.
40020001	“Balangbe tambaan krwang talei ga mi pakhatna baom drakha anqwat pi chwan to lang chwantok mi lan lang louthwan khwan se swaknu loupuba ga dannuwe.
40020002	Maanna chwantok mi nun le diga lumik pi denari khat lang zakaleluga bani ding baom drakha anqwat la bathan thang rwe.
40020003	Chakrin inthum khak tanu dat pi maanna se swaknu kaan bi katei rwan ga chwan maakka keithian bi han kadoi ongnu muluga
40020004	bani khou rinne, ‘Nani le drakha anqwat la sero khatle pi lang swaknu dam ga ei nani lang pine.’ Habei ga bani nun thou drwe.
40020005	Maanna chakrin karuk khatle chakrin kaqwa tanu dat pi le se swak latluga meithaan to damnu ga danga to rwe.
40020006	Atiga chakrin somga khat khak tanu dat pi maanna se swaknu kaan bi katei rwan le chwan to makka han ongnu muluga bani khou rinne, ‘Nani pa-aam toga heiba riak pi chwan to makka tarin han ongnubo?’
40020007	Banina bakhou rinne, ‘Ani ding mi pakhatchanale lan thang mak briakpinaye.’ Maanna bani khou rinne, ‘Nani le drakha anqwat la sero khatle phang lang swaknu dam ga nanina lousulune.’
40020008	Khwazinren tanu dat pi anqwat om bapuba na chwan thou phaangsinnu mi khou rinne, ‘Chwantok mi nun ding kouluga lan kham kataknu bina thouga lan kamanu lang tangga bani lo man ga pi thangbiro.’
40020009	Atiga khwazin chakrin somga khat khak tanu kaan bi lan thangnu rwan ga hungluga bani mi pakhat khatna denari khat khat phang rwe.
40020010	Atiyeda kamanu rwan gana hungnu kaan bi banina phang inkulune diga baning ngaake; atiyeda bani pakhat khatna denari khat khat phang rwe.
40020011	Banina haga phangnu kaan bi loupuba maitwang bi tu tu tam tamga
40020012	rin rwe, ‘Heiba hung khamnu nun ba chakrin khatcha chwan towe atiyeda nangna bani ding potrit phunnu le nisat pi riangrenu khaangnu ani le pi bacham thang nge.’
40020013	Atiyeda maanna bani pakhat khou katake, ‘Baanno, ei nakhou koinu to make. Nang ei le diga denari khat pi zakalenu makpo?
40020014	Naom lo man ga louluga sero. Eina heiba kakhamnu manpa lang le nalaang pinu chaang ga le bachamga pi lang baning nge.
40020015	Ei aom lan ding eina baningnu to lang zanu makpo? Mak tabe ei sa briakpina namikna antiamnubo?’
40020016	Atibriakpina kakhamnuna kamalune khatle kamanuna kham lune, balangbe mi taswang khak ting kouwe atiyeda titcha ding kathang nge.”
40020017	Jisu na Jerusalem la se ongnu kaan bi potroi pat somga kani ding tei kou swakluga bani khou rinne,
40020018	“Phaang ngo, ani Jerusalem la se ongme, atiga Misa Sa Kapaisa ding takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khou pi swaklune; banina Bating koi impu thangluga athat satlune.
40020019	Bating Gentile rwan khou choi banui lang, bwei lang khatle cross pi athat lang pi swaklu rwe. Atiga Maan ni thum ni ring thou latlune.”
40020020	Haba nung bi Zebedee sa rwan nuna basa kapaisa kani le diga Bakim bi hungluga kuntaluga Bakhouna pa-aambo khat ni ngaake.
40020021	Jisu na bakhou ngaiye, “Nang pa-aam bathaigabo?” Maanna Jisu khou rinne, “Nakrwang talei la asa kapaisa pat ni ding nga pakhat ting Nakut inchang pek la khatle pakhat ting imbei pek la ong lang za thang ngo.”
40020022	Atiyeda Jisu na katake, “Nanina ni ongnu ga paaambo dinu nani thei make. Eina in dingnu ngai ga nanina innu ngambo khatle Ating baptize to ongnu danga nani ding baptize pi tonu ngam dingbo?” Banina Bakhou katake, “Ani ngam khope.”
40020023	Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina Aom ngai ga batakka inlune khatle Ating baptize to thangnu bi ga nani dingle baptize to thanglune; atiyeda Akut inchang pek la khatle imbei pek la ong dingnu ga Eina pi dingnu make atiyeda haga Apa na pi lang daan thang ongnu bani lang nge.”
40020024	Potroi pat som gana haga ngaisunu kaan bi unao pat ni ding pem mak tak rwe.
40020025	Atiyeda Jisu na bani ding Bakhou kou hungluga rinne, “Gentile om bapuba rwanna bani lu chung bi nam danga bapuba to rwe khatle kaliannu nunna bani lu chung bi ngam chwan ga nam ga towe dinu nanina theiye.
40020026	Nani lak pi ba ati mak ting gaye; atiyeda nani lak pi tudannu kaliannu to nwamnu maan ga nani swak to ding ngo
40020027	khatle nani lak pi tudannu kamanu to nwamnu maan ga nani swak to ding ngo.
40020028	Hadanga Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Bating chwanlaang pi to thang langna hungnu make atiyeda chwanlaang to langna khatle mi taswang khak ting ran swak thang lang Bakum ding bathan swak thangnu man toga pi swak thang langna hungnuwe.”
40020029	Banina Jericho bina se swaknu kaan bi mi khang puina Banung sui se ngaake.
40020030	Atiga phaang ngo, mik chonu pat ni lampui kom bi badung ong ngaake, barweina Jisu hung naye dinu ngaisunu kaan bi paoga rinne, “He Pukraangba, David Sa Kapaisa! Arwei ding phaangkriang thang ngo.”
40020031	Habei ga mi khangna barwei ding thiap thiap ong ngo diga twei rwe; atiyeda barweina pao rakan ranga rinne, “He Pukraangba, David Sa Kapaisa! Arwei ding phaangkriang thang ngo.”
40020032	Atiga Jisu na han ngaakluga barwei ding kouluga ngaiye, “Eina narwei lang paaam to thangnu bathaigabo?”
40020033	Barweina Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, arwei mik pi mu thang ngo.”
40020034	Habei ga Jisu na kriangga barwei mik pi banaan thang rwe. Atiga haba kahan bi ga barwei mik mu lat rwe khatle barweina Banung sui se rwe.
40021001	Banina Jerusalem nai hungnu kaan bi Olive Rammwan bi amnu Bethphage bi hung rwe, habei ga Jisu na potroi pat ni ding lang thangluga
40021002	barwei khou rinne, “Narwei meithaan la amnu nam la ga sero khatle lola khat bang thangluga baswan le ongnu ding hung kadou khap ti lune. Haba lola kani ding sutluga Akhou lou hung ngo.
40021003	Tudannuna narwei khou pa-aam aam ngaiye dabe narweina rinno, ‘Pukraangba na heiba lola kani ding bathaang amme,’ atiga haba kahan bi maanna barwei ding bathan hung dam zung nge.”
40021004	Hei bing nga thiamtingna rin thang damnu bing ga hung tang lang nge:
40021005	“Zion sa kamaisa khou nanina rinno, ‘Phaang ngo, naom Krwang ga nakhou hung rwe, Maan sung bazaang nge, lola chung bi twang nge, Lola swan, lola chan swan chung bi twang nge.’ ”
40021006	Atiga potroi patni gana seluga Jisu na bani khou zathang pi thangnu ga danga to rwe.
40021007	Barweina lola le baswan ga lou hungluga barwei chung bi bani pwan sap thang rwe khatle Jisu na haba chung bi twang rwe.
40021008	Atiga mi khang puina lampui bi bani pwan phaa thang rwe; katei rwanna thingkung bina thing bom ramluga lampui bi phaa thang rwe.
40021009	Bameithaan la khatle nung la suisenu mi khang gana paoga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa khou Hosanna! ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Maan ga aih saye!’ Basaang kataknu bi Hosanna!”
40021010	Maanna Jerusalem bi khutnu kaan bi nampui bingna loh loga ngaiye, “Heiya Tubo?”
40021011	Habei ga mi khangna rinne, “Heiya Galilee om Nazareth lana hungnu thiamting Jisu ga rwe.”
40021012	Jisu na Rikrwang om kalum in bi khutluga kalum in bi kaleinu le zwan ongnu mi bing ding kazun sat rwe khatle sian kachoi kainu nun om table khatle banphi zwannu nun om kaong riak bing tun kalat sat rwe.
40021013	Atiga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Heiya hiak thangluga amme, ‘Ain ding kalum in diga koulune,’ atiyeda haga nanina ‘Baruksaak mi nun kabu’ pi to rwe.”
40021014	Habei ga mik chonu manpa le ket lwamnu manpa kalum in bi Bakhou hung ngaake khatle Maanna barwei ding pi sa thang rwe.
40021015	Atiyeda takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Maanna to damnu tasiatnu chwan bing khatle kalum in bi naosen rwanna, “David Sa Kapaisa khou Hosanna!” diga paonu ga muluga bani balung pwanga
40021016	Bakhou rinne, “Naosen rwanna rin ongnuwa Nang ngaisubo?” Jisu na bani khou rinne, “O. ‘Kasinnu khatle chup ongnu naosen rwan mun bina swan lang Nangna daan thang rwe’ dinu nani imphani beida pa mak aangbo?”
40021017	Atiga Jisu na bani ding thangsialuga nampui bi gana Bethany la thou drwe khatle Maan habei ga nei rwe.
40021018	Louthwan Maanna nampui la han hungnu kaan bi Maan chaam ngaak rwe.
40021019	Atiga lampui kim bi tacham kung ga muluga Maan habei ga hung rwe atiyeda habei ga banaa makka katei khatchale dou mak ngaake, habei ga tacham kung ding rinne, “Nakhou bakraa khatchale kraa lat mak tam dingro.” Haba kahan bi gana tacham kung ga baowei ta drwe.
40021020	Potroi rwanna haga munu kaan bi banina loh loga rinne, “Tatoga tacham kung nga heitia barapka baowei ta ongnubo?”
40021021	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nani khou balumsanu am ngaake dabe khatle balumsia make dabe tacham kung bi to damnu gaza make atiyeda nanina heiba rammwan ding nga, ‘Abeina swakluga tuipui la ga naraanto bazwan thang dammo’ diga rinne dabe haga ati dam zung nge.
40021022	Nanina balumsaye dabe paaam ngaakle hweini bi nanina ninu bing ga lousulune.”
40021023	Jisu na kalum in bi khutluga bachu thang ongnu kaan bi takopuba rwan le mi nun om patso rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Nangna pa-aam ngamna hei bing nga to ongnubo? Khatle heiba ngam ma Nakhou tuna pi thangnubo?”
40021024	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Eina le nani khou chong khat ngaide, haga nanina Akhou katake dabe, Eina le paaam om ngamna hei bing nga tonubo dinu Eina nani khou rin thangne:
40021025	John na baptize to thangnu ga inlammangnabo? Haga tambaan lanamo mak tabe mi nun khounabo?” Bani cham kathuiluga rinne, “Anina, ‘Tambaan la naye’ diga rinne dabe Maanna ani khou rinlune, ‘Ati dabe nanina pa-aam toga bating balumsa maknubo?’
40021026	“Atiyeda ‘Mi nun khou naye’ diga anina rinne dabe ani mi khang ding kachiye, balangbe mi bingna John ding thiamting khate diga chak thang nge.”
40021027	Atibriakpina banina Jisu khou rin rwe, “Ani thei make.” Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina pa-aam ngamna hei bing nga tonubo dinu Ei le nani khou rinlaye.
40021028	“Atiyeda nani pa-aam baningbo? Manpa khat om sa kapaisa pat ni am ngaake khatle maanna patsonu kim bi hungluga rinne, ‘Sa kapaisa, aniya aom drakha anqwat la chwan to seyo.’
40021029	Maanna katake, ‘Ei selaye,’ atiyeda bataang la maanna baning ngam makka se drwe.
40021030	Haba nung bi maanna kaninu sa kapaisa kim bi hungluga hadanga rin rwe. Atiga maanna katake, ‘O, bapuba ei sene,’ atiyeda maan se lan rwe.
40021031	Pat ni lak pi ga ingaana bapa om baningnu tobo?” Banina Bakhou rinne, “Patsonu gaye” Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, ramkhai khomnu rwan le taloi rwanna Rikrwang om krwang talei la nani meithaan se kamalune.
40021032	Balangbe John na nani khou ririak senu lampui rin thang lang hung rwe khatle nanina bating balumsa make; atiyeda ramkhai khomnu rwan le taloi rwanna bating balumsa ngaake khatle nanina haga munu kaan bi bataang la nani sung lega bating balumsa make.
40021033	“Chongchak katei khatle ngaiyo: Drakha kung lingnu taram puba khat am ngaake. Maanna anqwat qwatluga drakha ling thang rwe khatle raang qwat thangluga haba riak pi batui sumnu riak chou rwe khatle thaamkang le ra thang rwe. Atiga maanna anqwat ka loumi nun khou saan thangsialuga namlaanu taram la thou dam ngaake.
40021034	Drakha tui sumnu dat nai hungnu kaan bi maanna baswak rwan ding bakraa lou lang loumi nun khou lang hung rwe.
40021035	Loumi nun gana baswak rwan ding namluga pakhat ting bwei rwe, pakhat ting athat sat rwe khatle pakhat tingna lungna sat rwe.
40021036	Maanna kamanu ga ma tamga baswak rwan ding lang thang lat rwe khatle banina hadanga bani ding to rwe.
40021037	Kham katak pi maanna ‘Asa kapaisa ding ngabe banina takhwang tolu zung nge’ diga baningga basa Kapaisa ding bani khou lang hung rwe.
40021038	Atiyeda loumi nun gana basa kapaisa ding munu kaan bi banina bani cham lak pi atiga rin rwe, ‘Heiya barakhum lwak tingnu mi rwe. Hungro, ani bating athatluga barakhum lwakrizo.’
40021039	Atiga banina bating namluga anqwat paan la bazwan swak rwe khatle bating athat sat rwe.
40021040	Atibriakpina drakha anqwat om bapubana hungnu kaan bi loumi nun khouga maanna pa-aam tolu dingbo?”
40021041	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Sa maknu mi nun ding ga maanna railuga to braan satlune khatle baom anqwat ka bakaan chaga bakraa pi dingnu loumi nun katei khou saan thanglune.”
40021042	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani Bathiangnu chongdip heiya khatchale pa makchungbo, ‘Intok mi nunna bazwan sat thangnu lung gana intaki om bakung tonu lung imbei rwe. Heiya Pukraangba na to thangnuwe, Khatle haga ani mikphaang bi tasiatnuwe.’
40021043	“Atibriakpina Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nani khouna lou sat tamlune khatle haom bakraa kraa dingnu chaat khou pi damlune.
40021044	Atiga tudannu heiba lung chung bi bazwantanu ga baklune; atiyeda tudannu heiba lungna balu chung bi ta thangnu maan ga, tambut imbeilune.”
40021045	Takopuba rwan le Pharisee rwanna Baom chongchak ka ngaisunu kaan bi Maanna bani lang bi rin ongnuwe dinu thei rwe.
40021046	Atiyeda banina Bating nam lang zongnu kaan bi bani mi khang ding kachi ngaake, balangbe banina Bating thiamting khate diga lou ngaake.
40022001	Jisu na bani khou chongchak toga rin late:
40022002	“Tambaan krwang talei ga basa kapaisa lang tazwan bahwan lang daannu krwang khat ka dannuwe.
40022003	Maanna tazwan bahwan riak pi talot thang damnu mi nun ding kou lang baswak rwan ding lang thang rwe; atiyeda bani hung nwam mak ngaake.
40022004	Maanna swak katei rwan ding lang thang latluga rinne, ‘Talot mi nun khou rinno, “Phaang ngo, Eina aom thaisaak laang thang rwe; aom sen chan nun khatle bami pi sa thangnu khouring athatluga pum brumza laang thang rwe. Tazwan bahwan om balou bi hungro.”’
40022005	Atiyeda bani thou to makka thou dam ngaake, pakhatna balou la khatle katei khatna baom langgon lampui la se thou dam ngaake.
40022006	Katei rwan gana baswak rwan ding ga namluga siaga to rwe khatle bani ding athat sat rwe.
40022007	Krwangna haga ngaisunu kaan bi maan balung pwan tak rwe. Atiga maanna baom kraanmi nun ding bathan thangluga mi athatnu nun ding ga to braan sat rwe khatle bani namlian le mei thaang sat rwe.
40022008	Haba nung bi maanna baswak rwan khou rinne, ‘Tazwan bahwan om balou lang daan thang loi rwe atiyeda talot thangnu rwan ga khopsa lan rwe.
40022009	Atibriakpina lampui pui bing la ga seluga nanina kadounu bing ding tazwan bahwan om balou riak pi kou hungro.’
40022010	Habei ga swak rwan gana lampui pui bing la seluga banina kadounu kasanu khatle kasianu bing ding khom hung rwe. Atiga tazwan bahwan riak ka talot mina ongsip rwe.
40022011	“Atiyeda krwangna hungluga talot nun ding phaangnu kaan bi tazwan bahwan pon thang maknu manpa khat ting maanna mu rwe.
40022012	Maanna bakhou rinne, ‘Abaanpa, nang abeiya tazwan bahwan pon thang makka tatoga khutnubo?’ Atiga maan chong kabia swaklan rwe.
40022013	Haba nung bi krwangna swak rwan khou rinne, ‘Bating bakut baket krako khatle bating kai swakluga langkaang om kazingnu riak la bazwan sat tammo; habei ga chapnu khatle ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune.’
40022014	Balangbe mi taswang khak ting kouwe atiyeda titcha ding ka thang nge.”
40022015	Haba nung bi Pharisee rwanna seluga Bating Bachong kabiak pi tatoga namza dingbo diga chong katu ong ngaake.
40022016	Atiga banina bani om potroi rwan le Herod om mi nun ding Bakhou lang hungluga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Nang bazenuwe, Rikrwang om lampui ding bazega bachu thang nge khatle Nang pakhatcha ding hakna kachi make, balangbe Nang pakhatcha mai le phaang make dinu anina theiye.
40022017	Atibriakpina ani khou rin thang ngo, Nang pa-aam baningbo? Caesar lang ramkhai pinu zamo za makpo?”
40022018	Atiyeda Jisu na bani sung sa maknu ga theiluga rinne, “Sathot tonu nun, nanina pa-aam lang Ating tam ongnubo?
40022019	Ramkhai om sian ga Akhou pimuwo.” Banina denari khat Bakhou lou hung rwe.
40022020	Maanna bani khou ngaiye, “Heiya tu maangbo khatle pa-aam hiak thangbo?”
40022021	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Caesar omme.” Atiga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atibriakpina Caesar om pot ka Caesar khou piyo khatle Rikrwang om pot ka Rikrwang khou piyo.”
40022022	Heiba chong bing nga banina ngaisunu kaan bi bani loh lo rwe khatle banina Bating thang sialuga thou drwe.
40022023	Ring thou latnu maake diga rinnu Sadducee rwan Bakhou ha ni ga hungluga
40022024	ngaiye, “Bachuthangnupa, mi khatna basa pon makka thi damme dabe, banaona batang mei ding ga louluga batang lang chungna sa nao cha lang nge diga Moses na rin thang nge.
40022025	Ani lak pi unao pat siari am ngaake. Patsonu ga maan mei kounu nung thi drwe khatle sa nao pon mak briakpina bamei ga banao khou thangsia rwe.
40022026	Hadanga kaninu ga le, inthumnu ga le khatle siarinu ga tangga ati ngaak rwe.
40022027	Kham katak pi kamaisa ga le thi drwe.
40022028	Atibriakpina ring thou latnu kaan bi kamaisa ga pat siari lak pi tu mei tolu dingbo? Balangbe bani khangsungna bating lou ngaake.”
40022029	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Nani Bathiangnu Chongdip khatle Rikrwang ngam ding thei mak priakpina koi rwe.
40022030	Balangbe ring thou latnu kaan bi bani tazwan bahwan laye khatle tazwan bahwan lang le pi swak laye atiyeda tambaan bi Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwan danlune.
40022031	Atiyeda thi bina ring thou latnu lang bi Rikrwang na nani khou rin thang ngaaknu ga nani pa makchungbo?
40022032	‘Ei Abraham Rikrwang, Isaac Rikrwang khatle Jacob Rikrwang nge.’ Rikrwang nga thinu nun om Rikrwang make atiyeda ringnu nun om Rikrwang nge.”
40022033	Mi khang gana heiya ngaisunu kaan bi Maanna bachu thangnu bi ga bani loh lo rwe.
40022034	Maanna Sadducee rwan ding chong pi katak ngamlan rwe dinu Pharisee rwanna ngaisunu kaan bi bani hung kadoi rwe.
40022035	Habei ga bani lak pi chongtan theinu pakhatna Bating tamga ngaiye,
40022036	“Bachuthangnupa, chongtan lak pi tatonu zathangna lian kataknubo?”
40022037	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “ ‘Nangna Pukraangba Narikrwang ding nasung bing, nakatha bing khatle nalungning bingna kriang ding gaye.’
40022038	Heiya kama kataknu khatle lian kataknu zathang nge.
40022039	Kaninu gana hei dannuwe, ‘Nangna nainnai lounai ding nazan bahak ting danga kriang ding gaye.’
40022040	Heiba zathang kani biya Chongtan bing khatle Thiamting rwan om chong bing amnu rwe.”
40022041	Pharisee rwanna hung kadoi ongnu kaan bi Jisu na bani khou
40022042	ngaiye, “Christa om lang bi nani tato baningbo? Maan tu Sa Kapaisabo?” Banina Bakhou katake, “David Sa Kapaisa ye.”
40022043	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ati dabe David na tatoga Katha bi Bating ‘Pukraangba’ diga kounubo? Maanna rinne:
40022044	‘Pukraangba na Apukraangba khou rinne, “Eina Nating munanu nun ding Naket kadim riak pi to mak basaan, Akut inchang pek la badung ong ngo.” ’
40022045	“David na Bating ‘Pukraangba’ diga kouwe dabe, Maan tatoga basa Kapaisa to dingbo?”
40022046	Habei ga pakhatcha hakna Bakhou chongkaang khatcha hakna kataknu ngam mak ngaake khatle ha ni gana thouga Bakhou pakhatchanale raangga tangai ngainu ngamlan rwe.
40023001	Jisu na mi khang khatle potroi rwan khou
40023002	rinne, “Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna Moses om kaong riak pi ong nge.
40023003	Atibriakpina banina nani khou towo diga rinnu bing ga nani zeiluga towo atiyeda bani om chwan nung suiga nani to mako; balangbe banina rinnu ga banina to make.
40023004	Banina phun thoulanu karitnu potrit bachaluga haga mi nun daankong bi bason thang nge; atiyeda bani bazan bahaknaba haga bani kutzung khatchana hakna banaan thang make.
40023005	Atiyeda banina tonu chwan bing ga mi nunna mu dam lang towe. Bani om Phylactery rwan ga balaak pi lianne khatle bani om pwan hum ga pi baswanne.
40023006	Banina balou riak bing bi sa kataknu riak khatle synagogue bing bi sa kataknu kaong riak pi ong nwamme.
40023007	Keithian riak bing bi kadou chong kabianu khatle mi nunna bani ding, ‘Rabbi, Rabbi’ diga kou thangnu bathaiye.
40023008	Atiyeda nani dingba, ‘Rabbi’ diga pi kou mako, balangbe nani lang Bachuthangnupa, Christa Khatcha amme khatle nani mi bingza unao rwanne.
40023009	Talei ram bi pakhatcha ding hakna ‘Apa’ diga kou mako; balangbe nani Pa tambaan la amnu Khatcha ga zung nge.
40023010	Nani ding ‘Bachuthangnupa,’ diga pi kou mako; balangbe nani om Bachuthangnupa, Christa Khatcha zung nge.
40023011	Nani lak pi lian kataknu maan ga nani swak tolune.
40023012	Tudannu baraanto bating pi basaangnu bating ga pi bangiam talune khatle bating pi bangiam tanu batingna pi basaang ka thanglune.
40023013	“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina mi nun maitwang bi tambaan krwang talei ga khaan nam rwe; balangbe nani bahak le khut make khatle khut tingnu mi nun ding le pi khut make.
40023014	Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina tameinu rwan in kapumsaye khatle to thiamga kalum bakhwa seiye. Atibriakpina nani lu chung bi inkuga laak thangnu ga doulune.
40023015	“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina mi khat ting Jihudi rwan pi gon langna tuipui khatle taram la seye atiga ririak ka le hungnu kaan bi nanina bating nani khouna badam kani inkuga nani danga meikhun sa kapaisa pi to rwe.
40023016	“Mik chonu lampui kai thangnu, nani ga aih sia yeda! Nanina rinne, ‘Tudannu kalum in ding kaisingga karennu ga khatchale make; atiyeda tudannu kalum in bi amnu kachaak ting kaisingga karennuwe dabe haga soi makka to ding gaye.’
40023017	Kapangnu khatle mik chonu nun! Kachaak mak tabe kachaak ting to bathiang thangnu kalum in ga ingaana bakung tonubo?
40023018	Nanina rinne, ‘Rikhaang riak ting kaisingga karennu ga khatchale make; atiyeda tudannu rikhaang riak lu chung bi amnu pot ting kaisingga karenne dabe haga soi makka to ding gaye.’
40023019	Kapangnu khatle mik chonu nun! Kat thangnu pot le kat thangnu pot ting to bathiangnu rikhaang riak ka ingaana bakung tonubo?
40023020	Atibriakpina rikhaang riak ting kaisingga karennu maan ga ha ding khatle haba chung bi amnu bing ding kaisingga karennuwe.
40023021	Kalum in ding kaisingga karennu maan ga ha ding khatle habei amnu Bating kaisingga karennuwe.
40023022	Tambaan ding kaisingga karennu maan ga Rikrwang om takung riak khatle habei ga ong ongnu Bating kaisingga karennuwe.
40023023	“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina nungsit lou, padikhom khatle zira om som om badam khat katluga chongtan om barit rwan ding: bazenu ding, phaangkriang le balumsa zanu ding intaamme. Katei bing ding thou to maknu to makka, hei bing nga nanina to ngaak tingnu we.
40023024	Mik chonu lampui kainu nun ga, kakhut ting sing sat tingnu pot pi sing satluga ut ting kadwanne.
40023025	“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina ngai le butheng ga bapaanza thaam bathiang nge atiyeda basung laba bani ga kasut sanu khatle bapum ding raak thei maknuna sipe.
40023026	Mik chonu Pharisee, langkaang ga le bathiang lang ngai le butheng ga basung thaam bathiang kamawo.
40023027	“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nani langkaang la phaangsaga munu atiyeda basung la mang thinu mi nun om ru khatle bathiang maknuna sipnu sunu tei thangnu thaan dannuwe.
40023028	Hadanga nani le langkaang la mi nun meithaan bi bazenu thot toga pi muwe atiyeda basung laba sathot tonu khatle chongtan thouto maknuna sipe.
40023029	“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu, nani ga aih sia yeda! Balangbe nanina thiamting rwan om thaan bachaye khatle ririak senu mi nun om thaan ding tapon to thangluga
40023030	rinne, ‘Ani nun ani pu pa rwan kaan bi lung ngaake dabe thiamting rwan om thi pi tanu bi ga ani bani le badam suilou mak ngaak tingnuwe.’
40023031	Atibriakpina nani nun nani bahak maitwang bi thiamting rwan ding athat tamnu mi nun om sa kapaisa rwanne dinu sake rwe.
40023032	Atiga nani pu pa rwanna to ngaaknu kasianu chaang ga pi tang ngo.
40023033	Brun nun, dintu kik taat rwan! Nani meikhun om chongtan bina tatoga pak dwak langbo?
40023034	Atibriakpina batak takka Eina nani khou thiamting rwan, ningtingnu rwan khatle chongtan bachuthangnu rwan ding lang hung nge atiyeda nanina kasem ding athatluga cross pi bakhai lune, katei rwan dingna nani om synagogue bing bi bweilune khatle nampui khat pina nampui khat pi railune,
40023035	haga ririak senu Abel thi bina thouga nanina kalum in le rikhaang riak lak pi athat ngaaknu Berechiah sa kapaisa Zechariah om thi tangnu bi talei ram bi ta thang damnu ririak senu mi bing thi ga nani lu chung bi ta thanglune.
40023036	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, hei bing nga atun mikin lu chung bi hunglune.
40023037	“He Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Thiamting rwan ding athatnu khatle bakhou lang hungnu nun ding lungna khumnu nang! Aan puina baswan rwan ding babatha thwei bi ka aw thangnu ga danga Eina nani sa rwan ding katupka ka aw thang nwam ngaake atiyeda haga nanina bathai make!
40023038	Phaang ngo, nani in bing nga lung taakluga nani khou thangsia rwe.
40023039	Balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Maan ga aih sanuwe!’ diga nanina rin mak basaan nani Ating mula rwe.”
40024001	Jisu na swakluga kalum in bina thou dam ngaak rwe khatle Baom potroi rwanna hungluga Bakhou kalum in om in bing ga pi mu thang ngaake.
40024002	Habei ga Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani hei bing nga mu makpo? Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, abeiya to bakla dingnu lung khat chung bi lung khatchale am thang siala rwe.”
40024003	Maanna Olive Rammwan bi ong ongnu kaan bi potroi rwanna Bakhou inthim toga hungluga rinne, “Hei bing nga impei dat pi swak tingnubo, Nangna hung dingnu khatle talei ram loi dingnu om badan ga pa-aam lu dingbo ani khou rin thang ngo.”
40024004	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Pakhatchanale nani ding minam mak lang cheksinno.
40024005	Balangbe Ameng bi mi tamga hungluga rinlune, ‘Ei Christa rwe’ khatle banina mi inza ding minamlune.
40024006	Nanina kraan khatle kraan cham ngaisulune. Hagana nani ding sung pi katop mak lang barak theiyo; balangbe hei bing nga hung dingnu zung rwe atiyeda kakhamnu ga mak aang nge.
40024007	Balangbe chaat khatna chaat khat luchung bi krwang talei khatna krwang talei khat maitwang bi katwak thoulu rwe. Atiga bariak inza bi bu taangnu, ripian khatle talei kalingnu hei bing nga swaklu rwe.
40024008	Hei bing nga nao lung lang nainu kaan bi riangrenu om hou thounu rwe.
40024009	Banina nani ding rai lang khatle athat lang pi swaklune, Ameng lang chungna chaat bingna nani ding batanlune.
40024010	Haba kaan bi mi inzana ket basui lune, khatna khat ting pi swak kalega khat le khat batan kalelune.
40024011	Kakoinu thiamting inza hungluga mi inza ding baze maknu lampui bi kai thanglune.
40024012	Chongtan thouto maknu inku thou ding briakpina mi nun om kriangnu daitalune.
40024013	Atiyeda kakhamnu tangga khaangnu bating ga kan thanglune.
40024014	Krwang talei om sacham ga talei ram bariak thin chaat bing khou sake to lang kasamlune khatle haba nung bi kakhamnu ga hunglu rwe.
40024015	“Atibriakpina thiamting Daniel na rin thang damnu, ‘To braan to mutnu om batannu tonu,’ bathiangnu riak pi hannu nanina phaangmunu kaan bi (tudannu panu maanna bakaba thei ding ngo),
40024016	Judea bi ongnu nunna rammwan la pak thou dam ding ngo.
40024017	In chung bi ongnu maan gana pot lou lang bain bi ta mak ting ngo.
40024018	Lou la ongnu maan gana bapwan lou lang han hung mak ting ngo.
40024019	Atiyeda haba kaan bi pum rit ongnu khatle naosen kainu kamaisa rwan ga aih sia yeda!
40024020	Atiyeda nani kraan pak ka sikpha mak tabe Sabbath lumik pi mak lang kalummo.
40024021	“Balangbe talei ram am thou tan bina atun tangnu sung bi hung mak aangnu, hung le hung latla dingnu tasiatnu riangre kanang hunglu rwe.
40024022	Haba kaan ga pi toi thang mak ngaake dabe pakhatchale ring ngamlaye; atiyeda kathang swaknu nun lang chungna haba kaan ga pi toi thanglune.
40024023	Tudannuna nani khou, ‘Phaang ngo abeiya Christa amme!’ mak tabe ‘Habei ga amme’ diga rinne dabe haga balumsa mako.
40024024	Balangbe kakoinu christa le kakoinu thiamting rwan hunglu rwe, zaye dabe kathang swaknu mi nun ding hakna minam lang tasiatnu badan le tasiatnu chwan tolu rwe.
40024025	Phaang ngo, Eina nani khou rin chaak thangnuwe.
40024026	Atibriakpina banina nani khou, ‘Phaang ngo, Maan ramhaang la amme!’ diga rinne dabe nani swak mako; mak tabe, ‘Phaang ngo, Maan in kaa la amme!’ diga rinne dabe nani haga balumsa mako.
40024027	Balangbe khwa bathaaknuna lumik swak lana lumik taak la tangga bathaak hung nu ga danga Misa Sa Kapaisana hungnu ga le hadanlune.
40024028	Balangbe kathi pum amnu riak pi ga langkiya rwan le hung kadoilune.
40024029	“Haba riangre kanang om lumik bing nung bi lumik na zing damlune, tha na babaan pi bila rwe; saangbaan lana insi bing le bazwantalune khatle saangbaan la ngam bing le kanuklune.
40024030	Haba nung bi Misa Sa Kapaisa om badan ga tambaan la pi mulune, talei ram bi chaat bingna nu hweilune, atiga Misa Sa Kapaisana tambaan om tambu bi ngam khatle lwat lian ga tanu banina phaangmulune.
40024031	Maanna Baom tambaan chonglang rwan ding trumpet baraam rakannu le bachamga bathou thanglune, atiga banina talei taki bali lana khatle tambaan kalan khat lana kalan khat la tangga amnu Baom kathang swaknu nun ding khom kadoilune.
40024032	“Nani tacham kung bina heiba chongchak heiya bachuwo: Bakachangna bazik kasat swaknu khatle banaa phun swaknu kaan bi khwalumpha nai rwe dinu nanina theiye.
40024033	Hadanga nani le hei bing nga nanina phaangmunu kaan bi, Maan nai rwe inkhaan bi hung tang rwe dinu theiyo!
40024034	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, hei bing nga swak mak basaan heiba mi chaat heiya khatchale braanlaye.
40024035	Tambaan le talei ya braanlune atiyeda Achongkaang bing nga khatchale braanlaye.
40024036	“Pakhatchanale haba lumik khatle chakrin ga thei make, tambaan chonglang rwan tangga thei make atiyeda Apa zana theiye.
40024037	Atiyeda Noah kaan bi danga Misa Sa Kapaisana hungnu ga le hadanlune.
40024038	Balangbe tui lian hungnu meithaan lumik inzalana, Noah na lipui bi khutnu lumik tangga banina saluga inluga, tazwan bahwan ga khatle tazwan bahwan lang pi swak kalega ong ngaake.
40024039	Tui lian hungluga bani ding phun thou dam mak basaan banina thei maknu ga danga Misa Sa Kapaisana hungnu ga le hadanlune.
40024040	Haba kaan bi manpa pat ni lou bi onglune: pakhat ting lou thou damlune, khat ting thangsialune.
40024041	Kamaisa pat ni saang tak onglune: pakhat ting lou thou damlune, khat ting thangsialune.
40024042	“Atibriakpina barak theiyo, balangbe nani Pukraangba ga impei chakrin bi hunglu dingbo dinu nani thei make.
40024043	Atiyeda heiya theiyo, inpu gana impei chakrin bi in baruk mi hung dingbo dinu thei ngaake dabe maan barakka ong ngaak tingnuwe khatle bain ga pi torai mak ngaak tingnuwe.
40024044	Atibriakpina nani le daanga ong ngo, balangbe nanina baning maknu chakrin bi Misa Sa Kapaisa ga hunglune.
40024045	“Ati dabe bainpuba na bain inkhun lu chung bi kasa kasia phaangsinnu mi pi to dingnu bakaan badat chaga bani lang thaisaak pi thang dingnu balumsa lang khopnu khatle ningtingnu swak ka tubo?
40024046	Bainpubana hungnu kaan bi atiga to ongnu dounu swak ka aih sanuwe.
40024047	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, maanna bating baom lan bing om phaangsinnu mi pi to thanglune.
40024048	Atiyeda haba sa maknu swak kana basung bi, ‘Ainpuba bakhwa seiga hunglaye’ diga baning nge dabe
40024049	khatle swak to bachamnu rwan ding bwei thouwe dabe, zu innu rwan le diga zu in kaloga ong nge dabe,
40024050	maanna baning maknu lumik, thei maknu chakrin bi, haba swak om bapuba ga hunglune.
40024051	Bapuba gana bating batut kani toga tanchat lune khatle bating sathot tonu nun le diga bariak khatcha bi thang bachamlune. Habei ga chapka khatle ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune.
40025001	“Tambaan krwang talei ga bani thaomei choiluga tazwanpa ding kadou lang se swaknu reizuni pat som ga dannuwe.
40025002	Bani pat impaang ga ningtingnu nunne khatle pat impaangna kapangnu nunne.
40025003	Kapangnu nun ga bani thaomei choiluga banina thao tui ba phun mak ngaake,
40025004	atiyeda ningtingnu nun ba bani om thaomei le thaobun bi thao tui le phun ngaake.
40025005	Tazwanpa ga hungrei briakpina bani in nwamruga inthi thou dam ngaak rwe.
40025006	Atiyeda inmik kasia bi khwan khat paonu ngaisu ngaake, ‘Phaang ngo, tazwanpa hungna rwe, bating kadou lang se swakro!’
40025007	Habei ga reizuni bing ga lon thouluga bani thaomei taan thou rwe.
40025008	Kapangnu nun gana ningtingnu nun khou rinne, ‘Nani om thao tui ga ani lang kasem pi thang ngo, balangbe ani thaomei mit tam ding rwe.’
40025009	Atiyeda ningtingnu nun gana katake, ‘Pi laye, balangbe ani lang le nani lang le khop maknu zaye; atibriakpina nanina zwannu nun khou seluga nani lang kaleiro.’
40025010	Atiga banina kalei lang se damnu kaan bi tazwanpa ga hung rwe khatle daanga ongnu rwan ga tazwan bahwan riak la maan le diga khutluga inkhaan khaan drwe.
40025011	Haba nung bi reizuni katei nun gana hungluga rinne, ‘Pukraangba, Pukraangba, ani lang inkhaan lat thang ngo!’
40025012	Atiyeda maanna katake, ‘Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Ei nani ding thei make.’
40025013	Atibriakpina barak theiyo, balangbe Misa sa Kapaisana hung dingnu lumik khatle chakrin ga nanina thei make.
40025014	“Tambaan krwang talei ga baswak rwan ding kou hungluga baom lan bing bani khou sin thangsialuga namlaanu talei khat la bazin thou damnu manpa khat ka dannuwe.
40025015	Maanna pakhat khou talent impaang, pakhat khou kani, katei pakhat khou khat ti ga maan maanna ngamnu nung suiga pi thang ngaake khatle haba kahan bi maan bazin thou drwe.
40025016	Talent impaang lousunu maan gana seluga haga langgonluga talent katei impaang phang rwe.
40025017	Hadanga talent kani lousunu maanna le katei kani phang rwe.
40025018	Atiyeda talent khat lousunu maan gana seluga khun chouluga bapuba sian ga inkam thang rwe.
40025019	Bakaan kasei khak nung bi haba swak rwan om bapuba ga hungluga bani le diga sian paak pa bacham rwe.
40025020	“Atiga talent impaang lousunu maan gana talent katei impaang lou hungluga rinne, ‘Pukraangba, nangna alaang talent impaang pi thang nge; phaang ngo, habei gana inkuga eina talent impaang tong rwe.’
40025021	Bapuba na bakhou rinne, ‘To chui rwe, kasanu khatle balumsa zanu swak; nang pot titcha chung bi balumsaza briakpina, eina nating pot taswang khak chung bi phaangsinnu mi pi to thangne. Napukraangba om karonu bi khutro.’
40025022	Talent kani lousunu maanna le hungluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, nangna akhou talent kani pi thang nge; phaang ngo, habei gana inkuga eina talent kani tong rwe.’
40025023	Bapuba na bakhou rinne, ‘To chui rwe, kasanu khatle balumsa zanu swak; nang pot titcha chung bi balumsaza briakpina, Eina nating pot taswang khak chung bi phaangsinnu mi pi to thangne. Napukraangba om karonu bi khutro.’
40025024	“Talent khat lousunu maan gana le hungluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, nang karin sianu manpaye, nangna bwan thang maknu riak pi lwaknu khatle bamu bwan thang maknu riak pi khom thounu miye dinu eina theiye.
40025025	Atiga ei kachi ngaake khatle eina seluga naom talent ga talei thwei bi inkam thangnu rwe. Phaang ngo, naom ga abei am rwe.’
40025026	“Habei ga bapuba gana bakhou rinne, ‘Sa maknu khatle takaatnu swak, eina bwan thang maknu riak pi lwake khatle bamu bwan thang maknu riak pi khom thouwe dinu nang theiye.
40025027	‘Atibriakpina nangna aom sian ga sian rik in bi thang ngaak tingnuwe khatle ei hung latnu kaan bi aom ga bathoi le bachamga lousu dingnuwe.
40025028	‘Atibriakpina talent ga bakhouna louluga talent som amnu bakhou haga piyo.
40025029	“Balangbe ka amnu mi bing khou inkuga pi thanglune khatle maan sipsaga amlune; atiyeda ka maaknu bakhouna bakhou amnu ga tangga lou swak tamlune.
40025030	Bathaang maaknu swak ting ga langkaang kazingnu riak la bazwan sat tammo. Habei ga chapka khatle ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune.’
40025031	“Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Baom ngam liannu bi khatle Maan le bathiangnu tambaan chonglang rwan le diga hungnu kaan bi Maan Baom lwat liannu takung riak pi onglune.
40025032	Chaat bing ding Bameithaan bi khom hunglune khatle zao siannuna baom zao nun ding ken nun lak pina khok lang swaknu danga, Maanna bani ding khok lang swaklune.
40025033	Maanna zao nun dingna Bakut inchang pek la atiyeda ken nun dingna imbei pek la thanglune.
40025034	Habei ga Krwangna Bakut inchang pek la ongnu nun khou rinlune, ‘Hungro, Apa om rithoi phangnu nani ga, talei dam bina thouga nani lang daan thangnu krwang talei rakhum ga hung lwakro:
40025035	balangbe Ei chaamnu kaan bi nanina Alaang thaisaak pi thang nge; Ei taraannu kaan bi nanina Ating pi in thang nge; Ei man mi to ong ngaak pi nanina Ating loukhut thang nge;
40025036	Ei pum tangang ongnu kaan bi nanina Alaang pwan sin thang nge; Ei naanu kaan bi nanina Akhou taleng thang nge; Ei qwan in bi ongnu kaan bi nanina Akhou hung thang nge.’
40025037	“Habei ga ririak senu nun gana Bakhou kataklune, ‘Pukraangba, anina Nang chaamnu munu kaan bi impha Nating pi sa thanggabo mak tabe taraannu kaan bi Nating impha pi in thanggabo?
40025038	‘Nang man mi to ong ngaak pi anina Nating impha loukhut thanggabo mak tabe pum tangang ongnu kaan bi anina Nalaang impha pwan sin thanggabo?
40025039	Nang naanu munu kaan bi mak tabe qwan in bi ongnu kaan bi ani Nakhou impha hung thanggabo?’
40025040	Habei ga Krwangna bani khou rinlune, ‘Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, heiba sin kataknu Au Anao rwan lak pi pakhat lang nanina to thang damnu ga nanina Alaang to thangnuwe.’
40025041	“Haba nung bi Maanna kut imbei pek la ongnu nun khou le rinlune, ‘Taseng phangnu nani, Akhouna swakluga Diabol le baom chonglang rwan lang daan thangnu khwa seinu mei la ga sedro:
40025042	Balangbe Ei chaam ngaake atiyeda nanina Alaang thaisaak pi make; Ei taraan ngaake atiyeda nanina Ating pi in thang make;
40025043	Ei man mi to ong ngaake atiyeda nanina Ating loukhut thang make, pum tangang ongnu kaan bi nanina Alaang pwan sin thang make, naanu khatle qwan in bi ong ongnu kaan bi nanina Akhou hung thang make.’
40025044	“Habei ga banina le Bakhou rinlune, ‘Pukraangba, anina Nang impha chaamnu mak tabe taraannu mak tabe man mi to ongnu mak tabe pum tangang ongnu mak tabe naaga ongnu mak tabe qwan in bi ongnu muluga, Nating chwanlaang to thang maknu amgabo?’
40025045	Haba kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinlune, ‘Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, sin kataknu pakhat khou nanina haga to thang mak tamnu ga nanina Akhou to thang maknuwe.’
40025046	Atiga hei bing nga khwa seiga laak thangnu bi selune atiyeda ririak senu nun gabe ringzoknu kum la selune.”
40026001	Jisu na heiba chong bing nga rin taangnu kaan bi Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou rinne,
40026002	“Ni ni nung bi Takan swaknu Balou rwe dinu nani theiye atiga Misa sa Kapaisa ding cross pi athat lang pi swaklu rwe.”
40026003	Habei ga takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle mi nun om patso rwanna takolu Caiaphas tiga kounu in inkhu bi hung kadoi ngaake,
40026004	banina Jisu ding rin thiyamluga nam lang khatle Bating athat lang zong rwe.
40026005	Atiyeda banina rinne, “Bangei sung bi to makcho, balangbe mi nun lak pi kasao kabao thounu zaye.”
40026006	Jisu na Bethany bi imphaan ngaaknu Simon in bi ong ongnu kaan bi,
40026007	mannu pakhatna baman kung taknu banamsanu thao alabaster tong khat phunluga Bakim bi hung ngaake khatle Jisu na sa lang ongtanu kaan bi mannu gana Balu bi thao ga sung thang rwe.
40026008	Atiyeda haga Baom potroi rwanna munu kaan bi banina balung pwanga rinne, “Heiya pa-aam lang to braannubo?
40026009	Balangbe banamsanu thao heiya baman taswang khak lang zwanluga lungsianu nun lang pi thang zanuwe.”
40026010	Atiyeda Jisu na haga theinu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina pa-aam lang mannu ding ga to katop ongnubo? Balangbe maanna Alaang kasanu chwan to thang rwe.
40026011	Balangbe lungsianu nun ga nani le bakaan bathin ong bacham ongme atiyeda Eiba nani le bakaan bathin ong bachamlaye.
40026012	Balangbe maanna Apum bi heiba banamsanu thao sung thangnuwa Ating imphumnu om lang maanna to thangnuwe.
40026013	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, heiba sacham ma talei ram bing bi kasam senu kaan bi bating baningsunu toga heiba mannuna to damnu chwan ga le rinlune.”
40026014	Haba nung bi potroi pat somga kani lak pi Judas Iscariot diga kounu pakhatna takopuba rwan khou seluga
40026015	rinne, “Eina Bating nani khou pi swake dabe nani alaang pa-aam pinebo?” Habei ga banina balaang chandi somthum sem thang rwe.
40026016	Haba kaan bina thouga maanna Jisu ding pi swak lang badou chanu zong ngaake.
40026017	Khai Sui maknu Uilu Balou om kamanu lumik pi potroi rwanna Jisu kim bi hungluga Bakhou ngaiye, “Takan Swaknu Balou Thaisaak sa lang anina ingaipai laang thangnu Nang bathaigabo?”
40026018	Maanna rinne, “Nampui laga tudannu pakhat khou seluga bakhou rinno, ‘Bachuthangnupa na rinne, “Alaang bakaan ga nai hung rwe; nain bi Ei Aom potroi rwan le diga Takan Swaknu Balou Thaisaak ngaak lune.” ’ ”
40026019	Atiga Jisu na rin thangnu nung suiga potroi rwanna to rwe khatle banina Takan Swaknu Balou lang daan rwe.
40026020	Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Maanna potroi pat somga kani le diga sa lang ongta bacham rwe.
40026021	Banina sa in ongnu kaan bi Maanna rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nani lak pi pakhatna Ating pi swaklu rwe.”
40026022	Atiga bani nun sung riangre tak ngaak rwe khatle bani pakhat khatna Bakhou ngai thou rwe, “Pukraangba, haga eibo?”
40026023	Maanna katake, “Theng bi Ei le diga kut kapunta bacham ongnu maan gana Ating pi swaklu rwe.
40026024	Misa Sa Kapaisa om lang bi hiak thang ngaaknu danga Maanna seta ongnuwe atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisa ding pi swaknu manpa ga aih sianu weda! Bating pon thang mak ngaake dabe balaang sa inku dingnuwe.”
40026025	Haba kaan bi Bating pi swak tingnu Judas na ngaiye, “Rabbi, haga eibo?” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Haga nangna rin swak rwe.”
40026026	Banina sa ong bi Jisu na uilu ga louluga rithoi thangluga thiak bak rwe khatle haga potroi rwan khou pi luga rinne, “Louluga saro; heiya Apum rwe.”
40026027	Haba nungbi Maanna ngai ga louluga swanka thang rwe khatle haga bani khou pi luga rinne, “Nani khangsung habei gana inro.
40026028	Balangbe heiya mi taswang khak om noh kok thang lang ta thangnu chonghen kathan om Athi ga rwe.
40026029	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Apa om krwang talei la haga Eina nani nun le kathan toga in lat tingnu lumik tang mak basaan Ei heiba drakha tui ya atunna thouga in latla rwe.”
40026030	Banina laa khat to taangnu nung Olive Rammwan la se thou drwe.
40026031	Haba nung bi Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Aniya zingpha nani mi bing Alang bina ket basuinu doulu rwe, Balangbe heiya atiga hiak thang nge, ‘Eina Zao siannu ding bwei balum talune, Khatle zao nun lak pina zao nun ga pak imphaang damlune.’
40026032	Atiyeda Eina ring thou latnu nung Ei nani meithaan Galilee la selune.”
40026033	Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Nalang bi mi bingna ket basui ngaak peida Eiba impha ni beida ket basuilaye.”
40026034	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina nakhou batak sekka rinnuwe, aniya zingpha aankhongna khwang maknu meithaan nang Ating za mak leng thumlune.”
40026035	Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Ei Nang le diga thi bacham dingnu am ngaaklena ei Nating khatchale za maknu tolaye!” Atiga potroi rwan bingna le hadanga rin rwe.
40026036	Haba nung bi Jisu na Gethsemane diga kounu riak pi bani le hung rwe khatle potroi rwan khou rinne, “Ei ula ga seluga kalum ong bi nani abeiya ong ngaako.”
40026037	Maanna Peter le Zebedee sa kapaisa pat ni ding kalwang rwe, atiga Maan sung riangre thou rwe khatle rin lang maakka sung sok thou rwe.
40026038	Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Akatha heiya thi dingnu danga tasiatnu riangre riangre rwe. Nani abeiya Ei le diga barak theiga ong bachamzo”
40026039	Maanna kasem se swakluga Bamai kun bakhuptaluga kalum rwe, “He Apa, heiya zaye dabe, heiba ngai ya Akhouna lou sat thang ngo; atiyeda haga Eina baningnu to makka Nangna baningnu to ding ngo.”
40026040	Habei ga Maan potroi rwan khou hungnu kaan bi bani inthi ongnu dou rwe. Maanna Peter khou rinne, “Pa-aambo? Nani chakrin khatcha hakna Ei le diga khaang bachamnu ngamlanrubo?
40026041	Nani bathemnu bi ta mak lang khaang ngo khatle kalummo. Batak takka katha nabe bathaiye atiyeda pum naba sonne.”
40026042	Leng ninu toga Maan se latluga kalum rwe, “He Apa, Eina heiba ngai ya in maknu za maknuwe dabe, Nangna baningnu to ding ngo.”
40026043	Maan hung latnu kaan bi bani inthi ong ngaaknu dou lat rwe, balangbe bani in nwamnuna mik meng brak swaknu ngam mak ngaake.
40026044	Atiga Maan bani ding thangsialuga se lat rwe khatle leng thumnu toga bachamnu chongkaang ga ringa kalum rwe.
40026045	Haba nung bi Maanna Baom potroi rwan kim bi hungluga bani khou rinne, “Nani atun tangga in basak ong maangbo? Phaang ngo, chakrin ga nai rwe khatle Misa Sa Kapaisa ding noh mi nun kut pi pi swak rwe.
40026046	Thouro, ani serizo. Phaang ngo, Ating pi swak tingnu mi ga nai rwe.”
40026047	Maanna chong kabia ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, potroi pat somga kani lak pi Judas na takopuba khatle mi nun om patso rwan khouna kachaak chem le thing kalok choinu mi khang pui le diga hung rwe.
40026048	Bating pi swaknu gana bani khou badannu khat piga rinne, “Eina kaput tingnu Maan ga rwe; Bating namro.”
40026049	Haba kahan bi maanna Jisu kim bi hungluga rinne, “Kalumme, Rabbi!” Atiga Bating kaput rwe.
40026050	Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Baanno, nang pa-aam lang hungnubo?” Haba nung bi banina hungluga Jisu lu chung bi kut taluga Bating nam thou drwe.
40026051	Atiga phaang ngo, Jisu nung suinu nun lak pi pakhatna bakut balaan swakluga baom kachaak chem kaswa swak rwe khatle takolu om swak ting bakanaa kapakchat thang rwe.
40026052	Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Naom kachaak chem ga chemthaang bi thang dammo, balangbe kachaak chem choinu bingna kachaak chem bi braanlune.
40026053	Apana Alaang tambaan chonglang legion somga kani ma inkuga pi thang lang atun Eina Apa khou hweini ngamlaye diga nani baningbo?
40026054	Ati dabe Bathiangnu chongdip pi atiga swak ting ngo diga rin thang ngaaknu ga tatoga hung tang langbo?”
40026055	Haba chakrin bi ga Jisu na mi khang khou rinne, “Nanina kasut sanu maitwang bi danga kachaak chem le thing kalok choiluga Ating nam lang hungnubo? Ei kani bathin nani le diga ong bachamme, kalum in bi bachu thang nge atiyeda nanina Ating nam make.
40026056	Atiyeda hei bing nga thiamting rwan om Bathiangnu chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang swak rwe.” Habei ga potroi rwan bingna Bating bathan satluga pak thou drwe.
40026057	Jisu ding namnu mi nun gana Bating chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le patso rwan karung ongnu riak takolu Caiaphas in bi kalwang hung rwe.
40026058	Atiyeda Peter na impaan saam saamga takolu in inkhu tangga Banung suizon hung ngaake. Atiga maanna sekhutluga pa-aam swaklu dingbo dinuga phaang lang kalum in ngaak nun le ong bacham ngaake.
40026059	Takopuba rwan, patso rwan khatle thampei rwanna Jisu ding athat langna Bamaitwang bi kakoinu sake zong ngaake,
40026060	atiyeda khatchale dou mak ngaake. Kakoinu sake katei taswang khak hung beida banina koi khatchale dou make. Atiyeda bataang la kakoinu sake pinu pat ni hungluga
40026061	rinne, “Heiba manpana rinne, ‘Eina Rikrwang om kalum in ding ga raitaluga ni thum ni haga to thou lat ngamme.’ ”
40026062	Habei ga takoluna han thouluga Bakhou rinne, “Nang khatchale kataklabo? Heiba mi nunna Namaitwang bi sake pi ongnuwa pa-aambo?”
40026063	Atiyeda Jisu na thiap thiapka ong ngaake. Takoluna Bakhou rinne, “Eina ring ongnu Rikrwang ding kaisingga Nakhou kanatnu zathang pinuwe: Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa Christa gabo ani khou rinno.”
40026064	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna rin ongnu ga rwe. Atiyeda Eina nakhou rinnuwe, heiba nung Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Ngam om kut inchang pek la badungluga tambaan om tambu bi hungnu nanina phaangmulune.”
40026065	Habei ga takolu gana bapwan kachang reluga rinne, “Maanna Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatka rin drwe! Anina sake katei lou lat lang pa-aam bathaang am maang gabo? Phaang ngo, atun Maanna Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatnu ga nani ngaisuru dabo!
40026066	Nani pa-aam baningbo?” Banina katake, “Maan thi lang khop rwe.”
40026067	Haba nung bi banina Bamai kum bi bachin thangluga Bating bwei rwe khatle katei rwanna Bating bani kut bazaana kabengga
40026068	rinne, “Christa! Nating kabengnu ga tubo, ani khou rinno.”
40026069	Haba kaan bi Peter langkaang la inkhu bi badung ong ngaake. Atiga swak rangaaknu khatna Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Nang le Galilee rwan Jisu le se bacham ngaaknuwe.”
40026070	Atiyeda maanna bani mi bing meithaan bi za makka rinne, “Nangna rin ongnu ga pa-aambo ei thei make.”
40026071	Maanna inmai inkhaan lampui la swaknu kaan bi swak rangaaknu katei khatna bating muluga habei ga ong ongnu mi nun khou rinne, “Heiba manpa le Nazareth Jisu le diga se bacham ngaaknuwe.”
40026072	Atiyeda maanna habei ga le karenga “Ei haba Manpa ding ga thei make” diga za mak lat rwe.
40026073	Bakhwa sei maknu nung habei ga han ongnu mi nunna hungluga Peter khou rinne, “Soi makka nang bani lak pi pakhate, balangbe nachong kabiakna nating pi thei rwe.”
40026074	Habei ga maanna sengga khatle karenga rinne, “Ei haba Manpa ding ga thei make!” Haba kahan bi aankhongna khwang rwe.
40026075	Jisu na Peter khou “Aankhongna khwang maknu meithaan nang Ating za mak leng thumlune” diga rin thang ngaaknu chong ga maan baningsu rwe. Atiga maan langkaang la swakluga sung sokka chap barung hingga chap rwe.
40027001	Louthwan thou bi takopuba rwan le mi nun om patso rwan bing Jisu maitwang bi Bating athat lang chong katu rwe.
40027002	Banina Bating krakluga kalwang rwe khatle taleipuba Pontius Pilate khou Bating pi swak rwe.
40027003	Haba nung bi Bating pi swak ngaaknu Judas na Bating koi pi ta thang rwe dinu munu kaan bi maan baning ngamlan rwe khatle maanna chandi somthum ga takopuba rwan le patso rwan khou phun hung latluga
40027004	rinne, “Koi maaknu thi ding pi swaknu om langna ei noh to rwe.” Habei ga banina rinne, “Haga ani thou paaam ambo? Narang toro!”
40027005	Atiga maanna chandi ga kalum in bi bazwan thangsialuga thou drwe khatle maanna seluga baraanto ring khaak thi rwe.
40027006	Atiyeda takopuba rwanna chandi ga louluga rinne, “Heiya kalum in sian thangnu riak pi thang lang za make, balangbe heiya thi manne.”
40027007	Atiga banina chong kathuiluga haba sian gana man mi ding rinu riak lang ben bachaanu mi om lou khat kalei rwe.
40027008	Atibriakpina haba lou ding ga aniya tangga Thi Loukhun diga kou ongme.
40027009	Atiga thiamting Jeremiah na rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang ngaak rwe, “Banina chandi somthum ga lou rwe, Haga Israel sa rwanna han thangnu Bapum manne
40027010	khatle Pukraangba na akhou rin thangnu danga, Ben bachaanu mi loukhun man lang haga bani khou pi rwe.”
40027011	Atiga Jisu taleipuba meithaan bi hung han rwe. Habei ga taleipuba na Bakhou ngaiye, “Nang Jihudi rwan Krwang bo?” Jisu na bakhou katake, “Nangna rin damnu ga rwe.”
40027012	Atiga Bating takopuba rwan le patso rwanna koi impu thangnu kaan bi Maan khatchale katak mak ngaake.
40027013	Habei ga Pilate na Bakhou rinne, “Namaitwang bi banina sake heiza pi ongnuwa Nang thei makpo?”
40027014	Atiyeda Maanna bakhou chongkaang khatcha hakna katak mak ngaake atibriakpina taleipuba ga taswan khak lang loh lo ngaak rwe.
40027015	Atiga Takan Swaknu Balou dat pi taleipuba na baom chaang toga banina bathainu qwan in mi pakhat ting mi nun lang bathan thang ngaake.
40027016	Ha kaan bi ga khei sianu Barabbas tiga kounu bani om qwan in mi pakhat am ngaake.
40027017	Atibriakpina bani khangsung hung kadoinu kaan bi Pilate na bani khou ngaiye, “Eina nani khou tu ding bathan thangnu bathaigabo? Barabbas tingmo mak tabe Christa diga kounu Jisu dingbo?”
40027018	Balangbe banina antiam briakpina Jisu ding pi swak thangnuwe dinu maanna thei ngaake.
40027019	Maanna chongsem riak pi ong ongnu kaan bi bameina heiba cham ma bakhou bathan hungga rinne, “Haba ririak senu Manpa ding ga khatcha hakna tonu za make, balangbe aniya amang la Bariak pina ei taswang khak riangrenu dou ngaake.”
40027020	Atiyeda Barabbas ting bathanluga Jisu ding to braan lang banina ni dam lang takopuba rwan le patso rwanna mi khang ding kachui thang ngaake.
40027021	Taleipuba na bani khou rinne, “Pat ni lak pi nani khou tu ding eina bathan thangnu nanina bathaigabo?” Banina rinne, “Barabbas ting nge!”
40027022	Pilate na bani khou ngaiye, “Ati dabe Christa diga kounu Jisu ding ei pa-aam to langbo?” Bani khangsungna bakhou rinne, “Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!”
40027023	Taleipuba na rinne, “Pa-aam langbo, Maanna paaam kasianu chwan torugabo?” Atiyeda banina pao rakan ranga rinne, “Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!”
40027024	Pilate na maan khatchale thing ngamlan rwe atiyeda haba hut lang kasao kabaonu swaklu zung rwe dinu munu kaan bi maanna tui louluga mi khang meithaan bi bakut kasinga rinne, “Ei heiba bazenu Manpa thi om lang bi koi maake. Nani rang toro.”
40027025	Habei ga mi khangna katake, “Bathi ga ani khatle ani sa rwan lu chung bi ta ding ngo.”
40027026	Haba nung bi maanna bani lang Barabbas ting bathan thang rwe khatle maanna Jisu ding bwei basiatka pi bweiluga cross pi athat lang Bating pi swak rwe.
40027027	Haba nung bi taleipuba om kraanmi nunna Jisu ding Praetorium sung bi kalwang khutluga habei ga kraan mi doina Bating hung ong qwat rwe.
40027028	Banina Bapwan lwak satluga Bakhou sendumnu pwan sin thang rwe.
40027029	Banina kaling luthop khat bachaluga Balu bi run thang rwe khatle Bakut inchang pek la tou sungrwan khat pi choi thang rwe. Atiga banina Bameithaan bi kuntaluga Bating kiamga rinne, “Kalumme, Jihudi rwan Krwang!”
40027030	Habei ga banina Bakhou bachin thangluga tou sungrwan louluga Balu bi bwei rwe.
40027031	Banina Bating kiam taangnu nung Bakhouna pwan ga lou sat rwe khatle Bapwan ga sin thangluga Bating cross pi athat lang kalwang thou drwe.
40027032	Banina se swaknu kaan bi Cyrene rwan Simon diga kounu manpa pakhat ting kadou ngaake. Banina bating Jisu om cross ka namga pi pon rwe.
40027033	Atiga banina Golgotha bakabana, Luru riak diga kounu riak hung tangnu kaan bi,
40027034	Balaang kathunnu zu bi kakhaanu tui thang karungluga in lang pi rwe. Atiyeda Maanna haga batemnu kaan bi Maan inlan rwe.
40027035	Banina Bating cross pi bakhai thangluga Bapwan ga tasaan phaangluga kasem rwe, haga thiamtingna rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang nge, “Banina Apwan bani lak pi kasem rwe, Khatle Apwan lang chungna banina tasaan rwe.”
40027036	Banina habei ga badungtaluga Bating ong ngaak ong ngaake.
40027037	Banina Bamaitwang bi impu thangnu chongkaang hiak thangluga Balu chung la taan thang rwe, “HEIYA JIHUDI RWAN KRWANG JISU WE.”
40027038	Habei ga Maan le diga inbruk pat ni, pakhat ting inchang pek la, pakhat ting imbei pek la cross pi bakhai thang ngaake.
40027039	Atiga habei ga se hungnu mi nunna Bating rin basiatka bani lu kazinga
40027040	rinne, “Kalum in ding raitaluga ni thum ni ha ding to thou latnu Nang, Naraanto Nating kanro! Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dabe cross pina taro.”
40027041	Hadanga takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle patso rwanna le balaa ga rinne,
40027042	“Maanna katei rwan ding kan thang nge; atiyeda Baraanto Batingba kannu ngam make. Maan Israel rwan Krwang nge dabe, atun Maan cross pina ta ding ngo ati dabe anina Bating balumsane.
40027043	Maanna Rikrwang ding balumsaye; Maanna Bating pemnuwe dabe, atun Maanna Bating kan thang ding ngo, balangbe Maanna rinne, ‘Ei Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye.’ ”
40027044	Maan le diga cross pi bakhai bacham ongnu inbruk mi pat ni na le haga le bachamga Bating rin basiat rwe.
40027045	Chakrin karuk pina chakrin kaqwa tanu tangga haba taram bing ga zing rwe.
40027046	Chakrin kaqwa tanu dat pi Jisu na baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani?” Bakabana, “Arikrwang, Arikrwang, Nangna Ating pa-aam lang bathan thangnubo?” dinuwe.
40027047	Habei ga han ongnu mi kasemna haga ngaisunu kaan bi atiga rinne, “Heiba Manpana Elijah ding kou ongme!”
40027048	Haba kahan bi bani lak pi pakhatna pak seluga sponge louluga kathunnu tui bi imphomluga tou sungrwan lan bi thang rwe khatle haga in dam lang Bakhou balaanka rwe.
40027049	Atiga mi katei rwanna rinne, “Baraanto ong dam ding ngo; Elijah na Bating kan thang lang hunglu dingmo ani phaangzo.”
40027050	Atiga Jisu na baraam basaangga pao latluga Bakatha bathan drwe.
40027051	Phaang ngo, kalum in bi khamthing pwan ga balu lana bakalan tangga kani toga reta rwe; talei le kaling rwe, lung pui bing le pwak bak rwe,
40027052	thaan bing le lat swak rwe khatle bathiangnu mi nun om thi damnu pum bing ga le ring thou rwe.
40027053	Maan ring thou latnu nung thaan bina swakluga banina bathiangnu nampui la seluga mi inza khou pi mu thang ngaake.
40027054	Kraanmi razapuba le maan le diga Jisu ding ngaak ongnu mi nun gana talei kalingnu khatle swak tamnu bing ga muluga banina kachi takka rinne, “Batak takka heiya Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa zung nge!”
40027055	Atiga Galilee lana Jisu nung sui hungnu khatle Bating chwanlaang tonu mannu rwan gana impaan saam saamga han phaang ong ngaake.
40027056	Bani nun lak pi Mary Magdalene, James le Joses nu Mary khatle Zebedee sa kapaisa rwan nu sui ngaake.
40027057	Khwazinren tanu dat pi maan bahak le Jisu om potroi tonu Arimathea lana Joseph tiga kounu lungsanu manpa khat hung ngaake.
40027058	Heiba manpana Pilate khou seluga Jisu pum ding ni rwe. Atiga Pilate na Bapum ga balaang pi lang zathang pi thang rwe.
40027059	Joseph na Bapum ga louluga bathiangnu linen pwanna kazwan rwe,
40027060	atiga maanna haga lung pui bi ran thangnu thaan kathan bi ri thang rwe khatle maanna lung kaliannu khatna thaan inkhaanmun bi lengnam thangsialuga thou drwe.
40027061	Atiga Mary Magdalene le katei Mary na thaan maitwang la badung ong ngaake.
40027062	Inswan lampai Chamdaannu Lumik om bathang lumik pi takopuba rwan le Pharisee rwan Pilate in bi hung kadoiluga
40027063	rinne, “Bapuba, chong karwak mi heiyana Maan ring ngaaknu kaan bi ‘Ni thum nung Ei ring thou latlune’ diga rinnu ga anina baningsuwe.
40027064	Hei langna atunna thouga ni thum ni tangga thaan ga ngaak chuiga ngaak lang zathang pi thang ngo ati make dabe Baom potroi rwanna zingpha na hungluga Bating baru thou damluga, ‘Maan thi bina ring thou drwe’ diga mi nun khou rinlune. Atiga kakhamnu om chong karwak kana kamanu ma sia inkulune.”
40027065	Habei ga Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Nani lang rangkaan mi louro; nanina seluga ngamnu bing ngaakro.”
40027066	Atiga banina seluga thaan ga ngaak chuiga ngaak rwe khatle lung ga seal nam thangluga rangkaan thang rwe.
40028001	Sabbath nung, maap lak om kamanu ni louthwan khwan Mary Magdalene le katei Mary na thaan phaang lang hung ngaake.
40028002	Atiga phaang ngo, talei kaling rakan takka kaling rwe; balangbe Pukraangba om tambaan chonglang khatna tambaan lana taluga thaankham lung ga lat swakluga ha chung bi ong rwe.
40028003	Baman ga khwa bathaaknu dan ngaake khatle bapwan ga kabun danga ngou ngaake.
40028004	Rangkaan mi nun ga bating kachiga kathok rwe khatle bani thinu dan rwe.
40028005	Tambaan chonglang gana kamaisa rwan khou rinne, “Kachi mako, balangbe cross pi athat thang damnu Jisu ding nanina zong ongnuwe dinu ei theiye.
40028006	Maan abeiya ong lan rwe; balangbe Maanna rinnu danga Maan ring thou drwe. Hung ngo, Pukraangba ding ri thangnu riak ka hung phaangro.
40028007	Atiga barapka seluga Baom potroi rwan khou Maan thi bina ring thou drwe diga bapuro, batak takka Maan nani meithaan Galilee la selune; habei ga nanina Bating mulune. Phaang ngo, eina nani khou rin thangnu rwe.”
40028008	Atibriakpina bani karo takka kachinu le bachamga thaan bina barapka swakluga Baom potroi rwan khou cham ga pu lang pak thou drwe.
40028009	Atiga banina Baom potroi rwan khou cham ga pu lang thou damnu kaan bi phaang ngo, Jisu na bani ding kadouluga rinne, “Karowo” atiga banina hungluga Baket hung banaanluga Bating kalum rwe.
40028010	Habei ga Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Kachi mako. Seluga au anao rwan khou Galilee la se lang barinno, ha la ga banina Ating mulune.”
40028011	Banina lampui bi se ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, rangkaan mi kasem nampui la hungluga takopuba rwan khou swak tamnu om lang bing ga pu thang rwe.
40028012	Banina patso rwan le kadoiluga chong katunu nung banina kraanmi nun khou sian taswang khak piluga
40028013	rinne, “ ‘Zingpha anina inthi thou damnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna hungluga Bating baru thou drwe,’ diga mi nun khou rinno.
40028014	Heiba chong nga taleipuba om kanaa bi ngaisu ngaaklena, anina bating bathem ratne khatle nani ding riangrenu bi pi talaye.”
40028015	Atiga banina sian ga louluga bachu thang damnu danga banina to rwe khatle heiba chong nga aniya tangga Jihudi rwan lak pi kabia ongme.
40028016	Haba nung bi potroi rwan pat somga khat kana Galilee la Jisu na bani ding kadou lang rin thang ngaaknu rammwan la ga thou drwe.
40028017	Banina Bating munu kaan bi banina Bating kalum rwe; atiyeda kasemna balumsia ngaake.
40028018	Jisu na hungluga bani khou rinne, “Tambaan le talei bi ngam bing Akhou pi thang rwe.
40028019	Atibriakpina seluga chaat bing ding potroi bacharo, bani ding Pa, Sa Kapaisa khatle Katha Bathiangnu meng bi baptize to thang ngo.
40028020	Eina nani khou zathang pi thang damnu bapum brum ga zei lang bani ding bachu thang ngo; atiga phaang ngo, talei ram loinu tangga Eina nani le diga ong bacham thang ongme.” Amen.
41001001	Heiya Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa, Jisu Christa om sacham thou kamanu gaye.
41001002	Thiamting rwan om chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu danga, “Phaang ngo, Nameithaan seluga Nalampui daan thang dingnu, Acham phunnu mi ding Eina basom ga lang thang nge.
41001003	Khwan khatna ramhaang bi atiga pao ongme, ‘Pukraangba lampui ga daanno; Balampui bing ga to bazeyo.’ ”
41001004	John na ramhaang bi baptize to thangga khatle noh kok thang lang sung lenu om baptize tonu ga kasamga hung ngaake.
41001005	Habei ga Judea taram mi bing le Jerusalem bina mi bing Bakim bi hung rwe khatle bani om noh rin indaoluga Jordan tuiqwa bi bani mi bing ding maanna baptize to thang rwe.
41001006	John ut munna bachanu pwan sin basoi ngaake, bakong bi zan mun kongkhaak khaake khatle maan takhao le nilai lak khwei tui sa ngaake.
41001007	Maanna kasamga rinne, “Ama ngam liannu Baom sandal rui ga hakna eina kuntaluga sut lang khop maknu Pakhat anung la hung naye.
41001008	Batak takka Eina nani ding tui bi baptize to thang nge atiyeda Maanna nani ding Katha Bathiangnu bi baptize to thanglune.”
41001009	Haba kaan bi Jisu Galilee om Nazareth lana hung ngaake khatle John na Bating Jordan tuiqwa bi baptize to thang ngaake.
41001010	Atiga Jisu tui bina kakhap tinu kahan bi tambaan inkhaan lat swaknu khatle Katha na banphi danga Balu chung bi tatwangnu Maanna mu rwe.
41001011	Haba nung bi tambaan lana tanu khwan khatna rinne, “Nang Eina kriangnu Asa Kapaisa ye, Ei Nalu chung bi pem tak rwe.”
41001012	Haba kahan bi Katha na Bating ramhaang la phun swak rwe.
41001013	Maan ramhaang bi ni sombali Seitaan na bathemga nilai lak khouring nun le ong bacham ngaake khatle tambaan chonglang rwanna Bating chwanlaang to thang ngaake.
41001014	John ding qwan in bi thang damnu nung, Jisu na Galilee taram la seluga Rikrwang om krwang talei sacham kasamga
41001015	rinne, “Bakaan ga hung tang rwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nai rwe. Sung lero khatle sacham ding balumsaro!”
41001016	Jisu na Galilee tuipui paan bi se hungnu kaan bi Maanna Simon le banao Andrew ding tuipui bi kalang sat ong ngaaknu mu rwe; balangbe barwei ga ngaa namnu mi ngaake.
41001017	Habei ga Jisu na barwei khou rinne, “Anung suiyo, Eina narwei ding mi namnu mi pi to thangne.”
41001018	Haba kahan bi ga barweina barwei kalang bing ga asat thangsialuga Banung sui drwe.
41001019	Maan habei gana kasem se swaknu kaan bi Zebedee sa kapaisa James khatle banao John le li sung bi kalang photka ongnu Maanna mu ngaake.
41001020	Haba kahan bi Jisu na barwei ding kou rwe, atiga barweina barwei pa Zebedee le lan thangnu swak rwan ding li sung bi thangsialuga Banung sui se drwe.
41001021	Haba nung bi bani nun Capernaum la se rwe khatle Maanna Sabbath ni synagogue pi khutluga bachu thang ngaake.
41001022	Atiga Maanna bachu thangnu bi ga bani loh lo ngaake, balangbe Maanna bani ding bachu thangnu ga chongtan bachuthangnu rwan dan makka, ngam amnu pakhat tanga bachu thang ngaake.
41001023	Bani om synagogue pi bathiang maknu katha khutnu manpa pakhat am ngaake. Maanna paoga
41001024	rinne, “Nazareth rwan Jisu! Ani ding rai thang mako. Nang le ani paaam barui bazem ambo? Nang ani ding to braan lang hungnubo? Nang tubo dinu ei theiye, Nang Rikrwang om Bathiangnu Maan gaye!”
41001025	Habei ga Jisu na bating tweiga rinne, “Thiap thiap ong ngo, bakhouna swak tro!”
41001026	Bathiang maknu katha gana manpa ding ga rai basiat thangluga baraam basaangga paonu nung maan bakhouna swak trwe.
41001027	Habei ga bani khangsung loh lo rwe, atiga bani cham ngai kalega rinne, “Heiya pa-aambo? Tatonu kathan bachu thangnubo? Balangbe Maanna ngam suiga bathiang maknu katha ding tangga zathang pi thang bi banina Bachong zeiye.”
41001028	Haba kahan bi gana thouga Galilee taram bing bi Bameng ga thei chang thou dam ngaak rwe.
41001029	Bani nun synagogue pina se swak khap tinu le James le John bani nun Simon le Andrew in bi khut rwe.
