41001030	Atiga Simon mei nu bakhunga naaga in ong ngaake, haba kahan bi banina balang bi Jisu khou pu thang rwe.
41001031	Habei ga Jisu na hungluga bakut choiga bating kai thou rwe, haba kahan bi gana bakhunnu ga sa drwe. Atiga maanna bani ding chwanlaang to rwe.
41001032	Khwazin lumik tanu nung, banina naanu bing ding le ri kasia khutnu bing ding Bakhou phun hung ngaake.
41001033	Atiga nampui la mi bing inkhaanmun bi hung kadoi rwe.
41001034	Habei ga bachaat tei teina naanu tanat taswang khak ting Maanna pi sa thang rwe khatle ri kasia taswang khak ting le kazun sat thang rwe; Maanna ri kasia nun ding chong kabia lang za thang mak ngaake, balangbe banina Bating thei ngaake.
41001035	Louthwan khwan, khwa baan swak mak balei meithaan insaang thouluga Maan rim rimnu riak la seluga habei ga kalum ngaake.
41001036	Simon khatle Maan le diga ong bachamnu mi nunna Bating zong ngaake.
41001037	Banina Bating kadounu kaan bi banina Bakhou rinne, “Mi khangsungna Nating zong ongme.”
41001038	Atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ani nun bathang nampui bing la semaangzo, Ei habei ga le sacham kasam lang maang nge, balangbe Ei hei langna hungnuwe.”
41001039	Maanna Galilee taram bing bi bani om synagogue bing bi sacham kasam se ngaake khatle ri kasia nun ding kazun sat thang ngaake.
41001040	Imphaannu manpa pakhat Bakim bi hungluga hweini rwe khatle kekhok deluga Bakhou rinne, “Nangna zaye dabe, Nangna ating to bathiang thangnu ngamme.”
41001041	Habei ga Jisu na bating phaangkriang thangga, Bakut balaan swakluga bating banaan thang rwe khatle bakhou rinne, “Ei za rwe; bathiangro.”
41001042	Atiga kabianu kahan bina imphaannu ga bakhouna sa drwe khatle maan bathiang rwe.
41001043	Maanna bating rin basi thangluga haba kahan bi ga bating bathan thangga
41001044	bakhou rinne, “Nang heiya pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako; atiyeda nangna seluga napum bahak tako khou pi muwo khatle nating to bathiang thangnu langna bani khou sake toga Moses na zathang pi thangnu pot bing ga katro.”
41001045	Atiyeda maanna se swakluga bating pi sa thang damnu sacham ga rang toga kasam se ngaak rwe atibriakpina Jisu na namlian sung bi indaoga khut latnu ngam mak ngaake atiyeda namlian paan la rim rimnu riak la ong ngaak rwe; atiga bariak bing la mi nunna Jisu kim bi hung ngaake.
41002001	Lumik kasem nung bi Jisu Capernaum namlian bi khut lat rwe khatle Maan insung la amme dinu mi nunna ngaisu ngaake.
41002002	Haba kahan bi mi nun hung kadoi ngaak rwe khatle mi tam briakpina inkhaanmun tangga han lang bariak maak ngaake. Atiga Maanna bani khou sacham kasam ngaake.
41002003	Habei ga manpa pat balina pum baang thinu manpa pakhat ting phunluga bani nun Jisu kim bi hung ngaake.
41002004	Mi tam briakpina bani Jisu kim bi khuttang ngamlanruga Maan ongnu tun bi in chung ga rai sat rwe. Banina haga rai satluga pum baang thinu manpana in ongnu ria ga banina basaam ta rwe.
41002005	Jisu na bani balumsat ka munu kaan bi pum baang thinu manpa khou Maanna rinne, “Sa kapaisa, nanoh bing ga kok thang rwe.”
41002006	Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan kasem habei ga ong ngaake khatle bani sung bi atiga kakhan ngaake,
41002007	“Heiba manpana Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat ongnuwa pa-aam langbo? Rikrwang zana makka tuna noh bing ding kok thang ngamgabo?”
41002008	Bani raantoza bani sung bi atiga kakhan ongnu ga Jisu na Balungning bi theinu kahan bi, Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani sung bi ha bing ga pa-aam lang kakhan ongnubo?
41002009	Pum baang thinu ding nga, ‘Nanoh bing ga kok thang rwe’ diga rinnu le ‘Lon thouluga sero’ dinu le ingaana bai inkubo?
41002010	Atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisana talei ram bi noh bing kok thang lang ngam amme dinu nanina thei lang nge.” Maanna pum baang thinu khou rinne,
41002011	“Eina nakhou rinnuwe, lon thouro, nakain riak ka lou thouluga nain la sero.”
41002012	Haba kahan bi maan thou rwe, khatle bakain riak ka kai thouluga bani khangsung meithaan bi se swak rwe, habei ga mi bingza loh lo ga Rikrwang lwat indaoga rinne, “Impha ni beida hei dannu ani khatchale mu make!”
41002013	Jisu na tuipui paan la se hung lat rwe; habei ga mi khangna Bakim bi hung rwe khatle Maanna bani ding bachu thang lat rwe.
41002014	Maanna atiga se hungnu kaan bi ramkhai khomnu in bi Alpheus sa kapaisa Levi badung ongnu mu rwe. Jisu na ba khou rinne, “Anung suiro.” Habei ga maan lon thouluga Banung sui drwe.
41002015	Maan Levi in bi sa in ongnu kaan bi ramkhai khomnu nun le noh mi nun ga Jisu le Baom potroi rwan le diga ong karung ong ngaake; balangbe mi tam tak ngaake khatle banina Banung sui se ngaake.
41002016	Jisu na ramkhai khomnu rwan le noh mi nun le diga sa in karung ongnu ga chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna munu kaan bi banina Baom potroi rwan khou rin rwe, “Maanna ramkhai khomnu rwan le noh mi nun le diga sa in bacham ongnuwa paaam langbo?”
41002017	Jisu na haga ngaisunu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Pum sanu mi nun lang kathiam bathaang maake atiyeda naanu nun lang be bathaang amme. Ei ririak senu mi nun ding kou lang hungnu make atiyeda noh mi nun ding sung pi le langna kou lang hungnuwe.”
41002018	John om potroi rwan le Pharisee rwan om potroi rwan kalumsan ong ngaake. Banina hungluga Bakhou rinne, “John om potroi rwan le Pharisee rwan om potroi rwanna kalumsanda, Naom potroi rwanna pa-aam lang kalumsan maknubo?”
41002019	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Tazwanpa baan rwan gana tazwanpa le diga ong bacham basaan bani kalumsan ong ding gabo? Tazwanpana bani le ong bacham basaan banina kalumsan make.
41002020	Atiyeda tazwanpa ding ga bani khouna lou thou dam dingnu kaan ga hunglune; haba kaan bi bani kalumsanlune.
41002021	“Pakhatchanale charut maknu pwan kathan tutna pwan raan bi phot thang make; atiye dabe baraan ding ga kai charutluga re basiatlune.
41002022	Pakhatchanale drakha tui kathan ding zan mun khao raan bi thang make; atiye dabe drakha tui kathan gana zan mun khao raan ding ga pi pwak baklune atiga drakha tui ga lwang sate khatle zan mun khao ga le braanne. Atiyeda drakha tui kathan ga zan mun khao kathan bi thang lang nge.”
41002023	Sabbath ni Maan louzam lak pi serwan hung ngaake; banina se ong bi Baom potroi rwanna tapaan bazui thou rwe.
41002024	Habei ga Pharisee rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Phaang ngo, toza maknu chwan banina pa-aam toga Sabbath ni tonubo?”
41002025	Jisu na bani khou katake, “David na maan khatle maan le bachamnu nunna, bani bathaang amnu kaan bi khatle bon chaamnu kaan bi pa-aam to dambo dinu nanina pa makchungbo:
41002026	Takolu Abiathar kaan bi David na tatoga Rikrwang in bi khutluga, tako rwanna makka pakhatchanale sanu za maknu kat thangnu uilu ga sanu za makka, maan le chwanlaang bachamnu nun lang le kasem pi damme.”
41002027	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Sabbath heiya mi lang chungna bacha thangnuwe khatle mi ya Sabbath lang make.
41002028	Atibriakpina Misa Sa Kapaisa heiya Sabbath ni om Pukraangba le rwe.”
41003001	Jisu synagogue pi khut lat ngaake, habei ga kut lwamnu manpa pakhat am ngaake.
41003002	Banina Jisu ding koi impu thang langna Sabbath ni bating pi sa thanglu dingmo diga banina Bating aan ong ngaake.
41003003	Jisu na kut lwamnu manpa khou rinne, “Lon thouluga meithaan se swakro.”
41003004	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Sabbath ni kasanu chwan tonu zamo mak tabe kasianu chwan tonu, mi pakhat om kum ding kan thangnu mak tabe athatnu zabo?” Habei ga bani thiap thiap ong ngaake.
41003005	Jisu na bani ding balung pwanga phaang koinu nung, bani sung natnuna Basung sokka Maanna manpa khou ga rinne, “Nakut ka balaan swako.” Maanna balaan swaknu kaan bi bakut ka babaang khat ka danga sa bathiang rwe.
41003006	Pharisee rwan ga se swakluga haba kahan bi banina Herod om mi nun le diga Bating to braan lang Bamaitwang bi chong katu rwe.
41003007	Atiyeda Jisu Baom potroi rwan le diga tuipui la thou dam ngaake. Atiga Galilee la mi khang puina Banung sui ngaake khatle Judea le
41003008	Jerusalem namlian, Idumea taram Jordan raan la amnu khatle Tyre le Sidon la mi khang puina Maanna to ongnu chwan inza ga ngaisuluga Bakim bi hung rwe.
41003009	Mi khang tamlai briakpina Bating hwam lem mak lang Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou Balaang liswan khat daan thang lang rin rwe.
41003010	Balangbe Maanna mi taswang khak ting pi sa thang briakpina tanat kasia naanu mi nunna Bating banaan su lang Bakim bi hwam lem ngaake.
41003011	Bathiang maknu katha nunna Bating phaangmu bathin, Bameithaan bi balumtaluga paoga rinne, “Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye.”
41003012	Atiyeda banina Bating Tubo dinu rin indao swak mak lang Maanna bani khou rakanga rin thang ngaake.
41003013	Maan rammwan la kaluga Maan bahakna bathainu mi nun ding kou rwe. Atiga bani nun Bakim bi hung rwe.
41003014	Maanna potroi pat somga kani ding ka thang rwe, bani ga Maan le ong bacham lang, Maanna bani ding sacham kasam lang bathan swak thang lang,
41003015	kasa kanaa bing ding pi sa thang lang khatle ri kasia nun ding bathou satnu ngam am lang nge:
41003016	Maanna Peter dinu meng basak thangnu Simon;
41003017	atiluga Maanna Boanerges bakabana, “Bachek Sa Kapaisa rwan” diga meng basak thang ngaaknu Zebedee sa kapaisa James le banao John,
41003018	Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus sa kapaisa James, Thaddaeus, Canaan rwan Simon
41003019	khatle Bating pi swaknu Judas Iscariot bani ding ka thang rwe. Atiga bani in khat la se rwe.
41003020	Mi khangna hung kadoi lat rwe atibriakpina bani nun uilu hakna sanu ngam mak ngaake.
41003021	Hei lang bi Bami nunna ngaisunu kaan bi banina Bating nam thang lang se swak rwe, balangbe banina rinne, “Maan kalo rwe.”
41003022	Jerusalem lana hungnu chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna rinne, “Bakhou Beelzebub am rwe” khatle “Ri kasia nun om bapuba paanna Maanna katha kasia nun ding kazun sate.”
41003023	Jisu na bani ding Bakhou kou hungluga bani khou chongchak toga rinne, “Tatoga Seitaan na Seitaan ding bathou satnu ngam ding gabo?
41003024	Krwang talei khatna baraanto babaang kai khak kai lang swake dabe, haba krwang talei ga hannu ngamlaye.
41003025	Inkhun khatna baraanto kai khak kai lang nge dabe, haba inkhun ga hannu ngamlaye.
41003026	Seitaan na bamaitwang bi katwake dabe khatle kai khak kai lang swake dabe maan hannu ngamlaye atiga maan braannu zung rwe.
41003027	Kanatnu manpa ding ga karak kama make dabe, pakhatchanale kanatnu pa in bi khutluga baom pot bing kapumnu ngamlaye. Bating karaknu nung bina bain ga kapumlune.
41003028	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, misa sa kapaisa rwan om noh bing khatle banina Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatnu bing kok thanglune;
41003029	atiyeda tudannu Katha Bathiangnu maitwang bi rin basiatnu bating ga impha ni beida kok thanglaye atiyeda loinu nai maknu noh om laak thangnu ga phanglune.”
41003030	Heiba chongchak bing nga banina, “Bakhou bathiang maknu katha am rwe” diga rin briakpina kabianuwe.
41003031	Haba nung bi Banao kapaisa rwan le Banuna hungluga langkaang la hanluga Bating kou lang Bakhou mi langkhut rwe.
41003032	Mi khangna Bating ong qwatluga banina Bakhou rinne, “Phaang ngo, Nanu le Nanao kapaisa rwanna langkaang la Nating zong ongme.”
41003033	Atiyeda Maanna bani khou katake, “Anu le Anao kapaisa rwanzo tubo?”
41003034	Atiga Jisu na Bating ong qwat ongnu mi nun ding phaang koiluga rinne, “Phaang ngo, abeiya Anu le Anao kapaisa rwan amme.
41003035	Balangbe tudannu Rikrwang na baningnu to ongnu maan ga Anao kapaisa rwan le Anao kamaisa rwan khatle Anu rwe.”
41004001	Jisu na tuipui paan bi bachu thang thou lat rwe. Mi khang puina Bakim bi hung briakpina Maan tuipui chung bi amnu li sung bi khutluga habei ga ongta rwe; atiga mi khangna tuipui pek la kanei ong ngaake.
41004002	Habei ga Maanna bani ding chongchak inzana tamga bachu thang ngaake khatle Maanna bachu thangga bani khou rinne,
41004003	“Phaang ngo, tachi bwannu mi khatna tachi bwan lang se swak rwe.
41004004	Maanna tachi bwannu kaan bi tachi kasemna lampui paan bi ta thang nge khatle haga basaang la zwangnu basaa nunna hungluga kachung sa drwe.
41004005	Kasemna talei tomnu lung lak pi ta thang nge; talei ti thuk mak briakpina haga barapka mong thou rwe.
41004006	Atiyeda nisat nat kanu kaan bi haga phouchaan ta damme khatle bakamong ta mak briakpina baowei ta damme.
41004007	Tachi kasemna kaling lak pi ta thang nge; kaling gana thou kaluga ha ding ga zin lemme khatle haga bakraa kraalan rwe.
41004008	Atiyeda talei kasanu riak pi ta thangnu tachi gana mong thou rwe khatle sing thouluga bakraa kraa rwe: kasemna somthum, kasemna somruk khatle kasemna raza kraa rwe.”
41004009	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo!”
41004010	Maan baraanto ongnu kaan bi Bakim bi ong qwat ongnu rwan le potroi pat somga kani gana chongchak lang bi Bakhou ngai rwe.
41004011	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Rikrwang om krwang talei om inthim chong ga thei dam lang haga nani khou pi thangnuwe; atiyeda langkaang la ongnu mi nun khou balang bing bi chongchak toga rin thang nge,
41004012	‘Bani mu bi mulune atiyeda theilaye, Ngai bi ngaisulune atiyeda bakaba theilaye; Ati make dabe bani han hungluga bani om noh bing kok thang dingnuwe.’ ”
41004013	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Heiba chongchak heiya nani thei makpo? Ati dabe nanina chongchak bing nga tatoga theinu ngam dingbo?
41004014	Tachi bwannu manpa gana chongkaang bwannuwe.
41004015	Lampui paan bi chongkaang bwan thang damnu riak ka hei rwanne. Banina ngaisunu kaan bi Seitaan na barapka hungluga bani sung bi bwan thang damnu chongkaang ga lou sat tamme.
41004016	Hadanga lung lak pi bwan thangnu gana hei rwanne, banina chongkaang ga ngaisunu kaan bi barapka karoga lou thang nge;
41004017	haga bani khou bakamong ta make, bakaan taoiza khaang thang nge. Haba nung bi sacham lang chungna riangre kanang mak tabe rainu hungnu kaan bi bani barapka balumtaye.
41004018	Kaling lak pi bwan thangnu rwan gana hei rwanne; bani ga chongkaang ngaisunu nunne,
41004019	atiga talei ram om katop, lan om minamnu le pot katei ding bathainu ha bing gana chongkaang ding ga namdan damme khatle haga bakraa kraa maknu to rwe.
41004020	Atiyeda talei kasa bi ta thangnu gana hei rwanne, banina chongkaang ga ngaisuluga haga lou thang rwe khatle bakraa kraa rwe: kasemna saruk somthum, kasemna saruk somruk khatle kasemna saruk raza kraa rwe.”
41004021	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina thaomei ga luklei thwei bi thang lang mak tabe ria thwei bi dung thang lang lou hungnu zunggabo? Haga badung riak pi thang lang makpo?
41004022	Balangbe indao swak makka inthim thang dingnu khatchale maake khatle baannu bi indao swakla dingnu inkam thang dingnu khatchale maake.
41004023	Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo.”
41004024	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina ngaisunu ga cheksinno. Nanina mi khat lang badat thangnu dat kana nani khou le badat thanglune; ngai ongnu nani khou inkuga pi thanglune.
41004025	Balangbe tudannu ka amnu bakhou ga inkuga pi thanglune; atiyeda ka maaknu bakhouna baom ka amnu ga tangga lou sat tamlune.”
41004026	Maanna rinne, “Rikrwang om krwang talei ga manpa pakhatna talei bi tachi bwan thangnu ga dannuwe.
41004027	Maan zingpha in rwe khatle thamlai thou lat rwe; atiga bamu ga nge swakluga mong thou rwe, atiyeda haga tatoga sing thounubo dinu maan bahakna thei make.
41004028	Balangbe taleina baraanto bakraa pi kraaye: kama bi bana pi kasat swake atiga saangui pi swak thang nge; haba nung bi bamu pi nat thang nge.
41004029	Atiyeda tapaan ga minnu kaan bi aatnu kaan ga hung briakpina maanna sangkhwei chwei thouluga haba kahan bi ga aat rwe.”
41004030	Jisu na rinne, “Rikrwang om krwang talei ga anina pa-aam le diga rin kaba dingbo? Anina paaam chongchak sizinluga bachu thang langbo?
41004031	Haga talei bi bwan thangnu bamu khon bina sin kataknu ancham mu khat tannuwe;
41004032	atiyeda haga bwan thangnu kaan bi mongkaluga lou kung bing lak pina lian kataknu to rwe khatle babaak kaliannu su swakluga basaang la zwangnu basaa nunna haba om nilim bi bakabu hungkai rwe.”
41004033	Jisu na bani khou atinu chongchak inza, banina ngai ngam basaan chong kabia thang ngaake.
41004034	Atiyeda Maanna chongchak sui makka bani khou rin mak ngaake. Bani raantoza ongnu kaan bi Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou ha bing bathiangga rin thang ngaake.
41004035	Habani bahak khwazinren tanu kaan bi Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Ani tuipui raan la takan swakcho.”
41004036	Banina mi khang ding bathan satnu nung, Jisu na ong ngaaknu li bi potroi rwan ga khutluga banina Bating kalwang rwe. Bakim bi liswan tamga am ngaake.
41004037	Habei ga thirwei kanatnu hung rwe khatle tui kabaapnu gana li bi hung bwei briakpina li ga tuina sipka rwe.
41004038	Atiyeda Jisu ba li kamei la lukham khamluga inthi ong ngaake. Banina Bating bathou thouluga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, ani braan ding rwe, Nang rakhi thanglabo?”
41004039	Maanna thouluga thirwei ding tweiluga tuipui ding rin rwe, “Bazaang taro, rim rimmo!” Habei ga thiraang ga lan drwe khatle tuipui ga rim rim ta drwe.
41004040	Maanna potroi rwan khou rinne, “Nani pa-aam lang heitia kachinubo? Nani khou balumsat maaknuwa tatonu ombo?”
41004041	Atiga bani nun kachi tak ngaak rwe khatle bani cham khatna khat khou rinne, “Thiraang le tuipuina tangga Bachong zei ongnu Maan heiya tatonu Mi ngaak tingbo!”
41005001	Bani tuipui raan khat la takan swakluga Gadara taram la hung rwe.
41005002	Jisu na li bina swak khap tinu le, thaanmwan lana hungnu bathiang maknu katha khutnu manpa khatna Bating kadou ngaake,
41005003	maan thaanmwan lak pi ong ngaake; pakhatchanale bating parei ruina hakna bangnu ngam make,
41005004	balangbe bating thin rui le parei ruina bang thang batwan ngaake. Maanna parei rui ga kaichat sate khatle thin rui ga to katup sat ngaake; tupai khatchanale bating pi tehnu ngam mak ngaake.
41005005	Bakaan bathin, zingpha thamlai rammwan la khatle thaanmwan la paoga baraanto bating lungna ret bazam ga ong ngaake.
41005006	Maanna Jisu ding namlaa lamangna phaangmunu kaan bi pak hungluga Bating kalum rwe.
41005007	Maanna pao rakanga rinne, “Basaang kataknu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa, Jisu, Nang le ei paaam barui bazem ambo? Nangna ating rai thang mak lang eina Rikrwang ding kaisingga Nating kalumme.”
41005008	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Bathiang maknu katha, heiba manpa khouna swak tro!”
41005009	Habei ga Jisu na bakhou ngai rwe, “Nameng tatobo?” Maanna katake, “Ameng Legion diga kouwe; balangbe ani tamme.”
41005010	Maanna Jisu khou bani ding haba taram bina kazun sat thang mak lang rakanga kalum rwe.
41005011	Haba kaan bi ga rammwan kim la bok nun khatna basaak timsa ong ngaake.
41005012	Ri kasia bing gana Jisu khou hweiga rinne, “Ani ding bok nun khou khut za lang ani ding bani khou bathan thang ngo.”
41005013	Haba kahan bi Jisu na bani ding za thang rwe. Habei ga bathiang maknu katha nun gana swakluga bok nun khou khut rwe, bok nun ga raching ni khak ngaake khatle bok nun ga batok bariak thei makka rakanga pak tasuk taluga tuipui la ta imphum loi drwe.
41005014	Bok sian ngaaknu nun gana pak seluga banina swak tamnu ga nampui le taram la bapu rwe. Atiga swak tamnu bing ga phaang lang bani se swak rwe.
41005015	Banina Jisu kim la hungnu kaan bi ri kasia khutnu legion am ngaaknu manpa ga pwan sinluga badung ongnu khatle mi tak imbeiga ongnu ga mu rwe. Atiga bani kachi ngaake.
41005016	Haga mu damnu mi nunna ri kasia khutnu manpa khou tatoga swak tamnubo dinu lang bi khatle bok nun lang bi bani khou rin thang ngaake.
41005017	Haba nung bi bani om taram bina Bating se swak tam lang bathem thou rwe.
41005018	Jisu na li sung bi khut tamnu kaan bi ri kasia khutnu manpa gana Banung sui se lang Bakhou kalumga rin ngaake.
41005019	Atiyeda Jisu na bating za thang make atiyeda bakhou rinne, “Nain la khatle nabaan rwan khou sero, Pukraangba na nalaang tasiatnu chwan to thang damnu khatle Maanna nating heitia lang kriang thang damnu lang bi bani khou bapuro.”
41005020	Maanna se swakluga Jisu na bakhou to thang damnu bing ga Decapolis la kasam thou rwe khatle mi bingza loh lo ngaake.
41005021	Jisu li bina tuipui raan khat la takan swak latnu kaan bi mi khang pui Bakim bi hung rwe khatle Maan tuipui paan la ong ngaake.
41005022	Phaang ngo, Jairus tiga kounu synagogue om kai thangnu lak pi pakhatna hungluga Jisu ding munu kaan bi Baket kim bi in balumtaluga
41005023	Bating rakanga kalumga rin rwe, “Asa kamaisa swan thi ding ga in ong amme. Maan sa latluga ring lang hungluga balu chung bi Nakutna banaan thang ngo.”
41005024	Habei ga Jisu maan le se ngaake khatle mi khang puina le Banung suisega Bating sui bwat ong ngaake.
41005025	Habei ga sangwan somga kani thi se ongnu mannu pakhat am ngaake,
41005026	maan kathiam taswang khak khou phaangluga riangrenu dou ngaak rwe. Baom ka am bing maanna ting beida maan sa mak ngaake atiyeda sia khit khit ngaake.
41005027	Maanna Jisu cham ga ngaisunu kaan bi mi nun lak pi Banung la hungluga Bapwan banaan ngaake.
41005028	Balangbe maanna baning ngaake, “Eina Bapwan za beida banaan suwe dabe ei salune.”
41005029	Haba kahan bi thi se ongnu ga lan drwe khatle bapum bi naa ongnu sa maknu tanat ka sa drwe dinu bapum bi thei rwe.
41005030	Jisu na haba kahan bi ga Bakhouna nat swak trwe dinu Maan theiluga mi nun ding phaang koiluga rinne, “Tuna Apwan banaannubo?”
41005031	Atiyeda Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Nating mi khangna sui bwat ongnuwa Nang mu beida Nangna rinne, ‘Ating tuna banaannubo?’ ”
41005032	Jisu na Bating banaan damnu mannu ding ga mu lang phaang koi ong ngaake.
41005033	Mannu gana bakhou pa-aam swak tambo dinu ga theiluga kachi kathokka hungluga Bameithaan bi in bakhuptaluga bazenu bing ga Bakhou rin thang rwe.
41005034	Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Asa kamaisa, nabalumsat paanbina nating pi sa thang rwe, dai bazaangga sero khatle naom tanat ka sa dam dingro.”
41005035	Jisu na atiga kabia ongnu kaan bi synagogue om kai thangnu in lana mi kasemna hungluga rin rwe, “Nasa kamaisa ga thi drwe. Bachuthangnupa ding pa-aam lang to katop lat ongnubo?”
41005036	Kabia swak tamnu chong ga Jisu na thei khap tinu kaan bi Maanna synagogue om kai thangnu khou rinne, “Kachi mako; balumba balumsawo.”
41005037	Jisu na Peter, James le banao John ding makka mi katei ding Banung sui lang za thang mak ngaake.
41005038	Maan synagogue om kaithangnupa in bi hungnu kaan bi kasao kabao ga ongnu khatle chap barung hingga chap ongnu ga mu rwe.
41005039	Jisu na khutnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rin rwe, “Pa-aam toga nani kasao kabaoga chap ongnubo? Naosen ga thi make atiyeda in ongnu zung nge.”
41005040	Habei ga banina bating balaa ga banui rwe. Atiyeda Maanna bani khangsung ding langkaang la pi swakluga, haba naosen nu pa le maan le ong bachamnu nun ding kalwangluga naosen in ongnu riak la khut rwe.
41005041	Maanna naosen kut ka choiluga bakhou rinne, “Talitha Cumi,” bakabana “Kamaisa swan, Eina nakhou rinne, lon thouro” dinuwe.
41005042	Haba kahan bi kamaisa swan ga lon thouluga se rwe, balangbe maan sangwan somga kani ngaak rwe. Habei ga bani mi nun ga loh lonuna sip rwe.
41005043	Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou haga pakhatchanale thei mak ting ngo diga katip thang ngaake khatle kamaisa swan lang sa lang thaisaak kasem pi thangbiyo diga zathang pi thang ngaake.
41006001	Maan habei gana se swakluga Banampui la hung rwe khatle Baom potroi rwan le Banung sui hung ngaake.
41006002	Sabbath ni hungnu kaan bi Maanna synagogue pi bachu thang thou rwe. Maanna kabianu ngaisunu mi bingna loh lo ga rinne, “Hei bing nga heiba manpana inlampaina lousunubo? Heitia tasiatnu chwan bing nga Bakutna tonu ngam lang tuna Bakhou ningting pi thangnubo!
41006003	Heiya thing chwan tonu, Mary Sa Kapaisa, James, Joses, Judas le Simon tang ga makpo? Banao kamaisa rwan le ani kim bi ongnu makpo?” Atiga bani Balang bi ket basui rwe.
41006004	Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Thiamting pakhat ting bataleina, bain thirui nun lak pi khatle bain inkhun bahakna makka bariak thin takhwang to maknu make.”
41006005	Maanna habei ga kasa kanaa mi kasem lu chung bi Bakut kai thouluga bani ding pi sa thangnu ga makka katei tasiatnu chwan tonu ngam mak ngaake.
41006006	Habei ga banina Bating balumsa mak briakpina Maan loh lo rwe. Haba nung bi Maanna nam nam la se koiluga bachu thang ngaake.
41006007	Maanna potroi rwan pat somga kani ding Bakim bi kou hungluga bani ding pat ni pat ni toga lang thang rwe khatle bathiang maknu katha nun ding ngam lang bani khou ngam pi thang rwe.
41006008	Bani lamsek lang sungrwan makka katei khao, uilu, bani kongkhaak pi sian phun mak lang
41006009	atiyeda sandal twang lang khatle talathu kani bathu mak lang Jisu na bani khou zathang pi thang rwe.
41006010	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina in bi khutnu kaan bi nanina haba riak pina se swak lat mak basaan habei ga ong ngo.
41006011	Tudannuna nani ding lou thang make dabe khatle nani chong ngai thang make dabe, nanina habei gana se swaknu kaan bi bani maitwang bi sake toga nani ket pi kaphut ka kathing ta basiawo. Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, chongsem lumik pi ga Sodom le Gomorrah na haba namlian ma inkuga laak thangnu ga khaangsalune!”
41006012	Atiga bani se swakluga mi nun sung le langna sacham kasam rwe.
41006013	Banina ri kasia inza ding kazun sat thang rwe khatle naanu mi inza ding thao kanun thangluga bani ding pi sa thang rwe.
41006014	Krwang Herod na Jisu lang bi thei ngaak rwe, balangbe Bameng ga se thou ngaak rwe. Herod na rinne, “Baptize to thangnu John thi bina ring thou lat rwe atibriakpina heiba ngam bing nga bakhou am ongnuwe.”
41006015	Kateina rinne, “Haga Elijah zung nge.” Atiga kateina rinne, “Haga Thiamting khat chung nge mak tabe haga thiamting rwan lak pi pakhat tannuwe.”
41006016	Herod na haga theisunu kaan bi maanna rinne, “Heiya eina baring tan damnu John zung nge; maan thi bina ring thou lat rwe!”
41006017	Balangbe Herod maan bahakna lang thangluga banao Philip mei Herodias lang chungna John ding namluga bating qwan in bi bang thang ngaake; balangbe Herod na Herodias ting lou ngaake.
41006018	Atibriakpina John na Herod khou rin ngaake, “Nanao mei ding nangna lou lang za make.”
41006019	Haba om langna Herodias na John maitwang bi tu tu tam tam ngaake khatle bating athat nwam ngaake atiyeda maan ngam mak ngaake;
41006020	balangbe John ga bazenu khatle bathiangnu miye dinu theiga Herod na bating kachi ngaake khatle bating athat mak lang ngaak thang ong ngaake. John na to damnu chwan bing ga Herod na ngaisunu kaan bi basung bi loh lo ong ngaake atiyeda maan karoga ngai ngaake.
41006021	Haba nung bi Herod na bating ponnu bangei lumik hung tangnu kaan bi baom kasei kalian nun, kraan milu nun khatle Galilee taram om milu nun ding bu ke ongnu kaan bi badou chanu lumik ka hung rwe.
41006022	Herodias sa rangaaknuna khutluga laam rwe, atiga Herod khatle maan le ong bachamnu mi nun ding pi pem thang rwe, krwangna rangaaknu khou rinne, “Nangna bathainu ga akhou niyo, eina haga nalaang pi thangne.”
41006023	Maanna atiga le karen thang ngaake, “Pa-aam ngaak le nangna akhou ninu ga akrwang talei baang khat tangga eina nalaang pi thangne.”
41006024	Rangaaknu gana seluga banu khou rin rwe, “Ei pa-aam ni langbo?” Banuna rinne, “Baptize to thangnu John lu ga niyo!”
41006025	Haba kahan bi rangaaknu gana krwang khou barapka hungluga ni rwe, “Nangna butheng bi baptize to thangnu John lu thangluga alaang heiba kahan bi pinu ei bathaiye.”
41006026	Habei ga krwang basung riangre tak ngaak rwe; atiyeda bachongren khatle maan le ong bachamnu mi nun lang chungna krwangna bating za maknu bathai lan rwe.
41006027	Haba kahan bi ga krwangna mi athatnu mi ding lang thangluga John lu lou hung lang zathang pi rwe. Atiga maan qwan in la seluga John ring tan rwe,
41006028	balu ga butheng bi thangluga pon hung rwe khatle rangaaknu khou hung pi rwe; atiga rangaaknu gana haga banu khou pi rwe.
41006029	John om potroi rwanna haga theinu kaan bi banina bapum ga hung louluga thaan bi ri thang rwe.
41006030	Chonglang rwan Jisu kim bi hung kadoiluga banina to damnu khatle bachu thang damnu bing ga Bakhou hung pu rwe.
41006031	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Hungro ani mi chiknu riak la seluga bakaan kasem basakrizo.” Balangbe se swak sekhutnu mi tamlaiga bani sa in lang hakna bakaan maak ngaake.
41006032	Atiga bani nun li hwanluga mi chuk chik maknu riak la bani raantoza thou dam ngaake.
41006033	Atiyeda bani thou damnu ga mi khangna mu ngaake khatle banina Jisu ding bapu thei briakpina namlian bing lana bani nung ketna suizon hung rwe. Mi khang gana bani meithaan hung tang kamaluga Jisu kim bi hung kadoi rwe.
41006034	Jisu li bina swaknu kaan bi mi khang pui ding mu rwe khatle bani sian thang lang maaknu zao nun dan briakpina bani ding phaangluga kriang rwe. Habei ga Maanna bani ding balang tamga bachu thang thou ngaake.
41006035	Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Heiya mi chiknu riak chung nge khatle bakaan le rei rwe.
41006036	Amqwat ongnu taram le nam nam la banina seluga uilu kalei lang bani ding pi sedro; balangbe bani sa lang khatchale maak rwe.”
41006037	Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou katake, “Nanina bani lang sa lang kasem pi thangbiyo.” Banina Bakhou rinne, “Anina seluga denari raza ni om uilu kaleiluga bani lang sa lang pi thangbiyo dinubo?”
41006038	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani khou uilu inza ambo? Seluga phaang ngo.” Banina phaang seluga rin rwe, “Uilu impaang le ngaa kani amme.”
41006039	Habei ga Jisu na bani nun ding ga ba annu lousam daam chung bi badoi badoi toga pi badung ta lang bani khou zathang pi rwe.
41006040	Atiga bani nun mi raza raza, somnga somnga om baren baren toga pi badung ta rwe.
41006041	Maanna uilu impaang le ngaa kani ga lou luga tambaan la batoukaluga rithoi thang rwe khatle uilu ga thiak bak luga bani khou kasem thang lang Baom potroi rwan khou pi rwe; Maanna ngaa kani ga le bani khangsung lang kasem thang rwe.
41006042	Bani khangsung saluga imba rwe.
41006043	Habei ga banina uilu katup le ngaa katup ka luklei somga kani sipka khom thou ngaake.
41006044	Uilu hungsa ngaaknu mi sing ga kapaisa mi raching impaang khak ngaake.
41006045	Maanna mi khang ding bathan sat ongnu kahan bi Baom potroi rwan ding li bi pi khutluga Bameithaan se dam lang tuipui raan khat la amnu Bethsaida taram la pi takan swak ngaake.
41006046	Maanna bani ding bathan sat thangnu nung rammwan la kalum lang se rwe.
41006047	Khwazinren tanu dat pi li ga tuipui zai la am ngaake; atiyeda Maan tui paan la Baraantoza am ngaake.
41006048	Bani nun riangre takka li hwan ongnu ga Jisu na mu rwe, balangbe thiraangna bani maitwang bi raang hung ngaake. Atiga balinu rangkaan dat pi Jisu na potroi rwan kim bi tuipui chung bi ketna se hung rwe khatle Maan bani ding sekhan lang to ngaake.
41006049	Maan tuipui chung bi ketna se hungnanu banina muluga haga to bathaanu ri ngaakchung rwe diga baningga pao rwe;
41006050	balangbe bani khangsungna Bating muluga bani kachi tak ngaak rwe. Haba kahan bi Jisu na bani le chong kabiaga bani khou rinne, “Sung raang ngo! Ei zung nge; kachi mako.”
41006051	Habei ga Maan bani kim bi li bi ka rwe khatle thiraang ga raang lan drwe. Habei ga bani taswang khak loh lo rwe.
41006052	Balangbe bani sung nat briakpina banina uilu impaang om lang bi khatchale bakaba thei mak ngaake.
41006053	Banina tuipui ga takan swakluga Gennesaret taram la hungluga li ga tui paan bi bang thang rwe.
41006054	Bani nun li bina tanu kaan bi mi nunna haba kahan bi Jisu ding bapu thei rwe,
41006055	habei ga mi nunna amqwatnu taram bing bi pakkoi seluga kasa kanaa bing ding bani ria bi thangluga Jisu ongme dinu theinu riak pi pon hung thou rwe.
41006056	Nam bing bi, namlian bing bi mak tabe inmwan bing bi Jisu na khut thangnu riak om keithian bi banina naanu bing ding hung thang ngaake khatle banina Bapwan hum za beida banaan su lang Bakhou hweini ngaake. Atiga Bating banaan sunu bing ding pi sa thang rwe.
41007001	Atiga Jerusalem lana hungnu Pharisee rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwan mi kasem Jisu kim bi hung ong kadoi ngaake.
41007002	Baom potroi rwan kasemna tanaat ka, dinuba kut kasin makka uilu sanu banina munu kaan bi banina koi ga dou rwe.
41007003	Balangbe Pharisee rwan le Jihudi rwan bingna bani patso rwan chaang nung suiga banina cheksinga kut kasin makka sa make.
41007004	Banina keithian lana hungnu kaan bi bani kasin bathiang make dabe sa in make. Katei banina to ongnu chaang bing lak pi ngai, ben, thinzin ben khatle ria kasin bathiangnu hei bing nge.
41007005	Habei ga Pharisee rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Bakhou ngai ngaake, “Pa-aam toga Naom potroi rwanna patso rwan chaang bazei makka kut kasin makka uilu sa ongnubo?”
41007006	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Isaiah na sathot tonu nani lang bi rin basaam thang nge, ‘Heiba mi nunna bani mun zana Ating takhwang towe, Atiyeda bani sung ba Akhouna namlaaga amme.
41007007	Mi nun om zathang ding zekrin danga bachu thangga, Banina Ating baha bi kalumme.’
41007008	Balangbe nanina Rikrwang om zathang ding bathan satluga, mi nun om chaang ding choitipe. Hagazo ben le ngai kasinne khatle hadannu katei tamgale nanina kasinne.”
41007009	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina nani om chaang ding ngaak langna Rikrwang om zathang ding pen sate.
41007010	Balangbe Moses na rinne, ‘Nanu napa ding takung tazeiyo’ khatle ‘Tudannu banu bapa ding rin basiatnu bating ga to that ting gaye.’
41007011	Atiyeda nanina rinne, ‘Mi khatna banu mak tabe bapa khou, “Nang akhouna phang dingnu dam ga Corban ne” dinuba Rikrwang khou rikhaang pot toga khaang drwe diga rinne dabe,
41007012	bani banu bapa ding khatchale to thang lat lang maak rwe diga rinluga
41007013	nani om seta ongnu chaang om langna Rikrwang chong ding bathaang maaknu pi to rwe. Atiga hadannu chwan tamga nanina towe.”
41007014	Maanna mi khang ding Bakim bi kou hungluga bani khou rinne, “Eina rin ongnuwa nani khangsung ngaiyo khatle bakaba theiyo:
41007015	Mi khat khou langkaang bina khutluga bating to tanaatnu ngamnu pot khatchale maake; atiyeda bakhouna swaknu bing gana mi khat ting to tanaatnuwe.
41007016	Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo!”
41007017	Jisu na mi khang ding thangsialuga in khat pi khutnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna haba chongchak om lang bi Bakhou ngai rwe.
41007018	Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani le haba kaba ga thei makpo? Langkaanglana mi khat khou khut tamnu gana bating to tanaatnu make dinu nani thei makpo,
41007019	balangbe sakhut tamnu gana balungning bi ta thang make atiyeda bon bi ta thangluga langkaang la swak lat tamme atibriakpina thaisaak bing bathiang nge.”
41007020	Jisu na rinne, “Misa khat sung lana swaknu gana mi pakhat ting to tanaatnuwe.
41007021	Balangbe basung lana, dinuba misa sung lana sa maknu lungning, rwan mei rwan basan laannu, lungmaannu, mi athatnu,
41007022	barusanu, ra-aamnu, sa maknu, rou sianu, imbet boulaanu, sa maknu mik, rin basiatnu, lian tonu khatle kapangnu swake.
41007023	Kasianu hei bing nga sung lana swakluga mi khat ting to tanaatnuwe.”
41007024	Jisu na habei gana swakluga Tyre le Sidon taram la thou drwe. Atiga Maan in khat pi khut rwe, Maan habei ong nge dinu mi khatcha khou hakna pi thei nwam mak ngaake atiyeda Maan inkamnu ngamlan rwe.
41007025	Balangbe basa kamaisa swan khou bathiang maknu katha khutnu mannu gana Jisu lang bi ngaisuluga hung rwe khatle Baket pi hung in bakhupta rwe.
41007026	Haba mannu ga banu pok pina Syro-Phoenicia om Greek rwan mannuwe, maanna ri kasia ding ga basa kamaisa khouna kazun sat thang lang Jisu khou hweini lat latka ong ngaake.
41007027	Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Naosen rwan ga sa imba kama dingriyo, balangbe naosen rwan om uilu ga louluga ui swan nun lang bazwan thangnu sa make.”
41007028	Mannu gana Jisu khou katake, “Bazeye, Pukraangba, atiyeda naosen rwan om sa kadaak tanu ga table thwei bi ui swan nunna le kachungsa dabo.”
41007029	Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Sero, nangna heiba chong nga rin briakpina ri kasia ga nasa kamaisa khouna swak trwe.”
41007030	Maanna bain la hungnu kaan bi ri kasia ga basa kamaisa khouna swak tamnu khatle basa kamaisa ga ria bi in ongnu hung dou rwe.
41007031	Jisu na Tyre le Sidon taram bina se swak latluga Decapolis taram zai Galilee tuipui paan la hung rwe.
41007032	Habei ga kana setnu le chong thei chui maknu pakhat ting Bakhou kalwang hungluga balu chung bi Bakut banaan thang lang mi nunna Bakhou hweini ngaake.
41007033	Jisu na haba manpa ding mi khang lak pina kalwang swakluga bakanaa kani bi bakutzung sun thang rwe khatle Maanna bachin thangluga babalei bi banaan thang rwe.
41007034	Maanna tambaan la phaangkaluga kaphuk kasei kaiga bakhou rinne, “Ephphatha,” bakabana “Lat swakro” dinuwe.
41007035	Haba kahan bi bakanaa lat swak rwe, lwam ongnu babalei ga le lat swak rwe khatle Maan chong bathiangga kabia rwe.
41007036	Maanna bani khou pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako diga zathang pi thang rwe; atiyeda Maanna bani khou zathang pi thang beida banina haga inkuga rin indao thou dam ngaake.
41007037	Banina rin lang thei makka loh lo ga rinne, “Maanna pum brumza to chuiga to rwe. Kana setnu ding pi sa thang rwe khatle chong thei maknu ding le chong pi kabia thang rwe.”
41008001	Haba kaan bi mi khang ga tam tak ngaake khatle sa in lang khatchale maak briakpina Jisu na Baom potroi rwan ding Bakim bi kou hungluga bani khou rinne,
41008002	“Ei heiba mi khang ding nga kriang nge, balangbe bani Ei le ong bachamnu ni thum rwe khatle bani sa lang khatchale maak rwe.
41008003	Eina bani ding bani in la bon chaamga bathan thang nge dabe bani lampui bi tathiat ponnu le zaye; balangbe bani mi kasemba namlaa lamangna hungnuwe.”
41008004	Habei ga Jisu om potroi rwanna Bakhou katake, “Heipai ramhaang biya mi nun ding tatoga uilu pi sa imbanu ngam ding gabo?”
41008005	Jisu na bani khou ngaiye, “Nani khou uilu inza ambo?” Banina “Siari amme” diga katak rwe.
41008006	Maanna mi khang ding ga talei bi ongta lang zathang pi rwe. Maanna uilu siari ga lou luga swanka thang rwe khatle haga thiak bakluga bani khou kasem thang lang Baom potroi rwan khou pi rwe; atiga banina haga mi khang khou kasem thang rwe.
41008007	Bani khou ngaa swan kasem le am ngaake; Maanna ha ga le rithoi thangluga bani khou kasem thang lang rin rwe.
41008008	Atiga bani saluga imba rwe khatle balei thangnu bakatup ka luklei pui siari khom thou ngaake.
41008009	Uilu sa damnu mi sing ga raching bali khak ngaake. Atiga Maanna bani ding bathan thang rwe.
41008010	Haba kahan bi Maan Baom potroi rwan le diga li hwanluga Dalmanutha taram la hung rwe.
41008011	Pharisee rwanna swakluga Bakhou chong kae thou rwe khatle Bating tamga tambaan lana badannu khat bani khou pi mu thang lang Bakhou rin ngaake.
41008012	Atiyeda Maan sung katopka Bakatha kaphuk kasei kaiga rinne, “Heiba mikinna pa-aam lang badannu ding rakanga zongnubo? Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, heiba mikin khou badannu khatchale pi thangla rwe.”
41008013	Maanna bani ding thangsialuga li hwanluga tui raan khat la takan swak tam ngaake.
41008014	Potroi rwanna uilu phun banim ngaake atiga li sung bi banina phun ongnu uilu khat makka katei bani khou maak ngaak rwe.
41008015	Jisu na bani khou chongtan piga rinne, “Nani Pharisee rwan le Herod om khai bina barak theiyo khatle cheksinno.”
41008016	Atiga banina bani cham lak pi kathuiga rinne, “Heiya ani khou uilu maak briakpina Maanna rinnuwe.”
41008017	Atiyeda Jisu na ha ding theiluga bani khou rinne, “Nanina uilu maak briakpina rwe diga pa-aam lang kakhan ongnubo? Nani atun tangga mu mak aangbo mak tabe thei mak aangbo? Nani sung atun tangga nat ong maangbo?
41008018	Mik phun beida nani mu makpo? Kana phun beida nani ngaisu makpo? Nani baningsu makpo?
41008019	Eina kapaisa mi raching impaang lang uilu impaang thiak baknu kaan bi balei thangnu bakatup ka luklei sipnu inza nanina khom thoubo?” Banina, “Somga kaniye” diga Bakhou rin rwe.
41008020	“Eina mi raching bali lang uilu siari thiak baknu kaan bi balei thangnu bakatup ka luklei pui sipnu inza nanina khom thoubo?” Banina, “Siariye” diga rin rwe.
41008021	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Tatoga nanina bakaba thei maknubo?”
41008022	Haba nung Jisu Bethsaida la hung rwe khatle banina mik chonu pakhat ting Bakhou phun hungluga bating banaan thang lang Jisu khou hweini ngaake.
41008023	Maanna mik chonu ding ga kut kailuga inmwan paan la kalwang swak rwe. Atiga Maanna bamik pi bachin thangluga bakhou Bakut banaan thangluga paaam phaangmubo diga ngai rwe.
41008024	Maanna batou thouluga rinne, “Eina mi nun ding thingkung danga se ongnu ding muwe.”
41008025	Jisu na bamik pi Bakut banaan thang latluga bating pi batou thou rwe. Atiga maan sa latluga pum brum ding mu bathiang rwe.
41008026	Jisu na bating bain la bathan thangluga rinne, “Nang inmwan sung bi khutlanro khatle inmwan bi pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako.”
41008027	Jisu na Baom potroi rwan le diga Caesarea Philippi bi amnu inmwan bing bi seluga Maanna lampui bi Baom potroi rwan khou ngai rwe, “Mi nunna Ating Tu we diga rinbo?”
41008028	Banina katake, “Mi kasemna baptize to thangnu John ne diye, atiyeda mi kasemna Elijah ye diye khatle mi katei rwanna thiamting rwan lak pi pakhate diga rinne.”
41008029	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atiyeda nanina Eiya Tu we dibo?” Peter na Bakhou katake, “Nang Christa gaye.”
41008030	Haba nung bi Jisu na bani khou Balang bi pakhatcha khou hakna banina rin swak mak lang rakanga chongtan pi thang rwe.
41008031	Jisu na bani khou Misa Sa Kapaisa ga riangrenu taswang khak khaanglu rwe, atiga patso rwan, takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna za maklune khatle Bating athatlune atiyeda ni thum nung ring thou latlune diga bachu thang thou rwe.
41008032	Heiba chong nga Maanna bathiangga rin rwe. Habei ga Peter na Bating kalwang swakluga Bating twei thou rwe.
41008033	Jisu na kanei swakluga potroi rwan ding phaangluga Maanna Peter ding twei ga rinne, “Seitaan, Anung la thou dammo! Balangbe nangna Rikrwang om lang bi kakhan make atiyeda mi nun om lang biye.”
41008034	Maanna mi nun khatle Baom potroi rwan ding le Bakhou kou hungnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Tudannu Anung sui nwamnu maan ga, baraanto bating za mak ting ngo khatle baom cross ka lou thouluga Anung sui ding ngo.
41008035	Balangbe tudannuna bakatha ding kan nwamnu maan ga baraanlune atiyeda Alaang chungna khatle sacham lang chungna bakatha braannu mi gana bakatha kanthangnu lousulune.
41008036	Balangbe mi khatna talei ram bing balaang lousuluga bakatha braanne dabe balaang pa-aam tongnu ambo?
41008037	Mak tabe mi khatna bakatha lang chungna paaam le takhenebo?
41008038	Balangbe rwan mei rwan basan laannu khatle noh tonu mikin biya Alaangna khatle Achongkaang langna kazaknu maan ga Misa Sa Kapaisana Bapa om lwat liannu bi bathiangnu tambaan chonglang rwan le diga hungnu kaan bi balang bi kazaklune.”
41009001	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga ngam lianga hungnu banina mu mak basaan thinu batemla dingnu mi kasem abeiya han ongme.”
41009002	Ni karuk nung bi Jisu na Peter, James khatle John ding kalwangluga basaangnu rammwan la ka ngaake; atiga Maan bani meithaan bi Baman gon swak rwe.
41009003	Bapwan ga kabun danga ngou takka baan swak rwe, talei ram bi pwan kasinnu pakhatchanale pwan ga hadanga pi ngounu ngam make.
41009004	Habei ga bani khou Elijah le Moses ting pi mu thang rwe, atiga barwei Jisu le diga chong kabia ong ngaake.
41009005	Haba nung bi Peter na Jisu khou rinne, “Rabbi, ani abeiya ongnu sa rwe, anina pwan in inthum: Nalaang khat, Moses lang khat atiluga Elijah lang khat bacharizo.”
41009006	Balangbe bani kachi lai briakpina Peter na pa-aam kabia dingbo dinu thei mak ngaake.
41009007	Habei ga tambu khat hungluga bani ding hwam lem rwe khatle tambu lak pina khwan khatna rinne, “Heiya Eina kriangnu Asa Kapaisa ye, Maanna rinnu zeiyo.”
41009008	Thei mak daakka banina phaang koi swaknu kaan bi Jisu bani le ong bachamnu makka mi katei pakhatcha ding le mulan rwe.
41009009	Banina rammwan lana tanu kaan bi Misa Sa Kapaisana thi bina ring thou lat mak basaan banina mu damnu ga pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako diga Maanna bani khou zathang pi thang ngaake.
41009010	Atiga thinu nun lak pina ring thou latnu om bakabazo pa-aambo diga heiba chong nga banina bani raantoza bani sung bi katip thang ngaake.
41009011	Banina Bakhou ngaiye, “Chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna tatoga Elijah hung kama lang nge diga rinnubo?”
41009012	Maanna bani khou katake, “Batak takka Elijah na hung kamaluga pot bing nga pi hanchin thanglune. Atiga paaam toga Misa Sa Kapaisa om lang bi Maanna riangre kanang inza khaanglune khatle Bating phaang batanga tolune diga tatoga hiak thangnubo?
41009013	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Elijah ba hung drwe khatle balang bi hiak thangnu ga danga banina to nwamnu bing ga bakhou to thang drwe.”
41009014	Maanna potroi rwan khou hungnu kaan bi mi khang puina bani ding ong qwat ongnu Maanna mu rwe khatle chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna bani le kae ong ngaake.
41009015	Haba kahan bi ga banina Bating munu kaan bi mi nun ga taswang khak loh lo ngaak rwe khatle Bakhou pak hungluga Bating karoga kadou thang rwe.
41009016	Habei ga Maanna chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khou ngai rwe, “Nani nun bani le diga paaam kakhan kale ongnubo?”
41009017	Mi khang lak pi pakhatna katake, “Bachuthangnupa, eina chong swak maknu ri kasia khutnu asa kapaisa ding Nakhou phun hung nge.
41009018	Bathiang maknu katha na bating namnu kaan bi banina bating talei bi pi balumtaye, maan bachinphon swake, bangaa le ei karit thouwe khatle bapum ga inrin thouwe. Atiga Eina Naom potroi rwan khou bathiang maknu katha ding ga kazun sat thang lang rin ngaake atiyeda banina ngam make.”
41009019	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “He balumsat maaknu mikin, Ei nani le diga inchan tangga ong bacham lang maangbo? Ei nani le diga inchan tangga khaang ong lang maangbo? Bating Akhou kalwang hung ngo.”
41009020	Haba nung bi banina kapaisa swan ding Bakhou phun hung rwe. Bathiang maknu katha gana Jisu ding munu kaan bi katha na haba kahan bi kapaisa swan ding nam katat rwe khatle bamun bina bachinphon swak ka maan talei bi in kalwei ngaake.
41009021	Jisu na bapa khou ngaiye, “Bakhou ati ongnuwa inchan bakhwa seirubo?” Maanna katake, “Naosen badona zung rwe.
41009022	Katha gana bating to braan langna bating mei bi khatle tui bi bazwan thang katupe. Atiyeda Nangna pa-aam ngaakle to thangnu ngamme dabe, ani lu chung bi kriang thang ngo khatle paang thang ngo.”
41009023	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna balumsanu ngamme dabe, balumsanu bakhou ga pot bingza hung tangnu ngamme.”
41009024	Haba kahan bi naosen om bapa gana mikthi taga chapka rinne, “Pukraangba, Ei balumsa rwe; aom balumsianu langna paang thang ngo!”
41009025	Mi nunna pak kadoi hungnu ga Jisu na munu kaan bi Maanna bathiang maknu katha ding ga tweiga rinne, “Kana setnu khatle chong thei maknu katha, Eina nakhou zathang pinuwe, bakhouna swak tro khatle nang bakhou hung lat lanro!”
41009026	Habei ga bathiang maknu katha gana paoga bating nam katat thang sialuga bakhouna swak trwe. Atiga maan thinu dan thou drwe khatle mi taswang khakna rinne, “Maan thi drwe!”
41009027	Atiyeda Jisu na bakut choiluga kai thou rwe khatle maan han thou rwe.
41009028	Maan insung la khutnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna inthimthwei toga Bakhou ngai rwe, “Anina pa-aam to briakpina ha ding ga bathou satnu ngam mak tamnubo?”
41009029	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Heipai katha kasia ding ga hweininu khatle kalumsannuna makka khatchale bathou satnu ngam make.”
41009030	Bani habei gana swakluga Galilee la serwan hung rwe khatle haga pakhatchanale theinu Maan lou nwam mak ngaake.
41009031	Balangbe Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou atiga bachu thang ngaake, “Misa Sa Kapaisa ding mi nun kut pi pi swaklu rwe khatle banina Bating athatlune. Atiga Bating athatnu nung Maan ni thum ni ring thou latlune.”
41009032	Atiyeda heiba rin ongnu chong nga banina bakaba thei mak ngaake khatle Bakhou ngai lang kachi ngaake.
41009033	Haba nung Maan Capernaum bi hung rwe. Atiga Maan insung bi ongnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou ngai rwe, “Nani lampui bi nani cham kae ongnu ga pa-aam dingbo?”
41009034	Atiyeda bani thiap thiap ong ngaake, balangbe bani nun lampui bi tuna lian kataknu tolu dingbo diga kae kale ngaake.
41009035	Jisu na ongtaluga potroi pat somga kani ding kouluga bani khou rin rwe, “Tudannu kamanu to nwamnu maan ga, kakham kataknu khatle khangsung om swak to ding gaye.”
41009036	Haba nung bi Maanna kasinnu naosen khat ting kou hungluga bani lak pi bating pi badung thang rwe. Atiga Maanna bating Bapam bi pon thouluga Maanna bani khou rinne,
41009037	“Tudannuna Ameng bi heipai kasinnu naosen khat ting lou thangnu maan ga Ating lou thangnuwe khatle Ating lou thangnu mi gana Ating lou thangnu make atiyeda Ating lang hungnu Bating lou thangnuwe.”
41009038	John na bakhou katake, “Bachuthangnupa, ani nung sui se maknu mi pakhatna Nameng bi ri kasia ding bathou satnu anina mu rwe, maan ani nung sui mak briakpina anina bating khaam ngaake.”
41009039	Atiyeda Jisu na rinne, “Bating khaam mako, balangbe pakhatchana hakna Ameng bina tasiatnu chwan toluga barapka Alang bi sa maknu kabia ngam make.
41009040	Balangbe tudannu nani ding maitwang maknu maan ga ani pek la mi zung nge.
41009041	“Balangbe tudannu pakhatna Ameng bina nani Christa omme diga in lang tuidai ngai khatcha beida pi thang nge dabe, Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, maan impha ni beida baom taswan ga braanlaye.
41009042	“Atiyeda tudannuna Ating balumsanu heipai kasinnu pakhat ting ket pi basuinu bating ga baring bi saang tak lung khit thangluga tuipui bi sat thang damnu gana balaang sa inku dingnuwe.
41009043	Nakutna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga tanchat sat tammo. Kut kani amga khatchale mit lat maknu meikhun bi senu ma, kut thokka ringnu kum lousunu gana nalaang sa inkuwe.
41009044	Habei ga ‘Bani om kalung thi make khatle mei ga le mit make.’
41009045	“Naketna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga tanchat sat tammo. Ket kani amga khatchale mit lat maknu meikhun bi khutnu ma, ket thokka ringnu kum lousunu gana nalaang sa inkuwe.
41009046	Habei ga ‘Bani om kalung thi make, Khatle mei ga le mit make.’
41009047	Namikna nating noh pi towe dabe, haga ran sat tammo. Mik kani amga chok ongnu meikhun bi khutnu ma, mik khatcha phunluga Rikrwang om krwang talei khutnu gana nalaang sa inkuwe.
41009048	Habei ga ‘Bani om kalung thi make, Khatle mei ga le mit make.’
41009049	Balangbe mi bing ding le meina to bathianglune khatle rikhaang pot ting bachina to bathianglune.
41009050	“Bachi ya kasanu pote atiyeda bachi gana bathum ga braan damme dabe haga tatoga nanina pi thum lat langbo? Nani lak pi bachi pi ammo, khat le khat dai bazaangga ong ngo.”
41010001	Maan habei gana swakluga Jordan raan la amnu Judea taram la hung rwe. Mi nunna Bakim bi hung kadoi lat rwe khatle Maanna bachaang toga bani ding bachu thang lat rwe.
41010002	Pharisee rwanna hungluga Bating tamga Bakhou ngaiye, “Mi khatna bamei kanoinuwa zabo?”
41010003	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Moses na nani khou pa-aam zathang pi thangbo?”
41010004	Banina rinne, “Mi khatna mei kanoi chonghiak hiakluga bating kanoi lang Moses na za thang ngaake.”
41010005	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani sung nat briakpina Moses na haba chongtan ga hiak thangnuwe.
41010006	Atiyeda talei ram dam thou tan bina Rikrwang na ‘kapaisa le kamaisa ding dam thang ngaake.’
41010007	‘Atibriakpina kapaisana banu bapa ding bathan thangsialuga bamei le diga karung ding gaye.
41010008	‘Atiga barwei pat ni ga pum khatcha to lang nge’; atiga barwei ga pat ni latlan rwe atiyeda pum khatcha to rwe.
41010009	Atibriakpina Rikrwang na kai karung thang damnu ga mi khatchanale to kapaang lat mak ting ngo.”
41010010	Insung bi Baom potroi rwanna haba om chong lang bi Bakhou ngai lat rwe.
41010011	Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Tudannu pakhatna bamei ding kanoi satluga pakhat ting katha latnu maan ga balu chung bi lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe.
41010012	Atiga kamaisa khatna babasan ding kanoi satluga kapaisa pakhat khou kalaak late dabe, maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe.”
41010013	Mi nunna kasinnu naosen rwan ding Jisu na bani ding banaan thang dam lang Bakhou kalwang hung rwe; atiyeda bani ding kalwang hungnu mi nun ding potroi rwanna twei ngaake.
41010014	Jisu na haga muluga Maan pem mak takka bani khou rinne, “Kasinnu naosen rwan ga Akhou hung ding ngo bani ding khaam mako; balangbe Rikrwang om krwang talei ga hei rwan dannu nun lang nge.
41010015	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu heipai naosen khat tanga Rikrwang om krwang talei ding lou thang maknu maan ga impha ni beida habei ga khutlaye.”
41010016	Maanna bani ding Bapam bi pon thou rwe khatle bani lu chung bi Bakut kaising thangluga bani ding rithoi pi thang rwe.
41010017	Jisu na lampui bi se hungnu kaan bi mi khatna pak hungluga Bameithaan bi kekhok detaluga Bakhou ngaiye, “Kasanu Bachuthangnupa, ei ringzoknu kum lousu lang pa-aam to langbo?”
41010018	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna pa-aam lang Ating kasanu diga kounubo? Pakhat tak pakhatcha amnu Rikrwang ga makka kasanu pakhatchale maake.
41010019	Nangna zathang bing ga theiye, ‘Lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to mako,’ ‘Mi athat mako,’ ‘Baru sa mako,’ ‘Kakoinu sake pi mako,’ ‘Rwan ding minam mako,’ ‘Nanu napa ding takung tazeiyo.’ ”
41010020	Manpa gana bakhou katake, “Bachuthangnupa, hei bing nga ei naosen badona zei hung rwe.”
41010021	Haba nung bi Jisu na bating phaangluga kriang rwe khatle bakhou rinne, “Nang khatpa baatmaang nge: Sero, naom ka am bing zwan satluga lungsianu nun lang piyo atiye dabe tambaan la nalaang lan amlune khatle hung ngo, cross ka pon thouluga Anung suiyo.”
41010022	Atiyeda maan heiba chong bi riangre rwe khatle sung riangrega thou drwe, balangbe maan lan tam takka am ngaake.
41010023	Jisu na phaang koiluga Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Lungsanu nunna Rikrwang om krwang talei khut lang intia kungnubo!”
41010024	Bachong bi potroi rwan ga loh lo rwe. Atiyeda Jisu na katak latka bani khou rinne, “Naosen rwan ga, lan bi sung thangnu mi nunna Rikrwang om krwang talei khut lang intia kungnubo!
41010025	Lungsanu mi khatna Rikrwang om krwang talei khutnu ma ut khatna kaphin kana bi lon brwannuna bai inkuwe.”
41010026	Habei ga bani cham taswang khak lang loh lo ga rin ngaake, “Ati dabe tuna kanthangnu lousu ngam dingbo?”
41010027	Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou phaangluga rinne, “Misa lang heiya hung tanglanuwe atiyeda Rikrwang khou hung tanglanu maake; balangbe Rikrwang khou pum brumza hung tangnuwe.”
41010028	Habei ga Peter na Bakhou kabia thou rwe, “Phaang thang ngo, anina pum brumza bathan satluga Nanung sui se ongme.”
41010029	Jisu na katake, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu pakhatna Alaang chungna mak tabe sacham lang chungna bain balou mak tabe bau banao rwan banu bapa bamei basa rwan mak tabe bataram bathan sate dabe,
41010030	atun ring ongnu kum biya rainu le bachamga bani in lou, unao rwan, batang bau rwan, banu rwan, basa rwan khatle in lou badam raza inkuga lousulune atiga hung dingnu bakaan bi le khwa sei ringnu lousulune.
41010031	Atiyeda kamanu inzana kakhamnu tolune khatle kakhamnuna kamanu tolune.”
41010032	Atiga bani Jerusalem la se lang lampui bi se ong ngaake khatle Jisu na bani meithaan se kama ong ngaake; hei lang bi bani loh lo ngaake. Atiga Banung suinu nun gana kachi ngaake. Habei ga Jisu na potroi pat somga kani ding bani bapek khat la kalwang swak latluga Bakhou pa-aam swak tingbo dinu lang bi bani khou rin thang thou rwe:
41010033	“Phaang ngo, ani Jerusalem la se ongme atiga Misa Sa Kapaisa ding takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khou pi swaklune; banina Bating koi impu thangluga athat satlune khatle Bating Gentile rwan khou bachoi thanglune;
41010034	banina Bating kiamlune, Bating bweilune, Bakhou bachin thanglune khatle Bating athatlune. Atiga Maan ni thum ni ring thou latlune.”
41010035	Haba nung bi Zebedee sa kapaisa James le John na Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, anina ninu bing Nangna ani lang to thangnu bathaiye.”
41010036	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina nani lang pa-aam to thangnu bathaigabo?”
41010037	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Nalwat liannu bi arwei pat ni ding pakhat ting Nakut inchang pek la, pakhat ting Nakut imbei pek la ong lang za thang ngo.”
41010038	Jisu na barwei khou rinne, “Narweina ni ongnu ga pa-aambo dinu narwei thei make. Eina in dingnu ngai ga narweina innu ngambo khatle Ating baptize to thangnu bi ga Ating batize to ongnu danga narwei ding baptize tonu ngam dingbo?”
41010039	Barweina Bakhou rinne, “Arwei ngam khope.” Jisu na barwei khou rinne, “Batak takka Eina innu ngai ga narweina inlune khatle Ating baptize to thangnu bi ga Ating baptize tonu danga narwei ding baptize tolune;
41010040	atiyeda Akut inchang pek la khatle imbei pek la ong dingnu ga Eina pi dingnu make atiyeda haga pi lang daan thang ongnu bani lang nge.”
41010041	Potroi pat som gana haga ngaisunu kaan bi banina James le John ding pem mak tak rwe.
41010042	Atiyeda Jisu na bani ding Bakhou kou hungluga rinne, “Gentile rwan om bapuba rwanna bani lu chung bi nam danga bapuba to rwe khatle bani om kaliannu nun gana bani lu chung bi ngam chwan ga namga towe dinu nanina theiye.
41010043	Nani lak pi ba haga ati mak ting ngo; atiyeda nani lak pi tudannu kaliannu to nwamnu maan gana nani om swak to ding ngo.
41010044	Nani lak pi tudannu kamanu to nwamnu maan ga khangsung om swak to ding ngo.
41010045	Balangbe Misa Sa Kapaisa gana tangga Bating chwanlaang pi to thang langna hungnu make atiyeda chwanlaang to thang langna khatle mi taswang khak ting ran swak thang lang Bakum ding bathan swak thangnu man toga pi swak thang langna hungnuwe.”
41010046	Atiga bani Jericho bi hung rwe. Haba nung Maan Baom potroi rwan le mi khang pui khat le diga Jericho bina se swaknu kaan bi Timaeus sa kapaisa Bartimaeus mik chonu pa lampui paan bi ni saga badung ong ngaake.
41010047	Hungnanu ga Nazareth Jisu we dinu maanna ngaisunu kaan bi maanna pao thouga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa Jisu ating phaangkriang thang ngo!”
41010048	Habei ga mi taswang khakna bating thiap thiap ong lang twei rwe; atiyeda maanna pao rakan ranga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa ating phaangkriang thang ngo!”
41010049	Habei ga Jisu na han basakluga mik chonu pa ding ga kou lang zathang pi rwe. Banina mik chonupa ding ga kouluga bakhou rinne, “Sung raang ngo. Thouro, Maanna nating kou ongme.”
41010050	Atiga maanna bapwan kazit sat thangsia rwe khatle thouluga Jisu khou hung rwe.
41010051	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina nalaang pa-aam to thangnu bathai gabo?” Mik chonupa gana Bakhou rinne, “Rabboni, ei mik munu lou nwamme.”
41010052	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Sero; nabalumsat paan bina nating pi sa thang rwe.” Haba kahan bi ga maan mik mu lat rwe khatle lampui bi Jisu nung sui hung rwe.
41011001	Banina Jerusalem nai hungnu kaan bi Olive Rammwan kim bi amnu Bethphage le Bethany la hung rwe. Atiga Maanna Baom potroi rwan pat ni ding lang thangga
41011002	barwei khou rinne, “Narwei meithaan la amnu nam bi ga seyo khatle narweina habei khut khap tinu kaan bi mi pakhatchana hakna twang mak aangnu lola swan khat bang thang ongnu doulune. Haga sutluga lou hung ngo.
41011003	Tudannuna, ‘Heiya narwei paaam lang sutnubo?’ diga rinne dabe, ‘Heiya Pukraangba lang bathaang amme,’ diga rinno khatle maanna haga abeiya barapka bathan hung lat tam zung nge.”
41011004	Barweina seluga lola swan ga inkhaanmun kim bi lampui paan bi bang thang ngaaknu kadou rwe khatle barweina haga sut rwe.
41011005	Habei ga han ongnu mi kasemna barwei khou rinne, “Narweina pa-aam lang lola swan ding ga sutnubo?”
41011006	Habei ga Jisu na zathang pi thangnu danga barweina bani khou rin rwe. Atiga banina barwei ding pi se rwe.
41011007	Habei ga barweina lola swan ga Jisu khou lou hungluga banina haba chung bi bani pwan sap thang rwe khatle Maan haba chung bi twang rwe.
41011008	Mi taswang khakna lampui bi bani pwan phaa thang rwe khatle katei rwanna thingkung bina thing bom kasanu ramluga lampui bi phaa thang rwe.
41011009	Habei ga meithaan la khatle nung la senu mi nun gana pao rwe, “Hosanna! ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Maan ga aih saye!’
41011010	“Pukraangba meng bi hungnu ani pa David om krwang talei ga aih saye! Basaang kataknu bi Hosanna!”
41011011	Jisu na Jerusalem khatle kalum in sung bi khut rwe. Maanna pot bing ding phaang koi rwe khatle bakaan ga rei briakpina Maan potroi pat somga kani le diga Bethany la thou dam ngaake.
41011012	Inswan lampai bani Bethany bina se swaknu kaan bi Maan chaam ngaak rwe.
41011013	Namla lamangna banaa bom sanu tacham kung khat phaangmuluga habei ga Maan bakraa kasem phangnu le zaye diga Maan habei ga se hung ngaake. Maan habei ga hungnu kaan bi haga bana makka katei khatchale dou make, balangbe haga karaanu bapha mak ngaake.
41011014	Atibriakpina Jisu na thingkung ding ga rinne, “Nakhouna pakhatchanale bakraa sa lat mak tingro.” Haga Baom potroi rwanna ngaisu ngaake.
41011015	Habei ga bani Jerusalem la hung ngaake. Atiga Jisu na kalum in bi khutluga kalum in bi kaleinu le zwan ongnu mi bing ding kazun sat rwe khatle sian kachoi kainu nun om table khatle banphi zwannu nun om kaong riak bing tun kalat sat rwe.
41011016	Atiga kalum in bi pakhatchanale langgonnu pot phunkhutnu Maanna za mak ngaake.
41011017	Maanna bachu thangga bani khou rinne, “Heiya atiga hiak thangnu makpo? ‘Ain na chaat bing lang kalum in diga kou lang nge.’ Atiyeda haga nanina ‘Baruksaak mi nun in’ pi to rwe.”
41011018	Haga chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le takopuba rwanna ngaisuluga Bating tatoga athat za dingbo diga lampui zong thou rwe; atiyeda Baom bachu thangnu bi mi bingna loh lo ong briakpina banina Bating kachi ngaake.
41011019	Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Maan nampui bi gana se swak lat rwe.
41011020	Louthwan banina se hungnu kaan bi tacham kung ga bakamong tangga baowei ta damnu banina mu rwe.
41011021	Habei ga Peter na baningsuluga Bakhou rinne, “Rabbi, Phaang thang ngo, Nangna seng thangnu tacham kung ga baowei ta drwe.”
41011022	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Rikrwang khou balumsawo.
41011023	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu pakhatna heiba rammwan ding nga, ‘Abeina swakluga tuipui la ga naraanto bazwan thang dammo’ diga rinne dabe khatle basung bi balumsianu maake dabe khatle maanna rinnu ga to dam zung nge diga balumsaye dabe, maanna rinnu bing ga bakhou hung tanglune.
41011024	“Atibriakpina Eina nani khou rinnuwe, nanina kalumnu kaan bi pa-aam aam ngaakle nanina ninu bing ga nang phangsu rwe diga balumsawo khatle ha bing ga nang lousulune.
41011025	Nanina hanga kalumnu kaan bi tudannu pakhat maitwang bi tanut amme dabe, tambaan la ongnu nani pa na le nani koi maan ga kok thang lang bating kok thangbiyo.
41011026	Atiyeda nanina kok thang make dabe, tambaan la ongnu nani Pa na le nani koi maan ga kok thanglaye.”
41011027	Haba nung bi bani Jerusalem la hung lat rwe. Maan atiga kalum in bi se koinu kaan bi takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le patso rwan Bakhou hung ngaake.
41011028	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Nangna pa-aam ngamna hei bing nga to ongnubo? Khatle heiba chwan bing nga to lang Nakhou tuna ngam pi thangnubo?”
41011029	Habei ga Jisu na bani khou katake, “Eina le nani khou tangai khat ngaide, haga nani Akhou katako; ati dabe Eina impei ngam paan bina ha bing ga Eina tonubo dinu nani khou rin thangne:
41011030	John na baptize to thangnu ga tambaan lanamo mak tabe mi nun khounabo? Akhou katako.”
41011031	Bani cham kathuiluga rin rwe, “Anina haga ‘Tambaan la naye’ diga rinnu kaan bi Maanna rinlune, ‘Ati dabe nanina pa-aam toga bating balumsa maknubo?’
41011032	Atiyeda ‘Mi nun khou naye’ diga anina rinne dabe,” bani mi nun ding kachiye, balangbe mi bing zana John ding bataknu thiamting khate diga chak thang nge.
41011033	Atibriakpina banina Jisu khou rinne, “Ani thei make.” Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina paaam ngamna hei bing nga tonubo dinu Ei le nani khou rinlaye.”
41012001	Habei ga Maanna bani khou chongchak rin thou rwe, “Manpa khatna drakha anqwat khat qwat thangluga imbaang baang qwat rwe, batui sumnu riak le chou thang rwe khatle thaamkang le raa thang rwe. Maanna haga anqwat chwantok mi nun khou saan thangsialuga namlaanu talei khat la thou dam ngaake.
41012002	Bakraa lwaknu dat pi anqwat mi nun khouna baom drakha kraa kasem lou lang maanna baswak pakhat ting drakha anqwat la lang thang rwe.
41012003	Atiyeda banina bating namluga bwei rwe khatle bating kut barwang bathan sat rwe.
41012004	Haba nung bi maanna swak pakhat ting bathan lat rwe, banina lungna satluga balu bi to bazam rwe khatle to tangam thangluga bathan sat rwe.
41012005	Maanna swak katei khat ting bathan lat rwe, banina bating athat satrwe: khatle mi taswang khak ting bathan rwe, kasem ding bwei rwe khatle kasem ding athat sat rwe.
41012006	Atibriakpina bathan lat lang maanna kriangnu sa kapaisa pakhatcha am ngaake, kakham bi maanna ‘Asa kapaisa ding ngabe bani takhwang tolu zung nge’ diga baningga bating bani khou bathan rwe.
41012007	Atiyeda anqwat mi nun gana bani cham rinne, ‘Heiya barakhum lwak tingnu mi rwe. Hungro, ani bating athat satrizo atiye dabe barakhum ga ani lang zung rwe.’
41012008	Atiga banina bating namluga athat rwe khatle bating drakha anqwat paan la bazwan sat rwe.
41012009	Atibriakpina drakha anqwatpuba gana pa-aam tolu dingbo? Maanna hungluga chwantok mi nun ding ga to braan satlune khatle drakha anqwat ka mi katei khou pi thang damlune.
41012010	Heiba Bathiangnu Chongdip heiya nani pa makchungbo, ‘Intok mi nunna bazwan sat thangnu lung gana, Intaki om bakung tonu lung imbei rwe.
41012011	Heiya Pukraangba na to thangnuwe, Haga ani mikphaang bi tasiatnuwe.’ ”
41012012	Banina Jisu ding nam lang zong rwe atiyeda mi khang ding kachi ngaake, balangbe bani om maitwang bi Maanna chongchak ka rinnuwe dinu thei rwe. Atiga banina Bating thangsialuga thou dam ngaake.
41012013	Bachongkaang lang bina banina Bating nam lang Pharisee rwan le Herod om mi nun kasem ding Bakhou bathan hung ngaake.
41012014	Banina Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Nang bazenuwe, pakhatcha mai le phaang make khatle pakhatcha ding hakna kathing aih to make atiyeda bazenu bi Rikrwang lampui ga bachu thang nge dinu anina theiye. Caesar lang ramkhai pinu zamo za makpo?
41012015	Anina pi langmo mak tabe anina pi mak langbo?” Maanna bani om sathot tonu ga theiluga bani khou rinne, “Nanina Ating pa-aam lang tam ongnubo? Akhou denari khat lou hung ngo, Ei haga phaangde.”
41012016	Banina haga lou hung rwe. Atiga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Heiya tu maangbo khatle pa-aam hiak thangbo?” Banina Bakhou rinne, “Caesar omme.”
41012017	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Caesar om pot ka Caesar khou piyo khatle Rikrwang om pot ka Rikrwang khou piyo.” Bani Maanna rinnu bi ga loh lo ngaake.
41012018	Ring thou latnu maake diga rinnu Sadducee rwanna Bakim bi hungluga banina Bakhou ngaiye,
41012019	“Bachuthangnupa, Moses na ani lang atiga hiak thang nge, ‘Manpa khat om batang thi damme dabe, bamei ding thangsiaye dabe khatle basa thangsia make dabe, banao gana batang mei ding ga louluga batang lang sa nao cha lang nge.’
41012020	Atiga unao pat siari am ngaake. Patsonu ga mei kou rwe; atiyeda maan sa nao cha mak ka thi drwe.
41012021	Kaninu banao gana batang mei ding lou rwe atiyeda maan sa nao cha makka thi drwe. Inthumnu ga le hadan rwe.
41012022	Atiga unao pat siari gana bating lou ngaake atiyeda bani sa nao khatchale cha make. Kham katak pi kamaisa ga le thi drwe.
41012023	Atibriakpina ring thou latnu kaan bi bani khangsungna ring thou latnu kaan bi ha mannu ga tu mei to dingbo? Balangbe bani pat siarina bating bamei toga lou ngaake.”
41012024	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Nanina Bathiangnu Chongdip khatle Rikrwang ngam ding thei mak briakpina nani koinu makpo?
41012025	Balangbe banina thiluga ring thou latnu kaan bi bani tazwan bahwanlaye khatle tazwan bahwan lang le pi swaklaye atiyeda tambaan la tambaan chonglang rwan danlune.
41012026	Atiyeda thinu nunna ring thou late dinu lang bi nani Moses om chongdip pi pa makchungbo? Lou lak pi mei chok ongnu lang bi hiak thangnu riak pi Rikrwang na bakhou atiga rinne, ‘Ei Abraham Rikrwang, Isaac Rikrwang khatle Jacob Rikrwang nge.’
41012027	Maan thinu nun om Rikrwang make atiyeda ringnu nun om Rikrwang nge. Atibriakpina nani taswang khak koi rwe.”
41012028	Chongtan bachuthangnupa pakhat hungluga banina kathui ongnu ga ngaisu rwe khatle Maanna bani khou chong katak chuiga katak rwe dinu theiluga Bakhou ngai rwe, “Zathang lak pi ingaana bakung to kataknubo?”
41012029	Jisu na bakhou katake, “Zathang om bakung to kataknu ga heiye, ‘He Israel, ngaiyo, Pukraangba ani Rikrwang, Pukraangba khatcha zung nge.
41012030	Nangna Pukraangba Narikrwang ding nasung bing, nakatha bing khatle nalungning bing khatle nanat bingna kriang ding gaye.’ Heiya bakung to kataknu zathang nge.
41012031	Kaninu zathang ga heiye, ‘Nangna nainnai lounai ding nazan bahak ting danga kriang ding gaye.’ Hei bing ma thuk inkunu zathang katei maake.”
41012032	Chongtan bachuthangnupa gana Bakhou rinne, “Bazeye Bachuthangnupa. Nangna bazenu ga rin thang rwe, balangbe Rikrwang khatcha amme, Maan makka katei maake.
41012033	Bating sung bingna, theinu bingna, nalungning bingna, nat bingna kriang ding gaye khatle bainnai lounai ding bazan bahak ting danga kriangnu heiyana roumut satnu potkat khatle rikhaang pot bing ma inkunuwe.”
41012034	Maanna ningtingga katak rwe dinu Jisu na muluga, Maanna bakhou rinne, “Nang Rikrwang om krwang talei bina namlaa lan rwe.” Haba nung Bakhou pakhatchanale sung raangga chong ngainu ngamlan rwe.
41012035	Jisu na kalum in bi bachu thang ongnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Tatoga chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Christa heiya David Sa Kapaisa ye diga rinnubo?
41012036	Balangbe Katha Bathiangnu paan bina David maan bahakna rinne, ‘Pukraangba na Apukraangba khou rinne, “Eina Nating munanu nun ding Naket kadim riak pi to mak basaan, Akut inchang pek la badung ong ngo.” ’
41012037	Atibriakpina David maan bahakna Jisu ding ‘Pukraangba’ diga kouwe dabe; Maan tatoga David Sa Kapaisa to dingbo?” Habei ga amnu mi khangna karoga Bachong ngai ngaake.
41012038	Haba nung bi Baom bachu thangnu bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Pon baswannu bathuluga se koinu ding bathainu, keithian lak pi mi nunna kadou chongkaang kabia thangnu ding lou nwamnu,
41012039	synagogue pi sa kataknu kaong riak pi khatle balou riak pi talunu kaong riak pi ong nwamnu,
41012040	tameinu rwan in kapumnu khatle mi nun ding pi mu langna kalum bakhwa seinu, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khouna cheksinno. Bani nun lu chung bi ta thang dingnu chongtok ka lian inkulune.”
41012041	Jisu na sian lan kat thangnu riak meithaan bi ongluga mi nunna tatoga sian rik riak pi sian thang tabo dinu phaang ngaake. Lungsanu mi nunna habei ga sian tamga thang rwe.
41012042	Habei ga lungsianu tameinu khat hungluga peisa khat le bachamnu sian pek swan kani sat thang rwe.
41012043	Jisu na Baom potroi rwan ding Bakhou kou hungluga bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, mi nunna pi swaknu ma lungsianu tameinu heiyana inkuga sian rik riak pi thang rwe;
41012044	balangbe banina bani om baleinu bi gana sat thangnuwe atiyeda maanna balungsiat sung bi baom ka amnu bing, maan sa ring dingnu bing ga thangta rwe.”
41013001	Jisu na kalum in bina se swaknu kaan bi Baom potroi pakhatna Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, phaang thang ngo, intia lang tasiatnu lung bing khatle intia lang liannu in bing abeiya amnubo!”
41013002	Jisu na bakhou katake, “Inpui bing nga nang mubo? To bakla dingnu lung khat chung bi lung khatchale am thang siala rwe.”
41013003	Maanna kalum in meithaan bi amnu Olive Rammwan bi ongnu kaan bi Peter, James, John khatle Andrew na Bakhou inthimthwei toga ngai rwe,
41013004	“Hei bing nga impei dat pi swak tingnubo? Atiga hei bing nga hung tang ding rwe dinu thei zanu pa-aam badan ambo? Ani khou rin thang ngo.”
41013005	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Pakhatchanale nani ding minam mak lang cheksinno.
41013006	Balangbe Ameng bi mi tamga hungluga rinlune, ‘Ei Maan ga rwe’ khatle banina mi inza ding minamlune.
41013007	Nanina kraan khatle kraan cham ngaisunu kaan bi nani sung katop mako; balangbe ha bing ga swak tingnu zung rwe atiyeda kakhamnu ga mak aang nge.
41013008	Balangbe chaat khatna chaat khat luchung bi khatle krwang talei khatna krwang talei khat maitwang bi katwak thoulune. Atiga bariak inza bi talei kalingnu, bu taangnu khatle riangre kanang amlune. Hei bing nga nao lung lang nainu kaan bi riangrenu om hou thounu rwe.
41013009	“Nani barak theiyo, balangbe banina nani ding thampei in bi pi thanglune khatle synagogue pi bweilune. Alaang chungna bapuba rwan khatle krwang nun meithaan bi sake to lang nani ding phun hung lune.
41013010	Atiga sacham ma chaat bing khou kamaga kasamlune.
41013011	Atiyeda banina nani ding namluga nani ding pi swaknu kaan bi pa-aam kabia dingbo diga sung tam kama mako. Atiyeda haba chakrin bi nani khou pi thangnu ga kabiawo; balangbe kabia dingnu ga nani make atiyeda Katha Bathiangnu zung nge.
41013012	Banaona batang ding khatle bapana basa ding thi lang pi swaklune; sa nao rwanna nu pa rwan maitwang bi katwak thoulune khatle bani ding pi to thatlune.
41013013	Atiga Ameng lang chungna mi bingna nani ding batanlune. Atiyeda kakhamnu tangga khaangnu bating ga kan thanglune.
41013014	“Thiamting Daniel na rin thangnu ‘To braan to mutnu om batannu tonu,’ maanna han mak tingnu riak pi hannu ding nanina munu kaan bi” (panu mi gana bakaba thei ding ngo), “Judea bi ongnu nunna rammwan la pak thou dam ding ngo.
41013015	In chung bi ongnu maan gana in bi ta mak ting ngo mak tabe bain insung bi pot lou swak lang khut mak ting ngo.
41013016	Lou la ongnu maan gana bapwan lou lang han lat mak ting ngo.
41013017	Atiyeda haba kaan bi pum rit ongnu khatle naosen kainu kamaisa rwan ga aih sianuweda!
41013018	Nani om kraan pak ka sikpha bi swak mak lang kalummo.
41013019	Balangbe ha kaan ga Rikrwang na talei ram dam thou tan bina thouga atun tangnu sung bi hung mak aangnu khatle impha ni beida hung lat mak tingnu riangre kanang ga hunglune.
41013020	Pukraangba na haba kaan ga pi toi thang mak ngaake dabe pakhatcha hakna ringlaye; atiyeda Maanna kathang swaknu kathang thangnu mi nun lang chungna Maanna bakaan ga pi toi thang drwe.
41013021	Tudannuna nani khou, ‘Phaang ngo, abeiya Christa amme!’ mak tabe ‘Phaang ngo, Maan ula ga amme’ diga rinne dabe haga balumsa mako.
41013022	Balangbe kakoinu christa le kakoinu thiamting rwan hunglu rwe, zaye dabe kathang swaknu mi nun ding hakna minam lang badan le tasiatnu chwan tolu rwe.
41013023	Atiyeda barako; phaang ngo, Eina nani khou hei bing nga rin chaak thangnu rwe.
41013024	“Haba lumik bing bi, riangre kanang nung bi lumikna zing damlune khatle thana babaan pi bila rwe;
41013025	saangbaan insi bing bazwantalune khatle saangbaan la ngam bing le kanuklune.
41013026	Haba kaan bi Misa Sa Kapaisa gana tambu bi ngam liannu le lwat le bachamga hungnu banina phaangmulune.
41013027	Maanna Baom tambaan chonglang rwan ding lang hungluga talei taki balilana namla kataknu taram kalan khatle tambaan kalan lana Maanna kathang swaknu bing ding khom hung thanglune.
41013028	“Tacham kung bina heiba chongchak heiya bachuwo, bakachangna bazik kasat swaknu khatle banaa phun swaknu kaan bi khwalumpha nai rwe dinu nanina theiye.
41013029	Hadanga nani le ha bing ga swaknu nanina munu kaan bi Maan nai rwe, inkhaan bi hung tang rwe dinu theiyo!
41013030	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, ha bing ga swak mak basaan heiba mi chaat heiya khatchale braanlaye.
41013031	Tambaan le talei ya braan lune atiyeda Achongkaang bing nga impha ni beida braanlaye.
41013032	“Pakhatchanale haba lumik khatle chakrin ga thei make, tambaan la ongnu tambaan chonglang rwan mak tabe Sa Kapaisa hakna thei make atiyeda Pa zana theiye.
41013033	Phaang ngo, barak theiyo khatle kalummo; balangbe haga impei dat pi lu dingbo dinu nanina thei make.
41013034	Heiya manpa khatna bain asat thangsialuga khatle baswak rwan khou ngam pi thangluga, bani mi bing lang chwan sin thangsialuga khatle rangkaan khou ngaak chuiga ong lang zathang pi thangsialuga, namlanu taram la thou damnu manpa ga dannuwe.
41013035	“Atibriakpina barak theiyo, balangbe inpu gana hung dingnu ga khwazin lu dingmo, inmik kasia bi lu dingmo, aankhwang dat pi lu dingmo mak tabe louthwan lu dingmo dinu nanina thei make.
41013036	Maan thei mak daakka hungnu kaan bi Maanna nani ding inthi ongnu dounu le zaye.
41013037	Eina nani khou rin ongnuwa Eina khangsung khou rinnuwe, ‘Barak theiyo!’ ”
41014001	Takan swaknu Balou khatle Khai Sui maknu Uilu Balou hung tang lang ni ni baat ngaake. Takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Bating tatoga rin thiyamluga nam lang khatle Bating athat lang zong ngaake.
41014002	Atiyeda banina rinne, “Heiya bangei sung bi to makcho, balangbe mi nunna kasao kabao thounu le zaye.”
41014003	Jisu na Bethany bi imphaan ngaaknu Simon in bi bu sa lang ongnu kaan bi mannu pakhat baman kungnu nard thao thangnu alabaster tong khat choiluga hung ngaake. Maanna haba tong ga to bakluga Balu bi thao ga kanun thang rwe.
41014004	Habei ga ongnu mi kasemna balung pwanga bani cham atiga rinne, “Pa-aam to lang heiba banamsanu thao ding to braan ongnubo?
41014005	Balangbe haga denari raza thum katei ma inkuga zwanluga sian ga lungsianu nun lang pi thangnu zanuwe.” Atiga banina haba mannu ding twei rwe.
41014006	Atiyeda Jisu na rinne, “Barang to ong dam ding ngo. Pa-aam toga nanina bating to katop ongnubo? Maanna Alaang kasanu chwan to thangnuwe.
41014007	Balangbe lungsianu nun ga nani le chat makka ong bacham ongme khatle nanina baningnu kaan bi nanina bani lang kasanu chwan to thangnu zaye; atiyeda Eiba nani le bakaan bathin ong bachamlaye.
41014008	Maanna ngamnu ga maanna to thangnuwe. Imphum langna Apum bi thao kanun thang lang maanna basaamga hungnuwe.
41014009	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, heiba sacham ma talei ram bing bi kasamsenu kaan bi heiba mannuna to damnu chwan ga le bating baningsunu toga rinlune.”
41014010	Habei ga potroi pat somga kani lak pi suinu, Judas Iscariot na Jisu ding bani khou pi swak lang takopuba rwan khou thou drwe.
41014011	Haga banina ngaisunu kaan bi bani karo ngaake khatle balaang sian pi lang karen thang rwe. Atiga maanna Jisu ding pi swak lang badou chanu zong ngaake.
41014012	Khai Sui maknu Uilu Balou om kamanu lumik pi, banina Takan swaknu zao athatnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou ngaiye, “Takan Swaknu Balou Thaisaak sa lang anina bariak ingaipai laang thangnu Nangna bathaigabo?”
41014013	Maanna Baom potroi pat ni ding lang thangluga bani khou rinne, “Namlian laga sekhutro, tui ben phunluga se hungnu manpa khatna narwei ding kadoulune; banung ga suiseyo.
41014014	Maanna khut tamnu riak pi ga khutluga inpuba khou rinno, ‘Bachuthangnupa na rinne, “Eina Aom potroi rwan le diga Takan Swaknu Balou sa bacham dingnu bazin in kaa zo ingaabo?” ’
41014015	Atiye dabe daan thang ongnu kaliannu basaang in kaa khat maanna narwei khou pi mu thanglune; habei ga ani lang daanro.”
41014016	Baom potroi rwan gana se swakluga namlian bi khut rwe, Maanna bani khou rin thangnu bahak ka danga dou rwe; atiga banina habei ga Takan Swaknu Balou riak lang daan rwe.
41014017	Khwazinren Maan potroi pat somga kani le diga hung rwe.
41014018	Banina ongtaluga sa ong bi Jisu na rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Ei le diga sa bacham ongnu nani lak pi pakhatna Ating pi swaklu rwe.”
41014019	Habei ga bani sung riangre thou rwe khatle bani pakhat khatna Bakhou ngai rwe, “Haga eibo?” Kateina le “Haga eibo?” diga ngai rwe.
41014020	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Haga nani potroi pat somga kani lak pi Ei le diga theng bi kut kapunta bacham ongnu maan gaye.
41014021	Misa Sa Kapaisa om lang bi hiak thang ngaaknu danga Maanna seta ongnuwe atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisa ding pi swaknu manpa ga aih sianuweda! Bating pon thang mak ngaake dabe haga balaang sa inku dingnuwe.”
41014022	Banina sa ong bi Jisu na uilu ga louluga rithoi thangluga thiak bak rwe khatle haga bani khou pi luga rinne, “Louluga saro; heiya Apum rwe.”
41014023	Haba nung bi Maanna ngai ga lou rwe khatle Maanna swanka thangluga Maanna haga bani khou pi rwe khatle bani khangsung habei gana in rwe.
41014024	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Heiya mi taswang khak lang ta thangnu chonghen kathan om Athi ga rwe.
41014025	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei la Eina haga kathan toga in lat mak basaan drakha tui Ei in latla rwe.”
41014026	Banina laa khat to taangnu nung Olive rammwan la se thou drwe.
41014027	Haba nung bi Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Aniya zingpha nani mi bing Alang bina ket basuinu doulu rwe, balangbe heiya atiga hiak thang nge, ‘Eina Zao siannu ding bwei balum talune, Khatle zao nun ga pak imphaanglune.’
41014028	Atiyeda Eina ring thou latnu nung, Nani meithaan Ei Galilee la selune.”
