41014029	Habei ga Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Mi bingna ket basui ngaak peida eibe ket basuilaye.”
41014030	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina nakhou batak sekka rinnuwe, aniya zingpha aan khongna khwang leng ninu meithaan nang Ating za mak leng thumlune.”
41014031	Atiyeda Peter na sung raang takka rinne, “Ei Nang le diga thi bacham dingnu am ngaaklena Nating khatchale za maknu tolaye!” Bani mi bingna le hadanga rin rwe.
41014032	Haba nung bi bani Gethsemane diga kounu riak la hung rwe; atiga Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Ei kalum ong bi nani abeiya ong ngaako.”
41014033	Jisu na Peter, James khatle John ding kalwangluga se bacham rwe, atiga Maan sung katopka riangre thou rwe.
41014034	Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Akatha heiya thi dingnu danga tasiatnu riangre riangre rwe. Nani abeiya barak theiga ong ngo.”
41014035	Maanna kasem se swakluga talei bi in bakhup ta rwe khatle zaye dabe haba chakrin ga Bakhouna takan swak lang kalum rwe.
41014036	Maanna rinne, “Abba, Apa, Nakhou pot bingza hung tang nge. Heiba ngai ya Akhouna lou sat thang ngo; Atiyeda haga Eina baningnu makka Nangna baningnu to ding ngo.”
41014037	Habei ga Maan hung rwe khatle bani inthi ongnu dou rwe, Maanna Peter khou rinne, “Simon, nang chakrin khatcha hakna Ei le diga khaang bachamnu ngamlanrubo?
41014038	Nani bathemnu bi ta mak lang khaang ngo khatle kalummo. Batak takka katha nabe bathaiye atiyeda pum naba sonne.”
41014039	Maanna se latluga haba chongkaang bahak ka kabiaga kalum lat rwe.
41014040	Maanna hung latnu kaan bi bani inthi ong latnu hung dou rwe, balangbe bani in nwamnuna mik meng brak swaknu ngam mak ngaake khatle banina Bakhou impei chong katak tingbo dinu theilan rwe.
41014041	Maanna leng thumnu toga hung latluga bani khou rinne, “Nani atun tangga in basak ong maangbo? Heiya khoprwe! Chakrin ga hung rwe; phaang ngo, Misa Sa Kapaisa ding noh mi nun kut pi pi swak rwe.
41014042	Thouro, ani serizo. Phaang ngo Ating pi swak tingnu mi ga nai rwe.”
41014043	Jisu na heiba chong nga kabia ongnu kaan bi, potroi pat somga kani lak pi Judas na takolu, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle patso rwan khouna kachaak chem le thing kalok choinu mi khang pui le diga hung rwe.
41014044	Bating pi swaknu gana bani khou badannu khat piga rinne, “Eina kaput tingnu Maan ga rwe; Bating namro khatle Bating dwak mak lang kalwangsero.”
41014045	Judas na hung tang khap tinu le Jisu kim bi hung rwe khatle Bakhou rinne, “Rabbi, Rabbi!” diga Bating kaput rwe.
41014046	Habei ga banina Balu chung bi kut taluga nam thou drwe.
41014047	Habei ga han ongnu rwan lak pi pakhatna baom kachaak chem kaswaluga takolu swak ting bakanaa kapak chat thang rwe.
41014048	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina Ating kasut sanu maitwang bi danga kachaak chem le thing kalok choiluga Ating namlang hungnubo?
41014049	Ei kani bathin kalum in bi bachu thangga nani le diga ong bacham ngaake atiyeda nanina Ating nam make. Heiya Bathiangnu Chongdipna rin thangnu ga hung tang lang naye.”
41014050	Haba nung bi potroi rwanna Bating bathan satluga pak thou drwe.
41014051	Habei ga katangpa khat pum tangang linen pwan khatna bapum kabet namluga Banung sui se ngaake. Banina katangpa ding ga nam rwe,
41014052	habei ga maan linen pwan nui satluga bani khouna pum tangang pak thou dam ngaake.
41014053	Atiga banina Jisu ding takolu in bi kalwang hung rwe khatle takopuba rwan bing, patso rwan khatle chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Bakim bi hung kadoi rwe.
41014054	Peter na impaan saam saamga Banung suizon hungluga takolu in inkhu tangga sui hung ngaake. Habei ga maan kalum in ngaak nun le ong bachamga mei kahaiga ong ngaake.
41014055	Takopuba rwan le thampei rwanna Jisu ding athat lang Bamaitwang bi sake zong ong ngaake atiyeda khatchale dou make.
41014056	Balangbe mi taswang khakna Bamaitwang bi kakoinu sake taswang khak pi ngaake atiyeda bani om sake ga khatchale bacham kale mak ngaake.
41014057	Habei ga mi kasemna han thouluga Bamaitwang bi kakoinu sake piga rinne,
41014058	“ ‘Kutna bachanu heiba kalum in ding nga Eina to braanne khatle ni thum ni kutna bacha maknu kalum in katei khat Eina to thoune,’ diga Maanna rinnu anina ngaisuye.”
41014059	Haba nung tangga bani sake ga bacham mak ngaake.
41014060	Bani lak pi takolu gana han thouluga Jisu khou ngai rwe, “Nang khatchale kataklabo? Heiba mi nunna Namaitwang bi sake pi ongnuwa pa-aambo?”
41014061	Atiyeda Maan thiap thiapka khatchale katak makka ong ngaake. Takolu gana Bakhou ngai late, “Nang Swanka khopnu om Sa Kapaisa Christa gabo?”
41014062	Jisu na rinne, “Ei rwe. Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Ngam om kut inchang pek la badung ongnu khatle tambaan om tambu bi hungnu nanina phaangmulune.”
41014063	Habei ga takolu gana bapwan kachang reluga rinne, “Anina sake katei lou lat lang pa-aam bathaang am maang gabo?
41014064	Maanna Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat ongnuwa nani ngaisuru dabo! Nani pa-aam baningbo?” Bani khangsungna Bating thi lang khop rwe diga koi impu thang rwe.
41014065	Haba nung bi mi kasemna Bakhou bachin thang thou rwe, atiga Bamik khwam lemluga khatle Bating bweiluga Bakhou rinne, “Rin swako!” Kalum in ngaak nunna le bani kut bazaana Bating kabeng rwe.
41014066	Peter na kathwei bi, inkhu bi ongnu kaan bi takolu om swak rangaaknu rwan lak pi pakhat hung ngaake.
41014067	Peter na mei kahai ongnu ga maanna muluga bating phaangdengga phaangluga rinne, “Nang Nazareth Jisu le diga bacham ngaaknu gaye.”
41014068	Peter na za makka rinne, “Ei nangna rin ongnu ga thei make, bakaba le thei make.” Maan inkhu la swak tamnu kaan bi aankhongna khwang rwe.
41014069	Swak rangaaknu gana bating mu latluga habei ga han ongnu mi nun khou atiga rin thou rwe, “Maan bani lak pi pakhate.”
41014070	Habei ga le Peter na za mak lat rwe. Bakaan kasem nung bi habei ga han ongnu nun gana Peter khou rin late, “Nang soi makka bani lak pi pakhate; balangbe nang Galilee la miye dinu nachong kabiakna indaowe.”
41014071	Atiyeda maanna sengga khatle karenga rinne, “Nanina rin ongnu heiba Manpa ding nga ei thei make.”
41014072	Leng ninu toga aankhongan khwang rwe. Haba nung bi Jisu na bakhou rin damnu, “Aankhongna khwang leng ninu meithaan nang Ating za mak leng thumlune” diga rin thang ngaaknu chongkaang ga Peter na baningsu rwe. Haba lang bi kakhannu kaan bi maan chap rwe.
41015001	Louthwan khwan takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan, patso rwan khatle thampei rwan bing chong katu rwe; atiga banina Jisu ding karakluga Bating kalwang swak rwe khatle Bating Pilate khou bachoi thang rwe.
41015002	Habei ga Pilate na Bakhou ngaiye, “Nang Jihudi rwan Krwang bo?” Maanna bakhou katake, “Nangna rin damnu ga rwe.”
41015003	Takopuba rwanna Bating balang taswang khak pi koi impu thangnu chong kabia ngaake atiyeda Maan khatchale katak mak ngaake.
41015004	Pilate na Bakhou ngailate, “Nang khatchale kataklabo? Banina Namaitwang bi sake heiza pi ongnuwa phaang ngo?”
41015005	Atiyeda Jisu na khatchale katak mak ngaake, habei ga Pilate loh lo rwe.
41015006	Pilate na baom chaang toga Takan Swaknu Balou dat pi mi nunna ninu qwan mi pakhat ting bathan thang ngaake.
41015007	Habei ga Barabbas tiga kounu babaan rwan le diga parei ruina bang thang ongnu manpa khat am ngaake; bani talei chong swakpi mi athat ngaake.
41015008	Habei ga maanna bani lang baom chaang danga to thang lang mi khangna pao rakanga bakhou ni thou rwe.
41015009	Atiyeda Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Jihudi rwan Krwang ding eina nani lang bathan thangnu bathaigabo?”
41015010	Balangbe takopuba rwanna antiam briakpina Jisu ding pi swak thangnuwe dinu maanna thei ngaake.
41015011	Jisu om bahut toga Barabbas ting bathan thang lang takopuba rwanna mi nun ding kachui thang ngaake.
41015012	Pilate na bani khou rinlate, “Ati dabe nanina Jihudi rwan Krwang diga kounu Bating eina pa-aam to ding gabo?”
41015013	Banina pao lat rwe, “Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!”
41015014	Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Pa-aam langbo, Maanna pa-aam kasianu chwan torugabo?” Atiyeda banina rakan ranga pao rwe, “Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!”
41015015	Pilate na mi nun ding pi pem langna Barabbas ting bani khou bathan thang rwe khatle Jisu ding maanna pi bweiluga cross pi athat lang pi swak rwe.
41015016	Kraanmi nunna Bating Praetorium diga kounu riak pi kalwang khut rwe khatle banina kraanmi doi ding kou kadoi rwe.
41015017	Banina Bakhou sendumnu pwan sin thang rwe khatle banina kaling luthop khat bachaluga Balu bi run thang rwe,
41015018	banina Bating kalumga rinne, “Kalumme, Jihudi rwan Krwang!”
41015019	Banina Bating tou sungrwanna Balu bi bweiluga Bakhou bachin thang rwe khatle kekhok detaluga banina Bating kalum rwe.
41015020	Banina Bating kiamnu nung banina sendumnu pwan ga lou sat rwe, atiga Bakhou Bapwan sin thang lat rwe khatle banina Bating cross pi athat lang kalwang thou drwe.
41015021	Nam lana hungnu Alexander le Rufus pa Simon diga kounu Cyrene rwan manpa pakhat ting banina namga Jisu om cross pi phun ngaake.
41015022	Banina Bating Golgotha, bakabana Luru riak tiga kounu riak la kalwang hung rwe.
41015023	Banina zu le Myrrh thang karungluga Balaang in lang pi rwe atiyeda Maanna haga in mak ngaake.
41015024	Banina Bating cross pi bakhai thangnu kaan bi banina Bapwan ga kasemluga tuna impei dam lousulu dingbo diga tasaan phaang ngaake.
41015025	Chakrin inthum tanu dat pi banina Bating cross pi bakhai thang rwe.
41015026	Atiga Baom koi impu thangnu chongkaang: JIHUDI RWAN KRWANG diga lu chung pek la hiak thang rwe.
41015027	Banina Maan le diga kasut sanu pat ni, pakhat ting Bakut inchang la khatle katei pakhat tingna Bakut imbei pek la cross pi bakhai thang ngaake.
41015028	Atiga “Bating koi maan amnu mi nun lak pi basing sem thang rwe,” diga Bathiangnu chongdip pi hiak thangnu ga hung tang rwe.
41015029	Habei lampui bi se hungnu mi nunna Bating rin basiat rwe khatle bani lu kazinga rinne, “Aha! Kalum in ding raitaluga ha ding ni thum ni to thou latnu Nang,
41015030	Naraanto Nating kanro khatle cross pina taro!”
41015031	Hadanga takopuba rwanna le chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le diga bani lak pi balaa ga rin rwe, “Maanna katei rwan ding kan thang nge; atiyeda Baraanto Batingba kannu ngam make.
41015032	Anina muluga balumsa lang Israel rwan Krwang Christa ga cross pina ta ding ngo.” Maan le diga cross pi bakhai thang ongnu pat ni gana le Bating bala rwe.
41015033	Chakrin karuk tanu kaan bina chakrin kaqwa tangga haba talei bing ga zing rwe.
41015034	Chakrin kaqwa tanu kaan bi Jisu na baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Eloi, Eloi, lama, sabachthani?” bakabana, “Arikrwang, Arikrwang, Nangna Ating pa-aam lang bathan thangnubo?” dinuwe.
41015035	Habei ga han ongnu mi kasemna haga ngaisuluga rinne, “Phaang ngo, Maan Elijah ding kou ongme.”
41015036	Bani lak pi pakhatna pak seluga kathunnu drakha tui sponge bi li thangluga tou sungrwan bi thang rwe, atiga Balaang in lang pi luga rinne, “Baraanto ong dam ding ngo; Elijah na Bating louta lang hunglu dingmo ani phaangzo.”
41015037	Jisu na baraam basaangga paoluga Maan Bakatha bathan sat rwe.
41015038	Haba kaan bi kalum in bi amnu khamthing pwan ga balu lana bakalan tangga kani toga reta rwe.
41015039	Bamai thaan bi han ongnu kraanmi razapuba gana Jisu na paoga Maan Bakatha loi thang damnu ga muluga rinne, “Batak takka Manpa heiya Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye!”
41015040	Mannu rwan le namla lana hanphaang ong ngaake, bani lak pi Mary Magdalene, Kasinnu James le Joses nu Mary khatle Salome sui ngaake
41015041	Jisu na Galilee bi ongnu kaan bi bani ga Banung sui se ngaaknu, Bating chwanlaang to thang ngaaknu khatle Maan le diga Jerusalem la chwanlaang cham hung damnu katei mannu rwan le sui ngaake.
41015042	Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Sabbath ni meithaan haga Chamdaannu Lumik briakpina
41015043	thampei om takung tazei ongnu, Rikrwang om krwang talei ding ngaak ongnu Arimathea rwan Joseph na Pilate khou sung raangga hungluga Jisu pum ding ni rwe.
41015044	Jisu thi rwe diga ngaisunu kaan bi Pilate loh lo ngaake; atiga maanna kraanmi razapuba ding kouluga Maan thi damnu bakhwa seirubo diga ngai ngaake.
41015045	Pilate na kraanmi razapuba khouna chong ga bathiangga theinu kaan bi Jisu pum ga Joseph khou pi lang za thang rwe.
41015046	Habei ga Joseph na linen pwan kaleiluga Jisu pum ga louta rwe khatle pwan gana Bating kazwan thang rwe. Maanna lung pui bi ranluga bachanu thaan bi Jisu ding ri thang rwe khatle thaan inkhaanmun bi lung khatna lengnam thang rwe.
41015047	Mary Magdalene le Joses nu Mary na Bating ri thang damnu riak ka phaang ngaake.
41016001	Sabbath loi damnu nung Mary Madalene, James nu Mary khatle Salome na hungluga Bakhou kanun lang banamsanu pot kalei rwe.
41016002	Maap lak om kamanu ni om louthwan khwan lumik swaknu kaan bi bani nun thaan baloiga hung ngaake.
41016003	Bani cham atiga rinne, “Thaankham lung ga ani lang tuna ka lat sat thang dingbo?”
41016004	Balangbe haga lian tak ngaake. Atiyeda banina phaangkanu kaan bi lung ga tun swak thang ngaaknu banina mu rwe.
41016005	Banina thaan sung bi khutnu kaan bi katangpa pakhat baswannu pwan ngou sinluga inchang pek la badung ongnu banina mu rwe khatle habei ga bani loh lo ngaake.
41016006	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani loh lo mako. Cross pi athat thang damnu Nazareth Jisu ding nani zong ongme. Maan ring thou drwe! Maan abeiya ong lan rwe. Banina Bating ri thangnu riak ka phaangro.
41016007	Atiyeda seluga Baom potroi rwan le Peter khou ‘Maanna rin thang damnu ga danga Maan nani meithaan Galilee la selune; habei ga nanina Bating mulune diga barinno.’ ”
41016008	Bani barapka swakluga thaan bina pak thou drwe, balangbe bani kachi kathokka loh lo ngaake. Atiga bani khatle khat meiri rai kale mak ngaake, balangbe bani kachi ngaake.
41016009	Maap lak om kamanu ni louthwan khwan Jisu ring thounu kaan bi Maanna ri kasianu siari ding kazun sat thaang ngaaknu Mary Magdalene khou kamaga Baman pi mu thang ngaake.
41016010	Maanna seluga chunto lo siaga khatle chapka ongnu Banung sui ong bacham thang ngaaknu nun khou bapu thang rwe.
41016011	Jisu ring ongme khatle maanna mu rwe diga rinnu kaan bi bani balumsa mak ngaake.
41016012	Haba nung bi Maanna nam la se ongnu pat ni khou teinu gong bi pi mu thang ngaake.
41016013	Banina seluga katei khou rin rwe atiyeda banina le barwei ding balumsa make.
41016014	Ha nung bi potroi pat somga khat ka table bi sa in lang ongnu kaan bi Maanna pi mu thang rwe; bani om balumsa maknu khatle bani sung natnu ding twei rwe, balangbe Maan ring thounu nung Bating mu damnu mi nun ding banina balumsa make.
41016015	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Talei bariak bing bi seluga mi bing khou sacham kasamro.
41016016	Balumsanu khatle baptize tonu bating kan thangne; atiyeda balumsa maknu bating koi bi pi ta thangne.
41016017	Balumsanu nun khou heiba badan bingna bani le suilune: Ameng bi banina ri kasia nun ding kazun satlune khatle bani chong kathan kabialune,
41016018	banina barun nun ding kai thoulune; bani thinu zanu paaam ngaakle in beida bani ding liamlaye; banina naanu nun lu chung bi kut kaising thanglune khatle bani salune.”
41016019	Pukraangba na bani khou chong kabia taangnu kaan bi Bating tambaan la lou thou drwe khatle Rikrwang kut inchang pek la ongta drwe.
41016020	Banina se swakluga bariak thin kasam se ngaak rwe, Pukraangba na bani le diga chwanlaang bacham rwe khatle banina to ongnu badan paanna chong ding ga batake dinu pi mu thang rwe. Amen.
42001001	Ani lak pi hung tang thang damnu bing om lang bi baleng toga rin indao thang langna mi taswang khakna hiak lang karam ngaaknu nung suiga,
42001002	kama bina ha bing ga bani mikna mu ngaaknu khatle chongkaang lang bi chwanlaang tonu rwanna ani khou pi thei thangnu nung suiga,
42001003	He ngam liannu Theophilus, balang bingza kama bina thouga eina hei bing nga zongminga zongkhutluga nakhou baleng toga hiak latnuna sa inkuwe diga baningga,
42001004	nakhou bachu thang damnu ga balumsa lang khopnuwe dinu ga nangna thei lang eina hiaknuwe.
42001005	Judea krwang Herod kaan bi Abijah mikin bina Zacharias tiga kounu tako khat am ngaake. Bamei Elizabeth heiya Aaron in mikin bi naye.
42001006	Barwei pat ni Pukraangba om chongren khatle zathang bing zeiga, khan thang lang maaknu toga Rikrwang meithaan bi ririak sega ong ngaake.
42001007	Atiyeda Elizabeth ka nao lungnu dat hen dam briakpina barwei pat ni sa pon mak ngaake khatle barwei patso tak ngaak rwe.
42001008	Kani khat tako om chwan leng ga bakhou tanu nung suiga maan Rikrwang meithaan bi bachwan to ong ngaake,
42001009	tako om se ongnu bachaang nung suiga Pukraangba om kalum in bi khutluga parong bati lang babachan bi baleng ta ngaak rwe.
42001010	Atiga parong bati ongnu chakrin bi ga mi khangna langkaang la kalumga ngaak ong ngaake.
42001011	Parong mei batinu rikhaang riak inchang pek la Pukraangba om tambaan chonglang khat hung hannu bakhou pi mu thang rwe.
42001012	Zacharias na bating munu kaan bi basung riangrega maan kachi tak ngaak rwe.
42001013	Atiyeda tambaan chonglang gana bakhou rinne, “Kachi mako Zacharias, balangbe nangna kalumnu ga Eina ngaisu thang rwe; namei Elizabeth na sa kapaisa khat ponlu rwe khatle nangna bameng John diga basak lang nge.
42001014	Atiga nang karo lozaang sanu doulu rwe khatle bating am thangnu kaan bi mi taswang khak na le karo lozaang salu rwe.
42001015	Balangbe Rikrwang mikphaang bi maan kaliannu tolune, Maan drakha tui khatle kanatnu zu inlaye. Maan banu bonpui sung bina thouga bakhou Katha Bathiangnuna siplune.
42001016	Maanna Israel sa rwan mi taswang khak ting Pukraangba bani Rikrwang khou pi kanei hunglune.
42001017	Maanna ‘Pa rwan sung ding bani sa rwan khou pi kanei hung lang’ chong zei maknu mi nun ding ririak senu lungning bi pi kanei hung thang lang Pukraangba lang daan thangnu mi nun ding pi daan thang lang maan Elijah om katha khatle ngam bi Pukraangba meithaan bi selune.”
42001018	Zacharias na tambaan chonglang khou rinne, “Eina heiya tatoga bathiangga thei dingbo? Balangbe ei patso rwe khatle amei le patso tak rwe.”
42001019	Atiyeda tambaan chonglang gana bakhou rinne, “Ei Rikrwang meithaan bi han ongnu Gabriel ne, Maanna nakhou chong kabia lang khatle nakhou karonu cham rin thang lang ating lang hungnuwe.
42001020	Phaang ngo, bakaan chaga hung tang dingnu achong ding nangna balumsa mak briakpina ha bing ga swak mak basaan nang thiap thiap onglune khatle nang chong kabianu ngam bila rwe.”
42001021	Mi khangna Zacharias ting ngaak ong ngaake, maanna kalum in insung bi bakhwa seiga ong ngaak briakpina bani loh lo ong ngaake.
42001022	Atiyeda maan swaknu kaan bi maan bani khou chong kabianu ngamlan rwe; bakhou kalum in insung bi pi mu thangnu amsia rwe dinu banina thei rwe, balangbe maanna bani khou badannu khat toga bachong swak makka ong ngaake.
42001023	Maanna baom tako om to dingnu lumik bing ga loi thangluga bain la han hung lat rwe.
42001024	Haba nung bi bamei Elizabeth pum rit rwe khatle maan tha impaang inkamluga rinne,
42001025	“Mi nun lak pi akazak heiya lou sat thang lang alu chung bi Pukraangba na phaang thangnu lumik bing bi, Maanna alaang heiya to thang rwe.”
42001026	Elizabeth bapum ritnu tha karuk tangnu kaan bi Rikrwang na tambaan chonglang Gabriel ding Galilee taram om Nazareth nampui bi
42001027	David inkhun mi Joseph lang munchat thangluga ongnu Mary diga kounu reizuni kim bi lang hung rwe.
42001028	Tambaan chonglang gana hungluga bakhou rinne, “Lozaang sawo, nang heitia lang phaangkriang thangnu lousu rwe, Pukraangba na nating ong bacham thang ongme; kamaisa nun lak pi nang aih sanuwe!”
42001029	Atiyeda Mary na tambaan chonglang ding munu kaan bi bachong gana taswang khak lang basung pi katop rwe khatle rin ongnuwa tatonu kababo diga basung bi kakhan ngaake.
42001030	Habei ga tambaan chonglang gana bakhou rinne, “Kachi mako Mary, balangbe nang Rikrwang phaangkriang lousu rwe.
42001031	Phaang ngo, nang pum ritluga Sa Kapaisa khat ponlune khatle bameng Jisu diga basaklune.
42001032	Maan Balwat lianlune, Bating Basaang Kataknu Sa Kapaisa diga koulune khatle Pukraangba Rikrwang na Bapa David om krwang takung riak ka Balaang pi thanglune.
42001033	Maan Jacob in inkhun lu chung bi khwa seiga paanlune khatle Bakrwang talei ga loinu ambila rwe.”
42001034	Mary na tambaan chonglang khou rinne, “Ei kapaisa le diga thei kale makka heiya tatoga hung tang langbo?”
42001035	Tambaan chonglangna bakhou rinne, “Katha Bathiangnuna nakhou hung thanglune khatle Basaang Kataknu om ngam gana nalu chung bi ong lem thanglune; atibriakpina pon dingnu Bathiangnu Maan ga Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa diga koulune.
42001036	Phaang ngo, nainkhun mi Elizabeth na le patso hungnu kaan bi bapum ritluga sa kapaisa khat phun ong rwe; mi nunna bating sa pon maknu diga kou ngaaknu ga pum ritnu tha karuk tang rwe.
42001037	Balangbe Rikrwang khou hung tanglanu khatchale maake.”
42001038	Mary na rinne, “Phaang ngo, eiya Pukraangba om swak nu we! Nangna rinnu danga akhou swak tingro.” Habei ga tambaan chonglang ga bakhouna se swak trwe.
42001039	Haba kaan bi Mary Judea ching ram la amnu Judea namlian la barapka thou dam ngaake
42001040	khatle maanna Zacharias in bi khutluga Elizabeth ting kalum rwe.
42001041	Mary na kalumnu ga Elizabeth na theisunu kaan bi babon bi amnu naosen ga kachok thou ngaake khatle Elizabeth Katha Bathiangnuna sip ngaak rwe.
42001042	Maanna baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Kamaisa bing lak pi nang aih saye khatle nabon sung bi amnu Naosen ga aih saye!
42001043	Apukraangba nuna ei dannu khou hungnuwa tatonu ombo?
42001044	Balangbe phaang ngo, nangna ating kalumnu khwan ga akanaa bi ngaisunu kaan bi abon sung bi amnu naosen ga karoga kachok thouwe.
42001045	Pukraangba na bakhou rin damnu bing ga hung tanglune diga balumsanu mannu ga aih sanuwe.”
42001046	Mary na rinne, “Akatha na Pukraangba ding swankaye,
42001047	Akatha na ating Kanthangnupa Rikrwang khou karowe.
42001048	Balangbe Maanna sung bangiam damnu Baswak kamaisa ating phaangta thang rwe; Balangbe phaang ngo, atunna thouga mikin bingna ating aih sanu diga koulu rwe.
42001049	Balangbe Ngam Liannu Maanna akhou tasiatnu chwan to thang rwe, Khatle Bameng ga bathiangnuwe.
42001050	Bating kachinu mi nun khou Baphaangkriang ga mikin bing bi amme.
42001051	Bakut pwamna ngam chwan pi mu thang nge; Bani sung baning bi lian tonu nun ding chai imphaang thang nge.
42001052	Nat raangnu mi nun ding bani krwang takung riak pina kaitaye, Khatle sung bangiamnu nun ding Maanna kai basaang ka thang nge.
42001053	Bon chaamnu mi nun ding Maanna asanu thaisaak pi sa imba thang nge, Khatle lungsanu rwan ding kut barwang bathan thang nge.
42001054	Baphaangkriang ding baningsuga, Baswak Israel ding paang thang rwe,
42001055	Maanna ani pu pa rwan, Abraham le bakik taat rwan khou khwa sei lang rin thang damnu ga dannuwe.”
42001056	Mary na Elizabeth le diga tha thum khak ong bacham thangluga bain la thou lat tam ngaake.
42001057	Elizabeth ka nao amnu kaan hung tangnu dat pi maan sa kapaisa khat pon thang rwe.
42001058	Pukraangba na bakhou tasiatnu phaangkriang kriang thang rwe dinu bainnai rwan khatle bain thirui rwanna theinu kaan bi bani mi bingza maan le diga karo bacham ngaake.
42001059	Ni kariat tangnu kaan bi banina naosen ding mun rom lang phun hung rwe khatle banina bapa meng louga bameng Zacharias tiga basak lang to ngaake.
42001060	Atiyeda banuna rinne, “Make! Bameng John diga basak lang zung nge.”
42001061	Banina bakhou rinne, “Nain thirui bi heiba meng basaknu khatchale maake.”
42001062	Habei ga bapa Zacharias na basak nwamnu meng ga pa-aambo theiza lang banina bakhou badannu khat to rwe.
42001063	Habei ga maanna hiak lang pot khat niluga hiak rwe, “Bameng John kouwe.” Atiga bani mi bing loh lo rwe.
42001064	Haba kahan bi ga babalei lat swak rwe khatle maanna Rikrwang ding swanga chong kabia rwe.
42001065	Haba nung bi innai lounai rwan bing kachi rwe khatle hei bing lang bi Judea ching taram bing bi mi nunna rai ong ngaake.
42001066	Hei cham theisunu bingna bani sung bi kakhan ga rinne, “Heiba naosenna pa-aam tolu dingbo?” Balangbe Pukraangba om ngamna bating kalwang thang ong ngaake.
42001067	Bapa Zacharias ka Katha Bathiangnuna sipluga ri chong rin swak ngaake,
42001068	“Israel Rikrwang Pukraangba ding swanne, Balangbe Maanna Bami nun kim bi hungluga ran swak thang rwe,
42001069	Maanna ani lang nat raangnu ringriak om taki khat ting Baswak David in inkhun bi pi thang rwe,
42001070	Talei am thou tan bina, Maanna Baom bathiangnu thiamting rwan mun bina rin thang damnu ga dannuwe,
42001071	Ani ding munanu khouna Khatle ani ding batannu nun kut pina Maanna kan thanglune,
42001072	Ani pu pa rwan ding phaangkriang thang lang, Khatle Baom bathiangnu chonghen ga baningsu lang,
42001073	Maanna ani pa Abraham khou chongren toga karen thang damnu:
42001074	‘Ani ding munanu nun kut pina kanthangnu nung, Anina kachinu to makka Baom chwanlaang tolune,
42001075	Ani kum ambasaan anina Bameithaan bi bathiangga, Khatle ririak sega chwanlaang to lang naye.
42001076	Naosen nating Basaang Kataknu om thiamting diga koulune; Balangbe nangna Pukraangba meithaan bi Balampui daan lang selune,
42001077	Bani noh bing ding kok thangluga, Kanthangnu om lang bi Bami nun khou pi thei thang lang nge,
42001078	Ani Rikrwang om kriang thang theinu phaangkriang paan bina, Basaang la Louthwan Insi thanna ani khou hungbaan thanglune;
42001079	Heiya kazingnu riak pi le thinu lim bi ongnu nun khou baan thang lang, Ani ding dai bazaangnu lampui bi kai thang lang nge.”
42001080	Naosen ga sei lian thou rwe katha bi nat thou rwe khatle maan Israel rwan khou indao thang mak basaan maan ramhaang la ong ngaake.
42002001	Haba kaan bi krwang Caesar Augustus na talei bariak bing bi mi sing sem lang chongtan pi swak ngaake.
42002002	Haba mi sing semnu ga Quirinius na Syria taram om taleipuba toga paannu kaan bina kama kataknu to ngaake.
42002003	Atiga meng hiak lang mi bingna baom baom nampui la se ngaake.
42002004	Joseph le Galilee om Nazareth nam bina Judea taram Bethlehem diga kounu David namlian la se ngaake, balangbe maan David in mikin khatle inkhun bi naye,
42002005	bamei lang munchat thang ongnu Mary le diga meng hiak lang se ngaake, ha kaan ga Mary pum rit ngaak rwe.
42002006	Barweina habei ga ongnu kaan bi Mary an san thang lang lumik hung tang ngaak rwe.
42002007	Maan natainu Sa Kapaisa khat am thang rwe khatle Bating pwan khatna kazwanluga sensaak bunnu suktheng bi bayi thang rwe, balangbe bazin in bi ga barwei lang bariak maak ngaake.
42002008	Haba taram bi zao siannu nun bani zao rakhiga zingpha ramhaang la ong ngaake.
42002009	Phaang ngo, Pukraangba om tambaan chonglang khat bani khou hung hanluga Pukraangba om lwat kana bani ding baan qwat thang rwe, habei ga bani kachi tak ngaak rwe.
42002010	Tambaan chonglang gana bani khou rinne, “Kachi mako, balangbe phaang ngo, Eina nani khou mi bingza lang tasiatnu om karonu cham phun hung nge.
42002011	Balangbe aniya David namlian bi nani lang Kanthangnupa pon thang rwe, Maan Christa Pukraangba gaye.
42002012	Heiya nani khou badannu tolune: Naosen ga pwanna kazwanluga sensaak riak suktheng bi bayi thang ongnu nanina doulune.”
42002013	Haba kahan bi tambaan kraanmi nunna haba tambaan chonglang ga le diga Rikrwang ding swanga rinne:
42002014	“Basaang kataknu bi Rikrwang lwat lian ding ngo, Talei ram bi dai bazaangnu, mi nun lak pi Maanna pemnu to ding ngo!”
42002015	Tambaan chonglang rwan ga bani khouna tambaan la ka damnu kaan bi zao siannu nunna bani khatna khat khou rin rwe, “Ani Bethlehem la seluga swak tamnu lang bi Pukraangba na ani khou pi thei thang damnu ga baphaangrizo.”
42002016	Habei ga banina barapka seluga Mary le Joseph khatle sensaak riak pi bayi thang ongnu Naosen ding hung dou rwe.
42002017	Banina Bating munu kaan bi Naosen om lang bi bani khou pi thei thang damnu ga mi nun khou rai chang thou drwe.
42002018	Habei ga zao siannu nunna hei lang bi bani khou rai thangnu meiri ding theisunu mi bingna loh lo rwe.
42002019	Atiyeda Mary na hei bing nga basung bi ri thangluga thiap thiapka kakhan ong ngaake.
42002020	Zao siannu nun gana hung latluga bani khou rin thang ngaaknu ga danga banina thei damnu khatle mu damnu langna Rikrwang lwat liannu ding swan ngaake.
42002021	Ni kariat ni haba Naosen ding mun rom taangnu nung, Mary pum rit mak baleina tambaan chonglangna basak thangnu Jisu dinu meng ga basak thang rwe.
42002022	Moses om chongtan nung suiga Mary ding pum to bathiangnu lumik tangnu nung, barweina Jisu ding Jerusalem la kalwang hung rwe; heiya Bating Pukraangba khou kat thang lang
42002023	dinuba Pukraangba om chongtan bi hiak thangnu dan ga, “Nao am riak lat swakluga ponnu natainu sa kapaisa bing Pukraangba khou bathiangnu diga kou ding gaye”
42002024	khatle Pukraangba om chongtan nung suiga, “Tuizwan basa kani mak tabe banphi swan kani” rikhaang pot toga kat lang nge.
42002025	Phaang ngo, Jerusalem bi Simeon diga kounu manpa khat am ngaake, maan Israel rwan ding pi karo thang dingnu ding ngaakka ongnu ririak senu khatle ri baning thuknu manpaye; atiga Katha Bathiangnuna balu chung bi ong thang ngaake.
42002026	Maan Pukraangba om Christa ding mu mak basaan thilaye diga Katha Bathiangnuna bakhou rin thang ngaake.
42002027	Atiga Katha Bathiangnu paan bina maan kalum in bi hung rwe. Chongtan chaang nung suiga Mary le Joseph na Naosen Jisu ding kat thang lang kalum in bi kalwang hungnu kaan bi
42002028	Simeon na Jisu ding bakut pwam bi pon thouluga Rikrwang ding swanga rinne:
42002029	“Pukraangba Nachong nung suiga, Nangna Naswak ting dai bazaangga bathan thang rwe;
42002030	Balangbe amikna Naom ringriak ting mu rwe,
42002031	Haga Pukraangba na mi bingza meithaan bi daan thangnu gaye.
42002032	Maan Gentile rwan khou pi baan thang dingnu baan khatle Nami Israel rwan lang lwat liannu gaye.”
42002033	Jisu om lang bi Simeon na rin damnu bi ga Joseph le Banu Mary loh lo ong ngaake.
42002034	Habei ga Simeon na barwei khou rithoi pi thangluga Banu Mary khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, heiba Naosenna Israel rwan mi taswang khak ting pi balumta lang khatle pi lon thou thang lang hungnuwe khatle Bamaitwang bi mi taswang khakna za mak tingnu om badan tolu rwe.
42002035	Mi bing sung baning ding indao thang lang, kachaak chemna nasung ding choulu rwe.”
42002036	Asher in phum mi Phanuel sa kamaisa Anna diga kounu thiamting nu pakhat am ngaake. Maan patso tak ngaak rwe, atiga maan kalaak taangnu nung babasan le diga sangwan siari lung bacham thang ngaake.
42002037	Haba mannu ga sangwan somkariatka bali lung tangnu tameinuwe, maanna kalum in bina se swak lat makka kalumsanga khatle hweiniga zingpha thamlai Rikrwang chwanlaang to ong ngaake.
42002038	Haba kahan bi ga maan le hungluga Rikrwang ding swanga, Jerusalem ding ran swak thang lang ngaakka ongnu mi bing khou Pukraangba om lang bi chong kabia ngaake.
42002039	Joseph le Mary na Pukraangba om chongtan nung suiga to dingnu lang bing to loiluga, Galilee taram bani nam Nazareth la hung lat rwe.
42002040	Naosen ga sei lian thouluga katha bi nat thou rwe, ningtingna sip rwe khatle Rikrwang om phaangkriang Bakhou am ngaake.
42002041	Sangwan bathin Banu le Bapa Takan Swaknu Balou bi Jerusalem la se ngaake.
42002042	Maan sangwan somga kani tangnu kaan bi balou om zek nung suiga bani nun Jerusalem namlian la se ngaake.
42002043	Balou Thaisaak lumik bing loiluga bani in la han hung lat pi Naosen Jisu ga Jerusalem la ongsia ngaake. Atiyeda Joseph le Banu Mary na haga thei mak ngaake.
42002044	Atiga Maan mi nun lak pi sui ngaak chung nge diga baning briakpina barwei kani khat bazin lampui se ngaak rwe, habei ga barweina Bating bain doi rwan khatle man thei kalenu mi nun lak pi zong rwe.
42002045	Atiga barweina Bating zongsu maknu kaan bi Jerusalem la han hung latluga Bating zong rwe.
42002046	Ni thum nung bi barweina Jisu ding kalum in bi bachuthangnupa rwan lak pi badungluga bani chong ngaiga khatle bani khou tangai ngaiga ong ngaaknu dou rwe.
42002047	Bachong ngaisunu mi bingna Baom theinu khatle Bachong katak om lang bi loh lo ong ngaake.
42002048	Barweina Bating munu kaan bi barwei loh lo rwe; Banuna Bakhou rinne, “Sa Kapaisa, Nangna arwei khou paaam toga atiga tonubo? Phaang ngo, Napa le arweina sung tamga Nating zongse ongnuwe.”
42002049	Maanna barwei khou rinne, “Narwei pa-aam lang Ating zongnubo? Ei Apa chwan to ongnuwe dinu narwei thei makpo?”
42002050	Atiyeda Maanna barwei khou rinnu chong ga barweina bakaba thei mak ngaake.
42002051	Haba nung bi Maan barwei le diga Nazareth la hung latluga bani chong zeiga ong rwe atiyeda Banuna hei bing nga basung bi ri thang ong ngaake.
42002052	Jisu ningting bi, pum lwan bi khatle Rikrwang le mi nun kriang sung bi sing thou rwe.
42003001	Tiberius Caesar krwangna paannu sangwan somga impaang tangnu kum Pontius Pilate na Judea om taleipuba tonu kaan bi Herod na Galilee om tetrarch, banao Philip na Iturea le Trachonitis taram om tetrarch khatle Lysanias na Abilene om tetrarch tonu kaan bi
42003002	Annas le Caiaphas na takolu tonu kaan bi ramhaang bi Rikrwang om chong ga Zacharias sa kapaisa John khou rin hung rwe.
42003003	Maanna Jordan tuiqwa kim bi amqwatnu taram bing la seluga noh kok thang lang sung lenu om baptize tonu ga kasam ngaake,
42003004	heiya thiamting Isaiah om chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Khwan khatna ramhaang bi pao ongme, ‘Pukraangba lampui ga daanno; Balampui bing ga to bazeyo.
42003005	Bazwan taram bing pi siplune, Rammwan pui khatle rammwan swan bing ding pi bangiamta lune; Kadipnu lampui bing to kating lune, Khatle paratnu lampui bing to banim lune.
42003006	Mi bingna Rikrwang om ringriak ka mulune.’ ”
42003007	Bakhou baptize to lang hungnu mi khang khou John na rinne, “He barun kik taat rwan ga! Hung dingnu balung pwan bina pak dwak lang nani khou tuna rin basi thanggabo?
42003008	Atibriakpina sung lenu om khopsanu kraa ga kraawo, nanina, ‘Abraham ma ani pa ye’ diga rin mako. Balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Rikrwang na heiba lung bing bina Abraham lang sa nao rwan pi cha swak ngamme.
42003009	Atun le thingkung ri bing bi rei bachu thang luga ongme. Atibriakpina kasanu kraa kraa maknu thingkung bing ding pun satluga mei bi bazwan thang nge.”
42003010	Mi nunna bakhou ngai rwe, “Ati dabe ani pa-aam to langbo?”
42003011	John na bani khou katake, “Tudannu talathu kani amnu maan gana ka maaknu lang kasemmo khatle thaisaak amnu maanna le ka maaknu lang kasemmo.”
42003012	Habei ga ramkhai khomnu rwan le baptize to lang hungluga John khou ngaiye, “Bachuthangnupa, ani pa-aam to langbo?”
42003013	John na bani khou rinne, “Nanina lounu zek swaknu bi gana inkuga lou mako.”
42003014	Hadanga kraanmi rwanna le bakhou ngai rwe, “Ani pa-aam to langbo?” John na bani khou rinne, “Mi khat om baze makka kasutsa mako mak tabe koi impu thang mako khatle nani om lo man gana pemnu towo.”
42003015	Mi nunna Christa ding lamphaangga ongnu kaan bi banina John ding Christa rumo mak tabe ha makpo diga kakhan ong ngaake.
42003016	John na bani mi bing khou rinne, “Batak takka eina nani ding tui bi baptize to thang nge; atiyeda ama ngam liannu Pakhat hung naye, Baom sandal rui ga hakna sut lang ei khop make. Maanna nani ding Katha Bathiangnu le meina baptize to thanglune.
42003017	Baom zam ga Bakut pi amme, Maanna Baom loulaak riak ka to bathiang thanglune khatle gehu ga Baom inta bi hung thanglune; atiyeda baraang ding gana mit latlanu mei bi bati satlune.”
42003018	John na bani ding taswang khak kachui thangnu le bachamga sacham kasam thang ngaake.
42003019	Atiyeda Herod tetrach ting banao Philip mei Herodia om lang bina khatle baom sa maknu chwan katei om lang bina John na twei ngaake
42003020	khatle hei bing chung bi Herod na John ding qwan in bi thang ngaake.
42003021	John na mi nun ding baptize to thangnu kaan bi maanna Jisu ding le baptize to thang rwe; atiga Jisu na kalum ongnu kaan bi tambaan inkhaan lat swak rwe.
42003022	Katha Bathiangnuna pum toga Balu chung bi banphi danga tatwang rwe khatle tambaan lana tanu khwan khatna rinne, “Nang Eina kriangnu Asa Kapaisa ye; Ei Nakhou pem tak rwe.”
42003023	Jisu na Bachwan to thounu kaan bi maan sangwan somthum khak tang ngaak rwe, mi nunna baningnu danga Maan Joseph sa kapaisa ye, Joseph na Heli sa kapaisa ye,
42003024	Heli na Matthat sa kapaisa ye, Matthat na Levi sa kapaisa ye, Levi na Melchi sa kapaisa ye, Melchi na Janna sa kapaisa ye, Janna na Joseph sa kapaisa ye,
42003025	Joseph na Mattathiah sa kapaisa ye, Mattathiah na Amos sa kapaisa ye, Amos na Nahum sa kapaisa ye, Nahum na Esli sa kapaisa ye, Esli na Naggai sa kapaisa ye,
42003026	Naggai na Maath sa kapaisa ye, Maath na Mattathiah sa kapaisa ye, Mataathiah na Semei sa kapaisa ye, Semei na Joseph sa kapaisa ye, Joseph na Judah sa kapaisa ye,
42003027	Judah na Joannas sa kapaisa ye, Joannas na Rhesa sa kapaisa ye, Rhesa na Zerubbabel sa kapaisa ye, Zerubbabel na Shealtiel sa kapaisa ye, Sheatiel na Neri sa kapaisa ye,
42003028	Neri na Melchi sa kapaisa ye, Melchi na Addi sa kapaisa ye, Addi na Cosam sa kapaisa ye, Cosam na Elmodam sa kapaisa ye, Elmodam na Er sa kapaisa ye,
42003029	Er na Jose sa kapaisa ye, Jose na Eliezar sa kapaisa ye, Eliezar na Jorim sa kapaisa ye, Jorim na Matthat sa kapaisa ye, Matthat na Levi sa kapaisa ye,
42003030	Levi na Simeon sa kapaisa ye, Simeon na Judah sa kapaisa ye, Judah na Joseph sa kapaisa ye, Joseph na Jonan sa kapaisa ye, Jonan na Eliakim sa kapaisa ye,
42003031	Eliakim na Melea sa kapaisa ye, Melea na Menan sa kapaisa ye, Menan na Mattathah sa kapaisa ye, Mattathah na Nathan sa kapaisa ye, Nathan na David sa kapaisa ye,
42003032	David na Jesse sa kapaisa ye, Jesse na Obed sa kapaisa ye, Obed na Boaz sa kapaisa ye, Boaz na Salmon sa kapaisa ye, Salmon na Nahshon sa kapaisa ye,
42003033	Nahshon na Amminadab sa kapaisa ye, Amminadab na Aram sa kapaisa ye, Aram na Hezron sa kapaisa ye, Hezron na Perez sa kapaisa ye, Perez na Judah sa kapaisa ye,
42003034	Judah na Jacob sa kapaisa ye, Jacob na Isaac sa kapaisa ye, Isaac na Abraham sa kapaisa ye, Abraham na Terah sa kapaisa ye, Terah na Nahor sa kapaisa ye,
42003035	Nahor na Serug sa kapaisa ye, Serug na Reu sa kapaisa ye, Reu na Peleg sa kapaisa ye, Peleg na Eber sa kapaisa ye, Eber na Shelah sa kapaisa ye,
42003036	Shelah na Cainan sa kapaisa ye, Cainan na Arphaxad sa kapaisa ye, Arphaxad na Shem sa kapaisa ye, Shem na Noah sa kapaisa ye, Noah na Lamech sa kapaisa ye,
42003037	Lamech na Methuselah sa kapaisa ye, Methuselah na Enoch sa kapaisa ye, Enoch na Jared sa kapaisa ye, Jared na Mahalalel sa kapaisa ye, Mahalalel na Cainan sa kapaisa ye,
42003038	Cainan na Enos sa kapaisa ye, Enos na Seth sa kapaisa ye, Seth na Adam sa kapaisa ye khatle Adam na Rikrwang sa kapaisa ye.
42004001	Katha Bathiangnuna sipluga Jisu na Jordan tuiqwa lana han hung rwe khatle Bating Katha na ramhaang la kalwang thou dam ngaake,
42004002	Diabol na Bating ni sombali bathem ngaake. Haba lumik bing bi Maan khatchale sa in mak ngaake khatle haba lumik bing ga loinu kaan bi Maan chaam ngaak rwe.
42004003	Diabol na Bakhou rinne, “Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dabe, lung ding nga uilu gon lang zathang piyo.”
42004004	Jisu na katake, “Heiya hiak thangluga amme, ‘Uilu zana mi ring lang make atiyeda Rikrwang om chongkaang bing gana ring lang zung nge.’ ”
42004005	Diabol na Bating basaangnu rammwan lan la kalwang kaluga mik kakhipnu lak pi talei ram krwang talei bing Bakhou pi mu thang rwe.
42004006	Diabol na Bakhou rinne, “Heiba krwang talei ngam bing khatle lwat heiya eina Nalaang pi thangne; balangbe haga akhou pi thangnu rwe, atiga heiya eina pi nwamnu balaang piye.
42004007	Atibriakpina Nangna ating kalumme dabe, hei bing nga Nalaang tolune.”
42004008	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Seitaan, nang Anung la thou dammo! Balangbe heiya hiak thangluga amme, ‘Nangna Pukraangba Narikrwang ding kalum ding gaye khatle Batingza nangna chwanlaang to ding gaye.’ ”
42004009	Haba nung bi Diabol na Jisu ding Jerusalem bi kalwang hung rwe khatle kalum in om inton lan la pi han thangluga Bakhou rinne, “Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dabe Napum Bahak abeina kachak tawo.
42004010	Balangbe heiya atiga hiak thang nge, ‘Nating ngaaksian thang lang Baom tambaan chonglang rwan khou Maanna chongtan pi thanglune’
42004011	khatle ‘Lung bi Naket kadeng mak lang, Bani kutna nating pon kadou thou thanglune.’ ”
42004012	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Heiya rin drwe, ‘Nangna Pukraangba Narikrwang ding bathem mak ting gaye.’ ”
42004013	Diabol na bathemnu bing ga loinu kaan bi badou chanu dou lat mak basaan maan Jisu kim bina se swak trwe.
42004014	Jisu na Katha om ngam bi Galilee taram la han hung rwe khatle Baom cham ga haba taram bing thei thou drwe.
42004015	Maanna bani om synagogue bing bi sacham bachu thangnu kaan bi mi nunna Bating rinswan ngaake.
42004016	Maanna lian thou ngaaknu riak Nazareth la Jisu hung rwe. Sabbath ni Maanna Baom chaang toga synagogue pi khutluga chongdip pa lang han thou rwe.
42004017	Thiamting Isaiah om kazwan thangnu chongdip ka Bakhou pi rwe. Maanna chongdip ka lat swaknu kaan bi atiga hiak thang ngaaknu riak ka dou rwe:
42004018	“Pukraangba om Katha na Akhou ong thang ongme, Balangbe lungsianu nun khou sacham kasam lang Maanna Akhou thao kanun thang rwe; Sung soknu mi nun ding pi karo thang lang, Nam thang ongnu nun ding bathan thangnu cham kasam lang, Mik chonu nun ding pi mu lat lang, Rai ongnu nun ding rang pi to thang lang;
42004019	Pukraangba na za thangnu sangwan ga pao swak lang Maanna Ating lang thang rwe.”
42004020	Maanna chongdip ka kazwanluga chwanlaang mi khou pi latluga ongta drwe. Habei ga synagogue pi ongnu mi bingna Bakhou bani mik basouga phaang rwe.
42004021	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Aniya nanina ngaisu damnu Bathiangnu Chongdip ka nani khou hung tang rwe.”
42004022	Mi bingna Balang bi sake to ngaake khatle Bamun bina swaknu phaangkriangna sipnu chong langna mi bingna loh lo rwe. Banina rinne, “Heiya Joseph sa Kapaisa ga makkabo?”
42004023	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Batakka nanina heiba chongchat heiya Akhou rinlune, ‘Kathiam, Naraanto Nating pi sawo! Capernaum bi to damnu anina ngaisu damnu chwan ga Naom nam bi le towo.’ ”
42004024	Habei ga Maanna rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, thiamting pakhatcha ding hakna banampui bi lou thang make.
42004025	Atiyeda Eina nani khou bazega rinnuwe, Elijah kaan bi sangwan inthum tha karuk khwa sun makka talei ram bariak bing bi kaliannu bu taangnu swak tamnu kaan bi Israel bi tamei rwan amsip am ngaake;
42004026	atiyeda Sidon taram om Zeraphat nampui bi amnu tameinuza khou makka Elijah ding tamei rwan lak pi pakhatcha khou hakna lang thang dam make.
42004027	Thiamting Elisha kaan bi Israel bi imphaannu mi taswang khak am ngaake atiyeda bani lak pi Syria rwan pa Naaman ding makka katei pakhatcha ding hakna to bathiang thang dam mak ngaake.”
42004028	Heiya ngaisunu kaan bi synagogue pi ongnu mi bing gana balung pwan tak ngaake,
42004029	atiga banina thouluga Bating namlian paan la basom swak rwe khatle chen thwei la bazwanta lang banina bacha thang damnu namlian om rammwan la kalwangka rwe.
42004030	Atiyeda Maan mi nun lak pina swakluga thou dam ngaake.
42004031	Maan Galilee taram Capernaum nampui bi ta rwe khatle Sabbath ni bathin bani ding bachu thang rwe.
42004032	Atiga Maanna bachu thangnu bi ga bani loh lo ngaake, balangbe Maanna ngam suiga kabia ngaake.
42004033	Haba kaan bi synagogue pi bathiang maknu ri kasia om katha khutnu manpa khat am ngaake. Maanna baraam basaangga
42004034	pao rwe, “Nazareth Jisu, ani ding rai thang mako! Nang le ani pa-aam barui bazem amgabo? Nang ani ding to braan lang hungnubo? Nang Tubo dinu ei theiye, Nang Rikrwang om Bathiangnu Maan gaye.”
42004035	Habei ga Jisu na bating tweiga rinne, “Thiap thiap ong ngo, nang bakhouna swak tro.” Ri kasia gana manpa ding ga mi bing lak pi tun balum thangsialuga bating pi liam makka bakhouna swak tam ngaake.
42004036	Bani nun loh lo ga bani cham atiga rinne, “Heiya impei chongbo! Balangbe Maanna ngam khatle nat le bachamga bathiang maknu katha nun ding zathang pi thangnu kaan bi bakhouna swak tamme.”
42004037	Balang bi amqwatnu haba taram bing bi thei chang thou dam ngaak rwe.
42004038	Ha ni ga Jisu synagogue pina swakluga Simon in bi khut rwe. Habei ga Simon mei nu bakhun rakanga in ong ngaake khatle banina Jisu khou pi sa thang lang balang bi rin rwe.
42004039	Jisu na bakim bi hanluga bakhunnu ding ga twei rwe khatle bakhunnu ga lan drwe. Haba kahan bi ga maanna lon thouluga bani ding chwanlaang to rwe.
42004040	Lumik tanu dat pi mi nunna bani om kasa kanaa tanat bachaat bingna naanu nun ding Jisu kim bi phun hung rwe; habei ga Maanna bani pakhat khat lu chung bi Bakut banaan thangluga bani ding pi sa thang rwe.
42004041	Atiga ri kasia nun gana bani mi taswang khak khouna swakluga paoga rinne, “Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa Christa gaye!” Habei ga Maanna bani ding tweiga chong pi kabia mak ngaake, balangbe Maan Christa ye dinu ri kasia nunna thei ngaake.
42004042	Khwa baan swaknu dat pi Maan habei gana ramkaang ram la thou dam ngaake. Mi nunna Bating rakanga zongluga Bakim bi hung rwe khatle bani ding bathan sat thang mak lang khaam rwe;
42004043	atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ei namlian katei la le seluga Rikrwang om krwang talei sacham kasam lang ammaang nge, balangbe hei langna Rikrwang na Ating lang hungnuwe.”
42004044	Atiga Maan Galilee om synagogue bing bi sacham kasam se ngaake.
42005001	Kani khat lumik pi mi nunna Rikrwang chong ngai langna Jisu kim bi sui bwat ongnu kaan bi, Maan Gennesaret tuipui paan la han ong ngaake,
42005002	Maanna tuipui paan la li kani le basak ong ngaaknu ding mu rwe; atiyeda ngaa namnu mi nun ga li bina taluga kalang kasin lang thou dam ngaake.
42005003	Maanna li khat pi ka rwe, haga Simon om li ye khatle Maanna li ga tuikom bina kasem hwankhut lang rin rwe. Atiga Maanna badungtaluga li bina mi nun ding bachu thang ngaake.
42005004	Jisu na chong kabia taangnu kaan bi Maanna Simon khou rinne, “Tui kathuknu riak la hwankhutluga ngaa nam lang naom kalang ga sattawo.”
42005005	Simon na katake, “Pukraangba, ani riangrega zingpha kalang sat ka thang beida khatchale namsu make; atiyeda Nachong nung suiga ei kalang ga sattane.”
42005006	Banina sattanu kaan bi bani ngaa taswang khak namsu rwe khatle bani kalang ga re rwe.
42005007	Li katei la ongnu bani le chwanlaang bachamnu rwan ding hungluga bani ding paang thang lang bani kut zaapka kou rwe. Banina hungnu kaan bi li kani ga sipruga li ga lup thou ngaak rwe.
42005008	Simon Peter na haga munu kaan bi Jisu ket pi in bakhup taluga rinne, “He Pukraangba, akhouna se swak thang ngo, balangbe ei noh mi zung nge!”
42005009	Balangbe ngaa taswang khak namsu briakpina Peter khatle maan le diga sebachamnu mi nun ga loh lo rwe;
42005010	atiga Simon le diga chwanlaang bachamnu Zebedee sa kapaisa pat ni James le John le loh lo ngaake. Jisu na Simon khou rinne, “Kachi mako. Atunna thouga nang mi namnu mi to lang rwe.”
42005011	Banina li ga tui paan la phun swaknu nung, pot bingza thangsialuga Banung sui drwe.
42005012	Jisu na namlian khat pi ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, pum tamun imphaannu manpa khatna Jisu ding muluga Bameithaan bi in bakhup taluga rinne, “Pukraangba, Nangna za thangnuwe dabe, Nangna ating to bathiang thangnu ngamme.”
42005013	Habei ga Maanna Bakut balaan swakluga bating banaan thangluga rinne, “Ei za rwe; bathiangro.” Haba kahan bina thouga imphaannu ga bakhouna sa drwe.
42005014	Habei ga Jisu na bakhou pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mak lang zathang pi rwe, “Nangna seluga napum ga tako khou pi muwo khatle Moses om zathang nung suiga nating to bathiang thangnu langna bani khou sake to lang potkat katro.”
42005015	Atiyeda Jisu lang bi bariak thin inkuga thei thou dam ngaak rwe; atibriakpina mi khang puina Bachong ngai lang khatle bani om kasa kanaa bing ding pi sa thang lang Bakim bi hung rwe.
42005016	Atiyeda Jisu na ramhaang la katupka penseluga hweini ngaake.
42005017	Kani khat Jisu na bachu thangga ongnu kaan bi Galilee le Judea om nampui bing khatle Jerusalem lana hungnu Pharisee rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwan bing Bakim bi badung ong ngaake. Atiga bani om kasa kanaa bing ding pi sa thang lang Bakhou Pukraangba om ngam am ngaake.
42005018	Phaang ngo, habei ga mi nunna pum baang thinu pakhat ting baria bi thangluga pon hung rwe, banina bating Jisu meithaan bi ponkhut lang karam ngaake.
42005019	Atiyeda mi tam briakpina khutnu ngam maknu kaan bi banina in chung la kaluga naanu ding ga mi nun zai bi Jisu meithaan bi bakain riak ka basaamta rwe.
42005020	Jisu na bani balumsat ka munu kaan bi pum baang thinu manpa khou rinne, “He manpa, nanoh bing Eina kok thang rwe.”
42005021	Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna bani lungning bi kakhan ngaake, “Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat ongnuwa tubo? Rikrwang zana makka tuna noh bing ding kok thang ngamgabo?”
42005022	Atiyeda bani sung bi kakhan ongnu ga Jisu na theiluga bani khou rinne, “Pa-aam toga nani sung bi atiga kakhan ongnubo?
42005023	‘Nanoh bing ga kok thang rwe’ diga rinnu le ‘Lon thouluga sero’ dinu le ingaana bai inkubo?
42005024	Atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisana talei ram bi noh bing ding kok thang lang ngam amme dinu nanina thei lang nge.” Jisu na pum baang thinu khou rinne, “Eina nakhou rinnuwe, lon thouro, nakain riak ka lou thouluga nain la sero.”
42005025	Haba kahan bi ga maan lon thouluga baria lou thou rwe khatle Rikrwang ding swanga bain la thou dam ngaake.
42005026	Habei ga bani khangsung loh lo ga Rikrwang ding swanka ngaake khatle kachinuna sipka rinne, “Ani aniya tasiatnu khat mu rwe!”
42005027	Haba nung bi Jisu na se swaknu kaan bi Levi diga kounu ramkhai khomnu pakhat ramkhai khomnu in bi badung ongnu mu rwe. Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Anung suiro.”
42005028	Habei ga maanna baom pum brum thangsialuga, thouluga Jisu nung sui drwe.
42005029	Atiga Levi na bain bi Jisu lang balou pui khat rang swak ngaake. Ramkhai khomnu mi khang khatle katei rwan le diga sa lang ong kadoi ngaake.
42005030	Atiyeda bani om chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna Jisu om potroi rwan maitwang bi tu tu tam tamga rinne, “Nanina pa-aam toga ramkhai khomnu nun le noh mi nun le diga sa in bacham ongnubo?”
42005031	Habei ga Jisu na katake, “Pum sanu mi nun lang kathiam bathaang maake atiyeda naanu nun lang be bathaang amme.
42005032	Ei ririak senu nun ding kou lang hungnu make atiyeda noh mi nun ding sung le lang kou lang naye.”
42005033	Banina Jisu khou rinne, “John om potroi rwanna kalumsan katupe khatle hweini katupe, hadanga Pharisee rwan om potroi rwanna le towe atiyeda Naom potroi rwanna pa-aam to lang sa in ongnubo?”
42005034	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Tazwanpa baan rwan gana tazwanpa le diga ong bacham basaan bani kalumsannu ngambo?
42005035	Atiyeda tazwanpa ding ga bani khouna lou thou dam dingnu kaan ga hunglune; haba kaan bi bani kalumsanlune.”
42005036	Jisu na bani khou chongchat khatle rinne, “Pakhatchanale pwan kathan bina batut kaireluga pwan raan bi phot thang make; atiye dabe pwan kathan gana kani rwei ding to relune khatle pwan kathan bina kaire swaknu batut kale pwan raan ga le diga cha kale make.
42005037	Pakhatchanale drakha tui kathan ding zan mun khao raan bi thang make; ati make dabe drakha tui kathan gana zan mun khao raan ding ga pi pwak baklune atiga drakha tui ga lwang sate khatle zan mun khao ga le braanne.
42005038	Atiyeda drakha tui kathan ga zan mun khao kathan bi thang lang nge. Atiga kani rwei ga ri thang nge.
42005039	Drakha tui balui innu pakhatchanale barapka drakha tui kathan in nwamlaye; balangbe maanna rinne, ‘Drakha tui balui gana insaye.’ ”
42006001	Kamanu Sabbath nung kaninu Sabbath ni Jisu louzam bi serwan hung ngaake. Atiga Baom potroi rwanna gehu ui bathamluga bani kut pi banweiluga sa ngaake.
42006002	Habei ga Pharisee rwan mi kasemna bani khou rinne, “Nanina Sabbath ni pa-aam lang to sannu chwan to ongnubo?”
42006003	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “David khatle maan le ong bachamnu rwanna chaamnu kaan bi maanna pa-aam to dambo dinu nani pa makchungbo?
42006004	Maanna Rikrwang in bi khutluga tako rwan zana makka mi kateina sanu za maknu kat thangnu uilu ga louluga sa damme khatle maan le diga ong bachamnu mi nun lang le kasem pi damme.”
42006005	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Misa Sa Kapaisa heiya Sabbath om Pukraangba le rwe.”
42006006	Sabbath ni katei khat pi Jisu na synagogue pi khutluga bachu thang ong ngaake. Habei ga inchang kut lwamnu manpa khat am ngaake.
42006007	Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna Jisu ding koi zong langna haba manpa ding ga Sabbath ni pi sa thanglu dingmo diga phaang ong ngaake.
42006008	Atiyeda Jisu na bani sung ga thei briakpina kut lwamnu manpa khou rinne, “Lon thouluga mi nun zai bi thouhanno.” Habei ga maan thouhen rwe.
42006009	Atiga Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Ei nani khou chong khat ngaide: Sabbath ni kasanu chwan to lang zamo mak tabe kasianu chwan to lang zabo, mi pakhat om kum ding kan thang lang zamo mak tabe to braan lang zabo?”
42006010	Jisu na bani khangsung pek la phaang koiluga manpa khou rinne, “Nakut ka balaan swako.” Maanna balaan swaknu kaan bi bakut ka babaang khat ka danga sa bathiang rwe.
42006011	Atiyeda banina balung pwan takka Jisu ding pa-aam tonu za dingbo dinu lang bi chong kathui ong ngaake.
42006012	Haba kaan bi Jisu na rammwan la kalum lang se ngaake khatle Maan habei ga zingpha Rikrwang khou hweini kathangga ong ngaake.
42006013	Khwa baan swaknu kaan bi Maanna potroi rwan ding Bakhou kou hung rwe khatle bani lak pina mi pat somga kani ding ka thangluga bani ding chonglang rwan diga meng basak thang rwe:
42006014	Maanna Peter diga le kounu Simon le banao Andrew, James le John; Philip le Bartholomew;
42006015	Matthew le Thomas; Alphaeus sa kapaisa James khatle Zealot diga kounu Simon;
42006016	James sa kapaisa Judas khatle Bating zwansa ngaaknu Judas Iscariot ting kathang rwe.
42006017	Maanna potroi rwan le diga rammwan lana taluga bazwannu riak khat pi tahen rwe, habei ga potroi rwan mi khang pui le Judah taram, Jerusalem, Tyre le Sidon tuipui paan bing lana Bachong ngai lang khatle bani om kasa kanaa bing ding pi sa thang lang hung ngaake,
42006018	atiga bathiang maknu katha na rainu nun ding le Maanna pi sa thang ngaake.
42006019	Mi khang gana Bating banaan lang karam ngaake, balangbe Bakhouna ngam swakluga bani ding pi sa thang loi ngaake.
42006020	Habei ga Jisu na potroi rwan ding phaangluga rinne, “Lungsianu nani ga aih saye, Balangbe Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nani lang nge.
42006021	Atun bon chaam ga ongnu nani ga aih saye, Balangbe nani ding pi imba thanglune. Atun chap ongnu nani ga aih saye, Balangbe nani banui lune.
42006022	“Misa Sa Kapaisa om lang bina mi nunna nani ding batannu, Nani ding lang swaknu, Nani ding rin basiatnu Khatle nani meng sa make diga bathou satnu nani ga aih saye.
42006023	“Ha ni ga nani karoga kachok thouwo! Balangbe phaang ngo, tambaan la nani lang taswan lianne, Balangbe hadanga bani pu pa rwanna thiamting rwan ding to ngaake.
42006024	“Atiyeda lungsanu nani ga riangrenuweda, Balangbe nanina karo lozaang sanu lousu drwe.
42006025	“Bon imbanu nani ga riangrenuweda, Balangbe nani chaamnu doulune. Atun banui ongnu nani ga riangrenuweda, Balangbe nani banuiga nu hweinu khatle chapnu tolune.
42006026	“Mi bingna nani lang bi rinswannu lousunu nani ga riangrenuweda, Balangbe hadanga bani pu pa rwanna kakoinu thiamting rwan ding atiga to ngaake.
42006027	“Atiyeda Achong ngai ongnu nani khou Eina rinnuwe: Nani ding munanu nun ding kriang ngo, nani ding batannu mi nun khou kasanu to thangbiyo,
42006028	nani ding sengnu nun khou rithoi pi thangbiyo khatle nani ding batanga tonu nun lang kalum thangbiyo.
42006029	Nakabiang bang khat la kabengnu bakhou babaang khat kale kanei thangbiyo. Naom talathu pui lou damnu balaang naom talathu pi kaatnu to mako.
42006030	Nakhou ninu bing lang ga pi thangbiyo. Nakhouna naom pot lou thou damme dabe haga kalou lat mako.
42006031	Mi nunna nani khou pi to thang nwamnu bing ga nanina le bani khou to thangbiyo.
42006032	“Nanina nani ding kriangnuza ding kriang nge dabe, nani ding swanka lang pa-aam ambo? Balangbe noh mi nunna hakna bani ding kriangnu mi nun ding kriang nge.
42006033	Nani lang kasanu chwan to thangnu bani langza nanina kasanu to thang nge dabe, nani ding swanka lang pa-aam ambo? Balangbe noh mi nunna hakna haga le bachamga towe.
42006034	Nani lang banina thun latlune diga baningnu bani langza pi puk swake dabe, nani ding swanka lang pa-aam ambo? Balangbe noh mi nunna le ha bing ga lousu lat langna noh mi nun khou pi puk swake.
42006035	Atiyeda nani ding munanu nun ding ga kriang ngo, kasanu towo, nani lang lousu lat lang baning makka pi puk thangbiyo; habei ga naom taswan lianlune khatle nani Basaang Kataknu sa rwan tolune. Balangbe swanka thei maknu khatle sa maknu mi nun ding le Pukraangba na kriang nge.
42006036	Atibriakpina nani Pa na phaangkriang theinu ga danga, nanina le phaangkriang theiyo.
42006037	“Chong kasem mako atiye dabe nani ding chong kasemlaye. Pi koi mako atiye dabe nani ding pi koilaye. Kok thangbiyo atiye dabe nani ding kok thanglune.
42006038	Pi thangbiyo atiye dabe nani lang pi thanglune: badat chuiluga, namtaluga, kanuk kasimluga khatle liamtaga banina nani pam bi sung thanglune. Balangbe nanina badat tamnu chaang gana nani khou le badat latlune.”
42006039	Jisu na bani khou chongchat khatle rinne, “Mik chonuna mik chonu ding lampui kainu ngambo? Barwei pat ni khun bi ta thangbilabo?
42006040	Potroi khatna baom bachuthangnupa ma liannu make atiyeda mi bingza khopsaga talennu bingna baom bachuthangnupa danlune.
42006041	“Nangna namik pi amnu thingtum ding ga mu makka nau nanao mik pi amnu tamchin ding ga pa-aam to lang phaangnubo?
42006042	Mak tabe nangna namik pi amnu thingtum ding mu makka tatoga naunao khou ‘Aunao, namik pi amnu tamchin ga eina asat thangde’ diga rin langbo? Sathot tonu nang! Kama bi namik pi amnu thingtum ga asat kamawo atiye dabe naunao mik pi amnu tamchin ga asat lang bathiangga mulune.
42006043	“Balangbe kasanu thingkungna kasianu thakraa kraa make, hadanga kasianu thingkungna kasanu thakraa kraa make.
42006044	Balangbe thingkung ding bakraa bina theiye. Balangbe mi nunna kaling kung bina tacham kraa rai make khatle banina kaling daam bina drakha kraa rai make.
42006045	Kasanu mina basung bi thang kadoi ongnu kasanu bi gana kasanu phun swake khatle kasianu mina thang kadoi ongnu kasianu bi gana kasianu phun swake. Balangbe balungning bi sipka amnu bing ga bamun bi kabia swake.
42006046	“Eina rinnu chong ga to makka nanina Ating pa-aam lang ‘Pukraangba, Pukraangba’ diga kounubo?
42006047	Tudannu Akhou hungnu khatle Achong ngailuga tonu maan ga pa-aam le bachambo dinu Eina nani khou pi mu thangne:
42006048	maan ga lung chung bi khun chouthukluga in to thounu mi ga dannuwe. Tui lian hungnu kaan bi tui kabaapnu gana in ding ga rakanga hungtunnu kaan bi in ga tun kalingnu ngam make, balangbe haga lung chung bi to thounuwe.
42006049	Atiyeda Achong ngailuga to maknu maan ga inmun bacha makka talei bi in to thounu ga dannuwe, tui lian hungluga in ding ga rakanga hungtunnu kahan bi haga balumtaye. Haba in ga bao basiat takka bao rwe.”
42007001	Jisu na mi nun khou chong kabia taangnu kaan bi Maan Capernaum bi khut rwe.
42007002	Habei ga kraanmi razapuba na kriangnu baswak pakhat thi ding ga naa ong ngaake.
42007003	Kraanmi razapuba na Jisu om lang bi theisunu kaan bi Jisu na hungluga baswak ting pi sa thang lang, Jihudi rwan patso rwan ding Bakhou lang thang ngaake.
42007004	Atiga banina Jisu kim bi hungluga rinne, haba manpa lang ga Nangna to thang lang khopnu miye,
42007005	“Balangbe maan ani chaat ting kriang nge, maanna ani lang synagogue khat to thang nge.”
42007006	Habei ga Jisu na thouluga bani le diga se bacham rwe. Atiga Maan in ga tang lang nai hungnu kaan bi kraanmi razapuba na babaan rwan ding lang thangluga rinne, “Pukraangba, Nating to riangrelanro, balangbe Nang ain insung bi kaamkhut lang ei khopnu make.
42007007	Atibriakpina ei bahak le Nakhou hung lang khopnuwe diga baning make. Atiyeda chongkaang khatcha kabia thang ngo atiye dabe aswak ka sa damlune.
42007008	Balangbe ei le kangamnu pakhat thwei bi amnu athwei bi kraanmi rwan am ongnu zung nge. Atiga eina pakhat ting ‘Seyo,’ diye dabe maanna seye; katei pakhat ting ‘Hung ngo,’ diye dabe maanna hung nge khatle aswak khou ga ‘Heiya towo,’ diye dabe maanna haga towe.”
42007009	Hei bing nga Jisu na ngaisunu kaan bi Maan loh lo ga phaang koiluga Banung sui hungnu mi khang khou rinne, “Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Israel bi hei danga balumsat liannu Ei dou mak aang nge!”
42007010	Kraanmi razapuba om lang thangnu rwan gana in ga hung tangnu kaan bi naa ongnu swak ka sa lat ngaaknu hung dou rwe.
42007011	Inswan lampai Jisu na Nain diga kounu nampui la se ngaake; Baom potroi rwan khatle mi khangna le Banung sui se ngaake.
42007012	Maan nampui om kapan hung tang lang nai hungnu kaan bi phaang ngo, thinu mi pakhat pon swak ngaake, maan banu om khatchanu sa kapaisa ye khatle maan tameinu ngaake. Nampui om mi taswang khakna le banu le diga ong bacham ngaake.
42007013	Pukraangba na mannu ding ga munu kaan bi kriang thangga bakhou rinne, “Chap mako.”
42007014	Jisu na hungluga thingku ga banaannu kaan bi thingku ponnu nun ga han basak rwe. Maanna rinne, “Katangpa, Eina nakhou rinne, thouro.”
42007015	Thi damnu maan ga thou badungluga chong kabia thou rwe. Atiga Jisu na bating banu khou bachoi thang rwe.
42007016	Bani khangsung kachinuna sip rwe, banina Rikrwang lwat ting swanga rinne, “Thiamting kaliannu khat ani lak pi hung rwe!” khatle “Rikrwang na Bami nun ding hung phaang thang rwe!”
42007017	Jisu om cham ga Judea taram bing khatle amqwatnu taram bing la thei chang thou dam ngaak rwe.
42007018	Haba nung bi John om potroi rwanna swak tamnu lang bing ga John khou hung pu rwe. Jisu le Baptize
42007019	John na baom potroi pat ni ding bakhou kou hungluga Jisu khou atiga ngai lang rin rwe, “Hung dingnu Maan ga Nangrubo mak tabe anina mi katei pakhat ting ngaak lang maangbo?”
42007020	Potroi pat nina Jisu kim bi hungluga rinne, “Baptize to thangnu John na ani ding atiga ngai lang Nakhou lang hung nuwe, ‘Hung dingnu Khat ka Nangbo mak tabe anina katei pakhat ting ngaak lang maangbo?’ ”
42007021	Haba kahan bi ga Jisu na mi nun om tanat kasiana naanu, katha kasia khutnu rwan ding pi sa thang ngaake khatle mik chonu nun ding le pi mu thang ngaake.
42007022	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina seluga nanina phaangmu damnu khatle ngaisu damnu bing ga John khou bapuro: mik chonuna mu lat rwe, ket thoknuna se lat rwe; imphaannu rwan ga bathiang lat rwe, kana setnuna ngaisu lat rwe; thinuna ring thou lat rwe khatle lungsianu nun khou sacham kasam thang rwe.
42007023	Atiga Ariak pina ket basui maknu maan ga aih sanuwe.”
42007024	John om cham phunnu rwanna thou damnu kaan bi mi nun khou John om lang bi rin thou rwe, “Nanina ramhaang la pa-aam ding phaang lang se swaknubo? Thiraangna raang kaling ongnu tou kung ding gabo?
42007025	Atiyeda nani pa-aam ding phaang lang swaknubo? Banemnu pwan sin basoinu manpa ding gabo? Batak takka phaangsanu takungnu pwan sinnu nun khatle lozaan ga lungnu mi nun ga krwang in bi amme.
42007026	Atiyeda nani pa-aam ding phaang lang swaknubo? Thiamting khat tingbo? O, Eina nani khou rinnuwe, thiamting ma le inkunu Bating nge.
42007027	Atiga Balang bi hiak thang ngaaknu ga heiye, ‘Phaang ngo, Eina Nameithaan bi Nalampui bacha thang dingnu Achonglang ding lang thang nge.’
42007028	Balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, kamaisa nunna ponnu lak pi baptize to thangnu John ma lian inkunu thiamting khatchale maak maang nge; atiyeda Rikrwang om krwang talei la sin kataknu maan gana bama lian inkuwe.”
42007029	Mi bing khatle ramkhai khomnu nunna le Maanna rinnu ga ngaisunu kaan bi John om baptize tonu bi ga baptize to dam briakpina Rikrwang nga bazenuwe diga za rwe.
42007030	Atiyeda Pharisee rwan le chongtan theinu rwan nabe John khouna baptize to mak briakpina, Rikrwang om baningnu ding bani bapum bahak lang za dam make.
42007031	Pukraangba na rinne, “Heiba mikin om mi nun ding nga eina pa-aam le diga rin bachak langbo khatle baniya pa-aam danbo?
42007032	Bani khatna khat ting ‘Anina nani lang tamrwang sem thang nge, Atiyeda nanina laam make; Anina nani lang lungchung thang nge, Atiyeda nanina nu hwei make diga rinnu keithian bi badung ongnu naosen rwan ga dannuwe.’
42007033	Balangbe baptize to thangnu John na uilu le sa makka, drakha tui le in makka hung rwe khatle nanina rinne, ‘Bakhou ri kasia khut rwe,’
42007034	Misa Sa Kapaisa ga sa inluga hung rwe khatle nanina rinne, ‘Phaang ngo, taraonu le zu kalonuwe, ramkhai khomnu khatle noh mi nun baanne!’
42007035	Atiyeda ningting nga bazenuwe diga basa rwan bingna indao rwe.”
42007036	Pharisee rwan lak pi pakhatna Jisu ding maan le sa bacham lang talot ngaake. Atibriakpina Maan Pharisee in la seluga sa in lang badungta rwe.
42007037	Phaang ngo, namlian bi ga noh mi kamaisa khatna Jisu Pharisee in bi ga table kim bi badung ongme dinu maanna theinu kaan bi banamsanu thao thangnu alabaster tong khat phun hung rwe.
42007038	Kamaisa gana Jisu ket kim bi Banung la hanluga chap ngaake; Jisu ket ka bamikthina pi bazwan thangluga, balu samna kanun sat thang ngaake khatle Jisu ket ting kaputluga banamsanu thaona Baket pi kanun thang rwe.
42007039	Jisu ding talot ngaaknu Pharisee na haga munu kaan bi maanna baraanto atiga kakhan rwe, “Manpa heiya thiamting khat tabe kamaisa heiya tubo khatle Bating banaan ongnu kamaisa ga tatonubo dinu Maanna thei ngaak tingnuwe, balangbe kamaisa ga noh mi zung nge.”
42007040	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Simon, Ei nakhou rin lang kasem amme.” Habei ga maanna rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, rin thang ngo.”
42007041	“Tudannu sian pi puk swaknu khat om sian chaaknu pat ni am ngaake. Pakhatna denari raza impaang, pakhatna somnga chaak ngaake.
42007042	Barweina thun lang khatchale maaknu kaan bi maanna barwei ding bathaam kok thang rwe. Atibriakpina Akhou rinno, barwei lak pi ingaana bating kriang inkulu dingbo?”
42007043	Simon na katake, “Maanna inkuga kok thang damnu gaye diga eina baning nge.” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nang bazega chong kasem rwe.”
42007044	Jisu na kamaisa khou ga kanei khutluga Simon khou rinne, “Nang heiba kamaisa ding nga mubo? Ei nain bi khut rwe; Aket kasin lang nangna Alaang tui pi make atiyeda maanna bamikthina Aket kasin thangluga balu bi samna Aket kanun sat thang rwe.
42007045	Nangna Ating kaput thang make atiyeda heiba mannu heiyana Eina sekhut khap ti bina Aket ting kaput thangnu chat mak aang nge.
42007046	Nangna Alu bi thao tei thang make atiyeda heiba mannuna Aket pi banamsanu thao kanun thang nge.
42007047	Atibriakpina Eina nakhou rinnuwe, ba noh taswang khak ka kok thang rwe, balangbe maanna Ating taswang khak kriang rwe. Noh titcha kok thang damnu maan gana titcha kriang nge.”
42007048	Jisu na kamaisa khou ga rinne, “Nanoh bing ga kok thang rwe.”
42007049	Maan le diga sa in bacham ongnu nun gana bani cham atiga rin thou rwe, “Noh bing ding hakna kok thangnu Manpa heiya tubo?”
42007050	Habei ga Jisu na kamaisa khou rinne, “Nabalumsatna nating kan thang rwe. Dai bazaangga sero.”
42008001	Haba nung bi atiga swak ngaak rwe, Jisu na nampui bing khatle nam bing bi Rikrwang om krwang talei sacham kasam se ong ngaake. Atiga potroi pat somga kani ga le Maan le diga se bacham ngaake,
42008002	atiga katha kasia nunna khut ngaaknu khatle kasa kanaa bina pi sa thang damnu mannu rwan kasem: Bakhouna ri kasia siari swak tam ngaaknu Magdalene diga kounu Mary,
42008003	Herod om chwanlaang mi Chuza mei Joanna, Susanna khatle mannu katei rwanna bani lan phun swakluga Bating paang thang ngaake.
42008004	Atiga nampui bing lana mi khang pui tam takka kadoiluga Bakim bi hungnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou chongchak khat rinne:
42008005	“Tachi bwannu mi pakhatna baom tachi bwan lang se swak ngaake. Maanna tachi ga bwannu kaan bi tachi kasemna lampui paan bi ta thang nge; haga ketna kadim rwe khatle basaang la zwangnu basaa nunna haga sa sat trwe.
42008006	Kasemna lung lak pi ta thang nge; haga thou kanu le bazwannu baat briakpina baowei ta damme.
42008007	Kasemna kaling kung lak pi ta thang nge, kaling kung nun gana haga le thou ka bachamluga ha ding ga namdan damme.
42008008	Atiyeda katei rwanna talei kasanu riak pi ta thang nge, haga thou kaluga badam raza inkuga kraa rwe.” Maanna hei bing nga rin taangnu kaan bi Maanna paoga rinne, “Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo!”
42008009	Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou ngaiye, “Heiba chongchak om bakaba heiya pa-aambo?”
42008010	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani khou Rikrwang om krwang talei om inthim chong ga thei lang ngam pi thang rwe, Atiyeda Eina katei rwan khouba chongchak toga rin thang nge, ‘Banina muga muga mu mak lang khatle ngaiga ngaiga bakaba thei mak lang nge.’
42008011	“Chongchak om bakaba ga heiye: tachi ga Rikrwang om chongkaang nge.
42008012	Lampui paan bi ta thangnu bamu rwan gana Rikrwang chong ngaisu damnu rwan gaye; haba nung bi Diabol na hungluga banina balumsaluga kanthangnu lousu mak lang, chongkaang ga bani sung bina lou sat tamme.
42008013	“Lung lak pi ta thangnu bamu rwan gana, Rikrwang chong ga ngaisunu kaan bi karoga lou thangnu rwan gaye; bani bakamong tathuk make, banina bakaan kasem balumsaluga tamphaangnu kaan bi balum damme.
42008014	Kaling kung lak pi ta thangnu bamu rwan gana, ngaisuluga se swak pi lungning om katopnu, lan khatle kum om karo rangaana namdanne khatle bapung phanu kraa kraa make.
42008015	Atiyeda talei kasa bi ta thangnu bamu rwan gana sung bathiangga, sung sanuna, Rikrwang chong ga ngaisuluga Bachong ga ri thang nge khatle khaang theinu le bachamga bakraa ga kraa rwe.
42008016	“Pakhatchanale thaomei taanluga lukleina run thang make mak tabe haga ria thwei bi thang make atiyeda sekhutnu mi nunna babaan ga mu dam lang, thaomei ga ba badung riak pi thang nge.
42008017	Balangbe indao swakla dingnu inkam thangnu khatchale maake; atiga pi thei mak tingnu khatle babaan bi indao swakla dingnu inthim thangnu khatchale maake.
42008018	Atibriakpina nanina tatoga ngai ongnu cheksinno. Balangbe tudannu ka amnu bakhou ga inkuga pi thanglune; atiyeda maaknu bakhouna amme diga baning ongnu ga tangga bakhouna lou sat tamlune.”
42008019	Haba nung bi Jisu nu le Banao kapaisa rwan Bakhou hung ngaake, mi khang tam briakpina banina Bakim bi khuttangnu ngam mak ngaake.
42008020	Tudannu pakhatna Jisu khou rinne, “Nanu le Nanao kapaisa rwanna Nating kadou nwamga langkaang la han ongme.”
42008021	Atiyeda Maanna bani khou katake, “Rikrwang chong ngaisunu khatle haga zeinu bani ga Anu le Anao kapaisa rwanne.”
42008022	Kani khat Maan Baom potroi rwan le diga li bi ong ong ngaake. Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ani tuipui raan khat la takan swakcho.” Habei ga bani li hwanluga se swak ngaak rwe.
42008023	Banina li hwanluga se ong bi Maan inthi thou dam ngaak rwe. Haba tuipui bi thiraang thirwei hung rwe, li ga tuina lem hung rwe khatle bani aih sianu dou ngaak rwe.
42008024	Potroi rwanna Jisu kim bi hungluga Bating bathouga rinne, “Bapuba, Bapuba, ani braan ding rwe!” Habei ga Maan thouluga thiraang le tui kabaapnu ding ga twei rwe. Atiga ha bing ga rim rim ta drwe khatle bazaang ta drwe.
42008025	Maanna potroi rwan khou rinne, “Nani balumsat ingaabo?” Bani kachiga khatle loh lo ga khatna khat khou rinne, “Maan tatonu Mi ngaak tingbo? Thiraang le tui ding tangga Maanna zathang piye khatle banina Bachong zeiye!”
42008026	Banina Galilee tuipui raan la amnu Gadarenes taram la li hwanluga hung rwe.
42008027	Habei ga Jisu na li bina talei bi takhap tinu kaan bi haba nampui bi gana tudannu bakhwa seiga ri kasia nun khutnu manpa pakhatna Maan le diga kadou rwe. Maan pwan le sin basoi make, in bi le ong make atiyeda thaanmwan la ong ngaake.
42008028	Maanna Jisu ding munu kaan bi baraam basaangga paoluga Bameithaan bi hung in balumta rwe khatle pao rakanga rinne, “Basaang Kataknu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa Jisu, Nang le ei paaam barui bazem ambo? Ating rai thang mak lang eina Nating hweiye!”
42008029	Balangbe Jisu na bathiang maknu katha ding ga haba manpa khouna swak tam lang zathang pi ngaake. Bathiang maknu katha gana bating katupka nam ngaake khatle mi nunna bating thin rui le parei ruina bang thangluga rangkaan ngaake; atiyeda bang thangnu ga maanna kaichat katup sate khatle ri kasia gana bating ramhaang la kazun sat ngaake.
42008030	Jisu na bakhou ngaiye, “Nameng tato koubo?” Maanna katake, “Legion,” balangbe bakhou ri kasia taswang khak khut ngaake.
42008031	Jisu na bani ding bakalan maaknu khun bi se lang zathang pi thang mak lang ri kasia nun gana Bakhou hwei ngaake.
42008032	Atiga bok nun khatna rammwan la basaak timsa ong ngaake. Atiga Jisu na bani ding bok nun khou pi khut thang lang katha kasia nun gana Bakhou hwei ngaake. Maanna bani ding za thang rwe.
42008033	Habei ga ri kasia nun gana manpa khouna swakluga bok nun khou ga khut rwe khatle bok nun ga batok bariak thei makka rakanga pak tasuk taluga tuipui la ta imphum ngaake.
42008034	Bok sian ngaaknu nun gana swak tamnu om lang bing ga munu kaan bi pak seluga nampui la khatle taram la cham ga bapu ngaake.
42008035	Mi nunna swak tamnu ga phaang lang swak rwe khatle bani nun Jisu kim bi hungnu kaan bi ri kasia nun swak tamnu manpa ga pwan sinluga mi tak imbeiga Jisu ket kim bi badung ong ngaaknu dou rwe. Atiga bani kachi ngaake.
42008036	Haga phaangmu damnu nunna le ri kasia khut ngaaknu manpa ga Jisu na tatoga pi sa thang dambo dinu bani khou rin thang rwe.
42008037	Habei ga Gadarenes om am qwatnu taram bi mi bingna bani ding bathan thangsialuga se dam lang hwei ngaake, balangbe bani kachi tak ngaak rwe. Atiga Jisu li hwanluga han thou drwe.
42008038	Bakhouna ri kasia nun swak tamnu manpa gana Jisu le se bacham lang rakanga hwei ngaake. Atiyeda Jisu na bating heiba chong nga rinluga bathan thang ngaake,
42008039	“Nain la han latluga Rikrwang na nalaang intia liannu chwan to thang dambo dinu barinro.” Habei ga maanna seluga Jisu na balaang tasiatnu chwan to thang damnu lang bi nampui bariak thin rin indao ngaak rwe.
42008040	Jisu na han hung latnu kaan bi mi khangna Jisu ding karoga kadou thang rwe, balangbe bani mi bingna Bating ngaakka ong ngaake.
42008041	Phaang ngo, Jairus tiga kounu manpa pakhat hung rwe, maan synagogue om kaithangnupa ngaake. Maanna Jisu ket pi in bakhup taluga Bating bain la hung lang rakanga kalumga rin ngaake,
42008042	balangbe basa sangwan somga kani khak tangnu khat tak khatchanu kamaisa ga thi dingga ong ngaak rwe. Atiyeda Jisu na se hungnu kaan bi mi khangna Bating sui bwat ong ngaake.
42008043	Atiga sangwan somga kani thi se ongnu mannu pakhat am ngaake, maan sa ring dingnu lan bing tanat phaangnu rwan khou ting ngaak peida pakhatchanale bating pi sanu ngam maknu
42008044	mannuna Jisu nung la hungluga Bapwan taki banaan ngaake. Atiga haba kahan bi gana thi senu ga lan drwe.
42008045	Jisu na rinne, “Tuna Ating banaannubo?” Mi nunna banaan make diga rinnu kaan bi Peter khatle maan le se bachamnu rwanna rinne, “Bapuba, mi khangna Nating sui bwatluga banaan ongme khatle Nangna rinne, ‘Ating tuna banaannubo?’ ”
42008046	Atiyeda Jisu na rinne, “Tudannu pakhatna Ating banaan rwe, balangbe Akhouna ngam swak tamnu Eina thei rwe.”
42008047	Kamaisa gana maan inkam ngamla rwe dinu theiluga maan kathokka hung rwe khatle Jisu meithaan bi in bakhup taluga Bating pa-aam lang banaannubo khatle maan barapka sa damnu lang bi maanna mi nun meithaan bi rin swak rwe.
42008048	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Asa kamaisa, karowo; nabalumsat paan bina nating pi sa thang rwe. Dai bazaangga sero.”
42008049	Maanna chong kabia ongnu kaan bi synagogue om kaithangnupa Jairus in lana tupai pakhat hungluga bakhou rinne, “Nasa kamaisa ga thi drwe. Bachuthangnupa ding to katoplanro.”
42008050	Atiyeda Jisu na haga ngaisunu kaan bi bakhou rinne, “Kachi mako; balumba balumsawo, bating pi sa thangne.”
42008051	Jisu na Jairus in bi hung tangnu kaan bi Maanna Peter, James, John khatle rangaaknu banu le bapa ding makka mi katei pakhatcha ding hakna insung bi pi khut mak ngaake.
42008052	Mi bingna balaang zana chapka khatle nu hweiga ong ngaake; atiyeda Jisu na rinne, “Chap mako; maan thi make atiyeda in ongnu zung nge.”
42008053	Maan thi drwe dinu theiluga banina Jisu ding balaa ga banui ngaake.
42008054	Jisu na bani mi bing ding langkaang la pi swak loiluga bakut choiluga kouga rinne, “Kamaisa swan, lon thouro.”
42008055	Atiga bakatha ga bakhou han hung latluga haba kahan bi maan lon thou rwe. Atiga balaang sa lang kasem pi thangbiyo diga Jisu na bani khou zathang pi thang rwe.
42008056	Kamaisa swan banu le bapa ga loh lo rwe atiyeda Jisu na swak tamnu om lang bi pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako diga katip thang ngaake.
42009001	Haba nung bi Jisu na Baom potroi pat somga kani ding kou kadoiluga ri kasia bing ding kazun sat lang khatle tanat bachaat bing ding pi sa thang lang, bani khou ngam khatle nat pi thang rwe.
42009002	Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi kasam lang khatle kasa kanaa ding pi sa thang lang Maanna bani ding lang thang rwe.
42009003	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani bazin lamsek lang sungrwan, khao, uilu mak tabe sian phun mako; talathu kani phun mako.
42009004	Nanina khutnu in bi ga se swak lat mak basaan habei ga ong ngo.
42009005	Tudannuna nani ding loukhut thang make dabe, nanina haba namlian bi gana se swaknu kaan bi bani maitwang bi sake toga nani ket pi kaphut ka kathing ta basiawo.”
42009006	Atiga banina se swakluga nampui bing bi seluga, bariak thin sacham kasam thang rwe khatle kasa kanaa ding pi sa thang rwe.
42009007	Jisu na to damnu chwan bing ga Herod Tetrarch na ngaisunu kaan bi maan batok theilan rwe, balangbe John thi bina ring thou lat rwe diga mi kasemna rin ngaake,
42009008	kasemna Elijah bapum bahak hung thang rwe diga rin ngaake khatle kasemna kama nana thiamting rwan lak pi pakhat ring thou lat rwe diga rin ngaake.
42009009	Herod na rinne, “John dingba eina baring tan drwe atiyeda eina ngaisu ongnuwa tu om lang bibo?” Habei ga maanna Jisu ding kadou lang karam ngaake.
42009010	Chonglang rwanna han hung latnu kaan bi banina to damnu bing Jisu khou hung pu rwe. Atiga Maanna bani ding kalwangluga tei toga Bethsaida kounu nampui om mi chiknu riak la thou drwe.
42009011	Atiyeda mi khangna haga theinu kaan bi banina Banung suizon se ngaake; Maanna bani ding loukhut thangluga Rikrwang om krwang talei sacham lang bi kasamthang rwe khatle kasa kanaa pi sa thang lang bathaang amnu nun ding le pi sa thang rwe.
42009012	Lumik ta lang nainu kaan bi potroi pat somga kani gana hungluga Bakhou rinne, “Mi khang ding nga amqwatnu nampui le nampaan la seluga kaong riak khatle thaisaak lousu dam lang bathan thang dro; balangbe ani mi chiknu riak pi ongme.”
42009013	Atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina bani lang sa lang kasem pi thangbiyo.” Banina rinne, “Anina seluga heiba mi nun lang thaisaak kalei make dabe ani khou uilu impaang le ngaa kaniza makka katei khatchale maake.”
42009014	Balangbe habei ga kapaisa mi raching impaang khak am ngaake. Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Bani ding mi somnga somnga om baren toga pi ongtaro.”
42009015	Banina haga danga khangsung ding pi ongta rwe.
42009016	Haba nung bi Maanna uilu impaang le ngaa kani ga louluga tambaan la batou kaluga rithoi thang rwe khatle haga thiak bakluga bani khou kasem thang lang potroi rwan khou pi rwe.
42009017	Bani khangsung saluga imba rwe khatle banina baleinu katupka luklei somga kani khom thou rwe.
42009018	Kani khat Jisu Baraantoza kalum ongnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwan ga Maan le diga ong bacham ngaake atiga Maanna bani khou ngaiye, “Mi nunna Ating Tu we diga rinbo?”
42009019	Banina katake, “Baptize to thangnu John ne, kasemna Elijah ye khatle katei rwanna kama nana thiamting rwan lak pina pakhat ring thou latnuwe diga rinne.”
42009020	Maanna ngaiye, “Atiyeda nanina Eiya Tu we dibo?” Peter na katake, “Nang Rikrwang om Christa gaye.”
42009021	Jisu na bani khou pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mak lang zathang pi thangluga rakanga katip thang rwe.
42009022	Maanna rinne, “Misa Sa Kapaisa ga riangrenu taswang khak khaanglu rwe, atiga patso rwan, takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna za mak lune khatle Bating athatlu rwe atiyeda ni thum ni ring thou latlune.”
42009023	Maanna bani khangsung khou rinne, “Tudannuna Anung sui nwamme dabe, baraanto bating za mak ting ngo khatle baom cross ka kani bathin lou thouluga Anung sui ding ngo.
42009024	Balangbe tudannu bakatha ding kan nwamnu maan ga baraanlune atiyeda Alaang chungna bakatha braannu mi gana bakatha kanthangnu lousulune.
42009025	Balangbe mi khatna talei ram bing balaang lousuluga bapum bahak braanne dabe mak tabe bazwan sate dabe balaang paaam tongnu ambo?
