42009026	Tudannu Alaangna khatle Achongkaang rwan lang bi kazaknu bating ga Misa Sa Kapaisana Baom, Pa om khatle bathiangnu tambaan chonglang rwan om lwat lian bi hungnu kaan bi balang bi kazaklune.
42009027	Atiyeda Eina nani khou bazega rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga ngam lianga hungnu banina mu mak basaan thinu batemla dingnu mi kasem abeiya han ongme.”
42009028	Heiya rin taangnu ni kariat nung bi Maanna Peter, John khatle James ting kalwangluga kalum lang rammwan la ka ngaake.
42009029	Maanna kalum ong bi man gon swak rwe, Bapwan ga ngou swak rwe khatle baan chan chan swak rwe.
42009030	Phaang ngo, manpa pat ni Maan le diga chong kabia ong ngaake, bani ga Moses le Elijah ye,
42009031	bani ding lwat liannu bi pi mu thangga Maanna Jerusalem bi pi hung tang dingnu dinuba Maanna thi dingnu lang bi banina kabia ngaake.
42009032	Atiyeda Peter khatle maan le ong bachamnu nun ga inthi chui takka in ong ngaake; banina barak swaknu kaan bi Balwat liannu khatle Maan le han bacham ongnu pat ni ding mu rwe.
42009033	Pat ni ga Maan le kapaangna Peter na Jisu khou rinne, “Bapuba, ani abeiya ongnuna sa rwe; anina pwan in inthum: Nalaang khat, Moses lang khat atiluga Elijah lang khat bacharizo.” Maanna kabia ongnu ga pa-aambo dinu maan thei mak ngaake.
42009034	Peter na atiga rin ongnu kaan bi tambu doi khat zwang hungluga bani ding hwam lem rwe khatle bani nun tambu lak pi khutnu kaan bi bani kachi tak ngaake.
42009035	Atiga tambu lak pina khwan khatna rinne, “Heiya Eina kriangnu Asa Kapaisa ye. Maanna rinnu zeiyo!”
42009036	Khwan gana lan damnu kaan bi Jisu raantoza am ngaak rwe. Atiyeda potroi rwan ga thiap thiapka ong ngaake khatle banina mu damnu ga haba kaan bi pakhatcha khou le rin swak mak ngaake.
42009037	Inswan lampai banina rammwan lana tanu kaan bi mi khang puina Bating kadou ngaake.
42009038	Haba kahan bi ga mi khang lak pi manpa pakhatna paoga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, eina Nating rakanga hweiye, asa kapaisa ding phaang thang ngo, balangbe maan khat tak khatchanu asaye.
42009039	Phaang ngo, katha khatna bating namluga thei mak daakka maanna pao rwe; hagana bating pi kathoke khatle babachinphon pi swake, heiyana bating pi liam basiat thangluga bakhouna swak kaat takka swake.
42009040	Atibriakpina eina Naom potroi rwan khou kathaga kazun sat lang hweini ngaake atiyeda banina ngam make.”
42009041	Habei ga Jisu na katake, “He balumsat maaknu khatle lampui maannu mikin ga, Ei nani le diga inchan tangga ong bachamluga khaang lang maangbo? Nasa kapaisa ding ga abeiya phun hung ngo.”
42009042	Maanna se hungnu kaan bi ri kasia gana bating nam balumtaluga pi kathok rwe. Habei ga Jisu na bathiang maknu katha ding tweiluga naosen ding ga pi sa thang rwe khatle bapa khou pi thang lat rwe.
42009043	Atiga Rikrwang om ngam liannu bi bani khangsung loh lo rwe. Atiyeda Jisu na to damnu chwan bi ga bani mi bing loh lo ongnu kaan bi Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou rinne,
42009044	“Heiba chong bing nga nani ngai minno, balangbe Misa Sa Kapaisa ding mi nun kut pi pi swak ting rwe.”
42009045	Atiyeda rin ongnu chong nga bani bakaba thei mak ngaake khatle haga banina bakaba thei mak lang bani khouna inkam thang ngaake khatle rin ongnu lang bi banina Bakhou ngai kachi ngaake.
42009046	Potroi rwan lak pi tuna lian kataknu tolu dingbo dinu lang bi bani kae kale thou rwe.
42009047	Jisu na bani sung baningga theiluga kasinnu naosen khat ting kou hungluga Bakim bi pi badung thang rwe,
42009048	atiga bani khou rinne, “Tudannu pakhatna Ameng bi heiba kasinnu naosen ding nga lou thangnu maan ga Ating lou thangnuwe khatle tudannu pakhatna Ating lou thangnu maan ga Ating lang hungnu Bating lou thangnuwe. Balangbe Nani lak pi sin kataknu maan gana lian inkulune.”
42009049	Habei ga John na katake, “Bapuba, tudannu pakhatna Nameng bi ri kasia nun ding kazun satnu anina mu ngaake atiga maan ani nung sui mak briakpina bating anina khaam ngaake.”
42009050	Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Bating khaam mako, balangbe ani maitwang bi han maknu maan ga ani pek la mi zung nge.”
42009051	Jisu na tambaan ka dingnu dat ka nai hungnu kaan bi Maan Jerusalem la se lang Basung han rwe
42009052	khatle cham phunnu rwan ding Bameithaan lang thang rwe. Balaang bariak daan thang lang banina seluga Samaria rwan nam khat pi khut rwe.
42009053	Atiyeda Maan Jerusalem la se ong briakpina habei ga ongnu mi nunna Bating lou thang mak ngaake.
42009054	Baom potroi rwan James le John na haga munu kaan bi barweina rinne, “Pukraangba, Elijah na to damnu ga danga bani ding to braan lang anina tambaan lana mei pi ta lang zathang pinu Nang bathaibo?”
42009055	Atiyeda Maanna kanei swakluga barwei ding tweiga rinne, “Nani tatonu Katha om mibo dinu nani thei make.
42009056	Balangbe Misa Sa Kapaisa ga mi nun kum ding to braan lang hungnu make atiyeda bani ding kan thang lang naye.” Habei gana bani nam katei la thou lat trwe.
42009057	Banina lampui bi se ongnu kaan bi tudannu pakhatna Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nangna senu riak bing bi ei le Nanung suisene.”
42009058	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Lousa ui nun lang bain amme khatle basaang la basa nun lang le bani kabu amme atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisa langba balu inbei ta lang bariak maake.”
42009059	Jisu na katei pakhat khou rinne, “Anung suiro.” Atiyeda maanna rinne, “Pukraangba, apa ding rise kama lang ating za thang ngo.”
42009060	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Thinu nunna bani om kathinu nun ding ga kairi dam ding ngo atiyeda nangna seluga Rikrwang om krwang talei ding kasamro.”
42009061	Kateina le rinne, “Pukraangba, ei Nanung suine atiyeda ei ain la ongnu mi nun ding kapaang chong rinse kama maangde.”
42009062	Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Langkon bi bakut choiluga nung la kanei phaangnu maan ga Rikrwang om krwang talei lang khop make.”
42010001	Heiba chong bing kabia taangnu nung bi Pukraangba na katei mi somsiari ding le ka thang rwe, atiga bani ding pat ni pat ni toga Bameithaan pi se kamaga namlian bing bi khatle Maanna se thang dingnu bariak bing la bathan thang ngaake.
42010002	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Batak takka lou aat lang amsip am rwe atiyeda chwantok mi tomme; atibriakpina Balou bi chwantok mi nun bathan hung lang Lou aatpuba khou hweiniyo.
42010003	Nani sero; phaang ngo, Eina nani ding tangiya nun lak pi zao swan ding danga bathan thangnuwe.
42010004	Sian khao, khao mak tabe ketthop phunluga se mako khatle lampui bi pakhatcha ding hakna kabia mako.
42010005	“Atiyeda nanina khutnu in bi ga kamaga rinno, ‘Heiba in bi dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.’
42010006	Haba riak pi ga dai bazaangnu sa kapaisa am ngaake dabe nani om dai bazaangnu ga bakhou amlune; atiyeda dai bazaangnu maak ngaake dabe haga nani khou han hung latlune.
42010007	Haba in bi ga banina kapi kapinu ga sa in ga ong ngo, balangbe chwantok mi ga balo man phang lang khopnuwe. In khat pina in khat la se mako.
42010008	“Nanina khutnu nampui bi ga banina nani ding lou thang nge dabe, nani meithaan bi thangnu ga sawo.
42010009	Haba riak pi amnu naanu ding pi sawo khatle bani khou rinno, ‘Rikrwang om krwang talei ya nani khou nai rwe.’
42010010	Atiyeda nanina khutnu nampui bi ga banina nani ding lou thang make dabe, haba nampui om lampui bing bi seluga rinno,
42010011	‘Ani ket pi teinu nani nampui om kaphut heiya nani maitwang bi kathing ta rwe. Atiyeda Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nani khou nai rwe dinu theiyo.’
42010012	Atiga Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Chongtok ni Sodom na haba nampui ma khaangsa inkulune.
42010013	“Chorazin, nang aih sianuweda! Bethsaida, nang aih sianuweda! Balangbe nani khou to damnu tasiatnu chwan ga Tyre le Sidon bi to thang ngaake dabe banina bora pwan sin basoiluga khatle kaphut lak pi badungluga kamana sung le ngaak tingnuwe.
42010014	Atiyeda chong kasemnu bi Tyre le Sidon na nani ma khaangsalune.
42010015	Capernaum, tambaan tangga kai basaang ka thangnu nang, kathi ram bi kaita thanglune;
42010016	“Nani chong ngainu maan ga Achong ngainuwe, nani ding za maknu maan ga Ating za maknuwe khatle Ating za maknu maan ga Ating lang hungnu Bating za maknuwe.”
42010017	Haba nung bi mi pat somsiari gana karo karoga han hungluga rin rwe, “Pukraangba, Nameng bina ri kasia nun tangga ani thwei bi khut rwe.”
42010018	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Khwa bathaaknu danga Seitaan na tambaan lana tanu eina mu rwe.
42010019	Phaang ngo, barun le ri ai nun ding kadim dan lang khatle munanu nun om ngam bing lu chung bi ngam lang Eina nani khou ngam pi thang rwe, atiga pa-aam aamna ngaakle nani ding khatchale pi liamlaye.
42010020	Atiyeda katha bing ga nani thwei bi khut rwe diga karo mako atiyeda nani meng tambaan la hiak thang drwe diga karowo.”
42010021	Haba chakrin bi ga Jisu na Katha paanna karoga rinne, “He Apa, tambaan le talei om Pukraangba, Eina Nating swankaye, balangbe hei bing nga Nangna ningtingnu le katheinu mi nun khouna inkam thang rwe khatle haga naosen rwan khou indao thang rwe. O, Apa, balangbe haga Namikphaang bi pemnuwe.
42010022	Apana balang bingza Akhou bachoi thang rwe, Pa ga makka Sa Kapaisa ga tubo dinu pakhatchanale thei make, Pa ga tubo dinu Sa Kapaisa khatle Sa Kapaisana indao thang nwamnu maanza gana theiye.”
42010023	Maanna potroi rwan khou kanei khutluga inthimthwei toga rinne, “Nanina mu damnu bing ding phaangmunu mik ka aih sanuwe;
42010024	balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, thiamting taswang khakna khatle krwang bingna le nanina mu ongnu bing ga mu nwam ngaake atiyeda banina mu dam make khatle nanina ngaisu ongnu ga ngai nwam ngaake atiyeda haga ngaisu dam make.”
42010025	Phaang ngo, chongsem theinu pakhatna han thouluga Bating tamga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, ringzoknu kum lousu lang eina pa-aam to langbo?”
42010026	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Chongtan bi ga pa-aam hiak thang ambo? Nang haga tatoga pabo?”
42010027	Maanna katake, “ ‘Nangna Pukraangba Narikrwang ding nasung bing, nakatha bing khatle nanat bing khatle nalungning bingna kriang ding gaye’ khatle ‘Nainnai lounai ding nazan bahak ting danga kriang ding gaye.’ ”
42010028	Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna bazega katak rwe; haga towo khatle nang ringlune.”
42010029	Atiyeda maanna bazan ding bazenu mi pi to nwamga Jisu khou rinne, “A innai lounai zo tubo?”
42010030	Jisu na katake, “Tudannu manpa pakhat Jerusalem lana Jericho la setanu kaan bi maan kasut sanu mi nun kut pi ta thang rwe, banina bapwan kasut rwe khatle bating thina na lang bwei bazam thangsialuga thou drwe.
42010031	Haba kahan bi ga badou chaga tudannu tako pakhat haba lampui bi ga seta rwe. Tako gana bating munu kaan bi maan lampui kom la sepen thou drwe.
42010032	Hadanga Levi rwan manpa khatle haba riak pi ga hungluga bating munu kaan bi lampui kom la sepen thou drwe.
42010033	Atiyeda Samaria rwan manpa khat bazin se hungnu kaan bi haba manpa kim bi hung ngaake. Maanna haba manpa ding ga phaangmunu kaan bi bakhou kriangnu am rwe.
42010034	Atiga maanna bakim bi hungluga baom bazam bing bi ga drakha tui le thao sung thangluga pwanna kazwan thang rwe khatle maanna haba manpa ding baom khouring chung bi pi ong thangluga, man in riak in khat pi phun hungluga chwanlaang to thang rwe.
42010035	Inswan lampai, maan se thouna maanna denari kani lou swakluga in riakpuba khou pi luga rinne, ‘Heiba manpa ding nga kungga phaangsin thang ngo khatle nangna ting thang inku damnu sian ga, eina hung latnu kaan bi eina nalaang thun thangne.’
42010036	“Atiga baruksaak mi nun kut pi ta thang ngaaknu manpa om innai lounai ya bani pat thum lak pi tu we diga nang baningbo?”
42010037	Chongsem theinu pa gana rinne, “Bating phaangkriang thang ngaaknu maan gaye.” Habei ga Jisu na rinne, “Sero khatle nang le hadanga toro.”
42010038	Banina se hungnu kaan bi Jisu na nam khat pi khut ngaake khatle tudannu Martha diga kounu mannu pakhatna Bating karo karoga bain bi loukhut thang rwe.
42010039	Mary diga kounu banao khat am ngaake, maan le Jisu ket kim bi badungluga Bachong ngai ong ngaake.
42010040	Atiyeda Martha bachwan tamlai briakpina sung katop ngaak rwe, maanna Jisu kim bi hungluga rinne, “Pukraangba, anaona araantoza chwan to lang asat thang rwe dinu Nang thei makpo? Atibriakpina ating paang thang lang bating rin thang ngo.”
42010041	Jisu na bakhou katake, “Martha, Martha, nang balang taswang khak lang bi sung katop rwe khatle riangre rwe.
42010042	Atiyeda bathaang amnu khatcha amme, bakhouna lou sat lat mak tingnu kasanu dam ga Mary na ka thang rwe.”
42011001	Jisu na bariak khat pi kalum ong bi atiga swak ngaake, Maanna kalum taangnu kaan bi Baom potroi pakhatna Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, John na le baom potroi rwan lang kalum bachu thangnu danga, ani lang le kalum bachu thang ngo.”
42011002	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina kalumnu kaan bi hei danga rinno: Tambaan la ongnu ani Pa, Nameng bathiangnu to ding ngo. Nakrwang talei hung ding ngo. Tambaan la Nangna baningnu tonu danga talei ram bi le to ding ngo.
42011003	Kani bathin ani lang ni khat lang khopnu thaisaak pi thang ngo.
42011004	Ani noh bing kok thang ngo, Balangbe anina le ani khou lei chaaknu bing ding kok thang nge. Ani ding bathemnu bi pi ta thang mako, Atiyeda kasianu bina ani ding kan thang ngo.”
42011005	Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani lak pi tudannu pakhat om baan khat amme diga baningzo, maanna zingpha inmik kasia bi babaanpa khou seluga bakhou rinne, ‘Abaan, ei uilu inthumza puk kamde;
42011006	balangbe bazin senu abaan khat akim bi hung riak ongme atiga balaang pi sa pi in lang akhou khatchale maak rwe’;
42011007	maanna insung lana katake, ‘Ating to chana lanro; inkhaan khaan drwe khatle asa rwan le ei le diga ria chung bi ong rwe; Eina lon thouluga nalaang pinu ngamla rwe.’
42011008	Eina nani khou rinnuwe, maan ga babaanpa ye di ngaak peida lon thouluga pi dam make, atiyeda maanna ni lat lat ong briakpina maanna lon thouluga balaang bathaang amnu bing pi thanglune.
42011009	“Atibriakpina Eina nani khou rinnuwe, niyo khatle haga nani lang pi thanglune; zong ngo khatle nanina zongsulune; inkhaan bachuwo khatle nani lang lat thanglune.
42011010	Balangbe ninu mi bingna lousuwe, zongnu maan gana zongsuwe khatle inkhaan bachunu balaang ga lat thanglune.
42011011	Nani lak pi tudannu pa khat khou sa kapaisana uilu niye dabe, maanna balaang lung pi lu dingbo? Mak tabe maanna ngaa niye dabe, maanna balaang ngaa hut lang barun pi lu dingbo?
42011012	“Mak tabe maanna aantui niye dabe, maanna balaang ri ai pi lu dingbo?
42011013	Nani nun, sa maknu mi ngaak peida, nani sa rwan lang tatoga kasanu leithwan pi dingbo dinu theiye dabe, tambaan la ongnu nani Pa na Bakhou ninu bani khou intia inkuga Katha Bathiangnu pi thanglu dingbo!”
42011014	Jisu na ri kasia khat kazun sat ngaake, haga chong swak maknu ri kasia ngaake. Ri kasia ga swak tamnu kaan bi chong swak maknu maan ga chong kabia rwe; habei ga mi khang ga loh lo ngaake.
42011015	Atiyeda mi kasemna rinne, “Ri kasia nun om bapuba Beelzebub paan bina Maanna ri kasia nun ding bathou satnuwe.”
42011016	Kateina Bating tamga tambaan lana badannu khat pi mu thang lang Bakhou ni ngaake.
42011017	Atiyeda Maanna bani sung ga theiluga, bani khou rinne, “Bani bahak om maitwang bi khak langnu krwang talei bing braan lune khatle bani bahak maitwang bi khak langnu inkhun bing ga raita lune.
42011018	Seitaan na le baraanto bamaitwang bi khak lang swake dabe, bakrwang talei ga tatoga hannu ngam dingbo? Balangbe Eina Beelzebub paan bina ri kasia nun ding bathou satnuwe diga nanina rinne.
42011019	Eina Beelzebub paan bina ri kasia nun ding kazun sate dabe, nani sa kapaisa rwanna bani ding tu paan bina kazun satnubo? Atibriakpina bani ga nani om chongsempuba rwan tolune.
42011020	Atiyeda Eina ri kasia nun ding Rikrwang kutzung paan bina kazun sate dabe, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nani khou hungnu rwe.
42011021	Kraan pon naat sin basoi bachangnu, kanatnu manpa khatna bain ga rangkaanne dabe, baom pot bing ga saga amlune.
42011022	Atiyeda bama nat inkunu tudannu pakhatna Bakim bi hungluga bating ngamnu kaan bi maanna balumsa ngaaknu kraan kutchoi ga bakhouna kasutlune khatle maanna kraan bina phun hungnu pot bing ga maanna kasemlune.
42011023	Ei le diga karung maknu maan ga Amaitwang bi ongnuwe, Ei le diga khom karung bacham maknu maan gana to imphaangnu miye.
42011024	“Bathiang maknu katha khatna mi khat khouna swak tamnu kaan bi maan tui maaknu riak inza se rwanga basak riak zong ngaake, atiga khatchale zongsu makka maanna rinne, ‘Ei ong ngaaknu ain la ga han lat tam rwe.’
42011025	Maanna han hungnu kaan bi in ga than bathiang thangluga kakam chui thang ngaaknu hung dou rwe.
42011026	Haba nung bi maanna seluga bama sia inkunu katha katei siari ding kalwang hung rwe, banina khutluga habei ga ong rwe khatle haba manpa om kakhamnu thot ka meithaan om gong ma sia inku rwe.”
42011027	Jisu na hei bing nga kabia ongnu kaan bi mi khang lak pina tudannu mannu pakhatna baraam basaangga paoga Bakhou rinne, “Nating pon thangnu nu ga aih saye khatle Nating pi chup thang ngaaknu mannu ga aih saye!”
42011028	Atiyeda Maanna rinne, “Habei gana inkuga Rikrwang chong ding ngailuga ha ding ga zeinu bani ga aih sanuwe!”
42011029	Mi khang ga inku thouluga hung kadoinu kaan bi Maanna rinne, “Heiya sa maknu mikinne. Banina badannu ding ga rakanga zong nge atiyeda thiamting Jonah om badan ga makka badannu khatchale pi bila rwe.
42011030	“Balangbe Jonah na Nineveh rwan mi nun khou badannu tonu ga danga, Misa Sa Kapaisana le heiba mikin bi badannu tolune.
42011031	“Chongsem bi kathwei pek la ramaanuna heiba mikin om minun le han bachamlune khatle bani ding koi impu thanglune, balangbe maanna talei kalan lana Solomon om ningting ding ngai lang hung ngaake khatle phaang ngo, Solomon ma lian inkunu Pakhat abeiya amme.
42011032	Chong kasemnu kaan bi Nineveh mi rwanna heiba mikin le han bachamlune khatle heiba mikin ding koi impu thanglune, balangbe Jonah om kasamnu bi bani sung le ngaake khatle phaang ngo, Jonah ma lian inkunu Pakhat abeiya amme.
42011033	“Pakhatchanale thaomei taanluga inthim la mak tabe luklei thwei bi thang make atiyeda sekhutnu mi nunna babaan ga mu lang, bathaang riak pi dung thang nge.
42011034	Pum om thaomei ga mik e. Atibriakpina namik ka sanu kaan bi napum bing ga babaanna siplune. Atiyeda namik ka siaye dabe, napum ga le zingnuna siplune.
42011035	Atibriakpina nakhou amnu baannu ga zing mak lang barak theiyo.
42011036	Napum bing ga baannuna sipe dabe, zingnu riak khatchale maakka, baan chuinu thaomei baanna nating pi baan thang ngaaknu danga, napum bing ga baannuna siplune.”
42011037	Jisu na chong kabia taangu kaan bi Pharisee pakhatna sa in bacham lang Bakhou rin ngaake. Atibriakpina Maanna sekhutluga sa lang ongta rwe.
42011038	Maanna sa mak balei kamaga Bakut kasin maknu ga Pharisee gana munu kaan bi loh lo rwe.
42011039	Pukraangba na bakhou rinne, “Pharisee rwan nanina nani ngai khatle butheng om bapaan gaza thaam bathiang nge atiyeda nani om basungnu lang gabe takwamsanu khatle kasianuna sipe.
42011040	Kapangnu rwan ga! Misa om bapaannu lang ding dam thangnu Maan gana basungnu lang ding le dam thangnu makkabo?
42011041	“Nani om ka amnu bi gana paangsun piyo; atiye dabe batak takka pot bingza nalaang bathiangnuwe.
42011042	“Pharisee rwan nani aih sianuweda! Balangbe nanina nungsit lou, peganon khatle annaa bing om som om badam khat kate atiga bazenu chongtok khatle Rikrwang kriang ding intaamme. Katei bing ding thou to maknu to makka, hei bing nga nanina to ngaak tingnu we.
42011043	“Pharisee rwan nani aih sianuwe da! Balangbe synagogue pi nanina kasa kataknu kaong riak pi ongnu khatle keithian riak bing bi mi nunna takhwang to thangnu bathaiye.
42011044	“Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle Pharisee rwan, sathot tonu nani aih sianuweda! Balangbe nani thin thangnu thaan dannuwe khatle haba lu chung bi se ongnu mi nun gana haga thei make.”
42011045	Haba nung bi chongtan theinu khatna Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, heiba chong nga ringa Nangna ani ding le to kazak rwe.”
42011046	Maanna rinne, “Chongtan theinu rwan nani nun le aih sianuweda! Balangbe phun thoulanu potrit inza nanina mi nun lu chung bi bason thang nge khatle nani nazan bahaknaba potrit ting ga nani kutzung khatchana hakna banaan thang make.
42011047	Nani nun aih sianuweda! Balangbe nanina thiamting rwan thaan bacha rwe khatle nani pu pa rwanna bani ding athat ngaake.
42011048	Batak takka nani pu pa rwan om chwan bing ga zaye diga nanina sake piye; balangbe banina thiamting rwan ding athat ngaake khatle nanina bani thaan bing bacha rwe.
42011049	Atibriakpina Rikrwang om ningtingna rinne, ‘Eina bani khou thiamting rwan khatle chonglang rwan ding bathanlune atiga banina kasem ding athatlune khatle railune,’
42011050	haga talei ram dam bina thouga thiamting bing om thi ta thang damnu ga heiba mikin lu chung bi ta thang lang nge,
42011051	haga Abel om thi tanu dat pina thouga rikhaang riak khatle kalum in lak pi ta damnu Zechariah om thi ta damnu tang gaye. Eina nani khou rinnuwe, haba koi ga heiba mikin khou ta thanglune.
42011052	Chongtan theinu rwan nani aih sianuweda! Balangbe nanina theinu om taap thing ga louluga thou drwe. Nani nani zan bahakna le habei ga khut make khatle habei khutnu mi nun ding le nanina thing nge.”
42011053	Maanna bani khou hei bing nga rin ongnu kaan bi chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna Bating maitwangga kae rakan tak thou rwe khatle Bating balang taswang khak lang bi tangai ngaiga,
42011054	banina Bating koi impu thang lang khatle Bachong kabiak pina, Bating nam lang chwan ga ngaak ong ngaake.
42012001	Haba kaan bi ga, basing semngam maknu mi khang khat hung kadoinu kaan bi bani khatna khat chung bi kadim dan kale ngaake, kama kataknu bi Jisu na Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Pharisee rwan om khai, dinuba bani om sathot tonu ding ga cheksinno.
42012002	Balangbe indao swakla dingnu inkam thangnu khatchale maake mak tabe thei swakla dingnu inkam thangnu khatchale maake.
42012003	Atibriakpina zingnu bi nanina kabia damnu bing ga baannu bi ngaisulune khatle nanina insung kaa bing bi deza kanaa bi kabia damnu ga in chung bina pao swaklune.
42012004	“Abaan rwan ga, Eina nani khou rinnuwe, pum ding athatluga haba nung bi katei khatchale tonu ngam maknu bani ding ga kachi mako.
42012005	“Atiyeda nanina tu ding kachi dingbo dinu Eina nani khou pi thei thangne: Maanna athatnu nung, meikhun bi bazwan thang ngamnu Bating kachiyo: O, Eina nani khou rinne, Bating kachiyo!
42012006	Basak impaang ding peisa kani lang zwannu makkabo? Ati ngaak peida bani nun lak pi khatcha ding hakna Rikrwang meithaan bi banim thang make.
42012007	Atiyeda nani lu bi sam sang bing ga tangga basing sem thang nge. Atibriakpina nani kachi mako; naniba basak taswang khak ma bakung tonuwe.
42012008	“Eina nani khou rinnuwe, tudannu mi nun meithaan bi Ating indao thangnu bating ga, Misa Sa Kapaisana le Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwan meithaan bi indao thanglune.
42012009	Atiyeda mi nun meithaan bi Ating za maknu bating ga Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwan meithaan bi za thanglaye.
42012010	Tudannu Misa Sa Kapaisa maitwang bi chong kabianu bating kok thanglune; atiyeda Katha Bathiangnu maitwang bi rin basiatnu, bating ga kok thanglaye.
42012011	“Banina nani ding synagogue pi, talei choinu rwan khatle ngam amnu rwan khou phun hungnu kaan bi nanina tatoga mak tabe pa-aam katak tingbo mak tabe nanina pa-aam kabia dingbo diga sung riangre mako.
42012012	Balangbe nanina pa-aam kabia dingbo dinu haba chakrin bahak pi ga Katha Bathiangnuna nani khou bachu thanglune.”
42012013	Mi nun lak pi pakhatna Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, rakhum ga ei le kasem lang atang khou rin thang ngo.”
42012014	Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “He manpa, nani lu chung bi chongsem lang mak tabe kasem thang lang tuna Ating haap thanggabo?”
42012015	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Barak theiyo khatle ra-aamnu bina nani cheksinno, balangbe misa kum ga baom balim balei amnu lan nung suinu make.”
42012016	Habei ga Maanna bani khou chongchak khat rinne, “Tudannu lungsanu manpa pakhat om taram bi tapaan tara tam takka kraa ngaake.
42012017	Maanna baraantoza baningluga rinne, ‘Aom tapaanna thang lang bariak maak briakpina, ei pa-aam to langbo?’
42012018	“Maanna rinne, ‘Eina heiya tone: Eina aom inta nun ga rai satluga kasem liandomnu khat bachane, habei ga aom tapaan bing khatle aom pot bing thangne.
42012019	Atiga eina akatha khou rinne, “He katha, nangna sangwan taswang khak lang kasanu pot bing ri thang rwe; nang lo basakro; saro, inro khatle karo lozaang saro.” ’
42012020	“Atiyeda Rikrwang na bakhou rinne, ‘He kapangnu! Aniya zingpha nakathaga nakhouna lou damlu rwe; nangna nalaang laang thangnu pot bing ga tu langbo?’
42012021	“Baraantoza lang lan khom thangluga, Rikrwang pek la lungsa maknu mi ga hei dannuwe.”
42012022	Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Atibriakpina Eina nani khou rinnuwe, nani pa-aam sa dingbo, diga nani kum lang riangre mako khatle nani pum lang pa-aam sin basoi dingbo, diga nani sung katop mako.
42012023	Kum ga thaisaak ma inkunuwe khatle pum ga sin basoi ma inkunuwe.
42012024	“Ba-aak nun lang bi baning ngo, bani tachi bwan make, lou le aat make, basaak thang riak inta le maake; atiyeda Rikrwang na bani ding pi sa thang nge. Nani nunba basaa nun ma intia baman tam inkunubo!
42012025	Nani lak pi tudannuna basung riangrenuna bakum bi kutki khat hap thangnu ngamgabo?
42012026	Nanina sin kataknu ding hakna to ngam mak tabe, katei bing lang pa-aam lang sung katop ongnubo?
42012027	“Lily rei nunna tatoga thou kabo baning phaang ngo: bani chwan to make, laa le thun make; atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Solomon na le balwat bing bi hakna ha rwan lak pi khat tanga tapon to dam make.
42012028	Aniya lou bi thou ongnu khatle inswan mei bi sat thang dam dingnu, tamphoi ding Rikrwang na hadanga tapon to thang nge dabe, he balumsat sinnu naniga, Maanna nani lang intia inkuga tapon to thanglu dingbo?
42012029	Nanina pa-aam sa dingbo mak tabe pa-aam in dingbo diga zong mako khatle sung katop mako.
42012030	Balangbe talei ram chaat bingna hei bing ding nga rakanga zong nge atiyeda nani Pa na ha bing ga nani lang bathaang amme dinu theiye.
42012031	Atiyeda Rikrwang om krwang talei ding zong ngo khatle hei bing nga nani lang hap thanglune.
42012032	“Kasinnu zao nun, kachi mako, balangbe krwang talei ya nani khou pi thangnu ga nani Pa om pemnuwe.
42012033	Nani om ka amnu ga zwan satluga paangsun piyo; baraan latnu nai maknu sian khao nani lang daanno, braan latlanu lan tambaan la ri thang ngo, habei ga barusanuna le hung banainu ngam make sum tri nale sabraannu ngam make.
42012034	Balangbe nani om lan amnu riaklaga nani sung le amlune.
42012035	“Nani kongkhaak khaak tipo khatle nani om thaomei pi baanno;
42012036	tazwan bahwan riak lana hungluga, inkhaan bachunu kaan bi bakhou haba kahan bi inkhaan lat swak lang, bani om bapuba ding ngaaknu mi nun danga towo.
42012037	Bapuba gana hungnu kaan bi ngaak ongnu hung dounu swak rwan ga aih sanuwe. Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, bapuba gana kongkhaak khaak tipluga bani ding sa in lang pi badungta lune khatle maanna hungluga bani ding chwanlaang to thanglune.
42012038	Maanna kaninu rangkaan mak tabe inthumnu rangkaan dat pi hungnu zaye atiyeda ngaak ongnu swak rwan ga aih sanuwe.
42012039	Atiyeda heiya theiyo, inpu gana impei chakrin bi in baruk mi hung dingbo dinu thei ngaake dabe maan barakka ong ngaak tingnuwe khatle bain ga pi torai mak ngaak tingnuwe.
42012040	Atibriakpina nani le daanga ong ngo, balangbe nanina baning maknu chakrin bi Misa Sa Kapaisa ga hunglune.”
42012041	Habei ga Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nangna heiba chongchak heiya ani khouza rinnumo mak tabe mi bingza khoubo?”
42012042	Pukraangba na rinne, “Bainpuba na bain inkhun lu chung bi kasa kasia phaangsinnu mi pi to dingnu bakaan badat chaga bani lang thaisaak pi thang dingnu balumsalang khopnu khatle ningtingnu phaangsinnu mi tubo?
42012043	Bainpubana hungnu kaan bi atiga to ongnu dounu swak ka aih sanuwe.
42012044	Batak takka Eina nani khou rinnuwe, bapubana baom ka am bing lu chung bi bating phaangsinnu mi pi to thanglune.
42012045	“Atiyeda swak kana basung bi, ‘Ainpuba bakhwa seiga hung laye’ diga baningluga swak kapaisa rwan le swak kamaisa rwan ding bwei thou rwe khatle saluga inluga zu kalo thouwe dabe,
42012046	maanna baning maknu lumik, thei maknu chakrin bi, haba swak om bapuba gana hunglune, bating batut kani toga tanchat satlune khatle baom dam ga balumsa maknu nun le diga pi lou bachamlune.
42012047	“Bainpuba sung theinu swak khatna bapum bahak daan ong maknu mak tabe maanna baningnu to ong nge dabe, bating bwei tamga bweilune.
42012048	Atiyeda bapuba om baningnu ga thei makka, bwei lang khopnu chwan to thangnu swak tingga bwei tom lune. Balangbe taswang khak pi damnu bakhouna taswang khak loulune; taswang khak sin thang damnu bakhouna taswang khak nilune.
42012049	“Ei talei ram bi mei bathan thang lang hungnuwe, atiga haga chok daan ong ngaaknu ding Eina intia lang bathainubo!
42012050	Atiyeda Ei baptize lou lang baptize khat amme khatle haga pi hung tang mak basaan Ei intia lang sung katopnubo!
42012051	Ei talei ram bi dai bazaangnu pi lang hungnuwe diga nani baningbo? Eina nani khou rinnuwe, make atiyeda to kapaang lang naye.
42012052	Balangbe atunna thouga mi pat impaang amnu inkhun ga to kapaanglune: pat thum khatna pat ni om maitwang bi khatle pat nina pat thum om maitwang bi onglune.
42012053	Bapana basa om maitwang bi khak lang swaklune, banuna sa kamaisa maitwang bi, sa kamaisana banu maitwang bi, banina bamou maitwang bi khatle bamouna bani maitwang bi onglune.”
42012054	Jisu na mi khang khou rinne, “Nanina lumik taak pek la tambu kanu munu kaan bi nanina haba kahan bi ga rinne, ‘Khwa hung naye’ khatle haga ati rwe.
42012055	Nanina kathwei pek lana thiraang raang hungnu munu kaan bi nanina rinne, ‘Aniya nisat natlune’ khatle haga ati rwe.
42012056	Sathot tonu nun ga! Nanina saangbaan le talei om thot ting rin basaamnu ngamme atiyeda nanina hei kaan om badan ding ga thei maknuwa tatonubo?
42012057	“O, nani nazan bahakna bazenu ding ga pa-aam toga lang swak ngam maknubo?
42012058	“Nangna nating munanu maan le diga chongsempuba kim la senu kaan bi lampui bi maan le diga kasa to lang karammo, mak tabe maanna nating chongsempuba khou pi swaklune, chongsempuba gana nating ngam amnu khou khatle ngam amnu gana nating qwan in bi thanglune.
42012059	Eina nakhou rinnuwe, nangna pi dingnu kakhamnu sian ga pi mak basaan nang habei gana swak latnu zalaye.”
42013001	Galilee rwanna rikhaang pot katnu bi Pilate na bani ding athatluga bani thi ga thang katwak rwe diga Jisu khou hung pu ngaaknu mi nun kasem ha kaan bi ong ngaake.
42013002	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Galilee rwanna heipai riangre nang briakpina, banina Galilee mi katei rwan ma inkuga noh phunnuwe diga nani baningbo?
42013003	Eina nani khou rinnuwe, make; atiyeda nani nun sung le make dabe, hadanga nani mi bing le braanlune.
42013004	Mak tabe Siloam bi basaang in baotaluga badan that tamnu mi pat somga kariat ka, Jerusalem bi amnu mi bing ma noh tam inkunuwe diga nani baningbo?
42013005	Eina nani khou rinnuwe, make atiyeda nani sung le make dabe hadanga nani mi bing le braanlune.”
42013006	Jisu na heiba chongchak heiya rinne, “Tudannu manpa pakhatna baom drakha anqwat pi tacham kung khat ling thang ngaake khatle maanna hungluga haba kung bi ga bakraa zong ngaake atiyeda khatchale dou make.
42013007	Maanna drakha anqwat mi khou rinne, ‘Phaang ngo, sangwan thum eina heiba tacham kung biya bakraa hung zong ngaake atiyeda khatchale dou make. Heiya pun satro; pa-aam lang talei ding to katop ongne gabo?’
42013008	“Atiyeda anqwat mi gana bakhou rinne, ‘Bapuba, eina bakungri chou kaphok koiluga har thang mak basaan, ani kum le atiga am dam dingriyo.
42013009	Heiyana bakraa kraaye dabe sa rwe, karaa make dabe haba nung bina nangna pun satro.’ ”
42013010	Jisu na Sabbath ni synagogue khat pi bachu thang ong ngaake.
42013011	Phaang ngo, sangwan somga kariat katha khatna pi songa ongnu mannu pakhat habei ga am ngaake, maan bangum takuga baraanto han thou ngam mak ngaake.
42013012	Atiyeda Jisu na bating munu kaan bi Bakim bi kou hungluga rinne, “Kamaisa, nason bina nating sut swak thang rwe.”
42013013	Maanna balu chung bi Bakut kaising thang rwe, haba kahan bi ga maan hen kating thou rwe khatle Rikrwang ding swanka rwe.
42013014	Atiyeda Jisu na bating Sabbath ni pi sa thang briakpina, synagogue om kaithangnupana balung pwanga mi nun khou rinne, “Nani mi nunna chwan to lang ni karuk amme; atibriakpina haba dat pi ga naanu pi sa thang lang hung ngo, Sabbath ni hung mako.”
42013015	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Sathot tonu! Sabbath ni nani pakhat khatna nani om sen chan mak tabe lola bain bina sutluga, tui pi in lang kai swak makkabo?
42013016	Phaang ngo, heiba Abraham sa kamaisa ding nga, Seitaan na sangwan somga kariat bang thang ngaake atiyeda heiba bang thang ongnu bina bating Sabbath ni sut swak thang lagabo?”
42013017	Maanna bani khou atiga kabianu kaan bi Bating munanu nun ga kazaknu dou rwe khatle Jisu na heitia lwat liannu chwan to thangnu langna mi khang bing ga karo ngaake.
42013018	Jisu na rinne, “Rikrwang om krwang talei ga pa-aam danbo? Haga Eina pa-aam le diga rin kaba langbo?
42013019	Haga mi khatna baom anqwat pi bwan thangnu, ancham mu khat tannuwe; haga thou kaluga kaliannu thingkung imbei rwe khatle basaang la zwangnu basaa nunna hungluga babaak bing bi bani kabu kai rwe.”
42013020	Maanna rin late, “Rikrwang om krwang talei ga Eina pa-aam le diga rin kaba langbo?
42013021	Heiya mannu pakhatna khai louluga sukdi luklei inthumna pwangka mak basaan habei ga ri thangnu khai ga le bachamme.”
42013022	Jisu na namlian khatle nam nam bi serwanluga mi nun ding bachu thangga, Jerusalem tang lang se ngaake.
42013023	Habei ga mi khatna Bakhou ngaiye, “Pukraangba, kanthangnu lousu damnu mi titcha zungbo?” Jisu na bani khou rinne,
42013024	“Barumnu inkhaanmun bi ga khut lang karammo, Eina nani khou rinnuwe, mi inzana habei ga khut lang karamlune atiyeda khutnu ngamlaye.
42013025	Inpu ga na thouluga inkhaan ga khaan damme dabe, nanina langkaang la hanluga inkhaan bachuga rinlune, ‘Pukraangba, Pukraangba, ani lang inkhaan lat thang ngo,’ habei ga Maanna nani khou rinlune, ‘Nani inlamnabo, Ei nani ding thei make,’
42013026	habei ga nanina rinlune, ‘Nameithaan bi ani sa in ngaake khatle Nangna ani lampui bing bi bachu thang ngaake.’
42013027	“Atiyeda Maanna rinlune, ‘Nani inlamnabo dinu Ei thei make. Sa maknu chwan tonu nani bing ga, Akhouna se swak tro.’
42013028	“Rikrwang om krwang talei la Abraham, Isaac, Jacob khatle thiamting rwan bing ding nanina munu kaan bi chapka khatle ngaatang ei karit ritka onglune khatle nani nun ding langkaang la bathou satlune.
42013029	Bani nun lumik swak lumik taak, kasak kathwei lana hungluga, Rikrwang om krwang talei la sa in lang hung ongtalune.
42013030	Phaang ngo, habei ga kakhamnuna kamanu tolune khatle kamanuna kakhamnu tolune.”
42013031	Ha ni bahak ka Pharisee rwan mi kasemna hungluga Bakhou rinne, “Abeina se swak tro, balangbe Herod na Nating athat nwam ongme.”
42013032	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Sero, haba lousa ui khou ga rinno, ‘Phaang ngo, Eina ri kasia nun ding kazun sat ongme, kasa kanaa bing ding aniya pi sa thang ongme, inswan le pi sa thanglune khatle ni thum tangbani Achwan loilune.’
42013033	Ati ngaaklena Ei aniya le, inswan le, tipni le se lang maang nge; balangbe thiamting pakhatcha hakna Jerusalem paan la thinu za make.
42013034	“He Jerusalem, Jerusalem! Thiamting rwan ding athatnu khatle bakhou lang hungnu nun ding lungna khumnu nang! Aan puina baswan rwan ding babatha thwei bi ka aw thangnu ga danga Eina nani sa rwan ding katupka ka aw thang nwam ngaake atiyeda haga nanina bathai make!
42013035	Phaang ngo, nani in bing nga lung taakluga nani khou thangsia rwe; Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Maan ga aih sanuwe!’ diga rin dingnu bakaan ga hung tang mak basaan nanina Ating khatchale mula rwe.”
42014001	Jisu na Pharisee rwan bapuba pakhat in bi Sabbath ni sa in lang khutnu kaan bi banina bating atka phaang ong ngaake.
42014002	Phaang ngo, Bameithaan bi tui ri phunnu manpa khat ong ngaake.
42014003	Habei ga Jisu na chongtan theinu rwan le Pharisee rwan khou rinne, “Sabbath ni naanu ding pi sa thangnuwa zabo?”
42014004	Atiyeda bani thiap thiap ong ngaake. Atiga Maanna bating banaan thangluga pi sa thang rwe khatle bating pi se drwe.
42014005	Habei ga Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani lak pi tudannu lola mak tabe sen chan amnu maanna haga khun bi ta thang nge dabe, haba kahan bi ha ding ga Sabbath ni lou thou thang mak tingnu mi suigabo?”
42014006	Bani hei lang bi chong kataknu ngamlan rwe.
42014007	Talot mi nunna sa kataknu riak pi ong lang ka thang kale ongnu ga muluga, Maanna bani khou chongchak khat rinne:
42014008	“Tudannuna nani ding tazwan bahwan balou bi talotnu kaan bi sa kataknu riak pi ong mako, balangbe nama takungnu pakhat ting talot ngaaknu le zaye;
42014009	nating talotnu maan gana hungluga nakhou rinlune, ‘Heiba manpa lang kaong riak ka pi thangbiyo,’ habei ga nang kazakka bangiam kataknu riak la ta onglune.
42014010	Atiyeda nating talotnu kaan bi seluga nang bangiam kataknu kaong riak la ong ngo atiye dabe nating talotnu maan gana hungluga nakhou rinlune, ‘Abaanpa, sadomnu riak la kaong thang ngo.’ Haba kaan bi nang le diga sa in lang ongnu nun meithaan bi nating takhwang to thanglune.
42014011	Balangbe baraanto bating pi basaangnu bating ga pi bangiam talune khatle basung bangiamnu bating ga pi basaang ka thanglune.”
42014012	Jisu na Bating talotnu manpa khou le rinne, “Nangna louthwan mak tabe khwazin thaisaak pi sanu kaan bi nabaan rwan, naunao rwan, inkhun rwan khatle lungsanu innai rwan ding talot mako, balangbe banina nating le talot latluga nalei chaak thun lune.
42014013	Atiyeda nangna balou thaisaak pi sanu kaan bi lungsianu nun, kut ket lwamnu, ket thoknu khatle mik chonu nun ding taloto.
42014014	Banina haga nalaang thunnu ngam mak briakpina, nang aih sanu tolune; balangbe ririak senu mi nunna ring thou latnu kaan bi nalaang haga thun thang latlune.”
42014015	Jisu le diga sa in bacham ongnu nun lak pi pakhatna heiba chong nga ngaisunu kaan bi maanna Jisu khou rinne, “Rikrwang om krwang talei la sa in dingnu maan ga aih saye!”
42014016	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Tudannu pakhatna balou pui rang swakluga mi taswang khak talot ngaake,
42014017	atiga khwazin thaisaak sa in dingnu kaan bi maanna swak pakhat ting lang thangluga pi rin rwe, ‘Hungro, balangbe atun pot bingza laang thang rwe.’
42014018	“Atiyeda bani khangsungna sung khatcha toga sui mak lang rin rwe. Kamanu manpana bakhou rinne, ‘Ei lou khat kalei rwe, haga baphaang kama maang nge. Ating kai thang lang ei Nakhou hweiye.’
42014019	“Katei khatna rinne, ‘Ei senpot impaang kalei rwe, ei bani ding talen maang nge. Ating kai thang lang ei Nakhou hweiye.’
42014020	“Katei pakhatna le rinne, ‘Ei tazwan lou hung rwe atibriakpina ei hung ngamla rwe.’
42014021	“Atibriakpina swak kana hungluga hei bing nga bainpuba khou pu rwe. Habei ga inpuba gana balung pwanga baswak khou rinne, ‘Namlian om lampui bing le in lak bing bi barapka seluga lungsianu nun, kut ket lwamnu, mik chonu khatle ket thoknu nun ding kou hungro.’
42014022	“Swak kana rinne, ‘Pukraangba, nangna zathang pi thangnu nung suiga ei to rwe atiyeda bariak pa atun le ammaang nge.’
42014023	“Haba nung bi inpuba gana swak khou ga rinne, ‘Ainna ongsip lang, nang lampui pui bing le in lak bing bi seluga mi nun ding twansa makka kou hungro.
42014024	Balangbe Eina nakhou rinnuwe, talot tamnu mi bing ga pakhatchanale Aom balou thaisaak heiya batem bila rwe.’ ”
42014025	Mi khang puina Banung sui se ngaake. Habei ga Maanna bani khou kanei swakluga rinne,
42014026	“Tudannu pakhatna Akim bi hungluga banu bapa, bamei basa rwan, bau banao rwan khatle bazan bahak om kum ding tangga batan make dabe, maan Aom potroi to ngamlaye.
42014027	Tudannu baom cross ka phunluga Anung sui maknu maan ga Aom potroi to ngamlaye.
42014028	Balangbe nani lak pi pakhatna, basaang in to nwamme dabe, kamaga badungtaluga maanna haba in ga to loi ngamnu sian khop lang amrubo dinu pabilabo?
42014029	Haga ati make dabe, in ga rang thouluga to loi ngam maknu kaan bi haga phaangmunu mi bingna bating kiamga
42014030	rinlune, ‘Heiba manpana in be to thou rwe atiyeda maanna to loi ngam lan rwe.’
42014031	“Ati mak tabe krwang khatna krwang katei khat ting kraan katwak lang senu kaan bi bating katwak lang mi raching somni ding kalwangluga hungnanu bating baom mi raching som gana ngamlu dingbo diga chong kathui kama bilabo?
42014032	Maanna katwak ngamla dingnuwe dabe, krwang katei gana namlaa takka ongnu kaan bi tabat rwan ding lang thangluga kasa to kale lang kabia ding gaye.
42014033	Hei danga, nani lak pi pakhatna baom ka am bing bathan sat maknu maan gana Aom potroi tonu ngam make.
42014034	Bachi ya kasanu pote; atiyeda bachi gana bathum ga braan damme dabe haga tatoga pi thum lat langbo?
42014035	Haga talei lang le har lang le kana lan rwe atiyeda mi nunna haga bun sate. Tudannu ngai lang kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo!”
42015001	Ramkhai khomnu rwan le noh mi nunna Jisu chong ngai lang Bakim bi hung rwe.
42015002	Pharisee rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna tu tu tam tamga rinne, “Heiba Manpana noh mi nun ding loukhutluga bani le diga sa in bachamme.”
42015003	Habei ga Jisu na bani khou heiba chongchak heiya rinne:
42015004	“Nani lak pi pakhat om zao raza am bina khat braan damnu kaan bi somkaqwaga kaqwa ding ramhaang bi thangsialuga, braan damnu khat ting ga maanna zongsu mak basaan zong mak tingnu tu ambo?
42015005	Maanna haga dou latnu kaan bi karoga badaan kong bi pon thou rwe.
42015006	Bain hung tangnu kaan bi maanna babaan rwan le bainnai rwan ding kou kadoiluga bani khou rinne, ‘Ei le karo bachamzo, balangbe aom braan damnu zao ga eina dou lat rwe!’
42015007	Eina nani khou rinnuwe hadanga sung le lang bathaang maaknu mi somkaqwaga kaqwa ga ma noh mi pakhatna sung lenu langna tambaan la karo inkulune.
42015008	“Haga danga tangka som amnu mannu pakhat om, tangka khat braan dam mebe maanna thaomei taan thouluga haga zongsu mak basaan in thanga, zong chuiga zongbilabo?
42015009	Maanna haga zongsunu kaan bi babaan rwan le bainnai rwan ding kou kadoiluga rinne, ‘Ei le karo bachamzo, balangbe aom braan damnu sian ga dou lat rwe.’
42015010	Eina nani khou rinnuwe, haga danga noh mi pakhatna sung lenu kaan bi Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwan meithaan bi karonu amme.”
42015011	Maanna rinne, “Tudannu manpa pakhat sa kapaisa pat ni am ngaake.
42015012	Naosennu gana bapa khou rinne, ‘Apa, nangna alaang pi dingnu lan badam ga akhou pi thangro.’ Atibriakpina bapana barwei lang baom lan ga kasem thang rwe.
42015013	“Bakhwa sei maknu nung, naosennu gana baom lan bing khom thouluga namlaanu taram la bazin thou dam ngaake, haba riak pi maan lung impham imphaaga baom lan bing to braan loi drwe.
42015014	Maanna baom ka am bing to braan loinu nung, haba taram bi ga sia taknu bu taangnu hung rwe khatle balaang khatchale maak thou rwe.
42015015	Habei ga maanna seluga haba taram bi khulung sa pakhat kim bi sui ong rwe khatle manpa gana bating balou la bok nun ding basaak bun lang lang thang rwe.
42015016	Bok nunna sa ongnu bokthai ga maanna babon sa imba nwam ngaak rwe atiyeda pakhatchanale balaang thaisaak pi thang lan rwe.
42015017	“Maan bakaba thei swaknu kaan bi maanna rinne, ‘Apa om lan thangnu swak rwanna impham imphaga sa in ongme atiyeda eina abeiya chaam taraan ga thi ding dan ga ongme!
42015018	Ei thouluga apa kim la se lat tam rwe khatle bakhou atiga rinne, “Apa, ei tambaan khatle nameithaan bi noh to rwe,
42015019	ei nasa kapaisa diga kou lang khopnu lan rwe. Ating naom lan thangnu swak pakhat ting danga lou thangro.”
42015020	“Atiga maanna thouluga bapa kim la hung rwe. Atiyeda maanna namlaa lamangna se hungnanu ga bapana mu rwe khatle bapana kriangga pak hungluga baring hungphotluga bating kaput rwe.
42015021	“Maanna bapa khou rinne, ‘Apa, ei tambaan khatle nameithaan bi noh to rwe, ating nasa kapaisa diga kou lang khopnu lan rwe.’
42015022	“Atiyeda bapana baswak rwan khou rinne, ‘Sa kataknu pon naat barapka aswakluga balaang sin basoi thangro, bakut pi kutthop run thangro khatle baket pi ketthop thop thangro.
42015023	Bami pi sa thangnu sen chan swan ga lou hungluga athatro khatle ani saluga karo bachamrizo;
42015024	balangbe asa kapaisa heiya thi bina ring lat rwe; maan braan dam bina dou lat rwe.’ Atiga bani karo thou rwe.
42015025	“Atiyeda sa kapaisa patsonu ga lou la am ngaake. Maan bain nai hungnu kaan bi laa tonu le laamnu khwan ngaisu rwe.
42015026	Atibriakpina maanna swak pakhat ting kouluga hei bing nga pa-aam to ongnubo diga ngai rwe.
42015027	Swak kana bakhou rinne, ‘Nanao ga hung lat rwe, napana bating naa sananu to makka dou lat briakpina, bami pi sa thangnu sen chan swan khat balaang athat thang rwe.’
42015028	“Atiyeda maan balung pwanga insung khut nwam mak ngaak rwe. Atibriakpina bapana swakluga bating bathem rwe.
42015029	Maanna bapa khou rinne, ‘Phaang ngo, sangwan heichan eina nating chwanlaang toga; naom zathang khatchale zei maknu to make; atiyeda nangna alaang ken swan khatcha hakna abaan rwan le diga karo bacham lang diga pi thangnu maake.
42015030	‘Atiyeda naom lan bing taloi rwan le diga sabraan loi damnu, nasa kapaisa heiyana hung latnu kaan bi nangna bami pi sa thangnu sen chan swan balaang athat thang rwe.’
42015031	“Bapa na basa khou rinne, ‘Asa kapaisa, nangba ei le diga ong bacham batwan dabo, aom ka am bing nga naom zung nge.
42015032	Ani karo bacham dingnu zung rwe, balangbe nanao wa thi bina ring latnu zung rwe khatle braan dam bina dou latnu zung rwe.’ ”
42016001	Jisu na potroi rwan khou le rinne, “Lungsanu manpa om chwanlaang mi khat am ngaake, chwanlaang mi gana bapuba om lan to braanne diga mi nunna koi impu thang ngaake.
42016002	Atibriakpina bapubana bating kou hungluga bakhou rinne, ‘Na lang bi eina ngaisu ongnuwa tatonu ombo? Nachwanlaang om lang bi sing chak ka piro, balangbe nang chwanlaang mi to lat zala rwe.’
42016003	“Chwanlaang mi gana baraantoza basung bi baning rwe, ‘Ei pa-aam to langbo? Balangbe ainpubana chwanlaang chwan ga akhouna lou sat tam ding rwe. Ei talei le chounu ngamlaye; ei ni sa lang le kazake.
42016004	“Achwanlaang chwan bina lou sat tamnu kaan bi mi nunna ating bani in bi loukhut za lang ei paaam to langbo dinu ei thei rwe.’
42016005	“Atibriakpina maanna bainpuba om lei chaaknu mi bing ding kou kadoiluga kamanu manpa khou rinne, ‘Nang ainpuba lei inza chaakpo?’
42016006	“Maanna rinne, ‘Thao badat razaye.’ Habei ga maanna bakhou rinne, ‘Naom lei chaak om che ga louro khatle barapka badungtaluga somnga hiak thangro.’
42016007	“Habei gana maanna katei khat khou rinne, ‘Nang inza chaakpo?’ Maanna rinne, ‘Gehu cor badat razaye.’ Maanna bakhou rinne, ‘Naom lei chaak om che ga louro khatle haga somkariat hiak thangro.’
42016008	“Ririak se maknu chwanlaang mi gana ningtingga chwan to briakpina bapubana bating swanka rwe. Balangbe heiba mikin om sa rwanna bani om mikin bi babaan om sa kapaisa rwan ma ningting inkuwe.
42016009	Eina nani khou rinnuwe, talei ram om lan paan bina nalaang baan khommo, hagana loi damnu kaan bi banina nani ding khwa sei lung dingnu in bi lou thanglune.
42016010	“Tudannu titcha riak pi balumsa lang khopnu maan ga taswang khak riak pi le balumsa zanuwe khatle tudannu titcha riak pi lungning bathiang maknu maan ga taswang khak riak pi le lungning bathiang maknuwe.
42016011	Atibriakpina nanina talei ram om lan bi balumsa lang khop maknu towe dabe, bazenu lan ga tuna nani khou bachoi thang dingbo?
42016012	Nani ding mi katei khat om lan bi balumsa lang maake dabe, tuna nani om ga nani lang pi thang ding gabo?
42016013	“Swak khatna bapuba kani ding chwanlaang tonu ngam make; balangbe maanna pakhat ting batanluga katei ding krianglune mak tabe maanna pakhat ting takungluga pakhat ting thou to mak lune. Nanina Rikrwang le lan om chwanlaang tonu ngam make.”
42016014	Sian bathai natnu Pharisee rwanna le, hei bing nga ngaisuluga Jisu ding balaa ngaake.
42016015	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Mi nun meithaan bi nanina ririak senu thot toga pi muwe atiyeda Rikrwang na nani sung ding theiye. Balangbe mi nun lak pi baning basaangnu maan ga Rikrwang mikphaang bi batannuwe.
42016016	“Chongtan khatle Thiamting rwan om chong ga John na hungnu tangga kasam ngaake. Ha kaan bi gana thouga Rikrwang om krwang talei sacham ga kasam ongme khatle mi nunna habei ga namga khut ongme.
42016017	Chongtan om kasinnu hiak khat hung tang maknu ma tambaan le talei braannuna bai inkuwe.
42016018	“Tudannu bamei ding kanoi satluga katei khat ting kou latnu maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe khatle tudannu babasanna kanoi satnu bating kou latnu maan ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonuwe.
42016019	“Sendumnu khatle banemnu pon sin basoinu lungsanu kani bathin karo rangaaga lungnu manpa pakhat am ngaake.
42016020	“Haba lungsanu manpa om inkhaan pui bi Lazarus tiga kounu khaisanu, bapum bing takhotna sipnu manpa pakhat ting hung thang ngaake,
42016021	lungsanu manpa om table bina kadaaktanu katup baneng gana babon sa imba nwam ngaake. Haba chung bi ui nunna le hungluga batakhot zam ga baliak ngaake.
42016022	“Atiga lungsianu manpa ga thi rwe khatle bating tambaan chonglang rwanna Abraham pam la phun thou drwe. Lungsanu manpa ga le thi rwe khatle ri thang drwe.
42016023	Kathi ram la raiga ong bi, maanna basaang la phaangkanu kaan bi namlaa la Abraham khatle bapam bi badung ongnu Lazarus ting mu rwe.
42016024	Maanna paoga rinne, ‘Apa Abraham ating phaangkriang thang ngo, Lazarus ting bakut zung ga tui bi imphomluga abalei pi dai thang lang lang thang ngo; balangbe ei mei balei lak pi riangre khaang ongme.’
42016025	“Abraham na bakhou rinne, ‘Sa kapaisa, nang ring ongnu kaan bi kasanu bing nalaang lousu drwe, hadanga Lazarus na kasianu bing lousu drwe; atiyeda atunba bating abeiya pi lozaan thang rwe khatle nangna riangre khaang rwe.
42016026	Hei bing chung bi, abeina nani khou tangga takan swak nwamnu nunna takan swak ngam mak lang khatle haba riak pi gana ani khou takan hung mak lang, ani le nani lak pi kaliannu bahaang khat pi am thang rwe.’
42016027	“Habei ga maanna rinne, ‘Apa, eina nating kalumme, balangbe nangna Lazarus ting apa in la lang thang ngo,
42016028	balangbe au anao kapaisa pat impaang amme, banina le heiba riangrenu riak pi hung mak lang maanna bani khou sake pi ding ngo.’
42016029	“Abraham na bakhou rinne, ‘Bani lang Moses khatle Thiamting rwan amme; banina bani chong ga ngai ding ngo.’
42016030	“Maanna rinne, ‘Apa Abraham, make, thinu nun lak pina pakhatna bani khou hung nge dabe bani sung lelune.’
42016031	Atiyeda Abraham na bakhou rinne, ‘Banina Moses khatle Thiamting rwan chong ga ngai make dabe, thi bina ring thou latnu pakhatna bani ding bathemnu zalaye.’ ”
42017001	Jisu na potroi rwan khou rinne, “Ket basuinu dou maknu ngam make atiyeda ket pi basuinu maan ga aih sianuweda!
42017002	“Atiyeda tudannuna heipai kasinnu pakhat ting ket pi basuinu bating ga baring bi saang tak lung khit thangluga tuipui bi sat thang damnu gana balaang sa inku dingnuwe.
42017003	“Nani cheksinno. Nau nanao pakhatna namaitwang bi noh towe dabe, bating tweiyo khatle maanna sung leye dabe, bating kok thangbiyo.
42017004	Maanna namaitwang bi kani khat sung bi noh to leng siariye dabe atiluga nakhou hung leng siariluga maanna ‘Ei sung lerwe’ diga rinne dabe, nang bating kok thang ding gaye.”
42017005	Chonglang rwanna Pukraangba khou rinne, “Ani balumsat pi inku thou thang ngo.”
42017006	Pukraangba na rinne, “Nani khou balumsat ancham mu tiaza beida amme dabe, heiba pulang kung ding nga, ‘Nang nakamong phokluga tuipui la ga khut thou dammo’ diga rinne dabe nachong zei dam zung nge.
42017007	“Nani lak pi mi khat om lou khoinu mak tabe zao siannu swak pakhat amme dabe, maanna lou lana hungnu kaan bi bating, ‘Barapka hungro, sa in lang ongtaro’ diga rin dingnu tu ambo?
42017008	Atiyeda haba hut lang bakhou, ‘Nang alaang sa lang kasem daanno, ei sa in taang mak basaan kongkhaak khaak tipluga ating chwanlaang towo, ha taang bi nang sa inno’ diga rinlagabo?
42017009	Maanna bakhou zathang pi thangnu ga danga to briakpina swak ting ga maanna swanka dambo? Swanka make diga eina baning nge.
42017010	Hadanga nanina le nani khou zathang pi thangnu bing ga toluga, ‘Ani bathaang maaknu swak rwanne. Anina to dingnu thou ga anina tonu zung nge’ diga rinno.”
42017011	Jisu na Jerusalem la senu kaan bi Maan Samaria le Galilee taram se rwan hung ngaake.
42017012	Atiga Maan nam khat pi khutnu kaan bi namlaa la han ongnu imphaannu pat somna Bating kadou rwe.
42017013	Banina baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Pukraangba Jisu, ani ding phaangkriang thang ngo!”
42017014	Jisu na bani ding munu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Sero, nani pum ga tako rwan khou pi muwo.” Atiga banina se ongnu kaan bi bani pum ga bathiang drwe.
42017015	Habei ga bani lak pi pakhatna maan sa drwe dinu theiluga maanna han hung latluga baraam basaangga paoga Rikrwang ding swanka rwe
42017016	khatle Maanna Jisu ket pi in bakhup taluga Bating swan ngaake. Haba manpa ga Samaria rwan ngaake.
42017017	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Pat som ding to bathiang thang damnu makkabo? Atiyeda pat kaqwa ga inlam thoudrubo?
42017018	Talei khat la mi ya makka pakhatcha hakna han hungluga Rikrwang ding swanlanrubo?”
42017019	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Thouluga sero, nabalumsatna nating pi sa thang rwe.”
42017020	Pharisee rwanna Rikrwang om krwang talei ga impei dat pi hunglu dingbo diga Jisu khou ngainu kaan bi Maanna bani khou katake, “Rikrwang om krwang talei ga badannu le bachamga hung make;
42017021	banina, ‘Abeiya Phaang ngo,’ mak tabe ‘Ula Phaang ngo,’ diga rinlaye. Batak takka, Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nani lak pi amme.”
42017022	Maanna potroi rwan khou rinne, “Misa Sa Kapaisa om lumik rwan lak pi khat ka nanina mu nwam taknu dat hunglune atiyeda nanina haga mulaye.
42017023	“Banina nani khou rinlune, ‘Abeiya Phaang ngo!’ Mak tabe ‘Ula ga Phaang ngo!’ Atiyeda bani nung sui se mako mak tabe bani nung sui mako.
42017024	“Balangbe khwa bathaaknuna tambaan kalan khat lana tambaan kalan khat la baan tangnu ga danga, Misa Sa Kapaisa ga le Baom lumik pi hadanlune.
42017025	Atiyeda kamaga Maan riangre kanang inza khaanglu rwe khatle heiba mikinna Bating za mak lune.
42017026	“Noah kaan bi swak tamnu ga danga, Misa Sa Kapaisa om lumik ka le hadanga swaklune:
42017027	Noah na lipui sung bi khut mak basaan banina saluga, inluga, tazwan bahwanluga khatle tazwan bahwan lang pi swakka lung ong ngaake khatle tui lian hungluga bani ding to braan sat loi ngaak rwe.
42017028	“Hadanga Lot kaan bi le swak ngaake, banina saluga, inluga, kaleiga, zwanga, banina tapaan lingga khatle in toga ong ngaake;
42017029	atiyeda Lot na Sodom bina se swaknu ni saangbaan lana mei le kanduk khwa suntaluga bani mi bing ding to braan sat rwe.
42017030	“Misa Sa Kapaisa ding indao thangnu lumik ka le hadanlune.
42017031	Ha ni ga tudannu in chung bi ong ngaaknu maan gana insung la amnu bapot talou mak ting ngo. Hadanga lou la ongnu maannale han hung mak ting ngo.
42017032	“Lot mei ding ga baningsuwo.
42017033	Tudannu bakum ring lang zongnu maan ga braanlune khatle tudannu bakum braannu bating ga pi ring thanglune.
42017034	“Eina nani khou rinnuwe, ha ni zingpha ga ria khat pi pat ni in onglune: Khat ting lou thou damlune, khat ting thangsialune.
42017035	Kamaisa pat ni saang tak bacham onglune: Khat ting lou thou damlune, khat ting thangsialune.
42017036	Lou bi manpa pat ni onglune: Khat ting lou thou damlune, khat ting thangsialune.”
42017037	Banina Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, haga inlambo?” Maanna bani khou rinne, “Kathi pum amnu riak pi ga langkiya rwan le hung kadoilune.”
42018001	Mi nunna chat makka hweini ong ding gaye khatle sung inkhin mak ting gaye dinu pi thei langna, Jisu na bani khou chongchak khat
42018002	rinne, “Namlian khat pi Rikrwang ding le kachi mak, mi nun ding le takung tazei to maknu chongsempuba khat am ngaake.
42018003	Haba namlian bi ga tameinu khatle am ngaake; maanna chongsempuba kim bi hungluga rinne, ‘Ating munanu lu chung bi bazenu chongsem kasem thang ngo.’
42018004	“Maanna bakaan kasem za mak ngaake; atiyeda bataang la basung bi atiga kakhan rwe, ‘Eina Rikrwang ding kachi mak ngaak peida khatle mi nun ding takung tazei to mak ngaak peida,
42018005	heiba tameinuna ating to katop ong briakpina, maanna hung katupka hungluga ating to riangre mak lang ei balaang bazenu chongsem kasem thang lang rwe.’ ”
42018006	Pukraangba na rinne, “Ririak se maknu chongsempuna rinnu ga ngaiyo.
42018007	Rikrwang na bani le khwa seiga khaang thang ngaak peida, Maanna kathang swak thangnu nunna zingpha thamlai Bakhou hweini ongnu nun lang Rikrwang na bazenu chongsem kasem thang makkabo?
42018008	Eina nani khou rinnuwe, maanna bani lang barapka bazenu chongsem kasem thanglune. Atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisana hungnu kaan bi talei ram bi balumsanu doulu dingbo?”
42018009	Mi kasemna bani ririak senuwe katei rwanba khatchale make, diga baraantoza ding balumsanu nun om lang bi Maanna heiba chongchak heiya rin ngaake,
42018010	“Mi pat ni kalum lang kalum in bi se ka rwe, pakhatna Pharisee, pakhatna ramkhai khomnuwe.
42018011	Pharisee gana hanluga baraanto atiga kalum rwe, ‘He Rikrwang, eina Nating swanne, eiba mi katei rwan danga kasut sanu, baze maknu, lungkoi lungmaannu mak tabe heiba ramkhai khomnu mi dannu make.
42018012	‘Eiba maap lak khat pi kalumsan leng niye; aom ka am bing om som dam le pi swake.’
42018013	“Atiyeda ramkhai khomnu manpa gana namlaa la hanluga, bamai kum hakna tambaan la taswang khak batou thou makka atiyeda bakachaang kachumga rinne, ‘He Rikrwang, noh mi ating phaangkriang thang ngo.’
42018014	“Eina nani khou rinnuwe, heiba manpa heiya pakhat ka ma pi baze thangluga bain la se drwe; balangbe bazan ding pi basaangnu ding pi bangiam talune khatle bazan ding pi bangiamtanu ding pi basaang ka thanglune.”
42018015	Banina kasinnu naosen rwan ding le bani lu chung bi banaan thang lang Jisu khou kalwang hung rwe; atiyeda potroi rwanna haga muluga bani ding twei ngaake.
42018016	Atiyeda Jisu na bani ding Bakim bi kou hungluga rinne, “Kasinnu naosen rwan ga Akhou hung ding ngo, bani ding khaam mako; balangbe Rikrwang om krwang talei ga hei rwan dannu nun lang nge.
42018017	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu khatna kasinnu naosen khat tanga Rikrwang om krwang talei ding lou thang maknu maan ga habei ga khatchale khutlaye.”
42018018	Tudannu taleipuba pakhatna Jisu khou ngaiye, “Kasanu Bachuthangnupa, ringzoknu kum lousu lang ei pa-aam to langbo?”
42018019	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna pa-aam lang Ating kasanu diga kounubo? Pakhat tak pakhatcha amnu Rikrwang ga makka kasanu pakhatchale maake.
42018020	Nangna zathang bing ga theiye, ‘Lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to mako,’ ‘Mi athat mako,’ ‘Baru sa mako,’ ‘Kakoinu sake pi mako,’ ‘Nanu napa ding takung tazeiyo.’ ”
42018021	Maanna rinne, “Hei bing nga ei naosen badona zei hung rwe.”
42018022	Jisu na hei bing nga ngaisunu kaan bi Maanna bakhou rinne, “Nakhou khatpa baatmaang nge. Naom ka am bing ga zwan satluga lungsianu nun lang kasem thangbiyo atiye dabe tambaan la nalaang lan amlune khatle hungluga Anung suiro.”
42018023	Maanna heiba chong nga ngaisunu kaan bi maan basung riangre tak rwe, balangbe maan lungsa taknu mi ngaake.
42018024	Jisu na maan basung riangre tak rwe dinu muluga rinne, “Lungsanu nunna Rikrwang om krwang talei khut lang intia kungnubo!
42018025	Balangbe lungsanu mi khatna Rikrwang om krwang talei khutnu ma ut khatna kaphin kana bi lon brwannuna bai inkuwe.”
42018026	Haga ngaisunu mi nunna rinne, “Ati dabe tuna kanthangnu lousu ngam dingbo?”
42018027	Jisu na rinne, “Misa lang hung tang lanu ga Rikrwang khou hung tang zanuwe.”
42018028	Peter na rinne, “Phaang thang ngo, anina pum brumza bathan satluga Nanung sui se ongme.”
42018029	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei lang chungna, bain mak tabe banu bapa mak tabe bau banao mak tabe bamei mak tabe basa rwan bing bathan satluga,
42018030	hei kaan bi banina badam tam inkuga khatle hung dingnu bakaan bi khwa sei ringnu lou thang mak tingnu khatchale maake.”
42018031	Haba nung Jisu na potroi pat somga kani ding kalwang swakluga bani khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, ani Jerusalem la se ongme khatle Misa Sa Kapaisa lang bi thiamting rwanna hiak thang ngaaknu bing ga hung tanglune.
42018032	“Balangbe Bating Gentile rwan khou pi swaklu rwe, Bating kiamlune, pi kazaklune khatle bachin le bachin thanglune.
42018033	Banina Bating bweilune khatle athatlune. Atiga Maan ni thum ni ring thou latlune.”
42018034	Atiyeda rin ongnu bing nga banina bakaba khatchale thei mak ngaake; rin ongnu chong nga bani khouna inthim thang ngaake khatle rin damnu bing ga bani bakaba thei mak ngaake.
42018035	Jisu na Jericho hung tang lang nai hung bi, tudannu mik chonu pakhat nisaga lampui paan bi badungluga ong ngaake.
42018036	Mi khangna se hungnu ga ngaisuluga, maanna haga paaambo diga ngai rwe.
42018037	Banina bakhou Nazareth Jisu hung naye diga rin rwe.
42018038	Maanna paoga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa Jisu ating phaangkriang thang ngo!”
42018039	Habei ga meithaan la se ongnu mi nunna bating rim rim ong lang twei rwe; atiyeda maanna pao rakan ranga rinne, “David Sa Kapaisa ating phaangkriang thang ngo!”
42018040	Jisu na han basakluga bating Bakim bi kalwang hung lang zathang pi rwe. Bakim bi hungnu kaan bi Jisu na bakhou
42018041	ngaiye, “Eina nalaang paaam to thangnu bathaigabo?” Maanna katake, “Pukraangba, ei mik munu lou nwamme.”
42018042	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Namik mu lat tingro; nabalumsat paan bina nating pi sa thang rwe.”
42018043	Haba kahan bina maan mik mu lat rwe, atiga Rikrwang lwat liannu ding swanga Banung sui se rwe. Mi bingna haga munu kaan bi Rikrwang ding swanka rwe.
42019001	Jisu na Zericho bi khutluga habei ga se phao swak rwe.
42019002	Phaang ngo Zacchaeus tiga kounu, ramkhai khomnu rwan om balu tonu, lungsanu pakhat am ngaake.
42019003	Maanna Jisu wa tubo phaang lang zong ngaake atiyeda mi tam briakpina mungam mak ngaake, balangbe maan bangiamnu mi ngaake.
42019004	Atibriakpina maanna pak basom kaluga Jisu ding phaang lang heipong kung bi bazaak ka rwe, balangbe Jisu na haba lampui bi ga se rwan hung dingnu ngaake.
42019005	Jisu na haba riak pi ga hung tangluga phaangkanu kaan bi bating muluga bakhou rinne, “Zacchaeus barapka taro, balangbe Ei aniya nain bi riak lang rwe.”
42019006	Maanna barapka taluga Jisu ding karoga bain bi loukhut rwe.
42019007	Banina haga munu kaan bi bani khangsungna tu tu tam tamga rinne, “Phaang ngo, Maan noh mi khat om man to lang thou drwe.”
42019008	Habei ga Zacchaeus na han thouluga Pukraangba khou rinne, “Phaang thang ngo, Pukraangba, eina aom lan tangkhai lungsianu nun lang piye; eina tudannu om baze maknu baraan piga lou thangnu amme dabe, badam bali inkuga eina pine.”
42019009	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Aniya heiba in bi ringriak hung rwe, balangbe heiba manpa heiya le Abraham sa kapaisa ye;
42019010	balangbe Misa Sa Kapaisa ga braan damnu ding zong lang khatle kan thang langna hungnuwe.”
42019011	Banina heiba chong bing nga ngai ongnu kaan bi Maanna chongchak katei khatle rinne, balangbe Maan Jerusalem hung tang lang nai hung ngaak rwe khatle Rikrwang om krwang talei ga barapka hunglu rwe diga banina baning ngaake.
42019012	Atibriakpina Maanna rinne, “Tudannu kaliannu manpa pakhatna namlaanu talei khat la seluga balaang krwang talei khat lousuluga hung lat lang se ngaake.
42019013	Maanna baswak pat som ding kou hungluga, bani pakhat khat khou mina khat khat pi luga bani khou rinne, ‘Ei hung lat mak basaan heiyana langgon ngaako.’
42019014	“Atiyeda batalei mi nunna bating batanga, banung la mi lang thangluga rinne, ‘Heiba manpana ani lu chung bi paannu ani bathai make.’
42019015	Maanna krwang talei louluga, han hungnu kaan bi maanna sian pi thang damnu swak rwan gana, langgonluga inza za tongrubo dinu thei langna, bakim bi kou hung lang, zathang pi rwe.
42019016	“Kamanu manpa gana hungluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, naom mina gana katei mina som tong rwe.’
42019017	“Maanna bakhou rinne, ‘To chui rwe, kasanu swak; nang titcha chung bi balumsa lang khop briakpina namlian som om bapuba toro.’
42019018	“Kaninu manpa gana hungluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, naom mina gana katei mina impaang tong rwe.’
42019019	“Maanna hadanga bakhou rinne, ‘Nang le namlian impaang om bapuba toro.’
42019020	“Katei khat kana le hungluga rinne, ‘Bapuba, naom mina ga abeiya am rwe, eina heiya pwanna kazwanluga ri thangnuwe.
42019021	Balangbe ei nating kachiye, balangbe nang kanthi sianu mi briakpina nangna thangta maknu riak pi kachung thounu khatle nangna bwan thang maknu ding khom thounu miye.’
42019022	“Bapubana bakhou rinne, ‘Sa maknu swak nang, namun bina kabia swaknu nung suiga eina nating chong sem lang rwe. Eiya kanthi sianu, eina thangta maknu riak pi lou thounu khatle eina bwan thang maknu ding khom thounu miye dinu nang theiye.
42019023	Ati dabe pa-aam toga nangna aom sian ga sian rik in bi thang maknubo, eina hung latnu kaan bi haga sianthoi le diga eina lousubilabo?’
42019024	“Maanna bakim bi han ongnu mi nun khou rinne, ‘Bakhouna mina ga lou swak tammo khatle mina som amnu bakhou ga pi dammo.’
42019025	“Atiyeda banina bakhou rinne, ‘Bapuba, bakhou mina som am rwe.’
42019026	‘Balangbe eina nani khou rinnuwe, ka amnu mi bing khouga pi thanglune khatle ka maaknu bakhou ga, bakhou amnu ga tangga lou swak tamlune.
42019027	‘Atiyeda ating munanu, eina bani lu chung bi paannu bathai maknu nun ding ga abeiya lou hungluga, ameithaan bi athat sat tammo.’ ”
42019028	Maanna heiya rinnu nung, sebasomluga Jerusalem la se ka ngaake.
42019029	Maan Olive Rammwan diga kounu riak pi amnu, Bethphage le Bethany kim bi hungnu kaan bi Baom potroi pat ni ding lang thangluga
42019030	rinne, “Narwei meithaan la amnu nam la ga sero atiga sekhut pi mi khatchanale twang mak aangnu, lola swan khat bang thang ong ngaakne. Haga sutluga abeiya lou hung ngo.
42019031	Tudannuna ‘Haga pa-aam lang sutnubo’ diga ngaiye dabe, bakhou rinno, ‘Heiya Pukraangba lang bathaang amme.’ ”
42019032	Maanna lang thang damnu pat ni gana se hungnu kaan bi barwei khou rin thangnu ga danga dou rwe.
42019033	Barweina lola swan ga sut lang to ong bi bapuba rwanna barwei khou rinne, “Narweina lola swan ding ga paaam lang sutnubo?”
42019034	Barweina rinne, “Heiya Pukraangba lang bathaang amme.”
42019035	Barweina haga Jisu khou lou hung rwe. Banina lola swan chung bi bani pwan sap thang rwe khatle banina ha chung bi Jisu ding pi twang rwe.
42019036	Maanna atiga se hung bi, banina bani pwan lampui bi pha thang rwe.
42019037	Maan Olive Rammwan setanu riak nai hungnu kaan bi potroi rwan mi khangna banina phaangmu damnu tasiatnu chwan bing langna baraam basaangga khatle karoga paoga Rikrwang ding swanga
42019038	rinne, “ ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Krwang ga aih saye!’ Tambaan la dai bazaangnu khatle basaang kataknu bi lwat lian ding ngo!”
42019039	Mi khang lak pina Pharisee rwan mi kasemna Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Naom potroi rwan ding ga tweiyo.”
42019040	Atiyeda Maanna bani khou katake, “Eina nani khou rinnuwe, hei rwanna rim rim ta damme dabe heiba lung bingna barapka pao thoulune.”
42019041	Maanna Jerusalem nai hungnu kaan bi Maanna namlian ding phaangmuluga ha langna chapka
42019042	rinne, “Nangna aniya lumik pi, nazanna nalaang dai bazaangnu pi thang dingnu ding ga bapu thei ngaake dabe! Atiyeda atunba haga namikphaang bi inthim thang ong maang nge.
42019043	Balangbe nalu chung bi heipai bakaanna hunglu rwe nating munanu mi nunna kapan toga, nating nung ma imbei inchang ong qwatluga thing damlu rwe,
42019044	banina nating khatle nakhou amnu nasa rwan ding to mut satlu rwe khatle nakhou banina lung bing nga khat chung bi khat pi am latla rwe, balangbe nating hung phaang damnu dat ka nangna thei mak ngaake.”
42019045	Maan kalum in bi khutluga habei ga kaleinu zwannu chwan to ongnu nun ding kazun sat thouluga
42019046	bani khou rinne, “Heiya hiak thangluga amme, ‘Ain ga kalum in ne,’ atiyeda haga nanina ‘Baruksaak mi nun kabu’ pi to rwe.’ ”
42019047	Maan kalum in bi kani bathin mi nun ding bachu thangga ong ngaake. Atiyeda takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan khatle mi nun ding kai thangnu nunna Bating athat lang zong ngaake,
42019048	atiyeda banina khatchale tonu ngam mak ngaake; balangbe mi nunna Bachong ga sung khutka ngai ngaake.
42020001	Kani khat Maanna kalum in bi mi nun ding bachu thangga khatle sacham kasam thangga ongnu kaan bi takopuba rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le patso rwan bing le bachamga Bating kaega
42020002	Bakhou rinne, “Ani khou rinno, Nangna pa-aam ngamna hei bing nga to ongnubo? Mak tabe Nakhou heiba ngamma pi thangnu maan ga tubo?”
42020003	Maanna bani khou katake, “Eina le nani khou chong khat ngaide, haga Akhou katako:
42020004	John na baptize to thangnu ga tambaan lanamo mak tabe mi nun khounabo?”
42020005	Bani cham kakhanluga rinne, “Anina ‘Tambaan la naye,’ diga rinne dabe, Maanna rinlune, ‘Ati dabe nanina pa-aam toga bating balumsa maknubo?’
42020006	Anina ‘Haga mi nun khou naye,’ diga rinne dabe, mi bingna ani ding lungna khum lune, balangbe banina John ding thiamting khate diga balumsaye.”
42020007	Atiga banina haga inlamnabo dinu thei make diga katak rwe.
42020008	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina pa-aam ngamna hei bing nga tonubo dinu Ei le nani khou rinlaye.”
42020009	Maanna mi nun khou heiba chongchak heiya rin thou rwe, “Tudannu pakhatna drakha anqwat bachaluga haga anqwat mi nun khou saan thangsialuga, maan namlaanu taram la bakhwa seiga bazin thou dam ngaake.
42020010	Drakha kraa lwaknu dat pi maanna baswak pakhat ting anqwat mi nun khou lang hung rwe, haga banina balaang drakha kraa kasem pi lang nge. Atiyeda anqwat mi nun gana bating bweiluga kut barwang bathan sat rwe.
42020011	“Maanna swak katei khat ting bathan lat rwe; banina bating le bwei rwe khatle bating to mai sia thangluga kut barwang bathan sat rwe.
42020012	Maanna leng thumnu toga pakhat ting bathan lat rwe; banina bating le to bazam thangluga bazwan sat thang rwe.
42020013	“Drakha anqwatpuna rinne, ‘Ei pa-aam tonuna sa dingbo? Eina kriangnu asa kapaisa ding ga bathanne. Banina bating munu kaan bi takung tazei tonu le zaye.’
42020014	“Atiyeda anqwat mi nunna bating munu kaan bi bani cham kakhanluga rinne, ‘Heiya barakhum lwak tingnu mi rwe. Hungro, barakhum ga anina lwak lang bating athat satrizo.’
42020015	Banina bating drakha anqwat paan la bazwan satluga athat rwe. Atibriakpina drakha anqwatpuba gana bani ding paaam tolu dingbo?
42020016	“Maanna hungluga anqwat mi nun ding ga to braan satlune. Atiluga anqwat ka mi katei rwan khou pi lune.” Mi nunna haga ngaisunu kaan bi banina rinne, “Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo.”
42020017	Maanna bani ding phaangluga rinne, “Ati dabe ‘Intok mi nunna bazwan sat thangnu lung gana, Intaki om bakung tonu lung imbei rwe.’ diga hiak thangnu ga pa-aambo?
42020018	Tudannu heiba lung chung bi bazwantanu ga baklune; atiyeda tudannu heiba lungna balu chung bi ta thangnu maan ga, tambut imbeilune.”
42020019	Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le takopuba rwanna haba chakrin bi ga Balu chung bi kut ta lang zong ngaake atiyeda bani mi nun ding kachi ngaake, balangbe Pukraangba na heiba chongchak heiya bani ding rinnuwe dinu banina thei ngaake.
42020020	Banina Jisu ding chwanga, inkamnu mi ririak senu thot tonu nun ding bathan thangluga, Bachongkaang bina Bating namluga, taleipuba om ngam khatle nat pi bachoi thang langna,
42020021	banina Bakhou ngai rwe, “Bachuthangnupa, Nangna bazega kabiaye khatle bachu thang nge dinu ani thei rwe, Nang mi mai phaang make atiyeda Rikrwang lampui ding bazega bachu thang rwe:
42020022	Caesar lang ramkhai pinu zamo za makpo?”
42020023	Maanna bani rou ga theiluga bani khou katake, “Nanina Ating pa-aam lang tamphaang ongnubo?
42020024	Akhou denari khat pi muwo. Heiya tu maangbo khatle pa-aam hiak thang ambo?” Banina katake, “Caesar omme.”
42020025	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atibriakpina Caesar om pot ka Caesar khou piyo khatle Rikrwang om pot ka Rikrwang khou piyo.”
42020026	Banina Jisu ding mi nun meithaan bi Bachong kabiak pina namnu ngamlan rwe. Bachong katak pi ga bani loh lo ga thiap thiap ta drwe.
42020027	Ring thou latnu maake dinu Saducee rwan mi kasem Bakim bi hungluga
42020028	rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Moses na ani lang hiak thang ngaake, tudannu unao khatna mei kouluga sa nao cha makka thi damme dabe, banao gana batang mei ding ga louluga batang lang chungna sa nao cha ding gaye.
42020029	“Atiga unao pat siari am ngaake. Patsonu ga mei kouluga sa nao cha makka thi drwe.
42020030	Kaninu gana bating bamei lang lou rwe, maan le sa nao cha makka thi lat trwe.
42020031	Inthumnu gana bating lou lat rwe, hadanga bani pat siarina bating lou rwe; atiyeda bani khangsung sa nao cha makka thi loi drwe.
42020032	Kham katak pi mannu ga le thi drwe.
42020033	Atibriakpina ring thou latnu ni mannu ga tu mei to dingbo? Balangbe bani pat siarina bating bamei toga lou ngaake.”
42020034	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Heiba bakaan om sa kapaisa rwanna tazwan bahwanne khatle tazwan bahwan lang pi swake.
42020035	Atiyeda hung dingnu bakaan lang ga khope diga baningnu khatle thi bina ring thou lang khopnu mi nun ga tazwan bahwan make, tazwan bahwan lang le pi swak make;
42020036	bani thi lat la rwe, balangbe bani tambaan chonglang rwan le bachamlune khatle bani ring thou latnu om sa rwan briakpina bani Rikrwang sa rwan to rwe.
42020037	Moses na Pukraangba ding ‘Abraham Rikrwang, Isaac Rikrwang khatle Jacob Rikrwang’ diga kounu kaan bi maan tangga chok ongnu lou lak om lang bi hiak thangnu riak pi thinu mi nunna ring thouwe dinu pi mu thang nge.
42020038	Balangbe maan thinu nun om Rikrwang make atiyeda ringnu nun om Rikrwang nge, balangbe Bakhou mi bingza ring nge.”
42020039	Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan mi kasemna Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Nangna rin chuiga rin thang rwe.”
42020040	Haba nung bina thouga banina Bakhou tangai ngai lat raang mak ngaak rwe.
42020041	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Tatoga Christa heiya David Sa Kapaisa ye diga rinnubo?
42020042	Balangbe David maan bahakna Kalum Laa chongdip pi atiga rin thang nge, ‘Pukraangba na Apukraangba khou rinne,
42020043	“Eina Nating munanu nun ding Naket kadim riak pi to mak basaan, Akut inchang pek la badung ong ngo.” ’
42020044	Atibriakpina David na Bating ‘Pukraangba’ diga kouwe dabe, Maan tatoga Basa Kapaisa to langbo?”
42020045	Mi bingna ngai ongnu kaan bi Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou rinne,
42020046	“Pon baswannu thangnu, keithian lak pi mi nunna kadou chongkaang kabia thangnu ding lou nwamnu, synagogue pi sa kataknu kaong riak pi ong nwamnu, balou riak pi sa kataknu kaong riak ting bathainu, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan ding ga nani cheksinno,
42020047	baniga tameinu rwan in kapumnu khatle mi nun ding pi mulangna kalum bakhwa seiye. Bani nun lu chung bi ta thang dingnu chongtok ka lian inkulune.”
42021001	Jisu na phaang koinu kaan bi lungsanu nunna lan kat thangnu riak pi bani om potkat rwan sat thangnu mu rwe,
42021002	tudannu lungsianu tameinu pakhatna le sian pek swan kani sat thangnu Maanna mu rwe.
42021003	Maanna rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, lungsianu heiba tameinuna mi katei bing ma inkuga sat thang rwe;
42021004	balangbe katei bing gana bani om am tamnu bi gana Rikrwang lang leithwan kat thang nge atiyeda heiba mannuna balungsiat sung bi baom maaknu bina maan sa ring dingnu pum brum ga thangta rwe.”
42021005	Mi kasemna kalum in ga, intia lang kasanu lungna khatle potkatna tapon to thangbo diga kabia ngaake, Maanna rinne,
42021006	“Nanina mu ongnu hei bing nga, to bakla dingnu lung khat chung bi lung khatchale am thang siala dingnu bakaan ga hunglu rwe.”
42021007	Banina Bakhou ngaiye, “Bachuthangnupa, ati dabe hei bing nga impei dat pi swaklu dingbo? Hei bing nga swak tingnu kaan bi pa-aam badannu amlu dingbo?”
42021008	Maanna rinne, “Pakhatchanale nani ding minam mak lang cheksinno. Balangbe Ameng bi mi tamga hungluga rinlune, ‘Ei Maan ga rwe’ khatle ‘Bakaan nai rwe.’ Atibriakpina nani bani nung sui mako.
42021009	“Atiyeda nanina kraan cham khatle kasao kabaonu cham ngaisunu kaan bi nani kachi mako; balangbe hei bing nga kamaga swaklune atiyeda kakhamnu ga hung nong bila maang nge.”
42021010	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Chaat khatna chaat khat lu chung bi khatle krwang talei khatna krwang talei khat maitwang bi kraan katwak thoulune.
42021011	Tei teinu bariak pi kanatnu talei kalinglune, bu taangnu le ripian; kachinu khatle tasiatnu badannu bing tambaan la mulune.
42021012	“Atiyeda ha bing ga swak maknu meithaan, banina nani lu chung bi kut taluga rai thoulune, synagogue le qwan in bi nani ding pi swaklune. Ameng lang chungna nani ding krwang nun le bapuba rwan khou phun thanglune.
42021013	Atiyeda haga sake to lang nani lang badou chanu tolune.
42021014	“Atibriakpina nanina katak tingnu meithaan pa-aam kabia dingbo diga kakhan kama mak lang nani sung hanno;
42021015	balangbe nani ding munanu mi nunna nani ding to kabat kabaangnu mak tabe kakhangnu ngamlanu mun khatle ningting Eina nani lang pi thangne.
42021016	“Nani nu pa rwanna, naunao rwanna, inkhun mi nun le baan rwanna nani ding pi swaklune khatle banina nani kasem ding athatlune.
42021017	“Ameng lang chungna mi bingna nani ding batanlune.
42021018	Atiyeda nani lu bina sam sang khat tangga braanlaye.
42021019	Nani nun khaang rakannu paan bina nani ringnu lousulune.
42021020	“Jerusalem ding kraanmi nunna han qwatnu nanina phaangmunu kaan bi haga lung taak lang nai hung rwe dinu theiyo.
42021021	Judea bi ongnu mi nun ga rammwan la pak thou dam ding ngo, namlian sung bi amnu nun ga le pak swak tam ding ngo khatle nam la mi nun le namlian bi ga khut mak ting ngo.
42021022	Balangbe hiak thang ngaaknu bing ga hung tang langna, takhum baannu bakaan ga hung tang rwe.
42021023	Ha kaan ga pum ritnu khatle nao chup ongnu nun lang aih sianuweda! Balangbe talei ram bi riangre taknu hunglune khatle heiba mi nun lu chung bi Rikrwang balung pwan ta thanglune.
42021024	“Bani ding kachaak chemna athatlune, bani ding kraan minam toga chaat bing khou phun thou damlune. Gentile rwan om kaan ga loi mak basaan Gentile rwanna Jerusalem ding bani ketna kadim kataalune.
42021025	“Lumik pi, tha bi, insi bing bi badannu mulune khatle talei ram bi chaat bing khou riangrenu, tuipui le tui kabaapnuna batok thei maknu tolune;
42021026	kachinu bina khatle talei ram bi hung dingnu om lang bi kakhanluga mi nunna balumta rwe, balangbe saangbaan la ngam bing kanuklune.
42021027	“Haba kaan bi Misa Sa Kapaisana tambu bi ngam khatle tasiatnu lwat le bachamga tanu banina phaangmulune.
42021028	Hei bing nga swak thounu kaan bi nani batou thouluga basaang la phaangkawo, balangbe nani ding kan thang dingnu bakaan ga nai rwe.”
42021029	Maanna bani khou chongchak khat rinne, “Tacham kung khatle thingkung bing ding ga phaang ngo,
42021030	ha bing gana bazik kasat swaknu kaan bi nanina khwalumpha nai rwe dinu theiye.
42021031	“Hadanga hei bing nga hung tangnu nanina munu kaan bi Rikrwang om krwang talei ga nai rwe dinu theiyo.
42021032	“Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, ha bing ga hung tang mak basaan heiba mi chaat heiya khatchale braanlaye.
42021033	Tambaan le talei ya braan lune atiyeda Achongkaang nga khatchale braanlaye.
42021034	“Sa innuna, zu in kalonuna, nani kum langza sung riangrenu gana, nani sung ding pi ritta mak lang khatle ha ni lumik ka thei mak daakka nani lu chung bi hung mak lang nani nani zanna barak theiyo.
42021035	Balangbe talei ram bariak bing bi lung ongnu mi bing lu chung bi phaa danga hunglune.
42021036	Atibriakpina hung dingnu heiza bina dwak swak lang khopnuwe diga chak thang lang khatle Misa Sa Kapaisa meithaan bi hannu ngam lang bakaan badat bathin barak theiga hweini ong ngo.”
42021037	Maanna thamlai bakaan bi kalum in bi bachu thang ngaake atiyeda zingphana Olive Rammwan diga kounu rammwan la ong dam ngaake.
42021038	Louthwan khwan mi nunna kalum in bi Bachong ngai lang Bakhou hung ngaake.
42022001	Takan Swaknu Balou diga kounu Khai Sui maknu Uilu Balou ga nai hung ngaak rwe.
42022002	Takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna Jisu ding athat lang lampui zong rwe, balangbe bani mi nun ding kachiye.
42022003	Potroi pat somga kani lak pi suinu, Iscariot diga kounu Judas khou Seitaan khut rwe.
42022004	Maanna seluga Jisu ding tatoga bani khou pi swaknu za dingbo diga takopuba rwan khatle kalum in ngaak balu rwan le diga kathui ngaake.
42022005	Bani karo rwe khatle banina balaang sian pi lang za thang rwe.
