42022006	Maanna karenluga mi nun maaknu kaan bi Jisu ding bani khou pi swak lang badou chanu zong ngaake.
42022007	Khai Sui maknu Uilu Balou Lumik, Takan Swaknu Balou lang zao athatnu kaan hung tang rwe.
42022008	Jisu na Peter le John ding lang thangluga rinne, “Anina sa lang, seluga ani lang Takan Swaknu Balou daanro.”
42022009	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Anina haga bariak ingaipai daan thangnu Nangna bathaigabo?”
42022010	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, nanina haba namlian bi ga sekhutnu kaan bi manpa khat tui ben taanluga nani pek la se hunglune; maan khut tamnu in bi ga suikhutro.
42022011	Atiga nanina inpuba khou ga ngaiyo, ‘Bachuthangnupa na rinne, “Eina Aom potroi rwan le diga Takan Swaknu Balou sa bacham dingnu bazin in kaa zo ingaabo?” ‘
42022012	Maanna kaliannu, daan thangnu basaang in kaa khat pi mu thanglune; habei ga daanro.”
42022013	Banina senu kaan bi Maanna rin thangnu ga danga dou rwe, atiga banina Takan Swaknu Balou riak lang habei ga daan rwe.
42022014	Chakrin ga hung tangnu kaan bi chonglang rwan pat somga kani le diga sa in lang ongta rwe.
42022015	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina riangre kanang khaang mak balei Takan Swaknu Balou Thaisaak heiya Ei nani le diga sa bachamnu bathai take;
42022016	balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei hung tang mak basaan Takan Swaknu Balou Ei sa latla rwe.”
42022017	Haba nung bi Maanna ngai ga lou thouluga, swanka thangluga rinne, “Heiya louluga nani lak pi kasemro;
42022018	balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, Rikrwang om krwang talei hung mak basaan Eina heiba drakha kraa bina in latla rwe.”
42022019	Maanna uilu ga lou thouluga swanka thang rwe khatle haga thiak bakluga, bani khou pi luga rinne, “Heiya nani lang pi thangnu Apum rwe; Ating baningsu ong lang heiya towo.”
42022020	Hadanga sa in taang bi Maanna ngai ga lou thouluga rinne, “Heiba ngai ya Eina nani lang ta thang damnu Athi bi han thangnu chonghen kathan ga rwe.
42022021	Phaang ngo Ating pi swak tingnu kut ka table chung bi Akut le am bacham ongme.
42022022	Heiya kak thangnu nung suiga batak takka Misa Sa Kapaisa gana seta ongnuwe atiyeda Bating pi swaknu maan ga aih sianuweda!”
42022023	Bani lak pi haba chwan to dingnu mi ga tubo diga khat le khat ngai kale thou rwe.
42022024	Atiga bani lak pi tuna lian kataknu tolu dingbo dinu lang bi le, bani kae kale thou rwe.
42022025	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Gentile rwan om krwang nunna bani lu chung bi balu to rwe khatle bani lu chung bi chwan to ongnu nun ding ga ‘kriang theinu nun’ diga kou rwe.
42022026	Atiyeda nani lak piba hadan mak ting ngo; haba hut lang nani lak pi lian kataknu maan gana, kasinnu to ding ngo khatle balu tonu maan gana chwanlaang to ding ngo.
42022027	“Balangbe sa in lang badung ongnu maan ga le, chwanlaang tonu maan ga le, tuna lian inkubo? Sa in lang badung ongnu maan ga makkabo? Atiyeda Eiba nani lak pi chwanlaang tonu Khat tanga ongme.
42022028	Ating tamnu bing bi nani Ei le diga ong bachamnu nunne.
42022029	Apa na Akhou krwang talei sin thangnu danga, Eina le nani khou krwang talei sin thang nge,
42022030	heiya nanina Ei le diga Akrwang talei la sa in bacham lang khatle nanina chongsem kaong riak pi ongluga Israel chaat somga kani ding chong kasem lang nge.”
42022031	Pukraangba na rinne, “Simon, Simon! Phaang ngo, Seitaan na nating gehu ding basapnu danga basap lang niye.
42022032	Atiyeda nabalumsat ka braan mak lang, Ei nalaang hweini thang ongme; atiga nangna nasung le latnu kaan bi nau nanao rwan ding pi tip thang ngo.”
42022033	Peter na Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, qwan in bi khutnu ngaakle, thi dingnu ngaakle ei Nang le se bacham lang daan ongme.”
42022034	Maanna rinne, “Peter, Eina nakhou rinne, nangna Ating thei make diga za makka rin indao leng thum mak basaan aankhongna khwanglaye.”
42022035	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina nani ding sian khao, bazin khao khatle ketthop phun makka lang thangnu kaan bi nani lang pa-aam baatnu amgabo?” Banina rinne, “Khatchale baatnu maake.”
42022036	Atibriakpina Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atiyeda atun, sian khao amnu maan gana, haga phunro khatle bazin khao amnu maanna le hadanga lou dingro; atiga kachaak chem maaknu maanna, baom sin basoi zwan satluga haga khat kalei ding ngo.
42022037	Balangbe Eina nani khou rinnuwe, bathiangnu chong bi hiak thang ngaaknu ga Akhou hung tang lang nge, ‘Maan koi maan amnu mi nun lak pi basing sem thang rwe.’ Balangbe Alang bi rin thangnu ga pi hung tang lang nai rwe.”
42022038	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, phaang thang ngo, abeiya kachaak chem kani amme.” Maanna rinne, “Haga khop rwe.”
42022039	Maanna se swakluga Bachaang toga, Olive Rammwan la thou dam ngaake, atiga Potroi rwanna le Banung sui se ngaake.
42022040	Maanna haba riak pi ga hung tangnu kaan bi bani khou rinne, “Nani nun bathemnu bi ta mak lang kalummo.”
42022041	Maanna bani khouna lung tang sat tang zanu riak pi se swakluga, kekhok detaluga kalumga
42022042	rinne, “Apa, Nangna baningnuwe dabe, heiba ngai ya Akhouna lou sat thang ngo; atiyeda Eina baningnu to makka, Nangna baningnu to ding ngo.”
42022043	Tambaan lana tambaan chonglang khat hungluga Bating pi nat thang rwe.
42022044	Basung riangre briakpina, inkuga kalum rakanga kalum rwe. Baom baluptui ga talei bi kaliannu thitang nun danga santa rwe.
42022045	Maan kalum ong bina thouluga, Baom potroi rwan khou hungnu kaan bi bani sung riangre briakpina in ong ngaaknu dou rwe.
42022046	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani pa-aam lang in ongnubo? Bathemnu bi ta mak lang thouluga kalummo.”
42022047	Jisu na chong kabia ong bi phaang ngo, potroi pat somga kani lak pi, Judas tiga kounu pakhat kana, bani meithaan se kamaluga mi khang khat ting, kalwangluga Jisu ding kaput lang Bakim bi hung rwe.
42022048	Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Judas, nangna Misa Sa Kapaisa ding kaputluga pi swak lang tonubo?”
42022049	Bakim bi ong qwat ongnu nunna swak tingnu thot ka muluga Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, kachaak chemna kapakrizobo?”
42022050	Bani lak pi pakhatna takolu om swak ting inchang kanaa kapak chat thang rwe.
42022051	Atiyeda Jisu na rinne, “Heiya khop rwe.” Maanna bakanaa ga banaan thangluga pi sa thang rwe.
42022052	Haba nung bi Jisu na Bakim bi hungnu takopuba rwan, kalum in ngaak milu nun khatle patso rwan khou rinne, “Nanina Ating kasut sanu maitwang bi danga kachaak chem khatle thing kalok choiluga hungnubo?
42022053	Eina kalum in bi kani bathin nani le diga ong bachamnu kaan bi Ating nam lang to make. Atiyeda heiya nani lang badou chanu chakrin ga rwe khatle kazingnu ngam ga rwe.”
42022054	Banina Bating namluga takolu in la kai thou drwe. Atiyeda Peter na impaan saam saamga Banung suizon hung ngaake.
42022055	Banina inkhu zai bi mei to thouluga ong kadoi ongnu kaan bi Peter le bani lak pi ong ong ngaake.
42022056	Maanna mei kim bi badung tanu kaan bi swak rangaaknu khatna bating phaang ong ngaake khatle phaang dengga phaangluga rinne, “Heiba manpa le Maan le diga se bacham ngaake.”
42022057	Atiyeda maanna Jisu ding za makka rinne, “Kamaisa, ei Bating thei make.”
42022058	Bakaan kasem nung bi pakhatna le bating muluga rinne, “Nang le bani lak pi naye.” Peter na rinne, “Manpa, ei make!”
42022059	Chakrin khat khak nung bi, manpa pakhatna rakanga rin rwe, “Batak takka heiba manpa le Maan le bacham ngaake, balangbe maan Galilee rwanne.”
42022060	Peter na katake, “He manpa, nangna rin ongnu ga ei thei make!” Maanna atiga kabia ongnu kahan bi aankhongna khwang rwe.
42022061	Atiga Pukraangba na kanei swakluga Peter ding phaang rwe. Atiga Pukraangba na bakhou, “Aankhongna khwang maknu meithaan, nang Ating za mak leng thumlune” diga rin damnu ga baningsu rwe.
42022062	Habei ga Peter na swakluga chap barung hingga chap rwe.
42022063	Jisu ding rakhi ongnu nun gana Bating kiamluga bwei rwe.
42022064	Banina Bating Bamik khwam lemluga Bamai kum bi kabengga ngaiye, “Rinno! Nating bweinuga tubo?”
42022065	Banina balaa ga kasianu chong taswang khak Balu chung bi kabia rwe.
42022066	Khwa baan swak khap tinu kaan bi mi nun om patso rwan, takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna hung kadoiluga Bating bani om thampei bi phun swakluga rinne,
42022067	“Nang Christa ye dabe, ani khou rinno.” Atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou rin beida nanina balumsalaye.
42022068	Eina le nani khou ngaiye dabe nanina Akhou kataklaye mak tabe Ating bathanlaye.
42022069	Atunna thouga Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Rikrwang ngam kut inchang pek la badunglu rwe.”
42022070	Habei ga bani khangsungna rinne, “Ati dabe, Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa bo?” Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ei rwe diga nanina bazega rin rwe.”
42022071	Banina rinne, “Anina pa-aam sake lou lat lang bathaang am maang gabo? Balangbe Bamun bahakna kabia swaknu ga ani bahakna ngaisu rwe.”
42023001	Mi khang gana thouluga Jisu ding Pilate khou kalwang thou drwe.
42023002	Banina Bating koi impu thangga rinne, “Heiba Manpana ani chaat ting lampui kaimaan rwe, Caesar lang ramkhai pinu Maanna khaamme khatle Maan Bahakna Bating Krwang Christa ye diga rin rwe.”
42023003	Pilate na Bakhou ngaiye, “Nang Jihudi rwan Krwang bo?” Jisu na bakhou katake, “Nangna rin damnu ga rwe.”
42023004	Habei ga Pilate na takopuba rwan le mi khang khou rinne, “Heiba Manpa lu chung bi ei koi dou make.”
42023005	Atiyeda banina rakan ranga rinne, “Heiba Manpana mi nun ding to kasao kabaoga, Galilee bina thouga heiba riak tangga Judea taram bing bi bachu thang rwe.”
42023006	Pilate na Galilee om lang bi ngaisunu kaan bi heiba Manpa heiya Galilee rwanbo diga ngai rwe.
42023007	Jisu wa Herod na paan ongnu taram sung bi ongnu miye dinu Pilate na theinu kaan bi Jisu ding Herod khou bathan hung rwe, haba kaan bi Herod Jerusalem bi am ngaake.
42023008	Herod na Jisu ding munu kaan bi maan karo tak ngaake; balangbe maan bakhwa seiga Jisu ding kadou nwam ngaake, balangbe maan Jisu om lang bi taswang khak ngaisu ngaake khatle Jisu na tasiatnu chwan kasem tonu maanna mu nwam ngaake.
42023009	Maanna Jisu khou chong taswang khak ngai ngaake atiyeda Jisu na bakhou chong khatchale katak make.
42023010	Takopuba rwan le chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna han thouluga Jisu ding koi impu thangnu chong rakanga kabia ngaake.
42023011	Habei ga Herod na baom kraanmi rwan le diga Bating balaa ga kiam rwe, Bakhou phaangsanu baswannu pon sin basoi thangluga, Pilate khou bathan hunglat rwe.
42023012	Ha ni bahak ka Pilate le Herod baan to kale ngaak rwe, balangbe meithaan barwei muna kale ngaake.
42023013	Pilate na takopuba rwan, bapuba rwan khatle mi nun ding kou kadoiluga
42023014	bani khou rinne, “Heiba Manpa ding nanina mi nun ding lampui kaimaannu khat ting danga, akhou phun hung rwe. Phaang ngo, eina Bating nani meithaan bi tamphaangnu kaan bi nanina Balu chung bi koi impu thangnu bing om lang bi ei koi dou make;
42023015	balangbe Herod na le dou make, eina nani ding Herod khou bathan rwe; phaang ngo, Maan thi lang khopnu chwan khatchale tonu maake.
42023016	“Atibriakpina eina Bating laakluga bathan sat lang zung nge”
42023017	(balangbe Takan Swaknu Balou dat pi maanna bani lang mi pakhat ting bathan thang lang bathaang am ngaake).
42023018	Atiyeda bani khangsungna khwan khatcha toga pao thou rwe, “Heiba Manpa ding nga athat sat tammo, ani lang Barnabas ting bathan thang ngo.”
42023019	Barnabas ka namlian bi chong laa pi swaknu khatle mi athat briakpina bating qwan in bi nam thang ngaake.
42023020	Atibriakpina Pilate na, Jisu ding bathan thang nwamga, mi nun khou rinlat ngaake.
42023021	Atiyeda banina paoga rinne, “Bating cross pi athat tammo, cross pi athat tammo!”
42023022	Atiga Pilate na leng thumnu toga bani khou rinne, “Maanna pa-aam kasianu chwan torugabo? Bakhou thi lang khopnu koi dou make. Atibriakpina eina Bating laakluga bathan sat lang zung nge.”
42023023	Atiyeda banina baraam basaangga pao rakan ranga, Bating cross pi athat thang dam lang ni ngaake. Mi nun khatle takoluna paonu gana ngam rwe.
42023024	Banina bathainu ga ati dingro diga Pilate na chongtan pi swak rwe.
42023025	Atiga chong laa pi swaknu mi athatnu qwan in bi thang ongnu, banina ni ongnu bating bani lang bathan thang rwe; atiyeda Jisu dingna banina baningnu to dam lang bani khou bachoi thang rwe.
42023026	Kraanmi nunna Jisu ding kalwang se ong bi, tudannu nam lana hungnu, Cyrene rwan Simon ding banina namluga Jisu nung la cross ka suipon lang bakhou cross ka bason thang rwe.
42023027	Mi khang pui tam takka Banung sui se ngaake, habei ga mannu rwan taswang khakna le lo siaga khatle hweiga Banung sui se ngaake.
42023028	Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou kanei swakluga rinne, “Jerusalem sa kamaisa rwan ga, Alaangna chap mako atiyeda nani lang khatle nasa rwan langna chapo.
42023029	“Balangbe phaang ngo, ‘Sa pon maknu, khatchale pum rit mak aangnu khatle pi chup mak aangnu kamaisa rwan ga aih sanuwe!’ diga banina rin dingnu kaan ga hunglune.
42023030	Haba nung bi banina ‘Rammwan khou rinlune, “Ani lu chung bi badantaro!” khatle rammwan swan khou rinlune, “Ani ding thinlem thang ngo.” ’
42023031	Balangbe banina thing ring kung bi atiga towe dabe, thing thit kung ga tatolu dingbo?”
42023032	Atiga mi athatnu, katei pat ni ding le, Jisu le diga athat lang kalwang se ngaake.
42023033	Banina Calvary diga kounu riak pi hung tangnu kaan bi habei ga Jisu ding banina cross pi bakhai ka rwe, mi athatnu katei pat ni ding ga, pakhat ting inchang pek la pakhat tingna imbei pek la bakhai thang rwe.
42023034	Jisu na rinne, “Apa, bani ding kok thang ngo, balangbe bani paaam to ongnubo dinu banina thei make.” Banina Bapwan bing ga tasaanluga kasem rwe.
42023035	Atiga mi nunna han phaang ong ngaake. Atiyeda bapuba rwan le mi nun gana Bating banuiga rinne, “Maanna katei rwan ding kan thang rwe; Maan Christa khatle Rikrwang na kathang swaknuwe dabe, Baraanto Bating kan ding ngo.”
42023036	Kraanmi nunna le hungluga Bating kiam rwe, banina hungluga Balaang kathunnu zu pi luga
42023037	rinne, “Nang Jihudi rwan Krwang nge dabe, Naraanto Nating kanro.”
42023038	Balu chung pek la Greek, Latin Khatle Hebrew hiakna, “HEIYA JIHUDI RWAN KRWANG NGE” diga taan thang ngaake.
42023039	Haba riak pi bakhai thang ongnu mi athatnu pakhat kana Bating balaa ga rinne, “Nang Christa ye dabe Nating khatle arwei ding kanro.”
42023040	Atiyeda pakhat kana bating tweiga rinne, “Nang Rikrwang ding kachi makpo? Nangna bachamnu laak thangnu ga phang ongnuwe.
42023041	Batakka arweina khaang ongnuba khaangnu zek swaknuwe, balangbe arwei ba arwei chwan nung suiga phang dingnu taswan ga phang rwe; atiyeda heiba Manpana ka maknu chwan khatchale tonu maake.”
42023042	Maanna Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nangna Nakrwang talei hung tangnu kaan bi ating le baningsu thang ngo.”
42023043	Habei ga Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Batak sekka Eina nakhou rinnuwe, aniya lumik nang, Ei le diga Paradise pi ong bacham lune.”
42023044	Chakrin karuk phei bina, chakrin kaqwa tanu tangga talei ram bing zing rwe.
42023045	Lumik le zing drwe khatle kalum in khamthing pwan ga badam kani swakka re rwe.
42023046	Jisu na baraam basaangga paoluga rinne, “Apa, ‘Nakut pi Eina Akatha bachoi thang rwe.’ ” Heiba chong nga kabialuga Bakatha bathan sat rwe.
42023047	Kraanmi razapuba gana swak tamnu bing ga muluga, maanna Rikrwang ding swanga rinne, “Batak takka heiba Mi ya ririak senu Manpa zung nge!”
42023048	Haba riak pi hung kadoinu mi khang gana swak tamnu bing ga muluga, bani kachaang kachumga bani in la han thou dam ngaake.
42023049	Maan le diga bacham ngaaknu mi nun khatle Galilee lana Banung sui hungnu mannu rwanna, impaan saam saamga hanluga hei bing nga phaang ong ngaake.
42023050	Phaang ngo, Joseph tiga kounu sung sanu, bazenu, thampei patso pakhat am ngaake.
42023051	Thampeina kakhannu chonghen khatle bani chwan bing ga maanna za mak ngaake. Maan Jihudi rwan namlian Arimathea la miye, maan le Rikrwang om krwang talei ding ngaakka ong ngaake.
42023052	Heiba manpana Pilate khou seluga Jisu pum ding ni rwe.
42023053	Maanna pum ga loutaluga, banemnu pwanna kazwan rwe, atiga haga lung bi rannu, pakhatcha ding hakna thang mak aangnu thaan bi ri thang rwe.
42023054	Ha ni ga Chamdaannu Lumik ngaake khatle Sabbath nai hung ngaak rwe.
42023055	Galilee lana Banung sui hungnu mannu rwanna le thaan khatle Bating tatoga ri thangbo dinu phaang ong ngaake.
42023056	Banina han hungluga pot khatle tei lang babarim banamsanu thao daan rwe. Atiga Sabbath ni ga zathang nung suiga bani basak rwe.
42024001	Maap lak om kamanu ni louthwan karang takka bani le katei mannu rwan le diga banina daan thangnu barim banamsanu pot ka phunluga thaan la hung rwe.
42024002	Atiyeda thaankham lung ga thaan bina tun swak thangnu banina hung dou rwe.
42024003	Banina thaan sung bi khutnu kaan bi Pukraangba Jisu pum ga doulan rwe.
42024004	Banina haba lang bi batok bariak thei makka ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, bani kim bi manpa pat ni kabaannu pon sin basoiluga han ong ngaake.
42024005	Banina kachiga bani mai kum talei la kuntaluga ongnu kaan bi barweina bani khou rinne, “Nanina pa-aam toga thinu nun lak pi ringnu Bating zong ongnubo?
42024006	Maan abeiya ong lan rwe atiyeda ring thou drwe! Maan Galilee bi ongnu kaan bi Maanna nani khou tato rin thang ngaakpo dinu nani baningsuwo,
42024007	atiga rinne, ‘Misa Sa Kapaisa ding ga noh mi nun kut pi pi swaklune khatle Bating cross pi bakhai thanglune khatle Maan ni thum ni ring thou latlune.’ ”
42024008	Habei ga banina Bachong ga baningsu rwe.
42024009	Bani nun thaan lana han hungluga ha bing ga potroi pat somga khat atiluga katei rwan bing khou pu rwe.
42024010	Chonglang rwan khou pu thangnu baniga, Mary Magdalene, Joanna, James nu Mary khatle katei mannu rwanne.
42024011	Banina chong ga pang kabia kabianu ngaakne diga bani ding balumsa mak ngaake.
42024012	Atiyeda Peter na lon thouluga thaan la pak hung rwe khatle kuntaluga phaang khutnu kaan bi banemnu pwan ta thangnu za ding mu rwe khatle swak tamnu lang bi maan baraanto loh lo ga bain la thou dam ngaake.
42024013	Phaang ngo, Jisu nung sui ngaaknu nun lak pi pat ni ha ni ga Jerusalem bina mile siari khak namlaanu Emmaus tiga kounu nam la se ngaake.
42024014	Swak tamnu lang bing bi barweina meiri raiga se ong ngaake.
42024015	Barweina meiri raiga ngai swak ngai khut ka se ongnu kaan bi Jisu Maan Bahak barwei kim bi se hungluga barwei le se bacham ngaake.
42024016	Atiyeda barweina Jisu ding bapu thei mak lang barwei mik pi kabak thang rwe.
42024017	Maanna barwei khou rinne, “Narwei pat ni sega sega sung riangrega pa-aam lang bi meiri rai se ongnubo?”
42024018	Pat ni lak pi Cleopas tiga kounu gana Bakhou katake, “Lumik kasem sung bi swak tamnu lang bing bi thei maknu man mi Jerusalem bi Naraantoza zungbo?”
42024019	Maanna barwei khou rinne, “Hagazo pa-aambo?” Barweina Bakhou rinne, “Maan Rikrwang le mi nun meithaan bi chwan bi khatle chongkaang bi ngam amnu Thiamting, Nazareth Jisu lang biye.
42024020	Takopuba rwan le ani om bapuba rwanna Bating tatoga athat lang pi swak tamnubo khatle cross pi bakhai thang damnubo dinu lang biye.
42024021	Atiyeda Maan Israel rwan bing ding kan thang dingnu ga Maanne diga anina baning ngaake. Hei bing nga swak tamnu aniyana ni thum rwe.
42024022	Ani nun lak pi mannu rwan mi kasemna louthawn khwan thaan la seluga ani ding pi kalo rwe.
42024023	Banina Bapum ga dou maknu kaan bi Jisu ringga ongme diga bani khou indao thang ngaaknu tambaan chonglang rwan ding banina mu rwe diga le hung rin ngaake.
42024024	Ani le diga ong bacham ngaaknu kasem le diga thaan la se rwe khatle mannu rwanna rin thang ngaaknu ga danga dou rwe; atiyeda Batingba banina mu make.”
42024025	Habei ga Jisu na barwei khou rinne, “He kapangnu, thiamting rwanna rin thang ngaaknu bing ding balumsa lang bazaangnu!
42024026	Christa na riangre kanang bing ga khaangluga Balwat liannu bi khut lang makkabo?”
42024027	Moses le Thiamting rwan bing khouna thouga Pukraangba lang bi Bathiangnu chongdip pi amnu bing ga Maanna barwei khou bathiangga bachu thang rwe.
42024028	Barweina se ong bi nam ga nai hungnu kaan bi Maanna barwei ding sekhan dingnu danga se ka ngaake.
42024029	Atiyeda barweina Bakhou rin rwe, “Atun khwazinren ta rwe, ani le diga ong bacham thangro, rei le rei rwe.” Atiga Maan barwei le diga riak bacham lang khut rwe.
42024030	Maanna barwei le diga sa in lang ong ongnu kaan bi Maanna uilu ga louluga swanka thang rwe khatle haga thiak bakluga barwei lang pi rwe.
42024031	Habei ga barwei mik pi meng swak thang rwe khatle barweina Bating thei rwe; atiga Maan barwei mikphaang bina braan dam ngaake.
42024032	Barweina khatna khat khou rinne, “Maan lampui bi arwei le diga meiri raiga se ong bi khatle Maanna Bathiangnu Chongdip ka arwei khou rin thangnu kaan bi arwei sung mei bachwangnu dan makpo?”
42024033	Barweina haba kahan bi ga thouluga Jerusalem la han hung rwe khatle potroi pat somga khat atiluga bani le ong bachamnu rwan ga ong kadoi luga
42024034	“Batak takka Pukraangba ga ring thou drwe khatle Simon khou pi mu thang rwe!” diga rin ong ngaaknu ga barweina hung kadou ngaake.
42024035	Atiga lampui bi swak tamnu khatle Pukraangba na uilu thiak bak pi Bating tatoga thei damnu dinu lang bi barweina bani khou pu rwe.
42024036	Banina heiba chong bing nga kabia ong bi, Jisu Maan Bahak bani zai bi hung hanluga bani khou rinne, “Nani khou dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.”
42024037	Atiyeda bani balaoga kachi tak ngaak rwe khatle katha khat ting banina mu rwe diga baning ngaake.
42024038	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani pa-aam toga sung katopnubo? Nani sung bi paaam lang balumsia ongnubo?
42024039	Phaang ngo Akut le Aket heiya, Ei zung nge. Ating banaanluga phaang ngo, Akhou amnu munu danga katha ba zanti le ru maake.”
42024040	Maanna heiya kabianu nung bani khou Bakut Baket pi mu rwe.
42024041	Atiyeda bani nun karo laiga balumsanu ngam makka, loh lo ongnu kaan bi Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nani khou thaisaak ambo?”
42024042	Banina Balaang ngaa rounu kasem le khwei tui pi rwe.
42024043	Maanna haga louluga bani meithaan bi sa rwe.
42024044	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ei nani le diga ong bachamnu kaan bi nani khou rin damnu chong ga heiya rwe, Moses om chongtan bi, thiamting om chongdip pi khatle Kalum Laa bi Alang bi hiak thang ngaaknu bing ga hung tang lang nge.”
42024045	Bathiangnu Chongdip ka bakaba theinu ngam lang, Maanna bani sung lat swak thang rwe.
42024046	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atiga hiak thang nge, Christa ga riangre khaanglune khatle ni thum ni ring thoulune,
42024047	Jerusalem bina thouga chaat bing khou Bameng bi sung lenu khatle noh kok thangnu lang bi kasam lang nge.
42024048	Heiba lang bing bi nanina sake rwe.
42024049	Phaang ngo, Apana chong karen thang damnu ga Eina nani khou lang hungne; atiyeda nani ding basaang la ngamna nani lu chung bi hung thang mak basaan nani Jerusalem namlian bi ga ong ngo.”
42024050	Maanna bani ding Bethany tangga kalwang swak rwe khatle Bakut kai thouluga bani khou rithoi pi thang rwe.
42024051	Maanna bani lang rithoi pi thangga ong bi, Maan bani khouna kapaang drwe khatle Bating tambaan la lou thou drwe.
42024052	Banina Bating kalum rwe khatle bani nun karo takka Jerusalem la han hung rwe,
42024053	atiga bani nun kalum in bi chat makka Rikrwang ding swanga ong ngaake. Amen.
43001001	Thoutan bi Chongkaang ga am ngaake khatle Chongkaang ga Rikrwang le ong bacham ngaake khatle Chongkaang ga Rikrwang ngaake.
43001002	Maan thoutan bi Rikrwang le ong bacham ngaake.
43001003	Pot bingza Bapaan bina dam thang rwe khatle dam thang damnu pot bing ga Maan sui makka khatchale dam thang make.
43001004	Bakhou ringnu am ngaake khatle ringnu ga mi nun om babaan ngaake.
43001005	Babaan gana zingnu riak pi baan thang nge khatle zingnuna ha ding ga ngam make.
43001006	John diga kounu Rikrwang khouna lang hungnu manpa pakhat am ngaake.
43001007	Mi bing za bapaan bina balumsa dam lang, maanna Babaan om lang bi sake pi lang maan sake toga hung rwe.
43001008	Maan Babaan ga make atiyeda Babaan om lang bi sake pi lang lang hungnuwe.
43001009	Mi bing ding pi baan thangnu, talei ram bi hungnu ga bazenu Babaanne.
43001010	Maan talei ram bi am ngaake, Bapaan bina talei ram ding dam thang rwe atiyeda talei ram mi nunna Bating thei mak ngaake.
43001011	Maan Bami nun khou hung rwe atiyeda Bami nunna Bating loukhut thang make.
43001012	Atiyeda Bating lou thangnu bing ding, dinuba Bameng bi balumsanu nun ding Rikrwang sa rwan to lang Maanna ngam pi thang rwe:
43001013	bani ga thi bina mak tabe pum om baningnu mak tabe misa om baningnu bina ponnu make atiyeda Rikrwang om baningnu bina ponnuwe.
43001014	Chongkaangna zanti pum gonluga ani lak pi lung thang rwe khatle Pa khouna khat tak khatchanu Sa Kapaisa om lwat liannu, phaangkriang khatle bazenuna sipnu Balwat liannu ga anina phaangmu rwe.
43001015	John na Balang bi sake piga paoga rinne, “Eina rin damnu Maan ga heiya rwe, ‘Anung la hungnanu Maan ga ameithaanna am ngaak briakpina, Maan ama inkuwe.’ ”
43001016	Ani mi bingna Baom sipnu bina phaangkriang lu chung bi phaangkriang lousu rwe.
43001017	Balangbe Moses paan bina chongtan ga pi thang rwe atiyeda Jisu Christa paan bina phaangkriang le bazenu ga hung rwe.
43001018	Pakhatchanale Rikrwang ding impha ni beida mu make. Bapa pam bi ong ongnu, khat tak khatchanu Sa Kapaisa Maan gana Balang bi indao thang rwe.
43001019	Jihudi rwanna John khou, “Nang tubo?” diga ngai lang Jerusalem bi ongnu tako rwan le Levi rwan ding lang hungnu kaan bi maanna pi damnu sake ga heiye.
43001020	Maanna rin indao swak rwe khatle za maknu to make atiyeda “Ei Christa ga make” diga rin swak rwe.
43001021	Banina bakhou ngaiye, “Ati dabe nang tubo? Nang Elijah bo?” John na rinne, “Ei make.” “Nang Thiamting garubo?” Maanna katake “Make.”
43001022	Banina bakhou rinne, “Ani ding lang hungnu rwan khou anina chong katak pi lang, nang tubo? Nalang bi nang pa-aam rinnubo?”
43001023	John na rinne, “Thiamting Isaiah na rin damnu danga, ‘Ramhaang bi, “Pukraangba lampui ga to bazeyo,” diga pao ongnu khwan ga’ ei rwe.”
43001024	Bani ga Pharisee rwan khouna lang hungnu mi nunne.
43001025	Banina bakhou ngaiye, “Nang Christa le mak, Elijah le mak, Thiamting ga le mak tabe nang pa-aam to lang baptize tonubo?”
43001026	John na bani khou katake, “Eina tui bi baptize to thang nge atiyeda nanina thei maknu Pakhat nani lak pi han ongme.
43001027	Anung la hungnanu Maan ga ama inkuwe, baom sandal rui ga hakna sut lang ei khopnu make.”
43001028	Hei bing nga John na baptize to ongnu riak Jordan raan la amnu Bethany bi swak ngaake.
43001029	Inswan lampai John na bakim bi Jisu se hungnanu muluga rin rwe, “Phaang ngo, talei ram mi nun noh lou sat thangnu Rikrwang Zao saza!
43001030	‘Anung la Pakhat hung nge, Maanna ama am basom ngaak briakpina, Maanna ama inkuwe,’ diga eina rin damnu Maan ga heiya rwe.
43001031	Balangbe Ei Bating thei mak ngaake; atiyeda Bating Israel rwan khou indao thang lang, eina tui bi baptize to thangga hung rwe.”
43001032	John na sake piga rinne, “Katha na tambaan lana banphi danga tanu ga eina mu rwe khatle Katha ga Balu chung bi am ngaake.
43001033	Ei Bating thei mak ngaake atiyeda tui bi baptize to thang lang ating lang hungnu Maanna akhou rinne, ‘Katha gana taluga Balu chung bi ta ongnu nangna mulune, Katha Bathiangnuna baptize to thang dingnu ga Maan rwe.’
43001034	Maan Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ga rwe dinu eina muluga sake pi rwe.”
43001035	Inswan lampai le, John na baom potroi pat ni le han ong ngaake.
43001036	Maanna Jisu se ongnu ding muluga rinne, “Phaang ngo Rikrwang Zao saza!”
43001037	Maanna kabianu ga potroi pat ni gana ngaisuluga, barwei Jisu nung sui drwe.
43001038	Jisu na kanei swak pi barweina Banung sui se ongnu muluga barwei khou rinne, “Narwei paaam ding zongnubo?” Barweina Bakhou rinne, “Rabbi” bakabana Bachuthangnupa dinuwe, “Nang ingaipai ongnubo?”
43001039	Maanna barwei khou rinne, “Hungluga phaang ngo.” Barweina hungnu kaan bi Maan ongnu riak ka mu rwe khatle ha ni ga barwei Maan le diga ong bacham rwe, haga chakrin som khak tanu dat pi ngaake.
43001040	John na kabianu ngaisuluga, Jisu nung sui damnu, pat ni lak pi pakhat ka Simon Peter nao, Andrew ngaake.
43001041	Maanna batang Simon ding kamaga kadouluga bakhou rinne, “Anina Messiah ding lou su rwe,” (bakabana Christa dinuwe).
43001042	Andrew na bating Jisu khou kalwang hung rwe. Jisu na bating phaangluga Maanna rinne, “Nang Jonah sa kapaisa Simon ne. Nating Cephas” “diga kou lang rwe,” (bakabana lung dinuwe).”
43001043	Bathang om lumik pi Jisu Galilee la se nwam ngaake, atiga Maanna Philip ting kadouluga bakhou rinne, “Anung suiro.”
43001044	Philip heiya Andrew le Peter na ongnu namlian, Bethsaida rwanne.
43001045	Philip na Nathanael ding kadouluga bakhou rinne, “Moses om chongtan khatle thiamting rwanna hiak thang ngaaknu Bating anina kadou rwe. Maan Joseph sa kapaisa Nazareth rwan Jisu we.”
43001046	Nathanael na bakhou rinne, “Nazareth pina kasanu swak lang khopkabo?” Philip na bakhou rinne, “Hungluga phaangro.”
43001047	Jisu na Nathanael Bakim bi hungnanu muluga, balang bi atiga rinne, “Phaang ngo, heiya bataknu Israel rwan miye, bakhou rou sianu maake!”
43001048	Nathanael na Bakhou rinne, “Nang ating tatoga theinubo?” Jisu na bakhou katake, “Philip na nating kou mak balei, nang tacham kung thwei bi ong ngaaknu ga Ei mu rwe.”
43001049	Nathanael na Bakhou katakka rinne, “Rabbi, Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye! Nang Israel rwan Krwang nge!”
43001050	Jisu na bakhou katakka rinne, “ ‘Eina nating tacham kung thwei bi mu rwe,’ diga Eina rin briakpina nang balumsanubo? Hei ma lian inkunu chwan nang mulune.”
43001051	Maanna bakhou rinne, “Batak sekka Eina nakhou rinnuwe, heiba nung bi tambaan inkhaan lat swaknu khatle Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwanna Misa Sa Kapaisa lu chung bi tanu khatle kanu nanina phaangmulune.”
43002001	Ni thum ni Galilee taram Cana namlian bi tazwan bahwannu am ngaake khatle habei ga Jisu nu Mary le sui ngaake.
43002002	Banina Jisu le Baom potroi rwan ding le tazwan bahwannu riak pi ga talot ngaake.
43002003	Banina drakha tui ga maak hungnu kaan bi Jisu nu Mary na Bakhou rinne, “Bani drakha tui maak rwe.”
43002004	Jisu na Mary khou rinne, “He kamaisa, nangna banang thangga ongnu bi ga Athou pa-aam amgabo? Aom chakrin ga hung mak aang nge.”
43002005	Banuna swak rwan khou rinne, “Maanna nani khou rinnu ga towo.”
43002006	Jihudi rwan om bapum to bathiangnu om chaang toga, haba riak pi ga tui thang lang lung tui ben karuk am ngaake, tui ben khatna tui litre somkariat mak tabe raza khak chan ngaake.
43002007	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Tui ben bing ga tui thangsipo.” Banina haga baring tangga thangsip rwe.
43002008	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Atun habei gana kasem la swakluga, balou om thoupuba khou piro.” Banina haga pi rwe.
43002009	Balou om thoupuna drakha tui gon damnu tui ga batem rwe khatle haga inlammangnabo dinu maanna thei mak ngaake (atiyeda haga tui la thang ngaaknu swak rwanna thei ngaake), habei ga balou om thoupuna tazwanpa ding kou rwe.
43002010	Atiga maanna bakhou rinne, “Mi bingna kama bi kasanu drakha tui pi inne atiga mi nunna in kalo taknu kaan bi kasem tadomnu drakha tui pi in late. Atiyeda nangna atun tangga kasanu drakha tui thang ong maang nge!”
43002011	Jisu na badannu chwan bing om kamanu heiya Galilee om Cana namlian bi to thangga, Balwat liannu chwan ga indao thang ngaake khatle Baom potroi rwanna Bating balumsa ngaake.
43002012	Haba nung bi Maan, Banu, Banao rwan le Baom potroi rwan le diga Capernaum la se ngaake; bani habei ga lumik taswang khak nei mak ngaake.
43002013	Jihudi rwan om Takan Swaknu Balou nai hungnu kaan bi Jisu Jerusalem la se ngaake.
43002014	Maanna kalum in bi sen chan, zao, banphi zwannu nun le sian kachoi kainu langgonnu mi nun ding hung dou rwe.
43002015	Habei ga Maanna senrui karengluga zao, sen chan khatle mi bing ding kalum in bina kazun swak rwe, sian kachoi bing ga le bun sat rwe khatle bani table bing ga le tun ka lat sat rwe.
43002016	Maanna banphi zwannu nun khou rinne, “Hei bing nga lou thou dro! Apa in ding nanina langgonnu in pi to mako.”
43002017	“Nain lang chungna sung khutnuna Ating sa sat ting rwe” diga hiak thang ngaaknu ga Baom potroi rwanna baningsu rwe.
43002018	Atibriak pina Jihudi rwanna bakhou katake, “Nangna hei bing nga to ru briakpina, ani khou pa-aam badannu chwan pi murubo?”
43002019	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Heiba kalum in ding nga raita dro atiga ni thum sung bi Eina haga to thou latne.”
43002020	Habei ga Jihudi rwanna rinne, “Heiba kalum inna to thou bi sangwan sombaliga karuk khute khatle Nangna hei ding nga ni thum bi to thou dingbo?”
43002021	Atiyeda Maanna rin ongnu ga Bapum om kalum in ding kabianuwe.
43002022	Atibriakpina Maanna thinu nun lak pina ring thou latnu kaan bi hei bing nga bani khou rin thang ngaake dinu Baom potroi rwanna baningsu rwe; habei ga banina Bathiangnu Chongdip khatle Jisu na rin thangnu chong ga balumsa rwe.
43002023	Takan Swaknu Balou ni, Maan Jerusalem bi ong ngaaknu kaan bi Maanna to damnu badannu chwan bing ga banina munu kaan bi mi taswang khakna Bameng bi balumsa rwe.
43002024	Atiyeda Jisu na mi bing ding bapu thei briakpina, Bazan ding bani khou bachoi thang mak ngaake,
43002025	atiga tudannu pakhatna mi khat om lang bi sake pi lang bathaang maake, balangbe mi khat sung bi pa-aam ambo dinu Maanna theiye.
43003001	Pharisee rwan lak pi Nicodemus tiga kounu, Jihudi rwan ding kai thangnu manpa khat am ngaake.
43003002	Heiba manpana zingpha Jisu kim bi hungluga Bakhou rinne, “Rabbi, Nang Rikrwang khouna hungnu Bachuthangnupa khate dinu anina theiye; balangbe Rikrwang na bakhou sui thang make dabe Nangna to ongnu chwan bing nga pakhatchanale tonu ngam make.”
43003003	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Batak sekka Eina nakhou rinnuwe, mi khatna pon kathan make dabe, maan Rikrwang om krwang talei munu ngam make.”
43003004	Nicodemus na Bakhou rinne, “Mi pakhatna patso hungnu kaan bi tatoga pon lat ting gabo? Maan banu bon sung bi leng ninu toga khutluga ponnu ngamgabo?”
43003005	Jisu na katake, “Batak sekka Eina nakhou rinnuwe, mi pakhatna tui le Katha bi pon make dabe, maan ga Rikrwang om krwang talei bi khutnu ngam make.
43003006	Zanti pum bi ponnu gana zanti pumme, Katha bi ponnu gana katha ye.
43003007	‘Nang pon kathan lat lang zung nge’ diga Eina rinnu bi loh lo mako.
43003008	Thiraangna raang nwamnu pek la raang nge khatle nangna bakhwan ga ngaisuwe atiyeda haga inlamna hungnubo khatle inlammang thou dambo dinu nangna thei make. Katha bina ponnu mi bing ga le hadannuwe.”
43003009	Nicodemus na Bakhou rinne, “Hei bing nga tatoga hung tangnu ngam dingbo?”
43003010	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nang Israel rwan om bachuthangnupa toluga, hei bing nga thei makpo?
43003011	Batak sekka Eina nakhou rinnuwe, Anina theinu ga Anina rinnuwe, Anina munu ga Anina sake pinuwe atiyeda Ani om sake ga nanina lou thang make.
43003012	Eina talei ram om lang bi nani khou rinnu kaan bi nanina balumsa make dabe, Eina tambaan om lang bi rinnnu kaan bi nanina tatoga balumsa langbo?
43003013	Tambaan lana tanu Misa Sa Kapaisa Maan ga makka, pakhatcha hakna tambaan la ka dam mak aang nge.
43003014	Moses na ramhaang bi barun ding kai thou damnu ga danga, Misa Sa Kapaisa ding le kai thoulune,
43003015	tudannu Bating balumsanu mi bingna braan lat makka ringzoknu kum lousu lang nge.
43003016	“Balangbe Rikrwang na talei ram ding atiga kriang thang rwe, hagazo Basa Kapaisa Khatchanu ding pi thang rwe, atiga Bating balumsanu mi bingna braan lat makka ringzoknu kum lousu rwe.
43003017	Balangbe talei ram ding chong to lang Rikrwang na Basa Kapaisa ding lang hungnu make atiyeda Bapaan bina talei ram ding kan thang langnaye.
43003018	“Bating balumsanu mi ga Maanna chong to make; atiyeda balumsa maknu bating ga chong to taang rwe, balangbe maanna Khat tak Khatchanu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa meng ding balumsa make.
43003019	Chong tonu ga heiye, babaan ga talei ram bi hung rwe atiyeda mi nunna babaan ding ma zingnu ding bathai rwe, balangbe bani chwan ga sa make.
43003020	Balangbe kasianu chwan to ongnu mi bingna babaan ding batanne khatle bachwan ga indaolune diga babaan bi hung make.
43003021	Atiyeda tudannu bazenu to ongnu maan gana, maanna to ongnu chwan ga Rikrwang khou to ongnuwe dinu mu dam lang, babaan bi hung nge.”
43003022	Hei bing nung bi Jisu khatle Baom potroi rwan Judea taram la hung rwe khatle Maan habei ga bani le diga ong bachamluga bani ding baptize to thang ngaake.
43003023	John na le Salim kim bi amnu Aenon nampui bi ga baptize to thang ngaake, balangbe habei ga tui tamga am ngaake. Banina habei ga hungluga baptize to ngaake.
43003024	Balangbe haba kaan bi ga Herod na John ding qwan in bi thang mak aang nge.
43003025	John om potroi rwan le Jihudi rwan pakhat le diga to bathiangnu lang bi kae kale ngaake.
43003026	Banina John kim bi hungluga bakhou rin rwe, “Rabbi, Jordan raan la Maan nang le diga ong bacham ngaaknu, nangna Balang bi sake pi damnu ding ga phaang ngo, Maanna baptize to thang ongme khatle mi bing Bakhou hung ongme.”
43003027	John na katake, “Rikrwang na tambaan lana mi khat khou pi thangnu makka maanna khatchale lousu ngamlaye.
43003028	‘Ei Christa make,’ Atiyeda ‘Bameithaan ating lang hungnuwe’ diga eina rin damnu bi ga nani aom sake rwe.
43003029	Tazwannu lousunu maan ga tazwanpa gaye; tazwanpa baan rwan gana, hanluga ngai ongnu kaan bi tazwanpa baraam ga ngaisuluga, taswang khak lang karowe. Atibriakpina akaro ga pi bapungpha thang rwe.
43003030	Maan inku thoulune atiyeda eiba inkhinta damlune.
43003031	“Basaang lana tanu Maan ga pum brumza lu chung bi amme; talei ram bina hungnu maan ga talei ram omme khatle maanna talei ram om chong kabiaye. Tambaan lana tanu Maan ga pum brumza lu chung bi amme.
43003032	Maanna mu damnu, ngaisu damnu ga Maanna sake piye; atiyeda pakhatchanale Baom sake ding ga lou thang make.
43003033	Baom sake lousu damnu maan gana Rikrwang nga bazenuwe dinu seal nam thang rwe.
43003034	Rikrwang na lang thangnu Maan gana Rikrwang chong kabiaye, balangbe Rikrwang na balaang Katha ga badatluga pi thang make.
43003035	Pa na Sa Kapaisa ding kriang nge khatle pum brumza Bakut pi sin thang nge.
43003036	Sa Kapaisa ding balumsanu maan ga ringzoknu kum lousu rwe khatle Sa Kapaisa ding balumsa maknu maan ga ringnu kum mulaye atiyeda Rikrwang balung pwan balu chung bi amme.”
43004001	Jisu na John ma potroi tamga khomluga baptize to thang damnu ga Pharisee rwanna ngaisu drwe dinu Maanna theinu kaan bi
43004002	(Jisu Maan bahakna baptize to thang make atiyeda Baom potroi rwan naye),
43004003	Maan Judea bathan satluga Galilee la thou lat tam ngaake.
43004004	Maan Samaria taram serwan thang lang bathaang am ngaake.
43004005	Atibriakpina Maan Samaria taram om Sychar diga kounu namlian bi hung rwe, haga Jacob na basa kapaisa Joseph lang pi thang ngaaknu louphung kom biye.
43004006	Habei ga Jacob om tuikhun am ngaake. Jisu Maan lampui se riangre hung briakpina, tuikhun kim bi hung ongta rwe. Haga chakrin karuk tanu dat pi ngaake.
43004007	Haba tuikhun bi ga Samaria rwan mannu pakhat tui laa lang hung ngaake. Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Alaang tui in lang piyo.”
43004008	Balangbe Baom potroi rwan ga nampui la thaisaak kalei lang thou dam ngaake.
43004009	Habei ga Samaria rwan mannu gana Bakhou rinne, “Nang, Jihudi rwan pakhat toluga, tatoga Samaria rwan nu akhou tui in lang ninubo?” Balangbe Jihudi rwanna Samaria rwan le diga kakhai kale mak ngaake.
43004010	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Rikrwang om leithwan khatle nakhou ‘Alaang in lang tui piyo,’ diga rin ongnu Bating nangna bapu thei ngaake dabe nangna Bakhou ni ngaak tingnuwe, atiga Maanna nalaang ringnu tui ga pi thang ngaak tingnuwe.”
43004011	Haba mannu gana Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Nakhou tui laa ka lang khatchale maake, tuikhun le thuke. Nangna ringnu tui ga ingaina lousu dingbo?
43004012	Heiba tuikhunna ani lang pi thang ngaaknu, ani pa Jacob ma Nangna lian inkunubo? Maan bahak, basa kapaisa rwan khatle baom indwan khouring bing le abeina in ngaake.”
43004013	Jisu na bakhou katake, “Tudannu heiba tui innu maan ga taraan latlune,
43004014	atiyeda Eina bakhou pi dingnu tui ga innu mi bingna impha ni beida taraan lat pila rwe. Atiyeda Eina bakhou pi dingnu tui gabe balaang khwa sei ringnu kum pwak swaknu tuipwak imbeilune.”
43004015	Haba mannu gana Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, ei taraan mak lang khatle abeiya tui hung la lat mak lang haba tui ga alaang pi thang ngo.”
43004016	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Sero, nabasan ding kouluga abeiya hung ngo.”
43004017	Haba mannu gana katake, “Ei abasan maake.” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna ‘Abasan maake,’ diga bazega katak rwe,
43004018	balangbe nang nabasan impaang rwe, atun am ongnu ga nabasan make; nangna heiya bazega rin rwe.”
43004019	Haba mannu gana Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, Nang thiamting khate dinu ei thei rwe.
43004020	Ani pu pa rwanna heiba rammwan biya kalum ngaake atiyeda nani Jihudi rwannaba kalum dingnu riak ka Jerusalem biye diga rinne.”
43004021	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “He kamaisa Ating balumsawo, nanina Pa ding heiba rammwan bi le Jerusalem bi le kalum mak tingnu chakrin ga hung rwe.
43004022	Nanina thei maknu Bating kalumme; anina theinu ga anina kalumme, balangbe ringriak ka Jihudi rwan omme.
43004023	Atiyeda bazenu kalumnu nunna Pa ding Katha bi khatle bazenu bi kalum dingnu chakrin ga hung tang rwe, atun le rwe; balangbe Pa na Pukraangba ding kalum lang ha rwan ding zong ongme.
43004024	Rikrwang nga Katha ye khatle Bating kalumnu mi nun gana katha bi khatle bazenu bi kalum ding gaye.”
43004025	Haba mannu gana Bakhou rinne, “Ei Messiah hunglune dinu theiye,” (Maan Christa diga kouwe). “Maanna hungnu kaan bi balang bingza ani khou rin thanglune.”
43004026	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nating chong kabia ongnu Eiya Maan ga rwe.”
43004027	Haba kahan bi ga potroi rwan hung lat rwe, Maanna mannu pakhatle diga meiri rai ongnu hung douluga bani loh lo rwe; atiyeda “Nang pa-aam ding zongnubo?” mak tabe “Nang mannu ga le diga impei meiri rai ongnubo?” diga pakhatchanale ngai mak ngaake.
43004028	Haba mannu gana baom tui ben ga thangsialuga, namlian la thou drwe khatle mi nun khou rinne,
43004029	“Hung ngo, eina to damnu chwan bing ding rin swaknu Manpa pakhat ting hung phaang ngo. Heiya Christa ga ngaak tingbo?”
43004030	Haba nung bi namlian bina mi nun swakluga Jisu kim bi hung rwe.
43004031	Atiyeda Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Rabbi, saro.”
43004032	Atiyeda Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina thei maknu thaisaak Alaang amme.”
43004033	Atibriakpina potroi rwanna bani cham atiga rin rwe, “Tudannu mi khatna balaang thaisaak lou hungnu am bi dabo?”
43004034	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Aom thaisaak ka Ating lang hungnu Maanna baningnu chwan to ongnu khatle to loinu heiya rwe.
43004035	“ ‘Tha bali nung bi lou lwak dat hunglu rwe,’ diga nanina rin makpo? Phaang ngo, Eina nani khou rinnuwe, nani mai batou kaluga lou la phaang ngo, balangbe lou ga min bazin rwe!
43004036	Lou aatnu maan gana balo man lousuwe khatle khwa sei ring langna bakraa ga khom thouwe, atiga tachi bwannu le lou aatnu ga karo bachamme.
43004037	“Atibriakpina rin ongnuwa bazenuwe, ‘Pakhatna tachi bwanluga kateina lou lwake.’
43004038	Nanina chwan to thang maknu riak pi lou aat lang Eina nani ding bathan thang rwe; katei rwanna chwan towe khatle banina chwan tonu gana nani lang tong rwe.”
43004039	“Eina to damnu chwan bing Maanna rin swak rwe,” diga mannu gana sake pi ga rin briakpina Samaria namlian bi mi taswang khakna Bating balumsa rwe.
43004040	Habei ga Samaria rwanna Bakim bi hungluga, Jisu ding bani khou neita thang lang rin rwe; Maan habei ga ni ni neita ngaake.
43004041	Atiga Bachong paan bina mi taswang khakna Bating balumsa rwe.
43004042	Banina mannu khou rinne, “Atun ani balumsa rwe, haga nangna rin briakpina makka, anina haga ngaisu briakpi naye, balangbe Maan talei ram ding Kanthangnupa, Christa ye dinu ani thei rwe.”
43004043	Ni ni nung bi Maan habei gana swakluga Galilee taram la thou dam ngaake.
43004044	Balangbe thiamting pakhat ting batalei bi takung tazei to thang make diga Jisu Maan Bahakna sake pi ngaake.
43004045	Jisu na Galilee bi hungnu kaan bi balou ni Maanna Jerusalem bi to damnu chwan bing ga banina mu briakpina Galilee rwanna Bating lou thang ngaake; balangbe bani le balou riak la se ngaake.
43004046	Jisu na tui ding drakha tui pi gonnu riak Galilee taram Cana bi hung lat rwe. Habei ga Capernaum la basa kapaisa naa ongnu tudannu kasei kalian pakhat am ngaake.
43004047	Jisu Judea lana Galilee bi hung ongme dinu maanna ngaisunu kaan bi maan Jisu kim bi hung rwe khatle Bating bain la seluga basa ding pi sa thang lang hweini rwe, balangbe basa ga thi dingga ong ngaake.
43004048	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nanina badannu le tasiatnu chwan mu mak basaan, nanina khatchale balumsalaye.”
43004049	Kasei kaliannu manpa gana Bakhou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, asa thi maknu meithaan ta thang kammo!”
43004050	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Sero; nasa Kapaisa ga ring ongme.” Bakhou rin thangnu chong ga manpa gana balumsaga se thou drwe.
43004051	Maanna se ong bi baswak rwanna bating kadouluga rinne, “Nasa Kapaisa ga ringga ongme!”
43004052	Habei ga maanna bani khou basa kapaisana sa damnu chakrin ga ngai rwe. Banina bakhou rinne, “Inzaan chakrin siari tanu dat pina bakhunnu ga lan drwe.”
43004053	Bapana haga Jisu na bakhou, “Nasa kapaisa ga ringga ongme,” diga rinnu chakrin bi ga rwe dinu thei rwe. Maan bahak khatle bain inkhun bing Jisu ding balumsa rwe.
43004054	Heiya Jisu na Judea lana Galilee bi hungnu kaan bi to lat tamnu leng ninu tasiatnu badanne.
43005001	Haba nung bi Jihudi rwan om balou khat am ngaake, ha ni ga Jisu Jerusalem la ka ngaake.
43005002	Jerusalem bi Zao Inkhaanmun diga kounu riak pi tuikhun khat am ngaake, heiya Hebrew chongla, Bethesda diga kouwe, haba tuikhun ga inkhu impaang am ngaake.
43005003	Habei ga naanu mi khang pui khat, mik chonu, ket thoknu khatle pum baang thinu nunna tui kaling thounu ding ngaakka ong ngaake.
43005004	Balangbe balak lak pi tambaan chonglang khat taluga tuikhun tui ga pi kaling ngaake; tui ga kaling thounu nung, tudannu takamanu maan ga, pa-aam aam tanat am ngaakle sa ngaake.
43005005	Haba riak pi ga sangwan somthumga kariat songa ongnu manpa khat am ngaake.
43005006	Jisu na maan habei ga in ongnu mu rwe khatle maan atiga ongnu ga bakhwa sei rwe dinu theiluga, Maanna bakhou rinne, “Nating pi sa thangnu bathaibo?”
43005007	Naanu manpa gana Bakhou katake, “Pukraangba, tui kaling thounu kaan bi ating tui bi phunta thang lang mi maake; atiyeda eina se hung bi mi kateina ameithaan takama damme.”
43005008	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Lon thouro, nakain riak ka lou thouluga sero.”
43005009	Haba kahan bi haba manpa ga sa rwe khatle bakain riak ka lou thouluga se drwe. Haga Sabbath ni ngaake.
43005010	Atibriakpina naanu sa damnu manpa khou ga Jihudi rwanna rinne, “Aniya Sabbath lumik chung nge; nangna nakain riak phunluga se ong lang za make.”
43005011	Maanna bani khou katake, “Ating pi sa thangnu Maanna akhou rinne, ‘Nakain riak ka lou thouluga sero’ ”
43005012	Banina bakhou ngaiye, “ ‘Nakain riak ka lou thouluga sero’ diga nakhou rinnu Mi gazo tubo?”
43005013	Naanu sa damnu maan gana haga tubo dinu thei mak ngaake, balangbe habei ga amnu mi khang lak pina, Jisu sepen thou dam ngaake.
43005014	Haba nung bi Jisu na bating kalum in bi kadouluga bakhou rinne, “Phaang ngo, nating pi sa thang rwe. Nakhou inkuga kasianu hung lat mak lang noh tolanro.”
43005015	Haba manpa ga se swakluga bating pi sa thangnu ga Jisu we diga Jihudi rwan khou rin rwe.
43005016	Atibriakpina Jihudi rwanna Jisu ding rai rwe khatle Bating athat lang zong thou rwe, balangbe Maanna hei bing nga Sabbath ni to ngaake.
43005017	Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou katake, “Apa na atun tangga chwan to ongme khatle Ei le to ongme.”
43005018	Atibriakpina Jihudi rwanna Jisu ding athat lang inkuga zong thou rwe, balangbe Maanna Sabbath ting to baknuza makka, Rikrwang ding Bapa ye diye khatle Bating Rikrwang le pi bachamme.
43005019	Haba nung bi Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Pa na tonu ga phaangmu briakpina makka, Sa Kapaisa gana baraanto khatchale tonu ngam make, balangbe Pa na tonu ga Sa Kapaisana le hadanga towe.
43005020	Balangbe Pa na Sa Kapaisa ding kriang nge, Maan Bahakna tonu bing ga Bakhou pi mu thang nge khatle nani loh lo lang, Maanna lian inkunu chwan bing pi mu thanglune.
43005021	Balangbe Apa na thinu nun ding pi ring thouluga bani khou ringnu pi thang rwe, hadanga Sa Kapaisana le Maanna pi ring thou nwamnu bani ding pi ring thoulune.
43005022	Balangbe Pa na pakhatcha ding hakna chong kasem make atiyeda chong kasem lang ha bing ga Sa Kapaisa khou pi thang rwe,
43005023	heiya banina Bapa ding takungnu ga danga Sa Kapaisa ding le khangsungna takung lang nge. Tudannu Sa Kapaisa ding takung maknu maan ga Bating lang hungnu Pa ding le takung maknuwe.
43005024	“Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu Achong ga theiluga Ating lang hungnu Bating balumsanu maan ga khwa sei ringnu lousu rwe khatle maan chongsem bi suila rwe atiyeda maan thinu bina ringnu bi takan swak rwe.
43005025	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, thinu nunna Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa khwan ngaisu dingnu chakrin ga hung rwe, atun le rwe khatle ngaisunu banina ringlune.
43005026	Balangbe Pa na Bazan Bahak pi ringnu amnu ga danga, Sa Kapaisa Bahak khou le ringnu ga am dam lang Maanna ngam pi thang rwe
43005027	khatle Maan Misa Sa Kapaisa briakpina, Pa na bakhou chong kasem lang le ngam pi thang rwe.
43005028	“Hei ding nga nani loh lonu to mako; balangbe thaan sung bi ongnu bingna Bakhwan thei dingnu chakrin ga hung rwe,
43005029	atiga kasanu chwan tonu nunna ring lang khatle kasianu chwan tonu nunna pi koi thang lang, bani thaan bina ring thoulune.
43005030	Eina Araanto khatchale tonu ngam make. Eina theisunu nung suiga, Eina chong kasemme khatle Achong kasemga bazenuwe, balangbe Ating lang hungnu Apa na baningnu makka Araanto zana baningnu ga Ei zong make.
43005031	“Eina Araantoza om sake piye dabe, Aom sake ga baze maknuwe.
43005032	Alang bi sake pinu katei khat amme khatle Alang bi Baom sake ga bazenuwe dinu Ei theiye.
43005033	“Nanina chonglang rwan ding John khou lang hung rwe, atiga bazenu lang bi maanna sake to rwe.
43005034	“Eina mi nun om sake lou make atiyeda nani ding kan thang lang Eina hei bing nga rinnuwe.
43005035	Maan chok ongnu khatle baan ongnu thaomei gaye khatle nanina bakaan kasemza lang babaan bi karo ongnu bathaiye.
43005036	“Atiyeda John om ma lian inkunu Aom sake amme; balangbe Pa na Akhou pi bapung pha thang lang pi thangnu chwan, dinuba Eina to ongnu chwan bing ngana Ating Apa na lang hungnuwe dinu, Alang bi sake piye.
43005037	Ating lang hungnu Apa Bahakna, Alang bi sake pi rwe. Nanina impha ni beida Bakhwan ngaisu mak aang nge khatle Bating mu dam mak aang nge.
43005038	Bachong ga nani khou chat makka am ong make, balangbe Maanna lang hungnu Bating nanina balumsa make.
43005039	“Nani Bathiangnu chongdip tingga zong nge, balangbe habei ga khwa sei ringnu amme diga nani baning nge khatle Alang bi sake pinu ga haga rwe.
43005040	Atiyeda nani khou ringnu ga am lang nanina Akhou hung nwam make.
43005041	“Ei mi nun khouna takhwang bathai make.
43005042	Atiyeda Ei nani ding theiye, dinuba nani sung bi Rikrwang om kriang maake.
43005043	Ei Apa meng bi hung rwe atiyeda nanina Ating lou thang make; mi kateina bazan bahak om meng bi hung nge dabe, nanina bating lou thanglune.
43005044	Khat tak Khatchanu Rikrwang khouna hungnu lwat liannu ga zong makka, khatna khat ting takhwang tonu ding bathaiye dabe, nanina tatoga balumsanu ngam dingbo?
43005045	“Eina nani ding Pa meithaan bi koi impu thanglune diga baning mako; nani ding koi impu thangnu pakhat amme, haga nainina bachun ongnu Moses kaye.
43005046	Balangbe nanina Moses ting balumsa ngaake dabe nanina Ating le balumsa ngaak tingnuwe; balangbe maanna Alang bi hiak thang ngaak rwe.
43005047	Atiyeda maanna hiak thang ngaaknu ga nanina balumsa make dabe, tatoga nanina Achong ding balumsa dingbo?”
43006001	Hei bing nung bi Jisu na Galilee tuipui, Tiberias tuipui raan la takan swak ngaake.
43006002	Mi khang pui khat Banung sui se ngaake, balangbe Maanna tanat bachaat bingna naanu mi nun khou tasiatnu chwan to thang damnu ga banina mu ngaake.
43006003	Jisu na rammwan la kaluga, habei ga Baom potroi rwan le diga ongta rwe.
43006004	Takan swaknu Balou, Jihudi rwan om balou thaisaak ka nai hung ngaak rwe.
43006005	Jisu na Bamai batoukaluga phaangnu kaan bi mi khang pui gana Bakim bi hungnanu muluga, Maanna Philip khou rinne, “Hei rwanna sa dam lang ani uilu inlampaina kaleizobo?”
43006006	Jisu na haga Philip ting tamga rinnuwe, balangbe Maan Bazanna pa-aam to dingbo dinu theiye.
43006007	Philip na Bakhou katake, “Bani pakhat khatna tit titcha phang lang, denari raza ni om uiluna khoppilaye.”
43006008	Potroi rwan lak pi pakhat, Simon Peter nao, Andrew na Bakhou rinne,
43006009	“Abeiya barley uilu impaang le ngaa swan kani amnu naosen khat amme atiyeda mi heiza lang heiyana pa-aam to ding gabo?”
43006010	Jisu na rinne, “Mi nun ding ga pi ongtaro.” Balangbe habei ga lousam daam am ngaake. Atiga kapaisa rwan mi raching impaang khak badungta rwe.
43006011	Jisu na uilu ga louluga, swanka thangnu nung potroi rwan khou pi rwe khatle potroi rwanna ong ongnu mi nun lang kasem thang rwe; hadanga ngaa ga le, banina sakhop basaan lang kasem thang rwe.
43006012	Bani khangsung sa imbanu kaan bi Maanna potroi rwan khou rinne, “Kasem baleinu ga khatchale to braan makka khom thouwo.”
43006013	Banina haga khom thou rwe khatle mi nunna barley uilu impaang bina sabaleinu ga luklei somga kani sip ngaake.
43006014	Jisu na badannu chwan tonu mu damnu mi nun gana rinne, “Heiya batak takka talei ram bi hung dingnu Thiamting gaye.”
43006015	Bating krwang pi to lang banina hung nam ding rwe dinu Jisu na theiluga, Maan baraanto rammwan la pen thou lat tam ngaake.
43006016	Khwazinren tanu kaan bi Baom potroi rwan tuipui la taluga,
43006017	li hwan rwe khatle Capernaum pek la takan swak rwe. Bakaan ga zing ta ngaak rwe atiyeda Jisu bani kim la hung mak aang nge.
43006018	Thiraang rakanga raang hung briakpina tuipui ga kabaap thou rwe.
43006019	Banina li Hwanluga mile inthum bina bali khak hwankhutnu kaan bi Jisu tuipui chung bi ketna bani li pek la se hungnanu banina mu rwe; atiga bani kachi rwe.
43006020	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ei zung nge; kachi mako.”
43006021	Atiga banina Bating li sung bi karoga loukhut thang rwe khatle haba kahan bi banina tang dingnu taram ga hung tang rwe.
43006022	Inswan lampai, tuipui paan bi han ong ngaaknu mi nun gana potroi rwanna twang damnu li ga makka, li katei mu dam make khatle Jisu potroi rwan le diga li bi se dam make, bani raantoza thou damme dinu banina thei ngaake,
43006023	Atiyeda Pukraangba na swanka thangluga bani uilu sa bacham ngaaknu riak kim bi, Tiberias lana li kasem hung rwe,
43006024	mi nunna Jisu le, potroi rwan habei ga ong lan rwe dinu theiluga, bani le li bing bi ga twangluga Capernaum la Jisu ding zong hung ngaake.
43006025	Banina Bating tuipui raan khat la kadounu kaan bi Bakhou rin rwe, “Rabbi, Nang abeiya impei dat pi hungnubo?”
43006026	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nanina badannu chwan mu dam briakpina Ating zongnu make atiyeda nanina uilu sa imba briakpi naye.
43006027	Braan dam dingnu thaisaak langna nani chwan to mako atiyeda Misa Sa Kapaisana nani lang pi thang dingnu khwa sei ringnu thaisaak langna nani chwan towo, balangbe Pa Rikrwang na Baom seal ga Misa Sa Kapaisa lu chung bi nam thang rwe.”
43006028	Banina Jisu khou ngaiye, “Rikrwang chwan to lang, anina pa-aam to langbo?”
43006029	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Maanna lang hungnu Bating balumsanu heiya Rikrwang chwan rwe.”
43006030	Atibriakpina banina Bakhou rinne, “Anina muluga Nating balumsa lang, Nangna ani khou pa-aam badannu pi thang dingbo? Nangna pa-aam chwan tonebo?
43006031	Ani pu pa rwanna ramhaang bi manna sa ngaake; heiya hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, ‘Maanna bani khou tambaan lana sa lang uilu pi thang ngaake.’ ”
43006032	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Moses na nani lang tambaan lana uilu pi thang make atiyeda Apa na tambaan lana nani lang bataknu uilu pi thang rwe.
43006033	“Balangbe Rikrwang om uilu ga tambaan lana tanu talei ram mi nun lang Bakum pi swak ngaaknu Maan gaye.”
43006034	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, bakaan bathin haba uilu ga ani lang pi thang ngo.”
43006035	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Ei ringnu uilu gaye. Tudannu Akhou hungnu maan ga chaam latla rwe khatle Ating balumsanu maan ga taraan latla rwe.
43006036	Atiyeda Eina nani khou rinnuwe, nanina Ating mu beida balumsa make.
43006037	Apa na Akhou pi thang damnu bing ga Akhou hunglune khatle Akhou hungnu bating ga Eina bathou satla rwe.
43006038	“Balangbe Ei Araanto zana baningnu chwan to lang, tambaan lana tanu make atiyeda Ating lang hungnu Maanna baningnu chwan to lang naye.
43006039	Ating lang hungnu Pa na baningnu ga heiye dinuba Maanna Akhou pi thang damnu bing ding Eina khatchale to braanlaye atiyeda kakhamnu lumik pi bani ding pi ring thou thangne.
43006040	Ating lang hungnu Maanna baningnu ga heiye, Sa Kapaisa ding munu khatle Bating balumsanu mi bingna khwa sei ringnu lousu lang nge khatle kakhamnu lumik pi Eina bating pi ring thoulune.”
43006041	Jihudi rwanna Balu chung bi tu tu tam tam thou rwe, Balangbe “Ei tambaan lana tanu uilu gaye,” diga Maanna rin ngaake.
43006042	Banina rinne, “Heiya Jisu, Joseph sa kapaisa, Banu le Bapa ding ani theinu makpo? Atiyeda Maanna tatoga ‘Ei tambaan lana tanuwe,’ diga rinnubo?”
43006043	Atibriakpina Jisu na bani khou katake, “Nani lak pi tu tu tam tam mako.
43006044	Ating lang hungnu Pa na bating kai hung thangnu makka pakhatchanale Akhou hungnu ngam make; atiga Eina bating kakhamnu lumik pi pi ring thoulune.
43006045	“Thiamting rwanna hiak thang nge, ‘Rikrwang na bani mi bing ding bachu thanglune.’ Atibriakpina Pa khouna theisu damnu khatle bachu damnu mi bing gana Akhou hunglune.
43006046	Rikrwang khouna hungnu Maanza gana Pa ding munu makka, pakhatchanale Pa ding mu make; Maanna Pa ding mu rwe.
43006047	“Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu Ating balumsanu maan ga khwa sei ringnu lousu rwe.
43006048	Ei ringnu uilu gaye.
43006049	Nani pu pa rwanna ramhaang bi manna sa ngaake khatle bani thi damme.
43006050	Mi pakhatna saluga thi lat mak tingnu, tambaan lana tanu uilu ga heiya rwe.
43006051	Ei tambaan lana tanu ringnu uilu gaye. Tudannu heiba uilu saye dabe, maan ga khwa sei ringlune; Eina pi dingnu uilu ga talei ram mi nunna ring lang Eina pi dingnu Azan ga rwe.”
43006052	Atibriakpina Jihudi rwanna bani cham kana kalega rinne, “Tatoga heiba Manpana Bazan sa lang ani lang pinu ngamgabo?”
43006053	Haba nung bi Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nanina Misa Sa Kapaisa zan ga sa make dabe khatle Bathi ga in make dabe, nani khou ringnu amlaye.
43006054	Tudannu Azan sanu khatle Athi innu maan ga khwa sei ringnu kum lousu rwe khatle Eina bating kakhamnu lumik pi pi ring thou thanglune.
43006055	Batakka Azan ga thaisaake, batakka Athi ga in lang nge.
43006056	Azan sanu khatle Athi innu maan ga Akhou ongme atiga Eina le bakhou ongme.
43006057	Ringga ongnu Pa na Ating lang hungnu khatle Ei Bapaan bina ringnu danga, Azan sanu maan ga le Apaan bina ringlune.
43006058	Tambaan lana tanu uilu ga heiya rwe, nani pu pa rwanna manna saluga thinu ga dannu make. Heiba uilu sanu maan ga khwa sei ringlune.”
43006059	Hei bing nga Maanna Capernaum bi bachu thang damnu danga synagogue pi rin damnuwe.
43006060	Baom potroi rwan taswang khakna heiba chong nga ngaisuluga rinne, “Heiya kung taknu chong zung nge; tuna heiya theinu ngam ding gabo?”
43006061	Baom potroi rwanna hei lang bi tu tu tam tam ongnu ga Jisu na theiluga, Maanna bani khou rinne, “Heiyana nani ket basuirubo?
43006062	Misa Sa Kapaisa gana Maanna ong ngaaknu riak la ka damnu phaangmunu kaan bi nani tato dingbo?
43006063	Ringnu pi thangnu ga Katha ye; zanti pumba khatchale tongnu maake. Eina nani khou kabia damnu bing ga Katha ye khatle ringnuwe.
43006064	Atiyeda nani nun lak pi balumsa maknu kasem amme.” Balangbe thoutan bina Jisu na Bating balumsa maknu khatle Bating pi swak tingnu ga tubo dinu kamaga theichaak ngaake.
43006065	Atiga Maanna rinne, “Atibriakpina Eina nani khou rin drwe, Apa na bakhou za thang make dabe, pakhatchanale Akhou hungnu ngam make.”
43006066	Habei gana thouga Baom potroi rwan mi taswang khak Bakhouna thou dam ngaak briak pina Maan le se bachamlan rwe.
43006067	Jisu na potroi pat somga kani khou rinne, “Nani le thou dam nwamrubo?”
43006068	Simon Peter na Bakhou katake, “Pukraangba, ani tu nung sui dinggabo? Nakhou khwa sei ringnu chong bing ga amme.
43006069	Nang Christa gaye, ringnu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa gaye dinu anina thei rwe khatle balumsa rwe.”
43006070	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani nun mi pat somga kani ding Eina ka thangnu makpo atiyeda pakhat kaba Diabol ne?”
43006071	Maanna haga Simon sa kapaisa, Judas Iscariot om lang bi rinnuwe, balangbe maan potroi pat somga kani lak pi sui ngaak peida, Jisu ding pi swak tingnu pakhat ka maan ngaake.
43007001	Heiba nung bi Jisu Galilee taram la se ngaake; balangbe Jihudi rwanna Bating athat lang zong briakpina, Maan Judea bi se thang kaat ngaake.
43007002	Jihudi rwan om Pwan In Balou nai hung ngaak rwe.
43007003	Atibriakpina Banao kapaisa rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Naom potroi rwanna Nangna tonu chwan bing ga phaangmu lang, Nang abeina se swakluga Judea la sero.
43007004	Balangbe bazan ding phun indao nwamnu maanna inkamga khatchale chwan to make. Nangna heiba chwan bing nga towe dabe, talei ram bi Naraanto Nating indao swako.”
43007005	Balangbe Banao kapaisa rwanna tangga Bating khatchale balumsa mak ngaake.
43007006	Habei ga Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Aom bakaan hung mak aang nge atiyeda nani langba badou chanu ga bakaan bathin amme.
43007007	Talei ramna nani ding batannu ngam make atiyeda Eina bani chwan bing ga sa make diga sake pi briakpina talei ramna Ating batanne.
43007008	Nani balou riak la ga sero. Ei balou riak la ga sela maang nge, balangbe Aom bakaan ga hung mak aang nge.”
43007009	Maanna hei bing nga bani khou rin taangnu nung, Maan Galilee bi ongsia rwe.
43007010	Atiyeda Banao kapaisa rwanna thou damnu nung, Maan le balou riak la se ngaake atiyeda indaonu to makka, inkamga se ngaake.
43007011	Habei ga Jihudi rwanna balou riak pi Bating zong ga rinne, “Maan ingaipai ambo?”
43007012	Mi nun lak pi Balang bi kasao kabao thou rwe. Mi kasemna rinne, “Maan mi kasanu zung nge,” katei rwanna rinne, “Make, Maan mi nun ding minamme.”
43007013	Atiyeda Jihudi rwan ding kachi briakpina pakhatchanale Balang bi indaoga rin mak ngaake.
43007014	Balou om bazai tangnu kaan bi Jisu na kalum in bi seluga mi nun khou bachu thang ngaake.
43007015	Jihudi rwanna loh lo ga rinne, “Maan khatchale bachu makka, hei bing nga tatoga theinubo?”
43007016	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Aom zekrin heiya Aom make atiyeda heiya Ating lang hungu Baomme.
43007017	Tudannu pakhatna maanna baningnu ga to nwamme dabe, zekrin heiya Rikrwang khounnamo mak tabe Ei Araantoza om ngamna kabia ongnumo dinu maanna theilune.
43007018	Baraantoza ding kabia ongnu maan gabe baraantoza ding swan lang zong ongnuwe; atiyeda Bating lang hungnu Bapa ding swan lang zong ongnu maan ga bazenuwe khatle bakhou ririak se maknu maake.
43007019	Moses na nani khou chongtan pi thangnu makpo? Atiyeda nani pakhatchanale haga ngaak make. Pa-aam lang nanina Ating athat lang zongnubo?”
43007020	Mi nunna katake, “Nakhou ri kasia khut rwe. Tuna Nating athat lang zong gabo?”
43007021	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina chwan khat towe, atiga nani mi bingna loh lowe.
43007022	Atibriakpina Moses na nani khou mun rom lang chongtan pi thang rwe (Heiya Moses khouna make atiyeda haga pu pa rwan khou naye) khatle nanina Sabbath ni mun romme.
43007023	Mi khatna Moses om chongtan ga to bak mak lang Sabbath ni mun romme dabe, Eina Sabbath ni naanu mi pakhat ting pi sa bathiang thang briakpina nanina Alu chung bi pa-aam lang balung pwannubo?
43007024	Nanina bapaan bi munu bi ga chong kasem mako atiyeda ririak senu chongsemna chong kasemmo.”
43007025	Jerusalem lana hungnu mi kasemna rinne, “Banina athat lang zong ongnu Maan ga heiya makpo?
43007026	Atiyeda Phaang ngo, Maanna sung raangga chong kabiaye khatle banina Bakhou chong khatchale rin make. Heiya Christa ye dinu bapuba rwanna bathiangga thei ngaak tingbo?
43007027	Atiyeda Manpa heiya inlamnabo dinu anina theiye; atiyeda Christa na hungnu kaan bi Maan inlamnabo dinu pakhatchanale theilaye.”
43007028	Jisu na kalum in bi bachu thang ongnu kaan bi Maanna paoga rinne, “Nanina Ating theiye, Ei inlamna hungnubo dinu nanina theiye; Ei Araantoza khouna hungnu make atiyeda Ating lang hungnu Maan ga bazenuwe, nanina Bating thei make.
43007029	Balangbe Eina Bating theiye, Ei Bakhou naye khatle Maanna Ating lang hungnuwe.”
43007030	Atibriakpina banina Bating nam lang zong ngaake; atiyeda bani pakhatchanale Balu chung bi kut ta mak ngaake, balangbe Baom chakrin ga hung mak ngaak maang nge.
43007031	Mi nun tamga Bating balumsaruga, banina rinne, “Christa na hungnu kaan bi heiba Manpana to damnu ma inkuga Maanna tolu dingbo?”
43007032	Mi nunna Balang bi tu tu tam tamga kabia ongnu ga Pharisee rwanna ngaisu rwe, habei ga Pharisee rwan le diga takopuba rwanna Jisu ding nam lang kalum in ngaak rwan ding lang thang ngaak rwe.
43007033	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Ei nani le diga bakaan kasem ong bachamlune, haba nung Ating lang hungnu Bakim la Ei selune.
43007034	Nanina Ating zonglune atiyeda zongsulaye khatle Eina ongnu riak la nanina hung ngamlaye.”
43007035	Jihudi rwanna bani cham atiga rinne, “Anina zongsula dingnu riak inlampai Maan se dingnubo? Maan Greek rwan lak pi pak imphaang thou damnu riak la Greek rwan ding bachu thang lang se dingnubo?
43007036	Maanna ‘Nanina Ating zonglune atiyeda zongsulaye khatle Eina ongnu riak la nanina hung ngamlaye’ diga rinnuwa impei chongbo?”
43007037	Kakhamnu lumik, baloudei ni, Jisu na han thouluga paoga rinne, “Tudannu taraanne dabe, maan Akim bi hungluga in ding ngo.
43007038	Tudannu Ating balumsanu maan ga, Bathiangnu Chongdipna rin damnu ga danga, balungning bina ringnu tuiqwa lwang swaklune.”
43007039	Maanna heiya Bating balumsanu nunna lousu dingnu, Katha om lang bi rinnuwe; balangbe haba kaan bi tangga Jisu ding lwat pi lian mak aang briakpina, Katha Bathiangnu ga pi thang mak ngaak maang nge.
43007040	Atibriakpina rin ongnu chong ga ngaisunu mi nun lak pi mi taswang khakna rinne, “Batak takka heiya Thiamting khat chung nge.”
43007041	Katei rwanna rinne, “Heiya Christa ga rwe.” Atiyeda mi kasemna rinne, “Christa ga Galilee lana hunglu dingbo?
43007042	David inphum khatle David na ong ngaaknu namlian, Bethlehem bina Christa hunglune diga Bathiangnu Chongdipna rin damnu makpo?”
43007043	Atiga Balang bina mi nun lak pi sung cham maknu am ngaake.
43007044	Bani nun mi kasemna Bating nam nwam ngaak rwe atiyeda pakhatchanale Bakhou kut zaan thang make.
43007045	Kalum in ngaak rwanna takopuba rwan le Pharisee rwan khou han hungnu kaan bi banina kalum in ngaak rwan khou ngaiye, “Pa-aam toga nanina Bating phun hung maknubo?”
43007046	Kalum in ngaak rwanna katake, “Mi pakhatchanale heiba Manpa danga impha ni beida chong kabia mak aang nge!”
43007047	Pharisee rwanna bani khou ngaiye, “Nani ding le minamrubo?
43007048	Bapuba rwan mak tabe Pharisee rwan tudannu Bating balumsanu suirugabo?
43007049	Atiyeda chongtan ding thei maknu bani ga taseng ta thangnu mi nun zung rwe.”
43007050	Nicodemus na (Kani khat zingpha Jisu kim bi hung ngaaknu maan ga, bani lak pi naye) bani khou rinne,
43007051	“Mi pakhatna rinnu ngai mak balei ani chongtanna bating chong kasemgabo?”
43007052	Banina bakhou katake, “Nang le Galilee lanabo? Zongluga phaang ngo, balangbe Galilee bina thiamting pakhatcha hakna swak make.”
43007053	Habei ga bani mi bing bain bain la thou dam ngaake.
43008001	Jisu Olive Rammwan la thou dam ngaake.
43008002	Maan louthwan khwan kalum in bi hung lat rwe khatle mi bing le Bakim bi hung rwe; habei ga Maan badungtaluga mi nun ding bachu thang rwe.
43008003	Chongtan bachuthangnu rwan le Pharisee rwanna lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to ong ngaaknu kamaisa pakhat ting namluga Bakim bi kalwang hung rwe. Banina bating mi nun zai bi thangluga,
43008004	Jisu khou rinne, “Bachuthangnupa, heiba mannu ding nga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to ong ngaaknu dat pi anina nam hungnuwe.
43008005	Moses om chongtanna, ani khou heipai ding nga lungna satthat lang nge diga zathang pi thang nge. Atiyeda Nangna pa-aam rinbo?”
43008006	Banina heiya Bating koi impu thang langna, Bating tamga rinnuwe. Atiyeda Jisu na kuntaluga banina kabia ongnu ga thei maknu danga, talei bi Bakutzungna hiak ong ngaake.
43008007	Banina Bakhou ngai lat latka ong briakpina, Maanna phaangkaluga bani khou rinne, “Nani lak pi tudannu noh maaknu pakhatna, kamaga heiba mannu ding lungna sat ting ngo.”
43008008	Maan kunta latluga talei bi hiak ong ngaake.
43008009	Haga ngaisunu kaan bi kakoi baze theinu sungna bani koi theiluga bani patso khouna thouga kakhamnu tangga, khat khat toga se swak tam ngaake. Habei ga Jisu za ding thangsia rwe khatle kamaisa gana bazai bi han ong ngaake.
43008010	Jisu na batoukanu kaan bi kamaisa ga makka pakhatcha ding le mulan rwe, Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Kamaisa, nating koi impu thangnu mi nun ga inlam thoudrubo? Nating pakhatchanale pi koi thang makpo?”
43008011	Maanna rinne, “Pukraangba, pakhatchanale pi koi thang make.” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina le nating pi koi thang make; sero khatle noh to latlanro.”
43008012	Heiba nung bi Jisu na bani khou rin late, “Ei talei ram om babaanne. Anung suinu maan ga zingnu bi sebila rwe atiyeda bakhou ringnu baan ga amlune.”
43008013	Atibriakpina Pharisee rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Nangna Naom lang bi sake piye; Naom sake ga baze make.”
43008014	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina Aom lang bi sake pi beida, Aom sake ga bazenuwe, balangbe Ei inlamna hungnubo khatle inlam se ongnubo dinu Eina theiye; atiyeda Ei inlamna hungnubo khatle inlam se ongnubo dinu nanina thei make.
43008015	Nanina pum nung suiga chong kasemme; Ei pakhatcha ding hakna chong kasem make.
43008016	Eina chong kasem ngaak peida, Achongsem ga bazenuwe; balangbe Ei Araantoza make atiyeda Ei Ating lang hungnu Pa le ong bacham ongme.
43008017	Nani om chongtan bi pat nina sake pinuga bazenuwe diga le hiak thang ongme.
43008018	Aom lang bi sake pinu Ei khat rwe khatle Ating lang hungnu Pa na Aom lang bi sake piye.”
43008019	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Napazo ingaipai ambo?” Jisu na katake, “Nanina Ating le Apa ding le thei make. Nanina Ating thei ngaake dabe Apa ding le thei ngaak tingnuwe.”
43008020	Jisu na heiba chong bing nga kalum in bi bachu thangnu danga, sian rik in bi kabia ngaake; Baom chakrin hung mak aang briakpina, pakhatchanale Bating nam mak ngaake.
43008021	Jisu na bani khou rin late, “Ei se swak tam maang nge, nanina Ating zonglune khatle nani nani noh bi thilune. Eina senu riak la nanina hung ngamlaye.”
43008022	Jihudi rwanna rinne, “ ‘Eina senu riak la nanina hung ngamlaye’ diga rinnuwa Maan Baraanto thi ding bidamo?”
43008023	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Naniba kathwei la naye; Eiba basaang la naye. Naniba talei ram bi naye; Eiba heiba talei ram bina make.
43008024	Atibriakpina nani nani noh bi thilune diga Eina nani khou rin drwe; balangbe nanina Ating Maan ga rwe diga balumsa make dabe, nani nun nani noh bi thilune.”
43008025	Banina Bakhou ngaiye, “Nang tubo?” Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina kama bina nani khou rin damnu ga rwe.
43008026	“Nani nun om lang bi Eina rin lang khatle chong kasem lang taswang khak amme atiyeda Ating lang hungnu Maan ga bazenuwe khatle Eina Bakhouna theinu bing ga talei ram bi mi nun khou rin swaknuwe.”
43008027	Jisu na Pa om lang bi rinnu ga banina bakaba thei mak ngaake.
43008028	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Misa Sa Kapaisa ding nanina taan kanu kaan bi Ei Maan ga rwe, Araanto zana tonu make; atiyeda Apana Akhou bachu thangnu danga, Eina hei bing nga rin ongnuwe dinu nanina theilune.
43008029	Ating lang hungnu Maan ga Ei le ong bacham ongme. Pa na Araantoza ding bathan thang make, balangbe Eina Bating pi pemnu chwan bakaan bathin towe.”
43008030	Maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnu kaan bi mi taswang khakna Bating balumsa rwe.
43008031	Jisu na Bating balumsanu Jihudi rwan khou rinne, “Nani nun Aom chong biya chat makka ong nge dabe nani Aom potroi rwan bahak rwe.
43008032	Nanina bazenu ga theilune khatle bazenu gana nani ding rang pi to thanglune.”
43008033	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Ani Abraham om bakik taat rwanne, ani pakhatcha om swak to mak aang nge. Atibriakpina Nangna tatoga ‘Nani ding rang pi to thangne’ diga rinnubo?”
43008034	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, noh tonu bing ga noh swake.
43008035	Swak ka in bi khwa sei lang ong make atiyeda sa Kapaisa gabe khwa sei lang ong nge.
43008036	Atibriakpina Sa Kapaisa gana nani ding rang pi to thang nge dabe, batak takka nani rang tolune.
43008037	Nani nun Abraham om bakik taat rwanne dinu Ei theiye atiyeda nanina Ating athat lang zong ongme, balangbe Achong ga nani khou maake.
43008038	Eina Apa le diga mu damnu ga rinnuwe atiyeda nanina nani pa rwan khouna munu ga nanina towe.”
43008039	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Abraham ga ani pa ye.” Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani nun Abraham sa rwanne dabe, Abraham na tonu chwan ga nanina le to ngaak tingnuwe.
43008040	Atiyeda Rikrwang khouna bazenu ngaisunu nani khou bachu thangnu Ating nanina athat lang zong ongme. Abraham naba heiya to make.
43008041	Naniba nani pa om chwan ga towe.” Banina Bakhou rinne, “Ani ding lungmaannu chwan toga pon thangnu sa rwan make; ani Pa khat amme, haga Rikrwang nge.”
43008042	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Rikrwang ga nani Pa ngaake dabe nani Ating kriang ngaak tingnuwe, balangbe Ei Rikrwang khouna swak rwe khatle hung rwe; Ei Araanto hungnu make atiyeda Maanna Ating lang hungnuwe.
43008043	Eina rin ongnuwa nani pa-aam toga thei maknubo? Balangbe Eina rin ongnu chong nga nanina ngainu ngam make.
43008044	Naniba nani pa Diabol omme khatle nanina nani pa na bathainuza ga nanina tonu bathaiye. Maan kama bina mi athatnuwe khatle bazenu bi han make; balangbe bakhou bazenu khatchale maake. Maanna chong karwaknu kabianu kaan bi baraanto zana theinu ga kabiaye, balangbe maan chong karwaknuwe khatle maan haba pa gaye.
43008045	Atiyeda Eina bazenu rin briakpina, nanina Ating balumsa make.
43008046	Nani nun lak pi tuna Ating noh amme diga indaonu ngambo? Eina nani khou bazenu rinne dabe, nani pa-aam toga Ating balumsa maknubo?
43008047	Rikrwang khouna hungnu maan gana Rikrwang chong ngaiye; atiyeda nani Achong ga ngai thang make, balangbe nani Rikrwang khouna make.”
43008048	Jihudi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Nang Samaria rwan khatle ri kasia khutnu miye diga anina bazega rin damnu makpo?”
43008049	Jisu na katake, “Akhou ri kasia khut make; atiyeda Eiba Apa ding takung nge, nanina Ating takung make.
43008050	Ei Araanto lwat lang zongnu make; ha ding zongluga chong kasem ongnu Pakhat amme.
43008051	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, tudannu Achong zeiye dabe, maan impha ni beida thinu mulaye.”
43008052	Jihudi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Nang ri kasia khutnu miye dinu atun anina thei rwe! Abraham le thi drwe khatle thiamting rwan le thi drwe; atiyeda nangna rinne, ‘Tudannu Achong zeinu maan ga thinu khatchale batemlaye.’
43008053	Thi damnu ani pa Abraham ma Nangna liannubo? Thiamting rwan le thi drwe. Nang Naraanto Nating tuwe dinubo?”
43008054	Jisu na katake, “Eina Araanto Ating swankaye dabe, Ei swankanu ga khatchale make. Ating swanka thangnu ga Apa naye, Maan nani Rikrwang nge diga Balang bi nanina rinne.
43008055	Atiyeda nanina Bating thei make atiyeda Eina Bating theiye. Eina ‘Ei Bating thei make,’ diga rinne dabe, Ei nani danga chong karwaknu to rwe; atiyeda Ei Bating theiye khatle Eina Bachong zeiye.
43008056	Nani pa Abraham na Aom lumik ka mulune diga karo ngaake khatle maanna haga muluga karo ngaake.”
43008057	Jihudi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Nang sangwan somnga hakna tang mak aang nge, Nang Abraham ding murugabo?”
43008058	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Abraham pon mak balei meithaanna Ei amme.”
43008059	Habei ga banina lung kachung thouluga Bating sat lang to rwe; atiyeda Jisu na inkamga kalum in bina swakluga, bani lak pi se phao swak tam ngaake.
43009001	Jisu na se hungnu kaan bi mik choga ponnu manpa pakhat ting Maanna mu ngaake.
43009002	Potroi rwanna Bakhou ngaiye, “Rabbi, maan mik choga ponnuwa tuna noh to briakpinabo, heiba manpa namo mak tabe banu bapanabo?”
43009003	Jisu na katake, “Heiba manpana le make, banu bapana le make atiyeda Rikrwang chwan bakhou indao lang naye.
43009004	Ating lang hungnu Bachwan ga Eina lumik ambalei to lang nge; pakhatchanale chwan to ngam mak tingnu zingpha ga hung naye.
43009005	Ei talei ram bi ong basaan, Ei talei ram lang baannuwe.”
43009006	Maanna hei bing nga rinluga, talei bi bachinta rwe khatle hagana talei nei imphaanluga; mik chonu manpa mik pi tei thang rwe.
43009007	Maanna mik chonu manpa khou rinne, “Sero, Siloam tuikhun la kasin satro,” (bakabana bathan thangnu dinuwe). Maanna seluga kasin sat rwe khatle mik muga hung lat rwe.
43009008	Atibriakpina banu pok pina mik chonuwe dinu mu damnu innai lounai rwanna rinne, “Manpa heiya badungluga nisa ongnu ga makpo?”
43009009	Mi kasemna rinne, “Heiya maan gaye.” Kateina rinne, “Bating kapwanu mi zung nge.” Maanna rinne, “Ei maan ga rwe.”
43009010	Atibriakpina banina bakhou ngaiye, “Namik tatoga mu latnubo?”
43009011	Maanna katake, “Jisu diga kounu Mi Pakhatna talei nei imphaanluga amik pi tei thang ngaake khatle Maanna akhou rinne, ‘Siloam tuikhun la seluga kasin satro.’ Eina seluga kasinnu kaan bi amik mu rwe.”
43009012	Banina bakhou ngaiye, “Maan inlam ambo?” Maanna katake, “Ei thei make.”
43009013	Mik cho ngaaknu manpa ding ga banina Pharisee rwan khou kalwang hung rwe.
43009014	Jisu na bamik pi talei imphaan tei thangluga mik pi mu thang damnu ga Sabbath ni ngaake.
43009015	Habei ga Pharisee rwanna bakhou tatoga mik mu latnubo diga ngai lat rwe. Maanna bani khou rinne, “Maanna amik pi talei imphaan tei thang ngaake atiga eina kasin sat rwe khatle ei mu rwe.”
43009016	Atibriakpina Pharisee rwan mi kasemna rinne, “Manpa heiya Rikrwang khouna make, balangbe Maan Sabbaath ting ngaak make.” Kateina rinne, “Tatoga noh mi pakhatna heipai badannu chwan bing tonu ngam dinggabo?” Atiga bani lak pi sung cham maknu am ngaake.
43009017	Banina mik cho ngaaknu manpa khou rin late, “Maanna namik pi mu thang briakpina nang Balang bi pa-aam rinnebo?” Maanna rinne, “Maan Thiamting khate.”
43009018	Atiyeda Jihudi rwanna maan mik cho ngaake khatle mu lat rwe dinu lang bi, bamik mu latnu manpa om banu le bapa ding kou hung mak basaan, banina balumsa mak ngaake.
43009019	Banina banu le bapa khou ngaiye, “Mik choga ponnu narwei sa kapaisa ga heiyabo? Maan tatoga mik mu latnubo?”
43009020	Banu le bapana bani khou katake, “Heiya arwei sa kapaisa ye, maan mik choga ponne dinu arweina theiye;
43009021	atiyeda maan tatoga bamik mu latnubo, tuna bamik pi sa thangnubo dinu arwei thei make. Maan patso zung rwe; bakhou ngaiyo. Balang bi maanna rinlune.”
43009022	Jihudi rwan ding kachi briakpina banu le bapana hei bing nga rinnu ngaake, balangbe tudannu pakhatna Maan Christa ye diga rin swake da be bating synagogue pina kazun sat lang nge diga Jihudi rwanna han thangnu am ngaake.
43009023	Atibriakpina banu le bapana rinnuwe, “Maan patso zung rwe; bakhou ngaiyo.”
43009024	Jihudi rwanna mik cho ngaaknu manpa ding ga kou latluga bakhou rinne, “Rikrwang ding swanno! Heiba Manpa heiya noh miye dinu ani thei rwe.”
43009025	Maanna rinne, “Maan noh mi bo mak tabe noh mi makpo dinu ei thei make. Eina hei khatpa theiye: Ei mik cho ngaake, atun mu lat rwe.”
43009026	Banina bakhou rin late, “Maanna nakhou pa-aam to thangbo, Maanna tatoga namik pi mu thangbo?”
43009027	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ei nani khou rin drwe, nanina ngai thang make. Nanina haga pa-aam lang ngai nwam lat latnubo? Nani le Baom potroi to nwambo?”
43009028	Habei ga banina bating tweiga rinne, “Baom potroizo nang rwe, atiyeda aniba Moses om potroi rwan zwe.
43009029	Rikrwang na Moses ting chong kabia ngaake dinu anina theiye; heiba Manpa heiya Maan inlamna hungnubo dinu ani thei make.”
43009030	Manpa gana bani khou rinne, “Heiya tasiatnu omme, Maan inlamna hungnubo dinu nani thei make; atiyeda Maanna amik pi mu thang rwe!
43009031	Noh mina kalumnu ga Rikrwang na ngai thang make; atiyeda tudannu pakhatna Rikrwang ding kalumnu khatle Maanna baningnu ga towe dabe, Rikrwang na baom kalumnu ga ngai thang nge dinu anina thei rwe,
