43009032	Mik choga ponnu ding pi mu thangnu dinuwa talei ram dam thou bina pakhatchanale ngaisu mak aang nge.
43009033	Manpa heiya Rikrwang khouna make dabe, Maan khatchale tonu ngamlaye.”
43009034	Banina bakhou rinne, “Nangba nohna sipka ponnuwe, nang ani ding bachu thangnubo?” Habei gana banina bating kazun sat rwe.
43009035	Banina bating kazun sat rwe dinu Jisu na ngaisu ngaake; haba nung Jisu na bating kadounu kaan bi Maanna bakhou rinne, “Nang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding balumsabo?”
43009036	Maanna katake, “Pukraangba, eina balumsa dingnu Maan gazo tubo?”
43009037	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna Bating mu rwe, atiga nating kabia ongnuwa Maan ga rwe.”
43009038	Haba nung bi maanna rinne, “Pukraangba, ei balumsa rwe!” Maanna Bating kalum rwe.
43009039	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina chong kasem lang talei ram bi hung rwe, balangbe mik mu maknu nunna mu lang khatle mik munu nunna mik cho lang nge.”
43009040	Maan le diga ong bachamnu Pharisee rwan mi kasemna heiba chong bing nga ngaisuluga, Bakhou rinne, “Ani le mik chorubo?”
43009041	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani nun mik cho ngaake dabe nani noh maak ngaak tingnuwe; atiyeda atun nanina rinne, ‘Ani mik muwe.’ Atibriakpina nani noh ammaang nge.
43010001	“Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, inkhaanmun bi khut makka lampui katei lana bazaak kaluga, zao in bi khutnu maan ga, barusanu khatle kasut sanu miye.
43010002	Atiyeda inkhaanmun bi khutnu maan ga zao nun ding siannu zaosiannupaye.
43010003	Inkhaan ngaaknu maan gana inkhaan lat thang nge, zao nunna Bakhwan ga theiye khatle Maanna Baom zao nun ding bani meng kouga kalwang swake.
43010004	Maanna Baom zao nun ding kalwang swaknu kaan bi maanna bani meithaan la seye khatle zao nun gana banung suiseye, balangbe banina bakhwan ga theiye.
43010005	Banina mi katei nung sui make atiyeda bakhouna pak tamlune, balangbe banina mi katei rwan khwan thei make.”
43010006	Jisu na heiba chongchak heiya Pharisee rwan khou rin thang ngaake atiyeda Maanna rinnu ga banina bakaba thei mak ngaake.
43010007	Atibriakpina Jisu na bani khou rin late, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Ei zao nun om inkhaanmun gaye,
43010008	Ameithaan la hung ngaaknu bing ga barusanu khatle kasut sanu mi nunne, zao nunna bani khwan ga thei make.
43010009	Ei inkhaanmun gaye. Tudannu Akhou khutnu bating kan thangne khatle maan se swak sekhutka basaak riak doulune.
43010010	In barunu gana baruza lang makka, to that lang khatle to braan langna hungnuwe. Eina hungnuwa bani nun ringnu lousu lang nge khatle haga inkuga khopsanu lousu lang hung rwe.
43010011	Ei kasanu Zaosiannupa gaye. Kasanu Zaosiannupana zao nun lang Bakum pi swak thang nge.
43010012	Atiyeda zaosiannupa ka maknu lan thangnu, zao nun ga baom maknu, maan gana tangiya nun hungnu kaan bi maanna zao nun ding bathan sat basialuga pak tamme; atiga tangiya nunna zao nun ding hung namluga bani ding to imphaang thang nge.
43010013	Maan ga lan thangnu mi briakpina pak tamme khatle zao nun lang banang thang make.
43010014	Ei kasanu Zaosiannupa gaye; Eina Aom zao nun ding theiye khatle Aom zao nunna Ating theiye.
43010015	Apana Ating theinuga danga, Eina le Apa ding theiye khatle Eina zao nun langna Akum pi swake.
43010016	Heiba zao in bina maknu Aom zao katei nun le amme; ha rwan ding ga le Eina lou hung lang nge, banina Akhwan theilune khatle zao nun khat atiluga zaosiannupa khat amlune.
43010017	Atibriakpina Apana Ating kriang nge, balangbe Eina Akatha loukhut lat langna Akum pi swake.
43010018	Pakhatchanale Akhouna Akatha lou sat make atiyeda haga Araanto zana pi swaknuwe. Eina haga pi swak lang Akhou ngam amme, loukhut lat lang le Akhou ngam amme. Heiba zathang nga Eina Apa khouna lusu rwe.”
43010019	Maanna hei bing nga rin briakpina Jihudi rwan lak pi sung cham maknu swak lat rwe.
43010020	Bani mi taswang khakna rinne, “Bakhou ri kasia khut rwe khatle kalo rwe. Pa-aam lang nanina Bachong ngainubo?”
43010021	Kateina rinne, “Heiya ri kasia khutnu mi chong make. Ri kasia khutnu mi khatna mik chonu nun ding pi sa thangnu ngamgabo?”
43010022	Jerusalem bi kat thangnu balou dat hung tang ngaak rwe, haga sikpha kaan ngaake.
43010023	Jisu na Solomon inkhu bi, kalum in bi se swak ngaake.
43010024	Habei ga Jihudi rwanna Bating han qwatluga Bakhou rinne, “Nangna intia bakhwa seiga ani ding sung pi tamam ong ding maangbo? Nang Christa ye dabe, ani khou bathiangga rin thangro.”
43010025	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Eina nani khou rin drwe atiyeda nanina balumsa make. Eina Apa meng bina tonu chwan bing gana, Alang bi sake pinu rwe.
43010026	Atiyeda nanina balumsa make, balangbe Eina nani khou rin damnu ga danga, nani Aom zao nun make.
43010027	Aom zao nunna Akhwan theiye, Eina le bani ding theiye khatle banina Anung suiye.
43010028	Eina bani lang ringzoknu kum pi thang nge khatle bani impha ni beida braan la rwe khatle bani ding pakhatchanale Akut pina kasut swakla rwe.
43010029	Bani ding Akhou pi thangnu Apa ga, pum brum khon bina lian kataknuwe khatle bani ding pakhatchanale Apa kut pina kasut swaknu ngamlaye.
43010030	Ei le Apa le khatchaye.”
43010031	Haba nung bi Jihudi rwanna Bating sat lang lung kachung thou lat rwe.
43010032	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Apa khouna kasanu chwan bing Eina nani khou pi mu rwe. Ha bing lak pi gana pa-aam chwan lang bina nanina Ating lungna sat langbo?”
43010033	Jihudi rwanna katake, “Kasanu chwan langna anina Nating lungna sat lang make atiyeda Nangna Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat briakpinaye, Nang misa theikhaan khaanluga, Naraanto Nating Rikrwang pi towe.”
43010034	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nani om chongtan bi atiga hiak thangnu makpo, ‘Eina nani khou rin drwe, “Nani ri nunne” ‘?
43010035	“Rikrwang chong bani khou hung tang ongnu bani ding, Maanna ri nun diga kouwe dabe (bathiangnu Chongdip ka pakhatchanale to baknu ngam make),
43010036	‘Ei Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye’ diga Eina rin briakpina, nanina ‘Rikrwang ding Nang rin basiate,’ diga Pa na kalang swakluga talei ram bi lang hungnu Bating rinnubo?
43010037	“Eina Apa chwan to mak ngaake dabe ating balumsa mako,
43010038	atiyeda Eina chwan bing ga towe dabe, nanina Ating balumsa mak peida, Apana Akhou ongme khatle Eina Bakhou ongme dinu nanina theiluga balumsa lang chwan bing ga balumsawo.”
43010039	Atibriakpina banina Bating nam lang zong thou lat rwe atiyeda Maan bani kut pina dwak lat tam ngaake.
43010040	Haba nung bi Maanna Jordan tui raan la John na meithaan baptize to thang ngaaknu riak la se latluga, Maan habei ga hungnei rwe.
43010041	Mi taswang khakna Bakim bi hungluga rinne, “John na badannu chwan to mak ngaake atiyeda heiba Manpa om lang bi John na kabianu bing ga bazenuwe.”
43010042	Mi taswang khakna Bating habei ga balumsa rwe.
43011001	Lazarus tiga kounu pakhat naa ong ngaake, Maan Mary le bau Martha na ongnu namlian, Bethany bi naye.
43011002	Naa ongnu heiya, Jisu ding banamsanu thao kanun thang damnu khatle Baket pi samna kanun sat thang ngaaknu Mary nao Lazarus ngaake.
43011003	Atibriakpina bau rwanna Jisu khou mi lang thangluga pi rin rwe, “Pukraangba, phaang thang ngo, Nangna kriangnu maan ga naa ongme.”
43011004	Jisu na haga ngaisunu kaan bi atiga rinne, “Naanu ga thi lang naanu make atiyeda Rikrwang lwat lian lang khatle hapaanna Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa lwat pi lian lang nge.”
43011005	Jisu na Martha, banao Mary khatle Lazarus ting kriang ngaake.
43011006	Lazarus naa ongnu ga Jisu na theisunu kaan bi Maan ongnu riak pi ni ni neita ngaake.
43011007	Haba nung Maanna Baom potroi rwan khou rinne, “Ani Judea la se lat maangzo.”
43011008	Potroi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Rabbi, bakhwa sei maknu meithaan Jihudi rwanna Nating lungna sat lang zong ngaake, Nang ha la ga se lat maang gabo?”
43011009	Jisu na katake, “Thamlai kaan bi chakrin somga kani amnu makpo? Tudannuna thamlai seye dabe, maan ket basui make, balangbe maanna talei ram om babaan ding ga muwe.
43011010	Atiyeda mi khatna zingpha seye dabe, maan ket basuiye, balangbe baannu ga bakhou maake.”
43011011	Maanna hei bing nga bani khou kabia taangnu nung, Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ani baan Lazarus inthi drwe atiyeda Ei bating bathou lang semaang nge.”
43011012	Habei ga Baom potroi rwanna rinne, “Pukraangba, maan in damme dabe maan sa dam zung rwe.”
43011013	Atiyeda Jisu na maan thi damnu lang bi rinnuwe atiyeda Maanna kabia ongnu ga in basak tamnu ding nge diga banina baning ngaake.
43011014	Jisu na bani khou bathiangga rin rwe, “Lazarus thi drwe.
43011015	Nanina balumsa lang, Ei ha la ong maknu ga nani lang chungna Ei karowe ati ngaaklena ani bakim la serizo.”
43011016	Habei ga Didymus tiga kounu, Thomas na potroi rwan khou rin rwe, “Maan le diga thi bacham lang ani serizo.”
43011017	Jisu na hung tangnu kaan bi Lazarus ting thaan bi ri thangnu ni bali rwe dinu Jisu na thei rwe.
43011018	Bethany heiya Jerusalem bina, mile kani khak namlaa ngaake.
43011019	Thi damnu barwei nao langna pi lozaang sa thang lang Jihudi rwan mi taswang khak, Martha le Mary kim bi ongnu mannu rwan nung sui ngaake.
43011020	Habei ga Martha na Jisu hungna rwe dinu thei khap tinu le, Bating swak kadou rwe atiyeda Mary ba insung la badung ong ngaake.
43011021	Martha na Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nang abeiya ong ngaake dabe anao thi mak ngaak tingnuwe.
43011022	Atiyeda Nangna Rikrwang khou ninu bing ga, atun le Maanna pi thanglune dinu eina theiye.”
43011023	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nanao ga ring thou latlune.”
43011024	Martha na bakhou rinne, “Kakhamnu lumik pi ring thou latnu ni maan le ring thou latlune dinu ei theiye.”
43011025	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Ei ring thounu khatle ringnu gaye. Ating balumsanu maan ga, thi beida ringlune.
43011026	Ating balumsanu ringga ongnu mi bingna impha ni beida thilaye. Nang heiya balumsabo?”
43011027	Martha na Bakhou rinne, “O, Pukraangba, Nang talei ram bi hung dingnu, Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa, Christa gaye dinu ei balumsa rwe.”
43011028	Martha na hei bing nga rinluga maan thou drwe khatle banao Mary ding inkamga kouluga rinne, “Bachuthangnupa hung rwe, atiga nating kou ongme.”
43011029	Mary na ngaisu khap tinu le, lon thouluga barapka Bakim bi hung rwe.
43011030	Haba kaan bi Jisu namlian bi ga hung tang mak aang nge atiyeda Martha na Bating kadounu riak pi ga Maan ong ngaak rwe.
43011031	Insung la maan le diga ong ongluga, bating pi lozaang sa thang ongnu Jihudi rwanna, Mary na barapka lon thouluga se swak tamnu muluga, “Maan thaan la chap lang thou drwe” diga baningluga banung sui se ngaake.
43011032	Jisu na ongnu riak pi Mary hung rwe khatle Bating mu rwe, maanna Jisu ket pi in bakhuptaluga Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nang abeiya ong ngaake dabe anao thi mak ngaak tingnuwe.”
43011033	Mary na chap ongnu khatle maan le diga hung bachamnu Jihudi rwanna, chapka ongnu ga Jisu na muluga, Maan katha bi sung riangre ngaak rwe khatle sung katop ngaak rwe.
43011034	Maanna rinne, “Nani bating ingaipai ri thangnubo?” Banina Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, hungluga phaang thang ngo.”
43011035	Jisu chap rwe.
43011036	Jihudi rwanna rinne, “Phaang ngo Maanna Lazarus ting intia lang kriangnubo!”
43011037	Mi kasemna rinne, “Mik chonu ding pi sa thang ngamnu Maanna, heiba manpa ding le thi mak lang to thang ngam bilabo?”
43011038	Jisu Basung riangre takka, thaan la hung ngaake. Haga khun kapop ngaake khatle lungna thangnamnu ngaake.
43011039	Jisu na rinne, “Lung ga lou sat tammo.” Thi damnu Lazarus bau, Martha na Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, atunba banam sia lang zung rwe, balangbe maan thi damnu ni bali tang rwe.”
43011040	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna balumsaye dabe Rikrwang om lwat liannu ga mulune diga Eina nakhou rin makpo?”
43011041	Habei ga banina kathi pum thangnu riak pina thaankham lung ga lou sat rwe. Jisu na basaang la batoukaluga rinne, “Apa, Eina ninu Nangna ngaisu thangnu langna swankaye.
43011042	Eina ninu ga Nangna bakaan bathin pi thang nge dinu Eina theiye, balangbe Nangna Ating lang thangnuwe dinu Akim bi han ongnu mi nunna balumsa lang heiya Eina rinnuwe.”
43011043	Maanna hei bing nga rinluga, Maan baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Lazarus, swakro!”
43011044	Habei ga thi damnu maan ga bakut baket thaan pwanna kazwanluga se swak rwe, bamai kum le pwanna kazwan ngaake. Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Sut thangluga bating pi sero.”
43011045	Mary kim bi hung ngaaknu Jihudi rwan mi taswang khakna, Jisu na to damnu chwan bing ga muluga Bating balumsa rwe.
43011046	Atiyeda mi kasemna Pharisee rwan khou seluga Jisu na to damnu om lang bing bani khou pu ngaake.
43011047	Habei ga takopuba rwan le Pharisee rwanna thampei kou kadoiluga rinne, “Ani pa-aam tozobo? Heiba Manpana badannu chwan tamga to rwe.
43011048	Anina Baraantoza ding atiga barang toga bathan thang nge dabe, mi bing nga Banung suiloi dam zung rwe khatle Rome rwanna hungluga ani kaong riak khatle ani chaat ting to braan lang zung rwe.”
43011049	Bani lak pi haba kum ga takolu tonu Caiaphas na, bani khou rinne, “Nani khatchale thei make,
43011050	mi pakhatna khangsung hut toga thi thangluga hagana chaat bingza braan maknu gana, nani lang sanuwe dinu nani kakhan make.”
43011051	Heiba chong nga maanna babaning zana rinnu make; atiyeda maan haba kum ga takolu to briakpina Jisu na chaat bing langna thilune diga thiamting khat tanga rinnuwe,
43011052	haba chaat nun za lang thi thangnu make atiyeda pak imphaang thou damnu Rikrwang sa rwan ding khatcha toga khom kadoi lang naye.
43011053	Ha nina thouga, banina Jisu ding athat lang tup thou rwe.
43011054	Atibriakpina Jisu na Jihudi rwan lak pi indaoga se mak ngaak rwe atiyeda Maan habei gana swakluga ramhaang kim la amnu Ephraim diga kounu nampui la thou dam ngaake khatle habei ga potroi rwan le ong ngaake.
43011055	Jihudi rwan om Takan swaknu Balou nai hung ngaak rwe, Takan swaknu Balou meithaan nampaan lana mi taswang khakna bani pum bahak to bathiang langna, Jerusalem bi hung ngaake.
43011056	Banina Jisu ding zong ngaake khatle bani kalum in bi han kadoi ongnu kaan bi bani lak pi atiga kabia rwe, “Nani paaam baningbo? Maan balou riak pi hung bilagabo?”
43011057	Tudannu mi khatna Jisu ingaipai ambo dinu theiye dabe, Bating nam lang, bani khou pi thei ding gaye diga takopuba rwan le Pharisee rwanna zathang pi swaknu am ngaake.
43012001	Takan swaknu Balou lang ni karuk baat balei, thinu nun lak pina pi ring thou latnu, Lazarus na ong thang ngaaknu riak, Bethany bi Jisu hung ngaake.
43012002	Habei ga banina Balaang khwazin thaisaak sa lang laang thang ngaake; Martha na chwanlaang to ong ngaake atiga Jisu le diga sa in lang ong bacham ongnu lak pi Lazarus le khat ngaake.
43012003	Habei ga Mary na baman kung taknu nard thao litre baang khak louluga Jisu ket pi kanun thangluga, basamna Baket ka kanun sat thang ngaake. Atiga in ga thao barimna sip ngaak rwe.
43012004	Atibriakpina Bating pi swak tingnu, Baom potroi pakhat, Simon sa kapaisa, Judas Iscariot na rinne,
43012005	“Banamsanu thao heiya denari raza thum lang zwanluga sian ga lungsianu nun lang paaam toga pi thang maknubo?”
43012006	Heiya maanna lungsianu nun lang baningga rinnu make atiyeda maan barusanu mi briakpina, bakhou sianbu am ngaake khatle habei thangtanu sian ga maanna lou khap khap ngaake.
43012007	Habei ga Jisu na rinne, “Maanna bathainu ga to dam ding ngo; Ating imphum bani lang maanna haga to ongnuwe.
43012008	Balangbe lungsianu nun ga nani le bakaan bathin ong bacham ongme atiyeda Eiba nani le bakaan bathin ong bachamlaye.”
43012009	Jihudi rwan mi taswang khakna Jisu habei ga ongme dinu theiluga; habei ga hung rwe, haga Jisu om langza bina makka, thinu nun lak pina pi ring thou latnu, Lazarus ting le phaang langna hungnuwe.
43012010	Atiyeda takopuba rwanna Lazarus ting le athat lang chong tup ngaake,
43012011	balangbe Lazarus om lang bina Jihudi rwan mi taswang khakna takopuba rwan ding asat basialuga Jisu ding balumsa ngaak rwe.
43012012	Bathang om lumik pi balou bi hung ngaaknu Jihudi rwan mi khang pui gana, Jisu Jerusalem bi hung naye dinu theiluga,
43012013	ruidan nabom choiluga Jisu ding swak kadouluga pao rwe, “Hosanna! ‘Pukraangba meng bi hungnu Maan ga aih saye!’ Maan Israel rwan Krwang nge.”
43012014	Jisu na lola swan khat douluga, Maan habei ga katwang rwe; haga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe:
43012015	“Kachi mako, Zion sa kamaisa; Phaang ngo, na om Krwang ga, lola swan khat chung bi twangluga hung naye.”
43012016	Hei bing nga Baom potroi rwanna meithaan thei mak ngaake; atiyeda Rikrwang na Jisu ding lwat pi liannu nung, hei bing nga Balang bi hiak thangnuwe khatle banina haga Bakhou to thangnuwe dinu baningsu rwe.
43012017	Atibriakpina Maanna Lazarus ting thi bina pi ring thouluga thaan bina kou swaknu kaan bi Maan le diga ong bacham ngaaknu mi nun gana, baom sake pi rwe.
43012018	Ha langna mi nunna Pukraangba ding hung kadou rwe, balangbe Maanna heiba badannu chwan to rwe dinu banina ngaisu rwe.
43012019	Atiga Pharisee rwanna bani lak pi rinne, “Nani chwan khatchale to swak lan rwe dinu nanina mu rwe. Phaang ngo, talei ram mi bingna Banung sui drwe!”
43012020	Balou riak pi ri kalum lang hungnu nun lak pi Greek rwan le hung ngaake.
43012021	Habei ga Galilee taram Bethsaida lana hungnu Philip khou, banina ngai rwe, “Bachuthangnupa, ani Jisu ding kadou nwamme,”
43012022	Philip na Andrew kim bi hungluga rin rwe khatle Philip le Andrew na Jisu kim bi hungluga rin lat rwe.
43012023	Atiyeda Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Misa Sa Kapaisa lwat lian dingnu chakrin ga hung tang rwe.
43012024	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, gehu na talei bi ta thangluga thi make dabe, haga baraanto atiga am ongme; atiyeda haga thiye dabe, bakraa kraa tamme.
43012025	Tudannu bakum ding kriangnu maan ga braanlune khatle tudannu talei ram bi bakum ding batannu maan gana khwa sei ringnu loulune.
43012026	Tudannu Ating chwanlaang tonu maan ga, Anung sui ding ngo khatle Eina ongnu riak pi ga, Achwanlaang tonu maan ga le onglune. Tudannu Ating chwanlaang tonu bating ga Apana takung lune.
43012027	“Atun Ei Asung riangre rwe, Ei pa-aam kabia langbo? ‘Apa, heiba chakrin bina Ating kan thang ngo’ atiyeda hei langna Ei heiba chakrin biya hungnu rwe.
43012028	Apa, Nameng lwat liannu pi to thang ngo.” Habei ga tambaan lana khwan khatna rinne, “Eina haga lwat pi lian thang rwe khatle pi lian thang latlune.”
43012029	Atibriakpina habei ga han ongnu mi nunna haga ngaisuluga rinne, heiya khwa brinu zung nge. Katei rwanna rinne, “Heiya tambaan chonglang khatna Bating kabianu zung nge.”
43012030	Jisu na katake, “Heiba khwanna Alang bina hungnu make atiyeda nani lang naye.
43012031	Atun talei ram ding chong kasem ongme; atun talei ram om bapuba ding kazun satlu rwe.
43012032	Banina Ating talei ram bina kai thouwe dabe, mi bing ding Eina Akim la kai hunglune.”
43012033	Maanna heiya rinnu langba, Maan impei thit thilu dingbo dinu pi thei lang naye.
43012034	Mi nunna katake, “Christa ga khwa seiga amme dinu chongtan bina anina theiye khatle ‘Misa Sa Kapaisa ding kai thoulu rwe’ diga Nangna tatoga rinnubo? Misa Sa Kapaisa dinuzo tubo?”
43012035	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Bakaan kasemza lang baannu ga nani khou amme. Zingnu gana nani ding hwam lem mak lang, baannu ga ambasaan nani habei ga seyo; zingnu bi se ongnu maan ga maan inlampai se ongnubo dinu thei make.
43012036	“Baannu ga ambasaan baannu sa rwan to lang, baannu ding ga balumsawo.” Jisu na heiba chong bing nga kabialuga, se swak trwe khatle Maan bani khouna inkam drwe.
43012037	Maanna bani meithaan bi badannu chwan taswang khak to beida, banina Bating balumsa mak ngaake,
43012038	balangbe thiamting Isaiah na rin thang ngaaknu chong ga hung tang lang nge, “Pukraangba, tuna ani om sacham ga balumsarugabo? Tu khou Pukraangba om ngam indao thangrubo?”
43012039	Atibriakpina banina Bating balumsanu ngam mak ngaake, balangbe Isaiah na atiga rin lat ngaake:
43012040	“Bani mikna mu mak lang, bani sungna thei mak lang, Banina sung le mak lang khatle Eina bani ding pi sa thang mak lang, Maanna bani mik pi cho thang rwe Khatle bani sung pi nat thang rwe.”
43012041	Isaiah na Balwat munu khatle Balang bi rinnu kaan bi heiba lang bing nga rin ngaake.
43012042	Ati ngaaklena bapuba rwan lak pi tangga mi taswang khakna Jisu ding balumsa rwe atiyeda Pharisee rwan langna banina bani ding synagogue pina kazun sat mak lang, banina Jisu ding indaoga rin swak mak ngaake;
43012043	balangbe Rikrwang na swannu ma mi nunna swannu ding banina bathai inku rwe.
43012044	Habei ga Jisu na paoga rinne, “Ating balumsanu maan ga Ating balumsanu make atiyeda Ating lang hungnu Bating balumsanuwe.
43012045	Ating munu maan gana Ating lang hungnu Bating mu rwe.
43012046	Ating balumsanu mi bingna zingnu bi ong mak lang, Ei talei ram bi babaan toga hung rwe.
43012047	Tudannu Achong ngaisuluga balumsa make dabe, Eina bating chong kasem make; balangbe Ei talei ram ding chong kasem lang hungnu make atiyeda talei ram ding kan thang lang hungnuwe.
43012048	Ating za maknu khatle Achong lou thang maknu mi ding, chong kasemnu khat amme, Eina kabia swak tamnu chong bahak kana bating kakhamnu lumik pi chong kasemlune.
43012049	Eina Aom ngamna kabianu make; atiyeda Ating lang hungnu Pa na Eina rin dingnu khatle Eina kabia dingnu lang bi, Akhou chongtan pi thang rwe.
43012050	Baom zathang ga khwa sei ringnuwe dinu Eina theiye. Atibriakpina Eina kabia ongnuwa, Pa na Akhou rin thangnu danga Eina kabianuwe.”
43013001	Takan Swaknu Balou meithaan, Jisu na Maan talei ram bathan satluga Pa khou se dingnu Baom chakrin hung tang rwe dinu theinu kaan bi talei ram bi ongnu Bami nun ding kriang thangga, balan tangga Maanna bani ding kriang thang rwe.
43013002	Bani khwazin thaisaak sa ong bi, Diabol na Simon sa kapaisa, Judas Iscariot sung bi khutluga, Jisu ding pi swak lang pi kakhan ngaak rwe,
43013003	Bapana pot bingza Bakut pi pi thang rwe, Maan Rikrwang khouna hungnuwe khatle Rikrwang khou selune dinu Jisu na theiluga,
43013004	khwazin thaisaak sa ong bina lon thouluga, Bapwan lwak ta rwe khatle tui kasin pwan khat louluga Bakong bi khuap rwe.
43013005	Haba nung bi, Maanna suktheng bi tui sung thangluga potroi rwan ket kasin thang thou rwe khatle Bakong bi khuapnu pwan gana bani ket kanun sat thang rwe.
43013006	Habei gana Maan Simon Peter kim bi hung rwe. Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nangna aket kasin thang lang zunggabo?”
43013007	Jisu na bakhou katake, “Eina to ongnuwa atun nang bakaba thei make atiyeda kanung nangna theilune.”
43013008	Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Nangna impha ni beida aket kasin thang mak tingnuwe!” Jisu na bakhou katake, “Eina naket kasin thang make dabe, Akhou naom dam maake.”
43013009	Simon Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, aket cha makka, akut le alu le kasin thang ngo!”
43013010	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Tui kasin taangnu maan ga baket makka katei kasin lang bathaang maake, pubrumza bathiang rwe; nani bathiang nge atiyeda nani mi bingzaba bathiangnu make.”
43013011	Balangbe Bating pi swak tingnu maan ga Jisu na thei briakpina; “Nani mi bingzaba bathiangnu make” diga Maanna rinnuwe.
43013012	Haba om langna Jisu na bani ket kasin thang rwe khatle Bapwan louluga badungta lat rwe, Maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina nani khou to thang damnu ga nani theibo?
43013013	Nanina Ating Bachuthangnupa khatle Pukraangba diga kouwe, atiga nanina bazega rin rwe, balangbe Ei haga rwe.
43013014	“Eina nani om Pukraangba khatle Bachuthangnupa toga, nani ket kasin thang nge dabe, nanina le khatle khat ket kasin thang dingnu zek swake.
43013015	Eina nani khou to thangnu danga, nanina le to lang Eina nani khou rin kabanu pi thangnuwe.
43013016	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, swakna bapuba ma lian inkunu make; chonglang mi gana bating lang hung thangnu bama lian inkunu make.
43013017	Nanina ha bing ga theiluga haga towe dabe nani aih sanuwe.
43013018	“Eina nani khangsung om lang bi kabianu make. Eina kathang swaknu mi nun ding Eina theiye; heiya Bathiangnu Chongdipna rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang nge, ‘Ei le diga uilu sa bachamnu maan gana Ameithaan bi baket khong kai basaang thou rwe.’
43013019	Haga hung tangnu kaan bi Maan ga Ei rwe dinu nanina Ating balumsa lang atunna thouga haga swak mak balei, Eina nani khou rin chaaknuwe.
43013020	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Eina lang thangnu Bating lou thangnu maan ga Ating lou thangnuwe; Ating lou thangnu maan ga Ating lang thangnu Bating lou thangnuwe.”
43013021	Jisu na hei bing nga rin taangnu kaan bi Maan Basung riangre rwe khatle Maanna sake piga rinne, “Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nani lak pi pakhatna Ating pi swaklu rwe.”
43013022	Habei ga Baom potroi rwanna khat le khat phaang kaleluga, Maanna kabia damnu lang bi loh lo ong ngaake.
43013023	Potroi rwan lak pi Jisu na kriangnu, potroi pakhat Bapam bi ong hai ong ngaake.
43013024	Atibriakpina Maanna tuom lang bi kabia ongnubo dinu ngai lang Simon Peter na potroi khou ga mik kakhip ngaake.
43013025	Maanna Jisu pam bi ong hailuga Bakhou ngaiye, “Pukraangba, maan ga tubo?”
43013026	Jisu na katake, “Eina uilu than khat imphomluga pi dingnu maan ga rwe.” Atiga Maanna uilu than ga imphomluga Simon sa kapaisa, Judas Iscariot khou pi ngaake.
43013027	Uilu ga lounu nung, Seitaan na Judas sung bi khut rwe. Atibriakpina Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Nangna to dingnu ga barapka toro.”
43013028	Atiyeda table bi ong ongnu mi lak pi pakhatchanale Maanna paaam om lang bina bakhou atiga rinnubo dinu thei mak ngaake.
43013029	Judas khou sianbu am briakpina Jisu na bakhou, “Balou langna ani lang bathaang amnu pot bing ga kaleiwo,” mak tabe lungsianu rwan khou kasem pi thang lang, Maanna rinnu ngaakne diga bani mi kasemna baning ngaake.
43013030	Judas na uilu than ga sanu nung, barapka se swak trwe. Haga zingpha ngaake.
43013031	Judas na thou damnu nung, Jisu na rinne, “Misa Sa Kapaisa ding balwat pi lian thang rwe khatle Bakhou Rikrwang om lwat pi lian thang rwe.
43013032	Bakhou Rikrwang lwat pi lian thang nge dabe, Rikrwang na le Bating Bakhou bahak lwat pi lian thanglune khatle Bating haba kahan bi lwat pi lian thanglune.
43013033	Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, Ei bakaan kasemza nani le diga ong bacham ongme. Nanina Ating zonglune khatle Eina Jihudi rwan khou, ‘Ei senu riak la nani senu ngamlaye,’ diga rin damnu ga danga atun le Eina nani khou rinnuwe.
43013034	Eina nani khou zathang kathan khat piye, nani khat le khat kriang kaleyo; Eina nani ding kriangnu danga, nani khatna khat ting kriang kaleyo.
43013035	Nani khat le khat kriang kaleye dabe, heiyana mi bingna nani Aom potroi rwanne dinu theilune.”
43013036	Simon Peter na Bakhou ngaiye, “Pukraangba, Nang inlam mang se ongnubo?” Jisu na bakhou katake, “Ei senu riak la nang atun Anung suinu ngamlaye atiyeda kanung nangna Anung suilune.”
43013037	Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, atun Ei paaam toga Nanung suinu ngam mak tinggabo? Ei Nalaang chungna akum pi swakne.”
43013038	Jisu na bakhou ngaiye, “Batak takka Nang Alaang chungna nakum pi swak tingbo? Batak sekka Eina nakhou rinnuwe, nangna Ating thei make diga za mak leng thum mak basaan aankhongna khwanglaye.
43014001	“Nani sung riangrenu to mako; Rikrwang ding balumsawo Ating le balumsawo.
43014002	Apa in la kaong riak tamga amme; ati mak ngaake dabe Eina nani khou rin thang ngaak tingnuwe. Eina nani lang kaong riak daan lang seye.
43014003	Eina seluga nani lang kaong riak daan thang nge dabe, Ei hung latlune khatle Ei ongnu riak pi ga nani le ong lang; Eina nani ding Akim bi loukhut thangne.
43014004	Ei inlam se ongnubo dinu nanina theiye khatle Alampui ga le nanina theiye.”
43014005	Thomas na Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nang inlam se ongnubo dinu ani thei make, anina lampui ga tatoga theinu ngam dingbo?”
43014006	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Lampui ga le, bazenu ga le, ringnu ga le Eiye. A paan bina makka pakhatchanale Apa riak pi hung ngam make
43014007	“Nanina Ating thei ngaake dabe nani Apa ding le thei ngaak tingnuwe; atunna thouga nanina Bating thei rwe khatle Bating mu rwe.”
43014008	Philip na Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, Apa ding ani khou pi mu thang ngo atiye dabe ani sung pemlune.”
43014009	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Philip, Ei nani le bakhwa seiga ong bacham beida, aniya tangga nang Ating thei mak aangbo? Ating munu maan ga Apa ding le munu rwe; tatoga nangna, ‘Apa ding ani khou pi mu thang ngo’ diga rinnubo?
43014010	Ei Apa khou ongme khatle Apana Akhou ongme dinu nang balumsa makpo? Eina nakhou rin ongnu chong bing nga Ei Aom ngam bina rinnnu make; atiyeda Akhou ong ongnu Apana chwan ga towe.
43014011	Eina Apa khou ongme khatle Apana Akhou ongme diga rinnu wana Ating balumsawo mak tabe Eina to ongnu chwan bing langna Ating balumsawo.
43014012	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, Ating balumsanu maan gana, Eina tonu chwan bing ga maanna le tolune khatle Eina Apa khou se ding briakpina, Maanna hei bing ma liannu chwan bing tolune.
43014013	Balangbe Sa Kapaisa khou Pa na Balwat lian lang, nanina Ameng bi ninu bing ga Eina to thangne.
43014014	Nanina pa-aam aam ngaakle Ameng bi niye dabe Eina haga to thangne
43014015	“Nanina Ating kriang nge dabe, Aom zathang bing nga zeiyo.
43014016	Eina Apa khou hweinine khatle Maanna nani ding khwa sei ong bacham thang lang, Paangthangnu katei Khat ting pi thanglune;
43014017	Paang thangnu ga bazenu Katha gaye, talei ramna Bating lousunu ngam make, balangbe talei ramna Bating mu make khatle Bating thei make; atiyeda nanina Bating theiye, balangbe Maan nani le diga ong bacham ongme khatle nani sung bi onglune.
43014018	Eina nani ding taraisiasa rwan ding danga asat thanglaye; Ei nani khou hunglune.
43014019	“Bakaan kasem ongluga talei ramna Ating mu latla rwe atiyeda nani nabe Ating mulune. Ei ring ong briakpina, nani le ringlune.
43014020	Eina Apa khou ongme, nanina Akhou ongme khatle Ei nani khou ongme dinu nanina haba lumik pi ga theilune.
43014021	Aom zathang bing khatle ha bing ding zeinu maan gana ating kriangnuwe. Ating kriangnu bating ga Apa na le krianglune atiga Eina le krianglune khatle Apum Bahak ting Bakhou indao thanglune.”
43014022	Iscariot ka maknu Judas na Bakhou ngaiye, “Pukraangba, Nangna Napum Bahak ting ani khou indao thangne khatle talei ram mi nun khou make dinuwa tatonubo?”
43014023	Jisu na bakhou katake, “Tudannu khatna Ating kriang nge dabe, maanna Achong zeilune; Apana bating krianglune, anina Bakhou hunglune khatle Maan le diga lung bachamlune.”
43014024	“Ating kriang maknu maan ga Achong zei make; nanina ngaisu ongnu chong heiya Achong make atiyeda Ating lang hungnu Pa om chong nge.
43014025	“Eina nani le diga ong bacham ong bi hei bing nga nani khou rin thang rwe.
43014026	Atiyeda Paangthangnu, dinuba Katha Bathiangnu ga, Ameng bi Apana lang hunglune, Maanna nani ding balang bing bachu thanglune khatle Eina nani khou rin thang damnu chong bing ga nani ding pi baningsu thanglune.
43014027	Eina nani khou dai bazaangnu thangsiaye, Eina nani khou Aom dai bazaangnu piye; talei ramna pinu danga Eina nani khou pi make. Nani sung riangre mako khatle kachinu to mako.
43014028	“ ‘Ei se swak tammaang nge khatle nani khou hung latlune,’ diga Eina nani khou rin damnu ga nanina ngaisu rwe. Nanina Ating kriang nge dabe, ‘Ei Apa kim la se ding maang nge,’ diga Eina nani khou rin briakpina nani karo ngaak tingnuwe, balangbe Apana Ama lian inkunuwe.
43014029	Haga hung tangnu kaan bi nanina balumsa lang, heiya hung tang mak balei Eina nani khou atun rin ongnuwe.
43014030	Ei nani le chong kabia tamlaye, balangbe hei talei ram puba ga hung nge, Akhou baom badam khatchale maake.
43014031	Atiyeda Eina Apa ding le kriang nge dinu talei ramna thei lang, Apana Akhou zathang pi thangnu danga, Eina towe. Thouro, ani abeina serizo.
43015001	“Ei bataknu drakha zemme khatle Apa ga anqwat Mi ye.
43015002	Akhou ongnu bakraa kraa maknu bakachang bing ding Maanna katap sate khatle bakraa kraanu kachang bing ga bakraa kraa tam inku lang, Maanna bakachang katap bathiang thang nge.
43015003	Eina nani khou rin damnu Achong paan bina nani bathiang rwe.
43015004	Akhou chat makka ong ngo khatle Eina nani khou chat makka ongne. Drakha zem bi bakachang gana chat makka ong make dabe, baraanto karaanu ngam maknu ga danga, nanina Akhou chat makka ong make dabe, nani bakraa kraanu ngamlaye.
43015005	“Ei drakha zemme, nani bakachang nge. Tudannu Akhou chat makka ongnu khatle Eina bakhou chat makka ongnu maan gana, bakraa tamga kraaye; balangbe Ei sui makka nanina khatchale tonu ngam make.
43015006	Tudannuna Akhou chat makka ong make dabe, bating bakachang khat ting danga bazwan sate khatle baowei taye; atiga mi nunna bakachang ga khom kadoiluga mei bi bazwan thang nge khatle bakachang bing ga mei bati sate.
43015007	Nanina Akhou chat makka ong nge dabe khatle Achongkaang ga nani khou chat makka amme dabe, nanina ni nwamnu niyo, haga nani khou to thangne.
43015008	Nanina bakraa tamga karaanu heiyana, Apa om lwat pi lianne; atiga nani nun Aom potroi rwan tolune.
43015009	“Pa ga na Ating kriangnu danga, Eina le nani ding kriang nge; nani Akriang sung bi chat makka ong ngo.
43015010	Eina Apa om zathang bing zeiluga Bakriang sung bi chat makka ongnu ga danga, nanina le Aom zathang bing zeiye dabe, nani Akriang sung bi chat makka onglune.
43015011	Aom karo ga nani khou am lang khatle nani karoga khopsa langna, Eina heiba chong bing nga nani khou rinnuwe.
43015012	Eina nani ding kriangnu danga nani khatna khat ting kriang ngo, heiya Aom zathang nge.
43015013	Mi khatna babaan rwan lang bakum ga pi thangnu ga ma, lian inkunu kriang pakhatcha khou le maake.
43015014	Eina nani khou pinu zathang bing nga nanina towe dabe nani Abaan rwanne.
43015015	Eina nani ding swak rwan diga kou latla rwe, balangbe swak kana bainpubana pa-aam to ongnubo dinu thei make; atiyeda Eina nani ding baan rwan diga kou rwe; balangbe Eina Apa khouna ngaisunu bing ga nani khou pi thei thang rwe.
43015016	Nanina Ating ka thangnu make atiyeda nanina seluga bakraa kraa lang, nani khou bakraa ga chat makka am lang khatle nanina Ameng bi pa-aam aam ngaakle ninu ga Apana nani khou pi thang lang, Eina nani ding ka thang rwe khatle banei thang rwe.
43015017	Nani khatna khat ting kriang kale lang, hei bing nga Eina nani khou zathang pi rwe.
43015018	“Talei ramna nani ding batanne dabe, nani ding batan mak baleina hagana Ating batan rwe dinu nanina theiyo.
43015019	Nani nun talei ram omme dabe, talei ramna baom ding ga kriang ngaak tingnuwe. Atiyeda nani talei ram om mak briakpina atiyeda Eina talei ram bina kathang swak briakpina, talei ramna nani ding batannuwe.
43015020	“ ‘Swakna bainpuba ma liannu make,’ diga Eina nani khou rin thang damnu ga baningsuwo. Banina Ating raiye dabe, banina nani ding le railune. Banina Achong zeiye dabe, banina nani chong le zeilune.
43015021	“Atiyeda banina Ameng lang chungna hei bing nga nani khou tolune, balangbe Ating lang hungnu Bating banina thei make.
43015022	Eina hungluga bani khou kabia thang mak ngaake dabe bani noh maak ngaak tingnuwe atiyeda atunba bani noh bina dwak lat zanu riak maake.
43015023	Ating batannu maan gana Apa ding le batanne.
43015024	Pakhatchanale to maknu chwan bing ga Eina bani lak pi to mak ngaake dabe bani noh maak ngaak tingnuwe; atiyeda atunba banina haga muluga Ating le Apa ding le batan rwe.
43015025	Atiyeda ‘Banina Ating balang maakka batan rwe,’ diga bani om chongtan bi hiak thangnu chong ga hung tang lang heiya swak rwe.
43015026	“Eina Apa khouna nani khou lang hung dingnu Paangthangnu dinuba Apa khouna swaknu bazenu Katha gana, hungnu kaan bi Maanna Alang bi sake pi lune.
43015027	Nanina le Alang bi sake pi lune, balangbe kama bina nani nun Ei le diga ong bacham hung rwe.
43016001	“Nani nun ket basui mak langna, Eina hei lang bing nga nani khou rin rwe.
43016002	Banina nani ding synagogue inza bina kazun satlune; nani ding athatnu maan gana Rikrwang chwanlaang tonuwe diga baning dingnu chakrin ga hung nge.
43016003	Banina Pa ding le Ating le thei mak briakpina kabia ongnu bing nga banina nani khou tolune.
43016004	Atiyeda chakrin ga hung tangnu kaan bi heiba lang bing nga Eina nani khou rin drwe dinu nanina baningsu lang, Eina nani khou heiba chong bing nga rin ongnuwe. Eina nani le ong bacham briakpina, kama bi Eina heiba chong bing nga nani khou rin thang maknuwe.
43016005	“Atiyeda atun Ei Ating lang hungnu Pa kim la selune atiga nani pakhatchanale Akhou, ‘Nang inlam senebo?’ diga ngai make.
43016006	Atiyeda Eina heiba chong bing nga nani khou rin briakpina nani sung riangrenuna sip rwe.
43016007	Ati ngaaklena Eina nani khou bazenu ga rinnuwe. Ei se swaknuwa nani lang inkuga sanuwe; balangbe Eina se swak make dabe, Paangthangnu gana nani khou hunglaye; atiyeda Eina se swake dabe Eina Bating nani khou lang hunglune.
43016008	“Maanna hungnu kaan bi talei ram ding noh lang bi, ririak senu lang bi khatle chong kasemnu lang bi indao thanglune:
43016009	Noh lang bi dinuba banina Ating balumsa make;
43016010	ririak senu lang bi dinuba Eina Apa kim la seye atiga nani Ating mu lat pilaye;
43016011	“Chong kasemnu lang bi dinuba hei talei ram om bapuba ding chong kasem drwe.
43016012	“Ei nani khou rin lang chong taswang khak amme atiyeda nanina ha bing ga atun loukhutnu ngamlaye.
43016013	Atiyeda bazenu Katha gana, hungnu kaan bi Maanna nani ding bazenu bing bi kai thanglune; Maanna baraantoza ngam paan bina rinlaye atiyeda Maanna ngaisu damnu bing ga rinlune khatle swak tingnu bing ga nani khou pi thei thanglune.
43016014	Maanna Ating lwat pi lian thanglune, balangbe Maanna Akhouna louluga nani khou haga pi thei thanglune.
43016015	Apa om ka am bing ga Aomme. Atibriakpina Maanna ha bing ga Akhouna lou swakluga nani khou indao thanglune diga Eina rinnuwe.
43016016	“Bakaan inchan maknu lak pi nani Ating mulaye khatle inchan maknu lak pi nanina Ating mu latlune, balangbe Ei Apa kim la seye.”
43016017	Baom potroi rwan lak pi mi kasemna khat le khat atiga rinne, “Maanna ani khou ‘Bakaan inchan maknu lak pi nani Ating mulaye khatle bakaan inchan maknu lak pi nani Ating mu latlune, balangbe Ei Apa kim la seye’ diga rinnuwa pa-aam dingbo?”
43016018	Atibriakpina banina rinne, “Bakaan inchan maknu lak dinu Maanna rin ongnuwa pa-aambo dinu ani thei make.”
43016019	Banina Bakhou chong kasem ngai nwamnu ga Jisu na theiluga bani khou rinne, “Eina ‘Bakaan inchan maknu lak pi nanina Ating mulaye khatle bakaan inchan maknu lak pi nanina Ating mu latlune’ diga rinnu lang bi nani cham ngai kale ongnubo?
43016020	Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nani chaplune khatle nu hweilune. Atiyeda talei ramna karolune khatle nani sung riangre lune atiyeda nani sung riangre ga karonu bi gon swaklune.
43016021	Kamaisa khatna nao lung lang nainu kaan bi sung riangreye, balangbe baom chakrin ga hung tang rwe. Atiyeda maanna nao ga am thang khap tinu le talei ram bi misa khat lung hung rwe diga karo briakpina maanna riangrenu bing ga baningsula rwe.
43016022	Atiga nani le atun riangreye atiyeda Ei nani ding kadou latlune, nani sung karolune khatle nani karo ga pakhatchanale nani khouna lou satla rwe.
43016023	“Atiga ha ni ga nanina Akhou chong khatchale ngai latla rwe. Eina nani khou batak sekka rinnuwe, nanina Ameng bi Apa khou ninu ninu ga Maanna nani lang pi thanglune.
43016024	Atun tangnu sung bi nanina Ameng bi khatchale ninu maake. Niyo, nanina lousulune khatle nani karo ga sipsalune.
43016025	“Hei bing nga Eina nani khou chongchak toga rin thang drwe. Atiyeda Eina nani khou chongchak toga kabia lat makka, Apa om lang bi nani khou bathiangga indao thang dingnu dat ka hunglune.
43016026	“Ha ni ga nanina Ameng bi nilune atiyeda Eina nani lang Apa khou hweinine diga nani khou rinnu make.
43016027	Balangbe Apa Maan Bahakna nani ding kriang nge, nanina Ating kriang nge; balangbe Ei Rikrwang khouna hungnuwe dinu nanina balumsaye.
43016028	Ei Apa khouna hungluga talei ram bi hung rwe. Atiluga Ei talei ram bathan thangsialuga Apa khou seye.”
43016029	Baom potroi rwanna Bakhou rinne, “Phaang thang ngo, Nangna atun ani khou chongchak to makka bathiangga rin thang rwe.
43016030	Nangna pum brumza thei phik phike, atun pakhatchanale Nakhou chong ngai lat lang maak rwe dinu anina thei rwe, hagana Nang Rikrwang khouna hungnuwe dinu ani balumsa rwe.”
43016031	Jisu na bani khou katake, “Atunbe nani balumsarubo?
43016032	Phaang ngo, batak takka nanina Ating asat thangsialuga balaang balaang pak imphaang dam dingnu chakrin ga hungna rwe, atun hungna rwe. Atiyeda Apana Ating ong bacham thang ong briakpina Ei Araantoza make.
43016033	Nani nun Akhouna dai bazaangnu lou langna Eina hei bing nga nani khou rin thang rwe. Talei ram bi nani riangre kanang doulune atiyeda nani lozaang sawo, Eina talei ram ding ngam rwe.”
43017001	Jisu na hei bing nga rinnu nung, tambaan la batoukaluga kalum rwe, “Apa, chakrin ga hung tang rwe. Nasa Kapaisana le Nating lwat pi lian lang, Nasa Kapaisa ding lwat pi lian thangro.
43017002	Mi bingza lu chung bi Nangna Basa Kapaisa khou ngam pi thangnu danga, Nangna Alaang pi thang damnu mi bing khou Eina khwa sei ringnu ga pi thang lang nge.
43017003	“Khat tak Khatchanu bazenu Rikrwang ding khatle Nangna lang hungnu Jisu Christa ding banina theinu ga khwa sei ringnu gaye.
43017004	Eina talei ram bi Nalwat pi lian rwe. Nangna Alaang pi thangnu chwan ga Eina to loi rwe.
43017005	He Apa, talei ram am mak baleina Nang le Akhou am ngaaknu lwat kana atun Nang le bachamga Ating lwat pi lian thangro.
43017006	“Apana talei ram bi Alaang pi thang ngaaknu mi nun khou Eina Nameng phun indao thang rwe. Bani ga Naomme, bani ding Nangna Akhou pi thang rwe khatle banina Nachong zei rwe.
43017007	Nangna Alaang pi thangnu bing ga Nakhou naye dinu atun banina thei rwe.
43017008	“Balangbe Nangna Akhou pi thangnu chong bing ga Eina bani khou pi rwe; banina chong bing ga lousu rwe, Ei Nakhouna hungnuwe dinu bani bathiangga thei rwe; atiga Nangna Ating lang hungnuwe dinu bani balumsa rwe.
43017009	Eina bani lang kalumme. Talei ram lang make atiyeda Nangna Akhou pi thangnu mi nun lang nge, balangbe bani ga Naomme.
43017010	Aom bing ga Naomme, Naom ga Aomme khatle bani khou Ating lwat pi lian rwe.
43017011	Ei talei ram bi ong lan rwe atiyeda bani nunba talei ram bi ong maang nge atiga ei Nakhou hung nge. Bathiangnu Apa, Arweina khatcha to nu danga, bani le khatcha to lang Nangna Akhou pi thang damnu mi nun ding Nameng paan bina ngaak thang ngo.
43017012	Eina bani le diga talei ram bi ong bachamnu kaan bi Eina bani ding Nameng bi ngaaksian thang ngaake. Nangna Akhou pi thangnu mi nun ding Eina ngaaksian thang ngaake; atiga Bathiangnu chongdip pi rin thangnu, braan dingnu sa kapaisa ga makka bani pakhatcha hakna braan make dinu ga hung tang rwe.
43017013	“Atiyeda atun Ei Nakhou hung rwe khatle bani khou Aom karonu ga sipsaga am dam langna, Eina talei ram bi chong bing nga rin thang rwe.
43017014	Eina Nachong ga bani khou pi thang rwe khatle talei ramna bani ding batan rwe balangbe Ei talei ram om maknu danga, bani nun le talei ram om make.
43017015	Nangna bani ding talei ram bina lou swak thang ngo diga Eina hweininu make atiyeda sa maknu bakhouna bani ding ngaak thang ngo dinuwe.
43017016	Ei talei ram om maknu danga bani le talei ram om make.
43017017	Bazenu Nachong paan bina bani ding to bathiang thang ngo. Nachong ga bazenuwe.
43017018	Nangna Ating talei ram bi lang thangnu danga, Eina le bani ding talei ram bi lang thang rwe.
43017019	Ei Azan ding to bathiangnu danga, bani ding bazenu gana to bathiang thang lang nge.
43017020	“Eina hei rwanza lang kalumnu make atiyeda bani chong paan bina Ating balumsa dingnu mi nun lang leye;
43017021	Apa, bani mi bing khatcha to lang, Eina kalumme, Nangna Akhou ongnu khatle Eina Nakhou ongnu danga; bani nun ani khou ong ding ngo, heiya Nangna Ating lang hungnuwe dinu talei ramna balumsa lang nge.
43017022	Arwei khatcha to nu danga, bani le khatcha to langna Nangna Akhou pi thangnu lwat liannu ga Eina le bani khou pi thang rwe:
43017023	“Eina bani khou ongnu khatle Nangna Akhou ong thangnu danga; khatcha tonu bi bani nun khopsanu to lang nge, atiga Ating Nangna lang hungnu khatle Nangna Ating kriangnu danga, bani ding le kriang nge dinu talei ramna thei lang nge.
43017024	“Apa, Nangna Akhou pi thang ngaaknu lwat ka banina mu dam lang khatle Eina ongnu riak pi ga bani le ongnu Ei bathaiye; balangbe talei dam mak baleina Nangna Ating kriang thang rwe.
43017025	“He ririak senu Apa, talei ramna Nating thei make atiyeda Ei Nating thei rwe khatle Nangna Ating lang hungnuwe dinu hei rwanna thei rwe.
43017026	Eina Nameng ding bani khou indao thang rwe, atiga Akhou amnu Nakriang ga bani khou le am lang khatle Ei bani khou am lang haga indao thangne.”
43018001	Jisu na heiba chong bing nga kabia taangnu kaan bi Baom potroi rwan le diga Kidron tuiqwa la thou dam ngaake, haba riak pi ga amnu anqwat khat pi, Maan le Baom potroi rwan le diga khut rwe.
43018002	Bating pi swak tingnu Judas na le, haba riak ka thei ngaake; balangbe Jisu na Baom potroi rwan le diga habei ga katupka kadou ngaake.
43018003	Haba nung bi takopuba rwan le Pharisee rwan khouna kalum in ngaak rwan le, kraanmi rwan ding, Judas na kalwangluga thaomei, meila khatle sung chem choiluga habei ga hung rwe.
43018004	Jisu na Bakhou swak tingnu bing ga thei briakpina, meithaan la se swakluga bani khou rinne, “Nani tu ding zongnubo?”
43018005	Banina Bakhou katake, “Nazareth Jisu ding nge.” Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Maan ga Ei rwe.” Atiga Bating pi swak tingnu Judas le bani le diga han bacham ong ngaake.
43018006	Jisu na, “Maan ga Ei rwe,” diga rinnu kaan bi banina nung la inkhin swakluga talei bi in balumta rwe.
43018007	Habei ga Jisu na bani khou ngai late, “Nani tu ding zongnubo?” Banina rinne, “Nazareth Jisu ding nge.”
43018008	Jisu na katake, “Nani khou Maan ga Ei rwe diga rin drwe. Atibriakpina nanina Ating zongnuwe dabe, bani ding ga pi sedro.”
43018009	Heiya rin thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang nge, “Nangna Alaang pi thangnu nun lak pi pakhatcha ding hakna Eina to braan make.”
43018010	Habei ga Simon Peter na kachaak chem kaswaluga takolu swak pakhat om inchang kana kapak chat trwe. Haba swak meng ga Malchus tiga kouwe.
43018011	Atibriakpina Jisu na Peter khou rinne, “Kachaak chem ga chemthaang bi thang dro. Apana Alaang pi thangnu ngai ga Ei in lang makpo?”
43018012	Haba nung bi kraanmi nun, kraan milu khatle kalum in ngaak rwanna Jisu ding namluga karak rwe.
43018013	Banina kamaga Jisu ding Anas kim la kalwang hung rwe, balangbe maan haba sangwan bi takolu to ngaaknu Caiaphas pu we.
43018014	Caiphas heiya Jihudi rwan khou mi pakhatna mi bing lang thi thangnu ga sanuwe diga rin ngaaknu gaye.
43018015	Simon Peter le potroi katei khatna Jisu nung sui hung ngaake. Takoluna potroi khat tingga thei briakpina, Jisu le bachamga barwei takolu in inkhu tangga suizon hung ngaake.
43018016	Atiyeda Peter na langkaang la han ong ngaake. Atibriakpina takoluna theinu potroi pakhat kana, swakluga inkhaan ngaak rangaaknu khou rinluga Peter ding kalwang khut rwe.
43018017	Habei ga inkhaan ngaak rangaaknu gana Peter khou rinne, “Nang le heiba Manpa om potroi rwan lak pi pakhat makpo?” Peter na, “Ei make” diga katak rwe.
43018018	Sik briakpina swak rwan le kalum in ngaak rwanna mei kahaiga han kadoi ong ngaake. Atiga Peter le bani lak pi mei kahaiga sui ong ngaake.
43018019	Takoluna Jisu khou Baom potroi rwan khatle Maanna bachu thangnu zekrin lang bi chong ngai ngaake.
43018020	Jisu na bakhou katake, “Eina talei ram mi nun khou indaoga rinnuwe. Eina Jihudi rwanna hung kadoinu riak synagogue inza bi khatle kalum in bi, bakaan thin inkamnu to makka bachu thang ngaake.
43018021	“Pa-aam toga nangna Akhou ngainubo? Eina rinnu ngaisu damnu mi nun khou ngaiyo. Phaang ngo, Eina rinnu ga banina theiye.”
43018022	Atiyeda Maanna ha bing ga rin taangnu kaan bi Bakim bi han ongnu kalum in ngaak nun lak pi pakhatna Jisu ding bakut bazaana kabengga rinne, “Nangna takolu meithaan bi atiga kataknubo?”
43018023	Jisu na katake, “Eina kasianu kabia damnu amme dabe, kasianu om lang bi sake piyo; atiyeda kasanuwe dabe, nangna pa-aam lang Ating bweinubo?”
43018024	Haba nung bi kut karakluga ongnu Jisu ding Anas na takolu Caiaphas khou bathan thang rwe.
43018025	Simon Peter mei kahaiga ong ngaake. Atibriakpina banina bakhou ngaiye, “Nang le Baom potroi rwan lak pi pakhat makpo?” Maanna, “Ei make!” diga katak rwe.
43018026	Takolu om swak pakhat, Peter na bakanaa kapakchat tamnu insung rwan pakhatna le rinne, “Eina anqwat pi Maan le diga chwanlaang bacham ngaaknu munu ga nang makpo?”
43018027	Habei ga le Peter na Jisu ding za mak lat rwe; atiga haba chakrin bi ga aankhongna khwang rwe.
43018028	Haba nung bi banina Jisu ding louthwan khwan, Caiaphas khouna Praetorium la kalwang hung rwe. Banina Takan Swaknu Balou sa bi tanaat mak langna, bani Praetorium sung bi khut mak ngaake.
43018029	Pilate na swakluga bani khou rinne, “Heiba Manpa lu chung bi pa-aam koi impu thangnu amga nanina Bating akhou kalwang hungnubo?”
43018030	Banina bakhou katake, “Heiba Manpana sa maknu chwan to maknu ngaake dabe anina Bating nakhou kalwang hunglaye.”
43018031	Habei ga Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Nanina Bating kalwangluga nani om chongtan nung suiga chong kasem sero.” Atibriakpina Jihudi rwanna bakhou rinne, “Mi khat ting athat lang ani khou ngam pi thang make,”
43018032	Jisu na Maan tatonu thit thilu dingbo dinu rin chaak thang ngaaknu ga hung tang lang nge.
43018033	Habei ga Pilate na Praetorium sung la khutlatluga Jisu ding kouga, Bakhou ngai rwe, “Nang Jihudi rwan Krwang bo?”
43018034	Jisu na bakhou katake, “Heiya naraanto zana rinnumo mak tabe Alang bi nakhou mi khatna rin thanggabo?”
43018035	Pilate na katake, “Ei Jihudi rwanbo? Nachaatna khatle takopuba rwanna Nating akhou pi thang rwe. Nang paaam to ba dabo?”
43018036	Jisu na katake, “Akrwang talei ga heiba talei ram om make. Akrwang talei ga hei talei ram om ngaake dabe ating Jihudi rwan khou pi swak mak lang, Aswak rwanna katwak ngaak tingnuwe; atiyeda atunba Akrwang talei ga hei talei ram om make.”
43018037	Atibriakpina Pilate na Bakhou rinne, “Ati dabe Nang Krwang bo?” Jisu na katake, “Nangna Ei Krwang nge diga bazega rin rwe. Hei langna Ating pon thangnuwe khatle bazenu sake pi langna Ei talei ram bi hungnuwe. Bazenu mi bingna Akhwan ngaiye.”
43018038	Pilate na Bakhou rinne, “Bazenu dinuwa paaambo?” Maanna heiya rin taang bi, Jihudi rwan khou selatluga bani khou rinne, “Ei Balu chung bi koi khatchale dou make.
43018039	Atiyeda Takan Swaknu Balou dat pi eina nani lang mi pakhat ting bathan thang lang nani om chaang amme. Atibriakpina Jihudi rwan Krwang ding ga nani lang eina bathan thangnu nani bathaibo?”
43018040	Habei ga bani khangsungna paoga rinne, “Heiba Manpa ding nga make, Barnabas ting bathan thang ngo!” Barnabas ka kasut sanu mi ngaake.
43019001	Haba nung bi Pilate na Jisu ding kalwang swakluga pi bwei rwe.
43019002	Atiga kraanmi nunna kaling luthop khat bachaluga Balu bi thop thang rwe khatle banina Bakhou sendumnu pwan sin thang rwe.
43019003	Banina Bakhou rinne, “Kalumme, Jihudi rwan Krwang!” Atiga banina Jisu ding bani kutna kabeng rwe.
43019004	Pilate na swaklatluga, bani khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, eina Balu chung bi koi khatchale dou make dinu nanina thei lang, Bating nani khou phun swaknu rwe.”
43019005	Habei ga Jisu kaling luthop thopluga khatle sendumnu pwan sinluga swak rwe. Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, heiba Manpa ding nga!”
43019006	Atibriakpina takopuba rwan le kalum in ngaak rwanna Bating munu kaan bi banina paoga rinne, “Bating cross pi athat thang dammo, Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!” Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Nani raanto Bating kalwangseluga cross pi athatro, balangbe ei Balu chung bi koi dou make.”
43019007	Jihudi rwanna bakhou katake, “Ani om chongtan amme, ani om chongtan nung suiga Maan thi lang khop rwe, balangbe Maanna Baraanto Bating Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye diye.”
43019008	Rin ongnu chong ga Pilate na ngaisunu kaan bi maan kachi tak ngaak rwe,
43019009	maanna Praetorium la khut latluga Jisu khou ngaiye, “Nang inlamna hungnubo?” Atiyeda Jisu na bakhou katak make.
43019010	Pilate na Bakhou rinne, “Nang akhou pa-aam toga katak maknubo? Nating bathan thang lang khatle cross pi athat lang akhou ngam amme dinu nang thei makpo?”
43019011	Jisu na katake, “Nakhou basaang lana pi tanu mak ngaake dabe Alu chung bi naom ngam khatchale maak ngaak tingnuwe. Atibriakpina Ating nakhou pi swaknu maan ga noh lian inku rwe.”
43019012	Habeina thouga Pilate na Jisu ding bathan sat lang lampui zong thou rwe atiyeda Jihudi rwanna paoga rinne, “Nangna heiba manpa ding nga bathan sate dabe nang Caesar baan lan rwe. Tudannu baraanto bating krwang pi tonu maan ga Caesar ding rin basiatnu miye.”
43019013	Pilate na haba chong ga ngaisunu kaan bi maanna Jisu ding langkaang la kalwang swak rwe khatle Hebrew chong la, Gabatha diga kounu, chongsem riak pi badungta rwe.
43019014	Haga Takan Swaknu Balou lang Chamdaannu Lumik, chakrin karuk tanu dat pi ngaake. Maanna Jihudi rwan khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, nani Krwang ding ga!”
43019015	Atiyeda banina rakan ranga pao ong ngaake, “Bating kalwang thoudro! Bating kalwang thoudro! Bating cross pi athat thang dammo!” Pilate na bani khou rinne, “Nani Krwang ding eina cross pi athat lang zungbo?” Takopuba rwanna katake, “Caesar makka ani lang krwang maake!”
43019016	Habei ga Pilate na Jisu ding cross pi athat lang bani khou pi swak rwe. Atiga banina Jisu ding kalwang thou drwe.
43019017	Jisu na Baom cross phunluga Hebrew chong la Golgotha diga kounu Luru riak la hung rwe,
43019018	banina mi katei pat ni, pakhat ting inchang pek la, pakhat ting imbei pek la khatle Jisu dingna bazai bi cross pi taanka rwe.
43019019	Pilate na meng khat hiakluga cross pi thang rwe. Hiak thangnu ga, “NAZARETH RWAN JISU, JIHUDI RWAN KRWANG” dinuwe.
43019020	Jihudi rwan mi taswang khakna haga pa rwe, balangbe Jisu ding cross pi athat thangnu riak ka namlian kim bi ngaake; atiga haga Hebrew, Greek khatle Latin chong la hiak thang ngaake.
43019021	Atibriakpina Jihudi rwan om takopuba rwanna Pilate khou rinne, “ ‘Jihudi rwan Krwang,’ diga hiak thang mako, atiyeda ‘Maanna rinnu danga, “Ei Jihudi rwan krwang nge” diga rinnu ga hiak thang ngo.’ ”
43019022	Pilate na katake, “Eina hiaknu ga hiak trwe.”
43019023	Kraanmi rwanna Jisu ding cross pi athat thangnu nung, banina Jisu om pwan ga kraanmi pakhat khat lang, badam bali to swak rwe khatle talathu ga le lou rwe. Haba talathu ga bamun maaknu kasaklana pwan khatcha toga khongnu ngaake.
43019024	Atibriakpina bani cham atiga rinne, “Ani heiya kaire makcho, tuna lousulu dingbo dinu ani tasaan phaangzo,” heiya Bathiangnu chongdip pi rin thangnu, “Banina Apwan bani lak pi kasemluga, Apwan lang chungna banina tasaan rwe” dinu ga hung tang lang nge. Ha bing ga kraanmi nunna to ong ngaake.
43019025	Jisu om cross kim bi Banu le, Banu nao, Cleopas mei Mary khatle Magdalene Mary le han ong ngaake.
43019026	Jisu na Banu le, Maanna kriangnu potroina han ongnu ga muluga Banu khou rinne, “Kamaisa, Nasa Kapaisa ding ga phaang ngo.”
43019027	Habei ga Maanna Baom potroi khou rinne, “Nanu ding ga Phaang ngo,” Haba chakrin bina haba potroi gana Banu ding bain la kalwang thou dam ngaak rwe.
43019028	Heiba nung bi, Jisu na atunbe chwan bing loi rwe dinu theiluga Bathiangnu chongdip pi rin thang damnu ga hung tang langna atiga rinne, “Ei taraanne!”
43019029	Habei ga kathunnu drakha tui thangsipnu ben khat am ngaake; atiga banina kathunnu tui bi ga sponge bachemluga hyssop thing lan bi thangluga haga Bamun tangga balaanka rwe.
43019030	Jisu na haba tui ga batemluga, “Loi rwe!” diga rinnu nung Balu kuntaluga Bakatha bathan thang drwe.
43019031	Haga Chamdaannu Lumik briakpina pum bing ga Sabbath ni cross pi thang ong mak langna (balangbe haba Sabbath ni ga thuk kataknu lumik ngaake), bani ket bwei ropluga, lou thou dam lang Jihudi rwanna Pilate khou ni ngaake.
43019032	Atiga kraanmi rwanna Maan le diga cross pi bakhai thang bachamnu kamanu manpa khatle kaninu manpa ket ka bwei rop rwe.
43019033	Atiyeda banina Jisu khou hungnu kaan bi Maan thi rwe dinu theiluga Baket bwei rop mak ngaake.
43019034	Atiyeda kraanmi rwan lak pi pakhatna Babanaak pi sungna chou rwe khatle haba kahan bi ga thi le tui lwangta rwe.
43019035	Haga munu maan gana sake pi rwe khatle baom sake ga bazenuwe; maanna bazenu rinnuwe dinu nanina balumsa lang nge.
43019036	Balangbe Bathiangnu chongdip pi, “Baru khatchale to roppilaye,” diga rin thangnu bing ga swak ngaak rwe.
43019037	Bathiangnu Chongdip kateina rin late, “Banina sungna chounu Bating phaanglune.”
43019038	Haba nung bi Jihudi rwan ding kachi briakpina, Jisu om potroi to ngaaknu, Arimathea rwan Joseph na Pilate khou inkamga hungluga, Jisu pum ding ni ngaake; Pilate na bakhou haga za thang rwe. Atibriakpina Jisu pum ga louta rwe.
43019039	Meithaan kani khat zingpha Jisu kim bi hung ngaaknu Nicodemus le hung ngaake, maanna myrrh le aloes thang katwaknu banamsanu thao kilo somthumga impaang khak phunluga hung ngaake.
43019040	Banina Jisu pum ga louluga Jihudi rwan om pu pa chaang nung suiga ri lang banamsanu pot ka le diga Bapum ga banemnu pwanna kazwan rwe.
43019041	Atiga Bating cross pi bakhai thangnu riak kim bi anqwat khat am ngaake, haba anqwat sung bi ga pakhatcha ding le ri thang mak aangnu thaan kathan khat am ngaake.
43019042	Haga Jihudi rwan om Chamdaannu Lumik ngaak briakpina banina Jisu ding haba riak pi ga thang ngaake, balangbe thaan ga naiga am ngaake.
43020001	Maap lak om kamanu ni louthwan karang takka khwa baan swak mak balei, Magdalene Mary na thaan la hungnu kaan bi thaan bina thaankham lung ga lou sat tam ngaaknu mu rwe.
43020002	Atiga maanna pak seluga Simon Peter le Jisu na kriangnu potroi pakhat kim bi hungluga barwei khou rinne, “Pukraangba ding banina thaan bina lou thou drwe, Bating inlampai thang damnubo dinu theilan rwe.”
43020003	Atibriakpina Peter le potroi katei pakhat kana swakluga thaan la se ngaake.
43020004	Atiga barwei pat ni pak bacham ong bi, potroi pakhat kana Peter ding pak khan kaluga thaan la hung kama rwe.
43020005	Maanna kuntaluga phaang khutnu kaan bi banemnu pwan ga nui satsianu mu rwe; atiyeda maan basung la khut make.
43020006	Simon Peter na hungnu kaan bi barwei pat ni thaan sung la khut rwe; atiga banemnu pwan ga nui satsianu mu rwe,
43020007	Balu bi kabetnu pwan ga le banemnu pwan ga thang karung makka tei kadipluga thang ngaake.
43020008	Thaan bi hung kamanu potroi katei pakhat ka le suikhut rwe; atiga maanna muluga balumsa rwe.
43020009	Balangbe Jisu na thinu nun lak pina ring thou latlune diga Bathiangnu chongdip pi rin thang ngaaknu ga bani thei mak ngaak maang nge. Mary khou Pi mu thangnu
43020010	Haba nung bi potroi rwan ga bani riak la thou lat tam ngaake.
43020011	Atiyeda Mary na chapka thaan paan la han ong ngaake khatle maanna kuntaluga thaan sung la phaangkhut ngaake.
43020012	Jisu pum ding ri thangnu riak pi pwan kangounu sinnu tambaan chonglang pat ni, khatna lu pek la khatna ket pek la badung ongnu maanna mu rwe.
43020013	Barweina bakhou rinne, “Kamaisa, nang pa-aam toga chap ongnubo?” Maanna barwei khou rinne, “Balangbe banina Apukraangba ding lou thou drwe, banina Bating inlampai lou thou dambo dinu ani theilan rwe.”
43020014	Mary na heiba chong nga kabialuga, maan kanei swaknu kaan bi Jisu han ongnu ding mu rwe atiyeda haga Jisu we dinu thei mak ngaake.
43020015	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Kamaisa, nang pa-aam toga chap ongnubo? Nang tu ding zongnubo?” Maanna Bating anqwat miye diga baningga Bakhou rinne, “Bapuba, Nangna Bating lou thou damnuwe dabe, ingaipai thang dambo dinu akhou rin thang ngo, Ei Bating lou thou damne.”
43020016	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Mary!” Maanna kanei swakluga Bating “Rabboni!” diga kou rwe, (bakabana Bachuthangnupa dinuwe).
43020017	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Ating banaan mako, balangbe Ei Apa kim la se mak aang nge; atiyeda nangna au anao rwan khou seluga bani khou, ‘Ei Apa khou khatle nani Pa khou, Arikrwang khou khatle nani Rikrwang khou semaang nge diga barinno.’ ”
43020018	Magdalene Mary na potroi rwan kim bi hungluga maan Pukraangba ding mu rwe khatle heiba chong bing nga Maanna bakhou rin thang rwe diga bani khou hung rin rwe.
43020019	Maap lak om kamanu lumik khwazinren tanu dat pi, potroi rwanna Jihudi rwan ding kachiga inkhaan khaanluga ong kadoi ong ngaake, habei ga Jisu na bani lak pi hung hanluga, bani khou rinne, “Nani khou dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.”
43020020	Atiga Maanna heiya rinnu nung, bani khou Bakut khatle Babanaak pi mu rwe. Habei ga potroi rwanna Pukraangba ding muluga karo ngaak rwe.
43020021	Haba nung bi Jisu na bani khou rin late, “Nani khou dai bazaangnu am ding ngo! Apana Ating lang thangnu danga Eina le nani ding lang thang rwe.”
43020022	Maanna heiya rinnu nung, bani khou Bakaphuk sem thangluga rinne, “Katha Bathiangnu louro.
43020023	“Nanina tudannu pakhat om noh kok thang nge dabe, bani noh ga le kok thang rwe; nanina kok thang make dabe, haga kok thang lan rwe.”
43020024	Jisu hungnu kaan bi potroi pat somga kani lak pi pakhat, Didymus tiga kounu Thomas ka bani lak pi ong mak ngaake.
43020025	Atibriakpina potroi rwan kateina bakhou rinne, “Ani Pukraangba ding mu rwe.” Atiyeda maanna bani khou rinne, “Bakut pi thinzum zam ga eina mu mak basaan, Bazam bi ga akut zungna banaan mak saan khatle Babanaak pi akut banaan mak basaan ei balumsa make.”
43020026	Atiga ni kariat nung bi Baom potroi rwan insung bi hung kadoi lat ngaake, habei ga Thomas le sui ngaake. Banina inkhaan khaanluga ong ongnu kaan bi Jisu na hungluga bani lak pi hanluga rinne, “Nani khou dai bazaangnu am ding ngo!”
43020027	Habei ga Maanna Thomas khou rinne, “Nakutzung ga abeiya tangga balaan swakluga Akut heiya phaang ngo khatle nakut balaan swakluga Abanaak pi banaanno. Balumsianu to mako atiyeda balumsawo.”
43020028	Thomas na Bakhou rinne, “Apukraangba khatle Arikrwang!”
43020029	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Thomas, nang Ating mu briakpina balumsa rwe. Mu mak peida balumsanu maan ga aih sanuwe.”
43020030	Jisu na batak takka potroi rwan meithaan bi badannu chwan to thang damnu heiba chongdip pi hiak thang maknu amsip ammaang nge;
43020031	atiyeda Jisu wa Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dinu nanina balumsa lang khatle balumsaluga Bameng bina ringnu lousu dam langna heiba badannu bing nga hiak thangnuwe.
43021001	Hei bing nung bi Jisu na Bapum bahak ting Tiberias tuipui paan bi potroi rwan khou pi mu thang lat ngaake khatle Bating bani khou atiga pi mu thang rwe:
43021002	Habei ga Simon Peter, Didymus tiga kounu Thomas, Galilee taram Cana bina hungnu Nathanael, Zebedee sa kapaisa rwan khatle potroi pat ni le diga ong ngaake.
43021003	Simon Peter na bani khou rinne, “Ei ngaa namse maang nge.” Banina bakhou rinne, “Ani le nanung suide.” Bani nun se swakluga barapka li sung bi khut rwe atiyeda ha ni zingpha bani ngaa khatchale namsu mak ngaake.
43021004	Louthwan khwa baan swaknu kaan bi Jisu tui paan la han ong ngaake; atiyeda haga Jisu we dinu potroi rwanna thei mak ngaake.
43021005	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Naosen rwan ga, nani khou sa zanu pot ambo?” Banina Bakhou, “Maake” diga katak rwe.
43021006	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Kalang ga li om inchang pek la sattawo atiye dabe nanina phangkhape.” Banina kalang ga satta rwe, atiga atun ngaa ga tamlai briakpina bani kalang ga kai thounu ngamlan rwe.
43021007	Atibriakpina Jisu na kriangnu potroi gana Peter khou rinne, “Heiya Pukraangba zung nge!” Simon Peter na haga Pukraangba ye dinu theinu kaan bi baom langkaangnu talathu na bapum bi kabet thangluga (balangbe maan pwan basoi mak ngaake), tuipui la kachakta rwe.
43021008	Potroi rwan katei gana liswan khat pi hungluga (balangbe bani tui paan bina namlaa makka, kutki raza ni khak dinuba, meter somkaqwa khak namlaanu riak pi am ngaake), ngaana sipnu kalang ga banina kai hung rwe.
43021009	Banina tui paan swaktang khap tinu le, mei toluga, mei bi ngaa rou ongnu khatle uilu ga mu rwe.
43021010	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Nanina namnu ngaa ga lou hungro.”
43021011	Simon Peter na hungluga ngaa kaliannu raza somnga ga inthum suinu kalang ga tui paan la kai swak rwe; ngaa ga heitia lang tam beida, kalang ga re make.
43021012	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Hungro, louthwan thaisaak saro.” Atiyeda potroi rwanna haga Pukraangba ye dinu thei beida, “Nang Tubo?” diga pakhatchanale ngainu ngam mak ngaake.
43021013	Jisu na uilu ga hung louluga bani khou pi rwe, hadanga ngaa ga le pi rwe.
43021014	Jisu na thinu nun lak pina ring thou latnu nung Bapum bahak ting Baom potroi rwan khou pi mu thangnu heiyana leng thumnuwe.
43021015	Banina louthwan thaisaak sa taangnu nung, Jisu na Simon Peter khou ngaiye, “Jonah sa kapaisa Simon, hei bing ding ma nang Ating kriang inkubo?” Peter na Jisu khou rinne, “O, Pukraangba; eina Nating kriang nge dinu Nangna theiye.” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Aom zao swan nun ding basaak pi sa thang ngo.”
43021016	Jisu na leng ninu toga Simon Peter khou ngai late, “Jonah sa kapaisa Simon, nang Ating kriangbo?” Peter na Bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, eina Nating kriang nge dinu Nangna theiye.” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Aom zao nun ding sian thang ngo.”
43021017	Jisu na Peter khou leng thumnu toga ngai late, “Jonah sa kapaisa Simon, nang Ating kriangbo?” Jisu na bakhou leng thumnu toga “Nang Ating kriangbo?” diga ngai briakpina Peter basung riangre rwe, maanna Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, Nangna pum brumza theiye; eina Nating kriang nge dinu Nangna theiye.” Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Aom zao nun ding basaak pi sa thang ngo.
43021018	Batak sekka Eina nakhou rinnuwe, nang naosen bado, naraanto nakong bi kongkhaak khaakluga nangna se nwamnu riak la se ngaake; atiyeda nangna patso hungnu kaan bi nakut balaan swakluga mi khatna kongkhaak khaak thangluga nangna se nwam maknu riak la maanna nating kalwangselune.”
43021019	Maanna impei thit thiluga Rikrwang lwat pi lian dingbo dinu pi thei thangga Maanna hei bing nga rinnuwe. Maanna heiya rin taangnu nung Peter khou rinne, “Nang Anung suiro.”
43021020	Peter na nung la kanei swaknu kaan bi Jisu na kriangnu potroi ga sui hungnanu mu rwe, haba manpa ga khwazin thaisaak sanu kaan bi Pukraangba pam bi ongluga, “Pukraangba, Nating pi swak tingnu maanzo tubo?” diga ngai ngaaknu gaye.
43021021	Peter na bating muluga Jisu khou rinne, “Pukraangba, heiba manpa lang bi tato langbo?”
43021022	Jisu na bakhou rinne, “Eina hung lat mak basaan maan ringga ongnu ga Eina baningnuwe dabe, hagana nalaang pa-aam togabo? Nang Anung suiro.”
43021023	Haba potroi ga thilaye dinu chong ga unao rwan bing lak pi thei chang thou dam ngaake. Atiyeda Jisu na maan thilaye diga rinnu make atiyeda “Eina hung lat mak basaan maan ringga ongnu ga Eina baningnuwe dabe, hagana nalaang pa-aam togabo? dinuwe.”
43021024	Haba potroi ga hei bing lang bi sung kahan pi thangnu khatle hiak thang ngaaknu maan gaye; atiga baom sung kahanga bazeye dinu anina theiye.
43021025	Jisu na to thang ngaaknu chwan katei katei le amsip amme, ha bing ga khat khat toga hiaktaye dabe hiak tingnu chongdip bing ga talei ram bi thangchanlaye diga ei baning nge. Amen.
44001001	He Theophilus, eina hiak ngaaknu kamanu meiri ga Jisu na chwan to thou damnu khatle bachu thang thou damnu bing lang bina,
44001002	Bating tambaan la lou thou damnu lumik tangga to damnu lang biye, Maanna kathang swak thangnu chonglang rwan khou Katha Bathiangnu paanna zathang pi thang damnu nung ngaake,
44001003	Maanna riangre kanang khaangnu nung, bataknu badannu chwan taswang khakna Pukraangba Maan Bahak ring ongme dinu bani khou pi mu thang rwe, atiga ni sombali sung bi chwanlaang nun khou pi mu thangga khatle Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi tamga bachu thang ngaake.
44001004	Banina kadoi ongnu kaan bi Jerusalem bina se swak makka Pa na Karen thang damnu ga ngaak ong lang, Jisu na bani khou zathang pi thang ngaake, Maanna rinne, “Nani Akhouna ngaisu drwe;
44001005	balangbe John na tui bi baptize to thang nge atiyeda nani ding bakhwa sei maknu sung bi Katha Bathiangnuna baptize to thangne.”
44001006	Atibriakpina banina hung kadoinu kaan bi Bakhou ngai rwe, “Pukraangba, heiba kaan bi Israel rwan khou krwang talei ga pi thang lat tingbo?”
44001007	Jisu na bani khou rinne, “Apa na Bapum bahak om ngam nung suiga ret thangnu bakaan khatle bapha ga nanina thei lang make.
44001008	Atiyeda Katha Bathiangnuna nani khou ta thangnu kaan bi nanina ngam lousulune; atiga nani nun Jerusalem bi, Judea le Samaria taram bing bi khatle talei kalan tangga Aom sake tolune.”
44001009	Maanna heiba chong bing nga kabialuga banina phaang ongnu kahan bi, Bating phunka drwe, atiga tambuna Bating bani mikphaang bina lou thou drwe.
44001010	Maanna ka damnu kaan bi banina tambaan la phaang dengga phaang ongnu ngaake khatle phaang ngo, pwan kangounu sinnu manpa pat ni bani kim bi han ong ngaake,
44001011	banina rinne, “Galilee mi nun ga, nanina tambaan la phaangluga pa-aam lang han ongnubo? Nani khouna tambaan la lou thou damnu Jisu heiya nanina munu ga danga Maan hung latlune.”
44001012	Haba nung bi banina Jerusalem kim bi naiga amnu, Olive tiga kounu rammwan bina Jerusalem la han hung lat rwe, haba rammwan ga Sabbath ni se kaleknu bazin lampui ngaake.
44001013	Banina nampui ga hung tangnu kaan bi bani kaong riak basaang in kaa la ka rwe. Bani ga Peter, James, John, Andrew, Philip le Thomas; Bartholomew le Matthew, Alphaeus sa kapaisa James le Simon Zealot khatle James sa kapaisa Judas hei rwanne.
44001014	Bani khangsung kamaisa rwan le Jisu nu Mary khatle Jisu nao rwan le diga sung khat chun khatcha toga chat makka kalumga hweini ong ngaake.
44001015	Haba kaan bi ong kadoi ongnu potroi rwan (razaga somni khak) lak pi Peter na han thouluga rinne,
44001016	“Unao pasa rwan bing ga, Jisu ding namnu mi nun ding kai thangnu Judas lang bi David mun bina Katha Bathiangnuna rin thang ngaaknu Bathiangnu Chongdip ka hung tang lang nge;
44001017	balangbe maan ani le diga mi sing chak thang ngaake khatle heiba chwan om badam suilou ngaake.”
44001018	(Heiba manpana baom sa maknu chwan lo manna taram khat kalei rwe; maan habei gana balu tasuk khuntaluga babon pwak bak rwe khatle bakarin bing le zan swak rwe.
44001019	Haga Jerusalem bi lung ongnu mi bingna thei ngaak rwe; atiga haba taram ding ga bani chong la Akeldama, dinuba Thi Tram diga kou rwe.)
44001020	“Balangbe Kalum Laa chongdip pi atiga hiak thang nge, ‘Maan lungnu riak lung taak tam ding ngo, Habei ga pakhatchanale lung mak tam ding ngo’ khatle ‘Bachwan riak ka mi katei khatna lin ding ngo.’
44001021	Atibriakpina anina ani lak pi Pukraangba Jisu na se swak sekhutka bakaan bing bi ani le ong bacham ngaaknu manpa nun lak pi
44001022	John na Jisu ding baptize to thangnu lumik pina thouga Bating ani lak pina lou thou damnu lumik ka tangga, Jisu na ring thou damnu lang bi anina sake to lang heiba pat ni lak pi pakhat ting ka thang ding gaye.”
44001023	Atiga pat ni dinuba: Barsabas kounu Justas tiga le kounu Joseph le Matthias ting ka thang rwe.
44001024	Banina kalumga rinne, “Mi bing sung ding thei ongnu he Pukraangba, barwei pat ni lak pi Nangna ka thangnu ga ani khou pi thei thang ngo,
44001025	heiya Judas na bakaong riak bahak pi se lat za lang chong tanga zei mak tamnu chwandon khatle chonglang om kaong riak ka lou lang naye.”
44001026	Banina tasaan phaangluga haga Matthias khou ta rwe. Atiga bating chonglang pat somga khat le basing sem thang rwe.
44002001	Pentecost Lumik hung tangnu kaan bi bani khangsung sung khatcha toga bariak khat pi hung kadoi ngaake.
44002002	Habei ga thei mak daakka thiraang kanatnu khwan danga tambaan lana taluga banina ong ongnu in ga sip rwe.
44002003	Habei ga mei dannu balei rwanna phak swaknu bani khou pi mu thang rwe, haga bani pakhat khat lu chung bi ta ong thang rwe.
44002004	Atiga bani khangsung lu chung bi Katha Bathiangnuna sip thang rwe khatle Katha na chong pi kabia thangnu paan bina bani chong chaat tei tei kabia thou rwe.
44002005	Saangbaan thwei bi lung ongnu mi chaat bing lakpi ongnu, ri baning thuknu Jihudi kapaisa rwan Jerusalem bi ong ngaake.
44002006	Khwan ga ngaisunu kaan bi mi khang hung kadoi rwe khatle bani batok bariak theilan rwe, balangbe banina kabia ongnu chong ga mi bingna bachong bachong la kabianu danga ngaisu ngaake.
44002007	Bani loh lonu khatle tasiatnuna sipluga khatna khat khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, mi nunna Galilee rwan chong kabia ongnu nun makpo?
44002008	Ani mi bingza ani ding pon thangnu ani chaat chong la danga tatoga anina ngaisunubo?
44002009	Parthia rwan, Mede rwan le Elamite rwan, Mesopotamia la ongnu, Judea le Cappadocia, Pontus le Asia rwan,
44002010	Phrygia le Pamphylia, Egypt le Cyrene taram kim bi amnu Libya taram mi nun, Rome lana bazin mi toga lung ongnu nun, Jihudi rwan le Jihudi rwan zek lounu nun,
44002011	Crete le Arab rwan chong la danga Rikrwang om chwan lian lang bi kabianu ngaisu ongme.”
44002012	Heiyana bani khangsung ding pi loh lo ong ngaake khatle batok bariak pi thei mak ngaake, bani khatna khat khou rin rwe, “Heiya tatonu kababo?”
44002013	Mi kasemna choi banuiga rinne, “Heiba minunna drakha tui kathan in kalonu zung rwe.”
44002014	Atiyeda Peter na potroi pat som ga khat le diga han thouluga baraam basaangga paoga bani khou rinne, “Judea mi nun khatle Jerusalem bi ongnu mi nun ga, nani heiya thei thangga achong nga ngai thang ngo.
44002015	Balangbe heiya nanina baningnu danga bani drakha tui kathan in kalonu make, balangbe kani khat om chakrin inthumza maang nge.
44002016	Atiyeda heiya thiamting Joel na rin thang ngaaknu gaye:
44002017	‘Kakhamnu dat pi atiga hunglune, Rikrwang na rinne, Eina mi bing lu chung bi Akatha buntalune; Nani sa kapaisa rwan le nani sa kamaisa rwanna ri chong rin swaklune, Nani sa katang rwanna pi mu thangnu ga mulune, Khatle nani ding kai thangnu pa rwanna mang manlune.
44002018	Ha kaan ga eina Aswak kapaisa rwan le Aswak kamaisa rwan lu chung bi Akatha buntalune, Khatle banina ri chong rin swaklune.
44002019	Eina basaangnu tambaan la tasiatnu chwan inza, Khatle kathweinu talei bi badannu chwan inza: Thi, mei khatle meikhut pi mulune.
44002020	Pukraangba om tasiatnu khatle lwat liannu lumik ga hung tang mak balei, Lumikna zing damlune, Khatle thana thi danga sen damlune.
44002021	Atiga swaklune, Pukraangba meng ding kounu bating ga kan thanglune.’
44002022	Israel mi rwan ga, heiba chong nga ngai thang ngo: Nani bahakna le theinu danga, Rikrwang na Nazareth Jisu ding nani lak pi tasiatnu chwan khatle badannu bing pi to thangga, Maan heiya Rikrwang na chongtannu miye.
44002023	Rikrwang na han thang ngaaknu khatle thei chaaknu nung suiga Bating pi swak rwe, nani chongtan maaknu rwan kutna nam rwe khatle cross pi hemdan thangluga athat ngaak rwe;
44002024	atiyeda Rikrwang na Bating thinu om riangrenu bina kan thangluga pi ring thou thang rwe, balangbe thinu gana Bating bangnu ngam mak ngaake.
44002025	Balangbe David na Balang bi rinne, ‘Eina Pukraangba ding ameithaan bi bakaan bathin phaangmuwe, Balangbe ei kaling mak lang, Maan akut inchang la ong ongme.
44002026	Atibriakpina asungna karowe khatle achongbiak le karonuna sipe; Inkuga apumna le bachunnu bi basak ongne.
44002027	Balangbe nangna akatha ding kathi ram bi pi kapaang thanglaye, Khatle Naom Bathiangnu Bating ga pi thu braan thanglaye.
44002028	Nangna akhou ringnu lampui ga pi thei thang rwe; Nameithaan bi ating karonuna pi sip thanglune.’
44002029	“Unao rwan bing ga, ani pa David thi drwe khatle imphum drwe, atiga baom thaan ga aniya tangga ani kim bi amme dinu aniya le sung raangga eina kabianu ngamme.
44002030	Atibriakpina thiamting khat toga Rikrwang na bakhou chongren to thang damme dinu maan theiye, pum om lang bi baom mikin bi Christa ding Baom Krwang takung riak pi ong lang Maanna Christa ding pi ring thou thanglune,
44002031	Christa na ring thou latnu lang bi Maanna muchaakluga rin damme, Maanna Bakatha ding kathi ram la asat thang dam make khatle Bapum ga le pi thu thang make.
44002032	Rikrwang na heiba Jisu ding pi ring thou thang drwe, hei lang bi ani mi bing zana sake rwe.
44002033	Atibriakpina Rikrwang kut inchang pek la pi lian thou thangnu bi ga Pa khouna Karen thangnu Katha Bathiangnu ding lousunu kaan bi nanina atun mu ongnu khatle ngaisu ongnu heiya Pukraangba Maanna pi thang ongnuwe.
44002034	Balangbe David tambaan la ka dam make atiyeda maan bahakna rinne, ‘Pukraangba na Apukraangba khou rinne, “Akut inchang pek la ong ong ngo.
44002035	Eina nating munanu nun ding Naket kadim riak pi to mak basaan ong ong ngo.” ’
44002036	Atibriakpina nanina cross pi athat thang damnu Jisu ding Rikrwang na Pukraangba khatle Christa pi to thang rwe dinu Israel inkhun bingna bathiangga thei ding ngo.”
44002037	Atun banina haga ngaisunu kaan bi bani balung bi sungna chounu dan ngaak rwe, atiga Peter le chonglang katei rwan khou rinne, “Unao rwan ga, ani pa-aam to langbo?”
44002038	Habei ga Peter na bani khou rinne, “Sung lero khatle noh bing kok thang lang chungna nani Jisu Christa meng bi baptize toro; atiga nanina Katha Bathiangnu leithwan lousulune.
44002039	Balangbe karen thangnu ga nani, nani sa rwan, namlaa la ongnu nun khatle ani Pukraangba Rikrwang na kou thang dingnu mi bing lang naye.”
44002040	Atiga chong katei tamga kabialuga maanna bani khou sake pi rwe khatle kachui thangluga rinne, “Nani nani raantoza sa maknu mikin bina kanno.”
44002041	Haba nung bi bachong ga karoga lou thangnu mi bing ding baptize to thang ngaake; ha ni ga katha raching thum khak bani khou pi inku thang damme.
44002042	Banina chonglang rwan om bachu thangnu bi, badam lou bachamnu bi, uilu thiak baknu bi khatle hweininu bi chat makka badam lou bacham ngaake.
44002043	Habei ga mi nun lu chung bi kachinu hung ngaake atiga chonglang rwan om paan bina badannu khatle tasiatnu chwan tamga to ngaake.
44002044	Balumsanu mi bing ga karungluga pot bingza khangsung om toga choi ngaake,
44002045	bani om ka am bing khatle pot bing ga zwan satluga mi bing lak pi bathaang amnu tudannu lang kasem thang ngaake.
44002046	Bani nun kani bathin kalum in bi sung khatcha toga hung kadoiluga inkhun inkhun bi uilu thiak bakluga, karo lozaang saga khatle sung khatcha toga bani om thaisaak ka sa bacham ngaake,
44002047	banina Rikrwang ding swanga khatle mi bing khouna le kriang thangnu lousu rwe. Atiga kanthangnu lousu damnu nun ding kani bathin Pukraangba na rupkathan bi pi inku thou thang ngaake.
44003001	Kani khat Peter le John na kalumnu dat chakrin kaqwa bi kalum in la ka bacham ngaake.
44003002	Banu pok pina sethei maknu pakhat ting banina kalum in bi khutnu bing khouna paangsun nisa lang, kalum in om Phaangsanu diga kounu inkhaan pui bi ga kani bathin pon hung thang ngaake;
44003003	Peter le John na kalum in bi sekhut tingnu ga muluga paangsun pi thang lang ni ngaake.
44003004	Peter le John na bating phaangdengga phaangluga rinne, “Arwei ding phaang ngo.”
44003005	Barwei khouna kasem phanglu dingbo diga balumsa briakpina maanna sung khutka phaang ngaake.
44003006	Habei ga Peter na rinne, “Akhou kachaak kaphut maake atiyeda eina aom ka amnu ga nalaang piye: Nazareth Jisu Christa meng bina lon thouluga sero.”
44003007	Peter na bakut inchang ga kailuga pi han thou thang rwe, haba kahan bi baket khatle kasiangru ga pi nat thang rwe.
44003008	Maan kachak thouluga han thou rwe khatle se rwe. Seluga, kachak thouluga khatle Rikrwang ding swan ga bani le diga kalum in la suikhut ngaak rwe.
44003009	Maanna se koiga Rikrwang ding swannu ga mi nunna mu rwe.
44003010	Habei ga maan kalum in om Phaangsanu Inkhaan pui diga kounu riak pi paangsun ni ongnu gaye dinu banina thei rwe; atiga bakhou swak tamnu ga bani lang tasiatnu le loh lonuna sip ngaak rwe.
44003011	Sethei maknu bina sa damnu manpa gana Peter le John ding choiluga ongnu kaan bi mi nunna taswang khak lang loh lo ga Solomon inkhu diga kounu riak pi pak hung kadoi rwe.
44003012	Peter na haga munu kaan bi mi nun khou rinne, “Israel mi rwan ga hei ding nga pa-aam toga loh lonubo? Mak tabe ani ngam mak tabe ri baning thuknu paan bina pi sa thangnu danga ani ding phaangdengga phaang ongnubo?
44003013	Ani pu pa rwan Rikrwang, Abraham, Isaac, Jacob om Rikrwang na Bachwanlaang Jisu ding lwat pi lian thang rwe, Pilate na Bating bathan sat lang basung hannu kaan bi nanina pi swak tamme khatle Pilate meithaan bi za dam make.
44003014	Atiyeda nanina Bathiangnu le Bazenu Bating zalan rwe atiyeda nani lang mi athatnu pakhat ting pi thang lang ni ngaake,
44003015	Rikrwang na thinu bina pi ring thou damnu, ringnu pi thang dingnu Krwang ding athat rwe, hei lang bi anina sake rwe.
44003016	Jisu meng ding balumsanu paan bina heiba manpa ding nga pi nat thang damme, nanina muluga thei ongnu ga rwe. Rikrwang khou amnu balumsanu gana nani khangsung meithaan bi bating pi sa bathiang thang rwe.
44003017	“Unao rwan ga, atun nani om bapuba rwannale to damnu ga danga, naninale thei makka to damnuwe dinu ei theiye.
