44003018	Christa na riangre khaanglune diga Rikrwang na Baom thiamting rwan mun bina rin basaam thang ngaaknu bing ga Maanna pi hung tang thang rwe.
44003019	Atibriakpina nani noh bing ga tumut sat thang lang nani sung leluga han hungro, heiya Pukraangba meithaan bina chaang pi ring thou thangnu bakaan hung lang nge,
44003020	atiga Maanna nani khou kamaga kasam thang ngaaknu, Jisu Christa ding bathan hung thang lang nge,
44003021	Pot bingza pi kathan thang lat tingnu bakaan tang mak basaan Jisu ding tambaan la pi onglune, hei lang bi Rikrwang na talei dam thoutan bina Baom bathiangnu thiamting rwan bing mun bina rin thang rwe.
44003022	Balangbe Moses na pu pa rwan khou bathiangga rin thang ngaake, ‘Nani lang Pukraangba Rikrwang na nani unao rwan lak pina ei dannu Thiamting pakhat ting pi thanglune. Maanna nani khou rinnu bing ga nanina zei lang nge.
44003023	Heiya swaklune, tudannu Thiamting chong zei maknu mi bing ding ga mi nun lak pina to braan satlune.’
44003024	O, Samuel khouna thouga thiamting rwan bing khatle bani nung hungnu thiamting bingna le hadanga atun kaan om lang bi rin basaam thang ngaake.
44003025	Nani nun thiamting rwan khatle Rikrwang na ani pu pa rwan khou chongren to thang ngaaknu sa kapaisa rwanne, Abraham khou rinne, ‘Nakik nataat pina talei ram mi bing rithoi lousulune.’
44003026	Rikrwang na Bachwanlaang Jisu ding pi ring thou thangluga nani mi bingna nani om kasianu bina pi kaleluga nani khou rithoi pi thang lang kamaga lang hung thang ngaake.”
44004001	Banina mi nun khou chong kabia ongnu kahan bi tako rwan, kalum in ngaakpuba khatle Sadducee rwanna bani khou hung ngaake,
44004002	banina mi nun khou bachu thangnu khatle thinu nun ding Jisu paan bina pi ring thou thang latne diga pao swaknu lang bi bani sung katop tak ngaak rwe.
44004003	Atiga banina Peter le John ding namluga inswan lampai tangga qwan in bi thang rwe, balangbe haga khwazinren ngaake.
44004004	Atiyeda haba chong ga ngaisu damnu mi taswang khakna balumsa ngaak rwe; atiga habei hung ngaaknu kapaisa rwan ga mi raching impaang khak ngaake.
44004005	Inswan lampai bani om taleipuba rwan, patso rwan, chongtan bachuthangnu rwan,
44004006	takolu Annas, Caiaphas, John, Alexander khatle takolu in sung rwan bing mi taswang khak Jerusalem bi hung kadoi ngaake.
44004007	Banina Peter le John ding bani zai bi pi han thangluga ngai rwe, “Narweina tuom ngam paan bina mak tabe tu meng bina heiya to ongnubo?”
44004008	Habei ga Katha Bathiangnuna sipluga Peter na bani khou rinne, “Mi nun om taleipuba rwan khatle Israel om patso rwan ga:
44004009	Ani ding aniya lumik pi naaga ongnu pakhat khou kasanu chwan to damnu lang bi, tatonu chwanna heiba mi ding pi sa thangnubo diga chong kasemnuwe dabe,
44004010	nani khangsung khatle Israel rwan bingna thei ding ngo, nanina cross pi athat thang damnu khatle Rikrwang na thi bina pi ring thou damnu, Nazareth Jisu Christa meng bi dinuba Bapaan bina heiba manpana sa bathiangluga nani meithaan bi han ongme.
44004011	Heiya ‘Nani intok mi nun lang bathaang maaknu asat thangnu lung gana bakung tonu intaki lung imbei rwe’ dinu gaye.
44004012	Katei pakhatcha khou hakna ringriak maake, balangbe Jisu meng paan bina makka ani ding kan thang dingnu mi nun lak pi pi thangnu meng katei pakhatchale tambaan thwei bi maake.”
44004013	Habei ga banina Peter le John om sung raangnu ga muluga chongrik thei tomnu khatle bachunu baatnu zung nge dinu theiluga loh lo ong ngaake. Atiga barwei Jisu nung sui thang ngaaknu nunne dinu banina thei rwe.
44004014	Naa bina pi sa thang damnu manpa gana bani le diga han ongnu muluga banina haba om maitwang bi chong khatchale rinnu ngam mak ngaak rwe.
44004015	Atiyeda banina barwei ding thampei in bina langkaang swak tam lang zathang pinu nung, bani cham haba om lang bi kathuiluga
44004016	rinne, “Heiba pat ni ding nga ani pa-aam tozo dinubo? Balangbe batak takka barwei pat nina badan zanu tasiatnu chwan to rwe dinu Jerusalem bi ongnu mi nunna thei rwe, ha ding ga ani za maknu ngam make.
44004017	Atiyeda heiya mi nun khou kasam lat mak lang, banina Jisu meng bina pakhatcha khou hakna kabia mak lang anina barwei ding kachi dam lang basi thangrizo.”
44004018	Banina barwei ding kouluga pakhatcha khou hakna Jisu meng ding kabia lat mak lang khatle bachu thang lat mak lang barwei khou zathang pi rwe.
44004019	Atiyeda Peter le John na bani khou rinne, “Anina Rikrwang chong zeinu ma nani chong zeinuna Rikrwang mikphaang bi bazenu zungbo dinu nanina chong kasemmo.
44004020	Balangbe anina mu damnu khatle ngaisu damnu lang bi anina kabia maknu ngam make.”
44004021	Mi nunna to thang damnu langna Rikrwang lwat indaoga ong dam briakpina barwei ding laak lang batok maakka banina barwei ding rakanga to basiluga bathan drwe.
44004022	Balangbe heiba tasiatnu chwan paan bina naanu pi sa thang damnu manpa ga sangwan sombali sak la mi ngaake. Christian nun om Kalum
44004023	Barwei ding bathan thang bi bani doi rwan kim la seluga takopuba rwan le patso rwanna barwei khou rin damnu chong bing ga bani khou rin rwe.
44004024	Haga banina theisunu kaan bi bani sung khatcha toga baraam basaangga Rikrwang ding swanga pao rwe, “He Pukraangba, Nang be talei tambaan, tuipui khatle haba sung bi amnu bing ding dam thangnu Rikrwang nge,
44004025	Nangna Na swak David mun bina atiga rin thang ngaake, ‘Gentile rwanna pa-aam toga balung pwannubo, Pa-aam lang mi nunna bathaang maaknu chwan ga laangnubo?
44004026	Talei ram krwang nunna han thou rwe, Khatle taleipuba rwanna Pukraangba le Baom Christa maitwang bi hung kadoi rwe.’
44004027	Balangbe batak takka Naom bathiangnu Chwanlaang, Nangna thao kanun thang damnu Jisu maitwang bi, Herod le Pontius Pilate barweina, Gentile rwan le Israel mi nun le diga hung kadoi rwe,
44004028	heiya Nakutna khatle Nabaningna to lang meithaanna han thang damnu ga to lang nge.
44004029	Atun Pukraangba, banina basi ongnu ga phaang thang ngo atiga Naswak rwan ding Nachong ga sung raangga pi kabia swak thang ngo,
44004030	Nakut balaan swakluga naanu pi sa lang, Naom bathiangnu Chwanlaang Jisu meng bina badannu khatle tasiatnu chwan to dam ding ngo.”
44004031	Banina kalumnu kaan bi banina ong kadoi ongnu riak ka kanuk rwe; bani ga Katha Bathiangnuna sipluga banina sung raangga Rikrwang chong kabia swak rwe.
44004032	Balumsanu mi khangna sung khatcha, katha khatcha toga ong ngaake; pakhatchanale baom ka amnu pot ka baraantoza omme diga rin mak ngaake atiyeda bani om ka am bing ga bani khangsung om to ngaake.
44004033	Chonglang rwanna ngam liannu le bachamga Pukraangba Jisu na ring thou damnu lang bi sake pi ngaake. Atiga bani khangsung lu chung bi kaliannu phaangkriang tamga pi thang ngaake.
44004034	Bani lak pi pakhatcha hakna baatnu maak ngaake; balangbe taram mak tabe in amnu bing gana ha bing ga zwan sat rwe khatle zwan swaknu pot bing om man ga phun hung ngaake,
44004035	sian ga chonglang rwan kut pi hung bachoi thang ngaake; atiga tudannu bathaang amnu nung suiga mi bing lang banina kasem thang ngaake.
44004036	Cyprus la ponnu Levi phum bina manpa pakhat, chonglang rwanna bameng Barnabas tiga basak thangnu (bakabana Kachui thangnu sa kapaisa diga kounu) Joses na
44004037	lou khat zwan sat rwe, atiga maanna haba sian ga phun hungluga chonglang rwan kut pi hung bachoi thang ngaake.
44005001	Atiyeda Ananias tiga kounu manpa pakhatna bamei Sapphira le diga taram khat zwan ngaake.
44005002	Atiga maanna badam kasem khaak thangluga bameina le haga theiga taram man ga badam kasemza chonglang rwan kut pi hung bachoi thang ngaake.
44005003	Atiyeda Peter na rinne, “Ananias, nangna Katha Bathiangnu ding minam lang khatle taram man bina badam kasem khaak thang lang Seitaan na nasung ding pa-aam toga pi sipnubo?
44005004	Haga zwan mak balei naom makkabo? Atiga zwannu nung le narang tonu makkabo? Pa-aam toga heipai chwan to lang nasung bi baning swaknubo? Nang mi nun ding minamnu make atiyeda Rikrwang ding minamnuwe.”
44005005	Atiga Ananias na heiba chong nga ngaisunu kahan bi balumtaluga kaphuk kailan drwe. Haga ngaisunu bingna kachi tak ngaak rwe.
44005006	Atiga katang rwanna thouluga bapum ga pwanna kazwanluga pon thou dam ngaake khatle bating kairi thang drwe.
44005007	Chakrin inthum nung bi bamei ga pa-aam swak tambo dinu thei makka sekhut rwe.
44005008	Peter na bakhou ngai rwe, “Narweina taram ga hazaa za lang zwannu zunggabo? Akhou rinno.” Maanna rinne, “O, hazaa za lang zwannu zung nge.”
44005009	Habei ga Peter na bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba Katha ding tamphaang langna haga narweina tatoga zakalenubo? Phaang ngo, nabasan ding kairi thang damnu mi nun ga inkhaanmun bi han ong maang nge, banina nating le pon swaklu rwe.”
44005010	Haba kahan bi ga maan Peter ket kim bi balumtaluga kaphuk kailan drwe. Katang rwanna khutnu kaan bi maan le thi ngaaknu dou rwe, atiga banina bating le pon swakluga babasan thaan kim bi ri thang rwe.
44005011	Rupkathan bi amnu balumsanu bing khou khatle swak tamnu ga ngaisunu mi nun khou kachi taknu swak ngaak rwe.
44005012	Chonglang rwanna bani kutna mi nun lak pi badannu khatle tasiatnu chwan tamga to rwe. Bani khangsung Solomon inkhu bi sung khatcha toga ong ngaake.
44005013	Mi katei pakhatchanale bani khou karung raang mak ngaake atiyeda mi nunna bani ding takung tazei to takka ong ngaake.
44005014	Atiga kamaisa le kapaisa, mi khangna balumsaga Pukraangba khou mi tam khit khit thou ngaak rwe,
44005015	Peter na se hungnu kaan bi bakatha za beida bani khou ta thang langna, naanu nun ding lampui bi bani ria khatle kain riak pi thangluga pi in ong ngaake.
44005016	Jerusalem paan bi amnu namlian bing lana mi khang, bani om kasa kanaa bing ding khatle bathiang maknu katha na rainu nun ding pon hung rwe, atiga ha bing ding ga pi sa thang loi ngaake.
44005017	Habei ga takolu khatle maan le diga ong bachamnu mi bing (dinuba Sadducee rwanna) maitwangluga bani khou antiamnuna sip rwe,
44005018	atiga chonglang rwan ding bani kutna namluga mi khang ongnu qwan in bi thang rwe.
44005019	Atiyeda zingpha talak pi Pukraangba om Tambaan Chonglangna qwan in inkhaan bing lat thangluga bani ding langkaang la kalwang swakluga rinne,
44005020	Sero, nanina kalum in bi ga han thouluga mi nun khou heiba ringnu chong nga kasammo.”
44005021	Haga banina ngaisuluga louthwan khwan kalum in bi khutluga bachu thang rwe. Atiyeda takolu khatle maan le diga ong bachamnu nun ga hung tang rwe khatle banina Israel sa rwan om patso rwan khatle thampei rwan ding kou kadoiluga bani ding qwan in bina bani khou kalwang hung lang mi lang thang rwe.
44005022	Atiyeda ngam amnu nunna hungnu kaan bi bani qwan in bi maak ngaak rwe, banina seluga haga bapuluga
44005023	rinne, “Anina qwan in ga inkhaan khaan chuiga khatle bapaan bi rangkaan thang ong ngaaknu dou rwe; atiyeda anina inkhaan lat swaknu kaan bi basung bi pakhatcha ding le dou make!”
44005024	Takolu om rangkaan balu le takopuba rwanna heiya theinu kaan bi pa-aam swaklu dingbo diga bani loh lo ong ngaake.
44005025	Habei ga mi pakhatna hungluga bani khou rinne, “Phaang ngo, nanina qwan in bi thang ngaaknu kapaisa rwan ga kalum in bi hung hanluga mi nun ding bachu thang ongme!”
44005026	Kraanpuba gana ngam amnu nun le seluga bwei laak thang makka bani ding kalwang hung rwe, balangbe mi nunna bani ding lungna khumnu le zaye diga kachi ngaake.
44005027	Atiga banina ha rwan ding ga kalwang hungluga thampei meithaan bi pi han thang rwe. Atiga takolu gana bani khou ngaiga
44005028	rinne, “Heiba meng bi bachu thang mak lang anina nani khou rakanga zathang pi thangnu makpo? Phaang ngo, nanina bachu thang ongnu heiya Jerusalem namlian bi rin kazan bachang rwe khatle heiba Manpa thi ga ani lu chung bi pi ta lang karamme!”
44005029	Habei ga Peter le chonglang katei rwanna rinne, “Anina mi nun chong ding ma Rikrwang chong ding zei ding gaye.
44005030	Nanina cross pi bakhailuga athat thang damnu Jisu ding ani pu pa rwan Rikrwang na pi ring thou thang rwe.
44005031	Israel rwanna sung leluga noh kok thangnu lousu langna, Rikrwang na Bating Krwang khatle Kanthangnupa toga Bakut inchangna kai basaang ka thang rwe.
44005032	Hei lang bi anina sake rwe khatle Bachong zeinu mi nun lang Rikrwang na pi thang damnu Katha Bathiangnuna le haba lang bi sake rwe.”
44005033	Thampei mi nunna haga ngaisunu kaan bi bani balung pwan tak thou rwe khatle bani ding athat lang chong katu rwe.
44005034	Habei ga karung riak pi Pharisee rwan pakhat, mi nunna takung tazei tonu mi bing lak pi bameng senu chongtan bachuthangnupa Gamaliel na han thouluga chonglang rwan ding langkaang la bakaan kasem swak tam lang bani khou zathang pi rwe.
44005035	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Israel mi rwan ga, hei rwan ding nga pa-aam to langbo dinu lang bi nani barak theiyo.
44005036	Balangbe bakaan kasem meithaan la baraanto bating mi khate diga baningnu, Theudas na maitwang ngaake. Kapaisa rwan, mi raza bali khak banung sui ngaake. Bating athat tamnu kaan bi bachong zeinu mi nun ga pak imphaang damme atiga haga khatchale maknu to damme.
44005037	Heiba manpa nung bi mi sing semnu kaan bi Galilee lana hungnu Judas na maitwang thouluga potroi rwan mi tamga khom rwe. Atiyeda bating le athat trwe, bachong zeinu nunna le pak imphaang drwe.
44005038	Atun eina nani khou rinnuwe, nani hei rwan khouna impaan swak tammo, bani raantoza ding bathan thang dro; balangbe heiba baning mak tabe heiba chwanna mi nun khouna ngaake dabe heiya braan dam zung nge;
44005039	atiyeda heiya Rikrwang khouna ngaake dabe hei ding nga nani to braannu ngamlaye, nani Rikrwang maitwang bi katwaknu tolune.”
44005040	Banina Gamaliel chong ga za thang rwe khatle banina chonglang rwan ding kou hungluga bwei rwe, bani ding Jisu meng bi chong kabia za make diga zathang rakanga pi luga bathan sat rwe.
44005041	Atiga chonglang rwanna Jisu meng lang chungna kazaknu dou lang khopnu rwe diga baningluga karo karoga thampei karung meithaan bina se swak trwe.
44005042	Banina kani bathin kalum in bi khatle inkhun bing bi seluga Jisu wa Christa ye diga chat makka bachu thang se ngaake khatle kasam se ngaake.
44006001	Haba kaan bi potroi rwan mi sing inku thounu kaan bi Greek chong kabianu Jihudi rwan lu chung bi tu tu tam tam thou rwe, balangbe kani bathin thaisaak kasemnu bi bani om tamei rwan lang thouto thang make dinu lang bi naye.
44006002	Habei ga pat somga kani gana potroi rwan mi khang ding kou hungluga rin rwe, “Anina sa in langza laangluga Rikrwang chong ding bathan satnu balang maake.
44006003	Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, anina bani ding heiba chwan langna hap thang lang, nani lak pina bameng sanu, Katha Bathiangnuna sipnu khatle ningtingnu manpa pat siari ding nani lak pina zongro;
44006004	atiyeda sacham kasamnu chwan khatle kalum thang nu bi anina chat makka sung khut ongne.”
44006005	Rin ongnu heiyana mi khang sung ding pi pem rwe. Atiga balumsatna sipnu khatle Katha Bathiangnuna sipnu Stephen le Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas khatle Antioch la mi Jihudi rwan gon damnu Nicolas ting banina ka thang rwe,
44006006	bani ding chonglang rwan meithaan bi pi han thang rwe; atiga banina kalumnu kaan bi bani lu chung bi kut kaising thang rwe.
44006007	Rikrwang chong ga kazan swakluga, Jerusalem bi potroi rwan mi sing tam tak thou rwe khatle tako rwan le mi tam takka balumsanu ding ga zei rwe.
44006008	Stephen balumsatna sipnu khatle ngam amnu mi briakpina mi nun lak pi tasiatnu le badannu chwan tamga to ngaake.
44006009	Habei ga rang tonu rwan om Synagogue diga kounu phom mi nunna (Cyrene lana hungnu Alexander khatle Cilicia le Asia talei lana hungnu mi nun) Stephen le chong kae thou rwe.
44006010	Atiyeda Stephen na baningting khatle Katha Bathiangnu paan bina kabianu chong ga banina kataknu ngam mak ngaake.
44006011	Habei ga banina manpa rwan mi kasem ding tasun toluga chong karwaknu chong pi rin rwe, “Maanna Moses le Rikrwang maitwang bi rin basiatnu anina ngaisu rwe.”
44006012	Atiga banina mi khang, patso rwan khatle chongtan bachuthangnu rwan ding kachui thangluga khatle khangsung hung karungluga bating nam rwe, atiga bani om thampei in bi bating kalwang hung rwe.
44006013	Banina chong karwaknu sake rwan ding phun swakluga pi rin rwe, “Heiba manpana bathiangnu riak le chongtan om maitwang bi rin basiate;
44006014	balangbe Nazareth Jisu na heiba riak tingga to braanluga Moses na ani lang pi thang ngaaknu chaang ding ga to kale lune diga rinnu anina ngaisu rwe.”
44006015	Habei ga thampei in bi badung ongnu mi nun gana bating phaangdengga ongnu kaan bi bamai kum ga tambaan chonglang mai kum danga mu rwe.
44007001	Haba nung bi takoluna rinne, “Hei bing nga bazenubo?”
44007002	Stephen na rinne, “Unao rwan khatle apu apa rwan ga, ngai thang ngo: Lwat liannu Rikrwang na ani pa Abraham khou, maan Haran bi lung mak balei Mesopotamia bi lungnu kaan bi pi mu thangga
44007003	bakhou rinne, ‘Nangna natalei khatle nathi rui ding thangsialuga nakhou pi mu thang dingnu talei la ga sero.’
44007004	“Habei ga maanna Chaldean taram bina se swakluga Haran bi lung ngaake. Bapa thi damnu nung Rikrwang na bating nanina atun lung ongnu talei biya pi hung thang rwe.
44007005	Atiyeda Rikrwang na balaang talei khatchale pi thang mak ngaake, baket kadim riak lang hakna pi thang make. Ati ngaak peida Abraham na basa pon mak aangnu meithaan tangga, Rikrwang na heiba taram ma maan khatle bakik bataat rwan khou bani om pi to thangne diga karen thang ngaake.
44007006	Rikrwang na bakhou rin ngaake, ‘Nakik nataat rwanna rwan ram la lunglune khatle mi nunna bani ding swak pi toluga sangwan raza bali raiga pi lung thanglune.
44007007	Atiyeda bani ding swak pi to ongnu chaat ting ga Eina chong kasemlune,’ diga Rikrwang na rinne, ‘Khatle banina swakluga heiba riak pi Ating chwanlaang tolune.’
44007008	Maanna bani khou mun romnu chongren pi thang rwe; atibriakpina Abraham na Isaac ting ponnu nung ni kariat tangnu kaan bi bating mun rom rwe; Isaac na Jacob ting pon rwe khatle Jacob na phum pa rwan somga kani ding pon thang rwe.
44007009	“Atiga phum pa rwanna Joseph ting antiam thouluga Egypt la zwan sat thang ngaak rwe. Atiyeda Rikrwang na Joseph ting ong bacham thang ong ngaake,
44007010	bating rainu bing bina kan thang ngaake khatle bakhou Egypt krwang, Pharaoh meithaan bi kriang thangnu khatle baningting pi thang ngaake; atiga maanna Joseph ting Egypt khatle bainkhun lu chung bi phaangsinnu mi pi to thang rwe.
44007011	Egypt le Canaan talei bing bi tasiatnu bu taangnu khatle riangre kanangnu hung rwe khatle ani pu pa rwan ga thaisaak zongsulan rwe.
44007012	Atiyeda Egypt la baza kalaanu cham Jokob na ngaisunu kaan bi maanna ani pu pa rwan ding haba riak pi kamaga lang thang ngaake.
44007013	Atiga lang hung leng ninu kaan bi Joseph na batang rwan khou baman pi thei thang rwe khatle Joseph in inkhun thirui bing ding le Pharaoh na thei thang rwe.
44007014	Haba nung bi Joseph na bapa Jacob le bain thirui rwan mi somsiariga impaang ding bakhou kou hung lang lang thang rwe.
44007015	Atiga Jacob Egypt pi talung rwe; maan khatle ani pu pa rwan habei ga thi thang ngaak rwe.
44007016	Atiga bani ding Shechem la phun hung ngaake khatle Abraham na Shechem bi amnu Hamor sa kapaisa rwan khouna sianna kaleinu thaan bi bani ding ui thang ngaake.
44007017	“Atiyeda Rikrwang na Abraham khou karen thang damnu bakaan ga nai hungnu kaan bi Egypt la mi sing inku thou rwe khatle lungking thou rwe,
44007018	heiya Joseph ting thei maknu krwang katei kathan khat paan lat mak basaan ngaake.
44007019	Haba krwang gana ani mi nun ding rou siaga to rwe khatle ani pu pa rwan ding sia takka to rwe atibriakpina bani sa nao rwan ding thi braan loi dam lang asat thang ngaake.
44007020	Haba kaan bi Moses ting pon thang rwe, maan Rikrwang mikphaang bi sa taknu naosen ngaake khatle bapa in bi tha thum bakot thou ngaake.
44007021	Atiyeda bating asat thangnu kaan bi Pharaoh sa kamaisana bating lou thouluga maanna ponnu sa kapaisa lang toga bakot thou ngaake.
44007022	Moses na Egypt om ningting bing bachu ngaake, atiga maan chongbiak laabiak pi khatle chwan bing bi ngam am ngaake.
44007023	“Maan sangwan sombali tangnu kaan bi bau-banao rwan, Israel sa rwan ding phaang se nwamnu basung bi swak rwe.
44007024	Atiga bani lak pi pakhat ting baze maknu thot pi rai ongnu ga Moses na muluga ha ding ga kan thangluga rai ongnu Egypt rwan manpa ding ga takhum baan ga maanna athat sat rwe.
44007025	Balangbe Rikrwang na Moses kut paan bina bani ding kan thanglune dinu bau-banao rwanna theiye diga maanna baning ngaake atiyeda baninaba haga thei mak ngaake.
44007026	Inswan lampai le pat ni rwei kamai ongnu maanna muluga barwei kasa to kale lang maanna rinne, ‘Narwei bau banao ga, pa-aam lang khatna khat khou koinu chwan to kale ongnubo?’
44007027	Atiyeda koinu chwan to ongnu bainnai gana bating tun satluga rinne ‘Tuna nating ani lu chung bi kai thangnu khatle chongsempuba to lang hap thanggabo?
44007028	Inzaan nangna Egypt rwan pakhat ting athat tamnuga danga ating le athatne dinubo?’
44007029	Heiya rinnu kaan bi Moses na Median talei la pak seluga man mi toga ong ngaake, habei ga maan sa kapaisa pat ni ding pon thang rwe.
44007030	“Sangwan sombali taang bi Sinai rammwan om ramhaang bi Pukraangba om Tambaan Chonglang khatna nilai lak thing bom khat pi meibom sung bi Moses khou pi mu thang ngaake.
44007031	Moses na haga phaangmunu kaan bi maan loh lo rwe khatle maanna phaang lang hung banainu kaan bi maan Pukraangba khwan ngaisu ngaake,
44007032	atiga rinne, ‘Ei nani pu pa rwan Rikrwang nge, Abraham Rikrwang, Isaac Rikrwang khatle Jacob Rikrwang nge.’ Moses na kachi kathokka phaang kadou raang mak ngaake.
44007033	‘Habei ga Pukraangba na bakhou rinne, “Naket pina ketthop ka lou sat tammo, balangbe nangna han ongnu riak ka bathiangnu riake.
44007034	Egypt talei bi Ami nun ding rai ongnu ga Ei mu rwe; banina kakou ongnu khwan ga Ei ngaisu rwe, atiga Ei bani ding kan thang lang tanuwe. Atun hungro, Eina nating Egypt la lang thang lang rwe.” ’
44007035	“ ‘Tuna nating ani lu chung bi bapuba khatle chongsempuba to lang hap thanggabo?’ diga rin ngaaknu banina za mak tamnu Moses ting ga nilai lak pi pi mu thang ngaaknu Tambaan Chonglang om ngam paan bina phaangsinnu mi khatle ranthangnupa to lang Rikrwang na lang thang rwe.
44007036	Maanna Egypt talei bi Kasennu Tuipui bi khatle ramhaang bi sangwan sombali tasiatnu chwan khatle badannu bing pi mu thangnu nung bani ding kalwang swak rwe.
44007037	“ ‘Nani Pukraangba Rikrwang na nani unao rwan lak pina ei dannu thiamting pakhat ting nani lang lang hung thanglune. Nanina Bachong zei dingnu rwe,’ diga Israel sa rwan khou rin ngaaknu Moses ka heiya rwe.
44007038	Sinai rammwan bi Tambaan Chonglang le diga chong kabia ngaaknu, ani pu pa rwan le diga ramhaang bi mi khang le ong ngaaknu khatle ani lang pi dingnu ringnu chong ga lousu damnu maan ga heiya rwe,
44007039	ani pu pa rwanna Bachong zei nwam makka bating lou thang make. Atiga bani sung Egypt la kanei damluga
44007040	Aaron khou rinne, ‘Ani meithaan bi se lang ani lang ri katha bacha thang ngo; balangbe ani ding Egypt talei bina kalwang swak thangnu Moses khou pa-aam swak tambo dinu ani theilan rwe.’
44007041	Haba kaan bi ga banina sen swan katha khat bachaluga, haba ri katha khou ga rikhaang pot kat thang rwe khatle bani kutna bachanu chwan bi ga bani karo rwe.
44007042	Habei ga Rikrwang na bani khouna Bamai kanei satluga saangbaan la insi ding kalum lang bani ding bathan thang rwe, heiya thiamting om chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, ‘He Israel rwan inkhun, Ramhaang bi sangwan sombali nanina alaang khouring athatluga rikhaang pot kat thanggabo?
44007043	“ ‘Nanina Moloch om pwan in, Khatle nanina kalum lang bachanu ri katha Remphan insi ding ga nanina kai thou rwe; Atiga Eina nani ding Babylon paan la phun sat thanglune.’
44007044	“Ramhaang bi ani pu pa rwan om sake pwan in am ngaake atiga Moses na phaangmu damnu ga khak khakka bacha lang nge diga Rikrwang na bakhou rin thang damnu ga danga banina bacha rwe,
44007045	haba pwan in ga am taangnu nung, Rikrwang na ani pu pa rwan meithaan bi Gentile rwan ding kazun sat ong bi, Joshua na kai thangga haba pwan in ga ani pu pa rwanna phunkhut ngaake, haga David kaan tangga ngaake,
44007046	David na Rikrwang meithaan bi phaangkriang ga lousu damme khatle Jacob om Rikrwang lang kaong riak pi thang lang ni ngaake.
44007047	Atiyeda Solomon na balaang in khat bacha rwe.
44007048	“Ati ngaak peida Basaang Kataknu Rikrwang ga kutna bachanu kalum in bi ga ong thang make, haga thiamting na rin thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe,
44007049	‘Tambaan ga Akaong riake, Khatle talei ga Aket kadim riake. Nanina Alaang impei in bacha thangne gabo, Mak tabe Eina basak tingnu riak ka ingaipaibo? diga Pukraangba na rinne.
44007050	“ ‘Ha bing ga Akutna bacha thangnu makpo?’
44007051	“He tun natnu, sung khatle kana mun rom maknu mi nun ga! Nanina bakaan bathin Katha Bathiangnu ding maitwang rwe; nani pu pa rwanna tonu danga nanina le to rwe.
44007052	Nani pu pa rwanna rai dam maknu thiamting tu ambo? Hungnanu Bazenu Pakhat lang bi rin basaam thangnu nun ding nanina athat rwe, atun nani Bating pi swaknu khatle athatnu mi nunne,
44007053	nani tambaan chonglang rwan paan bina chongtan ga lousunu mi nun rwe atiyeda haga nanina zei make.”
44007054	Banina ha bing ga ngaisunu kaan bi bani sung souga bamaitwang bi ngaatang ei karit thou rwe.
44007055	Atiyeda Stephen na Katha Bathiangnuna sipluga saangbaan la phaangkanu kaan bi Rikrwang om lwat liannu khatle Jisu na Rikrwang kut inchang pek la han ongnu ga muluga
44007056	rinne, “Phaang ngo, Tambaan inkhaan lat swaknu khatle Misa Sa Kapaisana Rikrwang kut inchang pek la han ongnu eina mu rwe!”
44007057	Habei ga banina baraam nat ka, bani kana baruluga paoga khangsung sung khatcha toga bakhou pak hung rwe;
44007058	banina bating namlian paan la tun swakluga lungna sat rwe. Atiga sake nunna bani pwan bing ga Saul diga kounu katangpa kut pi bachoi thang rwe.
44007059	Banina Stephen ding lungna sat ong bi maanna Pukraangba ding kouga rinne, “Pukraangba Jisu, akatha lou thou thangro.”
44007060	Haba nung bi maan kekhok deluga baraam basaangga paoluga rinne, “Pukraangba, bani lu chung bi noh pi ta thang mako.” Heiba chong nga kabia taangluga maan thi drwe.
44008001	Stephen ding athat pi ga Saul le za bacham ngaake. Ha kaan ga Jerusalem bi rupkathan ding taswang khak rai thou rwe khatle chonglang rwan maknu katei rwan bing Judea le Samaria la pak imphaang thou dam ngaake.
44008002	Rikrwang ding kachinu manpa rwan gana Stephen ding kairi rwe khatle balaang chungna bani taswang khak chunto lo siaga ong ngaake.
44008003	Atiyeda Saul na rupkathan ding torai to imphaangluga inkhun bing bi khutluga mannu manpa rwan ding kai swakluga bani ding qwan in bi thang rwe.
44008004	Pak imphaang thou damnu mi nun gana bariak thin se koiluga Rikrwang chong ga kasam se ngaake.
44008005	Philip na Samaria namlian la seluga bani khou Christa om lang bi kasam thang rwe.
44008006	Mi khang gana Philip chong ga sung khatcha toga ngai ong ngaake khatle maanna tonu tasiatnu chwan bing ga banina mu rwe.
44008007	Bathiang maknu katha na mi nun khouna baraam basaangga paoga se swak tam ngaake; habei ga pum baang thinu le ket sethei maknu nun ding pi sa thang ngaake.
44008008	Atiga namlian bi ongnu mi nun ga karo tak ngaak rwe.
44008009	Namlian bi ga meithaan dwei choi ngaaknu Simon diga kounu manpa pakhat am ngaake, atiga Samaria rwan mi nun ding pi loh lo ong ngaake khatle maan baraantoza kaliannu manpa khate diga rin ngaake,
44008010	kasinnu bina kaliannu tangga bakhou bani sung thangga rinne, “Manpa heiya Rikrwang ngam liannu ga rwe.”
44008011	Banina bakhouza bani sung thangga ong ngaake, balangbe maanna baom dwei chwan gana bakhwa seiga bani ding pi loh lo ong ngaake.
44008012	Atiyeda Philip na Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi kasamnu ga banina balumsanu kaan bi Jisu Christa meng bi kamaisa le kapaisa rwan hungluga baptize to ngaake.
44008013	Haba nung bi Simon le balumsa ngaak rwe. Atiga maan le baptize toluga Philip le diga ong bacham rwe. Atiga tasiatnu khatle badannu chwan bing ga maan muluga loh lo rwe.
44008014	Jerusalem bi ongnu chonglang rwanna Rikrwang chong ga Samaria rwanna lou thang rwe dinu theinu kaan bi banina Peter le John ding bani khou lang hung rwe.
44008015	Banina Katha Bathiangnu ding lousu dam lang barweina hungluga bani lang kalum thang ngaake.
44008016	Balangbe Katha Bathiangnuna bani pakhatcha khou hakna ta thang mak aang nge, banina Pukraangba Jisu meng bi baptize to thangnuza zung nge.
44008017	Haba nung bi Peter le John na bani lu chung bi kut kaising thang rwe. Atiga banina Katha Bathiangnu ding lousu rwe.
44008018	Chonglang rwanna kut kaising thangnu kaan bi bani Katha Bathiangnu ding lousu rwe dinu Simon na munu kaan bi maanna bani lang sian kat rwe.
44008019	Atiga maanna rinne, “Eina mi khat lu chung bi kut kaising thangnu kaan bi maanna le Katha Bathiangnu ding lousu lang haba ngam ga alaang le pi thang ngo.”
44008020	Atiyeda Peter na bakhou rinne, “Naom sian ga nang le diga mut bacham dam ding ngo, balangbe Rikrwang leithwan ding nangna sianna kaleinu zaye diga baning nge.
44008021	Heiba chwan biya naom thou mak tabe naom badam maake. Balangbe Rikrwang mikphaang bi nasung baze make.
44008022	Atibriakpina kasianu nasung ga lero, Pukraangba khou hweiniyo atiye dabe nasung baning ding ga kok thangnu le zaye.
44008023	Balangbe kakhaanu gana hu pi to rwe khatle ririak se maknuna nating bang thang ong rwe dinu ei mu rwe.”
44008024	Haba nung bi Simon na katake, “Nangna kabia damnu bing ga akhou khatchale ta thang mak lang Pukraangba khou alaang hweini thangro.”
44008025	Atiga banina Pukraangba om sacham ga sake pi ga kasam thangsialuga khatle Samaria rwan nam bing bi le sacham bachu thangsialuga Jerusalem la han thou dam ngaake.
44008026	Pukraangba om tambaan chonglangna Philip khou rinne, “Thouluga Jerusalem bina Gaza la thou damnu lampui, kathwei pek la setaro.” Haga ramkaang ramme.
44008027	Atiga maanna thouluga se rwe. Phaang ngo, habei ga basa semnu Etheopia rwan pa, Etheopia rwan ramanu, Candace om lan bing choinu kaliannu ngam amnu gana Jerusalem la kalum lang se ong ngaake.
44008028	Maanna han hung latnu kaan bi baom raqwan gari sung bi badungluga thiamting Isaiah om chongdip pa ong ngaake.
44008029	Haba nung bi Katha Bathiangnuna Philip khou rinne, “Bakim la sero, baom raqwan gari ga le diga se bachamro.”
44008030	Atiga Philip na bakhou pak hungnu kaan bi thiamting Isaiah om Chongdip ka pa ongnu ngaisu rwe. Maanna rinne, “Nangna pa ongnu ga bakaba theibo?”
44008031	Atiga maanna rinne, “Mi khatna ating bachu thang mak tazuba ei tatoga theinu ngam ding gabo?” Maanna Philip ting raqwan gari bi kaluga maan le badung bacham lang rin rwe.
44008032	Bathiangnu chongdip pi maanna pa ongnu riak ka heiye, “Zao ding athat lang kai senu danga bating kalwang se rwe, Khatle zao swanna bamun kachatnu meithaan bi baraam maknu ga danga, Maan babao aang thou make.
44008033	Basung bangiam ta briakpina bakhou hung dingnu bazenu ding ga lou sat rwe. Atiga baom mikin ding tuna pao swak tingbo? Balangbe baom kum ga talei ram bina lou sat rwe.”
44008034	Atiga basa semnu manpa gana Philip khou katake, “Eina nakhou ngainuwe, thiamtingna tuom lang bi rinnubo? Balang bimo mak tabe mi katei om lang bibo?”
44008035	Philip na babao aang thouluga Bathiangnu chongdip pi gana thouluga Jisu om lang bi bakhou kasam thang rwe.
44008036	Barweina lampui bi setanu kaan bi tui amnu riak pi hung tang rwe. Atiga basa semnu manpa gana rinne, “Phaang ngo, abeiya tui am rwe ating baptize toza maknu om lang pa-aam ambo?”
44008037	Habei ga Philip na rinne, “Nangna nasung bingna balumsaye dabe zaye.” Atiga manpa gana katake, “Jisu Christa heiya Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dinu ei balumsaye.”
44008038	Atibriakpina maanna raqwan gari ding ga han basak lang zathang pi rwe khatle Philip le basa semnu manpa ga tui la taluga bating baptize to thang rwe.
44008039	Barwei pat ni tui bina kanu kaan bi Philip ting Pukraangba om Katha na lou thou drwe. Basa semnu manpa gana bating mu latlan rwe. Atiga maan karo karoga lampui la thou dam ngaake.
44008040	Atiyeda Philip ting Azotus pi kadou lat rwe. Atiga maanna Caesarea bi hung tang mak basaan namlian bing bi sacham kasam ngaake.
44009001	Haba nung bi Saul na Pukraangba om potroi rwan ding basi lang khatle athat lang baning briakpina maanna takolu khou se ngaake.
44009002	Atiga Lampui bi senu kamaisa ngaakle kapaisa ngaakle kadou kadounu mi bing ding karakluga Jerusalem la phun hung lang maanna Damascus om synagogue bing khou pi lang takolu khouna chamthwan ni rwe.
44009003	Atiga maan Damascus kim bi se hungnu kaan bi thei mak daakka tambaan lana babaan khatna bating baan qwat thang rwe.
44009004	Habei ga maan talei bi balumta rwe khatle khwan khatna atiga rinnu maanna ngaisu rwe, “Saul, Saul, nang pa-aam lang Ating rai ongnubo?”
44009005	Atiga maanna ngaiye, “Pukraangba, Nang Tubo?” Pukraangba na rinne, “Nangna rai ongnu Jisu ga Ei rwe, thingzum ding naketna basui lang nalaang kung lang zung nge.”
44009006	Maanna kachi kathokka loh lo ga ngaiye, “Pukraangba, nangna ating paaam tonu bathaigabo?” Haba kaan bi Pukraangba na bakhou rinne, “Thouluga namlian laga sero, nangna pa-aam to langbo dinu nakhou rin thanglune.”
44009007	Atiga maan le se bachamnu manpa rwan ga chong kabia makka thiap thiapka han ong ngaake. Bani khwan ga ngaisu ngaake atiyeda pakhatcha ding le mu make.
44009008	Haba nung bi Saul talei bina lon thouluga mik meng swaknu kaan bi pakhatcha ding le mulan rwe. Atiyeda banina bating kut kailuga Damascus namlian bi kalwang hung rwe.
44009009	Maan habei ga mik mu makka ni thum khatchale sa le sa mak in le in mak tiga ong ngaake.
44009010	Haba kaan bi Damascus pi Ananias tiga kounu potroi pakhat am ngaake. Atiga bakhou Pukraangba na pi mu thangga “Ananias,” tiga kou rwe. Atiga maanna, “Pukraangba, ei abeiya amme,” diga katak rwe.
44009011	Habei ga Pukraangba na bakhou rinne, “Thouluga nang Bazenu Lampui diga kounu riaklaga sero. Atiga Judas in bi Tarsus lana hungnu mi Saul diga kounu ding ga bazongro. Balangbe phaang ngo maan kalum ongme.
44009012	Atiga bakhou pi mu thangnu khat pi maan bamik mu lat lang Ananias tiga kounu pakhatna hungluga bakhou kut kaising thangnu mu ngaake.”
44009013	Haba nung bi Ananias na katake, “Pukraangba, haba manpa gana Jerusalem bi Naom bathiangnu mi nun ding kasianu tonu lang bi mi taswang khak khouna eina ngaisu rwe.
44009014	Atiga maanna Nameng ding kounu mi bing ding namluga karak lang takopuba rwan khouna kazanu lou ngaake.”
44009015	Atiyeda Pukraangba na bakhou rinne, “Sero, balangbe bating Gentile rwan khou, krwang nun khou khatle Israel sa rwan khou Ameng phunse lang Eina kathang swaknu Aom kutchoi rwe.
44009016	Balangbe maan Ameng lang chungna riangre kanang inza dou dingnu ga bakhou Eina pi mu thangne.”
44009017	Ananias na seluga haba in bi ga khut rwe khatle balu chung bi kut kaising thangluga rinne, “Unao Saul, nangna se hungnu lampui bi pi mu thang ngaaknu Pukraangba Jisu na ating lang hungnuwe. Atiga nang mik mu lat lang khatle nakhou Katha Bathiangnuna sip lang nge.”
44009018	Haba kahan bi ga bamik pina balip tannu khat ta dam ngaake. Atiga maan mik mu latluga lon thou rwe khatle baptize to rwe.
44009019	Atiga maan sa in latnu nung nat thou lat rwe. Haba nung Saul Damascus pi potroi rwan le diga bakaan kasem ong ngaake.
44009020	Haba kahan bi maanna synagogue bing bi Christa heiya Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye diga kasam thou rwe.
44009021	Habei ga bachong ngaisunu mi bingna loh lo ga rinne, “Heiya Jerusalem bi Jisu meng ding kounu nun ding to braan sat ngaaknu bani ding karakluga takopu khou phunse lang hungnu ga makpo?”
44009022	Atiyeda Saul na banat inkuga nat thouluga Jisu wa Christa ga rwe diga rakanga rin swak rwe. Ha bing gana Damascus pi ongnu Jihudi rwan ding bani sung to tamam rwe.
44009023	Atiga khwa sei hungnu kaan bi Jihudi rwanna bating athat sat lang tup ngaak rwe.
44009024	Atiyeda banina to ongnu ga Paul na thei rwe. Banina bating athat lang kapan bi zingpha thamlai thei makka chwan ong ngaake.
44009025	Haba nung bi potroi rwanna bating zingpha luklei pui khat pi thangluga kapan baang la basaam ta thang ngaake.
44009026	Atiga Saul na Jerusalem bi hungnu kaan bi maan potroi rwan nung sui lang karamnu kaan bi bani khangsungna bating kachi rwe. Balangbe bating potroi khate diga banina balumsa mak ngaake.
44009027	Atiyeda Barnabas na bating chonglang rwan khou kalwang hung rwe. Atiga Paul na lampui bi tatoga Pukraangba ding mu damnu, Pukraangba na bakhou impei chong kabia damnu khatle Damascus pi maanna basung raangga Jisu meng ding kasam damnu ha bing ga bani khou rin swak rwe.
44009028	Atiga maan Jerusalem bi bani le diga se swak sekhutka ong ngaake.
44009029	Atiga maanna Greek chong kabianu Jihudi rwan le diga Pukraangba Jisu meng bi sung raangga bani le diga kae kale rwe khatle banina bating athat lang to ngaake.
44009030	Atiyeda unao rwanna haga thei swaknu kaan bi bating Caesarea la kalwang taluga Tarsus la bathan thang rwe.
44009031	Haba nung bi Judea, Galilee khatle Samaria taram bing bi amnu rupkathan bing bi dai bazaangnu am thou rwe khatle katha bi lian thou rwe. Atiga Pukraangba ding kachi theiga khatle Katha Bathiangnu om pui thangnu bi se rwe khatle bani mi sing inku thou rwe.
44009032	Peter na talei khat om bariak bing bi atiga serwan hungnu kaan bi Lydda bi ongnu bathiangnu mi rwan kim bi ta ngaake.
44009033	Habei ga maanna ria bi sangwan kariat in ongnu khatle pum baang thinu Aeneas tiga kounu manpa khat ting kadou ngaake.
44009034	Atiga Peter na bakhou rinne, “Aeneas, nang thouro, Jisu Christa na nating pi sa thang rwe, thouluga naria ga kakamro.” Haba kahan bi maan lon thou rwe.
44009035	Atiga Lydda bi khatle Sharon bi ongnu mi nunna bating muluga bani mi bingza Pukraangba khou balumsa rwe.
44009036	Joppa bi Tabitha diga kounu potroi pakhat am ngaake. Tabitha om bakabana Dorcus dinuwe. Heiba mannuwa maanna to damnu kasanu chwan khatle kriang theinu chwanna sipnuwe.
44009037	Atiyeda haba kaan bi atiga swak ngaak rwe. Maan naaluga thi rwe. Banina bating tui kasin thangluga basaang in kaa khat la thang ngaake.
44009038	Atiga Lydda ga Joppa le diga nai kale briakpina potroi rwanna Peter habei ga amme dinu ngaisu rwe. Atiga banina manpa pat ni ding lang thangluga bani khou, “Barapka ani khou hung thang ngo” diga rin ngaake.
44009039	Haba nung bi Peter na thouluga bani le diga se bacham rwe. Maan hung tangnu kaan bi banina bating basaangnu in kaa la kalwangka rwe. Habei ga tameinu rwan bingna chapka han kadoi ong ngaake. Dorcas na bani le diga ong bacham ngaaknu kaan bi maanna bacha thang ngaaknu pwan sin pon naat bing ga Peter khou pi mu rwe.
44009040	Atiyeda Peter na bani ding langkaang la pi swak rwe khatle kekhok detaluga kalum rwe. Maanna kathi pum pek la kaneiluga rinne, “Tabitha, thouro.” Habei ga maan mik meng swak rwe. Atiga maanna Peter ding munu kaan bi lon thouluga badung rwe.
44009041	Haba nung bi Peter na bakut balaan swakluga bating kai thou thang rwe. Atiga maanna bathiangnu mi rwan khatle tamei rwan ding koukhutluga Dorcus ting ringga bani khou bachoi thang rwe.
44009042	Haba cham ga Joppa taram bing thei chang thou damnu kaan bi mi taswang khak Pukraangba khou balumsa rwe.
44009043	Atiga maan Joppa bi zan mun langnu chwan tonu Simon in bi bakhwa seiga nei ngaake.
44010001	Caesarea bi Italy kraanmi doi diga kounu kraanmi razapuba, Cornelius tiga kounu tudannu manpa pakhat am ngaake.
44010002	Maan ririak senu khatle bain inkhun mi bing le Rikrwang ding kachinu miye. Maan mi nun lang pi swak theiga pi ngaake khatle Rikrwang khou bakaan bathin kalumga ong ngaake.
44010003	Kani khat chakrin kaqwa tanu phei bi pi mu thangnu bi Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang khatna bakim bi hungluga bating, “Cornelius” diga kounu ga maanna bathiangga ngaisu rwe.
44010004	Cornelius na bating phaangnu kaan bi kachi rwe. Atiga maanna, “Pa-aambo, Pukraangba” diga ngai rwe. Tambaan chonglang gana rinne, “Naom kalum khatle naom pi swak theinu ga Rikrwang meithaan bi baningsu langna pi hung tang thang rwe.
44010005	Joppa la kapaisa kasem ding lang thangluga Peter diga kounu Simon ding pi kouro.
44010006	Maan tuipui paan la zan mun langnu Simon in bi amme. Nangna to dingnu chwan ga maanna nakhou rin thanglune.”
44010007	Atiga Cornelius khou chong kabia ongnu tambaan chonglang ga se swak tam bi maanna bain swak lak pi pat ni ding khatle bakim bi chat makka ongnu kraan mi nun lak pina ririak sethuknu kraanmi pakhat ting kou ngaake.
44010008	Maanna bani khou balang bing ga rin bathiang thangluga bani ding Joppa la lang thang rwe.
44010009	Inswan lampai banina atiga se hung bi namlian ga nai hungnu kaan bi khatle chakrin karuk khak tanu phei bi Peter in chung la kalum lang ka ngaake.
44010010	Habei ga maan chaam takka sa in nwam ngaak rwe. Bani sa in lang ong ongnu lak pi maan trance se ngaak rwe.
44010011	Atiga tambaan inkhaan lat swaknu khatle pwan pui dannu theng pui khat bataki bali kailuga basaang lana talei la basaamtanu ga maanna mu ngaake.
44010012	Haba sung bi ga baket bali phunnu talei ram khouring bing, nilai lak khouring bing, babonna katwanga senu bing, basaang la zwangnu basaa bing sui ngaake.
44010013	Atiga khwan khatna bakhou rinne, “Thouro Peter, athatluga saro.”
44010014	Atiyeda Peter na rinne, “Pukraangba, haga ati mak ting ngo, balangbe ei impha ni hakna tanaatnu mak tabe bathiang maknu sa mak aang nge.”
44010015	Leng ninu toga khwan gana bakhou rin late, “Rikrwang na to bathiang thangnu ding ga nangna bathiang maknu diga kou lang make.”
44010016	Heiya atiga swak leng thum ngaak rwe. Haba kahan bi theng ga tambaan la kai ka lat trwe.
44010017	Peter na bakhou pi mu thangnu ga bakaba thei makka loh lo ongnu kaan bi phaang ngo, Conelius na lang hungnu manpa rwan gana Simon in zong hungluga inkhaan pui bi hung han rwe.
44010018	Atiga banina kouga “Peter diga kounu Simon habei ga nei ong bo?” diga ngai rwe.
44010019	Peter na bakhou pi mu thangnu lang bi kakhan ongnu kaan bi Katha na bakhou rin rwe, “Phaang ngo, mi pat thumna nating zong ongme.
44010020	Atibriakpina nang thouro, balumsianu to mako khatle bani le diga se bachamro. Balangbe eina bani ding nakhou lang hungnu zung nge.”
44010021	Haba nung bi Peter na taluga Conelius na lang hungnu mi nun khou rin rwe, “Phaang ngo, nanina zong ongnu ga ei rwe, nani pa-aam lang hungnubo?”
44010022	Banina rinne, “Kraanmi razapuba, bazenu, Rikrwang ding kachinu khatle Jihudi rwan chaat lak pi bameng sanu Conelius khou ga bain la nating hung lang khatle nachong ngai lang bathiangnu tambaan chonglangna bachu thang rwe.”
44010023	Haba nung bi maanna bani ding koukhutluga riak bacham rwe. Inswan lampai Peter na bani le diga se bacham rwe. Atiga Joppa bina le unao rwan mi kasem maan le diga se bacham ngaake.
44010024	Inswan lampai bani Caesarea bi khutnu kaan bi Cornelius na bani ding ngaak ong ngaake. Atiga bain sung rwan khatle bacham chuinu baan rwan bing ding kou kadoiluga ong ngaake.
44010025	Peter na basung la sekhutnu kaan bi Cornelius na bating kadou rwe khatle maanna baket pi in bakhup taluga bating kalum rwe.
44010026	Atiyeda Peter na bating kai thouluga rinne, “Thouro, ei le misa khat chung nge.”
44010027	Atiga Peter na bating kabiaga sekhutnu kaan bi mi tam takka ong kadoi ongnu dou rwe.
44010028	Habei ga maanna bani khou rinne, “Jihudi rwan mi pakhatna Gentile rwan pakhat le diga ong bachamnu mak tabe se thang kalenu chongtanna za make dinu nanina theiye. Atiyeda eina mi khat ting tanaatnu mak tabe bathiang maknu diga kou mak lang Rikrwang na akhou pi mu thang rwe.
44010029	Atibriakpina nangna ating kou lang lang hungnu kaan bi ei za maknu to makka barapka hungnu rwe. Atiga nanina ating kou ongnuwa pa-aam lang binabo diga eina nani khou ngainuwe.”
44010030	Cornelius na rinne, “Ni bali meithaan lana atun chakrin tangga kalumsan ga ongme. Atiga chakrin kaqwa bi ain bi kalumme. Phaang ngo, kabaannu pwan sinnu manpa pakhat ameithaan bi hung han ngaake.
44010031	Maanna rinne, ‘Cornelius, nangna hweininu ga ngaisu thang rwe khatle naom pi swak theinu ga Rikrwang om mikphaang bi baningsu thang rwe.
44010032	Atiga Joppa la mi lang thangluga Peter diga kounu Simon ding ga abeiya kou hungro. Maan tuipui paan la zan mun langnu Simon in bi nei ongme. Maan hungnu kaan bi maanna nakhou chong rinlune.’
44010033	Atibriakpina eina bani ding nakhou barapka lang thangnu rwe. Nang hung thangnu heiya sa rwe. Atibriakpina atun ani mi bingza Rikrwang na nakhou zathang pi thang damnu bing ga ngai lang ani nun Rikrwang meithaan bi ong ongnuwe.”
44010034	Haba nung bi Peter na babao aang swakluga bani khou rinne, “Rikrwang nga kathing aih to make dinu batak takka eina thei rwe.
44010035	Atiyeda Rikrwang na mi chaat bing bating kachinu khatle bazenu tonu bating ga maanna lou thang nge.
44010036	Jisu Christa paan bina dai bazaangnu sacham kasamnu ga Rikrwang na Israel rwan sa rwan khou pi hungnu chong gaye, Maan ga pum brumza om Pukraangba ye.
44010037	Nanina theinu chong Judea taram bing bi kasamnu khatle baptize tonu nung Galilee bina thouga John na kasam damnu ga heiye.
44010038	Nazareth Jisu ding tatoga Pukraangba Rikrwang na Katha Bathiangnu le ngamna thao kanun thangluga Pukraangba na se koiluga kasanu chwan to thang ngaaknubo? Atiga Diabol na rai ongnu bing ding pi sa thang damnubo? Balangbe Rikrwang na Pukraangba ding ong bacham thang ngaake.
44010039	Maanna Jihudi rwan talei bi khatle Jerusalem bi to thang ngaaknu chwan bing om lang bi anina sake rwe. Atiluga banina bating cross pi bakhai that thang rwe.
44010040	Rikrwang na Bating ni thum ni pi ring thou lat rwe, atiga Bating indaoga pi mu thang rwe.
44010041	Haga mi bing khou make atiyeda Rikrwang na meithaanna kathang swak ngaaknu sake rwan khouwe. Maan thinu nun lak pina ring thou latnu nung maan le diga sa in bacham damnu ani khou le pi mu thang rwe.
44010042	Maanna ani ding mi nun khou sacham kasam lang zathang pi thang rwe. Atiga ring ongnu nun atiluga thi damnu nun ding chong kasem lang Rikrwang na Bating hap thang rwe diga sake to lang nge.
44010043	Balang bi thiamting rwan bingna sake pi rwe dinuba, bameng paan bina bating balumsanu bingna noh kok thangnu lousu rwe dinu gaye.”
44010044	Peter na heiba chong bing nga kabia ongnu kaan bi ngai ongnu mi bing khou Katha Bathiangnu ta thang rwe.
44010045	Atiga Peter le diga hung bachamnu mun romnu balumsanu nunna loh lo rwe. Balangbe Katha Bathiangnu leithwan ga Gentile rwan khou le bunta rwe.
44010046	Balangbe banina chong tei tei kabianu khatle Rikrwang ding swannu ga thei rwe. Haba kaan bi Peter na katake,
44010047	“Ani danga Katha Bathiangnu lousu damnu nun ding ga baptize to mako diga tudannuna khaam ngam dingbo?”
44010048	Maanna bani ding Pukraangba meng bina baptize to thang lang zathang pi thang rwe. Haba nung bi banina Peter ding lumik kasem bani khou neita lang rin ngaake.
44011001	Chonglang rwan khatle Judea bi ongnu unao rwanna Gentile rwanna le Rikrwang chong ga lousu rwe dinu thei rwe.
44011002	Peter na Jerusalem bi hungnu kaan bi mun romnu mi nunna bating kae thouluga
44011003	rinne, “Nangna mun rom maknu mi nun khou seluga bani le diga sa bachamme.”
44011004	Atiyeda Peter na bani khou swak tamnu lang bi thoutan bina thouga badon toga rin bathiang thang rwe. Atiga rinne,
44011005	“Ei Joppa namlian bi kalumga ong ngaake. Haba kaan bi ga ei trance seluga akhou pi mu thangnu khat mu rwe. Haga pwan pui dannu khat bataki bali kailuga tambaan lana basaam taluga akim bi ta thang rwe.
44011006	Haga eina bachak phaang dengluga kakhan ngaake. Habei ga baket bali phunnu talei ram khouring bing, nilai lak khouring bing, babonna katwanga senu bing khatle basaang la zwangnu basaa bing am ngaake.
44011007	Atiga khwan khatna akhou rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, ‘Peter, thouro, athatluga saro.’
44011008	Atiyeda eina rinne, ‘Pukraangba, haga ati mak ting ngo, balangbe ei impha ni hakna amun bi tanaatnu mak tabe bathiang maknu sa mak aang nge.’
44011009	Atiyeda tambaan la khwan gana akhou katak late, ‘Rikrwang na to bathiang thang damnu ding ga nangna tanaatnu diga kou lang make.’
44011010	Haga swak leng inthum ngaak rwe khatle ha bing ga tambaan la kai thou lat tam ngaake.
44011011	Atinu dat bahak pi ga Caesarea lana lang hungnu mi pat thum eina ongnu in inmai bi hung han rwe.
44011012	Habei ga khatchale balumsianu to makka ei bani le diga se bacham lang Katha na akhou rin ngaake. Haza makka, unao rwan pat karuk le ei le se bacham rwe khatle haba manpa in bi khut rwe.
44011013	Maanna tambaan chonglang khat bain bi tatoga mu dambo dinu lang bi rin rwe. Tambaan chonglang gana bakhou rinne, ‘Joppa la mi lang thangluga Peter diga kounu Simon ding bakouro.
44011014	Maanna nakhou chong rin thanglune, haba chong paan bina nang khatle nain inkhun mi bing kanthangnu lousulune.’
44011015	Kama bi ani khou ta thang ngaaknu ga danga eina kabia thounu kaan bi Katha Bathiangnuna bani lu chung bi ta thang rwe.
44011016	Habei ga Pukraangba na rin ngaaknu chong ga eina baningsu rwe dinuba, ‘John na batak takka tui bi baptize to thang ngaake atiyeda eina nani ding Katha Bathiangnuna baptize to thanglune.’
44011017	Atibriakpina nanina Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding balumsanu kaan bi Rikrwang na ani khou pi thang damnu leithwan ga nani khou le pi thang nge dabe Rikrwang maitwang bi han dingnu eiya tubo?”
44011018	Rin ongnu chong bing nga banina ngaisunu kaan bi bani thiap thiap ong drwe. Atiga banina Rikrwang lwat ting pi lianga rinne, “Ati dabe Rikrwang na Gentile rwan khou le ring langna sung lenu pi thang rwe.”
44011019	Stephen ding railuga athat tamnu nung pak imphaang thou damnu mi nunna Phoenicia, Cyprus khatle Antioch la tangga seluga sacham ga Jihudi rwan khouza kasam ngaake.
44011020	Atiyeda bani mi kasemba Cyprus le Cyrene la naye. Banina Antioch pi hungnu kaan bi Greek chong kabianu rwan khou le Pukraangba Jisu om lang bi kasam ngaake.
44011021	Pukraangba om ngam ga bani le diga ong bacham thang ngaake. Mi tamga balumsaluga Pukraangba khou hung rwe.
44011022	Atiga swak ongnu cham ga Jerusalem bi amnu rupkathan mi nun kana bi thei hung rwe. Banina Barnabas ting Antioch tang lang bathan thang rwe.
44011023	Maanna hung tangnu kaan bi Rikrwang om phaangkriang ga phaangmuluga karo rwe. Atiga bani khangsung ding sung hanga, Pukraangba khou chat makka ong dam lang kachui thang rwe.
44011024	Balangbe maan mi kasanu, Katha Bathiangnu khatle balumsanuna sipnu mi ngaake khatle mi tamga Pukraangba khou inku ka rwe.
44011025	Haba nung bi Barnabas na Saul ding zong lang Tarsus la thou dam ngaake.
44011026	Maanna bating kadouluga Antioch la kalwang hung rwe. Barnabas le Paul na sangwan chupka rupkathan le karungluga mi taswang khak ting bachu thang rwe. Antioch pi potroi rwan ding Christian diga kama katakka kou rwe.
44011027	Haba kaan bi thiamting rwan Jerusalem bina Antioch pi hung ngaake.
44011028	Habei ga bani lak pi Agabus tiga kounu pakhatna han thouluga talei ram bi bu taangnu hunglu rwe diga Katha paan bina bakhou pi mu thangnu ga rin swak rwe. Hadanga Claudius Caesar kaan bi swak tak ngaake.
44011029	Haba nung bi Judea bi ongnu unao rwan ding paang thang lang potroi rwanna maan maanna ngamnu nung suiga pi hung lang chong han thang rwe.
44011030	Hei danga banina to rwe, banina haba leithwan ga Barnabas le Saul kut pina chwan phunnu rwan khou pi thang ngaak rwe.
44012001	Haba kaan bi rupkathan om mi kasem ding rai langna Herod krwangna bakut ta rwe.
44012002	Maanna John nao Jacob ting kachaak chemna athat rwe.
44012003	Hagana Jihudi rwan ding pi pem rwe dinu maanna mu briakpina Peter ding le nam lang to thou rwe. Haga khai sui maknu uilu balou kaan bi ngaake.
44012004	Maanna Peter ding namluga qwan in bi thang rwe. Banina bating kraanmi patbali bali om badam bali khou bachoi thang rwe. Atiga bating Takan Swaknu Balou nung mi nun meithaan bi phun swak lang baning ngaake.
44012005	Banina Peter ding qwan in bi thang rwe, atiyeda rupkathanna Rikrwang khou balaangna chat makka hweini thang ong ngaake.
44012006	Herod na bating phun swak tingnu zingpha, Peter ga parei rui kanina bangluga kraanmi pat ni lak pi in ong ngaake. Atiga rangkaan rwanna qwan in inkhaanmun la ngaak ong ngaake.
44012007	Phaang ngo, Pukraangba om tambaan chonglangna Peter kim bi hung hanluga qwan in ga pi baan thang rwe. Maanna Peter ding babanaak pi bweiluga khatle kai thouluga rinne, “Barapka han thouro.” Habei ga bakut pina parei rui bing ga zokta drwe.
44012008	Haba nung bi tambaan chonglang gana bakhou rinne, “Nakongkhaak khaak tipo, ketthop rui le basuiro.” Maanna haga to rwe. Atiga rin late, “Napwan sinluga anung suiro.”
44012009	Maanna swakluga banung sui drwe. Atiga tambaan chonglangna to damnu ga bataknuwe dinu maanna thei make. Atiyeda maanna haga pi mu thangnu khate diga baning ngaake.
44012010	Barweina kamanu khatle kaninu rangkaan riak ka sekhan swaknu kaan bi namlian pek la se kaneinu thin kapan swaktang rwe. Barwei lang inkhaan ga baraanto lat thang rwe. Atiga barweina swakluga lampui pui khat la seta rwe. Haba kahan bi ga tambaan chonglang ga bakhouna se swak trwe.
44012011	Peter na bakaba thei swaknu kaan bi maanna rinne, “Batak takka heiya Pukraangba na Baom tambaan chonglang ding lang thangluga ating Herod kut pina khatle Jihudi rwan bing om baningnu bina pi dwak swak thang rwe dinu eina thei rwe.”
44012012	Maanna heiya kakhannu nung Mark tiga le kounu John nu Mary in bi hung rwe. Habei ga mi taswang khak hweiniga karung ong ngaake.
44012013	Peter na kapan inkhaan bachunu kaan bi Rhoda diga kounu swak rangaaknu gana lat swak thang lang swak rwe.
44012014	Maanna Peter khwan ga theinu kaan bi karo laiga inkhaan lat thang makka atiyeda pak khut latluga “Peter inmai inkhaan bi hung han ong rwe” diga rin ong ngaake.
44012015	Banina Rhoda khou rinne, “Nang kalo rwe.” Atiyeda maanna bataknuwe diga rakanga han rwe. Banina rinne, “Haga Peter om katha zung nge.”
44012016	Peter na inkhaan ga bachu ting ting ong ngaake. Banina inkhaan ga lat swaknu kaan bi bating muluga bani loh lo rwe.
44012017	Atiyeda maanna bani ding mang mang ong lang bakutna kabou rwe. Pukraangba na bating tatoga qwan in bina phun swak thangbo dinu bani khou rin indao thang rwe. Maanna rinne, “Nani sero, hei lang biya James khatle unao rwan bing khou barinro.” Atiga maan swakluga bariak katei la thou dam ngaake.
44012018	Haba nung khwa baan swak khap tinu le Peter lang bi paaam swaktrubo diga, kraanmi nun lak pi kasao kabao tak thou ngaak rwe.
44012019	Herod na bating rakanga zong rwe atiyeda bating zongsulanruga rangkaan rwan ding tamphaangluga, bani ding athat lang zathang pi swak rwe. Haba nung maan Judea bina Caesarea la taluga habei ga tanei ngaake.
44012020	Herod na Tyre le Sidon bi mi nun ding balung pwan tak ngaak rwe. Atiyeda bani khangsung sung khatcha toga Bakim bi hungluga krwang in insung bi chwanlaang mi nun ding phaangsinnu mi Blastus ting banina baan toluga dai bazaang ta lang bathem rwe. Balangbe bani taram ga krwang taleina thaisaak pi thangga ong ngaake.
44012021	Atiga dik thangnu lumik khat pi Herod na krwang pon naat sin basoiluga bakaong riak pi badungluga bani khou meiri rai rwe.
44012022	Mi nunna, “Heiya ri khwan zung nge, misa khwan make” diga pao ong ngaake.
44012023	Haba nung bi barapka Pukraangba om tambaan chonglangna bating bwei balumta rwe. Balangbe maanna Rikrwang lwat ting swan mak briakpi naye. Atiga bating kalungna sa sat trwe khatle thi drwe.
44012024	Atiyeda Rikrwang chong ga lian thou rwe khatle inku thou rwe.
44012025	Barnabas le Saul na barwei om chwandon loi thangluga Mark tiga le kounu John ding kalwangluga Jerusalem lana han hung lat rwe.
44013001	Antioch om rupkathan bi thiamting rwan, bachu thangnu rwan kasem, Barnabas, Niger diga kounu Simeon, Cyrene rwan Lucius, Herod tetrach in bi bakot thou ngaaknu Manaen khatle Saul bani nun am ngaake.
44013002	Banina Pukraangba chwanlaang toga khatle kalumsanga ongnu kaan bi Katha Bathiangnuna rin rwe, “Barnabas le Saul ding eina chwan to lang kou rwe, barwei ding kathang swak thangro.”
44013003	Barweina kalumsan ga hweini rwe. Haba nung banina barwei lu chung bi kut kaising thangluga barwei ding lang thang rwe.
44013004	Bani ding Katha Bathiangnuna lang thang briakpina bani Seleucia bi ta rwe. Habei gana Cyprus la li hwanluga hung rwe.
44013005	Barweina Salamis pi hung tangnu kaan bi Jihudi rwan om synagogue bing bi Rikrwang om sacham kasam thang rwe. Atiga barwei ding paang thang lang barweina John ding le kalwang ngaake.
44013006	Banina tuikoi ram se phaoluga Paphos pi hung tangnu kaan bi dwei choinu kakoinu thiamting, Jihudi rwan pa Bar Jisu diga kounu ding kadou rwe.
44013007	Maan talei choinu ningtingnu manpa Sergius Paulus le diga bacham ngaake. Haba manpa gana Barnabas le Paul ding kouluga barwei khouna Rikrwang chong ga ngai nwam tak ngaake.
44013008	Atiyeda dwei choinu Elymas na (bameng kabana “Dwei choinu” dinuwe) bani maitwang bi hanga talei choinu ding babalumsat pina kai imphaang lang lampui zong ngaake.
44013009	Habei ga Saul diga le kounu Paul na Katha Bathiangnu na sipluga bating phang dengga phaangluga
44013010	rinne, “He minamnu khatle bathot sianu, Diabol sa kapaisa, ririak senu bing om munanu, Pukraangba om bazenu lampui ding kaimaannu, nang nachwan ga lanlabo?
44013011	Batak takka Pukraangba kut nalu chung bi amme. Nang namik cholu rwe, bakaan kasem lumik mubila rwe.” Haba kahan bi ga kazingnu tambuna hungluga bating hwam lem rwe. Atiga tupai khatna bakut kai thang lang kalouga se ong ngaake.
44013012	Haba nung bi talei choinu gana swak tamnu ga muluga, maan balumsa rwe. Atiga Pukraangba lang bi bachu thangnu bi ga maan loh lo ngaak rwe.
44013013	Paul le babaan rwanna Paphos pina li hwan hungnu kaan bi Pamphylia bi amnu Perga bi hung tang rwe. Habei ga John bani khouna kapaangluga Jerusalem la han hung lat rwe.
44013014	Atiyeda Perga bi kapaangnu nung, bani Pisidia om Antioch pi hung rwe. Bani habei gana seluga Sabbath ni synagogue pi khutluga ongta rwe.
44013015	Atiga Moses om chongtan khatle thiamting om chongdip ka pa taangnu nung, synagogue om chwan phunnu rwan gana bani khou mi lang thangluga rinne, “Unao rwan ga, mi nun lang nanina kachui thang lang chong amme dabe haga rin thang ngo.”
44013016	Habei ga Paul na han thouluga bakut haiga rinne, “Israel manpa rwan khatle Rikrwang ding kachinu mi nun ga, achong nga ngai thang ngo.
44013017	Israel mi nun om Rikrwang na ani pu pa rwan ding kathang swak thang rwe. Atiga banina Egypt talei bi man ram mi toga lung ongnu kaan bi bani ding pi lian thou thang rwe. Bani ding kriang briakpina ngam kutpwam kating swakluga bani ding kai swak thang rwe.
44013018	Sangwan sombali khak om bakaan heiya maanna bani ding ramhaang bi rakhi rakha thang rwe.
44013019	Atiga maanna chaat siari ding Canaan bina to braan damnu kaan bi bani talei ga tasaanluga bani lang kasem thang rwe.
44013020	Haba nung bi maanna bani lang thiamting Samuel kaan tangga sangwan raza bali somnga khak chongsempuba rwan ding pi thang ngaake.
44013021	Haba nung bi banina krwang pi thang lang hweini rwe. Rikrwang na bani lang Benjamin in kik taat pina Kish sa kapaisa Saul ding sangwan sombali krwang toga paan lang pi thang rwe.
44013022	Rikrwang na Saul ding lou satluga bani krwang lang David ting pi thang lat rwe. Rikrwang na David om lang bi sake piga rinne, ‘Eina Jesse sa kapaisa Asungna bathainu David ting lousu rwe, maan Eina baningnu bing ga to lang nge.’
44013023	Karen thangnu nung suiga heiba manpa om kik taat pina Rikrwang na Israel rwan lang kanthangnu Jisu ding pi thang rwe.
44013024	Pukraangba hung mak balei meithaan, John na Israel mi nun khou sung leluga baptize to lang kasam ngaake.
44013025	Atiga John na bamadon to loiluga maanna rinne, ‘Nanina ating tuwe diga baningbo? Eiba Maan ga make. Ngaiyo, anung la Pakhat hung naye, Baom sandal rui ga hakna ei sut lang khopnu make.’
44013026	Abraham inkhun sa rwan, unao rwan ga, nani lak pi Rikrwang ding kachinu mi nun ga, ringriak om chong heiya ani khou phun hung thang rwe.
44013027	Balangbe Jerusalem bi ongnu mi nun khatle bani om bapuba rwanna Jisu ding khatle Sabbath ni bathin pa swak nu thiamting rwan khwan ding banina thei mak briakpina Bating koi impu thang ga haga pi hung tang rwe.
44013028	Bating thi lang khopnu koi dou mak peida banina Bating athat tammo diga Pilate khou ni ngaake.
44013029	Balang bi hiak thang ngaaknu bing ga banina pi hung tangnu kaan bi Bating cross pina loutaluga thaan bi ui thang rwe.
44013030	Atiyeda Rikrwang na Bating thi bina pi ring thou thang rwe.
44013031	Maan le diga Galilee lana Jerusalem bi hung bacham ngaaknu mi nun gana lumik taswang khak Bating mu ngaake. Ha rwan nun gana atun mi nun meithaan bi Baom sake rwe.
44013032	Anina nani khou karonu sacham, dinuba ani pu pa rwan khou karen thang ngaaknu ga indao thang rwe.
44013033	Rikrwang na Jisu ding pi ring thou thangga Pukraangba na bani sa rwan tonu ani langza haga pi hung tang thang rwe. Heiya Kalum Laa kani bi atiga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, ‘Nang Asa Kapaisa ye, Aniya Eina Nating pon thang rwe.’
44013034	Rikrwang na Jisu ding thinu bina pi ring thou rwe, braan zanu thot pi han latla rwe dinu lang bi atiga rinne, ‘Eina David khou pi thang ngaaknu balumsa zanu phaangkriang ga nakhou pi thangne.’
44013035	Atibriakpina Maanna Kalum Laa bariak katei la le rinne, ‘Nangna Naom Bathiangnu Bating braan zanu thot ka pi mu latla rwe.’
44013036	Balangbe batak takka Rikrwang na baningnu nung suiga, David na bamikin bahak lang chwan to thangluga thi drwe, bapu pa rwan thaan kim bi ui thang drwe khatle braan zanu thot ka to drwe.
44013037	Atiyeda Rikrwang na pi ring thou damnu Maan gabe braan za maknu to drwe.
44013038	Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, heiya nanina thei thang ngo, dinuba Bapaan bina noh kok thangnu nani khou kasam thangnuwe.
44013039	Moses om chongtan paanna nani ding pi baze thangnu ngam maknu bing bina Bapaan bina balumsanu bing ding pi baze thang rwe.
44013040	Atibriakpina thiamting rwan om chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu ga nani lu chung bi ta thang mak lang barak theiyo.
44013041	‘Phaang ngo, kiamrai natnu rwan, Loh lo le loh lowo braan le braanno! Balangbe nani kaan bi eina chwan khat towe; Tudannuna nani khou chwan ga rin thang beida, Kanina khatchale balumsalaye.’ ”
44013042	Jihudi rwan nunna synagogue pina se swak tamnu kaan bi Gentile rwanna hung latnu Sabbath ni chong ga bani khou kasam thang lat lang hweicha ngaake.
44013043	Mi nunna kapaang damnu kaan bi Jihudi rwan khatle ri baning thuknu mi nun gana Paul le Barnabas nung sui ngaak rwe. Barweina bani le diga meiri raiga, Rikrwang om phaangkriang sung bi chat makka ong dam lang bani ding bathem thang ngaake.
44013044	Atiga hung latnu Sabbath ni namlian om mi katamna Rikrwang chong ga ngai lang hung kadoi lat rwe.
44013045	Atiyeda Jihudi rwanna mi khang ding munu kaan bi antiamnuna sip rwe. Paul na kabianu chong maitwang bi ka mak ka maknu chong kabiaga rin basiat thou rwe.
44013046	Haba nung Paul le Barnabas na sung raangga katak rwe, “Kamanu bi anina nani khou Rikrwang chong ga rin ding gaye; atiyeda nanina haga lou thang maknu khatle nani khwa sei ringnu lousu lang khopnu lan rwe diga nani bahakna han dam briakpina phaang ngo, ani Gentile rwan khou thou damnu rwe.
44013047	Balangbe Pukraangba na ani khou zathang pi thangga rinne, ‘Eina nating Gentile rwan khou babaan to lang, Khatle napaan bina talei ram kalan mi bingna ringriak lousu lang nating ka thang rwe.’ ”
44013048	Gentile rwanna haga ngaisunu kaan bi bani karo rwe. Atiga Pukraangba chong ding lwat pi lian rwe khatle ringzoknu kum lousu lang kathang swaknu mi nun ga balumsa rwe.
44013049	Pukraangba chong ga haba taram bing bi kazan swak rwe.
44013050	Atiyeda namlian om takhwang tonu khatle ri baning thuknu mannu rwan atiluga balu tonu manpa rwan ding Jihudi rwanna kachui thangluga banina Paul le Barnabas ting rai thou rwe. Atiga bani ding bani taram bina kazun sat rwe.
44013051	Atiyeda Paul le Barnabas na bani ket pi kaphut ka bani maitwang bi kathing tabasialuga Iconium la hung rwe.
44013052	Atiga potroi rwan ga karonu khatle Katha Bathiangnuna sip rwe.
44014001	Iconium bi Paul le Barnabas bachamluga Jihudi rwan om synagogue pi chong kabia ongnu kaan bi Jihudi rwan khatle Greek rwan mi khang puina balumsa rwe.
44014002	Atiyeda balumsa maknu Jihudi rwanna Gentile rwan ding bani sung to tanopluga bau banao rwan maitwang bi sa maknu pi imbei rwe.
44014003	Atibriakpina barweina habei ga khwa seiga neitaluga Pukraangba paan bina sung raangga kabia ngaake. Atiga Baom phaangkriang om chong lang bi sake piga, bani kutna badannu khatle tasiatnu chwan tamga to ong ngaake.
44014004	Atiyeda namlian bi mi nun ga lang swakluga kasemna Jihudi rwan nung, kasemna chonglang rwan nung sui drwe.
44014005	Gentile rwan le Jihudi rwanna bani om bapuba rwan le diga karungluga bani ding pi tangam lang khatle lungna sat lang to thou rwe.
44014006	Haba kaan bi banina haga theiluga Lycaonia taram om Lystra khatle Derbe namlian atiluga am qwatnu taram la thou dam ngaake.
44014007	Atiga banina ha la ga sacham kasam ngaake.
44014008	Lystra bi tudannu banu pok pina baket lwamnu seza maknu pakhat am ngaake.
44014009	Paul na chong kabia ongnu ga maanna sung khutka ngai rwe khatle Paul na bating basouga phaangnu kaan bi bating pi sa thang lang balumsanu thot ka mu rwe.
44014010	Paul na baraam basaangga bakhou rinne, “Naket ka han kating thouwo.” Habei ga maan kachak thouluga se rwe.
44014011	Paul na to ongnu ga mi nunna munu kaan bi Lyconium chong la na, “Ri nunna misa thot louluga ani khou hung thang rwe” diga baraam basaangga pao thou rwe.
44014012	Banina Barnabas ting “ Zeus,” Paul dingna chong kabia bi maan balu to briakpina “ Hermes” tiga kou rwe.
44014013	Zeus kalum in ga namlian meithaan la am ngaake, haba om takona sen chan khatle rei rui ga mi khang le bachamga rikhaang pot kat thang lang namlian om kapan inkhaan la phun hung ngaake.
44014014	Atiyeda chonglang Barnabas le Paul na haga ngaisuluga, bani om pwan kachang reluga mi nun lak pi pak khutluga pao rwe.
44014015	“Mi nun ga, nani pa-aam lang heiya to ongnubo? Ani le nani chaang khatcha zung nge. Nani nun bathaang maaknu chwan bing bina talei, tambaan, tuipui khatle habei ga amnu pot bing ding dam thangnu ringnu Rikrwang khou hung langna anina nani khou sacham kasamnu rwe.
44014016	Thou damnu mikin bi maanna chaat bing ding maan maanna se nwamnu lampui bi se lang za thang ngaake.
44014017	Atiyeda Pukraangba na Baom sake sui makka thangsia make. Dinuba Pukraangba Maanna kasanu to thangluga saangbaan lana khwa khatle tachi tapaan kraa dam lang bakum baphaa pi thang rwe, hagana thaisaak khatle karonuna ani sung pi sip thang nge.”
44014018	Heiba chong nga kabiaga bani lang kat thang dingnu mi nun ding ga kung takka khaam thang rwe.
44014019	Haba nung bi Antioch le Iconium lana Jihudi rwan haba riak pi ga hung rwe. Atiga banina mi khang ding kachui thangluga Paul ding lungna sat rwe. Maan thi rwe diga banina bating namlian paan la kai sat rwe.
44014020	Atiyeda potroi rwanna bating han qwat ongnu kaan bi maan thouluga namlian sung bi khut rwe. Atiga inswan lampai maan Barnabas le diga Derbe la thou dam ngaake.
44014021	Banina haba namlian bi ga sacham kasamluga potroi taswang khak bacha rwe. Haba nung bani Lystra, Iconium khatle Antioch la han hung lat rwe.
44014022	Banina potroi rwan ding bani sung pi tip thangluga, bani balumsat pi chat makka ong dam lang kachui thangga rinne, “Anina riangre kanang taswang khak khaangga Rikrwang om krwang talei khut lang rwe.”
44014023	Banina rupkathan bing bi chwan phunnu rwan hap thang rwe. Atiga kalumsannu le bachamga kalum thangluga barweina balumsanu bing ding Pukraangba khou bachoi thang rwe.
44014024	Haba nung bi banina Pisidia se phao hungluga Pamphylia bi hung rwe.
44014025	Atiga banina Perga bi sacham ga kasam thangsialuga Attalia la ta lat rwe.
44014026	Habei gana barwei chwan to zokluga hungnu chwandon lang Rikrwang om phaangkriang bi barwei ding sin thang damnu Antioch pi ga li hwanluga hung lat rwe.
44014027	Barweina habei ga hung tangnu kaan bi rupkathan om mi bing ding khom kadoiluga Rikrwang na bani le diga chwan to bacham thang rwe khatle Gentile rwan bingna le balumsat lousu dam langna inkhaan lat thang rwe diga bani khou meiri rai thang rwe.
44014028	Atiga banina habei ga potroi rwan le diga bakhwa seiga ong bacham ngaake.
44015001	Judea lana mi kasem Antioch pi taluga unao rwan ding “Moses om zek nung suiga nani mun rom make dabe ringriak lousulaye” diga bachu thang ngaake.
44015002	Haba kaan bi Paul le Barnabas khatle bani nun le diga sung cham maknu taswang khak swakluga bani le diga kae kale rwe. Atibriakpina banina kathuiluga Paul le Barnabas khatle mi kasem ding Jerusalem la hei lang bi chonglang rwan khatle chwan phunnu rwan khou se lang ka thang thang rwe.
44015003	Rupkathanna bani ding lampui bi katha swak thang rwe. Bani nun Gentile rwanna sung lenu lang bi meiri raiga Phoenicia le Samaria takan hung rwe. Atiga unao rwan bing ga karo tak ngaak rwe.
44015004	Banina Jerusalem bi hung tangnu kaan bi rupkathan, chonglang rwan khatle chwan phunnu rwanna bani ding lou thang rwe. Atiga Rikrwang na bani khou to thang damnu bing ga bani khou pu thang rwe.
44015005	Atiyeda Pharisee rwan pek la suinu balumsanu mi kasemna han thouluga rinne, “Gentile rwan bing le mun rom lang khatle Moses om zathang ga zei langna chongtan pi lang bathaang amme.”
44015006	Atiga rin ongnu lang bi ga chonglang rwan khatle chwan phunnu rwan hung kadoiluga kakhan rwe.
44015007	Bakhwa seiga kakhannu nung Peter na han thouluga bani khou rinne, “Unao rwan ga, amun bina Gentile rwanna sacham ga ngaisuluga balumsa dam lang meithaanna Rikrwang na ating ani lak pina kathang swak thang rwe dinu nanina theiye.
44015008	Atiga mi bingza sung ding thei ongnu Rikrwang na ani khou pi thang damnu danga bani khou le Katha Bathiangnu ding pi thangga bani ding thei thang rwe.
44015009	Atiga balumsanu paan bina bani sung ding to bathiang thangluga bani le ani lak pi bacham maknu pi am thang make.
44015010	Atibriakpina atun ani nun khatle ani pu pa rwanna le phunnu ngamlanu ringok ka paaam toga potroi rwan daankong bi bason thangluga Rikrwang ding tamphaang ongnubo?
44015011	Atiyeda Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang paan bina ani le bani danga ringnu lousulune diga anina balumsaye.”
44015012	Habei ga mi khang ga rim rim ta drwe. Paul le Barnabas paan bina Gentile rwan lak pi Rikrwang na tasiatnu khatle badannu chwan bing to thang ngaaknu ga barweina rin swak thangnu bi ga bani khangsungna ngai ong ngaake.
44015013	Atiga banina rim rim ta damnu kaan bi James na katake, “Unao rwan ga, achong nga ngai thang ngo,
44015014	Rikrwang na Bameng lang chungna mi khang khat Gentile rwan lak pina kathang swak lang tatoga kamaga bani lak pi hung damnu bo dinu ga Simon na bathiangga ndao thang rwe.
44015015	Haga thiamting rwan om chong ga le diga bacham rwe. Atiga hiak thang nge,
44015016	‘Haba nung bi Ei han hunglune, Khatle David om raita damnu pwan in ga Eina bacha thou latlune. Raita damnu bing ga Eina bacha thou latlune, Khatle pi han thou latne.
44015017	Balangbe nung la ong thang sianu mi nunna Khatle Ameng kou damnu Gentile rwanna Pukraangba ding zong lang nge. Pum brum heiya to ongnu Pukraangba na rinne.’
44015018	Kama thoutan bina Rikrwang na baom chwan bing ding theiye.
44015019	Atibriakpina aom baning ga heiye, Gentile rwan lak pina Rikrwang khou kanei hung damnu mi nun ding ga anina to katop mak lang nge.
44015020	Atiyeda ri katha lang kat thangnu tanaatnu pot, lungmaannu chwan, karek thatluga thinu zan sanu khatle thi sanu hei bing bina impaan lang anina bani khou chamthwan ga hiaknuwe.
44015021	“Balangbe Moses om chongtan ga mikin bing bi, namlian bing bi khatle synagogue bing bi Sabbath ni bathin bani khou kasam thang ngaake.”
44015022	Habei ga unao rwan lakpi kai thangnu Barsabas tiga kounu Judas khatle Silas ting bani lak pina kathang swakluga Paul khatle Barnabas le bachamga Antioch la bathan thangnu heiya chonglang rwan, chwan phunnu rwan khatle rup kathan mi bingna sanuwe diga za ngaake.
44015023	Banina haba chamthwan bi ga atiga hiak rwe: “Chonglang rwan, chwan phunnu rwan khatle unao rwanna Antioch pi, Syria bi khatle Cilicia bi amnu Gentile rwan bing ding kalumme.
44015024	Mi kasemna ani khouna swakluga bani chongna nani ding pi katopnu, nani sung pi souga nani ding mun rom lang zung nge, chongtan ga zei lang zung nge diga rinnu anina theisu rwe. Bani khou anina hapai zathang pi thangnu maake.
44015025	Atibriakpina anina sung khatcha toga zakaleluga mi kasem kathang swakluga bani ding anina kriangnu Barnabas le Paul ding pi se bachamnu sa rwe diga baning ngaake.
44015026	Bani nun heiya ani om Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng lang chungna bakum pi swaknu nunne.
44015027	Atibriakpina anina Judas le Silas ting barwei munna ha bing ga bachangga nani khou rin thang lang lang hungnu rwe.
44015028	Balangbe bakung tonu lang heiya makka potrit katei nani khou badan thang maknuna saye diga Katha Bathiangnu khatle anina baning rwe.
44015029	Dinuba ri katha lang katnu, thi sanu, karek thatnu zan sanu khatle lungkoi lungmaannu hei bing bina nani impaan ding gaye. Nanina hei bing bina impaanne dabe nani lang salune. Donsanu towo.”
44015030	Atiga bani ding lang thangluga bani Antioch pi hung rwe. Habei ga banina mi khang ding khom karungluga chamthwan ga bani khou pi rwe.
44015031	Haga banina panu kaan bi bani ding kachui thangnu langna bani karo rwe.
44015032	Judas le Silas ka barwei bahak thiamting briakpina bani khou chong taswang khak kabiaga unao rwan ding kachui thang rwe khatle bani sung pi tip thang rwe.
44015033	Atiga bani bakaan kasem bani le diga ong bachamnu nung, barwei ding unao rwanna chonglang rwan kim la dai bazaangga bathan thang drwe.
44015034	Atiyeda Silas pa habei ga ongnuna sa rwe diga baning ngaake.
44015035	Paul le Barnabas na le katei rwan bing le diga Antioch pi ongluga Pukraangba om sacham ga bachu thangga kasam thang ngaake.
44015036	Lumik kasem nung bi Paul na Barnabas khou rinne, “Arweina Pukraangba om sacham kasam thang damnu namlian bing bi se latluga unao rwan ga tato ongbo dinu phaang sezo.”
44015037	Barnabas na Mark diga le kounu John ding le kalwang nwam ngaake.
44015038	Atiyeda Pamphylia bina bani khouna se kapaang damnu Mark ting bani le diga chwan to bacham mak lang Paul na baning ngaake.
44015039	Atiga khat le khat za kale makka rakanga kae kalenu nung, barwei kapaang kale drwe. Barnabas na Mark ting kalwangluga Cyprus la li hwanluga thou drwe.
44015040	Atiyeda Rikrwang phaangkriang paan bina unao rwanna za thangnu nung suiga Paul na Silas ting ka thangluga thou drwe.
44015041	Maanna Syria le Cilicia serwan thangluga rupkathan bing ding pi tip thang rwe.
44016001	Haba nung bi maan Derbe le Lystra bi hung rwe. Phaang ngo, habei ga tudannu potroi Timothy diga kounu balumsa zanu Jihudi rwan mannu sa kapaisa khat am ngaake, bapana Greek rwanne.
44016002	Lystra le Iconium bi ongnu unao rwanna balang bi rin chuiga rin ong ngaake.
44016003	Paul na maan le diga se bacham lang bathai ngaake. Maanna bating chwanlaang bachamluga mun rom thang rwe. Balangbe Timothy ding ponnu pa ga Greek rwanne dinu habei ongnu Jihudi rwanna thei ngaake.
44016004	Banina namlian bing bi se thangnu kaan bi Jerusalem bi chonglang rwan khatle chwan phunnu rwanna han thang damnu chongren ga zei lang banina pi thei thang ngaake.
44016005	Atiga rupkathan bing ga bani balumsat tip thou rwe khatle kani bathin bani mi sing inku thou ngaak rwe.
44016006	Banina Phrygia le Galatia taram serwan hungnu kaan bi Asia taram bi sacham kasam mak lang Katha Bathiangnuna bani ding khaam ngaake.
44016007	Banina Mysia bi hung tangnu kaan bi Bithynia bi khut lang to ngaake atiyeda Katha na bani ding za mak ngaake.
44016008	Banina Mysia tram se rwan hungluga Troas la seta rwe.
44016009	Atiga zingpha Paul khou pi mu thangnu khat indao thang rwe. Dinuba, Macedonia rwan manpa pakhatna hanluga bakhou hweiga rinne, “Macedonia la hungluga ani ding paang thang ngo.”
44016010	Indao thangnu ga mu taang bi, Rikrwang na bakhou sacham kasam lang bating kou thang rwe dinu theiluga barapka anina Macedonia la se lang daan rwe.
44016011	Atibriakpina anina Troas pina li hwan hungluga lampui se chuk chuk ka Samothrace tuikoi ram bi se hungluga inswan lampai Neapolis namlian bi hung rwe.
44016012	Haga Macedonia om namlwan bakung tonu namlian khatle Rome rwanna lungnu riake. Ani haba Philippi namlian bi ga lumik kasem nei ngaake.
44016013	Atiga Sabbath ni anina namlian inkhaan pui bi gana se swakluga tuiqwa paan la se ngaake. Habei ga Ri kalum lang bariak amlune diga baning ngaake atiga ani habei ga ongtaluga habei ga ong ngaaknu mannu rwan khou chong kabia thou rwe.
44016014	Thyatira namlian bi Lydia diga kounu sendumnu pwan langgonnu Rikrwang ding kalum ongnu mannu khatna ani chong ngai ong ngaake. Paul na kabia ongnu ga sung khutka ngai lang Pukraangba na basung lat swak thang ngaake.
44016015	Atiga maan khatle bain inkhun bing ding baptize to thangnu kaan bi maanna ani ding hweiga rin rwe, “Nanina ating Pukraangba khou balumsanuwe diga chak thang nge dabe aniya ain la hungluga riak thang ngo” khatle ani riak rwe.
44016016	Anina kalum lang se ongnu kaan bi ri chong rin swaknu katha amnu swak rangaaknu khat ani ding kadou rwe. Maanna ri chong rin swak briakpina bapuba rwan lang tongnu tamga lousu ngaake.
44016017	Haba rangaaknu gana Paul le ani nung suiga seluga paoga rinne, “Heiba mi nunna Rikrwang swak rwanne, banina ani khou ringriak lousu dingnu lampui kasam ongme.”
44016018	Haba mannuna bakhwa seiga ati to ong ngaake. Atiyeda Paul na basung nungngai mak takka bakhou kanei khutluga katha khouga rinne, “Bakhouna swak tam lang eina Jisu Christa meng bina nakhou chongtan piye.” Haba kahan bina katha ga se swak trwe.
44016019	Atibriakpina haba mannu om bapuba rwanna bani om tong dingnu om badou chanu ga se damnu munu kaan bi banina Paul le Silas ting namluga keithian sung bi bapuba rwan meithaan bi kai hung rwe.
44016020	Atiga barwei ding chongsempuba rwan khou kai hungluga rinne, “Heiba manpa pat nina Jihudi rwan toga ani namlian bi taswang khak to katop rwe.
44016021	Rome talei mi nun anina zeinu khatle ngaaknu za maknu zek ting ani khou bachu thang rwe.”
44016022	Haba nung bi mi khang gana bani maitwang bi han thou rwe. Atiga chongsempuba rwan gana Paul le Silas om pwan kaireluga barwei ding thin sungrwanna bwei lang zathang pi rwe.
44016023	Banina barwei ding bazam taswang khak bwei thangnu nung, qwan in bi bazwan thang rwe. Atiga qwan in ngaakpuba khou ngaak chuiga ngaak lang zathang pi thang rwe.
44016024	Maanna chongtan ga lousunu kaan bi barwei ding qwan in basung la kaa khat pi thang rwe khatle barwei ket thingpek pi balak thang rwe.
44016025	Atiyeda zingpha inmik kasia bi, Paul le Silas na hweiniga Rikrwang ding swan ga laa to ong ngaake. Atiga qwan in mi nunna haga ngaiga ong ngaake.
44016026	Habei ga thei mak daakka talei kaling rwe khatle qwan in inmun ga kanuk thou rwe, atiga inkhaan bing le lat swak rwe khatle mi bing khouna thin parei rui le zokta rwe.
44016027	Qwan in ngaakpuba na in ong bina barak swaknu kaan bi qwan in inkhaan bing ga lat ongnu mu rwe. Maanna qwan in mi nun pak dwak loi drwe diga baningluga baom kachaak chem kaswaluga baraanto bating athat lang to thou rwe.
44016028	Atiyeda Paul na baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Naraanto nating sia lang to mako, balangbe ani mi bingza abeiya amme.”
44016029	Haba nung bi maanna thaomei niluga pak khut rwe. Atiga Paul le Silas meithaan bi kathokka khut in balumta rwe.
44016030	Maanna barwei ding kalwang swakluga rinne, “Bapuba rwan ga, eina kanthangnu lousu lang pa-aam to langbo?”
44016031	Barweina rinne, “Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding balumsaro atiye dabe nang khatle nain inkhun mi bing ringriak lousulune.”
44016032	Haba nung bi banina bakhou khatle bain bi ongnu mi bing khou Pukraangba om chong kasam thang rwe.
44016033	Haba ni zingpha ga maanna barwei ding kalwang swakluga barwei pum bi bazam bing ga kasin sat thang rwe, atiga haba kahan bi ga maan le bain inkhun mi bing baptize to rwe.
44016034	Maanna barwei ding bain bi kalwang khutluga thaisaak barwei meithaan bi balam thang rwe. Atiga bain inkhun bing Rikrwang ding balumsa briakpina bani karo tak ngaak rwe.
44016035	Khwa baan swaknu kaan bi chongsempuba rwanna kaliannu rwan ding lang hungluga rinne, “Barwei ding ga bathan sat tro.”
