44016036	Qwan in ngaakpuba gana haba chong ga Paul khou hung rin rwe, atiga rinne, “Chongsempuba rwanna narwei ding bathan sat lang mi lang hung rwe. Atibriakpina atunbe narwei senu za rwe, dai bazaangga sero.”
44016037	Atiyeda Paul na bani khou rinne, “Banina Rome mi ani ding chong to makka, mi nun meithaan bi bweiluga qwan in bi thang rwe. Atiga ani ding inkamga bathan sat lang tonubo? Haga ani za nwam make. Bani bahak hung tangluga ani ding phun swak ting ngo.”
44016038	Kaliannu rangkaan mi nun gana haba chong ga chongsempuba rwan khou seluga rin rwe. Bani ga Rome mi nunne dinu theiluga kaliannu rwan ga kachi rwe.
44016039	Haba nung bi banina hungluga barwei ding phun swakluga namlian bina se swak thang lang bathem rwe.
44016040	Atiga bani qwan in bina swakluga Lydia in bi khut rwe khatle barweina unao rwan ding munu kaan bi bani ding kachui thangluga habei gana se swak tam ngaake.
44017001	Barwei Amphipolis le Apollonia se phaoluga Thessalonica bi hung rwe. Habei ga Jihudi rwan om synagogue khat am ngaake.
44017002	Habei ga Paul na bani khou khutluga baom chaang toga Sabbath lumik inthum khak Bathiangnu Chongdip ka bani le diga kathai karung ngaake.
44017003	Bani khou rin katupka, rin bachakka Christa na riangre kanang inza khaangluga khatle thiluga ring thoulune khatle “Eina nani khou kasam ongnu Jisu wa Christa ga rwe” diga rin ngaake.
44017004	Mi kasemna balumsa rwe. Habei ga ri baning thuknu Greek rwan mi khang pui atiluga balu tonu mannu rwan mi tamga hungluga Paul le Silas khou karung rwe.
44017005	Atiyeda sacham ding ga balumsa maknu Jihudi rwanna bani ding antiamga keithian lana sa maknu mi kasem phun hungluga mi khang khom kadoiluga banina haba namlian sung bi ga pi kasao kabao thou rwe. Banina Jason in bi hungluga Paul le Silas ting mi nun khou phun swak lang hung zong rwe.
44017006	Atiyeda banina barwei ding zongsu maknu kaan bi Jason le unao rwan mi kasem ding namlian om chongsempuba rwan khou kai hungluga paoga rin rwe, “Talei ram ding to tasuk talatnu mi nun ga abei le hung tang rwe.
44017007	Ha rwan ding ga Joson na loukhut rwe khatle Jisu dinu Krwang khat amme diga rinluga banina Caesar om zathang ding to kabat kabaangga to rwe.”
44017008	Haba chong ga theinu kaan bi mi khang khatle namlian bapuba rwan sung katop rwe.
44017009	Banina Jason khatle katei rwan khouna khopsanu sian louluga bani ding bathan thang rwe.
44017010	Haba nung bi unao rwanna Paul le Silas ting barapka zingphana Berea la pi pen thou drwe. Barweina habei ga hung tangnu kaan bi Jihudi rwan om synagogue pi khut rwe.
44017011	Habei mi nun ga Thessalonica bi mi nun ma bani sa inku dingnuwe. Balangbe banina cham ga taraan ga khatle Bathiangnu Chongdipna rin ongnu ga bazenubo dinu lang bi kani bathin sung khutka zong ong ngaake.
44017012	Atibriakpina mi taswang khak khatle takhwang to lang khopnu Greek rwan mannu manpa taswang khakna le balumsa rwe.
44017013	Atiyeda Berea bi Paul na Rikrwang chong kasam ongnu ding ga Thessalonica bi ongnu Jihudi rwanna theiluga bani habei ga le hung rwe. Atiga mi nun ding kachui thangluga pi kasao kabao thou lat rwe.
44017014	Habei ga unao rwanna barapka Paul ding tuipui lampui la bathan thang drwe. Atiyeda Silas le Timothy habei ga ongsia rwe.
44017015	Paul ding kalwangsenu mi nun gana bating Athens la kalwang hung rwe. Habei ga Paul na Silas le Timothy ding barapka banung sui hung lang rin thangnu nung bani thou lat trwe.
44017016	Paul na Athens pi barwei ding ngaak ongnu kaan bi haba namlian ga ri katha kalumnuna sipka ongnu muluga basung sou thou rwe.
44017017	Atibriakpina maanna synagogue pi Jihudi rwan le Rikrwang ding kalum ongnu Gentile rwan atiluga keithian bi kadounu mi nun le diga kani bathin chong kaphat kalega ong ngaake.
44017018	Habei ga Epicurean Le Stoic rwan ningtingnu rwanna Paul ding kae rwe. Mi kasemna rin rwe, “Tu tu tam tamnu manpa heiyana pa-aam kabia nwamnubo?” Kateina rinne, “Maanba man ram om ri bing ding kasamnu mi dannuwe.” Balangbe maanna Jisu om lang bi khatle Maan ring thou damnu lang bi bani khou kasam ngaake.
44017019	Banina bating kailuga Areopagus pi phun hungluga rin rwe, “Nangna kasam ongnu zekrin kathan ga pa-aambo, ani le theinu zabo?
44017020	Balangbe nangna ani kana bi teithaknu chong khat pi thei thang rwe atibriakpina ha bing ga pa-aambo dinu ani thei nwamme.”
44017021	Balangbe Athens pi mi nun khatle habei ga talei khat la mi nun gana chong kathan kathan kabiaga mak tabe ngaikalega chwan khatchale to makka bakaan to braan ga ong ngaake.
44017022	Haba nung bi Paul na Areopagus zai bi han thouluga rinne, “Athens manpa rwan ga, nani ririak se chuinu mi nunne dinu ei thei rwe.
44017023	Balangbe eina se koiga serwan hungnu kaan bi nanina kalum ongnu om lang bi kakhannu kaan bi nani om kalum riak pi ‘Thei maknu Rikrwang khou’ diga hiak thangnu ga eina dou rwe. Atibriakpina nanina thei maknu bating kalum ongnu lang bi eina nani khou kasamnu rwe.
44017024	“Talei ram khatle basung bi amnu pot bing ding dam thangnu Rikrwang ga tambaan le talei ram om bapuba to briakpina, Maan kutna bachanu kalum in bi ong make.
44017025	Balaang kabaatnu amme diga misa kutna Bating pui thang lang bathaang maake. Balangbe Maanna mi bing lang ringnu kaphuk khatle pot bingza pi thang nge.
44017026	“Maanna thi pum khatcha bina mi chaat bing ding talei ram bi lung dam lang dam thang rwe. Atiga Maanna kamaga han thangnu kaan khatle bani kaong riak om ramret bing kamaga bacha thang rwe.
44017027	“Balangbe Maan ga ani mi bing khouna namlaaga ong mak ngaak peida misana Pukraangba ding zong dam lang Bating kutna kalouga phangsu lang khatle Bating phangsu za lang nge.
44017028	“Balangbe Pukraangba khou ani ringga, kalingga khatle ringnu ga lousu rwe. Nani nun lak pi chongdip hiaknuna atiga hiak ngaaknu ga dannuwe, ‘Balangbe ani nun bing Bakik taat rwanne.’
44017029	“Atibriakpina ani nun Rikrwang kik taat rwan to briakpina, Rikrwang chaang misa ningtingna bachanu kachaak tannu, tangka dannu khatle lung om kutthiam dannuwe diga baningla dingnuwe.
44017030	Batak takka thei maknu kaan bi ga Rikrwang na mutwan ngaake atiyeda atunba bariak bing bi mi bing ding sung le lang zathang pi thang rwe.
44017031	Balangbe Maanna ka thang damnu Mi Pakhat kana talei ram mi bing lang ririak senu chongsem to lang lumik khat dik thang rwe. Rikrwang na Bating thinu bina pi ring thou thangluga mi bing khou badan pi mu thang rwe.”
44017032	Atiga thinu nunna ring thou latnu cham ga theisunu kaan bi mi kasemna choi banui ngaake. Katei rwanna rinne, “Hei lang bi ani nakhouna ngai lat maang nge.”
44017033	Haba nung bi Paul bani khouna thou drwe.
44017034	Atiyeda manpa rwan mi kasemna banung suiluga balumsa rwe. Balumsanu nun lak pi Areopagus rwan Dionysius, Damaris tiga kounu mannu khat atiluga katei rwan le sui ngaake.
44018001	Haba nung bi Paul Athens pina Corinthia la thou drwe.
44018002	Habei maanna Jihudi rwan, Pontus pi ponnu Aquila diga kounu pakhat ting kadou rwe. Maan Italy lana bamei Priscilla le diga hungnu nai ngaak maang nge. Balangbe Claudius na Jihudi rwan bing ding Rome talei bathan sat lang zathang pi swak rwe. Atiga Paul na barwei ding kadou lang hung rwe.
44018003	Bachwan ga bacham briakpina Paul na barwei le diga ong bachamluga chwan to bacham ngaake. Balangbe bani pwan in bachanu mi nunne.
44018004	Maanna Sabbath ni bathin synagogue pi hungluga Jihudi rwan le Greek rwan ding balumsa langna bani le diga kaphat karung ong ngaake.
44018005	Silas le Timothy na Macedonia lana hungnu kaan bi Katha Bathiangnuna bathouga Paul na Jisu ding Christa rwe diga Jihudi rwan khou sake pi ngaake.
44018006	Atiyeda banina bating thingluga khatle rin basiatnu kaan bi maanna bapwan kathingga bani khou rinne, “Nani thi nani lu chung bi ta ding ngo, eiba bathiang nge. Atunna thouga ei Gentile rwan khou thou dam rwe.”
44018007	Maan habei gana swakluga Rikrwang ding kachinu Jastus tiga kounu in bi khut rwe. Bain ga synagogue kom bahak pi ngaake.
44018008	Haba nung bi synagogue om kai thangnu Crispus bainkhun mi bing le diga Rikrwang khou balumsa rwe. Cham ga ngaisunu Corinthia rwan mi taswang khakna le balumsaluga bani baptize to ngaak rwe.
44018009	Atun Pukraangba na Paul khou zingpha pi mu thangga rinne, “Rou mako atiyeda kabiawo. Nang mang mang ong mako.
44018010	Balangbe Ei nang le ong bacham ongme. Pakhatchanale nating katwak pilaye khatle pi liamlaye. Heiba namlian biya Ami tamga amme.”
44018011	Maan habei ga sangwan khat tha karuk bani lak pi Rikrwang chong bachu thangga ong ngaake.
44018012	Gallio na Achaia om talei choi ongnu kaan bi Jihudi rwanna sung khatcha toga Paul maitwang bi han thouluga bating chongsem riak meithaan bi phun hung rwe.
44018013	Banina rinne, “Heiba manpana chongtan ding to kabat kabaangga Rikrwang ding kalum lang mi nun ding bathemme.”
44018014	Paul na chong kabia lang babao aang thou lang tonu kaan bi Gallio na Jihudi rwan khou rinne, “Jihudi rwan ga, heiba manpana ka maknu chwan tonu mak tabe, mi thi mi naa zanu to ngaake dabe ei nani le diga barit phun bacham lang balang amme.
44018015	Atiyeda haba chongkaang om, meng om khatle nani om chongtan om lang bina kaenu ngaake dabe, haga nani cham kae kaleyo. Balangbe heipai om lang bi ei chongsempuba to kaate.”
44018016	Maanna bani ding chongtok riak pina bathou sat trwe.
44018017	Haba nung bi Greek rwan bingna synagogue om kaithangnupa Sosthenes ting namluga chongsem kaong riak meithaan bi bwei rwe. Atiyeda haga Gallio na sung khut thang mak ngaake.
44018018	Paul bakhwa seiga Corinthia bi ong ngaake. Haba nung bi maan habei ga unao rwan khouna kapaangluga, Priscilla le Aquila ding kalwangluga Syria la se lang li hwan rwe. Baom chong ren khat am briakpina Paul Cenchrea bi balu bwat sat rwe.
44018019	Maan Ephesus pi hung bi Priscilla le Aquila ding habei ga thangsia rwe. Maan bahak synagogue pi khutluga Jihudi rwan le diga chong kakhan rwe.
44018020	Banina bating bakaan kasem ongsei thang lang rinnu kaan bi maan zalan rwe.
44018021	Atiyeda maan bani khou kapaang chong kabia thangsialuga, “Jerusalem la laang swak tingnu balou ga ei soimakka sui lang tone, atiyeda Rikrwang na zanuwe dabe ei nani khou hung latlune” diga rinluga maan Ephesus pina li hwan thou dam ngaak rwe.
44018022	Atiga maan Caesarea bi hung tangnu kaan bi Jerusalem la kaluga rupkathan ding kalumluga Antioch la ta rwe.
44018023	Maan habei ga bakaan kasem ongnu nung, Galatia le Phrygia taram bing serwanluga potroi rwan bing om balumsat ting pi tip thang rwe.
44018024	Apollos tiga kounu Alexandria nampui bi ponnu Jihudi rwan pakhat Ephesus pi hung rwe. Maan chong kabia theinu khatle Bathiangnu Chongdip om lang bi thei taknu mi pakhat ngaake.
44018025	Heiba manpa ding nga mi khatna Pukraangba lampui om lang bi bachu thang ngaake. Atiga maanna bakatha na rakan takka bathainu le bachamga Pukraangba om lang bi rin bazega rin thang ngaake khatle bachu thang ngaake. Atiyeda maan John na baptize to thangnu za ding thei ngaake.
44018026	Maanna basung raangga synagogue pi chong kabia thou rwe. Atiyeda Priscilla le Aquila na bachong ga ngaisunu kaan bi bating inkamga kalwang swakluga Rikrwang om lampui lang bi inkuga khatle bazenu ga bachu thang rwe.
44018027	Maanna Achaia talei la se nwamnu kaan bi bating loukhut thang lang unao rwanna haba riak pi ongnu potroi rwan khou chamthwan hiak ngaake. Atiga maanna hung tangnu kaan bi phaangkriang paan bina balumsanu nun ding taswang khak paang thang rwe.
44018028	Balangbe maanna khang meithaan bi Jihudi rwan chong ding ga kae ngam rwe. Atiga Jisu wa Christa ye diga Bathiangnu chongdip pina pi mu thang ngaake.
44019001	Apollos na Corinthia bi ongnu kaan bi Paul na kasak taram bing serwan hungluga Ephesus pi hung rwe. Habei ga potroi rwan mi kasem dou ngaake.
44019002	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Nanina balumsanu paan bina Katha Bathiangnu ding lousurubo?” Banina bakhou rinne, “Lousu make. Katha Bathiangnu amme dinu hakna ani thei make.”
44019003	Maanna bani khou rinne, “Ati dabe nani tatonu baptize tonubo?” Banina katake, “Ani John na baptize to thangnu ga lousu rwe.”
44019004	Paul na rinne, “Nung la hungnanu Pukraangba ding dinuba Jisu ding balumsa lang zung nge diga John na mi bing khou rinluga sung lenu om baptize to thang rwe.”
44019005	Haga banina ngaisunu kaan bi Pukraangba Jisu meng bi baptize to rwe.
44019006	Atiga Paul na bani lu chung bi kut kaising thangnu kaan bi Katha Bathiangnu bani khou ta thang rwe khatle bani chong tei tei kabiaga Rikrwang chong rin swak thou rwe.
44019007	Haba mi nun ga somga kani khak ngaake.
44019008	Paul na synagogue pi khutluga tha thum sung raangga Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi kaphat ngaake khatle bani ding balumsa lang bathem ngaake.
44019009	Atiyeda mi kasemna bani sung natka balumsa mak ngaake. Mi nun meithaan bi Pukraangba om Lampui lang bi kasianu kabia rwe. Paul na bani ding asat thang sialuga potroi rwan ding kalwangluga Tyranus pi kani bathin haba lang bi kakhan bacham ong ngaake.
44019010	Atiga heiya sangwan kani seta ngaake. Atibriakpina Asia bi amnu Jihudi rwan le Greek rwan bingna Pukraangba Jisu om chong ngaisu ngaake.
44019011	Rikrwang na Paul om kut pina teithak thaknu tasiatnu chwan pi to ong ngaake.
44019012	Atibriakpina Paul khouna baom rumaan mak tabe bapwan ga naanu khou lou hungluga banaannu kaan bi naanu ga sa ngaake khatle katha kasia rwan ga bani khouna swak tam ngaake.
44019013	Ha taang bi se koi senu Jihudi rwan dwei choinu kasemna Jisu meng panga katha kasia nun khutnu mi rwan lu chung bi rinne, “Ani Paul na kasamnu Jisu meng bina nating kazunne.”
44019014	Jihudi rwan takolu Sceva sa kapaisa pat siarina heiba chwanna to ong ngaake.
44019015	Katha kasia gana katake, “Jisu ding ei theiye, Paul ding le theiye; atiyeda nani tubo?”
44019016	Haba nung bi katha kasia khutnu manpa gana bani lak pi pak khutluga bani ding nam katatluga maanna ngam rwe. Atiga bani haba in bi gana pum tangang pak swak rwe khatle bani liam le liam ngaak rwe.
44019017	Haga Ephesus pi lung ongnu Jihudi rwan le Greek rwan lak pi thei chang thou dam ngaake. Atiga bani lak pi kachinu swak rwe khatle Pukraangba Jisu meng lwat pi lian rwe.
44019018	Habei ga balumsanu mi taswang khak hungluga sung leluga banina to ngaaknu chwan bing rin indao rwe.
44019019	Dwei choinu mi nunna le dwei om chongdip ka lou hungluga khangsung meithaan bi mei thaang sat rwe. Haga banina baman chaknu kaan bi tangka raching somnga man ngaake.
44019020	Haba nung Pukraangba om chong ga ngam lian thou rwe khatle nat thou rwe.
44019021	Haba chwan bing ga loi damnu nung Paul na Macedonia khatle Achaia se takan taluga Jerusalem tangga se lang balungningna baning briakpina rinne, “Ei ha la ga tangluga Rome le phaang lang maang nge.”
44019022	Maanna bating paang thangnu pat ni, Timothy le Erastus ting Macedonia la lang thang rwe. Atiyeda maan bakaan kasem Asia bi nei ngaake.
44019023	Haba kaan bi Pukraangba om Lampui lang bi tasiatnu kasao kabaonu swak ngaak rwe.
44019024	Balangbe tudannu tangka thin sweinu Demetrius tiga kounu gana Diana ri katha bachaluga chwantok mi nun lang siantong tamga baloi ngaake.
44019025	Maanna hapai chwan tonu mi nun ding kou kadoiluga bani khou rinne, “Mi nun ga, heiba chwan paan bina nani lan tamga lousu rwe dinu nanina thei rwe.
44019026	Ephesus pi za makka, Asia taram bing bi Paul na mi nun ding bathemga, bani sung pi lega, kutna bachanu ri bing ga ri nun make diga rin ngaaknu ga nanina mu rwe khatle ngaisu rwe.
44019027	Ani chwan heiya bameng braan ta zanu makka, Asia talei bing khatle talei chung bingna kalum ongnu kaliannu rinu Diana kalum in tangga rin basiatnu khatle balwat braan ta dam lang ani sung tamnu amme.”
44019028	Haga banina ngaisunu kaan bi banina balung pwan takka paoga rinne, “Ephesus rwan om Diana lian kataknuwe.”
44019029	Atiga namlian bing ga kasao kabaonuna sip rwe. Bani mi khang karung riak pi sung khatcha toga pak hung kadoiluga Paul le maan le diga chwanlaang bachamnu baan Macedonia lana hungnu Gaius le Aristarchus ting nam rwe.
44019030	Paul na mi nun khou se nwamnu kaan bi potroi rwanna za mak ngaake.
44019031	Haba nung bi Asia bi kasei kaliannu babaan rwan mi kasemna bakhou mi lang hungluga, bani karung riak pi bating khut mak lang bathem ngaake.
44019032	Atibriakpina mi kasemna chong khat, kateina chong khat tiga pao thou rwe. Balangbe bani karungga kasao kabao rwe. Mi katamna bani pa-aam lang hung karungnubo dinu hakna theilan rwe.
44019033	Banina Alexander ding mi khang lak pina kai swak rwe, balangbe Jihudi rwanna bating meithaan la tun swak ngaake. Alexander na bakut haiga mi nun khou chong kabia lang kakhang ngaake.
44019034	Atiyeda banina maan Jihudi rwanne dinu theinu kaan bi bani khangsungna chakrin kani khak, “Ephesus rwan om Diana na lian kataknuwe” diga pao rwe.
44019035	Namlian om hiakpuba gana bani ding khaamdai taluga rinne, “Ephesus mi rwan ga, heiba Ephesia mi nun om namlian heiya kaliannu rinu Diana katha, Zeus lana baotanu katha kalum in ding ngaaknuwe dinu thei maknu mi tu ambo?
44019036	Atibriakpina ha bing ga zei maknu za mak briakpina nani rim rim dingnuwe khatle kakhan makka khatchale to mako.
44019037	Balangbe ri katha kalum in bi in baruk mi le maknu, ani ri nun ding le rin basiat maknu manpa rwan ding nanina abeiya lou hung rwe.
44019038	Atibriakpina Demetrius le babaan kutthiam mi nun gana mi khat maitwang bi chong amme dabe, chongtok in ga inkhaan lat ongme khatle taleipuba rwan le amme. Bani cham koi impu thang kale ong dam ding ngo.
44019039	Atiyeda nanina katei katei om lang bi chong ngai nwam taknu amme dabe, haga chongsem om karung riak pi kakhan ding gaye.
44019040	Balangbe ani omma balang maaknu, kasao kabaonu riak pina bani ding kouluga chong ngaiza ongnuwa ani bachan sianuwe. Atiga chaang nai makka hung kadoinu om lang bi ani rinnu ngamlaye.”
44019041	Maanna heiya rinluga karung ongnu mi khang ding pi kapaang thang drwe.
44020001	Kasao kabaonu ga lan damnu kaan bi Paul na potroi rwan ding bakhou kou kadoiluga bani ding kapon thangsialuga, haba nung maan Macedonia la thou dam ngaake.
44020002	Atiga maanna haba taram ga serwan hungluga bani ding kachui thangnu chong taswang khak kabia thangsialuga Greek taram la hung rwe.
44020003	Maan habei ga tha thum nei thang ngaake. Atiga maanna Syria la se lang li hwanluga se ding ga ongnu kaan bi Jihudi rwanna bating athat lang tup ngaake. Haba nung bi maan Macedonia serwan hung lat lang baning ngaak rwe.
44020004	Berea la mi Sopater, Aristarchus le Thessalonica rwan Secundus, Derbe lana Gaius, Timothy khatle Asia lana Tychicus le Trophimus bani maan le se bacham ngaake.
44020005	Ha rwan gana se kamaluga Troas pi ani ding ngaak ong ngaake.
44020006	Atiyeda khai sui maknu uilu balou ni nung bi Philippi bina li hwan hungluga ni impaang ni Troas pi bani kim bi hung tang rwe. Habei ga ni siari hungnei ta rwe.
44020007	Maap lak om kamanu lumik pi uilu thiak bak lang potroi rwan hung kadoi rwe. Paul na inswan lampai haba riak pina se swak tam ding briakpina maanna bani khou chong kabialuga inmik kasia tangga meiri rai ngaake.
44020008	Banina ong kadoi ongnu basaang in kaa bi thaomei taswang khak taan thang ngaake.
44020009	Habei ga Eutychus tiga kounu katangpa swan khat inkhaan swan bi badungluga inthi chui tak thou dam ngaake. Maan in nwamnuna khang ngam mak ngaak rwe. Pual na chong kabia bakhwa sei hungnu kaan bi maan in thaak inthum lana bazwantaluga thiga kachung thou ngaak rwe.
44020010	Paul na taluga haba katangpa swan lu chung bi kuntaluga kapon thangga bani khou rinne, “Nani sung riangre mako, balangbe bakhou katha ammaang nge.”
44020011	Habei ga Paul na uilu thiak bakluga sa damnu basaang in la ka lat ngaake khatle bakhwa seiga, khwa baan swaknu tangga chong kabialuga se swak trwe.
44020012	Banina katangpa ding ga ringga kalwang hung rwe khatle bani karo tak ngaak rwe, atiga bani om karonu ga titcha mak ngaak rwe.
44020013	Haba nung bi anina kamaga lipui bina seluga Assos la se rwe, habei ga Paul ding li bina kalwang lang nge. Balangbe maan baraanto ketna se lang to ong ngaake.
44020014	Maanna Assos pi ani ding kadounu kaan bi anina bating li bina kalwangluga Mitylene la se rwe.
44020015	Ani habei gana li hwan hung rwe atiluga inswan lampai Chios tuikoi ram le mai pon kadounu riak pi hung rwe. Inswan lampai Samos tuikoi ram bi hung tang rwe khatle Trogyllium bi hungnei rwe. Inswan lampaina Miletus namlian bi hung rwe.
44020016	Balangbe Paul na Asia bi ongsei mak langna, Ephesus takan swakluga li hwan thou dam lang sung han ngaake. Balangbe maan zaye dabe Pentecost lumik pi Jerusalem bi ong lang barapka se ngaake.
44020017	Paul na Miletus pina Ephesus la mi bathanluga rupkathan om chwan phunnu rwan ding kou rwe.
44020018	Banina bakhou hungnu kaan bi maanna bani khou rinne, “Eina Asia bi hung tang khap tinu lumik pi gana thouga ei nani le diga tatonu gong bi ong ngaakpo dinu nanina theiye.
44020019	Ei talu taga khatle mikthi taswang khak tanu le bachamga Pukraangba om chwanlaang to rwe. Jihudi rwanna tupka ating tamphaang ngaake.
44020020	Nani lang kana dingnu khatchale eina khaak thang make. Atiyeda nani khou rin indao thang damme khatle inkhun bing bi khutluga nani ding mi bing meithaan bi bachu thang damme.
44020021	Eina Jihudi rwan khou le Greek rwan khou le Rikrwang khou sung lenu khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou balumsanu lang bi sake pi rwe.
44020022	“Phaang ngo, atun ating Katha Bathiangnuna Jerusalem la se lang bathou ongme. Hala ga akhou pa-aam swaklu dingbo dinu ei thei make.
44020023	Heiza be eina theiye dinuba qwan in khatle riangrenuna ating ong ngaak ongme dinu Katha Bathiangnuna namlian bing bi akhou pi thei thang nge.
44020024	Atiyeda kabia ongnu lang bingna ating pi kaling make, eina akum ding kungga baning make. Eina achwan don ga karoga loi thang lang khatle Rikrwang om phaangkriang sacham om sake pi lang eina Pukraangba Jisu khouna lousunu chwanlaang to ongnuwe.
44020025	Batak takka eina Rikrwang om krwang talei sacham ga nani lak pi sechangluga kasam thang ngaak rwe. Phaang ngo, nani aman mu lat pila rwe.
44020026	Atibriakpina mi nun thi om koi akhou maake dinu eina aniya nani khou sake tonuwe.
44020027	Balangbe Rikrwang na baningnu bing ga eina nani khou khaaknu to makka indao thang rwe.
44020028	Atibriakpina nani nun khatle zao nun lang barak theiyo, bani ding ga phaang thang lang Katha Bathiangnu bi bani ding phaangsin thangnu mi nun to lang hap thang rwe. Bathina kalei thang damnu Rikrwang om rupkathan ding ga sian thang ngo.
44020029	Balangbe ei thou damnu nung sa maknu tangiya nun nani lak pi hunglu rwe dinu ei theiye. Zao nun ding ga khaak thanglaye.
44020030	Atiga nani cham lak pina le mi nunna potroi rwan ding bani lang kai lang swak lang ka maknu chong kabianu mi nun nani khouna swaklu rwe.
44020031	Atibriakpina nani barak theiyo. Ei sangwan thum zingpha thamlai thei makka mikthi taga khangsung khou lannu maakka cheksin lang bachu thang damnu ga nani baningsuwo.
44020032	“Unao rwan ga, atun eina nani ding Rikrwang khou khatle Baphaangkriang chong bi bachoi thang rwe. Haba chong gana nani ding bacha thou lang khatle to bathiang thang damnu mi nunna lousu dingnu dam ga lousunu ngam lang nge.
44020033	Ei pakhatcha om kachaak tangka mak tabe sin basoi khatchale lou nwam make.
44020034	Akut heiyana alaang khatle ei le diga chwanlaang bachamnu bing lang bathaang amnu ga pi thang rwe dinu nanina theiye.
44020035	Eina atiga chwan toluga balang bing bi nani khou pi mu thang rwe. Dinuba nanina le kasonnu nun ding paang thang lang nge. Atiga Pukraangba Jisu na rin damnu, ‘Lousunu ma pi swaknuna aih saye’ dinu ga nani baningsuwo.”
44020036	Maanna haga rinnu nung, maan kekhok deluga maan le diga khangsung kalum bacham rwe.
44020037	Haba nung bi bani khangsung chap barung hingga chap rwe khatle banina Paul ding baring photluga kaput rwe.
44020038	Maanna baman mu lat pila rwe diga rin briakpina bani sung riangre tak ngaak rwe. Atiga banina bating lipui bi tangga katha swak thang rwe.
44021001	Ani bani khouna kapaangnu nung, lipui twangluga sechuk chukka se hungluga tuikoi ram Cos pi hung tang rwe. Inswan lampaina Rhodes pi khatle habeina Patara bi hung rwe.
44021002	Habei ga Phoenicia la se dingnu lipui am ngaakka, ani habei ga twangluga se rwe.
44021003	Anina Cyprus hungmunu kaan bi imbei pek la setakanluga Syria pek la li hwan hung rwe, atiga ani Tyre bi ta rwe. Balangbe habei ga li pot louta lang am briakpi naye.
44021004	Habei ga anina potroi rwan ding kadouluga ni siari neita ngaake. Banina Katha Bathiangnu paan bina Paul ding Jerusalem la se mak lang rin rwe.
44021005	Atiga ani lang bakaan ga maak hungnu kaan bi ani kapaangluga ani lampui la se lat rwe. Banina bani mei sa rwan le diga namlian ga sekhan mak basaan ani ding katha swak rwe. Atiga anina tuipui paan bi kekhok detaluga kalum ngaake.
44021006	Habei ga anina bani ding kapaangnu nung ani li hwan lat rwe, atiga bani le in han lat rwe.
44021007	Ani nun Tyre bina tuipui lamsek ka loinu kaan bi Ptolemais namlian bi hung tang rwe, habei ga unao rwan ding kalumluga ni khat riak ta rwe.
44021008	Inswan lampai Paul le diga kapaangluga ani Caesarea bi hung rwe. Atiga pat siari lak pi evangelist Philip in bi khutluga maan le riak bacham rwe.
44021009	Heiba manpa sa reizuni pat bali am ngaake. Bani ri chong rin swaknu karwak ngaake.
44021010	Ani habei ga lumik kasem nei ongnu kaan bi Agabus tiga kounu tudannu thiamting pakhat Judea lana ta rwe.
44021011	Maanna ani khou hungnu kaan bi Paul om kongkhaak louluga hagana bakut bake krakluga rinne, “Katha Bathiangnuna rinne, ‘Heiba kongkhaakpuba ding ga Jerusalem bi Jihudi rwanna karakluga Gentile rwan khou pi swaklu rwe.’ ”
44021012	Heiba chong bing nga anina ngaisunu kaan bi ani le diga habei ga ongnu mi nunna bating Jerusalem la se mak lang bathem ngaake.
44021013	Habei ga Paul na katake, “Nanina chapka asung to katop ongnubo? Balangbe atiga krak lang za makka Pukraangba Jisu meng lang Jerusalem la thi lang tangga ei daan ong rwe.”
44021014	Anina bating bathemnu ga maan za maknu kaan bi anina haga “Pukraangba na baningnu to dingro” diga rin rwe.
44021015	Haba nung bi ani pot bachaluga Jerusalem la ka ngaake.
44021016	Ani le diga Caesarea lana hungnu potroi rwan kasem le ani le se bacham ngaake. Banina ani ding meithaan potroi to ngaaknu Cyprus rwan Mnason in bi kalwang khut thangluga riak rwe.
44021017	Anina Jerusalem bi hung tangnu kaan bi unao rwanna ani ding karoga loukhut thang rwe.
44021018	Inswan lampai Paul ani le diga James ting kadou lang hung rwe. Habei ga chwan phunnu rwan bingle ong ngaake.
44021019	Paul na bani ding kalumnu nung chwan tonu sung bi Rikrwang na Gentile nun lak pi to thang ngaaknu bing ga katupka bani khou rin thang rwe.
44021020	Banina haga ngaisunu kaan bi Pukraangba lwat indaoga bakhou rinne, “Unao, nangna munuga hei rwe, Jihudi rwan lak pi balumsanu mi raching raching amme. Bani khangsung Moses om chongtan bi sung khut ongme.
44021021	Atiyeda nalang bi banina thei rwe dinuba, nangna Gentile rwan lak pi amnu Jihudi rwan khou bani sa rwan ding mun rom mako diga Moses chongtan mak tabe zek nung se mak lang bachu thang rwe.
44021022	Ati dabe into langbo? Balangbe nang hung rwe dinu banina ngaisuwe dabe bani soi makka hung karunglu zung rwe.
44021023	Atibriakpina anina nakhou rin ongnu heiya nang to thang ngo. Ani lak pi bazanna chong karennu mi pat bali am rwe.
44021024	Haba manpa rwan ding ga kalwang seluga nang le diga pum to bathiang sero. Atiluga bani lu bwat lang sian nangna pi thangbiyo. Atiye dabe nalang bi banina theinu bing ga khatchale make atiyeda nang bazega han ongme khatle nazanna chongtan ga zei ongme dinu mi nunna thei lang nge.
44021025	Atiyeda balumsanu Gentile rwan khou ri lang kat thangnu pot sanu, thi sanu, karek thatnu zan sanu, lungmaannu, hei bing bina namlaaga ong lang khatle katei bing ga zei mak lang anina kathuiluga bani khou chong ga hiak trwe.”
44021026	Haba nung bi Paul na haba manpa rwan ding inswan lampai kalwangluga bani pum to bathiangluga kalum in bi khut rwe. Haga to bathiangnu ni ga loi rwe dinu indao lang nge. Haba kaan bi ga bani pakhat khat lang potkat kat thang lang nge.
44021027	Ni siari tang lang nai hungnu kaan bi Asia lana hungnu Jihudi rwanna Paul ding kalum in bi mu rwe khatle mi nun ding bathou thangluga bating namluga
44021028	pao rwe, “Israel mi nun ga, ani ding paang thang ngo, heiya bariak thin mi nun ding, chongtan ding khatle heiba riak om maitwang bi bachu thangsianu manpa ga rwe. Haza makka maanna Greek rwan ding le kalum in bi kalwang khutluga bathiangnu riak ting to tanaat rwe.”
44021029	Balangbe meithaan bani le diga Ephesus lana hungnu Trophimus ting namlian sung bi mu ngaake. Atiga bating Paul na kalum in bi kalwang khute diga banina baning ngaake.
44021030	Atiga namlian bi ga kasao kabao thou rwe khatle mi nun pak hung kadoiluga Paul ding nam rwe. Atiga bating langkaang la kai swakluga kalum in inkhaan ga barapka khaan drwe.
44021031	Banina Paul ding athat lang zong ongnu kaan bi Jerusalem bi kasao kabaonu swak rwe dinu kraan milu khou cham ga thei hung ngaak rwe.
44021032	Kraan milu gana barapka kraanmi rwan khatle kraanmi razapuba rwan ding kalwangluga bani khou pakta rwe. Banina kraan milu khatle kraanmi rwan ding munu kaan bi Paul ding bwei ongnu ga lan drwe.
44021033	Haba nung bi kraan milu gana hungluga Paul ding nam rwe, atiga bating parei rui kanina bang lang kraan milu gana zathang pi rwe. Maanna, “Nang tubo, pa-aam to ba dabo?” diga ngai rwe.
44021034	Habei ga mi khang lak pi kasemna chong khat atiluga katei rwanna chong khat kabia rwe. Atiga kasao kabao ong briakpina bazenu ga paaambo dinu thei maknu kaan bi maanna Paul ding kraan mi nun ongnu riak la kalwang hung lang zathang pi rwe.
44021035	Paul na kalaak ka hung tangnu kaan bi mi khangna kasao kabao briakpina kraanmi nunna bating pon thouluga se rwe.
44021036	Balangbe mi khangna bani ding suizonga, “Bating athat sat tammo” diga pao ong ngaake.
44021037	Bating kraanmi nun ongnu riak la kalwang khutnu kaan bi Paul na kraan milu khou rinne, “Eina nakhou chong kasem kabianu zabo?” Habei ga maanna rinne, “Nang Greek chong theibo?
44021038	Ati dabe bakaan kasem meithaan la kraan laang thouluga mi athatnu manpa rwan mi raching bali ding kalwang se ngaaknu Egypt rwan pa ga nang makpo?”
44021039	Paul na rinne, “Eiba Cilicia bi Tarsus om Jihudi zwe, bakung tonu namlian om khulungsa zwe. Eina mi nun khou chong kabia lang nangna za thang ngo diga hweiye.”
44021040	Atiga maanna chong kabia lang bating za thangnu kaan bi Paul na kalaak pi thou hanluga mi nun khou bakut hai rwe. Habei ga mi nun ga rim rim ta damnu kaan bi maanna bani khou Hebrew chong la rin thou rwe,
44022001	“Unao rwan khatle pu pa rwan ga, atun nani meithaan bi eina kakhangnu chong nga ngai thang ngo.”
44022002	Maanna bani khou Hebrew chong la kabianu ga ngaisunu kaan bi bani inkuga thiap thiap ta rwe.
44022003	Maanna rinne, “Ei Cilicia taram om Tarsus namlian bi ponnu khatle haba namlian bi lian thounu Jihudi rwanne. Gamaliel kim bi ani pu pa rwan om chongtan ga bachu thounu, haga choitipka choinuwe khatle nanina aniya to ongnu danga Rikrwang khou asung thang ngaake.
44022004	“Heiba Lampui bi senu nun ding eina railuga athat ngaake. Kapaisa kamaisa rwan ding karakluga qwan in bi le thang ngaake.
44022005	Hei lang biya takolu khatle patso rwan om thampeina aom sake rwe. Eina unao rwan khou pi lang chamthwan bani khouna louluga Damascus la se ngaake. Bani ding parei ruina bangluga bani ding Jerusalem la laak lang kalwang hung lang se ngaake.
44022006	“Lumik badingnu phei bi ei Damascus tang lang nai hungnu kaan bi thei mak daakka tambaan lana babaan khat taluga ating baan qwat thang ngaake.
44022007	Habei ga ei talei bi bazwanta rwe khatle khwan khatna akhou atiga rinnu ngaisu rwe, ‘Saul, Saul, nang pa-aam lang Ating rai ongnubo?’
44022008	Habei ga eina katake, ‘Pukraangba, Nang tubo?’ Maanna akhou rinne, ‘Ei nangna rai ongnu Nazareth Jisu we.’
44022009	Ei le diga ong bachamnu nunna le batak takka baannu ga mu ngaake atiga bani kachi tak ngaak rwe. Atiyeda akhou chong kabianu gabe bani ngaisu mak ngaake.
44022010	Eina ngai rwe, ‘Pukraangba, ei pa-aam to langbo?’ Pukraangba na akhou rinne, ‘Thouluga Damascus la khutro, habei ga nangna to lang han thang damnu chwan bing ga nakhou rin thanglune.’
44022011	Atiga kanatnu babaan gana amik mulanruga ei le se bachamnu rwan gana akut kailuga Damascus pi khut rwe.
44022012	“Habei ga ongnu Jihudi rwan bingna rin chuiga rinnu khatle chongtan nung suiga senu Ananias tiga kounu pakhat am ngaake.
44022013	Maanna ameithaan bi hung hanluga rinne, ‘Unao Saul, nang namik mu lat tingro.’ Haba kahan bi ga ei bating phaangmu ngaake.
44022014	Maanna rinne, ‘Ani pu pa rwan om Rikrwang na Maanna baningnu ga thei lang Bazenu Bating ga mu dam lang khatle Bakhwan ga ngaisu lang nating kathang swak rwe.
44022015	Balangbe nangna mu damnu khatle ngaisu damnu bing ga mi nun khou sake to lang nge.
44022016	Atun nang pa-aam ding ngaak ongnubo? Thouro, baptize toro khatle nanoh kasin bathiangro khatle Pukraangba meng ding kouro’ diga rin ngaake.
44022017	“Eina Jerusalem la han hung latluga kalum in bi kalum ongnu kaan bi ei trance se ngaake
44022018	khatle ei Jisu ding mu rwe, Maanna akhou rinne, ‘Barapro, Jerusalem bina barapka swak tro, balangbe Alang bi naom sake banina lou thanglaye.’
44022019	“Eina rinne, ‘Pukraangba, synagogue bing bi Nating balumsanu mi nun ding eina qwan in bi thang ngaaknu khatle bwei ngaaknu ga banina thei rwe.
44022020	Pukraangba om sake langna Stephen thi tanu kaan bi eina bating athatnu nun ding za ngaaknu khatle mi athatnu nun om pwan ngaaknu to ngaak rwe.’
44022021	Haba nung bi Pukraangba na akhou rinne, ‘Sero, balangbe Eina nating Gentile rwan khou lang thangne.’ ”
44022022	Bani khangsungna bachong ga ngai ong ngaake. Haba nung bi banina baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Talei ram bina heiba manpa ding nga athat sat tammo, balangbe maan ring lang khopnu mi lan rwe.”
44022023	Haba nung bi banina paoga bani pwan kachang reluga basaang la tambut bwan ka rwe.
44022024	Habei ga kraan milu gana bating kraanmi nun ongnu riak la kalwang hung lang chongtan pi rwe. Atiga mi nunna bamaitwang bi heitia pao ongnu ga pa-aam tonu lang binabo dinu thei lang bating railuga chong ak lang rin rwe.
44022025	Atiga banina bating zan mun ruina bang rwe, habei ga Paul na bakim bi han ongnu kraanmi razapuba khou rinne, “Rome rwan mi pakhat ting chong to makka bweinu zagabo?”
44022026	Haga kraanmi razapuba gana ngaisunu kaan bi maanna kraan milu khou seluga rinne, “Nangna tonu chwan ga cheksinno, balangbe manpa heiya Rome talei mi zung nge.”
44022027	Haba nung bi kraan milu gana hungluga bakhou rinne, “Akhou rinno, nang Rome rwanbo?” Maanna “O,” diga katak rwe.
44022028	Kraan milu gana katake, “Eiba sian taswang khak pi luga Rome rwan mi tonuwe.” Paul na katake, “Atiyeda eiba Rome mi toga ponnuwe.”
44022029	Haba nung bi bating tamphaang dingnu mi nun ga bakhouna impaan thou drwe. Atiga Paul Rome mi ye dinu theiluga kraan milu ga kachi rwe, balangbe maanna Paul ding karak ngaake.
44022030	Inswan lampai Jihudi rwanna bating tatoga koi impu thangnubo dinu bathiangga thei lang bating bang thang ong bina bathan thang rwe. Maanna takopuba rwan le thampei rwan karung lang zathang pi ngaake, atiga Paul ding phun hungluga bani meithaan bi pi han rwe.
44023001	Haba nung bi Paul na thampei rwan khou phaang dengga phaangluga rinne, “Manpa rwan khatle unao rwan bing ga, ei aniya tangga Rikrwang meithaan bi akum bi kasanu ding theiga lung ongme.”
44023002	Habei ga takolu Ananias na bakim bi han ongnu nun khou Paul ding bamun bi bweiyo diga zathang pi rwe.
44023003	Habei ga Paul na bakhou rinne, “He wai teingounu imbaang, nating Rikrwang na bweilu rwe. Balangbe nangna chongtan nung suiga ating chongsem riak pi badung rwe. Atiga chongtan om kabat kabaangnu bi ating bweiyo diga nangna zathang pinubo?”
44023004	Habei ga han ongnu mi nunna rinne, “Rikrwang om takolu ding nangna atiga tweinubo?”
44023005	Habei ga Paul na rinne, “Unao rwan ga, ei bating takoluwe dinu thei make. Balangbe atiga hiak thangluga amme, ‘Nangna nani om bapuba ding rin basiat sa make.’ ”
44023006	Atiyeda bani kasemna Sadducee rwan, kasemna Pharisee rwanne dinu Paul na theiluga maanna thampei rwan meithaan bi paoga rinne, “Manpa rwan khatle unao rwan ga, ei Pharisee, Pharisee sa kapaisa zung nge, thinu nunna ring thou latnu khatle haba om balumsat lang bi ating chongsem ongnuwe.”
44023007	Maanna haga rinnu kaan bi Pharisee rwan le Sadducee rwan lak pi kae kale thou rwe. Atiga mi nun ga balang kani swak rwe.
44023008	Balangbe Sadducee rwanna ring thou latnu, tambaan chonglang khatle katha maake diga rinne. Atiyeda Pharisee rwannabe ha bing ga amme diga balumsaye.
44023009	Haba nung bi bani pao kale thou rwe. Atiga Pharisee rwan pek la hannu chongtan bachuthangnu rwanna han thouluga rakanga kae kaleluga rinne, “Heiba manpa khou ani kasianu dou make. Atiyeda bakhou katha na mak tabe tambaan chonglangna kabia thangnu ngaake dabe, ani Rikrwang maitwang bi katwak kale makcho.”
44023010	Kae kalenu ga rakan thounu kaan bi Paul ding mi nunna kaichat katup tamnu zaye diga kachi briakpina kraan milu gana bami nun ding lang thangluga Paul ding bani khouna kai swakluga kraanmi nun ongnu riak la kalwang hung lang zathang pi thang rwe.
44023011	“Atiyeda inswan lampai zingpha Pukraangba na bakim bi hung hanluga bakhou rinne, ‘Paul, nang lozaang sawo, nangna Jerusalem bi Alang bi sake to damnu ga danga nang Rome rwan meithaan bi le Aom sake to lang rwe.’ ”
44023012	Louthwan khwan baan swaknu kaan bi Jihudi rwan mi kasemna chong kathuiluga banina Paul ding athat mak basaan bani khatchale sa in mak lang diga sengga karen thang ngaake.
44023013	Atiga tup ong ngaaknu nun ga mi sombali katei ngaake.
44023014	Banina takopuba rwan khatle chwan phunnu rwan kim bi hungluga rinne, “Ani Paul ding athat mak basaan khatchale sa in mak lang sengga chong karen rwe.
44023015	Atibriakpina inswan balang bi inkuga zong lang danga Paul ding nani khou kalwang hung lang nani nun le thampeina kraan milu khou rinro. Atiga maan abeiya hung tang mak balei anina bating athat lang daan ong rwe.”
44023016	Paul basannuna ponnu sa kapaisana bani daan ongnu ga ngaisuluga kraanmi nun ongnu riak pi khutluga Paul khou pu rwe.
44023017	Haba nung Paul na kraanmi razapuba khat ting kouluga rinne, “Heiba katangpa ding nga kraan milu khou pi hung thang ngo, maan bakhou chong kasem rin lang amme.”
44023018	Maanna bating kraan milu khou kalwang hungluga rin rwe, “Qwan in mi Paul na ating kou hungluga heiba katangpa ding nga nakhou kalwang hung lang rin rwe. Maan nakhou chong rin lang amme.”
44023019	Haba nung bi kraan milu gana bating bakut kailuga kalwang tei swak rwe. Atiga inthimthwei toga bakhou ngai rwe, “Nangna akhou rin nwamnu ga pa-aambo?”
44023020	Maanna rinne, “Jihudi rwanna inswan thampei meithaan bi Paul ding banina inkuga balang bi chong ngai dingnu danga kalwang hung lang nakhou rin lang diga sung cham drwe.
44023021	Atibriakpina nang bani chong ga za thang mako. Balangbe bani manpa rwan pat sombali kateina Paul ding athat lang tup ongme. Banina Paul ding athat mak basaan bani khatchale sa in mak lang sengga karen drwe. Bani atun daan ong rwe khatle naom chongren za ding bani ngaak ongme.”
44023022	Kraan milu gana katangpa khou, “Nang heiba chong nga akhou rin thang drwe diga pakhatcha khou hakna rin swak mako” diga zathang pi luga bating bathan sat trwe.
44023023	Maanna kraanmi razapuba rwan lak pina pat ni ding kouluga rinne, “Caesarea la se lang kraanmi raza ni, raqwan twangnu kraanmi somsiari khatle sung choinu kraanmi raza ni daanro. Atiga chakrin inthum bi se lang nge.
44023024	Paul ding khouring chung bi pi twangluga khatchale khamnamnu to makka taleipuba Felix khou tang lang to lang nge.”
44023025	Maanna chamthwan khat hei danga hiak rwe,
44023026	“Claodius Lysias eina, ngam liannu taleipuba Felix ting kalumme.
44023027	Heiba manpa ding nga Jihudi rwanna namluga athat lang titcha ngaak rwe. Maan Rome mi zung nge dinu thei briakpina eina kraanmi nun le diga hungluga bating kan thang rwe.
44023028	Banina bating impu thangnu ga thei bathiang nwamga eina bani om thampei meithaan bi kalwang hung ngaake.
44023029	Eina thei rwe dinuba banina bating koi impu thangnu ga bani om chongtan om tangai lang bi bathiangga thei nwam ngaake. Atiga bating athat lang mak tabe bang thang lang khopnu koi khatchale dou make.
44023030	Jihudi rwanna heiba manpa ding nga chwan ong rwe dinu akhou thei hung briakpina eina bating barapka nakhou bathan hungnu rwe. Atiga bating koi impu thangnu nunna balu chung bi tanut amnu nun ga nameithaan bi banina rin lang eina bani ding zathang pi damnuwe. Donsanu towo.”
44023031	Haba nung bi kraanmi rwan khou zathang pi thangnu nung suiga Paul ding zingpha Antipatris namlian bi kalwang hung rwe.
44023032	Atiyeda inswan lampai raqwan twangnu mi nun khou Paul ding kalwang se lang sin thang sialuga kraanmi rwan ga bani riak la han lat trwe.
44023033	Banina Caesarea bi hungluga chamthwan ga taleipuba khou pinu kaan bi Paul ding le bakhou bachoi thang rwe.
44023034	Taleipuba gana chamthwan ga paluga maan impei talei lanabo diga ngai rwe. Maanna Paul ga Cilicia la naye dinu theinu kaan bi
44023035	bakhou rinne, “Nating koi impu thangnu nun ga hungnu kaan bi ei nakhou chong ngaide.” Atiga bating Herod krwang in bi rangkaan thangluga thang lang zathang pi rwe.
44024001	Ni impaang nung bi takolu Ananias na chwan phunnu rwan le Tartullus tiga kounu chong kabia theinu tudannu pakhat ting kalwangluga hung rwe. Atiga banina Paul maitwang bi taleipuba khou sake pi ngaake.
44024002	Banina Paul ding koukhutnu kaan bi Tartullus na bating koi impu thangga rin rwe, “Anina napaan bina bakaan seiga dai bazaang ga ong hung nge khatle nangna phaangkhut thangnu paan bina heiba chaat piya baning su zanu chwan taswang khak to thang rwe.
44024003	Anina takung tazei to ongnu Felix, bakaan bathin khatle bariak bathin anina swankanule bachamga heiya za rwe.
44024004	Atiyeda takhwang to lang khopnu bapuba ding bakhwa seiga to katop mak langna kriang thangga ani chong kasem ngai thang lang hweiye.
44024005	“Balangbe manpa heiya to tum to braannu phun hungnu, talei ram bi amnu Jihudi rwan lak pi kraan saraan pi swaknu khatle Nazareth kraanmi rwan om milu we dinu anina thei rwe.
44024006	Maanna kalum in ding tangga to tanaat briakpina anina bating chongsem nung suiga chong to lang bathaiga bating namnu rwe.
44024007	Atiyeda kraan milu Lysias na hungluga bating ani kut pina ngamsam samga kasut tam ngaake.
44024008	Bating koiye dinu rwan ding nakhou hung lang zathang pi ngaake. Anina bakhou koi impu thang ongnu bing nga nangna bakhou ngaiye dabe ha bing ga bakhouna theilune.”
44024009	Atiga rin ongnu chong bing nga bazeye dinu Jihudi rwan bingna le chong bacham rwe.
44024010	Haba nung bi taleipuba na Paul ding chong kabia lang balu hai rwe. Haba kaan bi maanna katake, “Bapubana bakaan bakhwa seiga heiba chaat om chongsempuba to ongnu eina thei briakpina, eina kakhangnu chong nga karoga kataknuwe.
44024011	Ei Jerusalem la Ri kalum lang senu ni somga kani bina hen mak aang nge dinu nangna bathiangga thei thang nge.
44024012	Bani ei le diga kalum in bi khatchale kae kanaanu mak tabe eina mi nun ding chong laa pi swaknu synagogue pi mak tabe namlian sung bi kadou dam make.
44024013	Banina ating koi impu thangnu bing nga bani rin bachak lang amlaye.
44024014	Atiyeda eina nakhou rin indao thangnuwe, hagazo banina khok langnu mi nunne diga rinnu ‘Lampui bi’ eina sega, apu apa rwan om Rikrwang ding kalumme. Moses om chongtan ding khatle thiamting rwan om chongdip pi hiak thangnu ding ga eina balumsaye.
44024015	Atiga banina balumsanu danga, eina le kasanu mi ngaakle kasianu mi ngaakle thi bina ring thou latlune dinu Rikrwang khou ei balumsaye.
44024016	Haba lang bi ei bakaan bathin Rikrwang khatle mi nun meithaan bi koi maan chwan to mak lang karam ongme.
44024017	“Sangwan taswang khak nung la eina achaat om lungsianu mi nun khou paangsun khatle potkat phunluga hung ngaake.
44024018	Eina to dingnu achwan toga apum to bathiangnu chwan to ongnu kaan bi banina ating kalum in bi kadou ngaake. Habei ga akim bi mi khang le ong make, kae kanaanu le maake.
44024019	Banina akhou koi impu thang dingnu amme dabe heiba riak pi nameithaan bi hanluga ating koi impu thang ngaak tingnuwe.
44024020	Mak tabe heiba riak pi ongnu nunna le thampei in meithaan bi han ong bi banina aom koi zongsuwe dabe rin swak ting ngo.
44024021	‘Thinu nunna ring thou latnu lang bi aniya ei bani meithaan bi chong kasem ongnuwe’ dinu khwan za be eina bani lak pi hanluga pao damme.”
44024022	Haba kahan bi Felix na Lampui om lang bi thei bathiangga theiluga, “Chongsem ga kraan milu Lysias na tanu kaan bi nani chong ga eina kasem thangne” diga rinluga chongtok ka lumik kai inkhin thang rwe khatle mi nun ding pi kapaang thang drwe.
44024023	Atiga maanna kraanmi razapuba khou Paul ding rangkaan bi thang lang atiyeda kasem barang to dam lang khatle balaang babaan rwan khouna chwanlaang to thang dingnu amme dabe bating khaam mako diga zathang pi thang rwe.
44024024	Lumik kasem Felix na bamei Jihudi rwan Drusilla le diga hungnu kaan bi Paul ding pi kouluga Christa khou balumsanu lang bi bakhou chong ngai rwe.
44024025	Atiga maanna ririak senu lang bi, bazanna bazan ding raaknu lang bi khatle hung dingnu chongsem om lang bi kakhannu kaan bi maan kachi rwe khatle atiga katak rwe, “Atunbe nang sero, alaang badou chanu kadou latnu kaan bi eina nating kou hunglune.”
44024026	Haba kaan bi ga Paul na bating bathan thang lang sian pi lune diga maanna baning ngaake. Atibriakpina maanna bating kou hung katupluga maan le diga meiri rai ngaake.
44024027	Atiyeda sangwan ni nung bi Felix hut Porcius Festus na paan lat rwe khatle Felix na Jihudi rwan ding pi karonu bathai briakpina Paul ding bathan makka qwan in bi thang ngaake.
44025001	Festus na baom chwan ga hungphunnu ni thum nung bi maan Caesarea bina Jerusalem la ka ngaake.
44025002	Habei ga takolu khatle Jihudi rwan om kai thangnu rwanna Paul maitwang bi chong kat thang rwe.
44025003	Atiga banina bani ding kriang thangga Paul ding Jerusalem la kou hung lang rin rwe, balangbe banina Paul ding lampui bi athat lang chwan ong ngaake.
44025004	Atiyeda Festus na Paul ding Caesarea la lang thang lang zung nge, maan bahak le ha la ga barapka hung lang amme diga katak rwe.
44025005	Maanna rinne, “Atibriakpina nani om milu nun ga ei le diga se bacham ding ngo khatle haba manpa gana kakoinu chwan tonu am ngaake dabe bakhou koi impu thang ding ngo.”
44025006	Maan bani lak pi ni som katei neitanu nung Caesarea la ta drwe. Inswan lampai maan chongsem kaong riak pi badungluga Paul ding bakhou kalwang hung lang zathang pi rwe.
44025007	Paul na hungnu kaan bi Jerusalem lana hungnu Jihudi rwanna bating han qwatluga sake pinu ngam maknu karit karitnu impu thangnu chong Paul lu chung bi badan thang rwe.
44025008	Habei ga Paul na kakhangga rinne, “Jihudi rwan om chongtan maitwang bi ngaakle, kalum in om maitwang bi ngaakle khatle Caesar maitwang bi ngaakle ei ka maknu chwan to make.”
44025009	Atiyeda Festus na Jihudi rwan ding pi karo langna Paul khou rinne, “Nang Jerusalem la hungluga hei lang bi ameithaan bi chong kasemnu bathaibo?”
44025010	Habei ga Paul na rinne, “Ei Caesar om chongsem meithaan bi han ongme, habei ga ating chong kasem lang nge. Jihudi rwan khou eina sa maknu chwan to thangnu maake dinu nangna bathiangga theiye.
44025011	Balangbe eina kakoinu chwan khatle thi lang khopnu chwan to ngaaknuwe dabe, ei thi lang za maknu to make. Atiyeda mi nunna alu chung bi koi impu thang ongnu bing ga bazenu khatchale mak ngaake dabe, pakhatchanale ating bani khou pi swaknu ngam make. Eina Caesar khou heiba chong nga kat thangnuwe.”
44025012	Haba nung bi Festus na baom thampei rwan le diga kathuiluga bakhou rinne, “Nangna Caesar khou chong kat thangnu nung suiga, nang Caesar khou se lang rwe.”
44025013	Lumik kasem nung bi krwang Agrippa le Bernice na Caesarea bi Festus ting kadou lang hung ngaake.
44025014	Habei ga bani nun bakhwa seiga ong bacham ongnu kaan bi Festus na Paul om chong ga krwang meithaan bi phun swakluga rinne, “Felix na qwan in bi thang ngaaknu tudannu manpa khat amme.
44025015	Eina Jerusalem bi ongnu kaan bi haba manpa lang bi takopuba rwan khatle Jihudi rwan om patso rwanna chong phun thangluga bating chong kasem thang lang akhou ni ngaake.
44025016	Eina bani khou atiga katak rwe ‘Koinu maan gana koi impu thangnu mi nun ga le maitwang kalega balu chung bi ta thangnu chong langna bating kakhang lang badou chanu phang mak balei haba mi ding pi swaknu dinu heiya Rome rwan om chaang make.’
44025017	Atibriakpina banina bakhwa sei maknu nung hung kadoinu kaan bi inswan lampai eina chongsem riak pi badungluga haba manpa ding ga kalwang hung lang zathang pi rwe.
44025018	Bakhou koi impu thangnu nunna han thounu kaan bi eina baning ong ngaaknu danga banina kasianu chong khatchale phun swak make.
44025019	Atiyeda bani bahak om ririak om lang bi khatle ring ongme diga Paul na tipka hannu Jisu kounu thi damnu Mi khat om lang bi baom maitwang bi tangai kasem am ngaake.
44025020	Atiga heiba tangai lang bi eina thei bathiang mak briakpina maan Jerusalem la seluga hei lang bi chong kasemnu bathaibo diga ngai ngaake.
44025021	Atiyeda Augustus na baom chonghan ga lou thang lang hweininu kaan bi Caesar khou bathan thangza mak basaan bating rangkaan thangluga ngaak thang lang eina zathang pi ngaake.”
44025022	Haba nung bi Agrippa na Festus khou rinne, “Ei heiba manpa chong nga ei bahak ngai nwamme.” Festus na rinne, “Inswan nang bachong ga ngai lang rwe.”
44025023	Inswan lampai Agrippa le Bernice na kraan milu rwan le namlian om milu nun le diga kasan hingga karung riak pi hung rwe. Habei ga Festus om zathang nung suiga Paul ding kalwang hung rwe.
44025024	Festus na rinne, “Krwang Agrippa khatle abeiya hung ongnu kapaisa rwan bing ga, nanina heiba manpa ding nga mu rwe. Heiba manpa om lang bi maan ring lang khopnu mi lan rwe diga paoga Jerusalem khatle abeiya ongnu Jihudi rwanna akhou chong impu thang rwe.
44025025	Atiyeda eina baom koi maan lang bi zongnu kaan bi maan thi lang khopnu koi bakhou maake dinu ei thei rwe. Atiga maanna Augustus khou chong phun thang briakpina eina bating lang thang lang asung han rwe.
44025026	Balang bi aom bapuba khou eina inkuga hiak lang maake. Atibriakpina eina bating nameithaan bi, bakung toga krwang Agrippa khou phun hungnu rwe. Bakhou ngai minga ngailuga haba nung bi eina hiak tingnu ga hiak lang nge.
44025027	Balangbe qwan in mi khat ting chong to lang lang thangnu kaan bi balu chung bi impu thangnu baom koi ga pi thei maknu dinuwa baze maknuwe diga eina baning nge.”
44026001	Habei ga Agrippa na Paul khou rinne, “Nalang bi kabia lang nating za thang rwe.” Habei ga Paul na bakut balaan swakluga balang bi kakhangga
44026002	rinne, “Krwang Agrippa, Jihudi rwanna alu chung bi impu thangnu heiza lang bi eina aniya nameithaan bi katak tingnuwa alaang aih sanuwe diga baning nge.
44026003	Balangbe Jihudi rwan om chaang khatle kakungnu tangai om lang bi nangna inkuga thei thang nge. Atibriakpina achong nga khaang theiga ngai thang lang eina hweiye.
44026004	“Atibriakpina kama bi ei babwa toga achaat lak pi khatle Jerusalem bi toga lung thounu ga Jihudi rwan bingna theiye.
44026005	Banina kamaga ating thei briakpina banina alang bi sake pi nwamme dabe, ei ani om ririak pi se thuknu mi nun Pharisee khat toga lung ngaake.
44026006	Rikrwang na ani pu pa rwan khou pine diga karen thang ngaaknu lang bi aom bachun am briakpina, ei han ongme khatle ating chong kasem ongme.
44026007	Ani phum somga kanina le heiba karen thangnuwa lousulune dinu om baning amga zingpha thamlai sung khutka Rikrwang ding chwanlaang to ngaake. He krwang Agrippa, rin ongnu heiba bachun om lang bina Jihudi rwanna ating koi impu thang ongme.
44026008	Rikrwang na thinu mi nun ding pi ring thou thang nge dinu dingga nanina pa-aam lang balumsa lang maaknuwe diga kakhan ongnubo?
44026009	“Batak takka, Nazareth Jisu meng om maitwang bi chwan taswang khak tone diga ei azan bahakna le baning ngaake.
44026010	Haga eina Jerusalem bi le to ngaak rwe. Eina takopuba rwan khouna ngam lousuluga bathiangnu mi taswang khak ting qwan in bi thangnuza makka bani ding athatnu kaan bi le eina ka zanu pi thang ngaake.
44026011	Eina bani ding synagogue bing bi katupka rai ngaake khatle ririak ting pi rin basiat ngaake. Eina bani maitwang bi balung pwan laiga man ram namlian namlian la tangga seluga bani ding rai ngaake.
44026012	“Eina takopuba rwan khouna ka zanu khatle chongtan lousuluga Damascus namlian la se ngaake.
44026013	He krwang, eina lampui bi se ongnu kaan bi lumik badingnu phei bi tambaan lana babaan khat, lumik ma baan inkunu babaan gana ei khatle ei le bazin se bacham ongnu mi nun khou baan thang ngaake.
44026014	Ani mi bingna talei bi balumtanu kaan bi khwan khatna Hebrew chong la kabianu eina ngaisu rwe. Atiga rinne, ‘Saul, Saul, nang pa-aam lang Ating rai ongnubo? Thingzum ding naketna basuinuwa nalaang kung lang zung nge.’
44026015	Haba kaan bi eina rinne, ‘Pukraangba, Nang Tubo?’ Maanna rinne, ‘Nangna rai ongnu Jisu ga Ei rwe.
44026016	Nang thouluga naketna hanno. Balangbe hei langna ating nakhou pi mu thangnuwe. Dinuba nangna Ating mu damnu khatle Eina nakhou indao thang dingnu lang bi nangna chwanlaang to lang khatle sake to lang Eina nating pi mu thangnuwe.
44026017	Eina atun nating lang thang ongnu Jihudi rwan mi nun khatle Gentile rwan khouna Eina nating kan thangne.
44026018	Haga bani mik meng swak lang, bani kazingnu riak pina kabaannu riak la hung lang, Seitaan om ngam bina Rikrwang khou hung lang, bani nun noh kok thangnu lousu lang khatle Ating balumsanu paan bina to bathiang thangnu nun lak pi bani om badam lousu lang nge.’
44026019	“Atibriakpina krwang Agrippa, tambaan om pi mu thangnu ding ga ei zei maknu ngam make.
44026020	Atiyeda eina kama bi Damascus khatle Jerusalem bi ongnu nun, Judea taram bing bi khatle Gentile rwan khou bani nun sung leluga Rikrwang khou kanei hung lang nge. Atiga sung lenu om khopsanu chwan to langna diga eina kasam ngaake.
44026021	Ha langna Jihudi rwanna ating kalum in bina namluga athat sat lang to ngaake.
44026022	Atiyeda Rikrwang na paang thangnu paan bina aniya tangnu sung bi ei abeiya hanga kasinnu khatle kaliannu mi nun khou chong katei kabia makka thiamting rwan khatle Moses na swaklu rwe diga rin damnu ga sake pi ongme.
44026023	Hagazo Christa na tatoga riangre kanang khaang dingnu, thi bina kamaga ring thou lat tingnu atiluga Jihudi rwan le Gentile rwan khou babaan om lang bi kasamne diga banina rin basaam thang nge.”
44026024	Maanna kakhangga kabianu kaan bi Festus na bakhou baraam natka rinne, “Paul, nang nazan bahak kalo rwe, nangna taswang khak bachunu gana nating to kalo rwe.”
44026025	Atiyeda Paul na rin late, “He ngam liannu Festus, ei kalonu make, eina kasanu khatle bazenu lungning om chong rinnuwe.
44026026	Balangbe krwangna hei bing nga thei ongme atiga eina krwang meithaan bi khaaknu to makka rin swaknu rwe. Krwangna ha bing ga thei maknu tolaye diga ei baning nge. Balangbe haga inthimthwei toga tonu make.
44026027	Krwang Agrippa, nang thiamting rwan ding balumsabo? Nang balumsaye diga ei baning nge.”
44026028	Haba nung bi Agrippa na Paul khou rinne, “Nangna ating bathemga Christian pi to lang khwa sei lan rwe.”
44026029	Paul na rinne, “Rikrwang khou eina bathaiye, dinuba naraantoza makka aniya achong ngai ongnu bing heiya, titchana ngaakle taswang khakna ngaakle ating parei ruina bang thang ongnu heiya makka ei dan phik lang eina Rikrwang khou kalumme.”
44026030	Paul na hei bing nga rin taangnu kaan bi krwang khatle maan le diga ong bachamnu taleipuba le Barnice bani khangsung han thou rwe.
44026031	Banina se pen swaknu kaan bi bani cham kabiaga rinne, “Manpa heiya thi lang mak tabe parei ruina bang thang lang khopnu chwan tonu maake.”
44026032	Haba nung bi Agrippa na Festus khou rinne, “Heiba manpana Caesar khou chong kat thang mak ngaake dabe eina bating meithaanna bathan thang dam dingnu zung rwe.”
44027001	Anina Italy la li bina se lang baningnu kaan bi banina Paul le qwan in mi kasem ding Augustus om kraanmi doi khat om kraanmi razapuba Julius tiga kounu khou ani ding bachoi thang rwe.
44027002	Atiga anina Asia taram tui paan la se dingnu Adramyttium lipui bi khut twangluga se rwe. Atiga Thessalonica rwan Macedonia bi ongnu Aristarchus le ani le diga se bacham ngaake.
44027003	Inswan lampai ani Sidon bi hung tang rwe. Habei ga Julius na Paul ding ga kung takka maanna babaan rwan khou seluga banina balaang bathaang amnu bing le pi thang lang chongtan ngaake.
44027004	Habei gana ani tuipui la se hungnu kaan bi thiraangna ani maitwang bi raang briakpina Cyprus taram lim la serwan hung rwe.
44027005	Anina Cilicia le Pamphylia meithaan bi amnu tuipui ga takan swakluga Lycia om namlian Myra bi hung rwe.
44027006	Habei ga kraanmi razapuba gana Italy la se dingnu Alexandria lipui khat kadouga maanna habei ga ani ding pi twang rwe.
44027007	Ani lumik taswang khak bazaang bazaangga se hungluga riangre takka Cnidus tui paan hung tang rwe. Habei gana ani thiraangna senu ngamlanruga Crete Salmone tuikoi ram om lim bi li hwan hung rwe.
44027008	Riangre takka haba taram ga sekhan hungluga Lasea diga kounu namlian kim bi amnu “Phaangsanu Li Basak Riak” diga kounu riak pi hung tang rwe.
44027009	Ani bakaan taswang khak ongnu nung li twang lat lang soi zanu kaan ga tangnu kaan bi kalumsannu dat ka le khandru briakpina Paul na kachui thang rwe.
44027010	Atiga rinne, “Kapaisa rwan bing ga, ani lamsek pi phunse ongnu pot bing khatle lipui, hei bingza makka ani kum hakna riangrenu khatle braannu dounu zaye dinu ei thei rwe.”
44027011	Atiyeda kraanmi razapuba gana Paul na rinnu chong ding ma li hwannu khatle lipuipuba chong ding balumsa ngaake.
44027012	Li basak riak ka sikphaa kaan nei lang badou cha mak briakpina li hwanluga se lang mi katamna sung han rwe. Zaye dabe batok khat toluga kathwei lumik taak khatle kasak lumik taak kaneiluga amnu Crete om li basak riak Phoenix la tangluga habei ga sikphaa hung ong lang baning ngaake.
44027013	Atiga kathwei pek la thiraangna raang kabin ri riga raang hungnu kaan bi banina baningnu ga hung tang rwe diga baningluga anchor kai thouluga Crete taram om tui kom la se hung rwe.
44027014	Atiyeda bakhwa sei maknu nung, bani maitwang bi “Euroclydon” diga kounu kanatnu thirwei thiraang raang hung rwe.
44027015	Li ga thirwei thiraang nang rwe, atiga thiraang ding maitwangnu ngamlanruga lipui ga bathan thangnu kaan bi thiraangna ani ding phunse rwe.
44027016	Atiga Claudia diga kounu tuikoi ram bi se hungluga riangre takka anina li ding ga bang tipka bang thang rwe.
44027017	Atiga banina hung basaknu kaan bi lipui ga lungtasi daam bi su thangnu le zaye diga kachi briakpina li ding ga bang tip thang rwe. Atiga li pwan ga pi bangiam taluga thiraang ding pi phunse rwe.
44027018	Thiraang ga raang kabet lai briakpina inswan lampai ani lipui ga pi zaang lang to thou rwe.
44027019	Ni thum tangbani ani kut bahakna lipui bi amnu li thounu om pot bing tui la bazwan sat thou rwe.
44027020	Lumik taswang khak anina lumik khatle insi man mulan hungnu khatle kanatnu thiraangna ani ding phunse ongnu kaan bi bataang la ani ringlune dinu baning ga braan hung ngaak rwe.
44027021	Atiga ani sa in maknu bakhwa sei hungnu kaan bi Paul na bani lak pi han thouluga rin rwe, “Mi nun ga, nani nun achong zeiluga Crete pina se thou mak ngaake dabe liamnu khatle braannu dou mak ngaak tingnuwe.
44027022	Atun eina nani sung katop mak lang rakanga rinnuwe. Balangbe lipui ya makka ani lak pi pakhatcha hakna kum braannu tolaye.
44027023	Balangbe eina Rikrwang mi tonu, eina chwanlaang to ongnu Rikrwang om tambaan chonglangna aniya zingpha akim bi hung han ngaake.
44027024	Atiga rinne, ‘Paul, nang kachi mako, nating Caesar meithaan bi phun hunglu rwe. Batak takka nang le diga li bi se bachamnu bing ding Rikrwang na nakhou pi thang rwe.’
44027025	Atibriakpina mi nun ga, sung raang ngo. Atiga akhou rin thang ngaaknu ga danga swaklune diga ei Rikrwang khou balumsaye.
44027026	Atiyeda ani tuikoi ram khat pi hungsunu twanla rwe.”
44027027	Atiyeda zingpha somga bali tangba ni, Adriatic tuipui bi thiraangna ani ding phun swak phunkhut ka se ngaake. Atiga inmik kasia raan li hwannu manpa rwanna bani taram khat nai rwe dinu thei ngaak rwe.
44027028	Atiga tui thuk ka badatnu kaan Bi fathom somni thuk ngaake. Kasem setouluga badat latnu kaan bi fathom somga impaang dou lat rwe.
44027029	Haba nung bi anina li ga lung pui lak pi hung kadenglang kachiga li sung bina anchor bali bata rwe, atiga khwa baan swak lang kalum ong ngaake.
44027030	Atiyeda li hwannu rwan gana li bina pak dwak lang toga lipui meithaan la anchor batanu katap toga liswan ga tui bi bata lang to ngaake.
44027031	Paul na kraanmi razapuba khatle kraanmi rwan khou rinne, “Haba mi nun ga lipui sung bi ong make dabe, nani ding kannu ngam bila rwe.”
44027032	Haba nung bi kraan mi nunna rui ga tanchatluga li ga bathan thang rwe.
44027033	Atiga khwa baan swakna Paul na bani khangsung ding thaisaak sa lang rin rwe, “Nani nun khatchale sa in makka riangrega ngaak hungnu aniyana ni somga bali tang rwe.
44027034	Atibriakpina eina nani ding sa in lang hweinuwe. Balangbe hagana nani ring lang nge. Nani pakhatcha lu bina sam sang khat tangga chunta bilaye.”
44027035	Maanna hei bing nga rinluga uilu louluga bani khangsung meithaan bi Rikrwang ding swanka rwe. Maanna haga thiak bakluga sa rwe.
44027036	Atiga bani khangsung lungning pi thou thangga sa bacham rwe.
44027037	Atiga ani lipui twang bachamnu mi sing ga raza ni somsiariga karuk ngaake.
44027038	Banina sa in taangnu kaan bi lipui ga zaang langna bani om gehu ga tuipui bi bazwan sat rwe.
44027039	Khwa baan swaknu kaan bi bani haba taram ga bapu theilan rwe. Atiyeda banina lungtasi daam khat amnu muluga habei ga zaye dabe bani lipui ga hung han lang baning ngaake.
44027040	Banina anchor ga tui bi bataluga barui sut sat rwe. Pwan ga laam thouluga tuikom bi lungtasi daam ga tang lang thiraang ding pi phun se rwe.
44027041	Atiyeda tuipui kani hung kamannu riak pi hung tangnu kaan bi lipui ga lungtasi daam bi pak khutluga habei ga khutsu thang drwe khatle li ga kalingnu ngamlan rwe. Atiluga lipui nung la tui kabaapnuna hung bweiluga li ga to bak thou rwe.
44027042	Atiga kraanmi rwan gana qwan in mi nun ding tui kalaapluga pak dwak thou damnu zaye diga bani ding athat sat lang chong katu ngaak rwe.
44027043	Atiyeda kraanmi razapuba gana Paul ding kan thang langna banina to ongnu ding ga khaam rwe. Atiga tui kalaap theinu maan gana li bina kachakta kamaluga tui paan la swak lang zathang pi ngaake.
44027044	Atiga katei bing gana lipui om thingbak thing tut pi twangluga takan swak lang chongtan pi rwe. Atiga bani khangsung tui paan la dwak swak rwe.
44028001	Atiga banina dwak swaknu kaan bi tuikoi ram ga Malta ye dinu thei rwe.
44028002	Haram rwan gana ani ding tasiatnu kriang kriang thangnu ga tamang make. Balangbe mei to thouluga khwa sunluga kasik nangnu ani ding loukhut thang rwe.
44028003	Paul na thing khwapluga mei bi thangnu kaan bi mei kaphuk ka briakpina dintu khat swakluga Paul kut pi kabet rwe.
44028004	Atiga dintu gana bakut pi bakhai ongnu ga haram rwanna muluga bani khatna khat khou rinne, “Balumsia lang maak rwe, manpa heiya mi athatnu mi zung nge. Maan tuipui bina dwak swak ngaak peida, bazenu chongtok kana bating ring lang za thang lan rwe.”
44028005	Atiyeda maanna dintu ding ga mei bi kathing thang rwe, atiga maan khatchale liam mak ngaake.
44028006	Banina maan pwan thou luzung rwe mak tabe maan barapka thiluga balumta luzung rwe diga baning ngaake. Atiyeda banina bakhwa seiga phaang ongnu kaan bi maan khatchale liam maknu ga muluga bani sung kale rwe. Atiga “Maan ri zung rwe” diga banina rin ngaake.
44028007	Atiga haba tuikoi ram kim bi Publius tiga kounu kaliannu tuikoi rampuba khat am ngaake. Maanna ani ding kriang takka loukhut thangluga ni thum bakhou pi riak thang rwe.
44028008	Habei ga Publius pa bakhun ga khatle thi etka naa ong ngaake. Atiga Paul na hungluga balaang khut kalum thang rwe khatle Paul na bakhou kut kaising thangnu kaan bi maan sa drwe.
44028009	Atiga to thangnu nung tuikoi ram bi kasa kanaa amnu rwan bing le bakim bi hung rwe. Atiga bani ding pi sa thang ngaake.
44028010	Banina ani ding takung tazei to takka to thang rwe. Atiga ani nun bani khouna kapaangna ani lang bathaang amnu pot bing le pi thang rwe.
44028011	Tha thum nung bi li thot Ka Ngaphinnu unao pat ni diga kounu Alexandria lipui bina tuikoi ram bi sikpha hungnei ngaaknu lipui bi ani twang hung rwe.
44028012	Atiga ani Syracus pi hung tangluga habei ga ni thum hungnei rwe.
44028013	Habei gana anina se koi hungluga Rhegium namlian bi hung tang rwe. Kani khat nung bi kathwei pek lana thiraang raang hung rwe. Haba nung inswan lampai ani Puteoli bi hung rwe.
44028014	Habei ga ani balumsanu unao rwan ding kadou rwe. Banina ani ding ni siari bani khou neita lang bathem rwe. Haba nung ani Rome la se ngaake.
44028015	Unao rwanna ani cham theinu kaan bi ani ding “Appius Keithian” khatle “Bazin in Inthum” diga kounu riak tangga swak kadou rwe. Paul na bani ding munu kaan bi Rikrwang ding swanka rwe khatle sung thou rwe.
44028016	Atiga ani Rome bi hung tangnu kaan bi kraanmi razapuba gana qwan in mi nun ding rangkaan om kraan puba khou sin thang rwe. Atiyeda Paul dingna rangkaan thangluga kraanmi nun le diga ong bacham dam lang za thang rwe.
44028017	Ni thum nung bi Paul na Jihudi rwan ding kai thangnu nun kou kadoi ngaake. Banina hung kadoinu kaan bi maanna bani khou rinne, “Unao rwan ga, eina mi nun maitwang bi mak tabe ani pu pa rwanna se ong ngaaknu chaang om maitwang bi kasianu chwan tonu maak peida ating qwan in mi toga Jerusalem bi Rome rwan kut pi pi swak thang rwe.
44028018	Banina ating tamphaangluga bathan sat lang baning ngaake. Balangbe ating athat lang khopnu koi maak ngaake.
44028019	Atiyeda Jihudi rwanna amaitwang bi chong kabia briakpina eina Caesar khou chong phun thang ngaake. Heiya eina achaat mi nun lu chung bi koi impu thang langna tonu make.
44028020	Atibriakpina eina hei lang bi nani ding kadouluga kabia lang amme diga kounu rwe. Balangbe Israel rwan bachun om lang bi ating parei ruina bang thang ongme.”
44028021	Habei ga Jihudi rwanna bakhou rinne, “Ani Judea lana nalang bi chamthwan lousu mak ngaake. Atiga unao rwan pakhatchanale hungluga impu thangnu khatle nalang bi kasianu hung kabianu le maake.
44028022	Atiyeda bani nun om lang bi ga nangna baningnu pa-aambo dinu nakhouna ani ngai nwamme. Balangbe bariak bathin mi nunna haba mi doi om maitwang bi chong kabianu anina ngaisu rwe.”
44028023	Banina balaang lumik khat kak thangnu ni bakaong riak pi mi taswang khak hung rwe. Habei ga Paul na Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi khatle Moses om chongtan bina khatle thiamting rwan chong bina Jisu om lang bi rin thang ngaaknu bing ga bani khou louthwanna thouga khwazinren tangga bani ding bathemga khatle cheksinga bachu thang rwe.
44028024	Atiga rin thangnu chong ga mi kasemna balumsa rwe atiyeda mi kasemnaba balumsa mak ngaake.
44028025	Bani lak pi za kale maknu kaan bi bani kapaang drwe. Habei ga Paul na bani khou chong khat rinne, “Haga Katha Bathiangnuna thiamting Isaiah paan bina ani pu pa rwan khou rin thang ngaak rwe.
44028026	“Atiga rinne, ‘Heiba mi nun khouwa seluga rinno, “Nanina ngai bi ngaisulune atiyeda bakaba theilaye, Khatle nanina munu ga bakaba khatchale theilaye.
44028027	Balangbe mi nun mikna munu, Bani kanana ngaisunu, Bani lungningna theinu, Kanei khut latnu, Khatle eina bani ding pi sa lang za mak lang, Heiba mi nun om sung pi inde rwe. Bani kana set rwe, Khatle bani mik inmu rwe.” ’
44028028	“Atibriakpina heiya nanina thei ding ngo dinuba Rikrwang om ringriak ka Gentile rwan khou le pi thang rwe khatle banina ha ding ga ngailune.”
44028029	Maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnu nung Jihudi rwan ga thou drwe khatle bani lak pi kae kanaanu taswang khak swak ngaak rwe.
44028030	Haba nung bi Paul om basonu in bi sangwan ni ong ngaake. Atiga bakhou hungnu mi bing ding maanna lou thang ngaake.
44028031	Atiga pakhatchanale bating khaamnu to makka sung raangga maanna Rikrwang om krwang talei lang bi kasam ngaake khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa om lang bi bachu thang ngaake.
45001001	Jisu Christa om swak, chonglang to lang kou swak thangnu khatle Rikrwang om sacham kasam lang lang swak thangnu Paul na heiba chamthwanna hiaknuwe.
45001002	Sacham gazo meithaan Rikrwang na Baom thiamting rwan paan bina Maanna kamaga bathiangnu chongdip pi karen thang rwe.
45001003	Hagazo Sa Kapaisa ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa lang biye. Maan misa pum nung suiga David om kik taat pi pon rwe.
45001004	Bathiangnu Katha nung suiga Pukraangba ga thi bina ring thou latnu paan bina ngam le bachamga Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye dinu indao thang rwe. Haga ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa ye.
45001005	Bameng lang chungna chaat bing khou balumsanu om chong zeinu phunhung lang Bapaan bina anina phaangkriang khatle chonglang tonu om pham lousu rwe.
45001006	Jisu Christa na kou thangnu mi chaat bing lak pi ani le suinu rwe.
45001007	Rikrwang na kriangnu khatle bathiangnu mi rwan to lang kou thang damnu Rome bi ongnu nani mi bing khou, ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
45001008	Kama bi eina nani mi bing lang chungna Jisu Christa paan bina Rikrwang ding swanne. Balangbe talei ram bariak bing bi nani om balumsat lang bi rin kazan ongme.
45001009	Balangbe eina hweininu bakaan bing bi eina nani meng panga kalum ongme dinu eina Basa Kapaisa om sacham chwan bi sung khutka chwanlaang to ongnu Rikrwang na aom sake rwe.
45001010	Rikrwang na baningnu paan bi ei bataang la upai kasem toluga nani khou hung lang alaang lampui lat thang lang ei chat makka kalum ongme.
45001011	Balangbe nanina tipka hanza lang Katha leithwan kasem nani khou eina pi thang langna nani ding kadou lang ngaak ongme.
45001012	Hagazo ei nani lak pi ongnu kaan bi nani ding le ating le bachamga nani ding aom balumsatna khatle ating nani om balumsatna sung pi thou thang kale lang nge.
45001013	Unao rwan ga, ei nani khou hung lang chat makka karamga hung ngaake atiyeda atun tangga khamnamnu ammaang nge dinu nanina thei maknu ei bathai make. Eina hung nwamnu langbe Gentile rwan khouna bakraa kasem lousunu ga danga nani khouna le bakraa kasem lousu lang naye.
45001014	Greek rwan khou le, barbaros rwan khou le, ningtingnu khatle ningting maknu bing khou ei lei chaak ongme.
45001015	Atibriakpina ei ngamnu bing Rome bi ongnu nani khou le sacham kasam lang daan ongme.
45001016	Balangbe sacham lang bi ei kazak make, balangbe haga balumsanu mi bingna ringriak lousu lang Rikrwang om ngamme. Haga kama bi Jihudi rwan lang nge khatle Greek rwan lang le rwe.
45001017	Balangbe heiba sacham bi Rikrwang khouna ririak senu ga indao thang rwe, ririak senu ga thounu bina loinu tangga balumsanu om paan naye. Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Ririak senu maan gana balumsat paan bina ringlune.”
45001018	Balangbe minun om ririak se maknuna bazenu ding khaamnu, Rikrwang ding kachi maknu khatle ririak se maknu mi bing maitwang bi Rikrwang om balung pwan tambaan lana indaowe.
45001019	Balangbe Rikrwang na bani khou pi mu thang briakpina Rikrwang om langbi thei zanu ga bani khou pi thei thang rwe.
45001020	Balangbe talei ram dam bina thouga mikna phaangmu ngam maknu Baom thot gong bing ga bathiangga pi mu thang rwe, Rikrwang om tonu khwa seinu ngam khatle Rikrwang om chaang ga dam thang damnu kutthiam bing paan bina theinu ngam rwe, atibriakpina bani nun lang dwak zanu lampui maake.
45001021	Balangbe banina Rikrwang ding thei beida Rikrwang khat tanga banina Bating lwat pi lian make mak tabe Bating swan make. Atiyeda bani om baning ga bathaang maaknu imbei hung rwe khatle bani om kapangnu sung baning ding pi zing rwe.
45001022	Bani cham ningtingnu mi nunne diluga kapangnu to rwe.
45001023	Banina braan latlanu Rikrwang om lwat ting braan zanu misa om, basaa nun om, baket bali phunnu khouring bing om khatle babonna katwannu khouring bing om dannu katha bi pi gon rwe.
45001024	Atibriakpina bani sung om bathainu nung suiga bathiang maknu ga to lang Rikrwang na bani ding bathan thang rwe. Haba om langna banina bani cham lak pi bani bani om pum ding takung tazei mak lang nge.
45001025	Balangbe Rikrwang om bazenu le bani om chong karwaknu le diga takhe rwe. Atiga khwa seiga swanka dingnu Damthangnu Bapuba om bahut pi dam thang damnu pot ting kalum rwe khatle chwanlaang to rwe. Amen.
45001026	Atibriakpina Rikrwang na bani ding pum om kazak zanu boulaanu chwan to lang bathan thang rwe, balangbe bani om kamaisa rwanna banina to dingnu chaang ding bathan satluga bachaang maknu gong bi gon swak rwe.
45001027	Hadanga kapaisa rwanna le kamaisa rwan le bachaang toga barui bazem amnu ga bathan sat rwe. Atiga khatna khat khou bani om bathainu gana mei rounu danga kapaisa le kapaisa cham kazaknu chwan to rwe. Atiga banina to damnu kazaknu chwan om bakraa ga bani bahakna lousu rwe.
45001028	Bani sung bi theinu bingna Rikrwang ding thang nwam mak briakpina, banina to hoi maknu chwan bing ga to lang Rikrwang na bani ding sa maknu lungning bi bathan thang rwe.
45001029	Atiga bani ririak se maknuna sipluga lungkoi lungmaannu, sa maknu, antiamnu, sa maknu sung, raaamnuna sipnu, mi athatnu, kabit kamainu, minamnu, kasianu sungna sip ngaake. Bani tu tu tam tamnu rwan,
45001030	rin basiat kalenu, Rikrwang ding batannu, kaphu kaphenu, lian tonu, phun liannu, noh chaat kathan to lang phun swaknu, nu pa chong zei maknu nun,
45001031	bakaba thei maknu nun, balumsa lang khop maknu nun, kriang thei maknu nun, kok thang thei maknu nun khatle phaangkriang maaknu mi nunne.
45001032	Heiba chwan bachaang toga tonu mi nunna thi lang khopnuwe dinu Rikrwang om ririak senu chongsem ga thei ngaak peida haga bahak tonuza makka, haga bachaang tonu mi nun le diga za thang nge.
45002001	Atibriakpina he misa, mi katei ding chong kasem ongnu nalaang dwak lang maake. Balangbe nangna katei rwan ding chong kasem ongnu chongtan gana nazanna nazan ding kakoinu bi pi ta rwe. Balangbe chong kasem ongnu nangna haga rin ongnu ga bahak to rwe.
45002002	Hei dannu chwan tonu nun maitwang bi Rikrwang om chongsem ga bazenu nung suinuwe dinu anina theiye.
45002003	Hapai chwan ga bachaang toga tonu nun ding chong kasem ongnu khatle ha bahak ka to ongnu he misa nang, nang Rikrwang om chongsem bina dwak khope diga baningbo?
45002004	Rikrwang om kasanu gana nating sung pi le thang nge dinu thei makka nangna Baom bakalan maaknu kasanu gong, khaang theinu khatle khwa seiga khaangnu ding ga baiga baningbo?
45002005	Atiyeda nasung natnu khatle sung le nwam maknu nung suiga, Rikrwang om balung pwan lumik lang khatle bazenu chongsem ga indao thang dingnu lang balung pwan nalaang pei thang rwe.
45002006	Rikrwang na “Mi bing lang maan maanna to damnu chwan nung suiga pi thanglune.”
45002007	Kasanu chwan tonu bi khaang theinu, lwat liannu, takungnu khatle braan lanu ding zongnu bani lang maanna khwa sei ringnu pi thanglune.
45002008	Atiyeda balaangza baloinu khatle bazenu ding zei makka, ririak se maknu ding zeinu nun lu chung bi balung pwan khatle sung sounu ga pi thanglune.
45002009	Sa maknu chwan tonu mi bing lu chung bi riangre kanangnu khatle sung riangrenu ga pi thanglune. Haga kamanu bi Jihudi rwan khouwe khatle Greek rwan khou leye.
45002010	Atiyeda kasanu chwan to ongnu mi bing khou lwat liannu, takungnu khatle dai bazaangnu ga pi thanglune. Haga kamanu bi Jihudi rwan khouwe khatle Greek rwan khou leye.
45002011	Balangbe Rikrwang khou kathing aih tonu maake.
45002012	Balangbe chongtan sui makka noh tonu mi bing ga chongtan sui makka braanlune khatle chongtan thwei bi noh tonu mi bing ding chongtanna chong kasemlune.
45002013	Balangbe chongtan ding ngainu banina Rikrwang meithaan bi bazenu make atiyeda chongtan ga to ongnu bani ding pi baze thanglune.
45002014	Balangbe chongtan maaknu Gentile na chongtan chwan ga bachaang toga towe dabe, bani om chongtan maak ngaak peida bani nun bahak ka chongtan zo rwe.
45002015	Habei ga bani sung bi hiak thang damnu chongtan om chwan ga banina indao rwe; atiga bani om kakoi baze theinu sung gana sake to rwe. Bani sungna khat le khat za kale makka koi impu thang kaleye khatle bani ding kok thang nge.
45002016	Heiya chongsem lumik pi eina sacham kasam ongnu nung suiga mi nun om inkamnu ding ga Jisu Christa paan bina Rikrwang na chong tolune.
45002017	Atiyeda nangna Jihudi rwanne diga rinne dabe, chongtan bi hai thangluga Rikrwang khou lian towe dabe;
45002018	Rikrwang na baningnu ga theiye dabe, chongtanna bachu thang damnu gana sa inkunu pot bing ga kathang swaknu ngamme dabe;
45002019	nangna nang bahak mik chonu nun ding lampui kainuwe khatle kazingnu riak pi ongnu nun om babaanne dinu bathiangga balumsaye dabe,
45002020	nangna chongtan bi ningting khatle bazenu gong ga amga kapangnu rwan ding bachu thang nge dabe khatle katha bi naosen tonu nun ding bachuthangnupa towe dabe,
45002021	mi katei ding bachu thangnu nang, naraanto nating bachu thang makkabo? Barusa mak ting gaye diga kasamnu nang, nangna barusanubo?
45002022	Rwan mei rwan basan laan mako” diga rinnu nang, rwan mei rwan basan laannubo? Ri katha ding batannu nang, kalum in bina barusabo?
45002023	Chongtan lang bi lian tonu nang, chongtan ding to bakluga Rikrwang ding takung maknubo?
45002024	Balangbe hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Nani riak pina Gentile lak pi Rikrwang meng ding rin basiat rwe.”
45002025	Balangbe nangna chongtan ga zeiye dabe mun romnu ga batak takka tongnuwe. Atiyeda nangna chongtan ga zei make dabe, nang mun romnu ga, mun rom maknu imbei rwe.
45002026	Atibriakpina mun rom maknu maan gana chongtan om bazenu ding ga zeiye dabe, mun rom maknu bating ga mun romnu bi chak thang bilabo?
45002027	Pum bi mun rom maknu pakhatna chongtan ding zeiye dabe, hiak thangnu chongtan amnu khatle mun romnu nangna chongtan zei make dabe maanna nating chong kasem bilabo?
45002028	Balangbe bapaan la Jihudi rwan tonu maan ga Jihudi make khatle pum bi bapaan la mun romnu ga mun romnu make.
45002029	Atiyeda basung lana Jihudi tonu maan ga Jihudi ye khatle hiak thangnu gana makka, katha na sung bi mun romnu ga mun romnuwe; atiga bating rinswannu ga mi nun khouna make, Rikrwang khou naye.
45003001	Ati dabe Jihudi rwan lang pa-aam tongnu ambo? Mak tabe mun romnuna pa-aam tongnu ambo?
45003002	Balang bing bi tamga amme. Kamanu bi bani khou Rikrwang chong ga sin thang ngaake,
45003003	balangbe mi kasemna balumsa make dabe pa-aam swaklu dingbo? Bani om balumsa maknu gana Rikrwang om balumsa lang khopnu ding khatchale bathaang maaknu pi tone gabo?
45003004	Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Mi bingza chong karwaknu ngaak peida Rikrwang be bazenu to ding ngo. Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Nachong paan bina nating pi baze thang lang, Khatle nating chong kasem bi nangna ngam lang nge.”
45003005	Atiyeda ani om ririak se maknu gana Rikrwang om bazenu ding pi mu thang nge dabe ani pa-aam rin langbo? Balung pwanna takhum baannu Rikrwang ga ririak se maknu rugabo? Heiya eina misa chaang toga rinnuwe.
45003006	Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Ati dabe Rikrwang na talei ram ding tatoga chong kasem langbo?
45003007	Balangbe “Aom chong karwaknu gana Rikrwang om bazenu ding indaoga balwat pi lianne dabe, atun tangga ating le noh mi danga chong kasem ongnu pa-aam langbo?”
45003008	Mi kasemna ani om lang bi rin basiatnu khatle mi kasem nabe “Kasanu swak lang anina kasianu tozo” diga anina rinne diga rinnu danga anina pa-aam toga rin mak tingbo? Bani ding koi impu thangnu heiya bazeye.
45003009	Ati dabe pa-aambo? Ani bani ma inkuga sanurubo? Haga khatchale baze make. Balangbe Jihudi rwan le Greek le noh thwei bi amnuwe diga anina nani khou kamaga rin drwe.
45003010	Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Ririak senu pakhatcha hakna maake, maake, pakhatcha hakna maake.
45003011	Bakaba theinu pakhatcha hakna maake, Rikrwang ding zongnu pakhatcha hakna maake.
45003012	Bani mi bingza lampui maan drwe, Bani mi bing ga bathaang maak rwe, Pakhatcha hakna kasanu chwan tonu maake, maake, khatcha hakna maake.”
45003013	“Bani krwan ga lat swaknu thaan dan rwe, Bani baleina minamme;” “Bani kanan thwei bi brun hu amme.”
45003014	“Bani mun ga taseng khatle kakhaanuna sipe.”
45003015	“Thi pi ta lang bani ket zaang nge.
