45003016	Bani lampui bi braantanu khatle riangre kanangnu amme.
45003017	Dai bazaangnu lampui ga banina thei mak ngaake.”
45003018	“Bani mikphaang bi Rikrwang ding kachinu maake.”
45003019	Chongtanna rinnu bing gana, chongtan thwei bi ongnu mi nun khouwe dinu anina theiye. Heiya mun bing ding khwam thang lang khatle talei ram mi bing ding Rikrwang meithaan bi chong katak pi lang nge.
45003020	Atibriakpina chongtan chwan paan bina bamikphaang bi pakhatcha ding le pi baze thanglaye, balangbe chongtan paan bina noh ding bapu thei hung nge.
45003021	Atiyeda atunbe chongtan paan bina makka Rikrwang khouna ririak senu ga indao thang rwe. Haga chongtan khatle thiamting rwanna sake pi rwe.
45003022	Rikrwang om ririak senu ga Jisu Christa khou balumsanu paan bina balumsanu mi bapum brum khou indao thang rwe. Balangbe teinu khatchale maake.
45003023	Balangbe mi bingza noh to rwe khatle Rikrwang lwat liannu bi hung tang lan rwe.
45003024	Christa Jisu khou amnu ran swak thangnu paan bina Pukraangba om phaangkriangna bathaam pi baze thang rwe.
45003025	Christa ding Bathi bi balumsanu paan bina hungnu pi pemnu rikhaang pot toga Rikrwang na Bating pi swak rwe. Heiya Rikrwang om ririak senu ding pi mu lang nge. Balangbe Rikrwang na khaang sei thangnu paanna kamaga to ngaaknu noh ga Maanna takan swak thang rwe.
45003026	Rikrwang na Baom ririak senu ga heiba kaan bi indao thang lang naye. Balangbe Maan heiya bazenu khatle Jisu ding balumsanu mi bing ding pi baze thangnu bapuba pi to lang nge.
45003027	Ati dabe lian to lang ingaipai ambo? Lian to lang khatchale maake. Impei chongtannabo? Chwannabo? Khatchale maake; atiyeda balumsanu chongtan paan bi naye.
45003028	Balangbe chongtan om chwan sui makka, balumsanu paanna mi ding pi baze thang nge diga anina balumsaye.
45003029	Atiga Rikrwang ga Jihudi rwanza om Rikrwang bo? Gentile nun om Rikrwang le makpo? O, Gentile rwan om leye.
45003030	Heiya bataknuwe. Rikrwang khatcha briakpina Gentile rwan om Rikrwang leye. Maanna mun romnu ding le mun rom maknu ding le balumsanu paan bina pi baze thanglune.
45003031	Ati dabe balumsanu heiyana chongtan ding khatchale bathaang maaknu pi torubo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Haba om hut lang anina chongtan ding pi tip thang nge.
45004001	Ati dabe ani pa Abraham na pum nung suiga lousu damnu lang bi anina pa-aam rin dingbo?
45004002	Balangbe bating bachwan paan bina pi baze thang nge dabe, maan lian to lang amme; atiyeda haga Rikrwang meithaan bibe make.
45004003	Balangbe Bathiangnu Chongdipna pa-aam rin thangbo? Atiga rinne, “Abraham na Rikrwang ding balumsa rwe, hagana bating ririak senu diga basing chak thang rwe.”
45004004	Mi pakhatna chwan tonu kaan bi baom lo man ga leithwan make atiyeda phangnu zek swaknuwe diga chak thang nge.
45004005	Chwan sui maknu atiyeda Rikrwang ding kachi maknu nun ding pi baze thangnu Bating balumsanu ding ga baom balumsat kana ririak senu diga chak thang rwe.
45004006	Chwan sui makka Rikrwang na mi pakhat ting ririak senu diga chak thangnu maan ga aih sanuwe diga David na rin thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe,
45004007	“Bani om chongtan thouto maknu chwan bing ding kok thang damnu Khatle bani om noh bing ding thinlem thang damnu mi nun ga aih sanuwe,
45004008	Pukraangba na noh impu thangla dingnu maan ga aih sanuwe.”
45004009	Hei dannu rithoiya mun romnu nun lang zamo mak tabe mun rom maknu mi nun lang lebo? Balangbe balumsanu paan bina Abraham ding ririak senu diga chak thang rwe diga anina rinne.
45004010	Ati dabe haga tatoga chak thangnubo? Bating mun rom maknu meithaan namo mak tabe mun romnu nung nabo? Haga mun romnu nungna make, mun rom mak balei naye.
45004011	Maanna mun rom maknu meithaan balumsat om ririak senu seal ga mun romnu badan toga phang ngaake. Haga mun rom mak ngaak peida balumsanu mi bing om pa to lang chungna khatle ririak senu ga le bani khou chak thang za lang naye.
45004012	Atiga mun romnu nun om pa za makka atiyeda ani pa Abraham na maan mun rom mak balei bakhou amnu balumsat ket kaam bi senu bing om mun romnu pa to lang nge.
45004013	Balangbe Abraham khatle baom kik taat rwanna talei ram rakhum lwaknu mi tolune diga karen thang ngaaknu ga chongtan paan bina make atiyeda haga balumsat om ririak senu paan bi naye.
45004014	Balangbe chongtan zeinu paan bina rakhum lwaknu mi towe dabe balumsat ka bathaang pi maak thang nge khatle chong ren ga le bakaba pi maak thang nge.
45004015	Balangbe chongtanna balung pwan phun hung nge. Atiyeda chongtan maaknu riak pi chongtan ding to bak nu le maake.
45004016	Atibriakpina chongren ga chongtan bi hai thang ongnu nun zakhou makka ani mi bingza pa to ongnu Abraham om balumsanu nung suiga ongnu kik taat bing khou pi tip thang lang rakhum lwaknu mi ga phaangkriang nung suiga balumsat paan bi naye.
45004017	Heiya hiak thangnu ga dannuwe, “Eina nating chaat taswang khak pa pi to thang rwe.” Maan heiya maanna balumsa damnu Rikrwang om meithaan bi ani pa ye. Rikrwang gabe thinu nun ding ringnu pi thangnu khatle ka maaknu pot bing ding kouluga pi am thangnu Rikrwang nge.
45004018	Bachunnu maak ngaak peida Abraham na bachun amga balumsa ngaake. Balangbe heiya “Naom kik taat ka ati lune” diga balang bi rin thang damnu ga danga, maanna chaat taswang khak pa to rwe.
45004019	Bapum thinu danrunu (balangbe maan sangwan raza khak ngaak rwe) khatle Sarah om kathinu dannu nao khao riak ka kakhannu kaan bi maan balumsanu bi sonta make.
45004020	Atiga Rikrwang om chongren lang bi balumsia mak ngaake atiyeda Rikrwang ding lwat pi lianga balumsanu bi lian thou damme.
45004021	Rikrwang na karen thang damnu ga maanna tonu ngamme diga Abraham na batak takka balumsa damme.
45004022	Atibriakpina “Haba balumsat ka ririak senuwe diga balaang chak thang rwe.”
45004023	Abraham ding ririak senu diga basing chak thang rwe. Heiya baraantoza lang hiaknu make.
45004024	Atiyeda ani lang leye; balangbe ani Pukraangba Jisu ding thinu nun lak pina pi ring thou thangnu bating balumsanu ani ding le ririak senuwe diga basing chak thanglune.
45004025	Bating ani koi maan riak pina thinu bi pi swak rwe khatle ani ding pi baze thang briakpina Bating thi bina pi ring thou thang rwe.
45005001	Atibriakpina balumsanuna ani ding pi baze thang briakpina, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bina Rikrwang le ani dai bazaangga ongme.
45005002	Ani om kahan riak to ongnu phaangkriang bi ga balumsanuna Bapaan bina lampui am rwe. Atiga Rikrwang om lwat liannu ga ani om bachunnu to briakpina ani karowe.
45005003	Haza make atiyeda anina riangre kanangnu bi le karowe, balangbe riangre kanangnuna khaang theinu phun hung nge,
45005004	khaang theinuna kasanu khei khatle kasanu kheina bachunnu phun hung nge
45005005	khatle bachunnuna sung pi inkhin make, balangbe ani khou pi thang damnu Katha Bathiangnu paan bina ani sung bi Rikrwang om kriang ga bunta thang rwe.
45005006	Balangbe anina batok maakka ongnu kaan bi bakaan chaga Rikrwang ding kachi maknu mi nun lang Christa na thi thang rwe.
45005007	Balangbe kasanu mi pakhat lang tupai pakhatna sung raangga thi thang za ngaakle ririak senu mi pakhat lang mi khatna thi thangnu dinuwa kungnuwe.
45005008	Atiyeda anina noh mi to ongnu kaan bi Christa na ani lang chungna thi thangnu gana Rikrwang na Baom kriang ding ani khou indao thang rwe.
45005009	Atibriakpina haza makka inkuga, Bathina ani ding pi baze thang briakpina Bapaanna ani ding Babalung pwan bina kan thanglune.
45005010	Balangbe anina Rikrwang om munanu toga ongnu kaan bi Basa Kapaisana thi thangnu paan bina ani ding Rikrwang le diga pi taman thang nge dabe, pi taman thangluga Baom ringnu om paanna intia lang ani ding inkuga kan thang dingnu!
45005011	Haza makka ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bina Rikrwang khou ani karowe. Atiga Jisu Christa paan bina ani ding pi taman thangnu ga lousu rwe.
45005012	Atibriakpina mi khat om lang bina talei ram bi noh khutnu khatle noh om langna thinu khutnu danga thinu ga mi bing khou kazan swak rwe. Balangbe mi bingna noh to rwe.
45005013	Balangbe chongtan ga pi thang mak baleina talei ram bi noh am ngaak rwe. Atiyeda chongtan ga maaknu kaan bi noh ding ga chak thang make.
45005014	Atiyeda thinuna Adam khouna Moses tangga paan rwe. Adam na chongtan to baknu ga le bachamga noh to maknu mi nun lu chung bi tangga thinuna paan ngaake. Adam ga hung dingnu Baom badanne.
45005015	Atiyeda bathaam leithwan gabe koi maan dannu make, balangbe mi pakhat om koi maanna mi taswang khak thiye dabe Rikrwang om phaangkriang khatle Mi Pakhat om dinuba, Jisu Christa om phaangkriangna pinu leithwan ga mi taswang khak khou inkuga, sipsaga pi thang rwe.
45005016	Haba leithwan ga mi khatna noh tonu bina hungnu ga dannu make. Balangbe noh om lang bi chong kasemnu gana koi impu thangnu phun hung rwe. Atiyeda koi maan taswang khak nung bi hungnu bathaam leithwan gana pi baze thangnu phun hung nge.
45005017	Balangbe mi khat om chongtan zei maknu langna, thinuna mi khat om paanna krwang danga paanne dabe phaangkriang khatle ririak senu om leithwan sipsaga lousu damnu nunna, mi khat dinuba Jisu Christa paan bina inkuga ringnu bi krwang danga paanlu dingbo!
45005018	Atibriakpina mi khat om koi maan lang bina mi bing lu chung bi chongsem hungnu ga danga, Mi khat om ririak senu chwan paan bina le mi bing ding ring lang pi baze thangnu bi kai thang rwe.
45005019	Balangbe mi khat om chong zei maknu riak pina mi taswang khak ting noh mi pi tonu danga, Mi khat om chong zeinu paan bina le mi bing ding ririak senu pi to thanglune.
45005020	Hei bing chung bi koi maan tam inku thou langna chongtan le hung rwe. Atiyeda noh inkunu riak pi ga phaangkriang le taswang khak inku ka late.
45005021	Heiya thinu bi nohna krwang paannu danga, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om langna khwa sei ringnu bi ririak senu om paanna phaangkriangna krwang danga paan lang nge.
45006001	Ati dabe atun ani pa-aam kabiazobo? Phaangkriang tam inku lang ani noh toga ong maangzobo?
45006002	Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Noh pek la thi damnu anina habei ga tatoga ong ting ting dinggabo?
45006003	Mak tabe Jisu Christa om thinu bi baptize to damnu ani mi bingna Baom thinu bi baptize to rwe dinu nani thei makpo?
45006004	Atibriakpina baptize tonu paan bina ani ding Christa le bachamga thinu bi ui bacham thang rwe. Heiya Bapa om lwat liannu paanna Christa ding thinu bina pi ring thou thang damnu danga anina le kum kathan bi lung bacham lang nge.
45006005	Balangbe anina Jisu Christa le diga Baom thinu thot pi karung nge dabe, ani le Maan ring thou latnu thot pi soi makka bachamlune.
45006006	Noh swak toga ongting ting mak lang mi lui ga Pukraangba le diga cross pi bakhai bacham drwe. Haga noh pum ga braan lang nge dinu anina theiye.
45006007	Balangbe thi damnu Bating ga noh bina rang pi to thang rwe.
45006008	Atibriakpina Christa le diga thi bachamme dabe, ani Maan le diga ring bachamlune dinu anina balumsaye.
45006009	Balangbe thinu nun lak pina Christa ga pi ring thou dam briakpina Maan thi lat la rwe, thinuna Christa lu chung bi paan lat lang ngam maak rwe dinu anina theiye.
45006010	Balangbe Jisu Christa na thi damnu thit ka noh pek la bakaan bing lang toga thi leng oweiza ngaake. Atiyeda Maanna ringnu kum ga Rikrwang pek la ringnuwe.
45006011	Hadanga nani le batak takka noh pek la thi rwe atiyeda ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou Rikrwang pek la ring ongnuwe diga chak thang ngo.
45006012	Atibriakpina nanina sung om bathainu gana rinnu zei mak lang thi zanu nani pum ding noh bi krwang danga pi paan mako.
45006013	Nani pum naat ting ga ririak se maknu om kutchoi toga noh bi pi swak lat lanro. Atiyeda nani pum ding ga thinu nun lak pina pi ring thounu mi nun toga khatle nani pum naat ka Rikrwang khou ririak senu om kutchoi toga Rikrwang khou kat swako.
45006014	Balangbe nohna nani ding pi ngam lat mak tingnu rwe, balangbe nani chongtan thwei bi ongnu make atiyeda phaangkriang thwei bi ongnuwe.
45006015	Ati dabe pa-aam tozobo? Ani chongtan thwei bi ong makka phaangkriang thwei bi ong briakpina ani noh to dingnubo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo.
45006016	Nanina thinu pi swaknu noh swak ngaakle mak tabe ririak senu pi swaknu chong zeinu swak ngaakle, nanina nani zan ding swak toga tudannu pakhat khou pi swake dabe nanina chong zeiga ongnu baom swak to rwe dinu nani thei makpo?
45006017	Atiyeda Rikrwang ding swankaye balangbe nani nun meithaan noh swak to ngaak peida nani khou bachoi thang damnu bachu thangnu ding ga nani sung khutka zei rwe.
45006018	Atiga nani ding noh bina rang pi to thangluga ririak senu swak pi to thang rwe.
45006019	Nani pum bi sonnu ga am briakpina eina misa chaang toga rinnuwe, balangbe nanina bathiang maknu khatle chongtan thouto maknu bi, chongtan inkuga thouto mak lang swak tanga nani pum naat bing ding pi swak ngaaknu danga, bathiangnu to lang ririak senu swak toga nani pum naat bing atun pi swako.
45006020	Balangbe nani nun noh om swak to ong bi nani ririak senu pek la rang to ngaake.
45006021	Atun nanina kazak ongnu chwan bing om lang bi, nani khou pa-aam tongnu lousu dambo? Balangbe haba chwan bing om kraabe thinuwe.
45006022	Atiyeda atunba noh bina nani ding rang pi to thangluga Rikrwang swak rwan pi to thangru briakpina, nanina baloi ongnu bakraa gana bathiangnu pi swake khatle haba om kraabe khwa sei ringnuwe.
45006023	Balangbe noh om lo manbe thinuwe atiyeda Rikrwang om leithwan gabe ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou khwa sei ringnuwe.
45007001	Unao rwan ga, misana ring ong basaan chongtanna nani lu chung bi ngam amme dinu nani thei makpo? Heiya eina chongtan theinu mi nun khou rinnuwe.
45007002	Balangbe babasan amnu kamaisa ga babasanna ring basaan, chongtanna babasan khou bang thang ongnuwe. Atiyeda babasan gana thi damme dabe bating tazwan bahwannu om chongtan bina rang pi to thang rwe.
45007003	Atiga babasan ring ongnu kaan bi kamaisa khatna kapaisa khat khou kalaake dabe bating rwan basan laannu diga kou rwe atiyeda babasanna thi damme dabe chongtan bina maan rang to rwe; atiga maan kapaisa katei khou kalaak peida rwan basan laannu lan rwe.
45007004	Hadanga he unao rwan ga, nani nun Mi khat om dinuba, thinu nun lak pina ring thou damnu Pukaangba om to langna, nani le Christa pum paan bina nani ding le chongtan pek la pi thi rwe. Haga anina Rikrwang langna bakraa kraa lang nge.
45007005	Balangbe ani nun zanti pum om chaang bi lung ongnu kaan bi chongtanna pi swaknu noh om bathainuna thinu kraa kraa lang ani pum om naat pi chwan to ong ngaake.
45007006	Atiyeda ani ding bang thang ngaaknu chongtan bi thiru briakpina, atunba chongtan bi gana bathan thang rwe; atiga anina chongtan lui bina makka, Katha om kum kathan bi bating chwanlaang to lang naye.
45007007	Ati dabe ani pa-aam rin dingbo? Chongtan ga nohbo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo; atiyeda chongtan paan bina makka ei noh ding bapu thei mak ngaak tingnuwe. Atiga rinne, “Nang ra-aam mako” diga chongtanna rin thang make dabe ei ra-aamnu ding thei mak ngaak tingnuwe.
45007008	Atiyeda zathang paan bina nohna badou chanu louluga ra-aamnu bachaat bing bi ating kachui thang rwe; balangbe chongtan maake dabe noh ga thinuwe.
45007009	Balangbe ei bakaan khat pi chongtan sui makka ring ong ngaake atiyeda zathang ga hungnu kaan bi noh ga ring thou rwe khatle ei thi rwe.
45007010	Atiga ringnu pi thang dingnu zathang ga alaangba thinu pi swak rwe.
45007011	Balangbe nohna zathang om badou chanu louluga ating minam rwe khatle hagana ating athat rwe.
45007012	Atibriakpina chongtan ga bathiang nge khatle zathang ga bathiang nge, bazeye khatle saye.
45007013	Ati dabe kasanu gana ating pithi lang tonubo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Atiyeda noh ga nohwe dinu pi thei lang kasanu om paanna noh gana akhou thinu pi swak rwe. Atiga zathangna noh dinu heiya heitia lang siaye dinu pi muwe.
45007014	Balangbe chongtan ga katha omme dinu anina theiye atiyeda eiba noh swak toga zwan sat ngaaknu zanti pum omme.
45007015	Balangbe eina to ongnuwa ei bakaba thei make, eina to nwamnu ga eina tonu make. Atiyeda eina batannu ga eina towe.
45007016	Eina to nwam maknu ga eina towe dabe, chongtan ga sanuwe dinu chongtan ding ei zaye.
45007017	Atiyeda atun eina to ongnu heiya eina make atiyeda haga akhou am ongnu noh ga naye.
45007018	Balangbe akhou dinuba aom zanti pum bi kasanu khatchale maake dinu ei theiye. Kasanu to lang baningnu akhou amme atiyeda kasanu chwan to lang balampui ei zongsu make.
45007019	Balangbe eina to nwamnu kasanu ga ei to make atiyeda eina to nwam maknu kasianu ga eina towe.
45007020	Atiga eina to nwam maknu ga eina towe dabe, to ongnu ga eina make atiyeda haga akhou amnu noh ga naye.
45007021	Atiga eina kasanu to nwamnu kaan bi sa maknu ga ei le diga ong bacham ongme dinu chongpham khat eina lousu rwe.
45007022	Balangbe basung la amnu mi nung suiga Rikrwang om chongtan bi ei karowe.
45007023	Atiyeda asung baning om maitwang bi chwan to ongnu khatle apum naat sung bi amnu chongtan katei khat eina theiye. Rin ongnu chongtan heiyana ating apum naat bing bi amnu noh chongtan om qwan mi pi to rwe.
45007024	He kasonnu bachan sianu ei, thi dingnu apum ding tuna kan thang dingbo?
45007025	Heiya ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bi naye diga ei Rikrwang ding swanne. Sung baning nabe Rikrwang om chongtan ding apum bahakna chwanlaang towe. Atiyeda aom zanti pum nabe noh om chongtan ding chwanlaang to ongme.
45008001	Atibriakpina atun noh om chaang nung suiga se makka katha nung suiga se ongnu Jisu Christa khou ongnu mi bing ding pi koi thang make.
45008002	Balangbe Jisu Christa khou amnu ringnu katha om chongtan gana ating noh khatle thinu om chongtan bina rang pi to thang rwe.
45008003	Balangbe zanti pumna pi sonnu, chongtanna tonu ngam maknu ding Rikrwang na Basa Kapaisa ding noh mi thot ting kapwaga noh lang chungna langta thangluga pum bi noh ding kakoinu pi ta rwe.
45008004	Hagazo zanti pum nung suiga amnu ga se makka Katha nung suiga senu ani khou chongtan om bathaang amnu ririak senu ga hung tang lang nge.
45008005	Balangbe zanti pum nung suiga lungnu nun gana zanti pum om tonu bi bani sung thang nge atiyeda Katha nung suiga lungnu nun gana Katha om tonu bi bani sung thang nge.
45008006	Balangbe zanti pum om lang bi baningnu ga thinuwe atiyeda Katha om ding baningnu ga ringnuwe khatle dai bazaangnuwe.
45008007	Balangbe zanti pum om lang bi baningnu ga Rikrwang ding munanuwe khatle haga Rikrwang om chongtan thwei bi ongnu make khatle ongnu le ngam make.
45008008	Atibriakpina zanti pum bi ongnu gana Rikrwang ding pi pemnu ngam make.
45008009	Atiyeda Rikrwang Katha na nani khou ong thang nge dabe, nani zanti pum om chaang bi ongnu make atiyeda Katha bi ongnuwe. Atiga tudannu pakhat khou Christa om Katha ga maake dabe maan Christa om make.
45008010	Christa na nani khou ong thang nge dabe noh om lang bina pum ga thi ngaak peida Katha gabe ririak senu paan bina ringnuwe.
45008011	Atiyeda Jisu ding thi bina pi ring thou damnu Bakatha gana nani khou ong thang nge dabe, Jisu Christa ding thi bina pi ring thou damnu Rikrwang na nani khou amnu Bakatha paan bina thi zanu nani pum ding le pi ring thou thanglune.
45008012	Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, anina lei chaak rwe atiyeda zanti pum om chaang nung suiga ring langna zanti pum om lei chaaknu make.
45008013	Balangbe nanina zanti pum om chaang nung suiga lung nge dabe nani thilune atiyeda Katha paan bina nanina pum om chwan ding ga pi thiye dabe nani ringlune.
45008014	Balangbe Rikrwang Katha na kai thangnu mi bing ga Rikrwang sa rwanne.
45008015	Balangbe nani nun kachinu bi ta thang lang swak tonu katha ga lousunu make atiyeda sa kapaisa pi to thangnu Katha ding ga nanina lousunuwe; atiga Bapaan bina anina “Abba, Apa” diga kou rwe.
45008016	Ani Rikrwang sa rwanne dinu Katha Maan Bahakna ani katha le diga karungluga sake pi rwe.
45008017	Ani Basa rwan towe dabe rakhum lwaknu mi le to rwe. Ani Rikrwang om rakhum lwaknu mi to rwe khatle Christa le rakhum lwaknu mi to bacham rwe. Atiga Pukraangba le diga riangre kanang khaang bachamme dabe lwat liannu ga maan le diga lou bachamlune.
45008018	Balangbe atun kaan riangre kanang khaang ongnu heiya ani khou indao thang dingnu lwat liannu le diga rin kaba lang khopnu make diga eina baning nge.
45008019	Balangbe Rikrwang sa rwan ding indao thang dingnu ding ga kaling prip bingna taraan ga ngaak ongme.
45008020	Balangbe kaling prip bingna bathaang maaknu thwei bi ongnu heiya baom baom bathainu make. Atiyeda bachunnu le bachamga ba thwei bi pi ongnu heiya Rikrwang na ati dam lang baning bada zung rwe.
45008021	Balangbe kaling prip bahak ting le braan dam dingnu swak to ong bina Rikrwang sa rwan om lwat liannu rang tonu bi bathan thanglune.
45008022	Balangbe kaling prip bingna atun tangga kakouga khatle nao am nat naa ongme dinu anina theiye.
45008023	Haza make atiyeda katha om kamanu kraa lousu damnu ani bahakna le sa kapaisa pi to thangnu dinuba, ani pum ding ran swak thangnu ding taraan ga ngaakka ong bi ani bahak le ani sung bi kakouga ongme.
45008024	Balangbe ani ding heiba bachunnu bi kan thang rwe. Atiyeda munu ngamnu bachunnu ga bachunnu make, balangbe mi khatna maanna mu damnu pot langna bachun ong ding gabo?
45008025	Atiyeda anina mu maknu ding ga siat siatka bachunne dabe, ani ha langna khaang theinu le bachamga taraan ga ngaak ongme.
45008026	Hadanga ani om sonnu bi Katha na le ani ding paang thang rwe, balangbe anina tatoga kalum dingbo thei make. Atiyeda Katha bahak kana rin lang thei makka kakouga ani langna hweini thang ongme.
45008027	Sung ding zong ongnu Pukraangba na Katha om sung ga pa-aambo dinu theiye, balangbe Katha gana Rikrwang om baningnu nung suiga bathiangnu mi nun lang hweini thang ongme.
45008028	Rikrwang ding kriangnu mi bing lang, Baom baningnu nung suiga kou thangnu bani lang pum brum zana sa lang to swak karung nge dinu anina theiye.
45008029	Balangbe Rikrwang na kamaga thei thangnu bani ding Basa Kapaisa thot tan lang kamaga badan thang rwe; atiga Maanna unao rwan bing lak pi natainu sa kapaisa to lang nge.
45008030	Maanna kamaga badan ngaaknu nun ding kou le kou thang rwe, kou thangnu nun ding ga Maanna le pi baze thang rwe. Atiga pi baze thang damnu bani ding lwat pi lian thang rwe.
45008031	Ati dabe hei bing lang bi anina pa-aam rin langbo? Rikrwang nga ani lang nge dabe tuna ani ding maitwangnu ngam ding gabo?
45008032	Basa Kapaisa Bahak ting kan thang makka ani lang pi swak thangnu Maanna Sa Kapaisa ding le diga pot bing ding ani lang bathaam pi thang bilabo?
45008033	Rikrwang na kathang swaknu nun lu chung bi tuna koi impu thang dingbo? Pi baze thangnu ga Rikrwang naye.
45008034	Koi impu thang dingnu mi ga tubo? Thi thang ngaaknu ga Christa Jisu we khatle haza makka thinu nun lak pina pi ring thouluga Rikrwang kut inchang pek la ongluga ani lang chungna hweini thang ongme.
45008035	Ani ding Christa om kriang bina tuna pi kapaang ding gabo? Riangre kanang namo mak tabe sung katopnu namo mak tabe rainu namo mak tabe bu taangnu namo mak tabe sin basoi maaknu namo mak tabe kachinu namo mak tabe kachaak chem namo?
45008036	Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Balangbe nalaang chungna ani ding thamlai tarin athat rwe, Ani ding athat tingnu zao nun ding danga chak thang rwe.”
45008037	Ati ngaaklena balang bing bi ani ding kriangnu Pukraangba paan bina ani ngamnu nun ma inkuga ngamnu to rwe.
45008038	Balangbe eina balumsaye dinuba, thinuna ngaakle, ringnuna ngaakle, tambaan chonglang rwanna ngaakle, kangam nu nunna ngaakle, ngam amnuna ngaakle, am ongnu potna ngaakle, hung dingnu potna ngaakle,
45008039	basaangnuna ngaakle kathuknuna ngaakle, dam thangnu pot kateina ngaakle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou amnu Rikrwang om kriang bina ani ding pi kapaang latnu ngamla rwe.
45009001	Eina Christa meng bi bataknu rinnuwe, ei chong karwaknu make. Aom kakoi baze theinu sungna le Katha Bathiangnu khou sake piye.
45009002	Dinuba ei asung bi riangre taknu khatle chat makka asung naanu amme.
45009003	Balangbe pum nung suiga aunao rwan khatle atalei mi nun lang apum bahak pi taseng ta thangnu, Christa khouna kapaang lang bathaiga ei baning ngaake.
45009004	Bani ga Israel rwanne, bani sa kapaisa rwan pi to thangnu, lwat, chonghen rwan, chongtan pi thangnu, Rikrwang chwanlaang tonu khatle chongren to thangnu bing ga bani omme.
45009005	Atiga pu pa rwan bing ga bani omme, zanti pum nung suiga Christa ga bani khou naye; Maan ga pum brum lu chung bi amnu, khwa seiga swanka dingnu Rikrwang gaye. Amen.
45009006	Atiyeda Rikrwang chong ga khatchale maknu dan rwe diga rinnu make. Balangbe Israel kik taat bing Israel rwan karwak make.
45009007	Bani Abraham om mikin bina ngaak peida bani mi bingza basa rwan make; atiyeda “Nakik nataat rwan ding Isaac khouna thouga chak thoulune.
45009008	Dinuba zanti pum om chaang sa rwan ga Rikrwang sa rwan make atiyeda karen thangnu sa rwan ding ga Abraham om kik taat lang chak thang rwe.”
45009009	Balangbe karen thangnu chong ga heiye, “Hei dannu kaan bi ei hunglune khatle Sarah na sa kapaisa khat lousulune.”
45009010	Heiza make, Rebecca na le mi khatle dinuba ani pa Isaac le rakhum bachaluga pum rit ngaake.
45009011	(Atiyeda pon mak balei banina kasanu kasianu chwan to mak balei kathang swak thangnu nung suiga Rikrwang baning hung tang langna chwanna make atiyeda kou thangnu Pukraangba paan bi naye).
45009012	Rebecca khou atiga rinne, “Batangna banao ding chwanlaang tolune.”
45009013	Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Ei Jacob ting kriang nge atiyeda Ei Esau ding batanne.”
45009014	Ati dabe ani pa-aam rin dingbo? Rikrwang khou kathing aih tonu ambo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo.
45009015	Balangbe Rikrwang na Moses khou rinne, “Eina phaangkriang thangnu bating ga phaangkriang thanglune, Eina kriang thang dingnu bating ga kriang thanglune.”
45009016	Atibriakpina heiya bathainu balaang le make, pak ongnu balaang le make atiyeda phaangkriang pi mu thang ongnu Rikrwang khou naye.
45009017	Balangbe Bathiangnu Chongdipna Pharaoh khou rinne, “Eina nakhou Angam indao lang khatle talei chung bing bi Ameng kasam lang hei bahak langna Eina nating pi basaang thang rwe.”
45009018	Atibriakpina Pukraangba Maanna baningnu bating phaangkriang thang nge khatle Maanna sung pi nat thang dingnu bating sung pi nat thang nge.
45009019	Ati dabe nangna akhou rinlune, “Rikrwang na pa-aam toga mi nun om koi ding zongnubo? Balangbe Maanna baningnu ding tuna kakhang gabo?”
45009020	Atiyeda he misa, Rikrwang maitwang bi chong kataknu nang tubo? Bacha thangnu pot kana bacha thangnu bapuba khou “Nang ating paaam lang atiga bacha thangnubo” diga rin dingbo?
45009021	Mak tabe ben bachanu maanna talei imphaannu tum khat pina khat ting takungnu toga choi lang khat ting baiga choi lang bacha lang bakhou ngam amnu makpo?
45009022	Rikrwang na Baom balung pwan tak nu ga indao swakluga mi nun khou Baom ngam ga pi thei thang nwam ngaak peida Maanna to mut lang daan thang ngaaknu balung pwan ben ga Maanna taswang khak khaang theiga khaang thang rwe.
45009023	Heiya lwat langna Maanna kamaga daan thang ngaaknu phaangkriang om ben nun khou Baom balim balei amnu phaangkriang ga Maanna pi mu lang nge.
45009024	Balangbe Maanna ani ding Jihudi rwan lak cha bina makka Gentile rwan lak pina le kou thang rwe.
45009025	Maanna Hosea om chongdip pi le atiga rin thang nge, “Ami nun mak ngaaknu ding Ami nun diga koulune, Khatle kriang thang maknu bating kriangnu diga koulune.”
45009026	“Atiga swaklune dinuba bani khou, ‘Nani Ami nun make’ diga rin damnu riak bahak pi ga, Bani ding ‘Ringnu Rikrwang sa rwan diga koulune.”
45009027	Isaiah na le Israel rwan lang bi atiga pao ong ngaake, “Israel sa rwan mi sing ga tuipui lungtasi za dan ngaak peida, Balei thangnu mi nun za ding kan thangne.
45009028	Balangbe Pukraangba na Baom chwan loi thanglune. Ririak senu bi haga pi toi thanglune. Balangbe Pukraangba na talei ram bi barapnu chwan tolune.”
45009029	Isaiah na meithaan atiga rin thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Kraanmi rwan om Pukraangba na ani lang kik taat thangsia mak ngaake dabe, Ani Sodom dan ngaak tingnuwe, Khatle Gomorrah le bacham ngaak tingnuwe.”
45009030	Ati dabe ani pa-aam rin dingbo? Ririak senu baloi maknu Gentile rwanna ririak senu dinuba balumsanu paan bina hungnu ririak senu ga lousu rwe.
45009031	Atiyeda chongtan om ririak senu ding zongnu Israel rwanna ririak senu chongtan ding lou thang make.
45009032	Pa-aam lang binabo? Balangbe banina ha ding balumsanu gana zong mak ngaake atiyeda banina chongtan om chwan paan bina danga zong ngaake. Balangbe “Ket basui dingnu lung” bi ga ket basui rwe.
45009033	Chongdip pi hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Phaang ngo, Eina Zion bi ket basui dingnu lung khatle balum dingnu lung pui ga thang nge, Khatle tudannu Pukraangba ding balumsanu bating pi kazaklaye.”
45010001	Unao rwan ga, asungna bathainu khatle Rikrwang khou Israel rwan lang hweininu gazo banina ringriak lousu dam lang naye.
45010002	Balangbe bani Rikrwang om lang bi thouna sa ongme atiyeda haga bani bakaba theinu nung suiga make dinu eina bani lang bi sake piye.
45010003	Balangbe bani Rikrwang om ririak senu ding thei make khatle bani om ririak senu ga bacha thou lang zong ga bani cham Rikrwang om ririak senu thwei bi ong make.
45010004	Balangbe balumsanu mi bing ding ririak senu chak thang lang chongtan ga Christa khou loi thang rwe.
45010005	Balangbe Moses na Chongtan om ririak senu lang bi atiga hiak thang nge, “Chongtan nung suiga tonu maan ga haba paan bina ringlune.”
45010006	Atiyeda balumsanu bi hai thangnu ririak senuna rinne, “Nani sung bi ‘Tuna tambaan la ka dingbo?’ diga rin mako.” (Haga Christa ding balu chunglana phunta lang rinnuwe).
45010007	Mak tabe, “ ‘Tuna bakalan maaknu khun la ta langbo?’ diga rin mako.” (Haga Christa ding thinu nun lak pina lou thou lang dinuwe).
45010008	Atiyeda hiak thang ngaaknu gana pa-aam rinbo? Atiga rinne, “Chongkaang ga nakim bi, namun bi khatle nasung bi amme.” Haga anina kasam ongnu balumsat chong ding gaye.
45010009	Hagazo nangna namunna Jisu ding Pukraangba ye diga rin swake dabe khatle Bating thi bina Rikrwang na pi ring thou rwe dinu nasungna balumsaye dabe nating kan thanglune.
45010010	Balangbe mi khatna ririak senu to langna basungna balumsaye khatle ringriak lousu langna bamunna rin swake.
45010011	Balangbe Bathiangnu Chongdipna rinne, “Tudannu Pukraangba ding balumsanu bating ga pi kazaklaye.”
45010012	Balangbe Jihudi le Greek lak pi tei teinu khatchale maake, balangbe khangsung om lu chung bi amnu Pukraangba ga khatcha zwe. Atiga Bating kounu mi bing lang rithoi tamga pi thang nge.
45010013	Balangbe “Tudannu Pukraangba meng ding kounu bing ding kan thanglune.”
45010014	Ati dabe banina balumsa maknu Pukraangba ding tatoga kou dingbo? Banina ngai thang makka Bating tatoga balumsa dingbo? Kasam thangnu mi sui makka banina tatoga ngaisu langbo?
45010015	Bani ding lang thang make dabe banina tatoga kasamnu ngam dingbo? Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Dai bazaangnu sacham kasam ongnu, Khatle karonu sacham phun hungnu bani ket ka intia lang phaang sanubo!”
45010016	Atiyeda bani mi bingna sacham ga zei thang make. Balangbe Isaiah na rinne, “Pukraangba, ani om chongpuk ting tuna balumsarubo?”
45010017	Atibriakpina ngaisunu paan bina balumsanu hung nge khatle ngaisunu ga Rikrwang chong paan bi naye.
45010018	Atiyeda eina rinne, “Bani ngaisu damnuru makpo? Bani batak takka ngaisu drwe. ‘Bani khwan ga talei ram bing thei chang drwe, Khatle bani chong ga talei kalan bing tang drwe.’ ”
45010019	Atiyeda eina rinne, “Israel rwanna theinuru makpo? Moses na kamaga rin ngaake, ‘Gentile rwan paan bina nating antiam lang Eina laolune, Khatle kapangnu chaat om paan bina Eina nating pi balung pwanne.’ ”
45010020	Atiyeda Isaiah na basung raangga atiga rinne, “Ating zong maknu mi nunna Ating lousu rwe; Ating ngai maknu mi nun khou Eina indao thang rwe.”
45010021	Atiyeda Israel rwan om lang bi maanna rinne, “Chong zei maknu khatle chong khetnu mi nun pek la thamlai tarin ei akut kating swak rwe.”
45011001	Ati dabe eina rinne, Rikrwang na Bami nun ding bazwan sat thangrubo? Haga khatchale bazwan sat thang make; balangbe ei le Israel rwan miye. Abraham om kik taat khatle Benjamin om phum bi naye.
45011002	Rikrwang na kamaga thei thang damnu Bami nun ding Maanna bazwan sat thang make, mak tabe Elijah om lang bi Bathiangnu Chongdipna pa-aam rin thangbo dinu nani thei makpo? Maanna Israel rwan maitwang bi Rikrwang khou atiga hwei ngaake,
45011003	“Pukraangba, banina Naom thiamting rwan ding athat sat rwe, Naom rikhaang riak bing to rai sat rwe; araan toza zung rwe. Ating banina athat lang zong ong rwe.”
45011004	Atiyeda Rikrwang na katakka bakhou tato rin dambo? “Baal meithaan bi kekhok deta maknu kapaisa mi raching siari ding Eina Alaang thang ongme.”
45011005	Hadanga atun le phaangkriang paan bina kathang swak thangnu balei thangnu mi kasem ammaang nge.
45011006	Haga phaangkriang paan binaye dabe chwan paan bina lan rwe; ati mak tabe haga phaangkriang latlan rwe. Heiya chwan paannaye dabe, phaangkriang ga phaangkriang latlan rwe mak tabe chwan ga chwan latlan rwe.
45011007	Ati dabe pa-aambo? Israel rwanna rakanga zongnu ga dou make atiyeda kathang swak thangnu mi nun gana lousu rwe khatle ongsianu rwan ga bani sung pi nat thang rwe.
45011008	Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Rikrwang na bani lang inmu nwamnu katha, Mulaanu mik, Khatle ngaisulanu kana, Aniya tangga pi thang rwe.”
45011009	David na rinne, “Bani om thaisaak ka bani ding nam lang le phaa to ding ngo, Khatle ket basui riak khatle takhum baannu riak to ding ngo.
45011010	Banina mu mak lang bani mik zing ding ngo, bakaan bathin bani ngum ga taku ding ngo.”
45011011	Ati dabe eina rinne, Bani balumnu langna ket basuirubo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Atiyeda bani ding pi antiam lang bani om koi maan langna Gentile rwan khou ringriak hung rwe.
45011012	Bani koi maan gana talei ramna lungsa lang khatle bani lang braannu gana Gentile rwan lang lungsanuwe dabe, bani lang khopsanu gana intia inku latlu dingbo?
45011013	Balangbe eina nani Gentile rwan khou rinnuwe, balangbe eiba Gentile rwan om chonglang to briakpina eina to ongnu chwan dinga ei takung nge.
45011014	Atiga eina baningnuba achaat mi nun ding pi antiam lang laoga bani mi kasem ding kanthangnu za lang nge.
45011015	Balangbe bani ding bazwan satnu gana talei ram ding pi taman thang nge dabe, bani ding loukhut thangnu gana thinu nun lak pina pi ring thounu makka pa-aambo?
45011016	Balangbe kat thang kamanu kraa gana bathiang nge dabe, sukdi tum ga bathiang rwe khatle bakamong gana bathiang nge dabe bakachang bing ga le bathiang nge.
45011017	Atiyeda bakachang kasem ding thiaktutluga nilai lak talwan kraa kung, nating bani lak pi pi kaman thangluga talwan kraa kung om kamong bina bathao ga badam lou bachamme dabe,
45011018	thing kachang bing om maitwang bi lian to mako atiyeda nangna lian towe dabe bakamong ding phunnu ga nang make; atiyeda bakamongna nating phunnuwe dinu baningsuwo.
45011019	Ati dabe nangna rinlune, “Ating pi kaman thang langna bakachang bing ding thiaktut rwe.”
45011020	Sa rwe, banina balumsa mak briakpina bani ding thiaktut rwe khatle nangba nabalumsat paan bina han ongme. Atiyeda nang naraanto nating baning basaang mako atiyeda nang kachiyo.
45011021	Balangbe Rikrwang na bakung bahak om kachang bing ding ga hoi thang make dabe, maanna nating le hoi thanglaye.
45011022	Atibriakpina phaang ngo, Rikrwang om kasanu khatle chongsem natnu ding ga kakhanno: balum damnu rwan pek la chongsem natnu atiyeda nangna Rikrwang kriang bi chat makka ong nge dabe napek la kasanu amlune; ati make dabe nating le katap chat satlune.
45011023	Atiga banina le bani om balumsa maknu bi ga atiga ong make dabe bani ding le pi kaman thanglune; balangbe Rikrwang na bani ding pi kaman thang ngamme.
45011024	Balangbe nating bachaang om tonu nilai lak talwan kraa kung bina thiaktutluga bachaang makka anqwat om talwan kraa kung bi pi kaman thang nge dabe, bachaang om bakachang nun ga bazan bahak om kung bi intia lang pi kaman thanglu dingbo?
45011025	Balangbe unao rwan ga, nanina nani baning bi ningtingnuwe diga baning mak lang inthim chong heiya nanina thou to maknu ei bathai make. Dinuba, Gentile rwan bing khut bachang mak basaan, Israel rwan khou sung nat khutnu kasem swak rwe.
45011026	Israel rwan mi bing ding kan thanglune. Hiak thangnu ga dannuwe, “Kanthangnupa ga Zion bina hunglune, Khatle Maanna Jacob khouna Rikrwang ding kachi maknu ga lou satlune.
45011027	Eina bani noh bing ding lou sat thangnu kaan bi, Bani Ei le diga chonghen tonu ga hagaye.”
45011028	Sacham om lang bi nani lang chungna bani nun munanu nunne atiyeda kathang swak thangnu om lang bi ani pu pa rwan lang chungna baniya kriang thangnu nunne.
45011029	Balangbe Rikrwang om kriangnu leithwan khatle kou thangnu heiya kale latnu za make.
45011030	Balangbe bakaan khat pi nani Rikrwang chong zei mak ngaake atiyeda atun Israel rwanna chong zei mak briakpina nani nun phaangkriang ga lousu rwe,
45011031	hadanga bani atun le chong zei maknu to rwe heiya nani khou pi mu thang damnu phaangkriang paan bina banina le phaangkriang lousu dam lang naye.
45011032	Balangbe Rikrwang na bani bing ding chong zei maknu bi pi khut thang rwe, haga Maanna mi bing khou phaangkriang pi thang lang naye.
45011033	Tasiatnuweda, Rikrwang om ningting khatle theinu om balim balei ga intia lang thuk tamnubo! Baom chongsem ga intia lang zong tang ngam maknubo khatle Balampui ding ga intia lang suingam maknubo!
45011034	“Balangbe Pukraangba sung ding tuna theinu ngambo? Mak tabe, tuna Pukraangba ding bachuthangnupa torugabo?”
45011035	“Ati mak tabe, Rikrwang na bakhou thun thang lang Rikrwang khou tuna pi dambo, Pukraangba lang kamaga pi luga Bakhouna lou lat tingnu tu ambo?”
45011036	Balangbe Bakhouna khatle Bapaan bina khatle Balaang zana pot bingza am ongme. Lwat liannu ga khwa seiga Balaang to ding ngo. Amen.
45012001	Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, nanina nani pum ding baring, bathiangnu, Rikrwang na lou thang zanu rikhaang pot toga kat thang lang eina Rikrwang phaangkriang paan bina nani ding hweiye. Haga nanina tonu zek swaknu chwandonne.
45012002	Heiba talei ram om thot ting bazei mako atiyeda Rikrwang na baningnu kasanu, lou thang zanu khatle bachang sanu ga ingaabo dinu nanina tamphaangluga thei lang nani sung bi pi kathanluga kale swako.
45012003	Balangbe Rikrwang na Baom phaangkriang akhou pi thangnu paan bina, nani lak pi ongnu mi bing khou eina rinnuwe. Nanina kakhan hoinu bi gana baning basaang mak lang atiyeda mi bing khou Rikrwang na bani balumsat chaang nung suiga bazan bazan ding raakluga kakhan lang eina rinnuwe.
45012004	Balangbe ani pum bi naat taswang khak amluga naat bingna to dingnu bathouga bacham maknu danga,
45012005	ani taswang khak ngaak peida Christa khou pum khatcha to rwe; ani pakhat khat heiya khat le khat om naat to rwe.
45012006	Atiga ani khou pi thangnu Baom phaangkriang nung suiga ani khou tei teinu leithwan amme. Ri chong rin swaknu omme dabe haga ani om balumsanu chaang nung suiga sizinzo.
45012007	Mak tabe chwanlaang tonu omme dabe chwanlaang tonu bi sizin ding gaye; bachu thangnu omme dabe maanna bachu thang ding gaye.
45012008	Kachui thangnu omme dabe maanna kachui thang ding gaye, pi swaknu omme dabe maanna batainu to makka pi swak ting gaye. Kai thangnu omme dabe maanna sung khutka kai thang ding gaye, phaangkriang chwan tonu omme dabe maanna karo karoga to ding gaye.
45012009	Kriangnu ga sathot to makka kriang ding ngo. Sa maknu ding ga batanno, kasanu ga choitipo.
45012010	Unao kriang kalenu danga khat le khat kriang kaleyo. Khatna khat ting inkunuwe diga takung tazei to kaleyo.
45012011	Chwan chang ngo khatle takaat mako. Sung khutka Pukraangba chwanlaang towo.
45012012	Bachunnu bi karowo, riangre kanangnu bi khaang theiyo; hweininu bi chat maknu towo.
45012013	Bathiangnu mi nun om bathaang amnu bi ga badam lou bacham thang ngo. Man rwan ding takungga to thangbiyo.
45012014	Nani ding rainu nun khou rithoi pi thangbiyo, rithoi pi thang ngo khatle seng thang mako.
45012015	Karonu nun le karo bachammo, chapnu nun le chap bachammo.
45012016	Khat le khat chong cham laa chammo, naraanto nating baning basaang mako; lungsianu nun le bachammo. Nazan om baningnu bi ga ningtingnuwe diga baning mako.
45012017	Pakhatcha khou hakna kasianu langna kasianu baan mako. Mi bingza meithaan bi kasanu ga to lang kakhanno.
45012018	Zanu bing nangna ngam basaan mi bing le dai bazaangga ong bachammo.
45012019	Kriangnu nun, nani cham takhum baan kale mako atiyeda Rikrwang balung pwan bi lang khaak thang ngo. Balangbe heiya hiak thangga amme, “Takhum baannu Aomme; Eina takhum baan thangne” diga Pukraangba na rinne.
45012020	Atibriakpina “Nating munanu gana chaamme dabe pi sa thangbiyo, Taraanne dabe pi in thangbiyo. Balangbe atiga tonu gana nangna balusip pi choknu meithin pei thanglune.”
45012021	Kasia nuna pi ngam mako atiyeda kasanuna kasianu ding ga pi ngammo.
45013001	Mi bingza ngam choinu rwan thwei bi ong ding gaye. Balangbe Rikrwang khouna makka ngam choinu maake. Am ongnu ngam choinu bing ga Rikrwang na hap thangnuwe.
45013002	Atibriakpina tudannu ngam choinu nun ding maitwangnu maan ga Rikrwang na kathang swak thangnu ding maitwangnuwe. Maitwangnu nun gana bani pum bi chongsem lousulune.
45013003	Balangbe taleipuba rwan ding kasanu chwan tonu mi nunna kachi lang make atiyeda kasianu chwan tonu mi nun langba kachinuwe. Atiga nang ngam choinu bating kachi maknu to nwambo? Kasanu chwan towo. Atiye dabe nangna ngam choinu bakhouna nating swankanu lousulune.
45013004	Balangbe maan nalaang sa langna Rikrwang om swake. Atiyeda nangna sa maknu chwan towe dabe nang bating kachiyo. Balangbe maanna baom kachaak chem ga bathaang maaknu bi phunnu make khatle maan Rikrwang swake. Atiga maan sa maknu chwan tonu bating ga balung pwannu om takhum baan lang ongnuwe.
45013005	Atibriakpina balung pwannu lang za bina makka kakoi baze theinu sung lang chungna ba thwei bi ong ding gaye.
45013006	Atibriakpina nanina ramkhai le pi ongnu rwe, balangbe ngam choinu rwan heiya bakaan bathin Rikrwang swak rwan toga bani om chwan sung khutka to ongnu nunne.
45013007	Nanina mi bing khou pinu zek swaknu ga piyo: ramkhai pinu zek swaknu mi khou ga ramkhai piyo khatle rampon pinu zek swaknu mi khou ga rampon piyo, kachi dingnu bating kachiyo khatle takhwang to dingnu bating takhwang towo.
45013008	Khat le khat kriang kalenu lei makka, pakhatcha khou hakna lei chaak mako. Balangbe mi khatna mi katei khat ting kriangnu gana chongtan ding pi bapung pha thang nge.
45013009	Balangbe zathangna rinne, “Lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to mako,” “Mi athat mako,” “Barusa mako,” “Kakoinu sake pi mako,” “Ra-aam mako.” Zathang katei am ngaaklena, “Nangna nainnai lounai rwan ding nazan bahak ting danga kriang ding gaye” dinu zathang biya kai karung thang rwe.
45013010	Kriangnuna bainnai lounai khou kasianu to make. Atibriakpina kriangnuna chongtan bing ding pi bapung pha thangnuwe.
45013011	Bakaan heiya thei thang ngo, atun in ong bina barak swaknu kaan zung rwe. Balangbe ani om ringriak ka anina meithaan balumsa ngaaknu kaan ma atunna nai inku rwe.
45013012	Zingpha loi dam ding rwe, khwa baan lang nai rwe. Atibriakpina anina kazingnu chwan ga bathan satluga baannu kraan pon naat ka sin basoirizo.
45013013	Ani thamlai danga se chuiga sezo, sa in kalonu khatle zu kalonu, lung rangwangnu khatle imbet boulaanu, kabit kamainu khatle antiamnu to makcho.
45013014	Atiyeda pwan sinnu danga, Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding sin basoiyo khatle zanti pumna bathainu ga pi hung tang lang zanti pum bi badou chanu khatchale pi mako.
45014001	Balumsanu bi sonnu bating ga loukhut thang ngo atiyeda balumsia zanu pot om lang bi kae lang make.
45014002	Balangbe mi khatna pot bingza sa zaye diga baning nge atiyeda kasonnu katei khatna anpekcha saye.
45014003	Sa ongnu maanna sa maknu bating ga balaanu to mak ting ngo khatle sa maknu maan gana sa ongnu bating ga chong kasem mak ting ngo, balangbe Rikrwang na bating loukhut thang rwe.
45014004	Mi pakhat om swak ting chong kasem ongnu nang tubo? Maan han ong ngaakle balumnu ngaakle bapuba meithaan bi amme. Batak takka bating pi han thanglune, balangbe Rikrwang na bating pi han thangnu ngamme.
45014005	Mi khatna lumik khat ting lumik khatna inkuwe diga baning nge, mi khatna lumik bing bachamme diga baning nge; mi bing zana basung basung bi siat siatka thei ding ngo.
45014006	Tudannu lumik khat ting ngaaknu maan ga Pukraangba lang ngaaknuwe khatle lumik khat ting ngaak maknu maan gana Pukraangba langna ngaak maknuwe khatle tudannu sanu maan gana Pukraangba langna sanuwe, balangbe maanna Rikrwang ding swanne. Atiga sa maknu maan gana Pukraangba langna sa maknuwe khatle maanna Rikrwang ding swankaye.
45014007	Balangbe ani pakhatchanale bapum bahak lang ring make khatle pakhatchanale bapum bahak lang thi make.
45014008	Balangbe ani ring nge dabe Pukraangba lang ringnuwe, ani thiye dabe Pukraangba lang thinuwe. Atibriakpina ani thi le ring le Pukraangba omme.
45014009	Balangbe Christa na thinu nun khatle ringnu nun om Pukraangba to langna Maan thi rwe khatle ring le ring thou drwe khatle ringga ongme.
45014010	Atiyeda nangna pa-aam toga nau nanao ding chong kasem ongnubo? Mak tabe nau nanao ding balaanubo? Balangbe ani mi bingza Christa om chongsem kaong riak meithaan bi hung hanlune.
45014011	Balangbe atiga hiak thang nge, “Pukraangba na rinne, Ei ringga ong briakpina, Mi bingza Ameithaan bi kekhok deta lune, Khatle balei bingna Rikrwang ding swan lune.”
45014012	Atiga ani mi bing zana baom baom lang bi singchak ka Rikrwang khou hung pi lune.
45014013	Atibriakpina ani khatna khat ting chong kasem kale latlanrizo atiyeda unao rwan lampui bi kalan lang mak tabe ket basui dingnu pot thang mak lang ani sung hanrizo.
45014014	Pot bingza baraantoza tanaat khap tinu khatchale maake dinu Pukraangba Jisu khou ei bathiangga theiye khatle ei siat siatka theiye; atiyeda pot khat ting tanaatnuwe diga baningnu bakhou haga balaangza tanaatnuwe.
45014015	Balangbe thaisaak om lang bina naunao pakhat ting basung pi katope dabe, nang kriangnu nung suiga selan rwe; atiga Christa na bahut toga thi thang damnu bating naom thaisaakna to braan mako.
45014016	Atibriakpina nani om kasanu ding ga mi nunna kasianu zwe diga rin mak ting ngo.
45014017	Balangbe Rikrwang om krwang talei ga kasa kain om make atiyeda Katha Bathiangnu khou ririak senu dai bazaangnu khatle karonuwe.
45014018	Balangbe hei bing bi Christa ding chwanlaang to ongnu bating ga Rikrwang na pem thang nge khatle mi nunna le lou thang nge.
45014019	Atibriakpina dai bazaangnu khatle khatna khat ting bacha thounu bing ga ani sui baloizo.
45014020	Thaisaak lang chungna Rikrwang chwan ding to braan mako. Batak takka pot bingza bathiangnuwe. Atiyeda ket pi basuinu le bachamga sa ongnu manpa lang ga kakoinuwe.
45014021	Zu zan sa innu sa make mak tabe nau nanao khat ting pi balum dingnu, ket pi basui dingnu mak tabe sung pi son dingnu bing ga tonu sa make.
45014022	Nakhou balumsat ambo? Haga Rikrwang meithaan bi naraan toza om towo. Bazanna za thang damnu lang bi bazan ding koi impu thang maknu maan ga aih sanuwe.
45014023	Atiyeda balumsiaga sanu maan ga kakoinu to rwe, balangbe maanna balumsaga sa make; balumsanu bina maknu bing ga noh we.
45015001	Kanatnu anina kasonnu rwan om soinu ding khaang thang ding gaye. Anina ani raantoza ding pi pem mak ting gaye.
45015002	Ani mi bing zana bainnai lounai rwan ding sa lang khatle bacha thou pui lang anina bani ding pemnu to ding gaye.
45015003	Balangbe Christa na le Baraanto Bating pi pem mak ngaake. Hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Nating rin basiatnu mi nunna rin basiatnu bing ga alu chung bi ta rwe.”
45015004	Balangbe kamana hiak thang ngaaknu bing ga ani lang bachu thang lang naye. Haga Bathiangnu Chongdip pina hungnu khaang seinu khatle kachui thangnu paan bi, ani khou siat siatnu theinu baning ga am lang naye.
45015005	Atiga khaang seinu khatle kachui thangnu pi thangnu Rikrwang na nani khou Jisu Christa na baningnu nung suiga nani khat le khat sung khatcha tonu ga pi thang ding ngo.
45015006	Heiyana nani khangsung karungluga khwan khatcha toga ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Rikrwang khatle Pa ding swannu ngam lang nge.
45015007	Atibriakpina Christa na le ani ding loukhut thangnu danga, Rikrwang lwat lian langna nani cham khatna khat ting lou thang kaleyo.
45015008	Balangbe eina rinne, ani pu pa rwan khou karen thang ngaaknu chongren ding pi tip thang lang khatle Rikrwang om bazenu ga pi mu thang lang Jisu Christa na mun romnu mi nun lang chwan to rwe.
45015009	Gentile rwanna le Rikrwang na phaangkriang thangnu langna Bating lwat pi lian lang nge. Haga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Atibriakpina Gentile rwan lak pi eina Nating swanne, Khatle eina Nameng ding swanga laa tone.”
45015010	Atiga rin late, “Gentile rwan bing ga, Bami nun le diga karo bachammo.”
45015011	Atiga le rin late, “Gentile rwan bing ga, Pukraangba ding swanno! Chaat bingna Pukraangba ding swan ding ngo!”
45015012	Isaiah na le rinne, “Jesse om Kamong khat lung hunglune, Khatle Maan Gentile rwan lu chung bi krwang paan lang thoulune. Gentile rwanna Bakhou bachunnu amlune.”
45015013	Atun bachunnu om Rikrwang na nani khou balumsanu bi karonu khatle dai bazaangnu pi sip thangnu to ding ngo. Hagana Katha Bathiangnu om ngam paan bina nani om bachunnu ga tam inku thou lang nge.
45015014	He au anao rwanga, nani khou kasanuna sip rwe, theinu bingna sip rwe khatle khatna khat ting cheksin lang bachu thang kalenu ngam rwe dinu akhou balumsanu am rwe.
45015015	Atiyeda Rikrwang na akhou phaangkriang pi thang briakpina nani khou pi baningsu thangnu toga eina balang kasem bi sung raang takka nani khou hiake.
45015016	Hagazo, Gentile rwan khou eina Christa Jisu om chwanlaang mi to lang Rikrwang om sacham chwanlaang to rwe. Hagazo Katha Bathiangnuna to bathiang thang damnu Gentile rwan ga Rikrwang na lou thang lang khopnu potkat to lang naye.
45015017	Atibriakpina Rikrwang om chwan lang bi ei Jisu Christa paan bina alian tonu lousu lang balang amme.
45015018	Balangbe chongkaang khatle chwan bi Gentile rwanna chong zei lang Christa na ating sizin thangga to damnu chwan rwan ga makka eina pa-aam tatonu khatchale sung raangga kabialaye.
45015019	Haga badan liannu khatle tasiatnu chwan bing ga Rikrwang Katha om ngam paan bina swak ngaake. Jerusalem bina thouga se koiluga Illyricum taram tangga Christa om sacham ga bachang saga eina kasam ngaake.
45015020	Christa meng ngai thang maknu riak pi sacham kasamnu heiya aom badannuwe. Heiya eina mi katei om inmun bi to thou mak lang naye.
45015021	Atiyeda haga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Balang bi rin thang mak aangnu mi nunna Bating mulune, Khatle khatchale ngaisu mak aangnu mi nunna bakaba theilune.”
45015022	Haba om lang bina nani khou hung mak lang ating hanga hanga to khamnam rwe.
45015023	Atiyeda atun ala pek alaang bariak maak hungru briakpina khatle sangwan inza ei nani khou hung lang baning hung ngaak briakpina,
45015024	eina Spain la senu kaan bi nani kim bi hungluga nani le diga kadou lang bachunne. Atiga kamaga bakaan kasem eina nani le karoga ong bachamnu nung alamsek pi ga nanina ating paang thanglune diga baning nge.
45015025	Atiyeda atunba ei Jerusalem la bathiangnu mi nun lang chwanlaang to lang se maang nge.
45015026	Balangbe Jerusalem bi amnu bathiangnu mi nun lak pi lungsianu rwan lang paang thangnu ga Macedonia rwan khatle Achaia rwanna pemnuwe.
45015027	Haga bani lang taswang khak pemnuwe, bataknuba ha rwan ga bathiangnu mi nun khou lei chaak rwe. Balangbe bani om Katha om badam ga Gentile rwanna lou bachamme dabe, banina le pum om tonu pot lang bi Gentile rwanna Jihudi rwan khou chwanlaang to lang lei chaaknuwe.
45015028	Atibriakpina eina heiba chwanna loi thangsialuga paang thangnu pot heiya bani khou soi makka pi thangsialuga Spain la senu kaan bi nani khou hungne.
45015029	Eina nani khou hungnu kaan bi Christa om rithoina sipnu sacham le bachamga ei hunglune dinu ei theiye.
45015030	Unao rwan ga, atun eina nani ding hweiye dinuba, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khatle Katha na akhou kriangnu pi thangnu paan bina nanina ei le bachamga rakanga Rikrwang khou alaang hweini thang ong lang ninuwe.
45015031	Atiga Judea bi amnu balumsa maknu nun kut pina ating kan thang lang khatle Jerusalem la eina to thang damnu achwan ga bathiangnu mi nunna lou thang zanu to lang hweini thang ngo.
45015032	Atiga Rikrwang na baningnu sung bi ei nani khou karoga hungluga nani le chaang pi ring bacham lang nge.
45015033	Atun dai bazaangnu Rikrwang na nani le diga ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
45016001	Cenchrea om rupkathan bi chwanlaang to ongnu ani sannu Phoebe ding loukhut thang lang eina nani khou man pi thei thangnuwe.
45016002	Khopsaga bathiangnu mi nun danga nanina bating Pukraangba khou loukhut thang ngo khatle nani khouna balaang bathaang amnu bing bi nanina bating sui paang thang ngo. Balangbe maan bazan bahakna mi taswang khak ting paang thang rwe khatle ating le paang thang rwe.
45016003	Jisu Christa khou ei le diga chwan to bachamnu Priscilla le Aquila ding kalum thang ngo.
45016004	Akatha ding kan langna barweina thinu tangga kachi lan rwe. Barwei ding araanto zana makka, Gentile rwan om rupkathan bingna le rinswan rwe.
45016005	Hadanga barwei in bi amnu rupkathan ding le kalum thang ngo. Christa khou ongnu Achaia om kamanu kraa to ongnu eina kriangnu Epaenetus ting kalum thang ngo.
45016006	Ani langna chwan katop ongnu Mary ding kalum thang ngo.
45016007	Ei le diga qwan in bi ong bacham ngaaknu ain thirui Andronicus le Junia ding kalum thang ngo. Bani nun chonglang rwan lak pi meng senu khatle ama Christa khou hung kamanu mi nunne.
45016008	Pukraangba khou eina kriangnu Amplias ting kalum thang ngo.
45016009	Christa khou ani le diga chwan to bachamnu Urbanus khatle eina kriangnu Stachys ting kalum thang ngo.
45016010	Christa khou sanuwe diga chak thang damnu Apelles ting kalum thang ngo, Aristobulus in inkhun mi bing ding kalum thang ngo.
45016011	Ain thirui Herodion le Pukraangba khou ongnu Narcissus in inkhun ding kalum thang ngo.
45016012	Pukraangba khou chwan to ongnu Tryphena le Tryphosa ding kalum thang ngo. Pukraangba khou chwan to rakan ongnu kriangnu Persis ting kalum thang ngo.
45016013	Pukraangba khou kathang swaknu Rufus le anu to ongnu banu ding kalum thang ngo.
45016014	Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobus, Hermes khatle bani le diga ong bachamnu unao rwan bing ding kalum thang ngo.
45016015	Philologus, Julia, Nereus le banao kamaisa khatle Olympas, bani le diga ong bachamnu bathiangnu mi bing ding kalum thang ngo.
45016016	Bathiangnu kaput le bachamga khat le khat kalum kaleyo. Christa om rupkathan bingna nani ding kalumme.
45016017	Unao rwan ga, atun eina nani ding hweiye, nanina thei damnu bachu thangnu om maitwang bi hennu, lang swaknu khatle ket pi basuinu bani ding ga bapu theiyo; bani ding ga karung mako.
45016018	Balangbe hadannu mi nun ga ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding chwanlaang tonu make atiyeda bani bon langza baloinu mi nunne. Munthiam saga chong kabianu khatle thumnu chong biakna chamnu mi nun om sung ding banina minamme.
45016019	Balangbe nani om chong zeinu lang bi mi bing zana thei rwe. Atibriakpina nani lang bi ei karowe atiyeda nani nun kasanu lang bi ningtingnu to lang atiluga kasianu lang bi koi maaknu eina bathaiye.
45016020	Bakaan inchan maknu sung bi dai bazaangnu Rikrwang na Seitaan ding nani ketbaza thwei bi kadim kataalune. Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang nani khou ong thang ding ngo. Amen.
45016021	Eile chwan to bachamnu Timothy, ain thirui Lucius, Jason khatle Sosipater nale nani ding kalumme.
45016022	Heiba chamthwan hiaknu Tertius na Pukraangba khou nani ding kalumme.
45016023	Aom bazin inpuba Gaius khatle rupkathan bingna nani ding kalumme. Namlian om sianripuba Erastus le unao Quartus na nani ding kalumme.
45016024	Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang nani mi bing khou am ding ngo. Amen.
45016025	Atun eina rin indao swak ongnu sacham khatle Jisu Christa ding kasamnu nung suiga, talei dam bina thouga inkam thangga hung ngaaknu inthim chong ding indao thangnu nani ding bacha thou thang ngamnu nung suiga
45016026	(atiyeda atunba indao thangdamnu khatle thiamting rwan om Bathiangnu Chongdip paanna chaat bing khou pi thei thangdamnu) khatle khwa sei ringnu Rikrwang om zathang nung suiga balumsaga rinnu zei lang nani ding pi nat thang ngamnu
45016027	Rikrwang, Baraantoza ningtingnu, Bakhou, Jisu Christa paanna khwa sei lwat liannu to ding ngo. Amen.
46001001	Rikrwang om baning thangnu paanna Jisu Christa om chonglang to lang kou thangnu, Paul khatle ani unao Sosthenes na,
46001002	Corinthia namlian bi amnu Rikrwang om rupkathan bi amnu bathiangnu rwan to lang kou thangnu, Jisu Christa khou to bathiang thang damnu mi nun khou, bani om le ani om le tonu Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng ding kounu bariak bathin bi ongnu mi bing khou,
46001003	ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou am ding ngo.
46001004	Jisu Christa na nani khou pi thang damnu Rikrwang om phaangkriang langna eina nani lang bi araantoza ding bakaan bathin swanne,
46001005	dinuba Bakhou ong ga balang bing za bi, dinuba nanina kabia swaknu bing bi khatle theinu bing bi, nani ding Maanna pi inku ka thang rwe
46001006	khatle Christa om sake ga tangga nani khou pi tip thang rwe.
46001007	Atibriakpina Pukraangba Jisu Christa om indao thang dingnu ding ga taraan ga ngaak ong bi nani lang Katha om leithwan ga khatchale baat make.
46001008	Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om lumik pi nani koi maaknu to lang nani ding kakhamnu tangga pi tip thanglune.
46001009	Rikrwang heiya balumsa zanuwe, Maanna Basa Kapaisa Jisu Christa, ani Pukraangba om badam lou bacham lang nani ding kou thang rwe.
46001010	Unao rwan ga, nani khangsungna khatcha toga kabia lang khatle nani lak pi khak langnu maak lang nani nun sungcham laachamnu bi khatle chongsem laasemnu bi khopsaga karung dam lang atun eina ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng bi nani ding kachui thang nge.
46001011	Au anao rwan ga, nani lak pi kae kanaanu amme diga nani lang bi Chloe in inkhun mi rwan kasemna akhou pu thang rwe.
46001012	Atun eina heiya rinne, nani pakhat khat na, “Eiba Paul omme,” mak tabe “Eiba Apollos omme,” mak tabe “Eiba Cephas omme,” mak tabe “Eiba Christa omme” diga rinne.
46001013	Christa ding khak langrubo? Paul ding nani lang chungna cross pi bakhai thangrubo? Mak tabe nani ding Paul meng bi baptize to thangrubo?
46001014	Eina Crispus le Gaius ting makka nani pakhatcha ding le baptize to dam make, ha langna eina Rikrwang ding swanne.
46001015	Mi pakhatchanale eina ameng bina baptize to rwe diga rin mak lang nge.
46001016	O, eina Stephenas in inkhun mi nun ding le baptize to thang damme. Haga maknu mi katei rwan ding baptize to thang damme dinu ei thei make.
46001017	Balangbe Christa na ating baptize to lang lang thangnu make atiyeda Christa om cross ka bathaang maaknu to mak lang chongkaang om ningtingna makka, sacham kasam lang lang thang rwe.
46001018	Balangbe braan ongnu rwan khou cross om chong ga kapangnuwe atiyeda kan thang damnu ani langba heiya Rikrwang om ngamme.
46001019	Heiya hiak thangga amme, “Eina ningtingnu rwan om ningting ding to braan satne Khatle bakaba theinu nun om bakaba theinu ding ga khatchale maknu pi tone.”
46001020	Ningtingnu ingaipai ambo? Chongtan bachuthangnu ingaipai ambo? Heiba bakaan om kae theinu mi ingaipai ambo? Rikrwang na heiba talei ram mi nun om ningting ding kapangnu pi tonu makpo?
46001021	Balangbe talei ram om ningtingna Rikrwang ding theinu ngam mak briakpina, Rikrwang om ningtingbe sacham kasamnu om paan bina balumsanu nun ding kan thang lang dinuwa Rikrwang na baningnuwe.
46001022	Balangbe Jihudi rwanna badannu ding zong nge khatle Greek rwanna ningting ding zong nge.
46001023	Atiyeda anina cross pi athat tamnu Christa ding kasamme, Jihudi rwan langba heiya ket basui riak khatle Greek rwan lang kapangnuwe.
46001024	Atiyeda Rikrwang na kou thang damnu nun Jihudi rwan khatle Greek rwan khou Christa heiya Rikrwang om ngam khatle Rikrwang om ningting nge.
46001025	Balangbe Rikrwang om kapangnu gana misa ningting ma ningting inkuwe khatle Rikrwang om sonnu gana misa om nat ma nat inkuwe.
46001026	Balangbe unao rwan ga, nani ding kou thangnu ding phaang ngo, pum nung suiga ningtingnu mi tomme, kangamnu mi tomme khatle kasei kalian tam make;
46001027	atiyeda ningtingnu rwan ding pi kazak langna talei ram om kapangnu nun ding Rikrwang na ka thang rwe khatle ngam amnu nun ding pi kazak langna talei ram om kasonnu nun ding Rikrwang na ka thang rwe.
46001028	Bakung tonu pot bing ding khatchale maknu to lang Rikrwang na talei ram om talunu pot ting khatle phaang batanu pot bing ding ka thang rwe.
46001029	Heiya pakhatchanale Rikrwang meithaan bi lian to mak lang nge.
46001030	Bapaan bina nani Christa Jisu khou amme, maanna ani lang Rikrwang khouna ningting khatle ririak senu, to bathiang thangnu khatle ran swakthangnupa to rwe.
46001031	Hagana, “Lian tonu maan gana, Pukraangba khou lian to ding ngo” diga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe.
46002001	Aunao rwan ga, eina nani khou hungnu kaan bi Rikrwang om sake ga indao thang lang hungnuwe, sa inkunu om mak tabe ningting om chongbiak le bachamga hungnu make.
46002002	Balangbe Jisu Christa khatle cross pi athat tamnu Bating ga makka nani lak pi khatchale thei mak lang asung bi han ngaake.
46002003	Ei songa, kachiga khatle kathok dun dun ga nani le ong bacham ngaake.
46002004	Achong biak khatle aom kasam ongnu heiya misa om ningtingna bathem swaknu chongkaangna make atiyeda katha ding khatle ngam ding indaonuwe.
46002005	Heiya nani om balumsat ka misa om ningtingna makka, Rikrwang om ngam bi to lang nge.
46002006	Atiyeda mipu phanu mi nun lak pi ani ningting chong kabiaye atiyeda heiba bakaan om ningting mak tabe bathaang khatchale maaknu heiyabe bakaan om bapuba rwan om ningting make.
46002007	Atiyeda Rikrwang om ningting ga anina inthim toga kabiaye, haga ani om lwat langna talei dam mak baleina Rikrwang na kamaga som thangnu, inkam thangnu ningting nge.
46002008	Atiyeda heiba bakaan om bapuba rwan pakhatchanale thei mak ngaake, balangbe banina thei ngaake dabe banina lwat liannu Pukraangba ding cross pi athat mak ngaak tingnuwe.
46002009	Atiyeda haga hiak thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe, “Rikrwang na Bating kriangnu nun lang daan thang damnu lang bing ga mikna mu dam make, Kanana ngaisu dam make, Khatle misa om lungning bi khut tam make.”
46002010	Atiyeda bani ga Rikrwang na Bakatha paan bina ani khou indao thang rwe. Balangbe Katha gana balang bing, o, Rikrwang om kathuknu lang bing ding zong nge.
46002011	Balangbe misa sung bi amnu katha gana makka mi nun lak pi mi khat om lang ding theinu ngamgabo? Hadanga Rikrwang om lang heiya le Rikrwang om katha gana makka tupai pakhatchanale theinu ngam make.
46002012	Anina talei ram om katha ga lousunu make atiyeda Rikrwang na ani khou bathaam pi thangnu pot ting anina thei lang Rikrwang khouna Katha ga lousunuwe.
46002013	Hei bing nga ani le misa om ningtingna bachu thangnu om chong bina make atiyeda Katha om lang ding Katha om chong le kabialuga Katha Bathiangnuna bachu thangnu chong bing ga anina kabiaye.
46002014	Bachaang om mina Rikrwang Katha om balang ding loukhutnu ngam make; balangbe bani ga bakhou kapangnuwe; balang rwan ga Katha om lang bi tamphaang briakpina maanna bani ding theinu ngam make.
46002015	Katha om mi gana balang bing ga tamphaang nge atiyeda pakhatchanale bazan ding bazega tamphaang make.
46002016	Balangbe “Tuna Pukraangba sung ding theiga Bating bachu thang ding gabo?” Atiyeda ani khou Christa om lungning amme.
46003001	Aunao rwan ga, eina nani khou Katha om mi nun khou kabianu danga kabianu ngam mak ngaake atiyeda eina nani khou pum nung suinu mi nun khou danga, Christa khou naosen rwan to ongnu mi khou danga kabia damme.
46003002	Ei nani khou sen kanu tui pi in thang nge, kanatnu thaisaak pi sa make; balangbe haba kaan bi nanina lou thang ngam make khatle atun tang ga le nani ngam mak aang nge.
46003003	Balangbe atun tangga nani pum nung suinu mi nun to ong maang nge. Balangbe nani lak pi antiamnu, kae kalenu khatle khak langnu, nani pumna bathainu mi nun khatle misa nun danga senu makkabo?
46003004	Balangbe mi pakhatna rinne, “Eiba Paul omme,” pakhatna, “Eiba Apollos omme,” nani nun pum nung suinu mi nun makkabo?
46003005	Ati dabe, Paul tubo? Apollos tubo? Atiyeda Pukraangba na nani pakhat khat khou pi thang damnu chwan danga, chonglang nun paanna nanina balumsanuwe.
46003006	Eina ling thang rwe, Apollos na tui sai rwe atiyeda Rikrwang na pi sing thou thang rwe.
46003007	Ati dabe ling thangnu khatle tui sai thangnu maan ga khatchale make atiyeda bakung tonuba pi sing thou thang ongnu Rikrwang gaye.
46003008	Ling thangnu mi ga le tui sainu mi ga khatcha zwe, mi bingna baom bachwan nung suiga baom taswan lousulune.
46003009	Balangbe ani Rikrwang le chwan to bachamnu nunne, nani nun Rikrwang om lou gaye, nani Rikrwang om inne.
46003010	Rikrwang na akhou pi thangnu phaangkriang nung suiga, ningtingnu in to theinu mi khat tanga eina inmun thwan thang rwe khatle katei pakhatna habei ga in to thou rwe. Atiyeda mi bingna habei ga maanna tatoga to thou langbo dinu cheksin ding ngo.
46003011	Balangbe thwan thang damnu inmun, Jisu Christa ga makka pakhatchanale inmun katei thwannu ngam make.
46003012	Tudannu pakhatna heiba inmun chung bi kachaakna, tangkana, baman kungnu lungna, thingna, thingna louna chaanna, saangbuna in to thouwe dabe,
46003013	mi bing om chwan ga indaolune; lumikna haga pao swaklune, meina haga indaolune; meina mi bing om chwan ga pa-aambo dinu tamphaanglune.
46003014	Tudannu pakhat om chwan, dinuba maanna habei to thounu in ga kaling makka atiga am ong nge dabe, maan taswan ga loulune.
46003015	Tudannu pakhat om chwan ga meina rou sat tamme dabe balaang braanlune atiyeda maan bapum dingba mei sung bina dwak swaknu danga kan thanglune.
46003016	Nani Rikrwang om inne khatle Rikrwang om Katha na nani khou ong ongme dinu nani thei makpo?
46003017	Tudannu pakhatna Rikrwang om in ga to tanaate dabe, Rikrwang na bating to tanaat lune. Balangbe Rikrwang om in ga bathiangnuwe, nani haba in gaye.
46003018	Pakhatchanale bazan bahak ting minam mak ting ngo. Nani lak pi tudannu pakhatna heiba bakaan bi maan ningtingnu miye diga baning nge dabe, ningtingnu to lang maan kapangnu to ding ngo.
46003019	Balangbe talei ram om ningting ga Rikrwang khou kapangnuwe. Balangbe atiga hiak thang nge, “Rikrwang na ningtingnu rwan ding bani bahak om rou sianu bi namme”
46003020	khatle atiga hiak thang late, “Pukraangba na ningtingnu mi nun om sung ga bathaang maaknuwe dinu theiye.”
46003021	Atibriakpina pakhatchanale misa om lang bi lian to mak ting ngo. Balangbe pot bingza nani omme;
46003022	Paul ngaakle Apollos ngaakle Cephas ngaakle talei ram ngaakle ringnu ngaakle thinu ngaakle am ongnu pot ngaakle hung dingnu ngaakle pot bingza nani omme.
46003023	Nani nun Christa omme, Christa ga Rikrwang omme.
46004001	Mi pakhatna ani ding Christa om swak rwan khatle Rikrwang om inthim chong om chwanlaang mi nun ding danga baning ding gaye.
46004002	Haza makka chwanlaang mi nun ga balumsa lang khopnu mi nun toga dou ding gaye.
46004003	Atiyeda nanina ating tamphaang nge dabe mak tabe mi nun om chongtok nung suiga chong towe dabe, haga akhou khatchale make. Batak takka, ei azan bahakna ating chong kasem make.
46004004	Balangbe ei azanna akoi khatchale thei make atiyeda heiyana ating pi baze thangnuba make; atiyeda ating tamphaang ongnu Maan ga Pukraangba ye.
46004005	Atibriakpina Pukraangba na hung lat mak basaan, bakaan tang makpi chong kasem mako. Kazingnu bi inkam thangnu lang bing Maanna baannu bi phun swaklune khatle mi nun om sung bi amnu baning inza ding le indao swaklune; haba kaan bi mi bingna Rikrwang khouna bani om swankanu ga lousulune.
46004006	Au anao rwan ga nani pakhatchanale mi khat maitwang bi lian to mak lang hiak thangnu bi gana inkuga kakhan mak lang hei bing nga ani paanna bachu lang nani langna eina azan ding khatle Apollos ting rin kabanuwe.
46004007	Balangbe nani ding tuna mi katei khouna pi tei thanggabo? Nangna katei khouna lou thang maknu pa-aam amgabo? Nangna haga lousuluga nangna lousu maknu danga paaam lang lian to ongnubo?
46004008	Atun nani sipsaga am rwe! Nani lungsa rwe! Ani sui makka nani krwang nun danga paan rwe khatle anina nani le diga paannu ga eina bathaiye.
46004009	Balangbe Rikrwang na chonglang ani nun ding kham katak pani athat tingnu nun ding danga phun swak lu rwe diga ei baning nge; ani ding talei ram bi tambaan chonglang rwan khou khatle mi bingna phaang langna bacha thang rwe.
46004010	Ani Christa lang chungna kapangnu nunne atiyeda nani Christa khou ningtingnu to rwe! Ani sonne atiyeda naniba nate! Nani ding takung thang nge atiyeda aniba mai sianu dou rwe!
46004011	Atun chakrin tang ga ani bon chaamme khatle taraanne khatle pwan tomga sin basoiye khatle bweiye khatle in make.
46004012	Ani kut bahakna chwan to rakanne. Rin basiatnu kaan bi anina rithoi pi thang nge, rainu kaan bi anina khaang nge;
46004013	meng to basiatnu kaan bi anina bathemme. Ani talei ram om imphom tanaatnu dan rwe, atun tangga mi nun om tanaatnu dan rwe.
46004014	Eina hei bing nga nani ding pi kazak lang hiaknu make atiyeda kriangnu asa rwan ding danga cheksin lang bachu thangnuwe.
46004015	Balangbe Christa khou nani ding bachu thang lang mi raching som am ngaak peida, nani pa rwan tam make; balangbe eina nani ding sacham paan bina Christa Jisu khou pon thang rwe.
46004016	Atibriakpina ating bazei lang eina nani ding kachui thangnuwe.
46004017	Hei langna eina bariak bing bi, rupkathan bing bi bachu thang damnu ga danga, Christa khou aom chaang bing ga nani khou pi baning su thang dingnu om kriangnu khatle Pukraangba khou balumsa lang khopnu sa kapaisa Timothy ding nani khou eina lang hungnuwe.
46004018	Atun ei nani khou hungla dingnu danga mi kasemna lian to rwe.
46004019	Atiyeda Pukraangba na baningnuwe dabe, ei nani khou karangga hunglune khatle eina lian tonu mi nun om chong ga makka, bani pa-aam ngam ambo dinu ga le theilune.
46004020	Balangbe Rikrwang om krwang talei ga chongkaang bi make atiyeda ngam biye.
46004021	Nani pa-aam bathaigabo? Ei sungrwan choiluga mak tabe kriangnu le bachamga mak tabe bazaangnu sungna nani khou hungzo gabo?
46005001	Nani lak pi rwan mei rwan basan laannu amme diga bathiangga pu thang rwe khatle hei dannu rwan mei rwan basan laannu heiya Gentile rwanna tangga tolan rwe dinuba mi khatna bapa mei ding bamei lang louwe dinuwe.
46005002	Atiga lungchung dingnu saruk nanina lian to rwe, dinuba heipai chwan tonu bating nani lak pina lou sat tammo.
46005003	Balangbe ei batak takka pum toga nani lak pi sui mak ngaak peida, akatha naba nani lak pi sui ongme, heipai chwan tonu bating ga ei ongnu danga chong kasem rwe.
46005004	Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng bi akatha na Pukraangba Jisu Christa om ngam le nani hung karungnu kaan bi
46005005	atinu pakhat ting Pukraangba om lumik ni bakatha ding kanthangnu lousu lang bapum braan lang Seitaan khou pi swako.
46005006	Nani lwat ka sa maknuwe. Khai titcha kanot thangnu gana sukdi tum bing ding pi pwangkaye dinu nani thei makpo?
46005007	Nani khai sui mak briakpina kanot thangnu sukdi kathan to lang khai raan ga lou sat tammo. Balangbe Christa ani om kai takan thangnu ding ani lang khaang drwe.
46005008	Atibriakpina anina khai raan ga sui makka mak tabe uilu suinu le antiamnu khatle kasianu om khai ga sui makka sung bathiangnu le bataknu om khai sui maknu uilu ga suinu balou ga ngaakcho.
46005009	Lungkoi lung maannu nun le karung mak lang aom chamthwan bi eina nani khou hiak tamnu rwe.
46005010	Atiyeda heiba talei ram om lungkoi lung maannu mak tabe ra-aamnu nun, kasut sanu nun mak tabe ri katha kalumnu nun khou eina rinnu make. Ati dabe nani talei ram bina se swak lang bathaang am rwe.
46005011	Atiyeda unaowe dinu pakhatna lungkoi lung maannu mak tabe ra-aamnu, ri katha kalumnu, chongbiak laabiak sianu mak tabe zu kalonu mak tabe kasut sanu mi towe dabe hadannu mi ding karung mako khatle atinu mi khat le sanu tangga sa karung mako diga hiak tamnu rwe.
46005012	Balangbe langkaang la ongnu mi nun ding ei chong kasem lang pa-aam thou amgabo? Basung bi ongnu nun ding nanina chong kasemnu makkabo?
46005013	Atiyeda langkaang la ongnu mi nun ding Rikrwang na chong kasemme. Atibriakpina “Nani lak pina sa maknu bating ga kazun sat tammo.”
46006001	Nani lak pi tudannnu khatna mi khat maitwang bi chong swaknu amluga, bathiangnu mi rwan meithaan bi se makka ririak se maknu nun meithaan bi chong to lang sung raangga senubo?
46006002	Bathiangnu mi rwanna talei ram mi nun ding chong kasemlune dinu nani thei makpo? Nanina talei ram mi nun ding chong kasemme dabe, kasinnu chong swak ting ga chong kasem lang nani khopnu makpo?
46006003	Anina tambaan chonglang rwan ding chong kasemlune dinu nani thei makpo? Ati dabe atun ring ong balei swak ongnu lang bing nga anina inkuga ngamnu zek swak makpo?
46006004	Atibriakpina atun ring ong balei swak ongnu lang bing om lang bi nanina chong kasemnu kaan bi rupkathan bi bakung to maknuwe diga baningnu mi nun ding chong kasem lang nanina kathang swaknubo?
46006005	Heiya nani nun kazak tam lang eina rinnuwe. Ati dabe nani lak pi, bau banao rwan lak pi chong kasem ngamnu ningtingnu pakhatcha hakna maakrubo?
46006006	Atiyeda unao khatna unao khat maitwang bi chong impu thang lang seye khatle haga balumsa maknu mi nun meithaan biye!
46006007	Atibriakpina atun nani lak pi nani khatna khat maitwang bi chong impu thang kalenu amme dinu heiya batakka nani lang soi taknuwe. Haba hut lang nani khou koi thangnu ding ga pa-aam toga khaang thang maknubo? Haba hut lang nani khou gotnu ding ga pa-aam toga za thang maknubo?
46006008	Haba hut nani kakoinu chwan towe khatle gote khatle nanina nani unao rwan khou hei bing nga tonuwe.
46006009	Ririak se maknu nunna Rikrwang om krwang talei lousulaye dinu nani thei makpo? Nani ding pi minam mako. Lungmaannu nun mak tabe ri katha kalumnu nun, rwan mei rwan basan laannu nun, imbet boulaanu nun, kapaisa cham khatle kamaisa cham lungnu nun,
46006010	mak tabe barusanu nun mak tabe ra-aamnu nun mak tabe zu kalonu nun mak tabe chongbiak laabiak sianu nun mak tabe kasut sanu nunna Rikrwang om krwang talei khut laye.
46006011	Nani kasemba hadannu nun ngaake. Nani ding kasin thang rwe, nani ding to bathiang thang rwe, Pukraangba Jisu meng bi khatle ani Rikrwang om Katha paan bina nani ding pi baze thang rwe.
46006012	“Alaangbe balang bingza zanuwe,” atiyeda balang bing ga akhou bathaang maake. “Alaangbe balang bingza zanuwe,” atiyeda ei pa-aam khatcha om ngam thwei bi onglaye.
46006013	“Thaisaak ka bonpui lang nge khatle bonpuina thaisaak lang nge,” atiyeda Rikrwang na kani rwei ding to braan satlune. Pum ga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to lang make atiyeda Pukraangba lang nge khatle Pukraangba ga pum lang nge.
46006014	Rikrwang na Pukraangba ding thinu bina pi ring thou thang rwe khatle ani ding le Bangam paan bina thinu nun lak pina pi ring thou thanglune.
46006015	Nani pum ga Christa pum om naate dinu nani thei makpo? Christa pum om naat bing ding eina louluga taloi rwan pum naat pi to dingbo? Haga ati mak ting ngo.
46006016	Bapum bahak taloi rwan khou karungnu maan ga, taloi le pum khatcha to rwe dinu nani thei makpo? Balangbe Maanna rinne, “Pat ni ga pum khatcha to lang nge.”
46006017	Atiyeda Pukraangba le karungnu maan ga, Pukraangba le Katha khatcha to rwe.
46006018	Lungkoi lungmaannu bina pak tammo. Mi khatna tonu noh bing ga pum om paanlaye atiyeda lungkoi lungmaannu tonu maan gana bazan bahak om maitwang bi noh tonuwe.
46006019	Ati mak tabe nani pum ga nanina nani sung bi am ongnu Katha Bathiangnu inne khatle anina bating Rikrwang khouna lousunuwe khatle naniya nani om make dinu nani thei makpo?
46006020	Balangbe nani ding baman pi luga kalei taang rwe; atibriakpina Rikrwang om to damnu nani pum bi khatle nani Katha bi Rikrwang lwat pi lianno.
46007001	Nanina akhou hiak hungnu chong om lang bi, kamaisa khat ting banaan maknu heiya kapaisa lang saye.
46007002	Atiyeda lungkoi lungmaan briakpina, kapaisa bingna bamei am dam ding ngo khatle mei bingna le babasan am ding ngo.
46007003	Babasanna bamei lang pi dingnu ga bakhou pi ding ngo khatle hadanga meina le babasan khou pi dam ding ngo.
46007004	Mei ga maan bapum bahak om ngam maake atiyeda babasan omme. Hadanga babasanna le bapum bahak om ngam maake atiyeda bamei omme.
46007005	Nanina kalumsan ga khatle kalum lang bakaan kasem zakalenu makka, narwei khatna khat ting khaam kale mako khatle nani om pum ding karak thei mak briakpina, Seitaan na nani ding bathem mak lang hung karung lato.
46007006	Heiya akhou za thangnu nung suiga eina rinnuwe, heiya zathang make.
46007007	Mi bingna ei bahak tannu eina bathaiye. Atiyeda mi bingna baom baom leithwan tei teiga Rikrwang khouna lousuwe.
46007008	Atiyeda eina mei kou kalaak mak aangnu nun khatle tameinu rwan khou rinne, bani ei danga ongnu saye.
46007009	Atiyeda banina bani pum ding karaknu ngam make dabe, bani mei kou kalaak tam ding ngo. Balangbe bathainu gana mei bachwangnu danga ongnu ma mei kou kalaaknuna sa inkuwe.
46007010	Mei kou kalaaknu nun khou eina zathang piye, eina make; atiyeda Pukraangba naye. Meina babasan khouna kapaang mak ting gaye;
46007011	atiyeda maanna kapaang nge dabe, mei gana kalaak makka ong ding ngo mak tabe babasan khou karung lat ting ngo. Basanna bamei ding kapaang mak ting gaye.
46007012	Atiyeda katei rwan khou eina rinne, Pukraangba na make, tudannu unao khatna balumsa maknu mei amme dabe, meina babasan le diga lung bacham nwamme dabe, maanna bamei ding ga kapaang mak ting gaye.
46007013	Mei khatna balumsa maknu basan amme dabe, maanna bamei le lung bacham nwamme dabe, maanna babasan ding kapaang mak ting gaye.
46007014	Balangbe balumsa maknu basan ding ga mei paan bina to bathiang thang rwe khatle balumsa maknu mei ding ga basan paan bina to bathiang thang rwe; ati make dabe, nani sa rwan ga bathiang maknu tolune atiyeda atun bani bathiang rwe.
46007015	Atiyeda balumsa maknu maan gana kapaang damme dabe, maan kapaang dam ding ngo; unao kapaisa mak tabe unao kamaisa ga hei lang bi bang thangnu make. Atiyeda Rikrwang na ani ding dai bazaang lang kou thang rwe.
46007016	He mei, nangna nabasan ding kan thanglune dinu tatoga theigabo? Mak tabe he basan, nangna namei ding kan thanglune dinu tatoga theigabo?
46007017	Atiyeda Rikrwang na mi pakhat khat khou kasem thang damnu danga, Pukraangba na mi pakhat khat ting kou thangnu bi ga maan se ding ngo. Eina rupkathan bing khou heiba chongtan bing nga pinuwe.
46007018	Mun rom damnu mi ding kou thangbo? Ati dabe maan mun rom maknu mi to mak ting ngo. Mun rom maknu mi ding kou thangbo? Maan mun rom mak ting ngo.
46007019	Mun romnu heiya khatchale make khatle mun rom maknu heiya khatchale make atiyeda Rikrwang om zathang bing ding zeinu heiyana bakung tonuwe.
46007020	Mi bingna bating kou thangnu bi am ngaaknu bi ga atiga am ding ngo.
46007021	Swak to ongnu kaan bi kou thangbo? Haba lang bi nating pi riangre mak ting ngo; atiyeda nangna rang tonu lousunu ngamme dabe, lousu lang karammo.
46007022	Balangbe swak to ongnu kaan bi kou thangnu maan ga Pukraangba om rang tonu mi rwe. Hadanga rang to ongnu kaan bi kou thangnu maan ga Christa om swak rwe.
46007023	Nani ding baman pi luga kaleinu rwe; nani mi nun om swak to mako.
46007024	Unao rwan ga, bating kou thangnu bi ga mi pakhat khatna Rikrwang le diga kale makka haom gong bi ong ding ngo.
46007025	Reizuni rwan om lang bi, ei Pukraangba khouna zathang maake; atiyeda ei Pukraangba na Baom phaangkriang lousu briakpina balumsa lang khopnu mi khat pi to thangnu danga, eina chongsem piye.
46007026	Atibriakpina atun riangrenu am briakpina mi khatna baom am ongnu lung bi ga atiga ongnuna saye diga ei baning nge.
46007027	Nang mei khou bangrubo? Bathan sat lang zong mako. Nang mei khouna kapaangrubo? Mei zong mako.
46007028	Atiyeda nangna mei kouwe dabe, nang noh to make khatle reizuni khatna kalaake dabe maan noh to make. Atiyeda hei dannu heiyana pum bi riangrenu amlune atinu riangrenu nanina dou maknu eina bathaiye.
46007029	Au anao rwan ga, eina heiya rinne, bakaan toi rwe, atunna thouga mei amnu rwanna bani mei maaknu danga ong ding ngo,
46007030	chap ongnu nunna bani chap maknu danga, karonu rwan gana bani karo maknu danga, pot kaleinu rwanna le bani maaknu dan ding ngo,
