46007031	heiba talei ram pot ting choinu rwanna le ha ding sung lungning thangga choi mak ting ngo. Balangbe talei ram om se ongnu gong ga takanse ongme.
46007032	Atiyeda nani nun thou to makka ongnu ei bathai make. Mei kou kalaak mak aangnu maan gana Pukraangba ding tatoga pi pem dingbo dinu lang bing bi kakhanne.
46007033	Atiyeda mei kou kalaaknu mi gana bamei ding tatoga pi pem dingbo diga talei ram om tonu pot bing lang bi kakhanne.
46007034	Mei le reizuni lak pi bacham maknu amme. Kalaak mak aangnu kamaisa gana maan bapum bi khatle katha bi bathiangnu to lang Pukraangba om lang bi kakhanne. Atiyeda kalaaknu kamaisa gana babasan ding tatoga pi pem dingbo diga talei ram pot bing om lang bi kakhanne.
46007035	Nani lang tong langna eina heiya rinnuwe, eina nani meithaan bi phaa to thangnu make atiyeda nanina bazega khatle sung khoranu to makka Pukraangba ding cheksinga chwanlaang to lang naye.
46007036	Tudannu pakhatna baom reizuni pek la lamchat salan rwe diga baning nge dabe, maanna kalaaknu dat khan damme dabe khatle maan katha dam ding ngo diga baning nge dabe maanna baningnu nung suiga to dam ding ngo. Maan noh to make; bani mei kou kalaak ting ngo.
46007037	Atiyeda basung han tipnu maan gana, bathaang maaknu makka atiyeda maanna baningnu chung bi ngam amme dabe khatle baom reizuni ding bathiangga thang lang basung bi hanne dabe haga sanuwe.
46007038	Atiyeda bating katha lang pinu maan gana to chuiga to rwe atiyeda bating katha lang pi maknu maan gana inkuga to chuinuwe.
46007039	Babasan ring ong basaan chongtanna mei ding ga bang thang nge; atiyeda babasanna thi damme dabe maanna baningnu bakhou ga katha lang maan rang to rwe atiyeda haga Pukraangba khouza dingnuwe.
46007040	Atiyeda abaning nung suiga maan ga atiga am ong nge dabe balaang inkuga karo inkunuwe; Rikrwang om Katha ga akhou amme diga ei baning nge.
46008001	Ri katha khou kat thangnu lang bi heiye; ani khangsung om theinu amme dinu ani theiye. Theinuna lian pi to thang nge atiyeda kriangnuna bacha thouwe.
46008002	Tudannu khatna maan kasem theiye diga baning nge dabe, maanna thei dingnu ga atun tangga thei make.
46008003	Atiyeda tudannuna Rikrwang ding kriang nge dabe, bating ga Rikrwang na thei thang nge.
46008004	Atibriakpina ri katha lang kat thangnu pot sanu lang bi, ri katha dinu talei ram bi khatchale make khatle Rikrwang khat makka rikrwang katei maake dinu ani theiye.
46008005	Balangbe tambaan le talei ram bi mi nunna ri nun diga kounu taswang khak amme, batak takka ri amsip amme khatle pukraangba taswang khak amme.
46008006	Atiyeda ani langbe Rikrwang khat amme, Maan Pa gaye, pot bingza Bakhouna hungnuwe, ani Balaangza ringnuwe khatle Pukraangba khat dinuba Jisu Christa paan bina pot bingza Bakhou naye khatle Bapaan bina ani ring ongnuwe.
46008007	Atiyeda mi bingna heiya thei make; mi kasem bi atun tangga ri katha kalumnu sung am briakpina, ri katha lang kat thangnu pot tanga saye khatle bani om kakoi baze theinu sung ga son briakpina to tanaat rwe.
46008008	Atiyeda thaisaakna ani ding Rikrwang khou pi za thangnu make, balangbe anina sa ngaakle anina sa inkunu make mak tabe anina sa maklena sia inkunu make.
46008009	Atiyeda nani om rang tonu gana sonnu nun ding ket pi basui mak lang cheksinno.
46008010	Balangbe ri katha om in bi sa lang ongnu katheinu nating tudannu pakhatna muwe dabe, kakoi baze theinu sung ding ri katha lang katnu pot ka sa lang sung pi raang bilabo?
46008011	Christa na thi thang damnu kasonnu naunao ding naom theinu gana to braan bilabo?
46008012	Atiyeda nanina hadanga naunao rwan maitwang bi atiga noh tonu kaan bi khatle nanina kasonnu bani om kakoi baze theinu sung ding pi lem rwe, nani Christa maitwang bi noh to rwe.
46008013	Atibriakpina thaisaakna aunao ding ket pi basuiye dabe, eina aunao ding ket pi basui mak lang ei zan impha ni beida salaye.
46009001	Ei chonglang khat makpo? Ei rang tonu makpo? Ei ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding munu makpo? Nani Pukraangba khou achwan om bakraa makpo?
46009002	Ei katei khou chonglang khat mak ngaak peida, nani khouba ei chonglang khate. Balangbe nani Pukraangba khou aom chonglang om seal ne.
46009003	Ating tamphaangnu nun khou heiya achong katake:
46009004	Sa in lang ani khou bazek maakkabo?
46009005	Chonglang katei rwan, Pukraangba om banao rwan khatle Caiaphas tanga, balumsanu mei rwan ding ani le bachamga phun lang ani khou bazek amnu makkabo?
46009006	Ring lang chwan to maknu za maknu gazo Barnabas le arweiza zunggabo?
46009007	Tudannuna baraanto om sian tingluga kraan katwak lang segabo? Drakha lingluga haba om bakraa sa maknu tu ambo? Mak tabe zao nun dwanluga bani om kanu tui insu maknu tu ambo?
46009008	Ei heiya tamang mi danga rinnubo? Mak tabe chongtanna le hei danga rinnu makkabo?
46009009	Balangbe heiya Moses om chongtan bi hiak thang amme, “Saang kadim ta ongnu sen chan ding nangna bamun khwam mak ting gaye.” Rikrwang na sen chan nun lang banang thangbo?
46009010	Ati mak tabe Maanna rinnu hei bing nga ani lang nge, batak takka heiya ani lang nge atiga hiak thangluga amme dinuba lou khoinu maan gana bachun le suiga khoi lang nge khatle bachunnu bi loulaaknu maan gana baom bachun bi badam suilou lang nge.
46009011	Anina nani lang Katha om tachi bwanluga nani pum om tonu bakraa lwake dabe haga barwannubo?
46009012	Nani lu chung bi katei rwanna heiba zek om badam suilou bachamme dabe, anina bani khouna inkuga ngam amnu nun makpo? Atiyeda anina heiba zek heiya sizin make atiyeda Christa om sacham ding anina khamnamnu to mak lang balang bing bi khaang ongme.
46009013	Kalum in om bathiangnu pot bing om chwanlaang to ongnu nunna kalum in om pot ka saye dinu nani thei makpo khatle rikhaang riak pi chwan to ongnu bani gana rikhaang riak pi katnu pot kat le badam lou bachamnu makpo?
46009014	Hadanga sacham kasamnu rwan gana sacham paan bina ring lang nge diga Pukraangba na zathang pi thang rwe.
46009015	Atiyeda haga akhou to thang langna, eina hapai bing ga khatchale sizin make mak tabe eina ha bing ga hiaknu make; balangbe alian tonu ding tupaina khatchale make diye dabe, ei thi damnuna alaang sa inku dingnuwe.
46009016	Balangbe eina sacham kasamme dabe, ei alian to lang khatchale maake, balangbe ei haga kasam lang bathaang amnuwe; eina sacham ding kasam make dabe, ei aih sianuweda!
46009017	Balangbe eina heiya kasam nwamga kasamme dabe, alaang taswan amme; atiyeda abaning om maitwang bi ngaake dabe, akhou sacham kasam lang chwan ga bachoi thang rwe.
46009018	Ati dabe aom taswan ga pa-aambo? Eina sacham kasamnu kaan bi sacham bi aom ngam ga choi maan mak lang Christa om sacham ga baman lou makka kasamme.
46009019	Balangbe ei mi bing khouna rang to ngaak peida, eina mi bing ding eina ngamnu bing Christa khou tamga phun hung lang ei azan bahak ting mi bing om swak pi to rwe.
46009020	Eina Jihudi rwan ding phun hung za langna ei Jihudi rwan khou Jihudi rwan danga to hung rwe. Chongtan thwei bi ongnu nun ding phun hung za langna, ei chongtan thwei bi ongnu danga to hung rwe.
46009021	Chongtan maaknu nun ding phun hung za langna, ei chongtan maaknu danga to hung rwe. Atiyeda Rikrwang meithaan bi chongtan maakka ongnu make atiyeda Christa meithaan bi chongtan sung bi ongnu mi nun dan rwe.
46009022	Kasonnu nun ding phun hung za langna kasonnu rwan khou ei sonnu dan rwe. Eina pa-aam gong bina mi kasem ding kan thang langna mi bing khou ei pum brumza to hung rwe.
46009023	Eina nani le badam ga lou bacham langna sacham lang chungna eina hei bing nga to rwe.
46009024	Nampak pi mi bingna pake atiyeda mi pakhatchana taswan lousuwe dinu nani thei makpo? Nani taswan lousu lang pako.
46009025	Takhem bi ngam lang talen ongnu mi bingna balang bingza bi bapum ding raake. Banina braan zanu luthop lousu langna haga tonuwe atiyeda aniba braan latlanu luthop ka lou lang naye.
46009026	Atibriakpina eina tang dingnu riak thei maknu dan makka pak ongme. Bathaam barwang bi katwak maknu danga ei katwak ongnuwe.
46009027	Atiyeda eina mi katei khou sacham kasamnu kaan bi azan bahak lou thang za maknu to mak lang apum ding raakka aswak pi to rwe.
46010001	Unao rwan ga, heiya nanina thei maknu eina bathai make, dinuba ani pu pa rwan bingna tambu thwei bi ongluga bani bing ga tuipui takan swak ngaake.
46010002	Bani mi bing ding Moses khou tambu bi khatle tuipui bi baptize to thang damme.
46010003	Bani mi bing bachamnu Katha om thaisaak sa bacham ngaake,
46010004	bani mi bing bachamnu Katha om tui in ngaake. Balangbe banina bani nung sui hungnu Katha om lung pui bina tui in ngaake khatle haba lung pui ga Christa ngaake.
46010005	Atiyeda Rikrwang ding bani mi katamna pemlan rwe, balangbe bani pum ding ramhaang bi to imphaang thangsia rwe.
46010006	Banina sa maknu ding bathainu danga aninaba sa maknu ding bathai mak langna hei bing nga ani khou rin kaba thang rwe.
46010007	Bani mi kasemna ri katha ding kalumnu danga, nani ati mako. Heiya hiak thang amme, “Mi nunna sa lang khatle in lang badungta rwe khatle kadai lang han thou ngaake.”
46010008	Bani mi kasemna lungmaan ongnu ga danga ani hadan makcho khatle kani khatcha bi bani mi raching somniga inthum balumtaluga thi ngaak rwe,
46010009	bani mi kasemna tamphaangluga bani ding barunna to that tamnu danga anina Christa ding tamphaang makcho,
46010010	mak tabe bani mi kasemna tu tu tam tamluga to braannuna to tum damnu danga nani tu tu tam tam mako.
46010011	Hei bing nga bani khou rin kaba thangnu danga swaknuwe khatle ani nun lang barak thei lang banina hiak thangnuwe. Kakhamnu bakaan ani khou hung tang rwe.
46010012	Atibriakpina han ongme diga baningnu maan gana blumnu zaye diga cheksin ding ngo.
46010013	Misa khou hungnu bathemnu ga makka bathemnu katei pakhatchale nani khou hung mak aang nge; atiyeda Rikrwang be balumsa lang khopnuwe. Nanina khaangnu ngamnu bi gana inkuga nani ding bathem lang Rikrwang na za thanglaye atiyeda nani ding bathemnu kaan bi nanina khaangnu ngam lang maanna le dwaknu lampui daan thanglune.
46010014	Atibriakpina eina kriangnu unao rwan ga, ri katha kalumnu bina pak tammo.
46010015	Eina ningtingnu mi nun khou rinnu danga rinnuwe, eina rinnu heiya nani nazanna kakhanno.
46010016	Anina swankanu rithoi ngai ga Christa om thi bi badam lou bachamnu makkabo? Anina to baknu uilu ga Christa om pum bi badam lou bachamnu makkabo?
46010017	Balangbe ani mi taswang khak ngaak peida ani uilu pek khat tannuwe khatle pum khat tannuwe, balangbe ani mi bingna haba uilu pek khat pi ga badam lou bachamnuwe.
46010018	Zanti pum nung suiga Israel rwan ding kakhanno. Rikhaang pot sanu rwan ga rikhaang riak om badam lou bachamnu nun makkabo?
46010019	Ati dabe eina rin ongnu heiya pa-aambo? Ri katha ga pot khatpo mak tabe ri katha nun lang kat thangnu ga pot khatpo? Mak tabe mi nunna ri katha lang kat thangnu ga pot khatpo?
46010020	Gentile rwanna khaangnu pot ka Rikrwang khou makka ri kasia nun lang khaang thangnuwe atiyeda nanina ri kasia nun le badam lou bachamnu ga eina bathai make.
46010021	Nanina Pukraangba om ngai khatle ri kasia nun om ngai ding innu ngam make; nanina Pukraangba om table khatle ri kasia nun om table bina le badam lou bachamnu ngam make.
46010022	Anina Pukraangba ding pi antiam lang laozo gabo? Ani Bama nat inkunubo?
46010023	Alaang balang bingza zanuwe, atiyeda balang bingza kanaanu make. Alaang balang bingza zanuwe, atiyeda balang bingza bacha thou make.
46010024	Pakhatchanale bazan langza zong mak ting ngo atiyeda pakhat khatna katei lang le kana lang zong ding gaye.
46010025	Zan zwannu riak pi zwan ongnu bing ga kakoi baze theinu sung lang chungna tangai ngai makka sawo,
46010026	balangbe “Talei ram khatle basung bi amnu bing ga Pukraangba omme.”
46010027	Tudannu balum sa maknu pakhatna nani ding sa lang talote dabe khatle nanina se nwamme dabe, nani om kakoi baze theinu sung lang chungna tangai ngai makka, nani meithaan bi thangnu ga sawo.
46010028	Atiyeda tudannu pakhatna nani khou, “Heiya ri katha lang kat tamnurwe” diga rinne dabe, nani khou rinnu mi lang chungna khatle kakoi baze theinu sung lang chungna haga sa mako, balangbe talei ram khatle basung bi amnu pot bing ga Pukraangba omme.
46010029	Eina rin ongnu heiya kakoi baze theinu nasung lang rinnu make atiyeda pakhat om ding nge. Balangbe aom rang tonu ding mi khat om kakoi baze theinu sungna paaam toga chong kasem langbo?
46010030	Atiyeda eina swankanu le bachamga badam lou bachamme dabe, eina swankanu thaisaak langna pa-aam toga kasianu rinnubo?
46010031	Atibriakpina nanina sanu ngaakle, innu ngaakle mak tabe nanina pa-aam tonu ngaakle, ha bing ga Rikrwang lwat lian lang towo.
46010032	Jihudi rwan khou mak tabe Greek rawan khou mak tabe Rikrwang om rupkathan khatcha ding hakna ket pi basui mako.
46010033	Balang bing bi eina mi bing ding pi pem lang tonu danga, ei alaang tong lang zong makka bani ding kan thang lang mi taswang khak lang tong lang zong nge.
46011001	Eina Christa chaang bazeinu danga nani achaang bazeiyo.
46011002	Au anao rwan ga, nanina balang bing bi ating baningsu thangga eina nani khou bachoi thangnu ga seta ongnu bing ga nanina tipka ngaak ongme diga eina nani ding swankaye.
46011003	Atiyeda kapaisa bing om balu ga Christa ye, kamaisa om baluna kapaisa ye khatle Christa om balu ga Rikrwang nge dinu nanina theinu ei bathaiye.
46011004	Lu runluga kalumnu mak tabe, ri chong rin swaknu kapaisa bing ga balu ding takung tazei to maknuwe.
46011005	Atiyeda lu run makka kalumnu mak tabe ri chong rin swaknu kamaisa bingna balu ding takung tazei to maknuwe. Balangbe haga balu bwat satnu le bachamme.
46011006	Balangbe kamaisa khatna lu run make dabe, basam kachat sat ting ngo. Atiyeda balusam kachat satnuna mak tabe, balu bwat satnuna kazak tingnuwe dabe, maan lu run ding ngo.
46011007	Kapaisa ga Rikrwang thot khatle Rikrwang om lwat am briakpina batak takka maan lu run mak ting gaye atiyeda kamaisa ga kapaisa om lwate.
46011008	Kapaisa ga kamaisa khouna make atiyeda kamaisa ga kapaisa khou naye.
46011009	Kapaisa ding kamaisa lang dam thangnu make atiyeda kamaisa ding kapaisa lang dam thangnuwe.
46011010	Heiba om langna tambaan chonglang rwan lang bina, kamaisana balu chung bi ngam khat amme dinu badannu khat balu chung bi am ding gaye.
46011011	Atiyeda Pukraangba khou kamaisa sui makka kapaisa maake khatle kapaisa sui makka kamaisa maake.
46011012	Balangbe kapaisa khouna kamaisa hungnu danga, kamaisa khouna kapaisa hungnuwe; atiyeda pot bingza Pukraangba khou naye.
46011013	Nani lak pi nani raantoza chong kasemmo. Kamaisana lu run makka Rikrwang khou kalumnu bazebo?
46011014	Kapaisana balusam seiye dabe, bazan ding takung maknuwe dinu chaang gana nani ding bachu thang makpo?
46011015	Atiyeda kamaisa khatna sam seiye dabe, haga baom lwate, bakhou sam seinu ga balu thin lang pi thangnuwe.
46011016	Atiyeda tudannuna hei lang bi kae nwamnu amme dabe, ani khou mak tabe Rikrwang om rupkathan rwan bi le chaang katei maake.
46011017	Nanina karungnu ga sa inku lang makka sia inku lang briakpina heiba bachu thangnu bi eina nani ding swan make.
46011018	Balangbe kama katak pi rupkathan toga hung karungnu kaan bi nani lak pi khak langnu amme diga ei ngaisuwe khatle ei kasem balumsaye.
46011019	Balangbe za thangnu bani ga nani lak pi thei langna nani lak pi baze makka bachu thangnu phom am ngaaknu le zaye.
46011020	Atibriakpina nanina bariak khat pi hung karungnu kaan bi nani Pukraangba thaisaak sa bacham lang karungnu make.
46011021	Balangbe sanu bi mi pakhat khatna mi katei rwan ding ngaaknu to makka balaang balaang saye khatle pakhatna bon chaamga ong nge khatle katei khatna drakha tui in kaloluga ong nge.
46011022	Heiya pa-aam langbo? Nani sa in lang in maakkabo? Mak tabe nanina Rikrwang om rupkathan ding thou to maknubo khatle ka maaknu nun ding pi kazaknubo? Ei nani khou paaam rin langbo? Hei langna eina nani ding swanka dingbo? Ei nani ding swanka make.
46011023	Balangbe eina Pukraangba khouna lousu damnu ga eina nani lang pi swak rwe: Pukraangba Jisu ding pi swaknu zingpha Maanna uilu lou rwe
46011024	khatle Maanna uilu ga louluga swanka thang rwe khatle Maanna haga to bakluga rinne, “Louluga saro, heiya nani lang to bak thang damnu Apum ga rwe Ating baningsu ong lang heiya towo.”
46011025	Hadanga Maanna sanu nung bi ngai ga le lou thouluga rinne, “Heiba ngai ya Athi bi chongren kathanne. Nanina in bathin Ating baningsu ong lang heiya towo.”
46011026	Balangbe nanina uilu heiya sanu khatle ngai bina in bathin Maanna hung lat mak basaan Pukraangba na thi thang damnu ga nanina pao swaknuwe.
46011027	Atibriakpina tudannuna heiba Pukraangba om uilu ding khopsa makka saye dabe khatle heiba ngai ding khopsa makka inne dabe maan ga Pukraangba om pum khatle thi bi koinu rwe.
46011028	Atiyeda haba mi gana bazan ding tamphaang ding ngo khatle maanna uilu ga sa ding ngo khatle ngai bina in ding ngo.
46011029	Balangbe maanna takung tazei makka saye dabe khatle inne dabe Pukraangba pum ding kakhan makka, maanna bazan ding chong kasem lang sanuwe khatle innuwe.
46011030	Atibriakpina nani lak pi mi taswangkhakna sonne khatle naaye khatle kasemna thi drwe.
46011031	Balangbe anina ani raantoza ding chong kasemme dabe, ani ding chong kasem thanglaye.
46011032	Atiyeda ani ding chong kasemnu kaan bi Pukraangba na ani ding talei ram mi nun le diga kakoinu bi pi ta thang mak lang Pukraangba na ani ding laak thang rwe.
46011033	Atibriakpina au anao rwan ga, nanina sa lang hung karungnu kaan bi nani khatna khat ting ngaak kaleyo.
46011034	Atiyeda tudannu khatna chaamme dabe, nanina karungnu ga chong kasem mak lang maan bain la sa ding ngo. Atiga ei hungnu kaan bi katei lang bi nani khou sin thangne.
46012001	Aunao rwan ga, Katha leithwan bing om lang bi nanina thei maknu ei bathai make.
46012002	Nanina Gentile rwan toga ong ngaak balei nani ding lampui kaimaanluga, chong thei maknu ri katha nun khou kai thang nge.
46012003	Atibriakpina eina nani khou pi theiye, dinuba Rikrwang Katha paan bina kabianu pakhatchanale Jisu khou taseng ta thang ding ngo diga khatchale rin make khatle Katha Bathiangnu paan bina makka pakhatchanale Jisu heiya Pukraangba ye diga rinnu ngam make.
46012004	Leithwan tei tei amme atiyeda Kathaba khatcha zung nge.
46012005	Chwandon tei tei amme atiyeda Pukraangba ga khatcha zung nge.
46012006	Chwan tonu gong tei tei amme atiyeda mi bingza khou chwan to ongnu Rikrwang heiya khatcha zung nge.
46012007	Atiyeda mi bingza lang tongnu lousu langna indao swaknu leithwan ga Katha na pi thang rwe:
46012008	balangbe mi khat khou Katha paan bina ningting chong, katei pakhat khouna Katha bahak kana theinu chong pi thang nge.
46012009	Mi khat khou haba Katha paan bina balumsanu, mi katei khat khou Katha paan bina naanu ding pi sa thangnu leithwan bing pi thang rwe.
46012010	Mi katei khat khou tasiatnu chwan bing to lang mi katei khat khou chong rin swak lang mi katei khat khou katha rwan khat le khat bacham maknu thei lang mi khat khou chong chaat tei tei kabia lang mi khat khou chong bakaba han swaknu om leithwan pi thang rwe.
46012011	Atiyeda Maanna baningnu danga mi pakhat khat khou leithwan ga kasem thangga, khat tak khatchanu Katha gana heiba chwan bing nga to ongnuwe.
46012012	Balangbe pum ga khatcha zung nge khatle naat tamga amme khatle haba pum om naat bing tam beida, pum khatcha zung nge hadanga Christa le rwe.
46012013	Balangbe Katha khat paan bina ani mi bing ding pum khatcha bi baptize to thang rwe; Jihudi rwan ngaakle, Greek rwan ngaakle, swak ngaakle, rang tonu mi nun ngaakle, ani khangsung ding Katha khatcha bi pi in thang rwe.
46012014	Balangbe pum naat heiya khatcha make, atiyeda tamme.
46012015	Ketna atiga rinne dabe, “Eiba kut mak briakpina ei pum om naat make,” atibriakpina haga pum om naat makkabo?
46012016	Kanana atiga rinne dabe, “Eiba mik mak briak pina pum om naat make,” atibriakpina haga pum om naat makkabo?
46012017	Pum bing nga mik ngaake dabe, ngai lang ingaipaibo? Atiluga pum bing nga kana ngaake dabe barim banam lang ingaipaibo?
46012018	Atiyeda atun Rikrwang na pum om naat khat khat ting Maanna bathainu danga pum bi thang rwe.
46012019	Pum om naat bing ga khatcha ngaake dabe, pum ga ingaipaibo?
46012020	Atiyeda pum om naat tamga amme atiyeda batak takka pumba khatcha zwe.
46012021	Atiga “Nang alaang bathaang maake” diga mikna kut khou rinnu za make mak tabe “Ei nani ding bathaang maake” diga luna ket khou rinnu za make.
46012022	Heiya make, songa munu pum om naat bing gana bathaang amnuwe.
46012023	Atiluga anina hei ding ngabe takung thang mak peida zaye diga baningnu pum om naat bing khou anina inkuga takung thang nge; atiluga anina phaangsa maknu pum om naat bing ding anina phaangsa lang towe.
46012024	Atiyeda ani om phaangsanu naat bing ga bathaang maake. Atiyeda Rikrwang na takungnu make diga baningnu naat bing khou inkuga takung thangga pum ding pi karung thangnuwe.
46012025	Heiya pum bi khak lang swaknu to mak lang atiyeda pum om naat bingna khatna khat lang banang bacham thang lang pum naat bing ding khatcha toga thang karung rwe.
46012026	Atiga naat khatna riangrenu khaang nge dabe, naat bingna haga le riangrenu khaang bachamme mak tabe, naat khat ting takung tazeiye dabe, naat bingna haga le karo bachamme.
46012027	Nani Christa om pumme khatle pakhat khat ka pum om naat bing nge.
46012028	Rikrwang na rupkathan sung bi mi kasem ding kathang swak thang rwe: Kama bi chonglang rwan, kani bi thiamting rwan, inthum bi bachu thangnu rwan, haba nung bi tasiatnu chwan tonu nun khatle naanu nun ding pi sa thangnu leithwan amnu nun, katei ding paang thangnu nun, ngaaksian thangnu nun khatle chong chaat tei tei kabianu nunne.
46012029	Ha bing ga chonglang rwanbo? Ha bing ga thiamting rwanbo? Ha bing ga bachu thangnu rwanbo? Ha bing ga tasiatnu chwan tonu rwanbo?
46012030	Mi bing khou kasa kanaa ding pi sa thang lang leithwan amphikpo? Mi bingna chong tei tei kabiabo? Mi bing chong han swaknu nunbo?
46012031	Atiyeda kasa kataknu leithwan ding ga bathaiyo. Eina nani khou sa kataknu lampui khat pi mu thangne.
46013001	Einav misa om khatle tambaan chonglang rwan chong kabia ngaak peida, kriangnu maake dabe, ei baraam kabaangnu sianmu khatle laak ongnu siantwei ga dannuwe.
46013002	Eina chong kabianu leithwan phang ngaak peida khatle inthim chong khatle theinu bing am ngaak peida, rammwan bing ding lou sat ngamnu balumsat bing am ngaak peida akhou kriangnu maake dabe, ei khatchale make.
46013003	Aom ka am bing lungsianu rwan lang pi swak ngaak peida khatle eina apum ding mei rou sat lang pi swak ngaak peida akhou kriangnu maake dabe, hagana alaang khatchale tongnu maake.
46013004	Kriangnuna khwa seiga khaang thang nge khatle kriang thang nge, kriangnuna antiam make, kriangnuna lian to make, phun lian make,
46013005	kasianu lamchat to make, balaangza baloi make, balung pwan nong make, kasianu kakhan make,
46013006	ririak se maknu bi karo make atiyeda bazenu tonu bi karowe.
46013007	Balang bingza phun thang nge, balang bing bi balumsaye, balang bing bi bachunnu amme, balang bing bi khaang thang nge.
46013008	Kriangnu bi impha bani hakna inkhin tanu to make. Atiyeda Chong rinnu nun le inkhin talune. Chong chaat tei tei am ngaaklena ha bing ga lan damlune. Theinu am ngaaklena haga braan damlune.
46013009	Balangbe anina kasemza theiye khatle anina kasemza chong rin swake.
46013010	Atiyeda bapung phanu ga hung tangnu kaan bi kasemza dinu ga amla rwe.
46013011	Ei naosen bado naosen danga kabia ngaake, eina naosen danga thei ngaake, eina naosen danga kakhan ngaake; atiyeda eina mipu phanu kaan bi naosen thot bing bathan sate.
46013012	Balangbe atun anina katha an bi muraam raamnu danga mu ongme atiyeda bataang labe ani mai le mai pon kadou kalelune. Atun anina kasemza theiye atiyeda ating bathiangga thei damnu ga danga, kanung eina le bathiangga theilune.
46013013	Balumsanu, bachunnu, kriangnu, hei inthum ma kaling makka amme atiyeda hei bing lak pi inku kataknuba kriangnuwe.
46014001	Kriangnu ga nani khou am lang karammo khatle Katha om leithwan rwan ding bathaiyo atiyeda bakung toga nanina chong rin swak lang lungning khutka karammo.
46014002	Balangbe chong chaat katei kabianu maan gana mi nun khou kabianu make atiyeda Rikrwang khouwe. Balangbe pakhatchanale bating thei make atiyeda katha khou maanna inthim chong kabiaye.
46014003	Atiyeda chong kabia swaknu maan gana mi nun ding bacha thou lang kachui thang lang khatle bathem thangnu chong kabianuwe.
46014004	Chong katei kabianu maan gana baraantoza ding bacha thouwe atiyeda ri chong rin swaknu maan gana rupkathan ding bacha thouwe.
46014005	Nani mi bingna chong chaat tei tei kabianu eina bathaiye atiyeda ha ma nanina ri chong rin swaknu eina bathaiye; balangbe rupkathan ding bacha thou lang chong kabia ongnu maan gana chong bing nga bakaba han swak make dabe, chong tei tei kabia ongnu mi ga ma Rikrwang chong rin swak ongnu maan gana lian inkuwe.
46014006	Atiyeda aunao rwan ga, atun eina nani khou chong chaat tei tei kabiaga hung nge dabe, indao thangnuna, theinuna mak tabe, ri chong rin swaknuna mak tabe, bachu thangnuna kabianu makka ei nani lang tongnu paaam ambo?
46014007	Katha sui maknu pot tamrwang mak tabe taraa kainuna ngaakle bazenu baraam ga pi baraam make dabe, haga tamrwangmo mak tabe pa-aam taraabo dinu tatoga thei dingbo?
46014008	Balangbe trumpet sem bi bazenu baraam pi baraam make dabe, tuna baraantoza kraan lang daan dingbo?
46014009	Nani le haga dannuwe. Mi nunna thei bai dingnu chongna baleina kabia swak make dabe, pa-aam rinnubo dinu tatoga thei langbo? Balangbe nani baha bi kabialune.
46014010	Talei ram bi baraam bachaat tamga amme khatle bakaba maaknu khatchale maake.
46014011	Atibriakpina baraam om bakaba ga eina thei make dabe, kabia ongnu bakhou ei talei khat la mi tolune khatle chong kabia ongnu maan ga alaang talei khat la mi tolune.
46014012	Haga danga ani khou le nani Katha om leithwan ga bathai tak briakpina rupkathan ding bacha thou lang inkunu ga zong ngo.
46014013	Atibriakpina chong katei kabianu gana maanna bakaba han swak lang kalum ding ngo.
46014014	Balangbe eina chong katei lana kalumme dabe, akatha na kalumnuwe atiyeda asung biba bakraa kraa make.
46014015	Ati dabe kakhamnu ga pa-aambo? Eina akatha le diga kalumlune khatle bakaba theinu le diga kalumlune. Eina katha le diga laa tolune khatle theinu le diga laa tolune.
46014016	Ati mak tabe nangna katha le diga swankanu kaan bi thei maknu mina nangna rin ongnu ga maanna thei mak briakpina tatoga “Amen” diga rin langbo?
46014017	Balangbe nang batakka swan chuiye atiyeda nangna mi katei dingba bacha thou lan rwe.
46014018	Eina nani mi bing ma chong chaat tamga kabia briakpina eina Arikrwang ding swanne;
46014019	katei rwan ding bachu thang lang eina chong kabianu bi chongkaang raching som kabianu ma, eina theinu le diga rupkathan bi chongkaang impaang kabia nuna inkuga bathaiye.
46014020	Unao rwan ga, theinu bi nani naosen rwan dan mako atiyeda kasianu tonu bi naosen danno atiyeda nanina theinu bi mipu phanu towo.
46014021	Chongtan bi atiga hiak thang nge, “Chong katei kabianu mi nun khatle katei rwan mun paan bina eina heiba mi nun khou rinlune; Ati ngaak peida banina Achong ding ngai thanglaye” diga Pukraangba na rinne.
46014022	Atibriakpina chong katei kabianuwa balumsanu nun lang makka balumsa maknu nun lang badannuwe atiyeda ri chong rin swaknuwa balumsa maknu nun lang make dida balumsanu nun lang nge.
46014023	Atibriakpina rupkathan mi bing bariak khatcha bi hung kadoinu kaan bi mi bingna chong chaat tei teinu kabiaye dabe, khatchale bachu maknu mak tabe balumsa maknu mi nunna habei ga khutnu kaan bi banina nani ding kalo rwe diga rin bilabo?
46014024	Atiyeda mi bingna chong rin swake dabe atiga balumsa maknu mak tabe bachu maknu tudannu pakhat sekhute dabe, mi bingna bakoi pi thei thang nge khatle mi bingna bating tamphaanglune.
46014025	Hadanga basung lamang om inkamnu ga indao swaklune; bamai bakhup taluga maanna Rikrwang ding kalumlune khatle batak takka Rikrwang nani lak pi amme diga rinlune.
46014026	Ati dabe unao rwan ga, haga pa-aambo? Nanina hung kadoinu kaan bi nani mi bingna kalum laa, bachu thangnu, chong katei, indao thangnu khatle chong han swak lang amme. Balang bingza bacha thou lang to ding ngo.
46014027	Tudannuna chong katei kabiaye dabe haga pat nina mak tabe tam kalan bi mi pat thumna baleng toga kabia ding ngo khatle mi pakhatna chong ga han swak ting ngo.
46014028	Atiyeda chong ga han swak lang mi maake dabe, rupkathan sung bi maan thiap thiap ong ding ngo khatle maan baraantoza khatle Rikrwang khou kabia dam ding ngo.
46014029	Thiamting pat ni mak tabe pat thumna kabia ding ngo. Mi kateina kakoi baze cheksinga phaang ding ngo.
46014030	Atiyeda bakim bi ongnu mi khat khou Rikrwang na pa-aam ngaakle indao thang nge dabe, kamanu mi ga thiap thiap ong ding n
46014031	Balangbe mi bingna bachu dam lang khatle mi bing ding kachui thang lang nani pakhat khat toga chong rin swak tam ding ngo.
46014032	Thiamting rwan Katha bing ga thiamting rwan thwei bi amnuwe.
46014033	Balangbe bathiangnu mi rwan om rupkathan bing bi se ongnu chaang nung suiga Rikrwang nga kasao kabaonu Rikrwang make atiyeda dai bazaangnu Rikrwang nge.
46014034	Nani kamaisana rupkathan sung bi thiap thiapka ong ding ngo, balangbe bani ding chong kabia lang za thang make; atiyeda chongtanna le rinnu danga, bani ha thwei bi ong ding ngo.
46014035	Banina pa-aam ngaakle bachu nwamnu amme dabe, haga in bi bani basan rwan khou ngai ding ngo; balangbe rupkathan sung bi chong kabianuwa kamaisa rwan lang kazaknuwe.
46014036	Ati mak tabe Rikrwang chong ga nani khouna hungnubo? Mak tabe haga nani khouza hung tangnubo?
46014037	Tudannu pakhatna maan thiamting khate mak tabe katha miye diga baning nge dabe, eina nani khou hiak tamnu bing ga Pukraangba om za thang nge diga maanna za ding ngo.
46014038	Atiyeda tudannuna haga intaamme dabe, bating intaam ding ngo.
46014039	Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, ri chong rin swaknu ga taraan ga bathaiyo khatle chong katei kabianu ding ga khaam mako.
46014040	Chwan bingza to chuiga khatle baleng toga towo.
46015001	Unaovrwan ga, hei bing chung bi eina nani khou kasam ngaaknu sacham ga nani khou rin indaonuwe. Nanina haga lousu rwe khatle nanina habei ga han ongme.
46015002	Nani om balumsat ka bathaang maaknu to mak lang Eina nani khou kasam ngaaknu sacham ga nanina choitipka ong nge dabe, haba sacham paan bina nani ding kan thang ongnuwe.
46015003	Balangbe eina le lousu damnu ga kamaga nani khou eina pi swak rwe. Haga Bathiangnu Chongdip nung suiga Christa na ani noh bing lang chungna thi thang rwe.
46015004	Bating ri thang drwe khatle Bathiangnu chong nung suiga ni thum ni Maan ring thou lat rwe,
46015005	Maanna Cephas khou atiluga potroi rwan pat somga kani khou pi mu thang ngaak rwe.
46015006	Haba nung bi Maanna unao rwan mi raza impaang katei khou leng oweiza toga pi mu thang rwe, bani lak pi mi katamna aniya tangga ring ongme atiyeda kasemna thi drwe.
46015007	Haba nung bi Maanna James khou, hageina chonglang rwan bing khou Bating pi mu thang rwe.
46015008	Heiba nung bi, bakaan tang makka ponnu naosen dannu akhou le pi mu thang rwe.
46015009	Balangbe eiba chonglang rwan khon bi sin kataknu khate. Eina Rikrwang om rupkathan ding rai damnu langna ating chonglang diga kou lang khopnu make.
46015010	Atiyeda eina to ongnuwa Rikrwang phaangkriang paan bina to ongnuwe khatle Maanna akhou pi thangnu phaangkriang ga bathaam make atiyeda eina bani mi bing ma inkuga chwan to rwe. Haga eina make atiyeda ating kalwang thang ongnu Rikrwang phaangkriang paan bina to ongnuwe.
46015011	Atibriakpina eina ngaakle, banina ngaakle anina kasam rwe atiyeda nanina balumsa rwe.
46015012	Thinu nun lak pina Bating pi ring thou rwe diga Christa ding kasamme dabe, nani lak pi mi kasemna thinu nun ring thou make diga tatoga rinnubo?
46015013	Atiyeda thinu nunna ring thou make dabe, Christa Bahak le ring thou make.
46015014	Atiga Christa na ring thou make dabe, anina kasam ongnuwa bathaang maak rwe khatle nanina balumsa ongnu ga le bathaang maak rwe.
46015015	Maanna Christa ding thi bina pi ring thou rwe diga anina Rikrwang om sake pi briakpina thinu nun ding pi ring thou thang make dabe Rikrwang na Christa ding pi ring thou make. Ati dabe ani Rikrwang om kakoinu sake nunne.
46015016	Thinu nunna ring thou make dabe, Christa le ring thoulan rwe.
46015017	Christa ring thou make dabe, nani balumsat ka bathaang maak rwe; nani noh bi ong maang nge.
46015018	Atiluga Christa khou thi damnu bani ga braan rwe.
46015019	Ring ong basaan za lang Christa khou bachunnu amme dabe ani mi bing lak pina aih sia kataknuwe.
46015020	Atiyeda atunba Christa na thi bina ring thouluga, thi damnu nun lak pina kamanu kraa to rwe.
46015021	Balangbe mi pakhat khouna thinu danga, Mi khat khouna thinu nun om ring thounuwe.
46015022	Balangbe Adam khou mi bingza thinu danga Christa khou mi bing ding pi ring thanglune.
46015023	Atiyeda baleng toga ring thoulune; kamanu kraa bi Christa, haba nung bi Maan hung latnu kaan bi Christa om mi nun ga ring thoulune.
46015024	Haba kaan bi Pukraangba na chongsem bing, ngam khatle nat bing to braan dingnu kaan bi Pukraangba na dinuba Bapa Rikrwang khou Krwang talei ga pi swak tingnu kaan bi kakhamnu ga hunglune.
46015025	Balangbe Maanna munanu bing ding Baket thwei bi thang mak basaan Maanna paanlune.
46015026	Kham katak pi to braan dingnu munanu ga thinu gaye.
46015027	Balangbe “Maanna pot bing ding Baket thwei bi thang rwe.” Atiyeda “Pot bing ding Christa thwei bi thang rwe” diga Maanna rinnu kaan bi bapum brum Christa thwei bi thang ongnu dinu biya Maan Bapum dingba sui make.
46015028	Rikrwang na pum brum om bapuba to lang Rikrwang na pot bing ding Bathwei bi thangnu kaan bi pot bing ding Bathwei bi thang damnu Basa Kapaisa Christa ding hakna Bathwei bi thanglune.
46015029	Ati mak tabe thinu nunna ring thou make dabe, thinu nun om langna baptize lou thangnu bani into langbo? Banina bazan bahak ting thinu nun om riak pi pa-aam lang baptize lou thangnubo?
46015030	Anina chakrin bathin bachan sianu bi intoga han ongnubo?
46015031	Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou nani lang bi eina lian to ongnu ga danga eina chongren toga rinnuwe. Ei kani bathin thi rwe.
46015032	Misa chaang nung suiga eina Ephesus pi nilai lak khouring nun le katwak ngaake dabe, alaang pa-aam tongnu ambo? Thinu nun ding pi ring thou mak ngaake dabe, “Ani sazo, inzo, balangbe ani inswan thilune!”
46015033	Nani ding pi minam mako, “Sa maknu mi ding karungnuna kasanu khei ding to braanne.”
46015034	Ririak senu chwan to lang barak swakro khatle noh to mako, balangbe mi kasemna Rikrwang om theinu ga maake. Nani ding to kazak langna eina heiya rinnuwe.
46015035	Atiyeda mi kasemna rinlune, “Thinu nun ding tatoga pi ring thounubo? Pa-aam pum phunluga bani hungnubo?”
46015036	He kapangnu, nangna bwan thangnu bamu ga thi make dabe haga ring thou make.
46015037	Atiga nangna bamu bwannu ga thou ka dingnu bapum gong langna bwannu make, bamu za ga bwannuwe. Bamu ga gehu mak tabe katei mu khatnu le zaye.
46015038	Atiyeda Rikrwang na Maanna bathainu nung suiga bapum gong ga pi thang nge khatle bamu bing bi ga baom baom bapum gong ding pi thang nge.
46015039	Zanti bing bacham make, misa om zanti tei, khouring bing om zanti tei, ngaa om tei, basaa om teiye.
46015040	Tambaan om pum atiluga talei ram om pum le amme. Atiyeda tambaan om lwatna khate talei ram pum om lwatna teiye.
46015041	Lumik om lwat khat amme, tha om lwat kana teiye khatle insi om lwat kana khate; balangbe insi khat om lwat ka katei insi khat om lwat le bacham make.
46015042	Thi bina ring thounu ga le hadan nuwe. Pum ga braan zanu bi bwan thang nge, baraan za maknu bi pi ring thou thang rwe.
46015043	Takung maknu toga bwan thang nge, lwat liannu bi pi ring thou thang rwe. Kasonnu bi bwan thang nge, nat pi pi ring thou thang rwe.
46015044	Bachaang om pum ga bwan thang nge, katha om pum toga pi ring thou thang rwe. Bachaang om pum khatle katha om pum amme.
46015045	Atiga hiak thang amme, “Kamanu mi Adam ga ringnu katha ngaake;” kakhamnu mi Adam ga ringnu pi thangnu katha to hung rwe.
46015046	Atiyeda katha om ga kamanu make, bachaang om gaye khatle bataang la katha om gaye.
46015047	Kamanu mi ga talei ram bi naye, kaphutna bachanuwe; kaninu Mi ga tambaan la om Pukraangba ye.
46015048	Kaphutna bachanu mi nun ga, kaphutna bachanu mi ga dannuwe; tambaan om mi nun gana tambaan om Mi ga dannuwe.
46015049	Ani nun kaphutna bachanu gong lounu danga, anina tambaan la Mi om gong le loulune.
46015050	Unao rwan ga, atun eina heiya rinnuwe, zanti le thi pum gana Rikrwang om krwang talei phangsulaye mak tabe braan zanu gana braan mak tingnu ga lousunu ngam make.
46015051	Phaang ngo, eina nani khou inthim chong rinnuwe, ani khangsung thilaye atiyeda ani ding pi gon swak thanglune.
46015052	Barapka mik karuplak pi, kakhamnu trumpet semnu kaan bi thi damnu nun ding braan lat lanu bi pi ring thou thanglune khatle ani ding pi gon thanglune.
46015053	Balangbe braan zanu ga braan lat lanuna sin basoi lune khatle thinu zanu ga thi lat lanuna sin basoi lune.
46015054	Atiga braan zanu ga braan lat lanuna sin basoi lune khatle thinu zanu ga thiza lanuna sin basoi lune, haba nung bi hiak thang damnu ga pi hung tanglune, “Thinu ding ngamnu gana kadwan drwe.”
46015055	“He thinu, naom kasat ingaabo? He kathi ram, naom ngamnu ingaabo?”
46015056	Thinu kasat ka noh we, noh om nat ka chongtanne.
46015057	Atiyeda ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bina ani lang kraan ngamnu pi thangnu Rikrwang ding swankazo.
46015058	Atibriakpina eina kriangnu unao rwan ga, han tipo, kaling maknu towo, nanina Pukraangba khou to ongnu chwan ga bathaam make dinu theiga bakaan bathin Pukraangba chwan ga khopsaga towo.
46016001	Naninavbathiangnu mi rwan lang sian khom thounu lang bi eina Galatia om rupkathan rwan khou chongtan pi thangnu danga nanina le towo.
46016002	Ei hungnu kaan bi nanina sian khai lat mak lang nani pakhat khat khou pi inku thou thangnu nung suiga nani pakhat khatna maplak om kamanu lumik pi pa-aam ngaakle kasem khai swakluga thang ngo.
46016003	Ei hungnu kaan bi nanina zanu mi kasem ding ga eina nani om chamthwan rwan le diga Jerusalem la nani om leithwan ga phunse lang bathanlune.
46016004	Atiyeda ei le se lang bathaang amme dabe, bani ei le diga se bachamne.
46016005	Eina Macedonia se rwan luga nani khou hunglune. Balangbe ei Macedonia se rwan lang amme.
46016006	Ei nani le diga hung ong bachamnu zaye mak tabe eina senu riak bing bi nanina ating bathan thang lang ei nani le sikpha ong bachamnu zaye.
46016007	Balangbe nani ding lampui bi se ong bi kadounu ei bathai make atiyeda Pukraangba na za thangnuwe dabe ei nani le diga bakaan kasem ong bacham lang baning nge.
46016008	Ei Pentecost lumik tang mak basaan Ephesus pi nei onglune.
46016009	Balangbe kaliannu khatle bakraa kraanu inkhaan khat lat thang rwe atiyeda ha ding maitwangnu mi tamga amme.
46016010	Timothy hung nge dabe, maan khatchale kachinu to makka nani le diga ong bachamnu zamo dinu phaang ngo. Balangbe eina tonu danga, maan le Pukraangba om chwan tonuwe.
46016011	Atibriakpina mi pakhatchanale bating balaanu to mak ting ngo. Atiyeda maan akhou hung lat lang bating dai bazaangga bathan thang ngo, balangbe ei khatle au anao rwanna bating ngaak ongme.
46016012	Ani unao Apollos lang bi unao rwan le diga nani khou hung lang eina bating rakanga rin ngaake atiyeda atun tangnu bi maan khatchale se nwam make atiyeda badou chanu kaan bi maan hunglune.
46016013	Barak theiyo, balumsat pi ga han tipo, sung raang ngo, kanatnu towo.
46016014	Nanina tonu bing ga kriangga towo.
46016015	Unao rwan ga, nanina Stephenas in inkhun ding theiye, bani Achaia taram om kamanu kraaye khatle banina bathiangnu mi rwan om chwanlaang to lang bazan ding kat swak rwe.
46016016	Nanina hei dannu mi nun thwei bi ong lang khatle ani le diga chwan to bachamnu khatle riangrega chwanlaang bachamnu mi bing thwei bi ong lang eina nani ding kachui thang nge.
46016017	Stephenas, Fortunatas khatle Achaicus na hungnu om lang bi ei karo take, balangbe nani pi hung maknu om kabaatnu ga banina pi thang rwe.
46016018	Banina akatha khatle nani katha ding le pi lozaan thang rwe. Atibriakpina hei dannu mi nun ding ga thei thang ngo.
46016019	Asia om rupkathan bingna nani ding kalumme. Aquila le Priscilla na le khatle bani in bi karungnu rupkathanna le nani khangsung ding Pukraangba khou karo rangaaga kalumme.
46016020	Unao rwan bingna nani ding kalumme. Bathiangnu kaputnu le bachamga nani khatna khat ting kalummo.
46016021	Kalumnu heiya Paul akutna hiaknuwe.
46016022	Tudannu mina Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding kriang make dabe, bakhou taseng ta thang ding ngo. He Pukraangba, hung thangro!
46016023	Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriangna nani ding kalwang thang ding ngo.
46016024	Jisu Christa khou ongnu nun nani khou aom kriang le ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
47001001	Rikrwang om baning thangnu paanna Jisu Christa om chonglang toga kou thangnu Paul khatle ani unao Timothy na Corinthia bi amnu Rikrwang om rupkathan khatle Achaia taram bing bi amnu bathiangnu mi nun bing khou:
47001002	ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou am ding ngo.
47001003	Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa Pa, phaangkriang theinu Pa khatle balang bing bi bathem thangnu Rikrwang ding swankawo.
47001004	Rikrwang na ani ding bathem thangnu bathem om paanna anina riangre kanang dou ongnu bani ding bathem thang lang Rikrwang na ani om riangre kanang bing bi bathem thang nge.
47001005	Balangbe Christa om riangre kanang inza khang thangnu ani khou inku thounu danga, ani ding bathem thangnu le khopsaga Christa paan bina pi inku thou thang rwe.
47001006	Atiyeda anina riangre nangnu douwe dabe, haga nani ding bathem thang lang khatle ringriak lang nge. Haba om bakraa toga anina khaangnu danga nanina le riangrenu khaang nge. Ani ding bathem thang nge dabe haga nani ding bathem thang lang khatle ringriak lang nge.
47001007	Anina nani lang bachunnu ga tipka amme, balangbe nani om riangrenu dam lou bachamnu danga, bathem thangnu dam le lou bacham rwe dinu anina theiye.
47001008	Balangbe unao rwan ga, Asia la ani khou riangre kanang dou damnu lang bi nanina thei maknu anina bathai make: Anina khaangnu ngamnu bina inkuga ani nat chung bi potrit badan thang ngaake. Habei ga ani ringlune dinu tangga baning lan rwe.
47001009	Anina ani zan ding balumsa makka, thinu nun ding pi ring thounu Rikrwang khou balumsa lang batak takka ani lu chung bi thi lang laaknu ga am ngaake.
47001010	Rikrwang na ani ding heitia lang lianga thinu bina kan thang rwe khatle kan thang ongme, atun le Maanna ani ding ran swak thanglune diga anina balumsaye.
47001011	Nanina kalumnu kaan bi nani nun ani le diga chwan to bacham ongme. Mi nunna kalumnu paan bina Rikrwang na ani khou pi thangnu phaangkriang langna, ani om lang bina mi nunna swanka lang nge.
47001012	Balangbe ani om lian tonu ga heiye: anina talei ram bi tatonu lung bi lungbo dinu ani om kakoi baze theinu sungna sake piye. Sung khatcha toga khatle Rikrwang om bathiangnu sungna se damnuwe. Pum om ningtingna makka Rikrwang om phaangkriangna, inkuga nani pek la atiga se damnuwe.
47001013	Balangbe nanina pa ongnu mak tabe thei ongnu ga makka anina nani khou katei khat om lang bi hiak tam make. Kakhamnu tangga nanina haga theilune diga ei baning nge.
47001014	Batak takka nanina ani om lang bi kasemba thei rwe dinuba, nani nun ani om lang bi lian to rwe; hadanga ani Pukraangba Jisu om lumik ni anina le nani lang bi lian to lang nge.
47001015	Eina balumsanu am briakpina, nanina leng ninu toga tongnu lousu langna ei nani khou kamaga hung lang baning ngaake.
47001016	Eina Macedonia la senu kaan bi nani ding kadou lang khatle Macedonia bina nani khou han hung lang diga baning ngaake, atiga nanina ating Judea la sebi paang thanglune diga baning ngaake.
47001017	Atibriakpina eina heiya rang thangnu kaan bi haga ei bai takka baningbo? Mak tabe eina rang thangnu ga pum om baning nung suigabo? Eina “O, o,” khatle “Make, make” diga rin indao dingbo?
47001018	Atiyeda Rikrwang ba balumsa lang khopnuwe, nani khou ani chong ga “O” khatle “Make” dinu kani ga make.
47001019	Balangbe ei le Silvanus le Timothy na Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa Jisu Christa om lang bi nani khou kasam thangnu ga “O” khatle “Make” dinu make, balangbe Bakhou bakaan bathin “O” dinuwe.
47001020	Balangbe Rikrwang om chongren bing ga Bakhouba “O” dinuwe khatle ani paan bina Rikrwang lwat liannu bi Bakhou “Amen” dirwe.
47001021	Ani khatle ani ding Christa khou pi tip thangnu khatle ani khou thao kanun thangnu Maan ga Rikrwang nge.
47001022	Baom seal ga ani khou thang rwe khatle Katha Bathiangnu ding ani sung bi pi chainu toga pi thang rwe.
47001023	Inkuga alu chung bi sake toga eina Rikrwang ding kouwe, dinuba ei Corinthia bi hung maknuwa nani ding pi riangre mak langna ngaake.
47001024	Anina nani balumsat chung bi bapuba tonu bathai make atiyeda nani nun karo lang chwan to bachamnu rwanne, balangbe balumsanu paan bina nani tipka han ongme.
47002001	Ei asung riangrega nani khou hung lat mak lang asung han rwe.
47002002	Balangbe eina nani ding sung pi riangreye dabe, eina sung pi riangre damnu maan ga makka ating pi karo thang dingnu mizo tubo?
47002003	Eina hungnu kaan bi ating pi karo thang dingnu banina asung pi riangrenu le zaye diga eina heiba chong nga nani khou hiaknuwe. Nani mi bing om karonu ga aom karonuwe diga nani mi bing lu chung bi abalumsat amme.
47002004	Balangbe inkuga riangre kanang khaangga, sung sokka khatle mikthi taga eina nani khou hiaknu rwe. Heiya nani ding sung to riangrenu make atiyeda eina nani lang taswang khak kriangnu amnu ga nanina thei lang nge.
47002005	Tudannu pakhatna sung to riangreye dabe, maanna atingza to riangrenu make; atiyeda kasemba nani mi bing ding to riangrenuwe, eina rin inku mak lang kasemza rinnuwe.
47002006	Mi katamna bating laaknu ga balaang khopnuwe.
47002007	Haba om hut lang nanina bating kok thang ngo khatle bathem thang ngo. Ati make dabe, hadannu mi ga sung riangre lainuna hwamlem damnu le zaye.
47002008	Atibriakpina nanina bating kriang nge dinu bathiangga pi mu thang lang eina nani ding hweinuwe.
47002009	Balangbe nani nun balang bing bi rinnu ga zeibo dinu tamphaang lang eina nani khou hiaknuwe.
47002010	Nanina tudannu mi khat ting pa-aam riak pina kok thang nge dabe, eina le kok thang rwe. Balangbe eina tudannu ding kok thang nge dabe, eina kok thang damnu bating nani lang bina Christa meithaan bi kok thang rwe.
47002011	Ati mak tabe Seitaan na ani khouna badou chanu lou dam mak lang nge. Balangbe baom rang thangnu ga anina thei maknu make.
47002012	Christa om sacham langna ei Troas namlian la hungnu kaan bi Pukraangba na alaang inkhaan khat lat swak thang rwe.
47002013	Eina unao Titus ting kadou mak briakpina ei akatha bi basak riak thei mak ngaake atiyeda eina bani khou kapaang thangsialuga Macedonia la se ngaake.
47002014	Christa paan bina ani ding bakaan bathin Christa khou mai aangga kai thangnu khatle ani paan bina banamsanu barim ga bariak bathin Baom theinu ga pi phang thangnu Rikrwang ding swankaye.
47002015	Balangbe kan thang damnu nun khatle braan ongnu mi nun lak pi ani Rikrwang khou Christa om banamsanu barimme.
47002016	Thinu nun khou thinu bina thinu bi kai thangnu barim towe khatle kanthangnu nun khou ringnu bina ringnu bi kai thangnu barim to rwe. Hei bing langna khopsanu tubo?
47002017	Balangbe aniba Rikrwang chong ding to tanaatluga phun se ongnu mi nun dannu make atiyeda anina sung bathiangga Rikrwang khouna danga, Christa khou Rikrwang meithaan bi kabianuwe.
47003001	Anina ani raantoza ding rin swan latnu gabo? Mak tabe nanina bani khou pi dingnu swankanu chamthwan bing mak tabe nani khouna swankanu chamthwan bing tupaina phun hungnu danga anina le phun hung lang bathaang ambo?
47003002	Ani sung bi hiak thang damnu mi bingna thei ongnu khatle pa ongnu ani om chamthwan ga naniye.
47003003	Batakka anina chwanlaang to ongnu Christa om chamthwan ga naniye, haga mukna hiaknu make atiyeda ringga ongnu Rikrwang Katha na hiaknuwe. Lungpek pi hiak thangnu make atiyeda lungning om zanti pek pi hiak thangnuwe.
47003004	Christa paan bina Rikrwang khou hei dannu tipnu balumsat ka ani khou amme.
47003005	Anina heiba chwanna ani raanto zana tonu ngamnuwe di lang khatchale khopnu make. Atiyeda anina tonu ngamnu ga Rikrwang khou naye.
47003006	Rikrwang na ani khou chonghen kathan om khopsanu chwan tonu nun pi to thang rwe, haga bahiak om make atiyeda Katha om chwanne; balangbe bahiakna athate atiyeda Katha na ringnu piye.
47003007	Rikrwang na lung bi hiak thang damnu bahiak ka thinu om chwandon ngaake. Haga balwat am ngaake. Thi ta dingnu ngaakle Israel sa rwanna lwat om paan bina Moses om mai kum phaangban ngam mak ngaake.
47003008	Ati dabe Katha om chwandon gana inkuga lwat lian bilabo?
47003009	Balangbe pi koi thangnu chwanlaang tonu om lwat liannu amme dabe, ririak senu chwanlaang to ongnu ma lwat kana lian inkunuwe.
47003010	Balangbe inku kiatnu lwat liannu ga amnu paan bina lwat liannu am ngaaknu lwat ka atunba hei lang bi maak rwe.
47003011	Balangbe thita dam dingnu gana lwat lianne dabe, am ongnu gana lwat lian inkuwe.
47003012	Atibriakpina ani khou hei dannu bachunnu am briakpina anina sung raangga rin swake.
47003013	Israel sa rwanna braan dingnu om loinu tangga phaangban mak lang bamai kum thin thangnu Moses dannu make.
47003014	Atiyeda bani sung nat rwe. Balangbe aniya tangga banina Chonghen Lui ga panu kaan bi thin thang damnu mai kum ga lat swak make, balangbe Christa khou thin thangnu mai kum ga lou sat rwe.
47003015	Atiyeda aniya tangga banina Moses om chongdip panu kaan bi thin thangnu mai kum khatna bani sung ding ga thin thang ongme.
47003016	Ati ngaaklena tudannu khatna Pukraangba khou han hungnu kaan bi thin thang ongnu mai kum ga lat swak rwe.
47003017	Pukraangba heiya Katha ye, Pukraangba om Katha na ongnu riak pi rang tonu amme.
47003018	Atiyeda ani mi bingza ani mai kum thin thangnu to makka Pukraangba om lwat liannu ding katha an bi phaang ongme. Ani ding bachamnu Katha ga, dinuba Pukraangba om Katha paan bina ani ding lwat liannu khat pina lwat liannu khat pi pi kale thang rwe.
47004001	Heiba om langna anina phaangkriang thangnu lousunu danga heiba chwanlaang tonu chwan ga lousunuwe atibriakpina ani sung inkhinta make.
47004002	Atiyeda anina inkam thang ongnu kazaknu bing ga bathan sat rwe, rou sianu bi se makka mak tabe Rikrwang om chong ding minamga choi makka bazenu ga indao swaknu paan bina anina ani zan ding Rikrwang meithaan bi mi bing om sungna thei lang pi mu rwe.
47004003	Atiyeda ani om sacham ding ga thin thang nge dabe, braannu rwan khou thin thang rwe.
47004004	Bani khou Rikrwang om baman to ongnu, Christa om lwat liannu babaan om sacham ga bani khou baan swak mak lang hei talei ram om rina balumsa maknu mi nun mik pi cho rwe.
47004005	Balangbe anina ani om lang bi kasam make atiyeda Jisu Christa na Pukraangba ye khatle Jisu om lang bi ani nani swak rwanne diga kasamnuwe.
47004006	Balangbe kazingnu riak pi babaan ga baan thang lang Rikrwang na zathang pi thang rwe. Jisu Christa mai kum bi Rikrwang lwat theinu om baannu ga pi thang lang ani sung bi baan thang rwe.
47004007	Atiyeda kaliannu ngam ga ani khouna make atiyeda Rikrwang khou naye dinu indao lang talei ben bi ani om lan ga amme.
47004008	Ani ding nung ma imbei inchang lana kachat khute atiyeda kachat rop make; ani batok bariak thei make atiyeda baningba braan make;
47004009	raiye, bathan thang make, bazwantaye atiyeda to braan make;
47004010	Jisu om ringnu ga ani pum bi indao swak lang Pukraangba Jisu om kathinu ga ani pum bi bakaan thin phunse ongme.
47004011	Balangbe Jisu om ringnu ding ani om thi zanu pum bi indao lang ringga ongnu ani ding bakaan bathin Jisu om lang bina thi lang pi swak rwe.
47004012	Atibriakpina thinuna ani khou chwan to rwe atiyeda ringnu gana nani khou chwan towe.
47004013	Bathiangnu chongrik pi hiak thangluga amme, “Eina balumsa damme atibriakpina eina rin damme,” diga hiak tamnu nung suiga ani khou balumsanu Katha ga am bacham ongme, anina le balumsaye khatle haba om langna rin ongme.
47004014	Pukraangba Jisu ding pi ring thou thang damnu Rikrwang na Jisu paan bina ani ding le pi ring thou thanglune khatle ani ding nani le bachamga pi mu thanglune dinu theiye.
47004015	Balangbe mi taswang khakna swankanu paan bina khopsanu baphaangkriang ga Rikrwang lwat liannu ding pi inku thou lang nani lang chungna hei bing nga hiake.
47004016	Atibriakpina ani sung inkhin make. Ani om langkaang mi ga braan ngaak peida basung la mi ga kani khat khat lang pi kathan thang ongme.
47004017	Balangbe bakaan toizanu ani om riangre kanang bahak kana ani lang balang bing bi inkuga khwa sei ringnu lwat liannu pi to rwe,
47004018	anina munu ngamnu pot pi ga phaang makka, munu ngam maknu pot pi ga phaang ongme. Munu ngamnu pot bing ga bakaan toiza zung nge atiyeda mu ngam maknu pot bingbe khwa seinu omme.
47005001	Balangbe ani om pwan in dannu talei in heiya pi braanne dabe, ani lang misa kutna bacha maknu Rikrwang khouna tambaan la khwa seinu in ani lang amme dinu anina theiye.
47005002	Atibriakpina tambaan lana ani inna pwan danga sin thang dingnu ding taraan ga ngaakka ong bi ani kakou ongme,
47005003	batak takka pwan ga sin thangnu kaan bi ani ding pum tangang doubila rwe.
47005004	Balangbe anina heiba pwan in biya ongnu kaan bi potrit phun ong briakpina ani kakou ongme, ringnuna thinu ding kadwan dam lang pwan sin thang maknu ding anina bathai make atiyeda pwan sin thangnu ding bathainuwe.
47005005	Hei langna ani ding daan thang ngaaknu ga Rikrwang nge. Maanna ani khou Katha ding le pi chainu toga pi thang rwe.
47005006	Anina pum bi in toga ong ongnu kaan bi ani Pukraangba khouna namlaaga amme dinu theiga anina bakaan bathin tipka balumsanu amme.
47005007	Balangbe ani balumsanu paan bina se ongme, munu paan bina make.
47005008	Ani tipka balumsaye khatle anina pum bina se swakluga Pukraangba le diga ong bachamnu bathainuwe.
47005009	Atibriakpina anina pum bi ong ngaakle mak tabe se swaknu ngaakle Pukraangba ding pi pemnu ga ani om badannuwe.
47005010	Balangbe mi bingna maan maanna to damnu nung suiga kasanu ngaakle, kasianu ngaakle mi bingna pum om lung bi to damnu bing om lang ga lousu lang ani mi bingza Christa om chongsem riak meithaan bi hung hanlune.
47005011	Atibriakpina Rikrwang ding kachi theiga anina mi nun ding bathemme; atiyeda ani ding Rikrwang khou indao thang rwe khatle kakoi baze theinu nani sung bi le indao thang rwe dinu ei le balumsa rwe.
47005012	Balangbe anina nani khou ani ding rinswan latnu make. Atiyeda sung bi amnu lang bi makka mu zanu lang bi lian tonu bani khou nani om chong katak pi lang nge. Hagana ani lang bi lian to langna anina nani khou badou chanu pi thang nge.
47005013	Ani kalo ngaak peida haga Rikrwang lang nge mak tabe ani bazega kakhan ngamme dabe, haga nani lang naye.
47005014	Balangbe Christa om kriangna ani ding bang thang rwe, balangbe mi pakhatna mi bing lang thi thangnu gana mi bingza thi rwe dinu anina bathiangga thei rwe;
47005015	atiga ringga ongnu rwanna bani bazan lang ring lat makka bani lang thi thangluga ring thou lat tamnu Balaang chungna ring lang Maanna mi bing lang thi thang rwe.
47005016	Atibriakpina atunna thouga anina pakhatcha ding hakna pum nung suiga thei make. Anina Christa ding pum nung suiga thei ngaaklena, atunba anina Bating han latka thei make.
47005017	Atibriakpina tudannu pakhatna Christa khou ong nge dabe, maan dam kathannu kutthiam rwe, baraannu pot bing ga thou drwe; phaang ngo, pot bingza kathan hung rwe.
47005018	Pot bingza Rikrwang khou naye, Maanna ani ding Jisu Christa paan bina Bazan Bahak khou pi taman thang rwe khatle ani ding bakhou pi taman thangnu chwandon to lang pi thang rwe,
47005019	hagazo Rikrwang na Christa khou talei ram mi nun ding Bazan Bahak khou pi taman thang rwe, mi nun om koi maan thangnu ding bani zan bi basing sem thang lan rwe khatle bakhou ani ding pi taman thangnu om chong ga bachoi thang rwe.
47005020	Atibriakpina ani Christa om chong phunnu nunne, Rikrwang na ani paan bina rinnu danga, anina Christa om saruk toga rinne, nani Rikrwang khou kasa towo.
47005021	Balangbe ani nun bapaan bina Rikrwang om ririak senu to lang noh dinu thei maknu Bating ani lang chungna noh pi to rwe.
47006001	Atibriakpina Maan le diga chwan to bachamnu nun toga nanina Rikrwang phaangkriang ga bathaang maaknu bi lou thang maknu to mak lang anina le nani ding kachui thang nge.
47006002	Balangbe Maanna rinne, “Za thangnu kaan bi eina naom kalumga ngai thang rwe, Khatle ringriak om lumik pi Eina nating paang thang rwe.” Phaang ngo, atun za thangnu bakaanne phaang ngo, atun ringriak om lumik e.
47006003	Balang bing bi mi nunna meng sianu pi mak lang anina pakhatcha ding le ket pi basui make.
47006004	Atiyeda balang bing bi ani Rikrwang chwanlaang tonu rwan danga anina khopsanu danga ani ding pi muwe, taswang khak khaang theinu bi, riangre kanang bi, bathaang amnu bi, katop kachinnu bi,
47006005	bweinu bi, qwan in bi, kasao kabaonu bi, chwan rakannu bi, in maknu bi, bu heinu bi,
47006006	bathiangnuna, theinuna, khaang seinuna, kriang thangnuna, Katha Bathiangnuna, bazenu kriangnuna,
47006007	bazenu kabianuna, Rikrwang om ngam na, kut imbei inchang la ririak senu kraan kutchoi bing paan bina,
47006008	takung tazei tonu bi khatle takung tazei to thang maknu bi, sa maknu chong impu thangnu khatle kasanu chong impu thangnu bi, minamnu nun dan peida bazenuwe;
47006009	thei bathiang maknu dan peida thei bathiang rwe, thi dam dingnu dan peida phaang ngo, ani ring ongme, laak thangnu nun dan peida athat make;
47006010	sung riangrenu nun dan peida bakaan bathin karowe, lungsianu nun dan peida taswang khak ting pi lungsa thang nge; khatchale maaknu nun dan peida pot bingza amme.
47006011	He Corinthia mi nun, nani khou anina bathiangga rin thangnu rwe, ani sung lat lian thang rwe.
47006012	Nani khou ani sung talit thang make atiyeda nani om kriangnu bi nani raan toza ding talit thang nge.
47006013	Atiga heiba om le bachamga nani sung le ani khou lat thang ngo. Heiya eina asa rwan khou danga kabianuwe.
47006014	Balumsa maknu nun le daankong pon bacham mako. Balangbe ririak senu nun le chongtan thouto maknu nun le pa-aam karung gabo? Baannu le zingnu le pa-aam badam lou bacham gabo?
47006015	Christa Le Belial le pa-aam karungnu amgabo? Mak tabe balumsanu le balumsa maknu mi le pa-aam badam amgabo?
47006016	Rikrwang om kalum in le ri maang nun le paaam zakalenu amgabo? Balangbe naniba ring ongnu Rikrwang om kalum inne. Rikrwang na rin damnu ga danga, “Eina bani khou onglune, Khatle bani lak pi selune. Eina bani Rikrwang tolune, Khatle banina Ami nun tolune.”
47006017	Atibriakpina “Bani lak pina se swakro, Khatle bani khouna tei swakro diga Pukraangba na rinne. Bathiang maknu khatchale banaan mako Atiga Eina nani ding loukhut thanglune.”
47006018	“Ei nani Pa tolune, Khatle nanina Asa kapaisa rwan khatle Asa kamaisa rwan tolune, diga Ngam Bachangnu Pukraangba na rinne.”
47007001	Atibriakpina kriangnu nun ga, ani lang heiba chongren bing nga am briakpina, mi pum le katha ding to tanaat ongnu bing bina ani raantoza to bathiang swakcho. Rikrwang ding kachinu bi bathiangnu ga pi khopsazo.
47007002	Ani khou nani sung lat thang ngo. Anina pakhatcha ding hakna pi koi thang make ani pakhatcha khou hakna to braan make, ani pakhatcha khou hakna chong karwak make,
47007003	heiya Eina nani ding koi pi ta lang rinnu make; balangbe thi bacham lang le, ring bacham lang le nani ani sung bi amme dinu eina meithaanna rin drwe.
47007004	Nani khou chong kabia lang asung raangnu amme, nani lang bi alian tonu taswang khak amme. Bathem thangnuna akhou sip rwe. Ani om riangre kanangnu bapum brum bi ei karonuna sip rwe.
47007005	Batakka pa-aambo dida ani Macedonia bi hungnu kaan bi ani pum lo basaknu am dam make atiyeda ani kim bangzaang bing bi ani ding pi riangrenu khaang nge. Langkaang lana kae kanaanu khatle basung lana kachinu am ngaake.
47007006	Ati ngaak peida phaang batanu bing ding bathem thangnu Rikrwang na Titus hungnu paanna ani ding bathem thang rwe.
47007007	Titus hungnu paanza bina makka, nanina bating bathem thangnu bathem paan bina leye. Maanna ani khou nani om lou nwam bathai taknu, nu hweinu, alaang nanina sung khut thangnu ding rin thangnu kaan bi ei karo inku thouwe.
47007008	Balangbe aom chamthwanna nani sung pi riangre thang beida ei baning ngam maknu to make. Ei baning ngam maknu am ngaak peida chamthwanna batak khatcha lang nani sung pi riangre thangnuwe dinu ei theiye.
47007009	Nani sung pi riangre thangnu makka nani sung pi riangre thangnu gana sung pi le swak briakpina atun ei karowe. Balangbe nanina ani khouna braannu khatchale dou mak lang Rikrwang om bathainu gong bi nani ding sung pi riangre rwe.
47007010	Balangbe Rikrwang om baningnu sung riangrenuna sung lenu khatle sung lenu gana ringriak pi hung nge, baning ngam maknu pi am make; atiyeda talei ram om sung riangrenuna thinu pi swake.
47007011	Balangbe phaang ngo, nani Rikrwang om baningnu sung riangrenuna riangre ngaake, hagana nani lang intia khak sung khutnu, intia khak chongkaangna kakhangnu, intia khak pi balung pwannu intia khak kachinu, intia khak bathai inkunu, intia khak sung khutnu, intia khak koinu ding laaknu pi swak ongnubo! Balang bing bi nani bahakpe heiba chonglang biya bathiang nge dinu indao rwe.
47007012	Atibriakpina eina nani khou hiak ngaak peida baze maknu chwan tonu mi om lang bi make khatle kakoinu nang damnu mi om lang bi le make; atiyeda intia khak lang anina sung khutnubo dinu ga Rikrwang mikphaang bi nani khou bathiangga indao lang naye.
47007013	Atibriakpina nani om bathem thangnu gana ani ding pui thang rwe. Ani ding Titus om karonu bi ani inku inkiatka karowe, balangbe baom katha ding nani bapum brumna bachaang pi ring thang rwe.
47007014	Balangbe eina bakhou nani om lang bi lian to thang damnu langna, ei kazak make. Atiyeda anina nani khou bataknu kabianu danga, anina Titus meithaan bi lian tonu ga le bataknu rwe.
47007015	Nanina Titus ting kachiga khatle kathokka loukhut thangluga nani mi bing zana chong zeiye dinu ga maanna baningsunu kaan bi baom kriangnu nani khou pi inkuka thang nge.
47007016	Balang bingza bi eina nani khou balumsa tipnu am ongnu langna ei karowe.
47008001	Unao rwan ga, Macedonia bi amnu rupkathan bing khou pi thang damnu Rikrwang om phaangkriang ga anina nani khou pi theiye
47008002	dinuba, riangre kanang lak pi, tamphaangnu bi ta thang ngaak peida bani taswang khak karowe khatle lungsia tak ngaak peida bani om sung lianga pi swak theinu ga inkuga lian thou rwe.
47008003	Banina ngamnu bing pi swake dinu eina sakeye. O! banina ngamnu bina inkuga pi nwamga pi swak rwe.
47008004	Banina bathiangnu mi rwan lang leithwan khatle chwanlaang tonu dam lou bachamnu ga lou thang lang ani khou rakanga hweini ngaake.
47008005	Haga anina bachun ngaaknu dannu make atiyeda kama bi Rikrwang na baningnu nung suiga banina bani pum ding Pukraangba khou khatle ani khou pi swak ngaak rwe.
47008006	Atiga Titus na to thou ngaaknu ga danga heiba phaangkriang heiya le maanna nani khou bapung pi pha thang lang anina bakhou rakanga kabia ngaake.
47008007	Atiyeda nanina balumsanu bi, rin swaknu bi, theinu bi, cheksinnu bing bi khatle nanina ani ding kriangnu, balang bing bi khopsanu danga, heiba phaangkriang bi le nani khou khopsanu to ding ngo.
47008008	Eina nani khou zathang pi ga rinnu make atiyeda mi katei rwanna cheksinnu ga muluga nani kriangga bathiang nge bathiang make dinu tamphaang lang eina rinnuwe.
47008009	Balangbe nanina ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang ding theiye, hagazo Pukraangba na lungsianu paan bina nani lungsanu to lang Maan lungsa ngaak peida nani lang bina Maan lungsianu to rwe.
47008010	Atiga abaning pi thei thangnuwe. Heiya nani lang sa inkuwe, thou damnu sangwan bi nani chwan to thou thang damnuza makka to nwamnu le nanina kamanu ngaake.
47008011	Atiyeda to nwamnu chwan rang thang ngaaknu danga, nanina nani khou amnu bi gana to loi thang lang tonu ga le atun bapungphaga to loi satro.
47008012	Balangbe pi lang baning thangnu amme dabe, bakhou amnu nung suiga pinu ga Rikrwang na lou thang nge, bakhou maaknu nung suiga make.
47008013	Balangbe katei ding pi zaangluga nani ding pi ritnu ei bathai make;
47008014	Atun kahan biya nani om katamnu gana bani om katomnu bi thang impam thangnuna saye; hagana bachamnu to lang bani om katamnu gana le nani om katomnu bi thang impam thangnuna saye. Hagana bachamnu to lang nge.
47008015	Heiya hiak thangluga amnu ga dannuwe, “Khom thang tamnu balaang ga balei make khatle titcha khom thangnu balaang ga baatnu maake.”
47008016	Titus lungning bi ei le bachamga nani langza banang thangnu pi thangnu Rikrwang ding swankaye.
47008017	Balangbe kachui thangnu ding ga lou thangnuza makka, inkuga sung khutka, maanna se nwamga nani khou se damnuwe.
47008018	Atiga maan le diga sacham kasamnu lang bi rupkathan bingna swanka ongnu unao ding anina bathan thang damnuwe.
47008019	Haza makka rupkathan bingna leithwan le bachamga ani le bazin bachamnu mi to lang bating kathang swak thang rwe. Pukraangba Bahak om lwat langna khatle anina to thang dingnu ga pi mu langna anina heiba phaangkriang om chwanlaang tonuwe.
47008020	Mi nunna inkuga pi hungnu khopsanu leithwan om chwanlaang tonu bi tudannuna ani ding pi koi mak lang ani karam ongme.
47008021	Anina Pukraangba mikphaang biza makka, mi nun mikphaang bi le bazenu ga towe.
47008022	Anina bani le diga ani unao ding lang thang rwe. Balang bing bi anina bating chat makka tamphaangnu kaan bi bakhou sung khutnu amme. Maanna nani khou balumsa taknu am briakpina atun maan inkuga sung khutnuwe.
47008023	Tudannu Titus lang bi ngaiye dabe maan abaanne khatle nani lang bi chwan to bachamnuwe. Ati mak tabe ani aunao rwan om lang bi ngaiye dabe, bani ga rupkathan om cham phunsenu nun khatle Christa om lwat liannuwe.
47008024	Atibriakpina nanina kriangnu om khatle anina nani lang bi lian tonu ga batake dinu ga nanina bani khou khatle rupkathan bing meithaan bi pi muwo.
47009001	Bathiangnu mi rwan ding chwanlaang tonu lang bi, eina nani khou hiaknu bathaang maake;
47009002	balangbe nanina paang thang nwamnu ga ei theiye; haba lang bi eina Macedonia rwan khou nani lang bi lian tonu amme, dinuba, Achaia taram la mi nunna sangwan khat meithaan lana daan thang ongnu amme; nani khou sung khutnu amnu gana mi katam ding kachui thang rwe.
47009003	Ati ngaak peida anina nani lang bi lian tonu ga heiba lang bi bathaang maaknu bi to mak lang eina unao rwan ding nani khou bathan thangnuwe, hagazo eina rin damnu ga danga, nanina daanga ong lang naye.
47009004	Ati mak tabe Macedonia rwan nun ei le diga hung bi nanina daanga ong ngo. Ati make dabe anina lian tonu om tipka balumsanu bi ani kazaknu doulune.
47009005	Atibriakpina unao rwan ding nani khou kamaga se lang kachui thangnu sa rwe diga ei baning ngaake. Balangbe nanina kamaga za kale thang damnu leithwan ga sung lianga pi lang naye. Haga bataiga pi makka sung lianga pi ding gaye.
47009006	Atiyeda eina heiya rinnuwe, tomga bwan thangnu maan gana tomga lwaklune, tamga bwan thangnu maan gana tamga lwaklune.
47009007	Mi pakhat khatna balungning bi han thangnu ga pi ding gaye, kheithinu to makka mak tabe pi maknu za maknu danga pi mak ting gaye; balangbe karo karoga pinu mi ding Rikrwang na kriang nge.
47009008	Atiga balang bing bi, bakaan bathin nani khou baatnu to mak lang kasanu chwan bing khopsaga am dam lang Rikrwang na Baphaangkriang ga nani khou pi khopsa thangnu ngamme.
47009009	Heiya hiak thangnu ga dannuwe, “Maanna chai imphaang sat tamme, Maanna lungsianu nun lang pi thang damme; Baom ririak senu ga khwa sei kaling makka amme.”
47009010	Tachi bwannu mi lang tachi pi thangnu khatle thaisaak lang uilu pi thangnu Maanna nani lang le bwan lang tachi pi khopsa thang dam ding ngo, nanina bwan damnu tachi ga pi tam thang ding ngo khatle nani om ririak senu kraa ga pi inku thang ding ngo.
47009011	Nani nun aangga pi ngam lang balang bing bi nani ding pi lungsa thanglune, haba om langna ani paan bina Rikrwang ding swankalune.
47009012	Balangbe nanina chwanlaang to ongnu gongna bathiangnu mi rwan om kabaatnu lang pi thangnuza makka, mi nunna Rikrwang ding swankanu pi khopsa thang nge.
47009013	Nanina heiba chwan tonu om sake langna Christa om sacham rin swaknu ding banina zei rwe khatle nanina bani khou khatle mi bing khou pi nwamga pi swak thangnu langna banina Rikrwang lwat pi lian rwe.
47009014	Atiga banina nani lang hweininu kaan bi nani khou amnu Rikrwang om khopsanu phaangkriang paan bina banina nani ding kadou nwam tak ngaake.
47009015	Rikrwang om rin ngamlanu Baom tasiatnu leithwan langna Bating swankanu to ding ngo.
47010001	Christa om sung banemnu khatle bazaangnu paan bina Paul, ei azan bahakna nani khou kachui thangnuwe. Ei nani le ong bachamnu kaan bi sung banemme atiyeda ong bacham maknu kaan bi sung raang nge.
47010002	Ei ongnu kaan bi eina balumsa tipnu le bachamga, mi kasem maitwang bi asung raangnu indaone diga baning ngaaknu ga sung raangnu to mak lang eina nani ding hweiye. Banina ani ding pum nung suiga senu nunne diga baning nge.
47010003	Anina pum nung suiga se ngaaklena ani pum nung suiga kraan katwak make.
47010004	Balangbe anina kraan kutchoi ga pum om make atiyeda kraan kapan ding to bak lang Rikrwang paan bina kutchoi bing ga ngam amnuwe.
47010005	Baningnu bing khatle Rikrwang ding theinu ding maitwangluga kaliannu basaangnu chwan bing bi anina to bakluga lungning bing ding qwan in mi ding danga Christa na rinnu zeinu tangga phun hung nge.
47010006	Nanina chong zei chuiga ongnu kaan bi chong zei maknu bing ding laak lang anina daan ongme.
47010007	Nanina balang bing bi langkaang la munu nung suiga phaangnubo? Tudannu khatna maan Christa om rwe dinu bathiangga theiye dabe, maan Christa om tonu danga, ani le Christa omme diga maan baraanto kakhan han lat ting ngo.
47010008	Balangbe ani ngam om lang bi eina kasem lian to ngaak peida, ei kazak lang maake. Heiya nani ding bacha thou lang Pukraangba na ani khou ngam pi thang rwe khatle nani ding to braan lang make.
47010009	Aom chamthwan bing paan bina eina nani ding basinuwe diga baningnu ei bathai make.
47010010	Balangbe banina rinne, “Baom chamthwan bing ga chong nate khatle ngam amme atiyeda bapum amnu kaan biba sonne khatle bachong biakpa khatchale make.”
47010011	Heipai mi gana atiga baning ding ngo, hagazo ani ong maknu kaan bi chamthwan om paanna chongkaang bi danga ani ongnu kaan bi le chwan toga tolune.
47010012	Balangbe bani raan toza ding swankanu tudannu nun le bachamga ani raan to zana ani ding balang khat pi thang lang mak tabe rin kaba lang ngam make. Atiyeda bani chamna bani raanto bani ding badat ongnu khatle bani chamna khat khat ting rin kaba ongnu bani ga thei ka maknu mi nunne.
47010013	Atiyeda ani haba badat thangnu chwanlaang om chaang bi gana inkuga lian tolaye atiyeda Rikrwang na ani khou pi thangnu chwanlaang om chaang nung suiga anina lian to lang nge, haba chwanlaang om chaang ga nani khou le hung tang lang nge.
47010014	Balangbe anina nani khou hung tang lang anina ani bahak ting inkuga balaan swak make; balangbe anina nani khou Christa om sacham phunluga anina hung damnu ga nani khouwe.
47010015	Ani khou am ongnu chaang bina inkuga dinuba, katei mi nun om chwan lang bi ani lian to make. Atiyeda anina nani om balumsat inku thounu kaan bi nani paan bina nani lak pi ani om chwan chaang inku kalune dinu ani bachun amme.
47010016	Heiya nani khouna inkuga katei riak pi anina sacham kasam lang khatle mi khatna kamaga to ngaaknu chwan lang bi lian to mak lang naye.
47010017	Atiyeda “Lian tonu maan gana Pukraangba khou lian to ding ngo.”
47010018	Balangbe baraantoza ding rinswannu ga za thang make atiyeda Pukraangba na rinswannu bating ga za thangnuwe.
47011001	Eina pang domnu bi nanina khaang thangnu bathaiye; batak takka, alaang chungna nanina khaang thang rwe.
47011002	Balangbe Rikrwang om antiamnu gana nani lang chungna antiam rwe. Balangbe bathiangnu reizuni toga kat thang langna khat tak khatchanu basan tonu Christa khou munchat thang rwe.
47011003	Barunna baom barou sianuna Eve ting bathem swak tamnu ga danga, Christa khou amnu nani sung bathiangnu baning ding to braannu zaye diga ei kachiye.
47011004	Balangbe anina kasam maknu Jisu katei khat kasamnu mi khat hungnu le zaye atiga nanina bating ga bathiangga loukhut thang nge. Meithaan lou thang maknu katha khat ting lousunu zaye mak tabe nanina kamaga lou thang mak ngaaknu sacham katei khat nanina lousunu zaye, nanina haga loukhut chuiga loukhut thangnu zaye.
47011005	Balangbe ei inkunu chonglang rwan ma sinnu make diga ei baning nge.
47011006	Ei chong kabia thei maknu ngaaklena, theinu bi baatnu make. Atiyeda anina ani zan ding balang bing bi bathiangga nani lak pi pi mu thang rwe.
47011007	Eina nani khou Rikrwang om sacham bathaam kasam thangnu paan bina nani ding pi lian thou lang ei azanna ating pi bangiam ta briakpina ei noh torubo?
47011008	Eina nani ding chwanlaang to langna katei rupkathan bing bina lo man louluga bani khouna kasut rwe.
47011009	Eina nani le ong bachamnu kaan bi khatle alaang baatnu kaan bi eina nani khou potrit pi to make. Balangbe Macedonia taram lana hungnu unao rwanna alaang kabaatnu bing pi thang rwe, balang bing bi ei nani lang potrit imbei mak langna ei azan ding cheksinne khatle ei cheksinga ongne.
47011010	Christa om bazenu ga akhou am briakpina eina asung liannu kaan bi Achaia taram la amnu pakhatchanale ating khaamlaye.
47011011	Pa-aam to ba dabo? Eina nani ding kriang mak briakpinabo? Rikrwang na theiye.
47011012	Banina lian tonu bi ga ani le bachamnu to lang badou chanu zong nge. Bani om badou chanu to braan sat tam lang eina to ongnu ga eina tone.
47011013	Balangbe ha rwan ga baze maknu chonglang rwan khatle minamnu nunne. Bani bazan bahakna Christa om chonglang rwan thot pi gonne.
47011014	Habei ga loh lo lang maake, balangbe Seitaan na le bating kabaannu tambaan chonglang om thot pi gonne.
47011015	Atibriakpina baswak rwanna le ririak senu nun om thot gon swaknu heiya kungnu chwan make, bani om kakhamnu ga banina tonu chwan nung suilune.
47011016	Eina rin han late, ei kapangnuwe diga pakhatchanale baning mak ting ngo. Atiga baning nge dabe, ei alian to lang kapangnu mi khat ting loukhutnu danga ating loukhut ting ngo.
47011017	Eina kabianu ga Pukraangba na kabianu nung suiga make atiyeda lian tonu om tipka balumsanu bi kapangnu mi khatna kabianu danga kabianuwe.
47011018	Mi taswang khakna pum nung suiga lian towe khatle eina le lian tolune.
47011019	Balangbe nani nun ningting briakpina nanina kapangnu rwan ding karoga khaang thang rwe.
47011020	Balangbe mi khatna nani ding swak pi towe dabe, mi khatna nani ding kadwanne dabe, mi khatna nani khouna lou swake dabe, mi khatna baraantoza ding pi lianne dabe, mi khatna namai kum bi kabeng nge dabe, nanina haga le khaang thang nge.
47011021	Ani songa ongnuna, eina kazaknu le bachamga kabiaye! Atiyeda mi khatna sung raang nge dabe, eina le sung raang dingnuwe. Eina kapangnu danga kabianuwe.
47011022	Bani Hebrew sa rwanbo? Ei leye. Bani Israel mi rwanbo? Ei leye. Bani Abraham kik taatpo? Ei leye.
47011023	Bani Christa om chwanlaang tonu rwanbo? Eina kapangnu khat tanga kabianuwe. Eina inkunu maang nge; atiyeda eina chwan tonuna taswang khak inkuwe, ating bweinu basing thei make, qwan in bi ong katupe, thinu riak pi ta thang katupe.
47011024	Jihudi rwan khouna ating bwei leng sombali lang khatcha baatka tazam khaang leng impaang ngaake.
47011025	Thingna bwei leng inthum ngaake, lungna phet leng owei ngaake, li kasuk leng thumnu nang ngaake, ei tuipui bi zingpha khat thamlai khat nei ngaake;
47011026	bazin se katup ngaake, tuiqwa bi riangre nangnu, bruksaak mi nun khouna riangre nangnu, man ram sa rwan lak pi riangre nangnu, Gentile rwan lak pi riangre nangnu, namlian bi riangre nangnu, ramhaang bi riangre nangnu, tuipui bi riangre nangnu, baze maknu unao rwan khouna riangre nangnu,
47011027	lo maaknu, chwan to riangrenu bi, katupka insu maknu bi, chaam taraan khaangnu bi, katupka sasu insu maknu bi, sikpha kasik nangnu, sin basoi maaknu, hei bing dou ngaake.
47011028	Langkaang la om hei bingza makka rupkathan bing om potrit kani bathin akhou hung ngaake.
47011029	Mi kasemna sonne dabe ei le sonnu makpo? Banina mi kasem ding ket pi basuiye dabe, asung sounu makpo?
47011030	Eina alian towe dabe, ei ason lang bi alian to lang nge.
47011031	Ei minamnu chong kabia make diga thei thangnu ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Pa, Rikrwang le tonu Bating bakhwa seiga swankawo.
47011032	Damascus namlian om krwang Aretas thwei bi ongnu taleipubana ating nam langna Damascus rwan namlian ding ga rangkaan thang ong ngaake.
47011033	Atiyeda ating luklei khat pi thangluga kapan inkhaan swan bina bathantaluga ei bakut pina dwak ngaak rwe.
47012001	Lian tonuna alaang tong make. Atiyeda Pukraangba na akhou pi mu thangnu khatle indao thangnu paan bina eina atiga kabiane.
47012002	Christa khou ongnu mi pakhat ting ei thei ngaake; sangwan somga bali meithaan la Rikrwang na bating inthumnu tambaan la phunka ngaak rwe. Bapum amnubo dinu ei thei make mak tabe bapum maakrubo dinu ei thei make, Rikrwang na theiye.
47012003	Hei dannu mi ding ga ei theiye, dinuba bapum suinumo sui maknubo ei thei make, Rikrwang na theiye.
47012004	Bating Paradise la phunka drwe khatle mi khatna rin swaknu za maknu khatle kabia tang ngam maknu chong bing theisu rwe.
47012005	Eina hei dannu mi om lang bi lian tone; atiyeda ei son briakpina makka, azan lang bi lian tolaye.
47012006	Balangbe eina lian to nwam beida kapangnu miba tolaye; balangbe ei bazenu kabiane. Tudannu pakhatna ating munu khatle akhouna thei briakpina maanna alang bi taswang khak kakhan mak lang ei lian tolaye.
47012007	Indao thangnu tam briakpina ei inkuga lian to mak lang apum bi kaling khat pi thang rwe. Eina inkuga lian to mak lang, ating to riangre lang Seitaan om cham phunnu pi thang rwe.
47012008	Atibriakpina haga akhouna se swak tam lang eina Pukraangba khou hweini leng thum ngaake.
47012009	Atiyeda Maanna akhou rinne, “Aom phaangkriang nalaang khop rwe; balangbe sonnu kaan bi anat ting pi khopsa thang nge.” Atibriakpina Christa om ngam ga akhou am lang ei sonnu bi karo takka lian tone.
47012010	Atibriakpina eina Christa khou sonnu bi, kazaknu bi, baatnu bi mak tabe rainu bi, riangre kanang dounu bi ei hweini ngaake; ei sonnu kaan bi ei nate.
47012011	Eina alian tonu kaan bi ei kapangnu towe, haga nanina ating pi tonuwe. Balangbe nanina ating swanka rwe diga rin lang naye; balangbe Ei khatchale maknu mi ngaak peida, inkunu chonglang rwan ma ei khatchale maknu to make.
47012012	Batakka eina chonglang khat tonu om badan ga nani lak pi khaang theinu badan bing amnu tasiatnu chwan bing khatle ngam liannu chwan bing to loi thang ngaak rwe.
47012013	Balangbe eina azan ding nani khou potrit pi to thang maknu makka, tatonu gong bi rupkathan katei ma nanina son inkunu paaam amgabo? Heiba kakoinu lang bi ating kok thang ngo.
47012014	Phaang ngo, ei leng thumnu toga nani khou hung lang daan ongme. Ei nani ding potrit pi phunlaye; balangbe ei nani pot ting zongnu make atiyeda nani ding nge. Balangbe basa rwanna banu bapa rwan lang khom thang lang make atiyeda banu bapa rwanna khom thang lang nge.
47012015	Atibriakpina eina nani lang aom ka amnu ga karoga ting thangne khatle nani khou sin thangne; Eina nani ding kriang tak peida naninaba ating titcha kriang nge,
47012016	hagana bazenu ngaaklena eina nani ding potrit pi phun dam make; atiyeda nani ding eina minamnu gana nani ding namsu rwe.
47012017	Eina nani khou bathan thang damnu mi nun paan bina ei nani khouna badou chanu lougabo?
47012018	Eina Titus ting kachui thang ngaake khatle au anao ding maan le diga nani khou bathan thang rwe. Titus na nani khouna tongnu lousurubo? Ani nun Katha khat paan bina se bachamnu makpo? Ani ket kaam khatcha kaam bachamnu makpo?
47012019	Anina ani pum ding kakhang latnuwe diga nani baningbo? Anina Rikrwang meithaan bi Christa khou kabianuwe; atiyeda kriangnu rwan ga, nani ding bacha thou langna anina hei bing nga kabianuwe.
47012020	Balangbe eina hungnu kaan bi eina bathainu danga nani ding kadou maknu zaye khatle nanina bathai maknu toga ating kadounu zaye diga ei kachiye; kae kanaanu, antiamnu, balung pwan taknu, balaang theinu, impu thang kalenu, nung ma khanrainu, tu tu tam tamnu, lian tonu, chong swak laa swaknu zaye.
