47012021	Ei hung latnu kaan bi Arikrwang na ating nani lang bina pi bangiamtanu zaye atiga mi taswang khakna noh toga, banina to damnu bathiang maknu lungkoi lungmaannu, imbet boulaanu hei bing bina sung le mak ngaaknu bani om lang bi ei lungchungnu le zaye.
47013001	Eina nani khou hung dingnu heiya leng thumnu lamsek lang nge. “Sake pat ni mak tabe pat thum om munsupnu bina balang bing baze rwe diga lou ding gaye.”
47013002	Eina nani khou kamaga rin drwe khatle eina nani le leng ninu toga ong bachamnu danga rin basaamnuwe; atun ei ong maknu kaan bi meithaan noh to damnu nun khatle mi bing khou eina hiaknuwe, hagazo eina hung late dabe, bani katei ding bathaam bathanlaye;
47013003	Christa na asung bi kabia thangnu ding nanina bazenumo baze maknubo dinu lang bi zong ongme. Christa ba nani pek la sonnu make atiyeda Maan nani khou nate.
47013004	Balangbe batak takka sonnu bi Bating cross pi banina athat ngaak peida Rikrwang om ngam paan bina Maan ringga ongme. Hadanga ani Bakhou sonne atiyeda Rikrwang ngam paan bina nani pek la ani Maan le ring bachamlune.
47013005	Atiga nani balumsanu bi ongmo ong makpo dinu thei lang nani bahakna tamphaang ngo. Nani nazan bahakna kakhan phaang ngo. Mak tabe Jisu Christa nani khou ongme dinu nani thei mak chunggabo? Mak tabe nani za maknuwe.
47013006	Atiyeda ani khopsa maknu mi nun make dinu nani theiye diga ei balumsaye.
47013007	Atun nanina sa maknu chwan to mak lang eina Rikrwang khou kalumme, ani ding za thang rwe dinu pi mu langna make atiyeda ani ding za maknu nun toga mu ngaaklena, nanina bazenu chwan to lang naye.
47013008	Balangbe anina bazenu om maitwang bi khatchale chwan tonu ngam make atiyeda bazenu lang naye.
47013009	Balangbe anina sonnu khatle nanina natnu kaan bi ani karowe. Nani nun khopsanu to langna le ani hweiniye.
47013010	Atibriakpina to braan lang makka bacha thou lang Pukraangba na akhou pi thang damnu ngam nung suiga ei ongnu kaan bi sialaiga to mak tam lang eina ong maknu kaan bi heiba lang bing nga hiaknu rwe.
47013011	Kakhamnu bi unao rwan ga, karo ngo, sung raang ngo, sung kazonga ong ngo, dai bazaangga ong ngo; kriangnu khatle dai bazaangnu pi thangnu Rikrwang na nani ding ong bacham thang ding ngo.
47013012	Bathiangga kaput kalega nani khatna khat ting kalum kaleyo.
47013013	Bathiangnu mi bingna nani ding kalumme.
47013014	Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang, Rikrwang om kriang khatle Katha Bathiangnu om badam lou bachamnu gana nani ding ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
48001001	Paul, mi nun khouna le maknu, mi khat paan bina le maknu atiyeda Jisu Christa paan bina khatle Bating thinu bina pi ring thou thangnu Pa Rikrwang paan bina chonglang tonu
48001002	khatle ong bachamnu unao rwan bingna Galatia bi amnu rupkathan bing khou,
48001003	Pa Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou pi thang ding ngo.
48001004	Maanna ani Pa khatle Rikrwang na baningnu nung suiga heiba sa maknu bakaan bina ani ding kan thang langna Jisu Christa na Bapum bahak ting ani noh lang chungna pi swak thang rwe.
48001005	Rikrwang khou khwa sei lwat liannu to ding ngo. Amen.
48001006	Christa om phaangkriang bi nani ding kou thangnu Bakhouna nanina heitia lang barapka sacham katei khat la kanei damnu langna ei loh lowe.
48001007	Haga katei make atiyeda nani ding pi riangre ongnu mi kasemna Christa om sacham ding to kale lang tonu nun amme.
48001008	Atiyeda anina nani khou kasam ngaaknu sacham ga maknu sacham katei khat ani bahakna mak tabe, tambaan chonglang khatna taluga kasam ngaake dabe bakhou taseng ta thang ding ngo.
48001009	Anina meithaan rin damnu ga danga atun le eina rin latnuwe, tudannu pakhatna nanina lousu damnu ga maknu sacham katei khat kasamme dabe maan ga taseng phang dam ding ngo.
48001010	Balangbe atun ei mi nun ding pi pem za lang zongnumo ati mak tabe Rikrwang ding pi pem lang zong ongnubo? Mak tabe mi nun ding pi pem lang karam ongnubo? Balangbe eina mi nun ding pi pemnu towe dabe, ei Christa om swak to mak ngaak tingnuwe.
48001011	Atiyeda unao rwan ga, eina kasam ongnu sacham heiya misa khouna make dinu eina nani khou pi thei nwamme.
48001012	Balangbe heiya eina misa khouna lousunu le make, mi khatna bachu thangnu bina le make. Atiyeda Jisu Christa na akhou indao thangnu paan bi naye.
48001013	Balangbe bakaan khat pi Jihudi rwan om ririak pi eina se ong ngaaknu thot ka nanina thei rwe. Rikrwang om rupkathan ding eina heitia lang railuga to braan sat lang to ong ngaake.
48001014	Eina apu apa rwan om chaang bi, inkuga sung khutluga atalei bi mi nun lak pi, abaan rwan inza ma Jihudi rwan ririak pi kamaga se ngaake.
48001015	Atiyeda Rikrwang na pem thangga ating anu bonpui sung bina kathang thang rwe khatle Baphaangkriang paan bina ating kou thang rwe.
48001016	Heiya Basa Kapaisa ding akhou indao thangluga eina Bating Gentile rwan khou kasam lang nge. Eina haba kahan bi pakhatcha khou le kathuinu make.
48001017	Jerusalem bi ameithaan ong ngaaknu chonglang rwan khou le ei se make atiyeda ei Arab la seye khatle Damascus la hung late.
48001018	Haba nung sangwan inthum nung bi ei Jerusalem la Peter ding kadou lang se ngaake khatle habei ga maan le diga ni somga impaang nei bacham ngaake.
48001019	Atiyeda Pukraangba nao kapaisa James ting maknu chonglang katei pakhatcha ding le mu make.
48001020	Atun eina nani khou hiaknu om lang bi phaang ngo, ei Rikrwang meithaan bi chong karwak make.
48001021	Haba nung bi ei Syria le Cilicia la se ngaake.
48001022	Atiga Christa khou ongnu Judea bi amnu rupkathan bingna ating man thei mak ngaake.
48001023	Atiyeda banina alang bi ngaisu zaga ong ngaake, “Meithaan ani ding rai ong ngaaknu mi gana to braan sat lang to ngaaknu balumsat ting maanna kasam ong rwe.”
48001024	Banina alang bi Rikrwang ding swan ngaake.
48002001	Sangwan somga bali nung bi eina Barnabas le Titus ting kalwangluga Jerusalem la se ngaake.
48002002	Atiga akhou indao thangnu nung suiga eina senuwe. Eina Gentile rwan lak pi kasam ngaaknu sacham ga balu tonu rwan khou eina inthimthwei toga pi thei rwe. Haga eina pak ongnu khatle pak hung ongnuwa bathaang maaknu pi to nwam mak briakpi naye.
48002003	Atiyeda ei le diga se bachamnu Titus ka Greek rwan ngaak peida, bating mun rom lang banina bathem mak ngaake.
48002004	Atiyeda ani ding swak rwan pi to lang Jisu Christa om paan bina anina lousunu rang tonu ding ga inthimthwei toga phaang lang inkamga khutnu baze maknu unao rwan ding phunkhutnu langna heiba lang bing nga swaknuwe.
48002005	Sacham om bazenu ga nani khou chat makka am lang anina chakrin khatcha hakna bani thwei ong lang za mak ngaake.
48002006	Atiyeda basaangnu nun danga ongnu nun ga bani pa-aam aam ngaakle, akhouba khatchale teinu maake. Rikrwang na mi thot mi mai phaang make. Balangbe basaangnu nun danga ongnu nun gana akhou khatchale pi inku kanu maake.
48002007	Atiyeda balang khat la Peter khou mun romnu mi nun lang sacham bachoi thangnu danga, mun rom maknu mi nun lang sacham akhou pi thang rwe dinu banina mu ngaake.
48002008	Balangbe mun romnu rwan lang chonglang rwan chwan bi Rikrwang na Peter khou bakraa kraa ga chwan tonu danga, Gentile rwan lang akhou le to thang rwe.
48002009	Atiga akhou pi thangnu phaangkriang ga inteng toga thei kale ongnu James, Cephas khatle John na theinu kaan bi Barnabas le arwei khou badam lou bachamnu kut inchang balaan swak rwe. Anina Gentile rwan khou se lang atiluga banina mun romnu rwan khou se lang za thang rwe.
48002010	Anina lungsianu rwan lang kakhan thangnu bahak heiya banina bathainuwe; eina le ha bahak to lang taswang khak bathai ngaake.
48002011	Atiyeda Peter na Antioch pi hungnu kaan bi bakhou koi am briakpina eina bamaitwang bi twei ngaake.
48002012	Balangbe James khouna mi kasem hung mak balei, maanna Gentile rwan le sa in bacham ngaake. Atiyeda banina hungnu kaan bi maanna mun romnu nun ding kachiga maan bazan ding baning inkhinluga tei swak thou rwe.
48002013	Katei am thang sianu Jihudi rwan mi kasemna le Peter le diga sathot to rwe. Atiga Barnabas ting tangga banina kai lang swak rwe.
48002014	Banina sacham om bazenu nung suiga bazega se make dinu munu kaan bi eina khangsung meithaan bi Peter khou rin ngaake, “Nang Jihudi rwan toga bani om chaang se makka Gentile rwan om chaang danga lung ong nge dabe, nangna Gentile rwan ding Jihudi rwan om chaang danga se lang tatoga namga pi to ongnubo?
48002015	Ani basana Jihudi rwanne khatle noh phunnu Gentile rwan dannu make.
48002016	Mi khat ting chongtan zeinu paan bina pi baze thangnu make atiyeda Jisu Christa ding balumsanu paan bi naye dinu theiga anina le chongtan zeinu paanna makka, Christa khou balumsanu paan bina ani ding pi baze thang lang Christa Jisu khou balumsa rwe. Balangbe chongtan zeinu paan bina pakhatcha ding le pi baze thanglaye.
48002017	Atiyeda Christa paan bina ani ding pi baze thang lang zong ong bi, ani ding ani bahakna noh phunnuwe dinu douwe dabe Christa ga noh om chwanlaang tonu gabo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo.
48002018	Balangbe eina to basiat tamnu pot ting eina bacha thou late dabe, ei chongtan zei maknu miye dinu araanto ating pi mu rwe.
48002019	Balangbe ei Rikrwang khou ring langna chongtan paan bina ei chongtan bi thi rwe.
48002020	Ei Christa le diga cross pi thi bacham rwe. Ei ringga ongnuwa eina ringnu make atiyeda heiya Christa na asung bi ong thangnu paan bi naye. Atun ei apum ringga ongnuwa ating kriang thang ongnu khatle alaang chungna pi swak thangnu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding balumsanu paan bi naye.
48002021	Eina Rikrwang phaangkriang ding ga bathaang maaknu pi to make. Balangbe chongtan zeinu paan bina ririak senu towe dabe Christa na thi thangnu ga baha bi zung rwe.”
48003001	He kapangnu Galatia rwan ga, nanina bazenu ding ga zei mak lang tuna nani sung ding pi tamam thangrugabo? Nani mik meithaan bahak pi Jisu Christa ding cross pi athat thang damnu lang bi bathiangga pi mu thang rwe.
48003002	Eina nani khouna heiza theinu bathaiye, “Nani chongtan zeinu paan binamo mak tabe nanina ngaisunu ga balumsaluga Katha Bathiangnu ga phangnubo?
48003003	Nani intia lang pangnubo? Katha paan bina sing thou damnu ga atun nanina pum om paan bina pi bapung pha thang ongnubo?
48003004	Nanina baha bi heitia lang riangre kanang khaangnubo? Haga batak takka baha bi zunggabo?
48003005	Atibriakpina nani khou Katha ding pi thangnu Rikrwang na nani lak pi tasiatnu chwan bing to thang rwe. Maanna haga chongtan zeinu paan binamo mak tabe nanina ngaisunu ga balumsaluga Maanna haga to thangnubo?
48003006	Haga danga Abraham na le Rikrwang ding balumsanu paan bina bating ririak senu diga chak thangnu ga dannuwe.
48003007	Atibriakpina balumsanu nun za ga Abraham sa rwanne dinu nani thei thang ngo.
48003008	Rikrwang na Gentile rwan ding balumsanu paan bina pi baze thangne dinu Bathiangnu Chongdip mu chaak briakpina, Abraham khou sacham ga kamaga kasam thangga rinne, “Napaan bina chaat bing khou rithoi pi thangne.”
48003009	Atibriakpina balumsanu Abraham le bachamga balumsanu mi bing ding rithoi pi thang rwe.
48003010	Balangbe chongtan om chwan tonu bing ga taseng thwei bi ongnuwe. Balangbe atiga hiak thang nge, “Chong zei lang chongtan om chongdip pi hiak thang damnu bing ga bakaan bathin zei maknu bing khou taseng phang ding ngo.”
48003011	Atiyeda Rikrwang meithaan bi chongtan paanna pakhatcha ding le pi baze thang make dinu bathiangnuwe. Balangbe “Ririak senu maan gana balumsat paan bina ringlune.”
48003012	Atiyeda chongtan gabe balumsanu bina make atiyeda “Chongtan bing zeinu maan ga ha bing paan bina ringlune.”
48003013	Christa na ani hut toga taseng to thangluga, chongtan om taseng bina ani ding ran swak thang rwe. Balangbe atiga hiak thang ngaake, “Thing chung bi bakhai thangnu mi ga taseng phangnuwe.”
48003014	Hagazo Christa Jisu paan bina Abraham om rithoi ga Gentile rwan khou le hung tang lang nge. Anina balumsanu paan bina karen thangnu om Katha ga lousu lang nge.
48003015	Au anao rwan ga, eina misa om chaang nung suiga rinnuwe. Mi nun om chongren tangga pi tip thang damnu kaan bi pakhatchanale baha bi pi ta make mak tabe habei ga hap thang make.
48003016	Chongren bing ga Abraham khatle baom Kik taat khou pi thang ngaake. Maanna “Kik taat rwan khou” diga rin make atiyeda pakhatcha lang bi rinluga “Naom Kik taat khou” diga rinne. Kik taat ka Christa ye.
48003017	Atun eina rinnu ga heiye, Rikrwang na Christa khou meithaanna pi tip thang damnu chongren ding ga sangwan raza bali somthum nung la hungnu chongtan gana chong karennu ga bakraa kraa mak lang to mut make.
48003018	Balangbe phang dingnu rakhum lwak ka chongtan paan binaye dabe, chongren paanna lan rwe. Atiyeda Rikrwang na Abraham khou karen thangnu paan bina haga pi thang damnuwe.
48003019	Ati dabe chongtan om kanaanu pa-aambo? Karen thang damnu mi nun khou Kik taat ka hung mak aangnu tangga koi maan om langna chongtan ga pi tip thang rwe. Heiya tambaan chonglang rwan paanna tabat tonu kutna chongtan ga bacha thou thangnuwe.
48003020	Tabat to thangnu maan gana phom khatcha ding kai karung thangnu make. Atiyeda Rikrwang ba khatcha zung nge.
48003021	Ati dabe chongtan ga Rikrwang chongren bing maitwang bi amnubo? Haga khatchale ati mak ting ngo. Balangbe ringnu pi thang ngamnu chongtan pi thang ngaake dabe, batak takka ririak senu heiya chongtan paan bina to ngaak tingnuwe.
48003022	Atiyeda Jisu Christa khou balumsanu paan bina karen thangnu ga balumsanu nun lang pi thang lang Bathiangnu Chongdipna ha bing ding noh thwei bi thang rwe.
48003023	Atiyeda hung dingnu balumsat ka indao thang mak basaan, chongtanna ani ding ong qwat thang ong ngaake. Kanung indao thang dingnu langna ani ding thin thang ong ngaake.
48003024	Atibriakpina ani ding Christa khou kai hung thang lang chongtanna ani om bachuthangnupa pi to thang rwe. Heiya balumsanu paanna ani ding pi baze thang lang naye.
48003025	Atun balumsanu gana hungnu kaan bi anina haba bachuthangnupa thwei bi ong latlan rwe.
48003026	Balangbe nani nun Jisu Christa khou balumsanu paan bina Rikrwang sa kapaisa rwanne.
48003027	Balangbe Christa khou baptize to damnu nani mi bingna Christa ding pwan sinnu danga sin rwe.
48003028	Jihudi mak tabe Greek rwan, swak mak tabe rang tonu, kapaisa mak tabe kamaisa dinu bacham maknu maake. Balangbe nani mi bing Christa Jisu khou khatcha zung nge.
48003029	Nani Christa omme dabe, nani Abraham om kik taat rwanne. Atiga chongren nung suiga nani rakhum lwak tingnu nunne.
48004001	Atun eina heiya rinnuwe, rakhum lwaknu maan gana naosen basaan maan ga pum brumza bapuba to beida, swak ka le teinu maake.
48004002	Atiyeda bapana ret thangnu bakaan ga hung tang mak basaan, maan bating ngaaksian thangnu nun om khatle phaangkhut ongnu thwei bi ong nge.
48004003	Hadanga anina naosen bado talei ram om bakung tonu om bachu thangnu thwei bi ani ding le bang thang ong ngaake.
48004004	Atiyeda bakaan badat ka hung tangnu kaan bi Rikrwang na Basa Kapaisa ding lang hung rwe. Maan kamaisana ponnu, chongtan thwei bi ponnuwe.
48004005	Heiya chongtan thwei bi ongnu nun ding ran swak thang lang nge. Basa kapaisa pi to thangnu ga anina lousu lang nge.
48004006	Nanina sa kapaisa rwan to briakpina Rikrwang na Basa Kapaisa om Katha ding ani sung bi lang hung thang rwe. Katha gana “Abba, Apa” diga kou rwe.
48004007	Atibriakpina nang swak to latlan rwe. Atiyeda sa kapaisa to rwe. Sa kapaisa to briakpina Christa paan bina nang Rikrwang om rakhum lwaknu mi to rwe.
48004008	Atiyeda haba kaan bi nanina Rikrwang ding thei mak balei bachaang toga ri ka maknu nun ding kalum ong ngaake.
48004009	Atiyeda atun nanina Rikrwang ding theiru briakpina mak tabe Rikrwang na nani ding theiru briakpina, tatoga nanina kasonnu khatle khopsa maknu bachu thangnu bi ga kanei khut latluga nanina swak to lat lang bathainubo?
48004010	Nanina lumik, tha, bakaan khatle sangwan ding ngaake.
48004011	Eina baha bi nani lang chwan to damnubo diga nani langna ei kachinu amme.
48004012	Au anao rwan ga, nani eina nani ding hwei ongme, Ei dan lang to thang ngo; balangbe ei le nani dan ongme. Nanina apek leng ka maknu chwan khatchale to make.
48004013	Atiyeda eina azan songa, nani khou kama katakka sacham ga kasam hung ngaake dinu nanina theiye.
48004014	Azan bi tamphaangnu ga nanina ating za maknu mak tabe, lou thang maknu to make. Atiyeda nanina ating Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang khat ting danga, dinuba Christa Jisu bahak ting danga lou thang rwe.
48004015	Ati dabe nani khou am ngaaknu karonu ga pa-aam torubo? Balangbe eina nani khou sake tonuwe, dinuba nanina zaye dabe nani mik ka ran swakluga akhou pi ngaak tingnuwe.
48004016	Eina bazenu ri chong rin swaknu langna ei nani om munanu torubo?
48004017	Banina nani ding sung khutka zong ngaake atiyeda haga kasanu lang mak ngaake. Nanina bani khou sung khutka zong lang banina nani ding pi sui mak ngaake.
48004018	Atiyeda eina nani le diga ong bachamnu za bi makka, bakaan bathin kasanu om lang bi sung khutnu ga sanuwe.
48004019	Eina kriangnu naosen rwan ga, nani sung bi Christa om thot gong ga bacha thou mak basaan, ei nani langna nao lung lang nainu kaan bi riangrenu danga ong maang nge.
48004020	Ei atun nani le diga ong bacham nwamme khatle achong biak kalenu bathai rwe. Balangbe ei nani langna asung tamamnu amme. Hagar le Sarah
48004021	Chongtan thwei bi ongnu bathainu nani ga akhou rinno, Chongtanna rinnu ga nani ngai thang makkabo?
48004022	Balangbe atiga hiak thang nge, Abraham sa kapaisa pat ni am ngaake, pakhat ka swak mannu saye, pakhatna rang tonu mannu saye.
48004023	Atiyeda swak mannuna ponnu sa ga misa pumna bathainu nung suiga ponnuwe. Rang tonu mannuna ponnu sa ga chongren nung suiga ponnuwe.
48004024	Heiba chong nga rin kaba thangnuwe, balangbe kamaisa pat ni ga chongren to thang ngaaknu kaniye. Pakhatna Sinai rammwan lana swak toga basa rwan ding pon thangnu Hagar ngaake.
48004025	Balangbe Hagar ga Arab la amnu Sinai rammwan gaye. Haga atun am ongnu Jerusalem dannuwe. Balangbe Jerusalem khatle basa rwan le diga swak toga lung ongme.
48004026	Atiyeda basaang la Jerusalem gabe rang tonu mannuwe. Haga ani khangsung nu we.
48004027	Balangbe atiga hiak thang ngaake, “He naosen kai maknu, sa pon maknu nang, karoro! Nao lung lang riangre maknu nang, pao rakanga paoro! Balangbe basan amnu kamaisa, Ma braanto ongnu maan gana sa nao tamnuwe.”
48004028	Unao rwan ga, atun Isaac tanga ani nun chongren sa rwan to rwe.
48004029	Atiyeda pum nung suiga ponnu maan gana Katha nung suiga ponnu bating rai ngaake, heiya atun le hadan ong maang nge.
48004030	Ati ngaaklena Bathiangnu Chongdipna pa-aam rin thangbo? “Swak mannu ding ga basa kapaisa le diga kazun sat tammo, balangbe swak mannu sa kapaisa gana rang tonu mannu sa kapaisa le diga rakhum lwak bachamlaye.”
48004031	Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, ani swak mannu sa rwan make atiyeda rang tonu mannu sa rwan zung nge.
48005001	Atibriakpina Christa na ani ding rang pi to thang briakpina rang tonu riak pi ga han tipka hanno. Swak om ringok thwei bi onglanro.
48005002	Phaang ngo, Paul, eina nani khou rinnuwe, nanina mun romme dabe Christa ga nani lang tongnu khatchale maake.
48005003	Mun romnu mi bing khou eina sake piye, dinuba chongtan bing zei lang lei chaaknuwe.
48005004	Chongtanna nani ding pi baze thang lang karamnu nani, Christa khouna lang swak trwe. Nani phaangkriang bina bukta drwe.
48005005	Balangbe Katha paan bi balumsanuna ririak senu om bachun ding anina taraan ga ngaak ongme.
48005006	Balangbe Christa Jisu khou mun romnu mak tabe mun rom maknu bathaang khatchale maake. Atiyeda balumsanuna kriangnu bi chwan tonu bathaang amnuwe.
48005007	Nani pak chuiga pak ngaake. Atiyeda bazenu ding ga zei mak lang nani ding tuna khaamgabo?
48005008	Nani ding bathem swaknu heiya nani ding kou thangnu Bakhouna make.
48005009	Khai titchana uilu tum pui ding pi pwangkaye.
48005010	Nanina nani sung katei am ngaaklaye diga eina Pukraangba khou balumsaye. Atiyeda tudannu nani ding pi riangrenu maan ga, tudannu ngaakle chong tonu kaan bi baom chongsem ga lousulune.
48005011	Atiyeda unao rwan ga, eina atun tangga mun rom ding gaye diga kasamme dabe, pa-aam to lang banina ating rai ongnubo? Ati dabe cross lang bi ket basuinu ga pi am thangla rwe.
48005012	Nani ding to riangre ongnu nun gana bani pum bahakna basa sem ngaake dabe ei pem dingnuwe.
48005013	Balangbe unao rwan ga, nani ding rang to lang kou thang rwe. Nani om rang tonuwa, pum lang badou chanu langna sizin mako. Atiyeda kriangnu paan bina khat le khat chwanlaang to kalewo.
48005014	Balangbe chongtan bing ga chongkaang khatcha bi pi hung tang thang rwe. Hagazo, “Nangna nainnai lounai ding nazan ding danga kriang ding gaye.”
48005015	Atiyeda nanina khat le khat eih kalega sa sat kaleye dabe, nani khatna khat ting to mut mak lang barak thei ding gaye.
48005016	Heiya eina rinnuwe, Katha om paanna seyo atiye dabe pum om bathainu ga pi hung tanglaye.
48005017	Balangbe pum om bathainu gana Katha ding mu naye. Atiga Katha om bathainu gana pum ding mu naye, Balangbe nanina to nwam to nwamnu ga to mak lang barwei khat le khat munaga maitwang kaleye.
48005018	Atiyeda Katha na nani ding kai thang nge dabe, nani chongtan thwei bi ongnu make.
48005019	Atiga pum om chwan bing ga indaowe. Hagazo, rwan mei rwan basan laannu, lungkoi lungmaannu, bathiang maknu lamchat, imbet boulaanu,
48005020	ri katha kalumnu, dwei choinu, phaang batannu, kabit kamainu, antiam kalenu, balung pwan taknu, balaangza baloinu, zakale maknu khatle kakoinu bachu thangnu,
48005021	antiamnu, mi athatnu, zu kalonu khatle sa in kalonu hadannu bing heiye. Eina meithaanna nani khou rin thang damnu ga danga, atun eina nani khou hei lang bi rin chaak thangnuwe, dinuba hei dannu chwan tonu mi bingna Rikrwang om krwang talei la badam lousulaye.
48005022	Atiyeda Katha om kraa gabe, kriangnu, karonu, dai bazaangnu, khaang theinu, kriang thang theinu, kasanu, balumsa zanu,
48005023	sung bazaangnu, bazan ding karaknu hei bing nge. Hei bing om maitwang bi chongtan khatchale maake.
48005024	Christa om tonu mi nunna zanti pum ga, haba om bathainu bing ga le sungna baningnu le bachamga cross pi athat bacham drwe.
48005025	Ani nun Katha paan bina ringnuwe dabe, Katha paan bina se le sezo.
48005026	Ani nun lian toga khatna khat ting to balung pwan kale makcho khatle antiam kale makcho.
48006001	Unao rwan ga, koi maan bi ta thangnu pakhat ting nanina namsuwe dabe, Katha om mi tonu nanina hadannu bating ga sung bazaangnu Katha paan bina pi kathui thang lato. Nating le bathem mak lang nazan bahakna barak theiyo.
48006002	Nani nun khat khat om potrit phunkaleyo. Atiga Christa om chongtan ding pi hung tang ngo.
48006003	Balangbe tudannu khatchale maknu mi pakhatna maan mi khat chung nge diga baning nge dabe, maan baraanto bating minamnuwe.
48006004	Atiyeda bazanna baraanto baom chwan ga tamphaang ding ngo. Hagana mi khat om lang bi maknu, balang bi lian tonu lousulune.
48006005	Balangbe mi bingna baom baom potrit ka phun lang nge.
48006006	Rikrwang chong bachu thangnu lousunu maan gana kasanu bing bakhou bachu thang ongnu maan ga le badam lou bacham ding ngo.
48006007	Nani ding pi minam mako. Rikrwang ding choi banui dingnu make. Balangbe mi khatna maanna bwan thang damnu ga maanna lwak le lwaklune.
48006008	Balangbe bazan bahak lang bwannu mi gana bapum bina braannu lwaklune; atiyeda katha langna bwannu mi gana katha khouna khwa sei ringnu lwaklune.
48006009	Kasanu to bi ani riangrenu to makcho. Balangbe anina sung inkhin make dabe, bakaan tang bi anina bakraa lwaklune.
48006010	Atibriakpina ani badou chanu lousu ong bi mi bing khou khatle inkuga balumsanu inkhun bing bi kasanu chwan tozo.
48006011	Phaang ngo, akut bahakna nani khou heitia liannu bahiakna hiak thangnuwa!
48006012	Langkaang la sanu thot pi muza lang bathainu bingna nani ding mun rom lang banina rakanga bathemme. Heiya Christa om cross lang bina bani ding rai mak lang naye.
48006013	Balangbe mun romnu banina tangga chongtan ga zei make. Atiyeda banina nani lang bi lian to langna nani ding mun pi rom nwamnuwe.
48006014	Atiyeda alaangbe, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om cross lang bi makka, khatchale alian to make. Hei paan bina talei ramna akhou khatle eina talei ram bi cross pi thi rwe.
48006015	Balangbe mun romnu ngaakle rom maknu ngaakle khatchale make. Atiyeda bakung tonuba dam kathannu heiye.
48006016	Rin ongnu chaang nung suiga bazega se ongnu bing khou khatle Rikrwang om Israel rwan bing lu chung bi dai bazaangnu khatle phaangkriang pi thang ding ngo.
48006017	Atunna thouga ating mi khatchanale to katop mak tam ding ngo. Balangbe Jisu Christa om toga apum bi aandim inza phun ongme.
48006018	Au anao rwan ga, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang gana nani katha le ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
49001001	Rikrwang na baningnu paan bina, Jisu Christa om chonglang Paul na, Ephesus pi amnu bathiangnu mi nun khatle Jisu Christa khou balumsanu nun khou,
49001002	ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou am ding ngo.
49001003	Christa khou ani ding Katha om rithoi bing tambaan ram bariak bing bi rithoi pi thangnu, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Rikrwang khatle Pa ding swankawo.
49001004	Ani Bameithaan bi bathiangnu khatle koi maaknu to lang talei ram dam mak baleina kriangnu bi Maanna ani ding Bakhou ka thang thangnu danga,
49001005	Maanna baningnu om kasanu pem thangnu nung suiga ani ding Jisu Christa paan bina Bapum bahak pi sa kapaisa toga lou thangnu heiya kamaga daan thangga,
49001006	Maanna kungga kriangnu Bapaan bina ani lang pi thang damnu Baphaangkriang om lwat ting anina swanka lang nge.
49001007	Khopsanu Baphaangkriang nung suiga, Bathi paan bina ani ding Bakhou ran swak thang rwe dinuba, ani koi maan ding kok thangnu lousu rwe.
49001008	Haba phaangkriang ga Baom ningting khatle theinu bing nung suiga ani khou sipsaga pi thang rwe.
49001009	Maanna baningnu kasanu Babaning nung suiga inthim chong ga ani khou pi thei thangga,
49001010	bakaan bing om talun ga hung tang bi, Maanna tambaan le talei ram bi amnu bing ding Christa khou khatcha toga kai karung thang lang nge.
49001011	Maanna baningnu nung suiga chwan bing to ongnu Baom rang thangnu nung suiga kamaga daan thangnu om langna anina le Christa khou rakhum ga lwaksu rwe.
49001012	Hagazo Christa khou kamaga bachun damnu anina balwat liannu ding swan lang nge.
49001013	Nanina le bazenu chong, nani ringriak om sacham ngaisuluga, Bakhou balumsaluga karen thangnu Katha Bathiangnu le diga nani ding Christa khou seal nam thang rwe.
49001014	Rikrwang om to damnu nun ding ran swak thang mak basaan, Katha Bathiangnu ga anina lwak tingnu rakhum lang pi chainuwe. Haga Balwat liannu ding swanka lang nge.
49001015	Atibriakpina Pukraangba khou nani om balumsat khatle bathiangnu mi bing ding nanina kriangnu cham ga eina ngaisuluga,
49001016	aom hweininu bi nani ding baningsu thangga nani langna swanka thangnu le chat make.
49001017	Dinuba, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Rikrwang, lwat liannu Pa na Bating theinu ningting khatle indao thangnu om katha ding nani khou pi thang lang
49001018	khatle nani lungning mik pi baan swakluga, hagana Maanna nani ding kou thangnu om bachun ga pa-aambo dinu thei lang bathiangnu mi rwan khou amnu Barakhum ga intia lang lwat liannubo dinu nanina thei lang
49001019	khatle ngam liannu chwan nung suiga, balumsa damnu ani khou amnu Baom kanatnu ngam ga intia lang liannubo dinu nanina thei lang nge.
49001020	Maanna Christa ding thi bina pi ring thouluga tambaan ram bariak bing bi Bakut inchang la pi ong thangnu kaan bi ngam gana Christa khou chwan to thang rwe.
49001021	Balu tonu nun, ngam, nat raangnu nun khatle bapuba tonu nun lu chung bi, meng bing lu chung bi heiba bakaan za bi makka hung dingnu bi le bapum brumza lu chung bi pi ong thang rwe.
49001022	Pot bing ding Baket baza thwei bi thang rwe khatle Christa ding pot bing om balu toga rupkathan bi pi thang rwe.
49001023	Haba rupkathan ga balang bing bi sipsanu, bachang sanu Bapum gaye.
49002001	Thou damnu kaan bi nani koi maan le noh bi thi ngaak rwe.
49002002	Nani bakaan khat pi talei ram chaang nung suiga, saangbaan om ngampuba chaang nung suiga se ong ngaake. Haba katha ga chong zei maknu sa rwan lu chung bi atun le chwan to ongme.
49002003	Bani lak pi ani bing le bakaan khat pi bani danga ani zanti pumna bathainu thot pi seluga ani zanti pumna khatle sungna bathainu bing toga ong ngaake. Ani nun katei rwan danga, bachaang toga balung pwan ta thangnu sa rwan to ong ngaake.
49002004	Atiyeda kriang thang theinuna sipnu Rikrwang na, Baom liannu phaangkriang paan bina ani ding Maanna kriang thangga,
49002005	ani koi maan bi thi ong bina tangga ani ding Christa le diga pi ring thou bacham thang rwe. Phaangkriang paan bina ani ding kan thang rwe.
49002006	Atiga ani ding Maan le diga pi ring thou bacham thangluga Christa Jisu khou tambaan ram bariak bing bi ani ding Maan le pi ong bacham thang rwe.
49002007	Haga Maanna Christa Jisu paan bina ani ding kriang thangnu bi Baom inkuga sipsanu Baphaangkriang ding hung dingnu kaan bi pi mu thang lang nge.
49002008	Balangbe phaangkriang paan bina balumsa briakpina nani ding kan thang rwe, heiya nani khouna make, Rikrwang leithwan zung nge.
49002009	Pakhatchanale lian to mak lang heiya chwan paan bina make.
49002010	Balangbe Rikrwang na kamaga laang thangnu kasanu chwan bing bi anina se lang Christa Jisu khou dam thang damnu ani Baom kutthiamme.
49002011	Atibriakpina nani baningsuwo dinuba, bakaan khat pi nani nun pum bi Gentile rwan toga, zanti pumna bachanu mun romnu diga kounu nunna nani ding mun rom maknu diga kou ngaake.
49002012	Ha kaan ga nani Christa sui maknu, Israel khulung sa rwan to makka, man ram sa rwan toga karen thangnu chongren bina man rwan, bachunnu maaknu nun khatle talei ram bi Rikrwang sui maknu nun toga ong ngaake.
49002013	Atiyeda bakaan khat pi namlaaga ong ngaaknu nani ding Christa thi paan bina Christa Jisu khou pi banai hung thang rwe.
49002014	Balangbe Maan Bahak ani lang dai bazaangnuwe. Maanna kani ding khatcha pi to thangluga ani lak pi khak lang thang ongnu imbaang ding torai thang rwe.
49002015	Kani bi gana mi kathan khat Bapum bahak paan bina bacha langna bapum bi munanu dinuba, zathang om chongtan bing ding lou sat thang rwe. Atiga dai bazaangnu phun hung thang rwe.
49002016	Munanu ding ga athatluga kani ding ga pum khatcha toga Rikrwang khou cross paan bina pi taman thang lang nge.
49002017	Maanna hungluga namlaaga ong ngaaknu nani khou khatle naiga ongnu bani khou dai bazaangnu sacham ga kasam thang rwe.
49002018	Balangbe Bapaan bina arwei pat nina Katha khatcha bi Pa khou khutnu riak lousu rwe.
49002019	Atibriakpina nani nun man mi khatle talei khat la mi lan rwe atiyeda bathiangnu mi nun khatle Rikrwang inkhun le diga nani khulung sa to bacham rwe.
49002020	Nani chonglang rwan khatle thiamting rwan om inmun bi bacha thou rwe. Jisu Christa Bahakna inmun om bakung tonu intaki lung gaye.
49002021	Bakhou in pum ga bariak cha chaga chan thangluga Pukraangba khou bathiangnu kalum in to lang bacha thounuwe.
49002022	Bakhou nani ding le Katha paan bina Rikrwang ongnu riak to langna bacha thou karungnuwe.
49003001	Ha langna nani Gentile rwan lang bi Christa Jisu om qwan in bi ongnu Paul eina,
49003002	nani lang akhou pi thang damnu Rikrwang om phaangkriang om talun ga nanina batak takka ngaisuwe dabe,
49003003	haga eina meithaanna toiga hiak tamnu ga dannuwe. Dinuba, inthim chong ga indao thangnu paan bina akhou pi thei thang rwe.
49003004	Nanina heiya panu kaan bi Christa om inthim chong ga eina theiye dinu nanina thei ngamlune.
49003005	Inthim chong ga atun Katha paan bina bathiangnu chonglang rwan khatle thiamting rwan khou indao thang ngaaknu danga, thou damnu bakaan bi mi rwan khouba pi thei thang mak ngaake.
49003006	Inthim chong gabe sacham paan bina Gentile rwan ga Jihudi rwan le rakhum lwaknu mi to bacham rwe khatle pum khat om naat to bacham rwe khatle Christa khou Baom karen thangnu badam ga lou bacham rwe.
49003007	Bangamna chwan tonu paan bina akhou pi thangnu Rikrwang phaangkriang om leithwan nung suiga ating sacham om chwanlaang pi to thang rwe.
49003008	Bathiangnu mi nun khon bina sin kataknu akhou heiba phaangkriang pi thang rwe. Haga Christa om zongsu ngamlanu lan ga Gentile rwan khou eina kasam lang
49003009	khatle Jisu Christa paan bina pot bing ding dam thang damnu Rikrwang khou talei ram thoutan bina inkam hung ngaaknu inthim chong om rang thangnu ga pa-aambo dinu mi bing khou pi thei lang nge.
49003010	Tambaan ram bariak bing bi kasei kalian nun khatle ngam phunnu nun khou Rikrwang om ningting bachaat bing ding atun rupkathan paan bina pi thei thang lang nge.
49003011	Haga ani Pukraangba na Christa Jisu khou to thangnu khwa sei lang laang thangnu nung sui gaye.
49003012	Bapaan bina khatle anina Bakhou balumsanu paan bina ani sung raangga khatle sung ritka khutsu rwe.
49003013	Atibriakpina nani lang chungna eina riangre kanang dounu kaan bi nani sung inkhin ta mak lang eina nani ding hweinuwe, balangbe aom riangre kanangga nani lian to lang naye.
49003014	Hei lang chungna eina ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Pa khou kekhok deluga kalumme.
49003015	Tambaan le talei ram bi amnu inkhun bing ga Bakhouna meng basaknuwe.
49003016	Eina hweiye dinuba nani om basungnu mi ga, Baom khopsanu lwat nung suiga Bakatha paan bina nani ding ngam le suiga pi nat thou thang lang
49003017	hagazo balumsanu paan bina Christa na nani sung bi ong thang lang khatle nani nun kriangnu bi kamong taluga tipka ong lang nge.
49003018	Christa om kriang ding ga basei, balian babasaang khatle bathuk paaambo dinu bathiangnu mi bingna theinu ngam lang nge.
49003019	Theinu ngamnu bina inku kiatka Christa om kriang ding thei lang khatle Rikrwang om khopsanu bing gana nani ding pi sip thang lang nge.
49003020	Ani sung bi chwan to ongnu ngam nung suiga anina hweininu khatle baningnu chung bi inku kiatka chwan to thangnu ngamnu Bakhou,
49003021	rupkathan lang bi Christa Jisu paan bina mikin bing bi lwat liannu ga Bakhou khwa seiga am ding ngo. Amen.
49004001	Atibriakpina nani ding kou thangnu kou bi ga khopsanu toga se lang Pukraangba langna qwan mi to ongnu eina nani ding hweinuwe.
49004002	Bangiam ta taknu khatle sung bazaangnu towo. Khaang theiga kriangnu paan bina khatna khat lang kriangnu bi khaang thang kaleyo.
49004003	Dai bazaangnu om karungnu bi, Katha om sung chamnu ga am ngam lang banangga karam thang ngo.
49004004	Nani ding kou thangnu dat pi bachunnu khatcha bi kou thangnu danga pum khat, Katha khat,
49004005	Pukraangba khat, balumsat khat, baptize khat,
49004006	Rikrwang khat khatle mi bing om Pa khat khatle Maan bani bing lu chung bi amme khatle bani bing khou chwan to thang ongme khatle nani bing khou ong ongme.
49004007	Atiyeda Christa na kasem thangnu leithwan nung suiga ani pakhat khat khou phaangkriang pi thang rwe.
49004008	Atibriakpina Maanna rinne, “Maanna basaang la ka damnu kaan bi Maanna namnu mi nun ding kai se rwe, Khatle mi nun khou leithwan bing pi thang rwe.”
49004009	“Maan basaang la ka drwe” dinu heiyana rinnuba Maan kama bi talei thwei kalan la ta ngaak rwe dinu om bakaba makka katei pa-aambo?
49004010	Talei thwei la ta ngaaknu Maan ga pot bing ding pi sip thang lang tambaan om Basaang kataknu riak la ka damnu ga Maan bahake.
49004011	Atiga Maanna mi kasem ding chonglang, kasem ding thiamting, kasem dingna evangelist, kasem ding pastor khatle kasem ding bachu thangnu to lang
49004012	haga chwanlaang om chwan langna bathiangnu mi nun ding pi khopsa thou lang nge. Haga Christa pum ding bacha thou lang nge.
49004013	Bacha thounu ga ani mi bingna balumsanu bi khatcha tonu khatle Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding theinu khatle khopsanu mi nun to lang Christa om sipsanu chaang ga hung tang mak basaan lang nge.
49004014	Tui kabaapnu bingna phun swak phunkhutnu, bachaat bachaat bachu thangnu thiraangna phunkoi senu zekrin khatle mi nun om rou siatna phun swak phunkhut senu, minam lang chwan ongnu kaan bi ani nun kasinnu naosen rwan dan mak tingnuwe.
49004015	Atiyeda bazenu ga kriangnu bi kabiaga balang bing bi balu tonu Christa khou lian thou lang nge.
49004016	Bakhouna pum om naat bing kai karung thang nge, ren bing ding bariak cha chaga don thangluga naat bingna bathou bathou to chuiga tonu kaan bi Bakhouna pum bing ding kriangnu bi baraantoza bacha thou lang pi lian thou thang nge.
49004017	Atibriakpina eina heiya rinnuwe, Pukraangba khou nani ding kachui thang nge dinuba, Gentile rwanna bani om bathaang maaknu bani sung baning bi senu danga nani se latlanro.
49004018	Bani khou thei maknu ga am briakpina, bani sung nat thouluga bani om theinu ga pi zing drwe khatle Rikrwang om ringnu bina impaan drwe.
49004019	Bani sung natnu gana banina theinu ngamnu om lungning ga braan dam briakpina bathiang maknu lamchat ka pemga to lang bani pum ding imbet boulaanu chwan to lang pi swak rwe.
49004020	Atiyeda Christa om lang bi atiga nani bachu dam make.
49004021	Nanina Balang bi batakka ngaisunu ngaake khatle Jisu khou amnu bazenu nung suiga nani ding bachu thang rwe.
49004022	Nanina meithaan se ngaaknu lamchat om lang bi, minamnu pum om bathainu nung suiga braan ongnu mi lui ga bathan sato.
49004023	Nani sung katha ga pi kathanno.
49004024	Bazenu ririak senu khatle bathiangnu bi Rikrwang thot gong bi dam thangnu mi kathan ga nanina sin basoiyo.
49004025	Atibriakpina chong karwaknu kabianu ga bathan satro. “Nani mi bing zana bainnai lounai rwan le diga bazenu chong kabiawo.” Balangbe ani khatna khat om naate.
49004026	“Balung pwannu bi noh to mako,” nani balung pwan ong bi lumik pi ta mako
49004027	khatle Diabol lang bariak pi mako.
49004028	Barusanu maan gana baru lat mak ting ngo atiyeda ka maaknu nun lang pi thang lang bakhou am lang maanna bakutna kasanu chwan rakanga to ding ngo.
49004029	Nani mun bina sa maknu chong kabia swak mak ting ngo. Atiyeda bacha thou langna bariak badat chaga kasanu chong kabianu to ding ngo. Hagana ngai ongnu nun khou phaangkriang pi thanglune.
49004030	Ran swak thangnu lumik tang lang Maanna nani ding seal nam thangnu Rikrwang om Katha Bathiangnu ding sung pi riangre mako.
49004031	Kakhaanu sung bing khatle sung sounu, balung pwannu khatle thot siaga paonu khatle kasianu kabianu, phaang batannu sung bing le suiga nani khouna asat tammo.
49004032	Atiyeda nani khat le khat kriang kaleyo, sung banemmo, Rikrwang na Christa paan bina nani noh kok thangnu danga, nani khat le khat kok thang kaleyo.
49005001	Atibriakpina nani nun kungga kriangnu sa rwan danga Rikrwang ding sui bazeiyo.
49005002	Christa na ani ding kriang thangga Rikrwang khou barim banam sanu potkat khatle rikhaang pot toga ani lang Bapum bahak ting kat swaknu danga nani kriangnu bi seyo.
49005003	Atiyeda nani lak pi lungkoi lungmaannu, bathiang maknu bing mak tabe ra-aamnu hei bing nga bameng hakna rin pan mako. Ha bing ga bathiangnu mi nun lang khopsanu make.
49005004	Tanaatnu lamchat, kapangnu chong kabianu khatle kasianu talwan tapa tonu hei bing nga khopsanu make atinu hut swankawo.
49005005	Nanina heiya batak takka theiye dinuba, lungkoi lungmaannu mi, bathiang maknu mi, ra-aamnu mi hagazo ri katha ding kalumnu mi ga Christa khatle Rikrwang om krwang talei rakhum lousulaye.
49005006	Tudannuna nani ding bathaang maaknu chongna minam mak ting ngo. Balangbe hagana chong zei maknu mi nun lu chung bi Rikrwang balung pwan hung nge.
49005007	Atibriakpina bani le diga badam lou bacham mako. Baannu bi Seyo
49005008	Balangbe nani nun bakaan khat pi zing ga ong ngaake. Atiyeda atunbe Pukraangba khou nani babaan to ong rwe. Naniba kabaannu sa rwan danga seyo,
49005009	balangbe Katha om kraa gabe balang bing bi kasanu, ririak senu khatle bazenuwe
49005010	khatle Pukraangba na lou thang zanu ga pa-aambo dinu zong ngo.
49005011	Kazingnu om bakraa kraa maknu chwan bing ga badam suilou bacham mako. Haba hut lang bani koi ga indao swako.
49005012	Balangbe banina inkamga to ongnu chwan bing ga rin swak lang hakna kazaknuwe.
49005013	Atiyeda ha bing ding ga baannu gana indao swak pi pot bing ding pi mu thang nge. Balangbe pi phaangmunu bing ga babaan naye.
49005014	Atibriakpina Maanna rinne, “Inthi ongnu nang insaang thouro, Thinu bina nang ring thouro, Khatle Christa na nakhou baan thanglune.”
49005015	Atibriakpina nanina kapangnu rwan dan makka atiyeda ningtingnu mi danga nanina se ongnu ga tatoga se ongbo dinu barak theiyo.
49005016	Nani om bakaan ga choi chuiyo, balangbe lumik heiya sia rwe.
49005017	Atibriakpina ningting maknu to makka atiyeda Pukraangba na baningnu ga paaambo dinu theiyo.
49005018	Zu kalo mako, habei ga chong swak la swak amme atiyeda Katha na sipo.
49005019	Nani khat le khat khou kalum laa, swannu laa khatle Katha om laana kabia kaleyo. Nani Pukraangba khou sung kalan la balung sianu khwan le suiga to thang ngo.
49005020	Balang bing bi ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng bi Pa Rikrwang khou bakaan bathin swanno.
49005021	Rikrwang ding kachiga nani khatna khat thwei bi talu tawo.
49005022	Mei rwan ga, Pukraangba khou danga nani basan bahak thwei bi talu tawo.
49005023	Balangbe Christa na le rupkathan om balu tonu dan basan ga mei om baluwe. Atiga Maan pum ding Kanthangnupaye.
49005024	Atibriakpina rupkathanna Christa thwei bi ongnu danga mei rwanna le balang bing bi bani basan bahak thwei bi ong ding ngo.
49005025	Basan rwan ga, Christa na rupkathan ding kriang thangga ha langna Bapum bahak ting pi swak thangnu danga nani mei rwan ding kriang ngo.
49005026	Christa na pi swak thangnu rupkathan ga to bathiang thangga tanaatnu maak lang tuina kasinnu danga chongkaangna kasin bathiang thang lang nge.
49005027	Atiga Maanna rupkathan ding imphom tanaatnu, chu thangnu mak tabe, charutnu mak tabe hadannu khatchale maaknu atiyeda haga bathiangnu khatle koi maaknu lwat liannu rupkathan toga maanna Bapum bahak khou pi thang lang nge.
49005028	Hadanga basan rwanna bani pum ding kriangnu danga bani mei bahak rwan ding kriang ding gaye. Bamei ding kriangnu maan gana bapum ding le kriangnuwe.
49005029	Balangbe pakhatchanale bapum ding batannu maake. Atiluga Pukraangba na rupkathan lang to thangnu ga danga haba mi gana bapum ding bakot thouwe khatle banang thang nge.
49005030	Balangbe ani nun Bapum, Bazanti khatle Baru om naat nunne.
49005031	“Atibriakpina kapaisa khatna banu bapa ding thangsialuga bamei khou karung ding gaye khatle barwei ga pum khatcha to ding gaye.”
49005032	Heiya kathuknu inthim chong nge atiyeda heiya eina Christa khatle rupkathan om lang bi rinnuwe.
49005033	Ati ngaaklena mi bingna le bamei ding bapum bahak ting danga kriang ding ngo khatle bameina le babasan ding takung tazei to lang barak thei ding ngo.
49006001	Naosen rwan ga, Pukraangba khou nani nu pa rwan chong zeiyo, balangbe heiya bazenuwe.
49006002	“Nanu khatle napa ding takung tazeiyo,” heiya karen thangnu le bachamga kamanu zathang nge.
49006003	Haga “Nalaang sa lang nge khatle nang talei ram bi lungsei bara inkuan lang nge.”
49006004	Pa rwan ga, nani sa rwan ding balung pwan lang lao mako. Atiyeda Pukraangba om lang bi bachu thang, rin thangga bani ding bakot thouwo.
49006005	Swak rwan ga, Christa khou danga nani sung bathiangga talei ram bi nani nun om bapuba rwan ding kachi kathokka chong zeiyo.
49006006	Mi nun ding pi pem langna mikphaang om chwan tonu makka sung bathiangga Christa om swak rwan danga, Rikrwang na baningnu ga towo.
49006007	Mi nun khou to thangnu dan makka Pukraangba khou to thangnu danga sung khutka chwanlaang towo.
49006008	Balangbe swak ngaakle rang tonu mi ngaakle tudannu khatna kasanu chwan towe dabe, maanna tonu om kasanu ga maanna Pukraangba khouna lousu latlune dinu nanina theiye.
49006009	Bapuba rwan ga, hadanga bani khou to thang ngo. Bani ding basi mako. Balangbe napum bahak om Bapuba tambaan la amme dinu nanina theiye khatle Bakhou kathing aih tonu maake.
49006010	Kakham bi unao rwan ga, Pukraangba khou khatle Baom kanatnu ngam bi nani natro.
49006011	Diabol om rou ding maitwangnu ngam lang nani Rikrwang om kraan pon bing ga sin basoiyo.
49006012	Balangbe anina katwak ongnuwa zanti le thi pum maitwang bi make. Atiyeda kangamnu, nat raangnu rwan, ngam phunnu khatle heiba bakaan om kazingnu bapuba rwan lu chung bi, tambaan ram bariak bing la amnu sa maknu katha om ngam nun maitwang biye.
49006013	Atibriakpina sa maknu lumik ting ga nanina maitwangnu ngam lang Rikrwang om kraan pon bing ga sin basoiro. Ha bing ga toluga nani tipka han lang nge.
49006014	Atibriakpina bazenuna kongkhaak toga khaakluga hen tipka han ong ngo. Ririak senuna kachaang thop to ding gaye.
49006015	Dai bazaangnu sacham bina hungnu chamdaannu gana ketthop toga nani ket pi thopo.
49006016	Hei bing chung bi balumsat om kapho ga choi thouro. Hagana sa maknu baom mei choknu thanthing bing ding to mitnu ngam lang nge.
49006017	Ringriak om kraan luthop thopo khatle Katha om kachaak chem dinuba Rikrwang om chong ga choiyo.
49006018	Kalumnu khatle hweininu hei bing nga bakaan bathin Katha paan bina towo. Heiba sung bing nga amga, khaang theinu bingna bathiangnu mi nun lang kalum thangga barak theiga ong ngo.
49006019	Atiga alaang le sacham om inthim chong ga sung raangga kabianu ngam lang eina abao aang thouluga chongkaang ga rin swaknu ngam lang kalum thang ngo.
49006020	Sacham langna eibe parei ruina bang thang ongnu tabate. Eina rinnu zek swaknu danga sung raangga rin swaknu ngam lang alaang hweini thang ngo.
49006021	Atiyeda nanina le ei tatoga ongbo khatle pa-aam to ongbo dinu thei lang eina kriangnu unao khatle Pukraangba khou balumsa lang khopnu chwanlaang Tychicus na nani khou balang bing ga pi thei thanglune.
49006022	Eina bating hei langna nani khou lang hungnu rwe. Balangbe nanina ani om lang bi thei lang khatle maanna nani sung ding lozaang pi sa thang lang nge.
49006023	Unao rwan khou Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna dai bazaangnu khatle balumsat le bachamga kriangnu am ding ngo.
49006024	Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding sung bathiangga kriangnu bing khou phaangkriang am ding ngo. Amen.
50001001	Jisu Christa om swak tonu Paul le Timothy na, Philippi bi ongnu Christa Jisu om bathiangnu mi nun, phaangsin thangnu mi nun khatle deacon nun khou,
50001002	ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukaraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
50001003	Eina bakaan bathin nani ding baningsuga Arikrwang ding swanne.
50001004	Ei bakaan bathin nani langna karoga kalum ong ngaake.
50001005	Balangbe nanina kamanu lumik pina aniya tangga sacham om badam lou bacham ongnu lang naye.
50001006	Atiga hei lang bi eina balumsaye dinuba, thoutan bina nani khou kasanu chwan to thang damnu Rikrwang na Jisu Christa om lumik ka tangga haga pi to loi thanglune.
50001007	Nani khangsung lang bi eina baning ongnuwa alaangba bazenuwe. Balangbe naniya asung bi am ongme khatle ating parei ruina bangnu bi, kakhangnu bi khatle sacham ding pi tip thangnu bi, nani nun ei le diga phaangkriang om badam lou bachamnu nunne.
50001008	Balangbe Jisu Christa kriang le bachamga eina nani lang intia taraan ngaakpo dinu lang bi Rikrwang na aom sakeye.
50001009	Heiya eina kalumme dinuba, nani kriangga ningting khatle kakoi baze theinu bi inku khit khit thou lang nge.
50001010	Nani lang ingaana sa kataknubo dinu nanina kakhannu ngam lang khatle Christa om lumik tangga bathiangnu to lang khatle koi maaknu to lang nge.
50001011	Atiga Jisu Christa paan bina nani ririak senu karaa gana sip lang nge. Haga Rikrwang lwat liannu lang khatle Bating swan lang nge.
50001012	Atiyeda unao rwan ga, akhou swak tamnu bing gana batak takka sacham ga kasam inku thou lang nge dinu nanina theinu bathaiye.
50001013	Parei ruina ating bang thang ongnu heiya Christa lang naye dinu krwang in ngaaknu bingna khatle mi katei rwan bingna thei rwe.
50001014	Ating bang thang ong briakpina Pukaraangba khou balumsa ongnu unao rwan inzana kachinu maakka chong ga kasam lang inkuga bani sung raang rwe.
50001015	Mi kasemna batakka antiamnuna khatle kae kanaanu riak pina khatle mi kasemna sung bathiangga Christa om sacham ding kasamme.
50001016	Ating bang thang ongnu chung bina inkuga riangre lang kamanu mi kasem gana bani rang toza lang baning briakpina sung bathiang makka Christa sacham ding kasamme.
50001017	Atiyeda sacham ding hankhou lang ating ka thang rwe dinu thei briakpina kakhamnu mi nun gana kriangnu bina sacham ga kasamme.
50001018	Ati dabe tato langbo? Bakung tonu bi, balang bing bi sathot tonuna ngaakle bazenuna ngaakle Christa sacham ding kasamme. Ha langna ei karowe khatle karoga ongme.
50001019	Balangbe nanina kalum thangnu paan bina khatle Jisu Christa om Katha na paang thangnu paan bina akhou swak ongnu heiya ating ran swak thanglune dinu ei theiye.
50001020	Ating pi kazak thanglaye dinu eina taraan ga baning ongme khatle bachun ongme. Atiyeda bakaan bathin bi tonu danga atun le, ei thi ngaakle ring ngaakle apum bi Christa ding lwat pi lian lang sung raangnu ga akhou sipsaga amme.
50001021	Balangbe alaangba eina ringga ongnuwa Christa lang nge. Atiyeda thinu gana alaang tongnuwe.
50001022	Atiyeda eina pum bi ringga ong nge dabe, haga achwantok om bakraa tolune. Atiyeda eina pa-aam ding ka thang langbo dinu ei thei make.
50001023	Balangbe kani lak pi ei batok theilan rwe, kum ga bathan satluga Christa le diga ong bachamnu bathai rwe. Hagana alaang sa inku rwe.
50001024	Ati ngaaklena pum toga atiga ongnuna nani lang bathaang am inkunuwe.
50001025	Ei ringga onglune dinu bathiangga thei briakpina nani lian thou lang khatle balumsanu bi karonu am lang eina ong bachamluga nani mi bing le bacham ting ting onglune dinu theiye.
50001026	Atiga ei nani khou hung lat pi alang bina Christa khou nani karoga khopsanu to lang nge.
50001027	Nani khei ga Christa om sacham le khopsanu zaga towo. Atiga eina nani ding hungmunu ngaakle mak tabe hungmu maknu ngaakle sacham om balumsat pi sung khatcha toga chwan to bachamga nani Katha bi khatcha toga tipka ongme dinu nani lang bi eina ngaisu lang nge.
50001028	Nani ding munanu nunna khatchale pi kachinu to mak ting ngo. Kachi maknu dinuwa bani braan dingnu om badanne. Atiyeda nani langba batak takka ringriake khatle haga Rikrwang khou naye.
50001029	Balangbe Christa meng lang chungna Bakhou balumsanu za makka Bariak pina riangre khaangnu heiya le nani khou za thang rwe.
50001030	Balangbe nani akhouna mu damnu khatle atun ei katwak ongme dinu nanina ngaisu damnu bahak ka nanina le katwak ongme.
50002001	Atibriakpina Christa paan bina nani lang kachui thangnu amme dabe, kriangga bathem thangnu amme dabe, Katha bi badam lou bachamnu amme dabe, kriangnu khatle phaangkriang amme dabe,
50002002	nani khou sung khat tonu khatle badannu khatcha toga, kriangnu amga, sung chamga akaro ga pi sip thang ngo.
50002003	Balaangza baloinu mak tabe lian tonu bi khatchale chwan to mako. Atiyeda sung bangiam taga, katei rwanna nama sa inkunuwe diga chak thang ngo.
50002004	Nani pakhat khatna balannai za lang phaangnu to mako atiyeda katei rwan lang le baning ding ngo.
50002005	Christa Jisu khou am ngaaknu sung ga nani khou le am ding ngo:
50002006	Maan Rikrwang om thot gong bi ong ngaak peida, Rikrwang le diga bachamnu ga tipka choi dingnu danga kakhan mak ngaake.
50002007	Atiyeda Maan bahakna Bating pi barwang thangluga swak pakhat thot gong danga khatle mi khat tanga hung rwe.
50002008	Thot gong bi Maan misa khat tanga hungluga Maan Bapum bahak sung bangiam taga thinu tangga chong zei rwe hagazo cross pi thinu tang gaye.
50002009	Atibriakpina Rikrwang na le Bating pi basaang ka thang rwe. Atiga Bakhou meng bing chung bi basaangnu meng pi thang rwe.
50002010	Tambaan le talei ram bi khatle talei thwei bi amnu nun om kekhok bingna Jisu meng bi detaga kalum lang nge.
50002011	Balei bingna Pa Rikrwang lwat lian langna Jisu Christa heiya Pukaraangba ye dinu rin indaolune.
50002012	Atibriakpina eina kriangnu nun ga, nani bakaan bathin chong zeinu ga danga, eina nani khou ongnu kaan za bi makka atiyeda atun ei ong maknu kaan bi le ha ma inkuga kachi kathokka nani om ringriak ka pi khopsawo.
50002013	Balangbe Bating pi pem langna nanina to nwam lang khatle to lang nani sung bi chwan tonu ga Rikrwang nge.
50002014	Nanina chwan bingza tu tu tam tamnu khatle kae kanaanu sui makka towo.
50002015	Nani sa maknu khatle tun natnu mikin lak pi koi impu thang lang maaknu khatle koi maaknu Rikrwang sa rwan to lang nge. Atiga nani talei ram bi bani lak pi babaan toga baan ongme.
50002016	Eina pak ongnu mak tabe to ongnu achwan heiya bathaam make diga Christa lumik pi eina karo lang ringnu chongkaang ding ga tipka choiyo.
50002017	O, nani om balumsat, rikhaang pot khatle chwan paan bina ating Rikrwang om innu potkat toga bun swak ngaak peida ei karowe khatle nani le diga karo bachamme.
50002018	Ha langna nani le karowe khatle ei le diga karo bacham thang ngo.
50002019	Atiyeda eina nani cham ga ngaisunu kaan bi ating le kachui thang lang Timothy ding nani khou karangga pi hung lang Pukaraangba Jisu khou ei balumsaye.
50002020	Balangbe nani nun om lang bi sung bathiangga banang thang dingnu maan danga kriang thang theinu mi alaang pakhatchale maake.
50002021	Balangbe katei rwan ga bapum za lang zongnu karwake. Atiyeda Christa Jisu lang bi zongnu mi maake.
50002022	Atiyeda nanina baom bataknu thot ka theiye, dinuba, basana bapa ding chwanlaang tonu danga, eina sacham kasam hungnu kaan bi maanna ei le chwan to bacham rwe.
50002023	Atibriakpina eina akhou pa-aam swaklu dingbo dinu thei khap tinu le bating karangga nani khou lang hung lang baning nge.
50002024	Atiyeda ei bahak le nani khou karangga hunglune diga Pukaraangba khou balumsaye.
50002025	Atiyeda unao tonu, chwan to bachamnu khatle kraanmi to bachamnu atiyeda nani om chongpuk mi tonu khatle alaang bathaang amnu kaan bi chwanlaang to thang ongnu Epaphroditus ting nani khou lang hungnuna sa rwe diga ei baning nge.
50002026	Maan nani mi bing ding mu nwamga baning nge, maan naa ngaake dinu nanina ngaisu briakpina maan basung riangre rwe.
50002027	Balangbe maan batak takka thi dingnu danga naa ngaak rwe atiyeda Rikrwang na bating phaangkriang thang rwe. Batingza make, riangrenu chung bi riangrenu akhou hap thang mak lang Maanna ating le phaangkriang thang rwe.
50002028	Atibriakpina nanina bating mu latnu kaan bi karo chui lang khatle ariangre le pi zaang thang langna eina bating nani khou bathunga bathan hungnuwe.
50002029	Atibriakpina bating Pukaraangba meng bi karo karoga loukhut thang ngo. Hei dannu mi nun ding nga basaangga takung tazei to thang ngo.
50002030	Balangbe nanina alaang chwanlaang tonu bi baatnu amnu ga pi nang thang lang bakum ding batainu to makka Christa om chwan langna maan thi dingnu dan ngaak rwe.
50003001	Kakham katak pi, unao rwan ga, Pukaraangba khou karowo. Balangbe eina nani khou hiak han latka hiaknu ga alaang riangre make. Haga nani nun ding ngaaksian thang lang naye.
50003002	Ui nun ding ga cheksinno, sa maknu chwan tonu mi nun ding ga cheksinno, bani pum ding aat bazamnu mi nun ding ga cheksinno.
50003003	Balangbe aniba Katha bi Rikrwang ding kalumnu nun Christa Jisu khou karonu khatle pum bi balumsanu maaknu, mun romnu mi nun zung nge.
50003004	Einabe pum ding balumsanu balang am ngaak peida einaba balumsanu maake. Tudannu pakhatna bakhou pum ding balumsa lang balang amme diga baning nge dabe eina inku lat maang nge:
50003005	Eiba ni kariat tang bi mun romnu, Israel chaat mi, Benjamin in phum mi, Hebrew rwan lak pi bathiangnu Hebrew mi; chongtan lang bina Pharisee;
50003006	chwan bi sung khutnu lang bi, rupkathan ding rainu; chongtan om ririak senu bi, koi maaknu ngaake.
50003007	Atiyeda alaang toga tongnu nun ga Christa lang chungna bathaang maaknu toga ei chak thang rwe.
50003008	Atiyeda batak takka Apukraangba Jisu Christa ding theinu gana inku kataknu le phaang kabanu kaan bi pum brum ga bathaang maaknuwe diga eina chak thang rwe. Pum brum baraannu ga eina Balaang zana khaang thang rwe khatle pum brum ga imphom tanaatnuwe diga eina chak thang rwe, heiya eina Christa ding adam toga lousu langna
50003009	khatle Christa khou ongsunu za lang nge. Chongtan zeinu bina lousunu ririak senu ga akhou maak rwe atiyeda Christa ding balumsanu paan bina lousunu ririak senu ga akhou amme.
50003010	Heiya Maan le thinu thot gong louluga, Maan khatle Bating thinu bina pi ring thounu ngam ga thei langna khatle Bariangrek ka badam lou bacham lang naye,
50003011	pa-aam aam ngaakle, thinu bina ring thounu ga eina le lousu lang nge.
50003012	Eina lousu rwe dinu make mak tabe ei khopsa rwe diga rinnu make. Atiyeda ating Jisu Christa na nam damnu ga danga eina le taswan ga lousu lang karam ongme.
50003013	Unao rwan ga, ei haga lousu rwe diga chak thang make atiyeda khatpa eina towe, hagazo nung la amsia damnu ding ga banim satluga meithaan la amnu ding ga lousu lang baloiga pak ongme.
50003014	Christa Jisu khou Rikrwang na basaang lana kou thangnu taswan ga lousu langna ei kapan ga baloiga pak ongme.
50003015	Atibriakpina bachang sanu bingna heiba sung nga ani khou amzo khatle nanina baningnu katei am ngaaklena haga le nani khou Rikrwang na indao thanglune.
50003016	Atiyeda anina hung tangnu thaak nung suiga khatle anina bachamnu zek nung suiga lungzo, atiga ani sung khat chun khat tozo.
50003017	Unao rwan, nani mi bingna mi katei rwan danga ating sui bazeiyo. Atiga anina nani khou pi mu thangnu ga danga sianu mi nun ding ga thei thang ngo.
50003018	Balangbe eina nani khou meithaanna katupka rin thang damnu danga, atun le eina nani khou mikthi taga rinnuwe, mi taswang khakna Christa om cross ting munanu nun toga lung ongme.
50003019	Banina tang dingnu riak ka baraannu, mutnu gaye, bani ri ga bani bonne khatle bani lwat ka kazaknu gaye khatle bani sung ga talei ram pot pi amme.
50003020	Balangbe ani khulung ga tambaan laye, habei gana ani ding kanthangnu Pukaraangba Jisu Christa ding anina taraan ga ngaak ongme.
50003021	Maanna pot bing ding Bathwei bi thangnu ngamnu ngam paan bina, ani om son damnu braan zanu pum ding lwat liannu Bapum danga pi gon swak thanglune.
50004001	Atibriakpina eina kadou lang taraan ga ngaak ongnu kriangnu unao rwan, aom karok khatle taswan luthop tonu kriangnu nani nun ga, Pukaraangba khou han tipka ong ngo.
50004002	Eina Euodia le Syntyche ding Pukaraangba khou sung khatcha toga ong lang kachui thang nge.
50004003	Bataknu potrit phun bachamnu baan, sacham lang bi ei le diga chwan to bachamnu mannu rwan, Clement ding le, bani meng ringnu chongdip pi am damnu, chwan to bachamnu mi katei ding paang thang lang eina nating hweinuwe.
50004004	Bakaan bathin nani Pukaraangba khou karoga ong ngo. Eina rin late, karowo.
50004005	Nani sung bazaangnu ga mi bing khou pi theiyo. Pukaraangba hung lang nai rwe.
50004006	Nani sung riangre mako atiyeda balang bing bi kalumnu khatle hweininu ga swankanu le bachamga Rikrwang khou nanina ni nwamnu bing ga pi theiyo.
50004007	Atiga theinu bina inkuga Rikrwang om dai bazaangnu gana nani sung ding Christa Jisu paan bina ngaaksian thang ding ngo.
50004008	Kakhamnu bi, unao rwan ga, bazenu bing, lemsanu bing, bataknu bing, bathiangnu bing khatle kriang thang zanu bing khatle kasanu toga chong impu thangnu bing, pa-aam aam ngaakle sa inkunu khatle swanka lang khopnu amme dabe, ha bing lang bi nani sung thang ngo.
50004009	Nani akhouna bachu damnu, lousu damnu, ngaisu damnu khatle mu damnu bing ga to thang ngo. Atiga dai bazaangnu Rikrwang na nani khou ong thanglune.
50004010	Atiyeda atun kakhamnu kaan bi nanina alaang banang thangnu ga pi kathan thangnu langna Pukaraangba khou ei taswang khak karowe. Nani nabe alaangna banang thang ngaak rwe atiyeda nani lang badou chanu phang dam make.
50004011	Haga eina baatnu riak pina rinnu make. Balangbe eiba alung gong bi paaam aam ngaakle ei pem rwe.
50004012	Ei baatka lung lang le, khopka lung lang le thei rwe. Bariak bathin khatle balang bing bi ei bon imbanu ngaakle chaamnu ngaakle balim balei amnu bi le, maaknu bi le tatoga lung langbo dinu ningting ga akhou am rwe.
50004013	Ating pi nat thangnu Christa paan bina pum brumza tonu ngamme.
50004014	Atiyeda ariangrek pi nanina badam suilou thangnu bi ga nani kasanu chwan to rwe.
50004015	Atun Philippi mi rwan nanina theiye dinuba, sacham kasam thou kama bi eina Mecedonia bina se swaknu kaan bi nani zana makka rupkathan khatchanale paang thangnu khatle sui pui thangnu lang bi ei le diga badam lou bacham mak ngaake.
50004016	Balangbe Thessalonica bi tangga nanina alaang bathaang amnu pot bing pi hung thang lat lat ngaake.
50004017	Atiyeda leithwan ding ga rakanga zongnuba make atiyeda nani lang bakraa toga chak thang dingnu ga eina rakanga zongnuwe.
50004018	Batak takka, ei pum brumza sipsaga lousu rwe, baatnu khatchale maak rwe. Nani khouna pi hungnu banamsanu, lou thang lang khopnu kat swaknu khatle Rikrwang na pem thangnu rikhaang pot ka Epaphroditus kut pina lousuluga alaang bathaang amnu bing ga bachangga am rwe.
50004019	Arikrwang na nani lang bathaang amnu bing ga Christa Jisu paan bina Balwat liannu bi amnu lan nung suiga pi thanglune.
50004020	Atun ani Rikrwang khatle ani Pa khou khwa seiga lwat liannu to ding ngo. Amen.
50004021	Christa Jisu khou bathiangnu mi bing ding kalum thang ngo. Ei le ong bachamnu unao rwanna nani ding kalumme.
50004022	Bathiangnu mi bingna atiyeda inkuga Caesar in inkhunna nani ding kalumme.
50004023	Ani Pukaraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriangna nani mi bing lu chung bi kalwang thangnu to ding ngo. Amen.
51001001	Rikrwang na baningnu nung suiga Jisu Christa om chonglang Paul khatle ani unao Timothy na
51001002	Colosse bi ongnu Christa khou bathiangnu khatle balumsanu unao rwan khou hiaknu: Ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu khouna nani khou phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu pi thangnu to ding ngo.
51001003	Anina nani lang chat makka kalum thangga, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa Pa Rikrwang ding swanne.
51001004	Balangbe Jisu Christa khou nani balumsat khatle bathiangnu mi bing lang nanina kriangnu cham ga anina ngaisu rwe.
51001005	Haga tambaan la nani lang am ongnu bachunnu paan bi naye. Haba bachunnu ga sacham om bazenu chong bi ga nanina kamaga ngaisu drwe.
51001006	Sacham ga nani khou hung rwe. Atiga talei ram bariak bathin bakraa kraa ga lian thou ongnu ga danga, nanina le Rikrwang om phaangkriang ding ngaisunu khatle bathiangga theinu lumik pi gana thouga nani khou le bakraa kraa ongme.
51001007	Haga ani nun chwanlaang to bachamnu, kriangnu Epaphras khouna le nanina thei rwe. Maan ga nani hut toga Christa om balumsa zanu chwanlaang tonu khate.
51001008	Katha paan bina nanina ani ding kriangnu ga maanna ani khou indao thang rwe.
51001009	Hei langna anina haga ngaisunu lumik pina thouga Maanna baningnu ningting bing khatle Katha lang bi theinu ga nani khou sipka am dam lang ani chat makka nani lang hweini ong ngaake.
51001010	Heiya nanina kasanu chwan bing bi bakraa kraaluga, Rikrwang ding theinu bi inku kaluga khatle balang bing bi Rikrwang ding pi pemluga Pukraangba lang zana khopsaga ring lang nge.
51001011	Karonu le bachamga sung sei inku lang khatle khaang thei lang Balwat liannu ngam nung suiga ngam bingna nani ding pi nat thang ding ngo.
51001012	Atiga babaan bi ga bathiangnu mi nun le diga rakhum lou bacham langna ani ding khopsanu pi to thangnu Pa ding swankawo.
51001013	Maanna ani ding kazingnu ngam bina kan thang rwe khatle Maanna kriangnu Sa Kapaisa krwang talei la kai takan swak thang rwe.
51001014	Bakhou ani Bathi paan bina, noh bing kok thangnu dinuba ran swak thangnu lousu rwe.
51001015	Maan heiya mikna mungam maknu Rikrwang thot gong nge khatle dam thang damnu bing lu chung bi amnu natainuwe.
51001016	Balangbe Bapaan bina tambaan la amnu khatle talei ram bi amnu, mikna munu, mikna mu maknu, krwang takung riak ngaakle, krwang talei ngaakle, bapuba rwan ngaakle mak tabe ngam ngaakle ha bing ding dam thang ngaak rwe. Pot bing ga Bapaan bina khatle Balaang zana dam thang rwe.
51001017	Maan pot bing ma kamaga am ong ngaake khatle Bakhou pot bingza bariak cha chaga am karung nge.
51001018	Maan pum om dinuba, rupkathan om baluwe. Atiga Maan thou kamanu, thinu nun lak pina natainuwe. Haga Maan pum brumza lak pi basaang kataknu to lang nge.
51001019	Balangbe Bakhou Rikrwang om sipsanu amnu ga Pa sung pemnuwe.
51001020	Baom cross pina tanu thi paan bina dai bazaangnu phun hung thangga, Bapaan bina talei ram bi ngaakle, tambaan la ngaakle, am ongnu pum brumza Maan le pi taman thang rwe.
51001021	Atiga bakaan khat pi naniba khak lang satnu toga khatle sa maknu chwan toga munanu mi nun to ong ngaake. Atiyeda atunba Maanna pi taman thang rwe.
51001022	Haga Bapum bahak thi thangnu paan bi naye. Haga nani ding Bamikphaang bi bathiangnu, koi maaknu khatle khan lang maaknu to lang nge,
51001023	batak takka nani balumsat pi ga han tipka khatle kaling makka ongluga, tambaan thwei bi amnu kutthiam bing lang sacham kasam damnu, Paul ating ha lang chungna chwanlaang mi pi to thangnu, nanina ngaisu damnu sacham om bachunnu bi ga kaling makka ong nge dabe heiya hung tanglune.
51001024	Atun eina nani lang chungna riangre kanang khaang beida ei karowe. Atiga Christa om riangre kanang bi kabaatnu ga rupkathan to ongnu Christa pum lang chungna apum bi pi bapung pha ongme.
51001025	Nani lang sa langna akhou pi thang damnu Rikrwang chwan nung suiga ating heiba rupkathan om chwanlaang mi pi to thang rwe. Haga Rikrwang chong ding eina bapung phaga kasam lang nge.
51001026	Haba chongkaang ga thou damnu bakaan inza khatle mikin inza lana inthim thang ongnu ding ga Baom bathiangnu mi nun khou atunba indao thangnu chong gaye.
51001027	Gentile rwan lak pi heiba inthim thangnu chong om khopsanu lwat lian ga intia lianbo dinu bathiangnu mi nun khou pi thei thang lang Rikrwang na ka thang thang rwe. Haba inthim thangnu ga lwat liannu bachun to ongnu Christa na nani khou ong thangnu gaye.
51001028	Anina mi bing ding Christa Jisu khou bachang sanu toga bachoi thang lang mi bing ding kachui thangga khatle ningting bing le suiga mi bing ding bachu thangga Christa lang bi kasam rwe.
51001029	Hei lang chungna akhou chwan to rakan ongnu Bangam nung suiga karam rakanga eina karam ongme.
51002001	Balangbe eina nani lang, Laodicea bi ongnu mi nun lang khatle aman mu mak aangnu bing lang riangre takka ongnu lang bi nanina theinu bathaiye.
51002002	Dinuba, kriang kalenu bi khatcha toluga sung bi kachui thang lang Pa khatle Christa om to ongnu, Rikrwang om inthim thangnu chong banina theiluga, theinu bing bina hungnu khopsanu lan bing ga banina lousu lang naye.
51002003	Christa khou Rikrwang na ningting khatle theinu lan bing ga inkam thang ongme.
51002004	Eina heiya nani ding tudannuna munthiam sanu chongna minamga bathemnu le zaye diga rinnuwe.
51002005	Balangbe ei apum toga ong mak ngaak peida, katha bi nani le ong bacham ongme atiga nani kasanu gong khatle Christa khou nani balumsat tipka han ongnu ding muluga ei karowe.
51002006	Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding lousu damnu danga nani Bapaan bina ring ngo.
51002007	Nani khou bachu thang damnu danga balemphu taluga, Bakhou bacha kaluga, balumsanu bi tipnu towo khatle swankanuna sipka ong ngo.
51002008	Christa chong nung sui makka, talei ram om ningting, bathaang maaknu minamnu, mi nun chaang, khatchale bathaang maaknu talei ram om chong bachuk paan bina nani ding pakhatchanale lampui kaimaan mak lang barak theiyo.
51002009	Balangbe Bakhou Rikrwang om sipsanu bing ga pum toga amme.
51002010	Atiga bapuba bing khatle ngam bing om balu tonu Bapaan bina nani bachang sanu to rwe.
51002011	Zanti pum om noh ga asatluga Bakhou nani mun rom rwe, haga misa kutna tonu mun romnu ga makka atiyeda Christa na tonu mun romnu gaye.
51002012	Baptize tobi nani Maan le ui bacham rwe. Atiga thinu nun lak pina pi ring thou thangnu Rikrwang chwan bi balumsanu paan bina nani ding Pukraangba le diga pi ring thou thang rwe.
51002013	Atiga naniba, nani om koi maan khatle mun rom mak briakpina thiga ongnu nani ding, nani koi maan bing ding kok thangluga Pukraangba le diga Maanna pi ring thou bacham thang rwe.
51002014	Ani ding munanu ani maitwang bi hiak thangluga amnu ani lei ga to mut sat rwe khatle ha ding ga cross pi hemdan thangluga haga ani khouna lou sat thang rwe.
51002015	Rikrwang na bapuba tonu bing khatle ngam choinu mi nun om ngam lou satluga, ha bing ding ga maanna ngamluga, mi nun khou cross paan bina indao thang rwe.
51002016	Atibriakpina pakhatchanale kasa kain lang bi mak tabe bangei bangui lang bi mak tabe tha than mak tabe Sabbath lang bi nani ding chong kasem mak ting ngo.
51002017	Ha bing ga hung dingnu om bakathaye. Atiyeda bataknuba Christa gaye.
51002018	Tambaan chonglang rwan ding kalumnu paan bina, mikna mu maknu pot bing bi basung thangnu, zanti pum om lungning bi bathaang maakka lian tonu bi karonu, bazek ka maknu bi talu tanu mi gana nani ding minamluga nani taswan ga lou mak tam ding ngo.
51002019	Maan gana Balu tonu le barui bazem maak rwe. Ren khatle katha rui bingna bathon thangluga, pi nat thangnu paan bina Balu tonu khou gana pum tamun ding Rikrwang khouna sing thounu ga le bachamga sing thou rwe.
51002020	Atibriakpina talei ram om bakung tonu seta ongnu chaang bi gana nani Christa le diga thi bachamme dabe, pa-aam toga nanina talei ram bi ongnu danga talei ram om chongren thwei bi ongnubo?
51002021	Chongren nun gabe, “Banaan mako, batem mako, choi mako.”
51002022	Ha bing ga mi nun om zathang khatle bachu thangnu bi hai thang briakpina hei bing nga sizinnu le bachamga braan lang lang swaknuwe.
51002023	Mi nunna bachanu ririak, bazek ka maknu bi talu tanu mi gana, pum ding rai basiatnu ha bing ga batak takka ningting om thot am ngaak peida zanti pumna bathainu bing ding thingnu ga khatchale bathaang maake.
51003001	Nanina Christa le diga ring thou bachamme dabe, basaang la amnu pot bing ding ga zong ngo. Habei Christa na Rikrwang kut inchang pek la badung ongme.
51003002	Basaang la amnu pot bing bi ga nani sung thang ngo, talei ram bi amnu bi nani sung thang mako.
51003003	Balangbe nani thi rwe khatle nani kum ga Christa le diga Rikrwang khou inkam thang rwe.
51003004	Ani ringnu riak to ongnu Christa ding indao thangnu kaan bi nani ding le Pukraangba le diga lwat liannu bi indao thanglune.
51003005	Atibriakpina talei ram bi nani pum naat bing ga, lungkoi lungmannu, bathiang maknu, boulaanu, kasianu to nwamnu khatle ri katha ding kalumnu toga chak thang ongnu dinuba raaamnu, hei bing nga thinuwe diga chak thang ngo.
51003006	Atibriakpina chong zei maknu mi nun lu chung bi Rikrwang balung pwan hunglune.
51003007	Nani nun heipai chwan bi lung ong ngaaknu kaan bi nani le habei ga se ong ngaake.
51003008	Atiyeda atunba balung pwannu, sung sounu, phaang batannu sung, rin basiatnu, nani mun bina chong ru kabianu bing ga bathan satro.
51003009	Nani khatna khat khou chong karwaknu kabia kale mako. Balangbe nani khouna mi lui ga bachwan le diga asat trwe.
51003010	Atiga theinu nung suiga Bating dam thangnu Rikrwang katha louluga pi kathan thang damnu Mi kathan ga nanina sin basoiyo.
51003011	Habei ga Greek rwan, Jihudi rwan, mun romnu, mun rom maknu, barbaros rwan, Scythia rwan, swak khatle rang tonu rwan dinu maake. Atiyeda Christa Maan ga pum brum zaye khatle pum brumza bi ongme.
51003012	Atibriakpina Rikrwang na kathang swak thangnu nun toga bathiangnu rwan khatle kriangnu nun ga, nani khou kriang theinu sung, sung sanu, bangiamtanu, sung bazaangnu khatle khaang theinu ha bing ga pon naat tanga sin basoiyo.
51003013	Khat na khat ting khaang thang kaleyo khat le khat kok thang kaleyo. Khat le khat pem maknu amme dabe Christa na nani ding kok thangnu ga danga nanina le atiga towo.
51003014	Atiyeda hei bing chung bi, pum brum ding sung chamnu bi bang karung thangnu kriangnu ga sin basoiyo.
51003015	Rikrwang om dai bazaangnu gana nani sung ding kai thang ding ngo. Ha langna nani ding pum khatcha to lang kou le kou thang rwe khatle nani swan le swanka dingnuwe.
51003016	Christa chongkaang ga nani sung bi sipsaga amnu to ding ngo. Kalum laana khatle swannu laana khatle katha laa le bachamga, ningting bing paan bina khatna khat ting bachu thangga, kachui thang kaleyo. Atiga swankanule bachamga nani sung kalan lana Pukraangba khou towo.
51003017	Nanina chongkaang bi ngaakle, chwan bi ngaakle balang bing bi Pukraangba Jisu meng bina towo khatle Bapaan bina Pa Rikrwang ding swanno.
51003018	Mei rwan ga, Pukraangba khou tonu zek swaknu danga nani basan rwan bahak thwei bi ong ngo.
51003019	Basan rwan ga, nani mei rwan ding kriang ngo, bani ding siaga to mako.
51003020	Naosen rwan ga, balang bing bi nani nu pa rwan chong zeiyo. Balangbe haga Pukraangba khou pem taknuwe.
51003021	Pa rwan, nani sa nao rwan ding bani sung pi inkhin mak langna bani ding balung pwan lang lao mako.
51003022	Swak rwan ga, mi nun ding pi pem langna mikphaang om chwan tonu makka sung bathiangga Rikrwang ding kachiga talei ram bi nani om bapuba rwan ding balang bingza bi rinnu zeiyo.
51003023	Pa-aam ngaakle nanina tonu bi ga mi nun khou tonu dan makka Pukraangba khou tonu danga sung khutka towo.
51003024	Pukraangba khouna taswan toga rakhum lousulune dinu nanina theiye. Balangbe naniba Pukraangba Christa ding chwanlaang tonu mi nunne.
51003025	Atiyeda tudannu kakoinu chwan tonu maan gana, maanna to damnu chwan nung suiga taswan phanglune khatle habei ga kathing aih tonu maake.
51004001	Bapuba rwan ga, tambaan la nani om Bapuba khat amme dinu theiga, nani swak rwan ding bazega khatle saga to thang ngo.
51004002	Sung khutka, chat makka kalumga, habei ga swankanu le bachamga barak theiga ong ngo.
51004003	Haga le bachamga Christa om inthim thangnu chong ga kasam langna Rikrwang na sacham inkhaan ga ani lang lat thang lang kalum thang ngo. Sacham langna ating le atun bang thang ongme.
51004004	Eina kabia dingnu zek ka bathiangga indao swaknu ngam lang kalum thang ngo.
51004005	Nani bakaan ga choi chuiga balumsa maknu mi nun meithaan bi ningtingga seyo.
51004006	Nanina mi bing khou tatoga chong katak tingbo dinu thei lang nani chongbiak laabiak ka bachi danga thumga phaangkriang le bachamga kabiawo.
51004007	Anina kriangnu unao, balumsa lang khopnu chwanlaang mi khatle Pukraangba khou chwanlaang to bachamnu Tychicus na aom cham bing nani khou rin thanglune.
51004008	Heiba om langna eina bating nani khou lang hungnuwe. Hagazo maanna nani lang bing ga theiluga nani sung ding kachui thang lang nge.
51004009	Nani lak pina le, nani mi to ongnu, balumsa lang khopnu kriangnu unao, Onesimus ting Tychicus le diga lang hung nge. Barweina ala ani khou swak ongnu lang bing bi nani khou pi thei thanglune.
51004010	Ei le diga qwan in bi ong bachamnu Aristarchus le Barnabas unao Mark na le nani ding kalumme (balang bi nanina chongtan kasem lousu rwe. Maan nani khou hung nge dabe bating loukhut thang ngo).
51004011	Justus tiga kounu Jisu na nani ding kalumme. Mun romnu bani zana ei le diga Rikrwang om Krwang talei lang chwan to bachamnu nunne. Bani ga ating pi lozaang sa thangnu mi nunne.
51004012	Nani lak pina le nani mi to ongnu, Christa chwanlaang tonu Epaphras na nani ding kalumme. Rikrwang na baningnu bi bachang saga khatle tipka hannu ngam lang maanna bakaan bathin rakanga hweini thang ongme.
51004013	Balangbe maanna nani lang Laodicea bi khatle Hierapolis pi ongnu mi bing lang banang thang ongme dinu lang bi eina sake rwe.
51004014	Anina kriangnu doctor Luke le Demas na nani ding kalumme.
51004015	Laodicea bi amnu unao rwan, Nymphas le bain bi amnu rupkathan ding kalum thang ngo.
51004016	Heiba chamthwanna nanina pa taangnu kaan bi Laodicea om rupkathan bi le pa lang pi thang ngo. Atiga Laodicea lana pi hungnu chamthwan ga nanina le pa thang ngo.
51004017	Archippus khou, “Nangna Pukraangba khouna lousu damnu chwandon ga to zok lang sung khutka to thang ngo” diga rin thang ngo.
51004018	Kalumnu heiya Paul akut bahakna hiaknuwe. Ating bang thang ongnuwa baningsu thang ngo. Phaangkriang nani khou amnu to ding ngo. Amen.
52001001	Paul, Silvanus khatle Timothy na, Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou ongnu Thessalonica rupkathan bi: ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
52001002	Anina hweini bi nani nun ding panga Rikrwang khou chat makka swan ongme.
52001003	Nani nun om balumsat chwan, kriangnu chwan khatle ani Rikrwang atiluga Pa mikphaang bi Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou nani om khaang theinu bachun bing lang ga anina chat makka baningsuwe.
52001004	Kriangnu unao rwan ga, nani ding Rikrwang na kathang swak thangnu ga theiye.
52001005	Balangbe ani om sacham ga nani khou chongkaangza hungnu make atiyeda ngam le suiga Katha Bathiangnu bi khatle bataknu bi hungnuwe. Balangbe nani nun lang chungna anina to ongnuwa ani tatonu mi nunbo dinu nanina theiye.
52001006	Nanina riangre kanang lak pi chong ga Katha Bathiangnu om karonu le bachamga, lousuluga, ani nung khatle Pukraangba nung suinu nun to rwe.
52001007	Hagana nani nun Macedonia bi khatle Achaia bi ongnu balumsanu mi bing khou bazei zanu to rwe.
52001008	Balangbe nani khouna Macedonia le Achaia za bi makka bariak bathin Pukraangba om chongkaang ga kazan swak trwe. Rikrwang khou nani balumsat ka kazan swak trwe, atiga anina katei kabia lat lang maak rwe.
52001009	Balangbe ani om lang bi dinuba, anina nani khou tatoga hungbo dinu lang bi bani bahakna indao rwe. Nanina tatoga ri katha kalum ong bina Rikrwang khou kanei hungluga ringga ongnu khatle bazenu Rikrwang ding chwanlaang tonu lang bi,
52001010	Basa Kapaisana tambaan lana ta dingnu, thi bina Maanna pi ring thou damnu khatle Rikrwang balung pwan bina ani ding kanthangnu Jisu ding ngaak ong lang nge.
52002001	Balangbe unao rwan ga, nanina theiye dinuba anina nani khou hungnuwa bathaam make.
52002002	Atiyeda ani nun meithaan Philippi bi mai sianu khatle rainu dou ngaake. Anina Rikrwang om sacham ga nani khou rin swak lang maitwangnu inza am ngaak peida Rikrwang khou ani sung raangnu amme.
52002003	Balangbe anina nani ding kachui thangnuwa kabaknu bina mak tabe bathiang maknu mak tabe minamnuna make.
52002004	Atiyeda Rikrwang na za thangga sacham ga ani khou sin thang rwe. Atibriakpina anina mi nun ding pi pemnu dan makka atiyeda ani sung ding tam ongnu Rikrwang ding pi pem langna anina kabianuwe.
52002005	Balangbe nanina theinu ga danga anina impha ni hakna rin thiyamnu chongna mak tabe antiamnuna nani khou anina tonu make dinu Rikrwang na sake rwe.
52002006	Ati mak tabe ani khou Christa om chonglang rwan to lang khopnu ngaak peida ani mi nun khouna mak tabe nani khouna mak tabe katei rwan khouna lwat liannu ding ga ani zongnu make.
52002007	Atiyeda ani banuna basa rwan bahak ting pi karo thangnu ga danga nani nun lak pi sung bazaangnu to rwe.
52002008	Anina nani ding heitia lang kriangga nani khou Rikrwang om sacham za makka ani kum hakna pi thang rwe. Balangbe naniya anina kriangnu nunne.
52002009	Balangbe unao rwan ga nanina ani chwan khatle ani riangre kanang ding baningsu thang rwe. Anina nani pakhatcha khou hakna potrit pi thang mak langna zingpha thamlai thei makka chwan toga nani khou sacham ma kasam thang rwe.
52002010	Balumsa damnu nani lak pi anina ririak sega, bazega khatle koi maakka se ongbo dinu nanina le Rikrwang na le sake rwe.
52002011	Nanina theinu ga danga anina nani ding kachui thangga khatle pi karo thangga, nani pakhat khat ting bapana basa rwan ding phaang thangnu danga phaang thang rwe.
52002012	Rikrwang na Baom krwang talei khatle lwat liannu bi kou thangnu nung suiga, nani nun khopsanu nun toga se lang naye.
52002013	Ha langna anina Rikrwang ding chat makka swankaye. Balangbe nanina ani khou Rikrwang chong ga ngaisuluga lousu damnu kaan bi haga nanina mi nun om chong dan makka, bazenu Rikrwang chong nge diga karoga lou thang rwe. Hagana balumsanu nani khou rakanga chwan to rwe.
52002014	Balangbe unao rwan ga, nani Judea bi amnu Rikrwang om rupkathan nun om thot lounu mi nun to rwe. Balangbe Jihudi rwan khouna bani riangre kanang khaang damnu ga danga, nani nun le nani talei mi nun khouna haba riangre khaang rwe.
52002015	Banina Pukraangba Jisu Christa khatle bani om thiamting rwan ding athat sat rwe khatle ani ding le rai rwe. Atiga Rikrwang ding le pi pemlan rwe atiluga mi nun ding to kabat kabaang thang rwe.
52002016	Gentile rwan ding kan thang lang chong kabianu ani ding banina khaamme. Hagana bani noh ga bakaan bathin inku thou rwe. Atiyeda Rikrwang om balung pwan ga bani chung bi inku kiatka hung rwe.
52002017	Atiyeda unao rwan ga, anina ani sung bi kapaang maklena, ani pum bi nani le diga bakaan kasemza kapaang kale biya anina nani man mu lat nong lang rakanga karam ngaake.
