52002018	Atibriakpina Paul ei le diga anina nani khou hung lang karam lat lat ngaake. Atiyeda Seitaan na ani ding to tan ngaake.
52002019	Ati dabe Pukraangba Jisu Christa na hungnu kaan bi ani om bachun mak tabe karonu mak tabe karonu luthop ka pa-aambo?
52002020	Balangbe nani nun ga ani om lwat liannu khatle karonu gaye.
52003001	Atibriakpina eina khaang ngam mak hungnu kaan bi Athens pi araanto ong damnuna sa rwe diga anina baning rwe.
52003002	Christa om sacham bi chwanto bachamnu, Rikrwang om chwantok mi ani unao Timothy ding nani balumsat pi nani ding pi tip thang lang khatle kachui thang lang lang hung rwe.
52003003	Heiba riangre kanang ngana pakhatcha ding hakna to kaling mak tam lang hei langna ani ding chwan hap thangnu rwe dinu nani bahakna theiye.
52003004	Balangbe ani riangre kanang khaang lang rwe diga ani nani le diga ong bacham ongnu kaan bi rin chaak thang ngaaknu ga danga batak takka hung tang rwe dinu nanina theiye.
52003005	Atibriakpina eina khaang ngam mak hungnu kaan bi eina nani khou Timothy ding nani balumsat ka thei lang lang hungnuwe. Balangbe nani ding bathemnu gana bathemnu le zaye khatle ani om chwan ga bathaang maaknu le zaye diga baning briakpi naye.
52003006	Atiyeda atun Timothy nani khouna ani khou hung tang lat rwe. Maanna nani nun balumsat khatle kriangnu kasanu cham ga phun hung rwe. Nanina ani ding chat makka baningsu thang ongnu, ani ding mu nwam takka ongnu cham ga thei rwe.
52003007	Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, nani lang bi, ani riangrek khatle nangnu bing bi nani balumsat kana ani ding sum thang rwe.
52003008	Balangbe nanina Pukraangba khou han tipka ong nge dabe, atun ani ringlune.
52003009	Balangbe ani Rikrwang meithaan bi nani lang bina lozaang sa ongnu karok bing lang ga Rikrwang khou ani saruk swankanu intoga anina indao tang ngam ding gabo!
52003010	Anina nani man mu nwamga khatle nani balumsat pi lian thou langna, zingpha thamlai thei makka hweini rakanga hweini ongme.
52003011	Ani Pa Rikrwang Maanna khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa na ani ding nani khou lang hung thang ding ngo.
52003012	Anina nani khou tonu danga Pukraangba na nani lak pi khatna khat ting kriangnu inku thou lang pi thang ding ngo.
52003013	Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa na Baom bathiangnu mi rwan le diga hungnu kaan bi ani Pa Rikrwang meithaan bi nani sung koi maakka bathiangnu to lang Maanna nani ding pi nat thanglune.
52004001	Kakhamnu bi unao rwan ga, nani ani khouna lousu damnu ga danga into se langbo, intoga Rikrwang ding pi pem langbo dinu lang bi inku thou lang Pukraangba Jisu khou anina nani ding bathemga kachui thang nge.
52004002	Balangbe anina nani khou Pukraangba Jisu paan bina paaam zathang pi thangbo dinu nanina theiye.
52004003	Balangbe nani ding to bathiang thangnu heiya Rikrwang na baningnuwe dinuba nani nun lungkoi lungmaannu to mak ting gaye.
52004004	Dinuba nani mi bingza bamei le diga tatoga bathiangga khatle takungga lung dingbo dinu thei lang nge.
52004005	Rikrwang ding thei maknu Gentile rwan danga boulaanu mi nun to mak ting gaye.
52004006	Dinuba pakhatchanale hei lang bi baunao ding minamluga balaangza zong mak ting gaye. Anina nani khou kamaga rin thang rwe khatle sake pi drwe. Hadanga Pukraangba heiya heipai bing ding takhum baannu Pa ye.
52004007	Balangbe Rikrwang na ani ding tanaat lang kou thangnu make atiyeda bathiangnu to lang kou thang rwe.
52004008	Atibriakpina tudannu hei ding nga za maknu maan ga mi ding za maknu make; atiyeda Baom Katha Bathiangnu ani lang pi thangnu Rikrwang ding za maknuwe.
52004009	Atiyeda naniba unao rwan khat le khat kriang kalenu lang bi eina nani khou hiak lang balang maak rwe. Balangbe nani khat le khat kriang kale lang Rikrwang na nani ding bachu thang rwe.
52004010	Batakka nanina Macedonia taram bing bi ongnu unao rwan bing ding atiga to rwe. Atiyeda nanina haga inku inkuga to lang anina nani ding kachui thangnu rwe.
52004011	Anina nani khou zathang pi thangnu danga nani thiap thiapka ong lang nani thou ga to chui lang khatle nani kutna chwan to lang karammo.
52004012	Langkaang la ongnu mi nun meithaan bi sung bathiangga ong lang nge khatle nani lang khatchale baatnu maak lang nge.
52004013	Atiyeda unao rwan ga, thi damnu nun om lang bi nanina thei maknu eina bathai make, dinuba bachunnu maaknu nun danga nani sung riangrenu ei bathai make.
52004014	Balangbe Jisu Christa thiluga ring thou lat trwe dinu anina balumsaye dabe, haga danga Jisu khou thi damnu mi nun ding Maan le bachamga Rikrwang na kalwang hung lune.
52004015	Balangbe heiya anina nani khou Rikrwang chong paan bina rinuwe dinuba Pukraangba hungnu tangga ringga ongnu khatle am ongnu anina thi damnu nun ma khatchatle se kamalaye.
52004016	Balangbe Pukraangba Maan Bahak tambaan lana tambaan chonglang rwan khwan le Rikrwang om trumpet baraam le bachamga talune. Atiga Christa khou thi damnu rwan gana ring thou kamalune.
52004017	Haba nung bi ring ga ongnu ani nun ding bani nun le diga tambu bi phunkaluga, basaang la Pukraangba ding ka kadoulune. Atiga ani nun Pukraangba le diga bakaan khwa seiga ong bachamlune.
52004018	Atibriakpina heiba chong ngana nani nun khat le khat bathem thang kalega ong ngo.
52005001	Atiyeda unao rwan ga, bakaan khatle bapha lang bi eina nani khou hiak lang bathaang maake.
52005002	Balangbe Pukraangba lumik ka in baruk mina zingpha hungnu ga danga hunglune dinu nanina bathiangga thei rwe.
52005003	Balangbe banina “Dai bazaang rwe khatle kakham kanam maak rwe” diga rinnu dat pi kamaisana nao lung lang nainu kaan bi riangrenu danga thei mak daakka to braannu ga bani lu chung bi hunglune khatle bani habei gana dwakla rwe.
52005004	Atiyeda unao rwan ga, naniba zingnu bi ong lan rwe. Haba Lumik ka inbruk mi danga nani lu chung bi hungla rwe.
52005005	Naniba kabaannu khatle thamlai sa rwan zung rwe. Ani zingpha mak tabe zingnu om lan rwe.
52005006	Atibriakpina ani katei rwan danga inthi ong makcho. Atiyeda ani barak theiga khatle ningting ga ongzo.
52005007	Balangbe innu nunna zingpha innuwe khatle zu kalonu nun gana zingpha kalonuwe.
52005008	Atiyeda aniba thamlai mi nun briakpina ani balumsat khatle kriangnu kachaang thop khatle ringriak om bachunnu ga kraan luthop toga thopluga ningtingga ongrizo.
52005009	Balangbe Rikrwang na ani ding balung pwan dou lang makka, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bina ringriak lousu lang ka thang thang rwe.
52005010	Balangbe anina insaang thounu ngaakle in ongnu ngaakle ani le diga lung bacham langna Maan thi ngaak rwe.
52005011	Atibriakpina nanina le to ongnu ga danga nani khatna khat ting pi lozaang sa kaleyo khatle bacha thou kaleyo.
52005012	Unao rwan ga, nanina nani nun lak pi chwan to ongnu khatle Pukraangba khou nani lu chung bi ong ongnu nani ding bachu thang ongnu nun ding takung tazeiyo diga rinnuwe.
52005013	Bani om chwan lang gana bani ding inkuga takhwang to lang anina nani ding kalumme. Nani lak pi dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
52005014	Unao rwan ga, atun anina nani ding bachu thangnuwe, takaatnu nun ding ga laak thang ngo, katha bi sonnu nun ding ga kachui thang ngo, kasonnu ding ga kai thou thang ngo khatle bani mi bing le diga khaang bachammo.
52005015	Pakhatchanale kasianu tonu langna kasianu to baan mak lang towo. Atiyeda khatna khat lang atiluga khangsung lang kasanu to lang bakaan bathin zong ngo.
52005016	Bakaan thin karowo.
52005017	Chat makka hweiniyo.
52005018	Balang bing bi swankawo, balangbe haga Christa Jisu khou nani lang Rikrwang na bathainuwe.
52005019	Katha Bathiangnu ding khaam mako.
52005020	Ri chong rin swaknu ding balaa mako.
52005021	Pot bing ding ga tamphaang ngo, kasanu ga choitipo.
52005022	Kasianu thot bing ga bathan sato.
52005023	Atun dai bazaangnu Rikrwang na nani ding balang bing bi to bathiang thang ding ngo. Bani katha, ringnu khatle pum ding Pukraangba Jisu Christa na hungnu ga tangga, koi maan maak lang Maanna to bathiang thang ding ngo.
52005024	Nani ding kou thangnu Maan ga balumsa lang khopnuwe. Maanna haga nani lang to le to thanglune.
52005025	Unao rwan ga, ani lang hweini thang ngo.
52005026	Bathiangga kaputnu le bachamga unao rwan bing ding kalum thang ngo.
52005027	Chongdip heiya bathiangnu unao rwan bing khou pa indao thang lang eina Pukraangba meng bi sin thangnuwe.
52005028	Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang ga nani khou amnu to ding ngo. Amen.
53001001	Paul, Silvanus khatle Timothy na Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khou ongnu Thessalonica rupkathan khou,
53001002	ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou am ding ngo.
53001003	Unao rwan, anina nani lang bi Rikrwang ding bakaan bathin swankaye, haga anina to dingnu zek bahak rwe, balangbe nani balumsat taswang khak sing thou ongme khatle nani mi bing khatna khat ting kriangnu le inku thou rwe.
53001004	Atibriakpina nani ding rai ongnu khatle nanina khaang ongnu riangre kanangnu bing lak pi nani om khaang seinu khatle balumsanu langna Rikrwang om rupkathan bing bi nani lang bi ani lian to rwe.
53001005	Hei bing ngana, Rikrwang om ririak senu chongsem ma bazenuwe dinu indao rwe. Nani ding Rikrwang om krwang talei langna khopsanu mi nun toga chak thang lang nge. Balangbe ha langna nani le riangre khaang ongnuwe.
53001006	Nani ding to riangre ongnu mi nun ding ga Rikrwang na riangre kanangnu piga takhum baannu bazenuwe.
53001007	Pukraangba Jisu ding Baom ngam liannu tambaan chonglang rwan le diga tambaan lana indao thangnu kaan bi riangre kanang khaang ongnu nani nun ding ani le diga Rikrwang na lo pi basak thangnu bi Rikrwang ga bazenuwe.
53001008	Rikrwang na Bating thei maknu nun ding khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om sacham ding lou thang maknu mi nun ding meina takhum baanlune.
53001009	Bani ding Pukraangba khatle Baom lwat liannu ngam meithaan bina laak thangga khwa sei lang to braan satlune,
53001010	heiya Baom bathiangnu mi nun lak pi lwat liannu to lang khatle Bating balumsanu mi bing lak pi Bating bathai lang haba lumik pi Pukraangba na hungnu kaan bi haga pi hung tang thanglune. Balangbe ani om sake ga nanina balumsa rwe.
53001011	Atibriakpina nani ding kou thangnu om khopsanu ga ani Rikrwang na chak thang lang khatle kasanu bathainu bing khatle balumsanu chwan bing ngam le suiga pi hung tang thang lang anina le nani lang bakaan bathinza bi hweini ongme.
53001012	Haga ani Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang nung suiga nani khou ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng ding khatle Bakhou nani ding lwat pi lian thang lang nge.
53002001	Unao rwan ga, Pukraangba Jisu Christa na hung dingnu khatle ani nun Bakhou hung karung dingnu lang bi anina nani khou hweinuwe,
53002002	dinuba katha na ngaakle, chongkaang na ngaakle ani khouna bathwan hungnu chamthwan danga pi hungnuna ngaakle, Christa lumik ka hungna rwe diga rinnu gana, nani sung ding to kanuknu khatle to riangrenu to mak lang nge.
53002003	Nani ding pakhatchanale pa-aam aamna ngaakle minamnu to mak ting ngo. Balangbe balumsanu bathan satnu ga kamaga hung mak basaan khatle to braannu sa kapaisa dinuba chongtan thouto maknu mi ding ga indao thang mak basaan haba lumik ka hung tanglaye.
53002004	Maanna Rikrwang nge diga kounu mak tabe kalum dingnuwe dinu bing ding maitwanglune khatle haba lu chung bi baraanto bating phun basaanglune. Maanna Rikrwang kalum in bi Rikrwang danga badungluga maan Rikrwang nge diga pi mulune.
53002005	Eina nani le diga ong bachamnu kaan bi hei bing lang bi nani khou rin thang damnu ga baningsu makpo?
53002006	Atun Baom bakaan bi indao thang dingnu ding khaam thang ongnu ga tubo dinu nanina theiye.
53002007	Balangbe chongtan thouto maknu om inthim thangnu gana atun bachwan to ong rwe. Atiyeda atun khaam thang ongnu bating ga lou thou dam mak basaan maanna khaam thang onglune.
53002008	Haba nung bi chongtan thouto maknu bating indao thanglune khatle Pukraangba mun bina swaknu kaphuk kana bating athat satlune khatle Pukraangba hungnu babaan gana bating to braan satlune.
53002009	Chongtan thouto maknu maan hungnu ga Seitaan om chwan nung sui gaye. Haga baom ngam bing, badannu chwan bing khatle katap tonu tasiatnu chwan bing le hunglune.
53002010	Braan dam dingnu mi nun ding minamnu baze maknu bing ga le bachamga hunglune. Balangbe bani ding kanthangnu lousu lang bazenu kriang ding ga lou thang make.
53002011	Atibriakpina banina kakoinu ding ga balumsa dam lang rakanga minamnu ngam ding ga Rikrwang na lang thanglune.
53002012	Bazenu ding ga balumsa maknu bing ding khatle ririak se maknu bi pemnu nun ding pi koi thang lang nge.
53002013	Atiyeda Pukraangba na kriangnu unao rwan ga, nani langna bakaan bathin Rikrwang ding swan dingnu zek swake. Balangbe Katha na nani ding to bathiangnu paan bina khatle bazenu ding ga balumsanu paan bina, ringriak ka lousu lang Rikrwang na thoutan bina nani ding ka thang rwe.
53002014	Ha langna ani sacham paan bina nani ding Maanna kou thang rwe. Haga nanina Pukraangba Jisu Christa lwat liannu ga lousu dam lang nge.
53002015	Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, han tipka ong ngo. Nani ding chongkaangna ngaakle, ani chamthwanna ngaakle nani khou bachu thangnu chaang ga choitipka choiyo.
53002016	Atun ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa Maan Bahakna khatle ani Pa Rikrwang, ani ding kriang thang ongnu khatle chat makka kachui thangnu khatle phaangkriang paan bina kasanu bachun pi thangnu gana
53002017	nani sung pi lum thang ding ngo khatle kasanu chongkaang khatle chwandon bingna nani ding kachui thang ding ngo.
53003001	Kakham katak pi, unao rwan ga, nani khou amnu danga Pukraangba chong ga barapka kazan swakluga lwat pi lian langna ani lang kalum thang ngo.
53003002	Ani ding bagong cha maknu khatle sa maknu mi nun khouna kan thang lang kalum thang ngo, balangbe balumsat ka mi bing khou amnu make.
53003003	Atiyeda nani ding pi nat thang lang khatle kasianu khouna nani ding ngaak sian thang lang Pukraangba gabe balumsa zanuwe.
53003004	Anina zathang pi thang damnu ga nanina towe khatle toga onglune diga anina nani lang bi Pukraangba khou balumsanu amme.
53003005	Atun Rikrwang om kriangnu bi khatle Christa om sung seinu bi ga Pukraangba na nani sung ding kai thang ding ngo.
53003006	Unao rwan ga, anina nani ding Pukraangba Jisu Christa meng bi zathang piye, dinuba: Bagong ta maknu khatle nanina ani khouna lousu damnu bachu thangnu chaang nung suiga lung maknu bing ga bathan sato.
53003007	Balangbe nanina ani thot ting intoga bazei langbo dinu nanina theiye. Balangbe ani nun nani lak pi takaatnu to make.
53003008	Mak tabe mi khat om thaisaak anina bathaam sa innu maake atiyeda nani pakhatcha ding hakna to riangre mak lang anina zingpha thamlai thei makka chwan rakanga towe.
53003009	Haga ani nani om paang thangnu lounu zek maak briakpina make. Atiyeda nanina ani ding tatoga sui bazei langbo dinu anina nani khou pi mu lang naye.
53003010	Balangbe ani nani le diga ong bachamnu kaan bi anina heiba zathang nga nani khou pi thang damnu rwe, “Tudannu pakhatna chwan to takaate dabe sa le sa mak tam ding ngo.”
53003011	Balangbe nani lak pi tudannu mi kasem batun cha maknu khatle chwan khatchale to makka atiyeda chwan katopnu katap tonu mi nun kasem amme dinu anina ngaisuwe.
53003012	Atun heiba mi nunna, banina chwan to thiap thiapluga, bani baom baom thaisaak sa lang Pukraangba Jisu Christa paan bina anina zathang piye khatle kachui thang nge.
53003013	Atiyeda unao rwan ga, nani nun kasanu chwan to bi riangrenu to mako.
53003014	Tudannu ani om chamthwan bi amnu ani chong bachuk zei maknu towe dabe, bating ga bapu theiyo atiluga bating pi kazak langna nani bating bacham mako.
53003015	Ati ngaaklena bating nanina munanu khat ting danga chak thang mako atiyeda unao ding danga bachu thang ngo.
53003016	Atunba dai bazaangnu Pukraangba bahakna nani nun khou bakaan bathin balang bingza bi dai bazaangnu pi thangnu to ding ngo. Pukraangba na nani mi bing le ong bacham thang ding ngo.
53003017	Kalumnu heiya Paul akut bahakna hiaknuwe. Hei dannu gong bi chamthwan bing bi eina badannu toga hiake.
53003018	Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang gana nani khangsung khou ong bacham thangnu to ding ngo. Amen.
54001001	Ani ding Kanthangnupa Rikrwang khatle ani bachun to ongnu Pukraangba Jisu Christa om zathang nung suiga, Jisu Christa om chonglang Paul eina,
54001002	balumsanu bi bataknu sa kapaisa Timothy khou ani Pa Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang, kriang thang theinu khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
54001003	Banina zekrin katei bachu thang mak lang nangna bani ding bachu thang lang eina Macedonia la se damnu kaan bi nang Ephesus pi ong lang rakanga rin damnu danga,
54001004	pwaknu meiri khatle loinu nai maknu pu pa rui bi sung thang mak lang bani khou chongtan pi thang ngo. Hagana balumsat pi Rikrwang khou lian thounu hut kae kanaanu pi swake.
54001005	Atun heiba zathang pi thangnu lang bi bathiangnu sung lana, kakoi baze theinu sung lana khatle bataknu balumsat pina swaknu kriangnu gaye.
54001006	Hei bing bina mi kasemba lampui maanluga takaatnu meiri la kanei drwe.
54001007	Banina rin ong nu ga pa-aambo khatle bani balumsat ka pa-aambo dinu bakaba thei mak peida, bani chongtan bachuthangnu mi nun tonu bathaiye.
54001008	Atiyeda tupai pakhatna bazega sizinne dabe chongtan ga sanuwe dinu anina theiye.
54001009	Heiya theiye dinuba, chongtan ga ririak senu mi lang bacha thangnu make atiyeda haga chongtan thouto makka ringnu mi nun, rwan thwei ong takaatnu mi nun, Rikrwang ding kachi maknu mi nun, noh mi nun khatle bathiang maknu mi nun, imphom tanaatnu mi nun, banu bapa ding athatnu mi nun, mi athatnu nun,
54001010	lungkoi lungmaannu nun, kapaisa cham khatle kamaisa cham lungnu nun, mi nam mi kainu nun, mun theinu nun, chong karwaknu chongren tonu nun khatle bazenu zekrin maitwang bi hannu ha bing lang nge.
54001011	Bazenu zekrin ga akhou sin thang damnu aih sanu Rikrwang om sacham nung sui gaye.
54001012	Ating pi nat thang ongnu ani Pukraangba Christa Jisu ding ei swankaye. Balangbe chwanlaang to lang Maanna ating kathang swak thangga, balumsa lang khopnu mi toga chak thang rwe.
54001013	Ei bakaan khat pi rin basiatnu mi, rainu mi khatle bathot sianu mi khat to ngaak peida, eina thei makka khatle balumsa makka to briakpina akhou phaangkriang ga pi thang rwe.
54001014	Ani Pukraangba phaangkriang gabe Jisu Christa khou amnu balumsat khatle kriangnu le bachamga khopsaga amme.
54001015	Jisu Christa talei ram noh mi nun ding kan thang lang hung rwe dinu chong nga balumsa lang khopnu khatle lou thang lang khopnuwe, atiga noh mi nun khon bina eina sia kataknuwe.
54001016	Ati ngaaklena, khwa sei ringnu ga lousu langna kanung Bating balumsa dingnu mi nun khou rin bachaknu toga, Jisu Christa na Baom loinu nai maknu khaang seinu ga, noh mi nun khon bina sia kataknu akhou pi mu thang lang eina phaangkriang ga lousu rwe.
54001017	Atun khwa sei ringnu Krwang, thi latlanu, mikna mu maknu, Baraantoza ningtingnu Rikrwang khou takhwang khatle khwa sei lwat liannu to ding ngo. Amen.
54001018	Sa kapaisa Timothy, thou damnu bakaan bi nalang bi indao thang damnu chong nung suiga, chongtan ga eina nakhou sin thang nge. Indao thang damnu chong heiyana nangna kasanu kraan katwaknu toga katwak lang nge.
54001019	Ha lang chungna balumsanu khatle kasanu lungning am ding gaye. Mi kasemna hei ding nga bathan sat rwe khatle bani om balumsanu lang bi li baknu danga bak trwe.
54001020	Rin basiat mak lang bachu lang Seitaan khou eina pi swak tamnu Hymenaeus khatle Alexander heiya bani nun lak pi le sui ngaake.
54002001	Atibriakpina kama katak pi mi bingza lang Rikrwang khou kalumga, hweiniga, katei lang hweini thangga khatle swan lang eina kachui thang nge.
54002002	Rikrwang ding baningga khatle sung bathiangga, ani nun dai bazaangga khatle chongsok saga lung lang krwang nun khatle ngam choinu mi bing lang hweini thang ngo.
54002003	Balangbe heiya ani ding Kanthangnupa Rikrwang mikphaang bi kasanu khatle lou thang lang khopnu gaye.
54002004	Mi bing zana kanthangnu lousunu khatle bazenu ding theinu ga Maanna bathainuwe.
54002005	Balangbe Rikrwang khat amme khatle Rikrwang le mi nun lak pi Tabat pakhat amme, Maan Misa tonu Christa Jisu we.
54002006	Maan mi nun ding kan thang lang bathan swaknu man toga Bapum ding pi swak ngaak rwe. Atiga Baom sake ga kachanu kaan bi pi thang lang nge.
54002007	Ha langna ating sacham kasamnu mi, chonglang (Ei Christa khou bazenu kabia ongnuwe ei chong karwaknu make), balumsanu khatle bazenu lang bi Gentile rwan khou bachuthangnupa toga ating kathang thang ngaak rwe.
54002008	Atibriakpina bariak bathin kapaisa rwanna bathiangnu kut kai thouluga balung pwannu khatle balumsianu to makka kalumnu eina bathaiye.
54002009	Hadanga kamaisa rwanna le phaang lemnu sin basoi, phaangsaga khatle lungning amga sin basoinu ei bathaiye. Sam phannuna mak tabe kachaak, baman kungnu lung mak tabe baman kung taknu potna tapon to makka,
54002010	atiyeda Rikrwang ding kachinu kamaisa rwanne diga rinnu rwan lang hoinu kasanu chwan gana tapon towo.
54002011	Kamaisana bangiamtanu le bachamga thiap thiapka bachu dam ding ngo.
54002012	Kamaisa khatna kapaisa ding bachu thangnu mak tabe kapaisa lu chung bi ngam choinu ei za make atiyeda maan thiap thiap ong ding ngo.
54002013	Balangbe Adam ding dam kama ngaake, haba nung bi Eve ting nge.
54002014	Adam ding minamnu make atiyeda kamaisa ding minamnuwe, atiga maan koi maan bi ta thang rwe.
54002015	Atiyeda banina balumsanu bi, kriangnu bi, bathiangnu bi khatle chat makka bazan ding raak ong nge dabe, nao amnu dat pi kan thanglune.
54003001	Rin ongnu heiya balumsa lang khopnuwe dinuba, mi pakhatna phaangsin thangnu mi chwan to lang bathainu ga maan kasanu chwan ding bathainuwe.
54003002	Phaangsin thangnu maan ga koi maaknu, kamaisa khat om basan tonu, sung bazaangnu, bazan ding raak theinu, takhwang man phunnu, pi sa pi in theinu, bachu thang ngamnu,
54003003	zu in maknu, kabit kamai maknu, sian ra-aam maknu atiyeda sung bazaangnu, kae kanaa maknu, antiam maknu,
54003004	maanna bain inkhun ding phun chuiga basa rwan ding takung tazeinu bing le bachamga pi talu ta ding gaye.
54003005	Balangbe mi khatna bain inkhun ga tatoga phun dingbo dinu thei make dabe, maan tatoga Rikrwang om rupkathan ding phunnu ngam dingbo?
54003006	Haga sung le hungnu mi kathanna phun mak ting ngo. Mak tabe maan balian to thouluga Diabol danga, braannu bi ta thangnu le zaye.
54003007	Haza makka, bating rupkathan paan la mi nun lak pi le rinswannu mi to lang nge. Haga bating rin basiatnu to mak lang khatle maan Diabol phaa bi man mak lang nge.
54003008	Hadanga deacon rwan le takungnu thot phunnu, balei kani phun maknu, zu in maknu, sian ra-aam maknu,
54003009	bathiangnu sung le bachamga balumsat om inthim chong ga choitipnu mi to ding gaye.
54003010	Atiyeda bani ding ga le tamphaang kama ding gaye. Bani ding khan lang maake dabe, banina deacon toga chwanlaang to ding ngo.
54003011	Hadanga bani mei rwan le takungnu thot phunnu, rwan ding sia lang rin maknu, sung bazaangnu khatle balang bing bi balumsa lang khopnu to ding ngo.
54003012	Deacon rwanna le mei khat basan tonu, basa rwan khatle bain inkhun ding phun chuinu to ding ngo.
54003013	Balangbe deacon toga chwanlaang to chuinu bani ga kasanu pham khatle Christa Jisu khou amnu balumsat lang bi bani sung raangnu ga lousu rwe.
54003014	Ei nani khou hung nong lang baning ong beida hei bing nga eina nani khou hiak hungnuwe.
54003015	Atiyeda eina hungreiye dabe, Rikrwang in bi dinuba, ringnu Rikrwang om rupkathan, bazenu om inteng khatle bakung tonu ket pan bi ga nanina tatoga se dingbo dinu nanina thei lang eina heiba chong bing nga nani khou hiaknuwe.
54003016	Zet lang maaknu ririak senu om inthim chong ga tasiatnuwe: Rikrwang ding zanti pum bi indao thang rwe, Katha na ririak senu diga indao thang rwe, Tambaan chonglang rwanna mu rwe, Gentile rwan khou kasam thang rwe, Talei ram bi balumsa rwe, Lwat liannu le bachamga Bating lou thou drwe.”
54004001	Katha gana bathiangga rin thang rwe dinuba, kakhamnu kaan bi minamnu katha nun khatle ri kasia nun om zekrin ding mi kasemna bazeiluga balumsat ka bathan satlune.
54004002	Banina bani kakoi baze theinu sung ding kasanu thinna bachaan indehnu danga pi indehluga, sathot toga chong karwaknu kabiaye.
54004003	Banina mei kou kalaaknu ding khaamme, balumsa damnu khatle bazenu ding theinu mi nunna swankanu le bachamga sa dingnu, Rikrwang na dam thangnu thaisaak ting sa mak lang banina zathang piye.
54004004	Rikrwang na dam thangnu pot bing ga kasanu karwake, haga swankanu le bachamga saye dabe, za mak lang khatchale maake.
54004005	Balangbe haga Rikrwang om chongkaang khatle kalumnu paan bina to bathiang thang rwe.
54004006	Nangna hei bing lang bi unao rwan bing khou bachu thang nge dabe balumsanu chongna khatle nangna cheksinga bazei damnu bazenu zekrinna pi sing thou thangnu Jisu Christa om kasanu chwanlaang tolune.
54004007	Atiyeda bathaang maaknu khatle pwaknu katampi rwan meiri ding lou mako, Rikrwang ding kachinu lang bi nang talen ong ngo.
54004008	Balangbe pumna talennu ga titcha kanaaye atiyeda Rikrwang ding kachinuna balang bing bi kanaanuwe. Balangbe atun ring ongnu kum khatle hung dingnu kum om chongren ga habei amme.
54004009	Rin ongnu chong nga balumsa lang khopnu khatle khangsungna lou thang lang zanuwe.
54004010	Balangbe anina hei langna chwan to rwe khatle rin basiatnu le khaang rwe, balangbe mi bing ding Kanthangnupa, bakung toga balumsanu mi bing ding kanthangnu ringnu Rikrwang khou ani balumsaye.
54004011	Hei bing nga zathang piga bachu thang ngo.
54004012	Nating naosenne diga pakhatchanale balaanu to mak ting ngo atiyeda balumsanu mi nun lak pi nachong biak pi, lamchat pi, kriangnu bi, katha bi, balumsanu bi khatle bathiangnu bi nating bazei zanu pi towo.
54004013	Eina hung lat mak basaan bathiangnu chong panu bi, bani ding kachui thangnu bi khatle bachu thangnu bi nang sung khuto.
54004014	Chwan phunnu rwanna nalu chung bi kut kaising thangluga indao thangnu paan bina nakhou pi thangnu, nakhou amnu leithwan ding ga nang intaamnu to mako.
54004015	Hei bing lang bi kakhan chuiyo. Naom chwan ga mi bing khou sing thounu pi mu lang hei bing bi nasung khut thang ngo.
54004016	Nakum khatle naom bachu thangnu ga cheksinno. Habei ga khaang theiyo, balangbe atiga tonu gana nang nating bahak khatle nachong ngai ongnu mi nun ding kan thang lang nge.
54005001	Patso rwan ding twei mako atiyeda bating napa ding danga kachui thang ngo khatle nama naosennu kapaisa dingna nanao ding danga,
54005002	nama patsonu kamaisa rwan ding nanu ding danga khatle nama naosennu kamaisa ding nasannu ding danga, bathiangga kachui thang ngo.
54005003	Bataknu tamei rwan ding takhwang towo.
54005004	Atiyeda tameinu gana basa rwan mak tabe batu rwan amme dabe, ri baning thuke dinu kama bi inkhun bi pi mu lang khatle banu bapa khou lei thun lang bachu ding ngo. Balangbe haga Rikrwang meithaan bi kasanu khatle lou thang zanuwe.
54005005	Bataknu tamei, baraantoza lungnu maan gana Rikrwang khou balumsaye. Zingpha thamlai thei makka kalumga hweiniga ongme.
54005006	Atiyeda bapum pi pem langza baningga lungnu tameinu ga ringga ringga thi rwe.
54005007	Bani ding koi maaknu to lang heiba zathang bing nga pi thangbiyo.
54005008	Atiyeda tudannu khatna bain thirui khatle bakung toga bainkhun mi nun lang hakna pi thang phaang thang make dabe, maan balumsanu ding za maknuwe, atiga maan ga balumsa maknu mi ma sia inku rwe.
54005009	Sangwan somruk tang maknu tamei ding tamei rwan lak pi chak thang mako, maan kapaisa khatcha mei toga,
54005010	kasanu chwan langna mi nunna rinswan thangga, naosen rwan ding pi sing thou thangga, man rwan ding pi sa pi inga, bathiangnu mi nun ket kasin thangga, riangre kanang nun ding paang thangga khatle kasanu chwan bing bi sung khutka lung nge dabe bating tamei rwan lak pi chak thangnu zaye.
54005011	Atiyeda tamei naosennu rwan ding tamei rwan lak pi chak thang mako, balangbe bani boulaanu gana bani ding Christa khouna pi namla thangnu kaan bi bani balung lung nwam thouwe.
54005012	Kamanu balumsat ka bathan sat briakpina bani koi maan dou rwe.
54005013	Hei bing chung bi, banina in khat pina in khat la se koiluga takaat lang bachuwe, takaatnuza makka mi chorin choraiga banina kabia mak tingnu ga kabiaga chwan katopnu katap towe.
54005014	Atibriakpina tamei naosen rwanna kalaakluga sa nao chanu, inkhun phunnu, rin basiat lang munanu nun khou badou chanu pi thang maknu ei bathaiye.
54005015	Balangbe mi kasemna Seitaan nung suiga lampui semaan thou drwe.
54005016	Tudannu balumsanu kapaisa mak tabe kamaisa in inkhun bi tamei rwan amnu towe dabe bani ding phaang thang ding ngo atiga banina rupkathan bi potrit bason thang mak ting ngo. Heiya bataknu tamei rwan ding rupkathanna paang thang za lang nge.
54005017	Chwan phunnu rwan chwan phun chuinu, bakung toga Rikrwang chong khatle zekrin lang bi bachu thang ongnu bani ding ga badam kani inkuga takhwang to lang khopnuwe.
54005018	Bathiangnu Chongdipna rinne, “Saang kadim ta ongnu sen chan ding nangna bamun khwamsa make” khatle “Chwantok mi maan ga balo man phang lang khopnuwe.”
54005019	Pat ni mak tabe pat thum om sake makka chwan phunnu lu chung bi impu thangnu chong ga lou mako.
54005020	Noh tonu bani ding khang meithaan bi tweiyo atiye dabe katei rwanna le kachi lune.
54005021	Eina Rikrwang, Pukraangba Jisu Christa khatle kathang swaknu tambaan chonglang rwan meithaan bi heiba chong bing nga kathing aih to makka khatle mi mai phaangga khatchale to mak lang nating rakanga kachui thang rwe.
54005022	Tupai pakhat lu chung bi kut kaising thang nong mako mak tabe mi khat om noh badam suilou mako; nang bathiangga ong ngo.
54005023	Tui za in mako atiyeda nabonpui langna khatle naa katupnu langna drakha tui kasem inno.
54005024	Mi kasem om noh ga bathiangga muwe, chong kasem langna meithaan la se ongme atiyeda mi katei om nohna bani nung sui hung nge.
54005025	Hadanga mi kasem om kasanu chwan gabe bathiangga phaangmuwe khatle mu bathiang maknu rwan ga le inkamnu ngam make.
54006001	Rikrwang meng ding khatle zekrin ding rin basiat mak lang ringok phunnu swak bingna bani om bapuba rwan ding takhwang to lang khopnuwe diga chak thang ding ngo.
54006002	Balumsanu bapuba rwan amnu swak rwan gana bani inpuba rwan le diga unao we diga bani ding thou to maknu to mak ting ngo. Atiyeda kanaanu phang ongnu ga balumsanu nun khatle kriangnu nun to briakpina bani ding inkuga chwanlaang to ding gaye. Hei bing nga bachu thang ngo khatle kachui thang ngo.
54006003	Tudannu pakhatna kabat kabaangga bachu thang nge dabe khatle bazenu chongkaang dinuba, Pukraangba Jisu Christa om chong le Rikrwang ding kachi dingnu lang bi bachu thangnu le za kale make dabe,
54006004	maan ga lian tonu, khatchale thei maknuwe. Atiyeda kae kanaanu khatle chong zetnu bi sung thang nge. Habei gana hei bing nga swake: antiamnu, kabit kamainu, rin basiatnu, siaga balumsianu,
54006005	sung sa maknu khatle bazenu ding thei maknu mi nun lak pi katupka kae kanaanu swake. Ririak senu ga lungsanu lampuiye diga banina baning nge. Hadannu mi nun khouna nang namlaaga ong ngo.
54006006	Atiyeda pemtheinu le bachamga ririak senu dinuwa taswang khak lang kanaanuwe.
54006007	Balangbe anina talei ram bi khatchale phun hung make khatle anina khatchale phun se laye dinuwa bataknuwe.
54006008	Sa lang in lang khatle sin basoi lang amme dabe anina pem dingnuwe.
54006009	Atiyeda lungsanu ding bathainu bani ga bathemnu bi, phaa bi khatle braannu le mut tanu bi pi imphum tanu kapangnu khatle liam zanu bathainu inza bi ta thang nge.
54006010	Balangbe sian bathainuwa kasianu bing om bakungriye, habei ga mi kasemna ra-aam briakpina bani balumsat lampui bina maan thou drwe; atiga riangre kanang inza gana bani ding hwam lem rwe.
54006011	Atiyeda he Rikrwang mi nang, hei bing bina pak tammo khatle bazenu, ririak senu, balumsanu, kriangnu, khaang theinu khatle bazaangnu ding zong ngo.
54006012	Balumsat om kasanu kraan ga katwako, khwa sei ringnu ding ga choitipo, habei ga nating kou thang rwe khatle nangna sake taswang khak meithaan bi kasanu sake ga indao rwe.
54006013	Pot bing khou ringnu pi thangnu Rikrwang khatle Pontius Pilate meithaan bi kasanu sake pi ngaaknu Christa Jisu meithaan bi eina nakhou zathang pi ye.
54006014	Dinuba ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa na hung lat mak basaan, heiba zathang nga nang bathiangga khatle koi maaknu toga ngaak tingnuwe.
54006015	Haga aih sanu, khatchanu Pum ngam Ngamnu, krwang bing Krwang, bapuba bing Bapubana Baom bakaan bi pi hung tanglune.
54006016	Thi maknu ga Maan baraantoza zung nge. Pakhatchanale hung banai ngam maknu babaan bi amme khatle pakhatchanale Bating mu mak aang nge khatle munule ngam make. Bakhou takhwang khatle khwa seinu ngam am ding ngo. Amen.
54006017	Atun kaan om lungsanu mi nunna lian to mak lang balumsaza maknu lan bi balumsanu to mak lang atiyeda ani khou lozaang sa lang pum brumza khopsaga pi thangnu Rikrwang khou sung thang lang zathang pi thang ngo.
54006018	Bani kasanu chwan tamga to lang sung lianga pi swak thei lang atiluga khat le khat badam lou bacham nwam lang kasanu to ding ngo.
54006019	Haga danga ringzoknu kum ga banina lousu lang nung la lang kasanu inmun bani lang banina ri thang nge.
54006020	He Timothy, bathaang maaknu chong, bakaba maaknu chong khatle ningting ding ga baze makka kabat kabaangga kounu bi ga sui makka nakhou sin thang damnu ga nang ngaak chuiyo.
54006021	Haba ningting lousu rwe dinu mi kasem balumsat pina bani lampui maan drwe. Phaangkriang nakhou amnu to ding ngo. Amen.
55001001	Jisu Christa khou amnu ringnu om karen thangnu nung suiga, Rikrwang na baningnu paan bina Jisu Christa om chonglang Paul eina,
55001002	kriangnu asa kapaisa Timothy khou: Pa Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Christa Jisu khouna phaangkriang, kriang thang theinu khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo.
55001003	Zingpha thamlai kalumnu bi eina nani ding chat makka baningsuga apu apa rwanna to damnu danga bathiangnu kakoi baze theinu sung le bachamga eina chwanlaang to ongnu Rikrwang ding swankaye.
55001004	Ei karonuna sip lang nangna mikthi ta damnu ga baningsuga nating kadou nwam take.
55001005	Napi Lois khatle nanu Eunice khou kamaga am ngaaknu nakhou amnu bataknu balumsat ka ei baningsuwe. Haga nakhou le amme dinu ei bathiangga thei rwe.
55001006	Atibriakpina eina kut kaising thangnu paan bina nakhou amnu Rikrwang leithwan ga pi chok thou lang eina nating pi baningsuwe.
55001007	Balangbe Rikrwang na ani khou zamnu katha pi thang make, haba hut lang ngam amnu, kriangnu khatle bazan ding karaknu om katha pi thang rwe.
55001008	Atibriakpina ani Pukraangba lang bi sake pinu langna mak tabe Balaang zana qwan mi to ongnu alaangna nang kazaknu to mako; atiyeda Rikrwang om ngam nung suiga sacham lang chungna riangrenu bi badam suilou thang ngo.
55001009	Rikrwang na ani ding kan thang rwe khatle bathiangnu kou bi ga ani ding kou thang rwe, anina tonu chwan nung suiga make atiyeda Maan bahakna baning thangnu khatle phaangkriang nung suiga kou thangnuwe. Heiba phaangkriang nga talei ram dam mak baleina Christa Jisu khou ani lang pi thang rwe.
55001010	Atiyeda ani ding Kanthangnupa Christa Jisu hung thangnu paan bina atun indao thang rwe. Jisu Christa na thinu ding lou sat thangga sacham paan bina ringnu khatle thi latlanu kum ding ga babaan bi phun hung rwe,
55001011	haba sacham ga kasam lang ating sacham kasamnupa, chonglang khatle Gentile rwan khou bachuthangnupa toga hap thang rwe.
55001012	Hei langna, ei hei bing nga khaang ongnuwe; ati ngaaklena ei kazak make; balangbe eina balumsa ongnu Bating ei theiye khatle eina Bakhou sin thang damnu ga Maanna le ha ni Lumik ka tangga ngaak thangnu ngamme dinu ei bathiangga theiye.
55001013	Nangna akhouna ngaisu damnu bazenu chong ga Christa Jisu khou balumsanu khatle kriangnu bi badan toga tipka choiyo.
55001014	Nakhou sin thang damnu kasanu pot ka ani khou ong thang ongnu Katha Bathiangnu paanna ngaako.
55001015	Phigellus le Harmogenes suiga Asia tram bi ongnu mi bing zana ating bathan thangsia rwe dinu nangna theiye.
55001016	Pukraangba na Onesiphorus in inkhun ding phaangkriang thang ding ngo; balangbe maanna ating katupka sung pi thou thang nge khatle ei qwan in bi ongnu langna maan kazak make,
55001017	atiyeda maan Rome bi hungnu kaan bi ating sung khutka zongluga zongsu ngaake.
55001018	Chongtok ni ga maanna Pukraangba khouna kriang thangnu lousu lang Pukraangba na bating phaangkriang thang ding ngo, maanna Ephesus pi ating balang inza bi paang thang damme dinu nangna bathiangga theiye.
55002001	Atibriakpina asa kapaisa, Christa Jisu khou amnu phaangkriang bi ga nang natnu towo.
55002002	Sake taswang khak meithaan bi nangna akhouna ngaisu damnu bing ga katei rwan khou le bachu thang ngam dingnu balumsa zanu mi nun khou sin thang ngo.
55002003	Atibriakpina nangna Jisu Christa om kasanu kraanmi khat toga riangre khaang ngo.
55002004	Kraanmi khat toga chwan to ongnu tudannu pakhatna kani khat khat om lungna baraantoza ding pi katop make, haga bating kraanmi toga kathang thang damnu Bating pi pem lang nge.
55002005	Tudannu mi khatna le kadai bi takhemme dabe, maanna kadai om chaang nung suiga takhem make dabe maan taswan phang make.
55002006	Chwan rakannu loumi gana tapaan om badam lousu kama lang nge.
55002007	Eina rin ongnu lang bi kakhanno, balangbe Pukraangba na balang bingza bi nakhou bakaba theinu pi thang ding ngo.
55002008	Eina kasam ongnu sacham nung suiga, thinu nun lak pina pi ring thou thang damnu David kik taat Jisu Christa ding baningsuwo.
55002009	Hei langna sa maknu chwan tonu mi khat tanga, ei bang thangnu tangga riangrenu khaang ongnuwe; atiyeda Rikrwang chong gabe bang thang make.
55002010	Atibriakpina Christa Jisu khou khwa sei lwat liannule bachamga amnu ringriak ka banina lousu dam lang Rikrwang na kathang swak thangnu mi nun lang eina hei bing nga khaang ongme.
55002011	Heiya balumsa lang khopnu chong nge: Anina Maan le diga thi bachamme dabe, Ani Maan le ring bachamlune.
55002012	Anina riangre khaang nge dabe, Ani Maan le diga krwang toga paan bachamlune; Anina Bating za make dabe, Maanna le ani ding za thanglaye.
55002013	Anina balumsa lang khopnu mak peida, Maanbe balumsa lang khopnu toga atiga amme: Maan Baraanto Bating za maknu ngam make.
55002014	Heiba chong bing nga chat makka pi baningsu thang ngo, banina khatchale tong maknu, ngai ongnu rwan ding ga pi braannu chong om lang bi ga kae kanaa mak lang Pukraangba meithaan bi tipka rin thang ngo.
55002015	Bazenu chong ga bazega sizinga kazak lang bathaang maaknu chwantok mi Rikrwang khou lou thang zanu toga napum bahak kat swak lang karammo.
55002016	Atiyeda batak maknu khatle pang kabia kabianu minun khouna pen dammo; balangbe banina Rikrwang ding kachi maknu inku thoulune.
55002017	Bani om bachu thangnu gana taket ri naanu danga sakhutlune, bani lak pi Hymenaeus le Philetus le suiye.
55002018	Banina ring thounu ga loi drwe diga bazenu bina lampui maan thou drwe khatle banina mi kasem om balumsat ting to braanne.
55002019	Atiyeda Rikrwang om tipnu inmun ga kaling makka heiba om seal le suiga han ongme, “Pukraangba na Bami nun ding theiye” khatle “Christa meng ding kounu mi bingna kakoinu bina impaan swak ting ngo.”
55002020	Atiyeda inpui khat sung bi kachaak khatle tangka om theng amnuza makka thing khatle talei om theng le amme. Kasem dingna takungga khatle kasem dingna baiga choiye.
55002021	Atibriakpina tudannu pakhatna bapum ding heiba kasianu bing bina to bathiang nge dabe, maan ga kasanu chwan bing lang daan thangnu takungnu theng, to bathiang thangnu khatle Bapuba lang sizin zanu theng tolune.
55002022	Babwa rwan om pumna bathainu bing bina pak tammo atiyeda sung bathiangga Pukraangba ding kounu mi nun le diga ririak senu, balumsanu, kriangnu khatle dai bazaangnu nung suiyo.
55002023	Atiyeda kapangnu khatle bakaba maaknu chongngai inzana kae kanaanu pi swake dinu theiga habei gana pen dammo.
55002024	Rikrwang om swak pakhatna kae kana mak ting gaye atiyeda mi bing khou sung bazaangnu, bachu thang ngamnu khatle khaang theinu to ding gaye.
55002025	Bamaitwang bi ongnu nun ding sung bazaangnu le bachamga maanna bachu thang ding gaye, banina bazenu ga thei lang Rikrwang na bani sung pi le thangnu le zaye.
55002026	Banina bakaba thei swak latka, maanna baningnu ga to lang maan nam thang ongnu Diabol om phaa bina dwak swaknu le zaye.
55003001	Atiyeda heiya theiyo, hagazo kakhamnu dat pi sia taknu kaan hunglune.
55003002	Balangbe mi nunna bani raanto za ding kriangnu, sian bathainu, lian tonu, phun liannu, Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatnu, nu pa rwan chong zei maknu, swanka thang thei maknu, bathiang maknu,
55003003	kriangnu maaknu, kok thang thei maknu, rwan ding sia lang rinnu, bazan ding karak maknu, khouring dannu khatle kasanu ding bathai maknu,
55003004	rou sianu, tun natnu, ra-aamnu, Rikrwang ding kriangnu ma bazan ding pi lozaannu ding inkuga bathainu,
55003005	ririak senu thot phunnu atiyeda haba om ngam dingba za maknu hunglune. Hei dannu mi nun khouna pen dammo.
55003006	Balangbe banina in in bi khutluga noh pot ritna nam dannu, bachaat bachaat om pum bi bathainuna kainu kasonnu mannu rwan ding namme.
55003007	Bani bakaan bathin bachuwe atiyeda banina bazenu ding impha ni beida theinu ngam make.
55003008	Jannes le Jambres na Moses ting kakhangnuga danga, baninale bazenu ding kakhang nge: Tanaatnu sung phunnu mi nun, balumsat om lang bi za make,
55003009	atiyeda bani ga lian thoula rwe; balangbe barwei om kapangnu ga indao damnu ga danga bani om kapangnu ga le mi nun khou indaolune.
55003010	Atiyeda nangna bachang saga thei rwe, hagazo aom zekrin, aom khei, baningnu, balumsanu, khaang seinu, kriangnu, khaang theinu,
55003011	Antioch pi, Iconium bi khatle Lystra bi akhou swak tamnu bing ga sui bazei thang ngo. Atiyeda Pukraangba na ha bing bi gana ating kan thang damme.
55003012	Batak takka, Christa Jisu khou, ririak sega lung nwamnu mi nunna rainu khaanglune.
55003013	Atiyeda sa maknu mi nun khatle minamnu mi nun gana mi nun ding minamga khatle mi nunna bani ding minamga sianu inku thoulune.
55003014	Atiyeda nang tukhouna bachunubo dinu nang thei briakpina, nangna bachu damnu khatle bazenuwe diga thei thang damnu bi ga tipka han ong ngo.
55003015	Christa Jisu khou balumsanu paan bina ringriak lang nating pi ningting ngamnu Bathiangnu Chongdip ka nang naosen badona thei drwe.
55003016	Chongdip bing Rikrwang om kaphuk pi naye khatle bachu thang lang, laak thang lang, to baze thang lang khatle ririak senu bi rin thang lang kanaanuwe.
55003017	Hagana Rikrwang om mi ga sanu chwan bing to lang chamdaan chuiluga khopsaga ong lang nge.
55004001	Atibriakpina Rikrwang meithaan bi, Maanna hungnu kaan bi khatle Bakrwang talei la ring ongnu khatle thi damnu rwan ding chong kasem thang dingnu Pukraangba Jisu Christa meithaan bi eina nakhou chongtan piye:
55004002	Chong ga kasammo! Bakaan cha bi le, bakaan mak pi le daan ong ngo. Khaang seinuna sipka khatle bachu thangnu le bachamga kakoinu ga to baze thang ngo, twei thang ngo khatle kachui thang ngo.
55004003	Balangbe bazenu zekrin bachu thangnu ding ga mi nunna khaang thanglanu kaan hunglune atiyeda banina kana bathak briakpina bani om bathainu nung suiga, banina bani lang bachuthangnupa rwan khom thanglune
55004004	khatle bani kana ga bazenu bina pon penluga, pwaknu meiri bing la kanei thou damlune.
55004005	Atiyeda nangba balang bing bi barak theiyo, riangrenu khaang ngo, katei rwan ding Christa khou phun hungnu evangelist chwan ga towo, naom chwanlaang ga pi bapungphawo.
55004006	Balangbe ei innu potkat toga kat swak rwe, akum loi dingnu kaan nai rwe.
55004007	Kasanu kraan ga ei katwak rwe, nampak ka ei pak loi rwe; eina balumsanu ga ngaak rwe.
55004008	Kakhamnu bi, ririak senu luthop ka alaang thang ong rwe, haga Pukraangba ririak senu Chongsempuna haba Lumik pi akhou pi thanglune khatle Maanna akhouza pi thangnu makka atiyeda Maan hung latnu ding bathainu mi bing khou le pi thanglune.
55004009	Nang akhou karangga hung lang karam thang ngo;
55004010	balangbe Demas na atun am ongnu heiba talei ram ding nga kriangga ating bathan satluga Thessalonica la thou drwe. Crescens na Galatia la, Titus na Dalmatia la thou drwe.
55004011	Akim bi ongnu Luke cha zung rwe. Nang Mark ting kalwangluga hung ngo, balangbe maan chwanlaang to lang akhou bathaang amme.
55004012	Atiga Tychicus ting eina Ephesus la bathan damme.
55004013	Nang hungnu kaan bi eina Troas pi Carpus kim bi thangsia damnu aom talathu pui le chongdip nun, bakung toga zan mun bi hiak thangnu chongdip nun ga phun hung ngo.
55004014	Konri thin sweinu Alexander na alu chung bi kasianu chwan tamga to rwe. Bachwan nung suiga Pukraangba na bating takhum baan thang ding ngo.
55004015	Nang le bating cheksinno, balangbe maanna ani chong ding rakanga thing nge.
55004016	Kama bi achong katak pi pakhatchanale apek lengnu maake atiyeda khangsungna ating bathan sat rwe. Haga Pukraangba na bani lu chung bi basing chak thang mak ting ngo.
55004017	Atiyeda eina sacham ga khopsaga kasam lang khatle Gentile rwan bingna ngaisu dam lang Pukraangba na apek leng thang rwe khatle ating pi nat thang rwe. Atiga ating takhu krwang mun bina kan thang rwe.
55004018	Pukraangba na ating sa maknu chwan bing bina kan thangluga, Baom tambaan krwang talei lang ngaak thanglune. Bakhou khwa seiga lwat liannu to ding ngo. Amen.
55004019	Priscilla, Aquila khatle Onesiphorus in inkhun bing ding kalum thang ngo.
55004020	Erastus Corinthia bi ongsia drwe atiyeda Trophimus ting eina Miletus pi naaga thangsia drwe.
55004021	Sikpha kaan tang mak balei nang hung lang rakanga karam thang ngo. Eubulas, Pudens, Linus, Claudia khatle unao rwan bingna nating kalumme.
55004022	Pukraangba Jisu Christa na nakatha le ong bacham thang ding ngo. Phaangkriang nani khou am ding ngo. Amen.
56001001	Rikrwang om swak khatle Jisu Christa om chonglang Paul, Rikrwang na kathang swak thangnu nun om balumsat nung suiga khatle Rikrwang ding theinu bazenu bi bani ding kai thang langna eina kalumme.
56001002	Khwa sei ringnu om bachun bi chong karwak maknu Rikrwang na bakaan hou thou mak baleina ani khou karen thang rwe.
56001003	Atiyeda badou chanu dat pi Bachong ga kasamnu paan bina indao thang rwe. Kasamnu ga ani ding Kanthangnupa Rikrwang om zathang nung suiga akhou sin thang rwe.
56001004	Ani balumsat bachamnu bataknu asa kapaisa Titus khou Pa Rikrwang khatle ani ding Kanthangnupa Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang, kriang thangnu khatle dai bazaangnu ga am ding ngo.
56001005	Hei langna eina nating Crete pi thangsianu lang bi to baatnu chwan bing ga nangna baleng toga to lang khatle namlian bing bi chwan phunnu rwan ding som thang lang eina zathang pi thang damnu ga rwe.
56001006	Koi maaknu, mei khatcha basan tonu kae kanaanu mak tabe rwan thwei ongnanu om khan lang maaknu balumsa zanu sa rwan amnu mi khat ting chwan hap thang ngo.
56001007	Balangbe rupkathan bi balu tonu maan ga Rikrwang om chwanlaang mi, khan lang maaknu, rang to maknu, sung sia barap maknu, zu kalo maknu, kabit kamai maknu, sian ra-aam maknu to ding gaye.
56001008	Atiyeda pi sa pi in theinu, kasanu ding bathainu mi, basung ding karaknu, bazenu, bathiangnu khatle bazan ding karak theinu
56001009	khatle bating bachu thang damnu danga balumsa zanu chong ga tipka choinu bazenu zekrinna chong khetnu mi nun ding kachui thang ngamnu khatle koi indao thang ngamnu to ding gaye.
56001010	Balangbe balu tonu rwan thwei ong maknu, takaat chong kabianu mi khatle minamnu mi tamga amme, bakung toga bani mun romnu nun khou naye.
56001011	Bani mun khwamnu taye. Hapai mi nun gana sian raaamga banina bachu thang mak tingnu ga bachu thangga, inkhun bing ding to imphaang rwe.
56001012	Bani lak pi bani om thiamting nge dinu pakhatna rinne, “Crete rwan ga bakaan bathin chong karwaknu, sa maknu nilai lak khouring, takaatnu takwam sanu nunne.”
56001013	Heiba sake ya bazenuwe. Atibriakpina bani bazenu balumsat pi tipka ong dam lang bani ding rakanga raak thang ngo.
56001014	Jihudi rwan om pwaknu meiri ding ga ngai mak lang khatle bazenu bina mi nun om zathang pek la kanei mak lang bani ding rakanga raak thang ngo.
56001015	Bathiangnu mi nun lang pot bingza bathiang nge atiyeda tanaatnu khatle balumsa maknu nun lang bathiangnu khatchale maake atiyeda bani lungning khatle kakoi baze theinu sung ga hakna tanaat rwe.
56001016	Banina Rikrwang ding theinu katap towe atiyeda bani chwan bingna Bating za make. Haga batannu, chong zei maknu khatle kasanu chwan bing lang batik cha maknuwe.
56002001	Atiyeda nangba bataknu zekrin le bachamnu ga rinno.
56002002	Dinuba kapaisa patso rwanna sung bazaang lang, lem lang, chaang nai lang, balumsat tipka ong lang, kriang thei lang khatle khaang thei lang to ding ngo.
56002003	Hadanga kamaisa patso rwan le bani lamchat takhwang man phunnu to lang, rwan ding sia lang rin theinu to mak lang, zu kalo mak lang khatle kasanu bachu thang thei lang to ding ngo.
56002004	Haga banina nulwei rwan ding bani basan rwan ding kriang lang khatle bani sa rwan ding kriang lang bachu thang ding ngo.
56002005	Banina bani zan ding karak thei lang, bathiang lang khatle lung thei lang, kasanu rwan to lang bani basan rwan thwei bi ong lang khatle Rikrwang chong ding pi rin basiat mak lang bachu thang ding ngo.
56002006	Hadanga palwei rwan ding le bani sung bazaang lang bachu thang ngo.
56002007	Balang bing bi naraan to za ding kasanu chwan bi bazei zanu toga pi muwo; bachu thangnu bi sung bathiangnu, takhwang man phunnu khatle imphom tanaat maknu ga pi muwo.
56002008	Nalang bi sianu rin lang maakka maitwangnu nun ga kazak tam lang khetnu ngamlanu bazenu chong ga kabiawo.
56002009	Swak rwanna le bani om bapuba rwan thwei bi ong lang, balang bing bi bani ding pi pem lang khatle banina chong katak kadou mak lang bachu thang ngo.
56002010	Bani pot baru mak lang atiyeda banina ani ding Kanthangnupa Rikrwang om bazenu bachu thangnu ding tapon to thang lang balumsaza taknu thot ka pi muwo.
56002011	Balangbe ringriak phun hung thangnu Rikrwang phaangkriang ga mi bing khou pi mu thang rwe.
56002012	Hagana Rikrwang ding kachi maknu talei ram om bathainu ding bathan satluga, sung karakka lung lang ririak senu khatle heiba bakaan bi ririak sega lung lang ani ding bachu thang nge.
56002013	Aih sanu bachun le tasiatnu Rikrwang khatle Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa na lwat lianga hung dingnu ding ga anina lamphaang ongme.
56002014	Maanna chongtan thouto maknu chwan bing bina ani ding ran swak lang, kasanu chwan lang sung khut lang khatle Baom bakung tonu mi nun ding Balaang to bathiang thang lang Baraanto Bating ani lang pi swak thang rwe.
56002015	Hei bing nga bani khou kabiawo, kachui thang ngo khatle ngam suiga bani ding tweiyo. Nating pakhatchanale thou to maknu to mak ting ngo.
56003001	Banina taleipuba rwan le kangamnu nun thwei bi ong lang, bani chong zei lang khatle kasanu chwan bing ga to lang pi baningsu thang ngo.
56003002	Pakhatcha khou hakna kasianu kabia mak lang dai bazaangnu, sung bazaangnu, talu tanu thot mi bing khou pi mu lang pi baningsu thang ngo.
56003003	Balangbe ani le bakaan khat pi kapangnu toga, chong zei makka, minamga, pumna bachaat bachaat bathaiga, karo rangaa om swak toga, sianu khatle antiamnu bi lungga, khatna khat ting batan kalega ong ngaake.
56003004	Atiyeda ani ding Kanthangnupa Rikrwang om kriang thangnu khatle kriangnu ga mi nun khou pi mu thangnu kaan bi
56003005	anina ririak senu chwan to thang damnu paan bina makka atiyeda Maanna ani ding phaangkriang thangnu nung suiga ani ding pi pon kathan thangluga khatle Katha Bathiangnu om pi kathan thangnu paan bina Maanna ani ding kan thang rwe.
56003006	Ani ding Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa paan bina Katha Bathiangnu ding ani khou khopsaga bunta thang rwe.
56003007	Haga Baphaangkriang paan bina ani ding pi baze thangluga khwa sei ringnu ani bachun nung suiga rakhum lwaknu mi to lang nge.
56003008	Heiya balumsa lang khopnu chong nge. Hei lang biya Rikrwang khou balumsa damnu nunna kasanu chwan tonu bi bani sung khutka to lang nangna bani khou chat makka rin thangnu bathaiye. Hei bing nga mi nun lang sanuwe khatle tongnuwe.
56003009	Atiyeda kapangnu om kae kanaanu, pu pa rui ding zongnu, kabit kamainu khatle chongtan om lang bi kae kanaanu hei bing bina pen dammo. Balangbe bani ga tongnu maaknu khatle bathaang maaknuwe.
56003010	To kapaang lang tonu mi ding ga twei owei kani bina zei make dabe,
56003011	hapai mi ga lampui maannu khatle noh toga baraanto bating pi koinuwe dinu theiga kalang sat tammo.
56003012	Eina Artemas mak tabe Tychichus ting nakhou lang hungnu kaan bi Nicapolis pi nang akhou hung lang karam thang ngo. Balangbe ei sikpha habei ga hung ong lang baning nge.
56003013	Chongtan theinu mi Zenas le Apollos ting barapka lang thang ngo, barwei lamsek lang khatchale baatnu to mak lang phaang thang ngo.
56003014	Ani mi nunna bakraa kraa maknu to makka bathaang amnu bing ga lousu lang kasanu chwan bing bi to talen ong ding ngo.
56003015	Ei le diga ong bachamnu mi bingna nani ding kalumme. Balumsat pi ani ding kriangnu bing ding kalum thang ngo. Phaangkriangna nani khangsung khou ong thangnu to ding ngo. Amen.
57001001	Jisu Christa om lang bina qwan mi Paul khatle ani unao Timothy, ani le diga chwan to bachamnu kriangnu baan Philemon khou
57001002	khatle kriangnu Apphia, ani baan kraanmi Archippus khatle nain bi amnu rupkathan khou,
57001003	ani Pa Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou am ding ngo.
57001004	Eina bakaan bathin nating rinpanga, baningsuga Arikrwang khou swankaga hweiniye.
57001005	Nangna Pukraangba Jisu khou atiluga bathiangnu mi bing khou kriangnu khatle balumsanu amnu ga eina ngaisu omme.
57001006	Dinuba, ani khou amnu kasanu bing om lang bi bathiangga theinu khatle nangna balumsat lousu damnu gana Christa Jisu khou bakraa tamga kraa lang nge.
57001007	Balangbe ani nakriang bi karo liannu khatle sung pi thou thangnu lousu rwe. Balangbe unao nangna bathiangnu mi nun sung ding taswang khak pi chaang ring thang rwe.
57001008	Atibriakpina nangna to lang hoinu chwan ga to lang nakhou zathang pinu bi Christa khou ei sung raang zanu ngaaklena,
57001009	nating kriangnu paan bina Christa om lang bi patso khat tonu qwan mi Paul eina nating hweinuwe.
57001010	Ei qwan in bi ongnu kaan bina pon thang ngaaknu asa Onesimus langna nakhou hweinuwe.
57001011	Maan bakaan khat pi nalaang bathaang maaknu to ngaake. Atiyeda atunba nalaang le alaang le bathaang amnu to rwe.
57001012	Eina bating nakhou lang hung latnu rwe atibriakpina nang bating asung bahak ting danga lou thangro.
57001013	Ei sacham lang chungna qwan in bi ongnu kaan bi naom hut toga ating maanna chwanlaang to thang lang bathainuwe.
57001014	Atiyeda naom kasanu ga twansa makka tonu makka atiyeda to thang nwamga tonu to lang nangna za thangnu ga sui makka ei khatchale to nwam make.
57001015	Balangbe Onesimus ka nang le diga bakhwa seiga ong bacham langna bakaan kasem lang kapaangnu ngaakle zaye.
57001016	atiga maan swak tan makka atiyeda swak ma inkuga kriangnu unao zung rwe, haga bakung toga akhouwe atiyeda nakhouba talei ram bi le Pukraangba khou le inku chuiga ong lat lang nge.
57001017	Nangna ating nang le diga chwan to bachaamnuwe diga chak thang nge dabe ating lou thangnu danga bating le loukhut thang ngo.
57001018	Atiyeda maanna nakhou koi maan thangnu mak tabe nalei chaak thangnu am ngaake dabe haga alei chaak toga chak thang ngo.
57001019	Napum bahak ka akhou naom leiye diga rin mak lang Paul eina heiya akut bahakna hiaknu rwe. Haga eina thun thangne.
57001020	O, unao, ei nakhouna Pukraangba khou karonu lousu lang Pukraangba khou asung pi chaang ring thang ngo.
57001021	Nangna chong zeinu bi ga eina balumsaga rinnu ma inkuga nangna tolune dinu theiga eina nakhou hiaknuwe.
57001022	Atiyeda ei hung mak balei alaang bazin in kaa khat daan thang ngaako, balangbe nangna hweini thangnu paan bina Rikrwang na ating nakhou pi hung thanglune diga ei balumsaye.
57001023	Christa Jisu langna ei le qwan in bi ong bachamnu Epaphras na nating kalumme.
57001024	Ei le diga chwanlaang bachamnu Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, Luke banina le nating kalumme.
57001025	Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriangna nakatha le diga ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
58001001	Kama meithaan katupka khatle bachaat tei tei toga thiamting rwan paan bina pu pa rwan khou Rikrwang na kabia thang ngaake.
58001002	Maanna pot bing om rakhum lwaknu mi to lang Rikrwang na kathang swak thang damnu khatle Maanna Bapaan bina le talei ram ding dam thang damnu Basa Kapaisa paan bina Maanna heiba kakhamnu dat pi ani khou chong kabia thang rwe.
58001003	Maan Rikrwang lwat liannu om baan chuinuwe khatle Rikrwang om thot bahake. Bangam amnu chongkaang paan bina pot bing nga ngaak thang nge. Maan Bapum bahakna ani om noh to bathiang thangnu chwan toloi thangluga basaang la Ngam lian kataknu om kut inchang la ongta drwe.
58001004	Maan rakhum lwaknu paan bina tambaan chonglang rwan om ma sa inkunu meng lousu briak pina bani ma sa inku rwe.
58001005	Balangbe “Nang Asa Kapaisa ye, Aniya Eina Nating pon thang rwe.” Atiga “Ei Bapa tolune, Khatle Maan Asa Kapaisa tolune” diga Rikrwang na tambaan chonglang rwan lak pina pakhat khou impha rin dambo?
58001006	Maanna talei ram bi natainu Basa Kapaisa ding lang hung Hiakpuba : Thei maknu Phang damnu : Balumsanu Jihudi Rwan Hiak tamnu bakaan: A.D. 67-69 latnu kaan bi Maanna rinne, “Rikrwang om tambaan chonglang rwan bingna Bating kalum ding ngo.”
58001007	Atiyeda tambaan chonglang rwan lang bi Maanna rinne, “Rikrwang na Baom tambaan chonglang rwan ding thiraang Khatle Bachwan tonu rwan ding mei balei pi to thang rwe.”
58001008	Atiyeda Basa Kapaisa lang bi Maanna rinne, “He Rikrwang, Naom takung riak ka khwa sei am ongme, Naom Krwang talei om chongsem sungrwan ga ririak senu om chongsem sungrwanne.
58001009	Nang ririak senu ding bathaiye, Khatle chongtan thouto maknu nun ding batanne, Atibriakpina Rikrwang na dinuba Narikrwang na Nating Nabaan rwan lak pina inkuga karonu om thao kanun thang rwe.”
58001010	Atiga “He Pukraangba, Nangna thoutan bina talei ram ding dam thang rwe, Khatle tambaan heiya Naom kutthiamme.
58001011	Bani ga braan damlune Atiyeda Nang be am onglune, Atiga bani ga pon dan baraan ta damlune.
58001012	Nangna bani ding baswannu pon danga kadip thoulune, Khatle bani ga kale damlune. Atiyeda Nangbe bakaan bathin kale make, Khatle Naom kum ga impha ni beida loinu amlaye.”
58001013	Atiyeda Maanna impha ni beida tambaan chonglang rwan lak pina pakhat khou “Eina Nating munanu rwan ding Naket kadim riak pi to mak basaan, Akut inchang pek la ong ngo” diga rin dambo?
58001014	Tambaan chonglang rwan bing ga ringriak lousu dingnu rwan ding chwanlaang to lang lang hungnu katha rwan makkabo?
58002001	Atibriakpina ani ding daan braan dam mak lang anina ngaisu damnu chong ga choitip ong lang rwe.
58002002	Balangbe tambaan chonglang rwan paan bina kabia damnu chong ga bazenu kale za maknuwe dabe khatle chongtan zei maknu khatle chong zei maknu bing langna khopsanu laak thangnu ga phang nge dabe,
58002003	anina heitia liannu ringriak ting thou to make dabe, anina tatoga pak dwaknu ngam ding gabo? Pukraangba na kamanu bi ringriak ka pao swak trwe khatle Maanna rinnu ngaisu damnu banina haga ani khou pi tip thang rwe.
58002004	Rikrwang na le badannu tasiatnu chwan khatle tasiatnu ngam chwan inza Maanna baningnu nung suiga Katha Bathiangnu om leithwan le bachamga sake pi damme.
58002005	Balangbe anina kabia ongnu hung dingnu talei ramma Rikrwang na tambaan chonglang rwan thwei bi pi ong thang make.
58002006	Atiyeda tudannu pakhatna bariak khat pi atiga rinne, “Nangna baningsu thang ongnu talei mi ya pa- aambo, Mak tabe Nangna banang thang ongnu Misa Sa Kapaisa ga Tubo?
58002007	Nangna Bating tambaan chonglang rwan ma titcha pi bangiam ta thang rwe, Khatle Nangna Bakhou lwat liannu khatle takhwang luthop thop thang rwe, Nangna Bating Nakutthiam bing lu chung bi thang rwe;
58002008	Nangna pot bingza Baket thwei bi pi ong thang rwe.” Balangbe Rikrwang na pot bingza Ba thwei bi bapuba pi to thangnu kaan bi Maanna ba thwei bi pi ong thang maknu pot khatcha hakna maake. Atiyeda atun anina pot bing Ba thwei bi pi ong thangnu mu mak aang nge.
58002009	Atiyeda Maanna thinu om riangre khaang thangnu langna atun lwat liannu khatle takhwang luthop thop thangnu, tambaan chonglang rwan ma titcha pi bangiam ta thangnu Jisu ding anina muwe. Thinu om riangre khaangnu heiya Rikrwang om phaangkriang paan bina mi bing lang Maanna thinu ga batem lang nge.
58002010	Balangbe sa kapaisa inza ding lwat liannu bi phun hung bi, riangre khaang thangnu paanna bani om ringriak bapuba ding pi khopsa thangnuwa Balaang khopnuwe. Pot bingza Balaang to ongme khatle Bapaan bina amnuwe.
58002011	Balangbe mi nun ding to bathiang thang ongnu khatle to bathiang thang damnu bani le khatcha bi naye. Hei langna Maanna bani ding unao rwan kou lang kazaklan rwe.
58002012	Maanna rinne, “Eina Nameng Au Anao rwan khou indao thanglune, Khang karungnu lak pi Ei Nalang bi swankanu laa tone.”
58002013	Maanna rin late, “Ei Rikrwang khou balumsa ongne.” Atiga rinne, “Ei khatle Rikrwang na Akhou pi thangnu sa rwan ga abeiya amme.”
58002014	Naosen rwan heiya zanti pum le thi om badam suilou briakpina Maan Bahak le bani nun danga misa om badam suilou bacham rwe. Balangbe Maanna thi thangnu paan bina thinu ngam amnu Diabol ding to braan lang nge.
58002015	Mi nunna thi lang kachinuna bani kum ambasaan Diabol thwei bi swak pi to ongnu ding pi dwak thang lang nge.
58002016	Batak takka, Maanna tambaan chonglang nun ding paang thang make. Atiyeda Abraham om kik taat ting paang thang nge.
58002017	Atibriakpina balang bing bi Maanna Bau banao rwan le bacham dingnu thouwe. Balangbe mi nun om noh bing lang pi pemnu rikhaang pot toga khaang lang Maanna Rikrwang om balang bing bi phaangkriang theinu khatle balumsa lang khopnu Takolu to lang nge.
58002018	Balangbe Maan Bahak bathemnu bi riangrenu dou briakpina bathemnu ding maitwang ongnu bani ding Maanna paang thang ngamme.
58003001	Atibriakpina tambaan om kou thangnu bi badam lou bachamnu bathiangnu unao rwan, anina rin indao swaknu Chonglang khatle Takolu Christa Jisu ding baning ngo.
58003002	Moses na Rikrwang om inkhun bi balumsa lang khopnu danga, Bating kathang thangnu Rikrwang khou Jisu le balumsa zanuwe.
58003003	Balangbe in to thangnu mi pakhat ting in ding ma takhwang tonu danga, Jisu ding Moses ma inkuga balumsa lang khopnuwe diga chak thang rwe.
58003004	Balangbe in bing nga tudannu mi pakhatna bacha thangnuwe. Atiyeda pot bing ding bacha thangnu ga Rikrwang nge.
58003005	Nung la kabia dingnu chong bing nga maanna sake to lang Moses na swak pakhat toga Rikrwang om inkhun bing bi balumsa lang khopnu to rwe.
58003006	Atiyeda Christa be Rikrwang om inkhun bi Sa Kapaisa toga balumsa lang khopnu ngaake. Anina ani om sung raangnu khatle anina karo ongnu bachunnu bi ga loinu tangga tipka choiye dabe ani Rikrwang om inkhun to rwe.
58003007	Atibriakpina Katha Bathiangnuna rinnu danga, “Aniya nani Rikrwang khwan ngaisuwe dabe,
58003008	Ramhaang bi tamphaangnu kaan bi, Tun natnu danga nani sung pi nat mako.
58003009	Habei ga nani pu pa rwanna Ating chaang phaang nge, Tamphaang damme, Khatle sangwan sombali Achwan inza mu damme.
58003010	Atibriakpina haba mikin ding ga Ei balung pwan ngaak rwe, Khatle atiga rin rwe, ‘Bani ga bani sung bi bakaan bing bi lampui maan rwe, Khatle banina Alampui theilan rwe.’
58003011	Atibriakpina Eina balung pwanga karen thang damme, ‘Bani ga Aom lo basaknu bi ga khutlaye.’ ”
58003012	Unao rwan ga barak theiyo mak tabe nani lak pi tudannuna ring ongnu Rikrwang khouna pi se swakluga balumsa maknu sung amnu le zaye.
58003013	Atiyeda chong karwaknu om nohna tudannu nani sung pi nat mak lang “Aniya” diga kounu bakaanna am ong bi nani khatna khat ting kani bathin kachui thang kaleyo.
58003014	Balangbe ani balumsanu om thoutannu ga loinu tangga tipka choiye dabe, ani nun Christa om badam lou bachamnu nunne.
58003015	Heiya rin damnu danga, “Aniya nani Rikrwang om khwan ngaisuwe dabe, Nani pu pa rwanna tun natnu danga nani sung pi nat mako.”
58003016	Balangbe Rikrwang chong ngaisuluga tun natnu tubo? Batak takka Moses na Egypt pina kalwang swaknu bani bingna makkabo?
58003017	Tu lu chung bi Rikrwang na sangwan sombali balung pwan dambo? Noh toluga ramhaang bi bani om kathinu pum bing ta thang damnu bani nun gana makpo?
58003018	Baom lo basaknu bi banina khutla rwe diga tu khou Rikrwang na karen thang damgabo? Haga chong zei maknu bani khou makkabo?
58003019	Atibriakpina banina balumsa mak briakpina karen thangnu talei bi ga khutnu ngamlan rwe dinu anina thei rwe.
58004001	Atibriakpina Baom lo basaknu bi khut lang chongren ga am ong briakpina nani lak pi tudannuna lo basaknu bi khutnu bi gana hung tang maknu zaye diga ani barak theizo.
58004002	Balangbe ani khou sacham ga kasam thang damnu danga, bani khou le sacham kasam thang rwe. Atiyeda banina ngaisu damnu chong gana bani khou kanaanu phun hung dam make. Balangbe haga ngaisu ongnu banina balumsanu le bachamga ngai dam make.
58004003	Balangbe balumsanu ani lo basaknu bi ga khute. Talei ram dam thou khap pina chwan bing ga loi ngaak peida heiya Maanna rin damnu ga dannuwe, “Eina balung pwannu bi karen ngaak rwe, Bani ga Aom lo basak riak pi ga khutpilaye.”
58004004	Balangbe Rikrwang na bariak khat pi ni siari ni lang bi rin thang nge, “Rikrwang na ni siari ni Bachwan bing bina basak rwe.”
58004005	Hei riak pi le atiga rin thang late “Bani ga Aom lo basak riak pi khutpilaye.”
58004006	Haba lo basak riak pi khut tingnu mi kasem amme. Atiyeda kamaga sacham kasamluga pi ngaisu damnu bani ga chong zei mak briakpina haba om lo basak riak pi khut tam make.
58004007	Rikrwang na lumik khat ret thang lat ngaake, ha ding ga “Aniya” diga kou damme. Sangwan taswang khak nung la David khou kamaga rin damnu danga rin ngaake, “Aniya nanina Bakhwan ngaisuwe dabe, Nani sung pi natlanro.”
58004008	Balangbe Joshua na bani khou lo basaknu pi thang ong ngaake dabe bataang la Rikrwang na bani khou katei lo sak ni lang bi rin mak tingnuwe.
58004009	Rikrwang mi nun lang basaknu ga am ongme.
58004010	Balangbe Rikrwang om basaknu bi khut tamnu maan gana Rikrwang na Bazan Bahak om chwan bina basak tamnu danga Maan le Baom chwan bina basak rwe.
58004011	Atibriakpina tudannuna chong zei maknu nun om thot tanga tupai khatchanale balumta mak lang anina lo saknu riak pi ga khut lang ngamnu bing karamzo.
58004012	Balangbe Rikrwang om chong heiya ringnuwe khatle ngam amme khatle balem kani amnu kangainu kachaak chem ma le ngaiye. Hagana sung le katha bi khatle ru bathon riak khatle bing ding tangga chouluga to kapaang thangnu ngamme khatle to kapaang thangnu misa om baning khatle lungningna bathainu ding tangga chong tonu ngamme.
58004013	Bamikphaang bi inkam dingnu kutthiam khatchale maake. Atiyeda anina ani om singchak hung pi lang nge. Bameithaan bi pum brumza thin thang makka lat thang omme.
58004014	Rikrwang Sa kapaisa Jisu, tambaan tang ga serwan damnu kaliannu Takolu ani lang amme. Atibriakpina anina rin indaonu balumsat ka tipka choizo.
58004015	Balangbe ani son bing khaang bacham thangnu ngam maknu Takolu ani lang amnu make. Atiyeda ani danga balang bing za bi bathemnu dounu ati ngaak peida noh maaknu Takolu ani lang amme.
58004016	Atibriakpina anina kriang thang theinu lousu lang khatle bathaang amnu kaan bi paang thangnu phaangkriang lousu lang phaangkriang om krwang takung riak pi sung raangga hungzo.
58005001	Balangbe mi nun lak pina ka thangnu takolu bing ga Rikrwang om chwanlaang lang toga ka thang thang nge. Hagazo maanna noh lang leithwan khatle rikhaang pot khaang lang nge.
58005002	Maan bahak le sonnuna ong qwat ong briakpina thei maknu khatle lampui semaannu mi bing lu chung bi sung bazaangga kriang thangnu ngamme.
58005003	Sonnuna ong qwat ong briakpina mi nun lang khatle bapum bahak lang noh lang khaangnu rikhaang pot heiya bathaang amme.
58005004	Pakhatchana hakna takungnu heiya bapum bahakna lou make. Atiyeda Aaron danga Rikrwang na kou thangnu nunna phangsuwe.
58005005	Haga danga Christa na le Bapum bahak ting takolu to lang lwat pi lian dam make. Atiyeda “Nang nga Asa Kapaisa rwe, Aniya Eina Nating pon thang rwe” diga bakhou rin thang ngaaknu Maan gaye.
58005006	Bariak khat pile Maanna rin thang late, “Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi nang khwa sei tako to rwe.”
58005007	Maanna zanti pum toga ong ngaaknu kaan bi thinu bina Bating kanthang ngamnu Bakhou chap rakan takka khatle mikthi taga kalumga hweini ngaake. Maanna ri baning thuk briakpina katak thang ngaake.
58005008	Maan Sa Kapaisa ngaak peida, Maanna khaangnu paanna Maan chong zeinu bachu rwe.
58005009	Maan mipu phanu toga, Bachong zeinu bing khou Maan khwa sei ringriak om bapuba to rwe.
58005010	Atiga Bating “Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi” Takolu toga Rikrwang na kou thang rwe.
58005011	Balang bi rin lang taswang khak amme. Atiyeda nani louthei maklai briakpina rin bathiang thang lang kung nge.
58005012	Balangbe atun nani bachu thangnu rwan to lang khopnu zung rwe. Atiyeda nani khou tudannu pakhatna nani ding Rikrwang om kamanu bachu thangnu ga bachu thang lat lang bathaang ammaang nge. Nani kanatnu thaisaak sanu ma sen kanu tui bathaang am maang nge.
58005013	Balangbe sen kanu tuiza in ongnu bing ga ririak senu om chong bi bathuk thei mak aangnu nunne. Balangbe maan naosen zung maang nge.
58005014	Atiyeda kanatnu thaisaak kabe patso rwan lang nge. Dinuba bani sung ga talennu paan bina kasa kasia ding theinu ngamme.
58006001	Atibriakpina Christa om thou kamanu zek bing ga asat thangluga anina mipu pha lang karamzo. Thinu chwan bing bina sung lenu om lang bi Rikrwang pek la balumsanu om,
58006002	kasin bathiangluga to bathiang thangnu om khatle kut kaising thangnu om thinu nunna ring thounu om khatle khwa sei chong kasemnu om lang bi inmun ga thwan lat lanrizo.
58006003	Rikrwang na za thangnuwe dabe anina to dingnuzo heiya rwe.
58006004	Balangbe pi baan thang owei damnu, tambaan om leithwan batem taang damnu khatle Katha Bathiangnu om badam lou bacham damnu nun,
58006005	Rikrwang om sanu chong ding khatle hung dingnu bakaan om ngam ding batem taang damnu nunna,
58006006	banina balum damme dabe bani ding sung le lat langna pi kathan lat zalan rwe. Balangbe banina bani bahak lang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding cross pi bakhai that thang late khatle Bating mi bing meithaan bi pi kazak thang nge.
58006007	Balangbe taleina bakhou khwa katupka sunta thang damnu ding innu khatle lou chwan tonu nun lang bathaang amnu tapaan pi thangnu talei ga Rikrwang khouna rithoi lousuwe.
58006008	Atiyeda haba talei bi ga kaling dannu khatle babaak karwaknu kaling kung thouwe dabe haga bathaang maak rwe khatle Rikrwang om taseng ta thang lang bakaan nai rwe. Haba om kakhamnu ga meina roulune.
58006009	Atiyeda kriangnu nun ga, anina atiga rin ong ngaak peida nani lang bi balumsaye. Ringriak sa inkunu rithoi nani lang am rwe dinu ani thei rwe.
58006010	Balangbe nani om chwan khatle bathiangnu mi rwan khou Bameng lang chungna to thang damnu kriangnu chwanlaang ga banim lang Rikrwang be ririak se maknu make.
58006011	Nani mi bing om sung khutnu ga loinu tangga tipka bachunnu anina bathaiye.
58006012	Siat siatka bachunnu ga am lang loinu tangga nani mi bingna bacham khak khakka sung khutnu anina bathaiye.
58006013	Balangbe Rikrwang na Abraham khou chongren to thang bi, bama lian inkunu am lat mak briakpina maan bahakna karenga
58006014	rinne, “Eina nating batak takka rithoi thangne khatle nakik taat inku thoulune.”
58006015	Atiga maan khaang seiga khaangnu paan bina haba chongren ga lousu damme.
58006016	Balangbe mi nunna bani ma lian inkunu ding kai basaamga chongren towe. Atiga baze rwe dinu sake khatna bani om chong swak bing ding pi loi thang nge.
58006017	Hadanga Rikrwang na Baom chongren ga lousu dingnu mi nun khou chongren ga kale latza maknuwe dinu pi thei bathiang thang nwam briakpina Baom chongren ga chongsemna pi tip thang rwe.
58006018	Hagazo Rikrwang na chong karwak lat zamaknu kale lat zamaknu lang kani bi ani meithaan bi thang ongnu bachun ga lousu langna inkam riak pi pak hung damnu anina kachui thangnu lousu lang Maanna pi tip thang rwe.
58006019	Ani khou amnu haba om baning ga ani katha lang anchor dannuwe. Heiya soi make khatle tipe. Khamthing pwan li la ga khut rwe.
58006020	Habei ga Jisu na Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi khwa sei Takolu toga, ani hut toga lampui kai thang kamanu toga khut thang rwe.
58007001	Balangbe krwang nun ding athat thangsialuga hung latnu kaan bi Abraham ding Melchizedek, Salem nampui om krwang, Basaang kataknu Rikrwang om tako heiyana, kadouluga rithoi pi thang ngaake.
58007002	Bakhou Abraham na karaan bina phun hungnu bing bina som om badam khat balaang pi ngaake. Bameng om bakaba ga kamanu bi “Ririak senu krwang” khatle kaninu bi “Salem om krwang” bakabana “Dai bazaangnu krwang” dinuwe.
58007003	Melchizedek heiya bapa maaknu, banu maaknu, bapu bapa rui maaknu khatle maan ponnu le thinu maaknu atiyeda maan Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa danga khwa sei lang tako to ongme.
58007004	Maan intia liannubo baning Phaang ngo, Bakhou pa Abraham na tangga kraan bina phun hungnu bing bina som om badam khat pi ngaake.
58007005	Atiga tako tonu pham lousunu Levi sa kapaisa rwanna batak takka zathang nung suiga mi nun khouna, dinuba Abraham na ponnu ngaaklena, bani om unao rwan khouna som om badam khat lou lang chongtan lousu rwe.
58007006	Atiyeda Levi om bapu bapa rui bi sui maknu Melchizedek na Abraham khouna som om badam khat lou ong ngaake khatle chongren lousu damnu bakhou rithoi pi thang ngaake.
58007007	Kasinnu ding liannuna rithoi thang nge dinu kae lang maaknuwe.
58007008	Abeiya thi zanu mi nunna som om badam khat louwe. Atiyeda habei ga maan ring ongme diga sake amnu maan gana louwe.
58007009	Atiga kabianu kaan bi som om badam khat lounu Levi le Abraham paanna som om badam khat pi ngaake diga rin zaye.
58007010	Balangbe Melchizedek na Abraham ding kadounu kaan bi Levi ga bapa Abraham khou am ngaake.
58007011	Atibriakpina khopsanu heiya Levi sa rwan om tako rwan om chwan thou paannaye dabe, (balangbe haba om paan bina mi nunna chongtan lousu ngaake) Aaron na to damnu chaang bi maknu atiyeda Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi takolu katei hung lat lang pa-aam bathaang amgabo?
58007012	Balangbe tako rwan om chwan thou ga kalenu kaan bi Chongtan ga le kale lang bathaang am rwe.
58007013	Balangbe phum teinu mi pakhat om lang bi heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe. Haba om phum bi gana pakhatchanale rikhaang riak pi chwanlaang to mak ngaake.
58007014	Balangbe Judah phum bina ani Pukraangba pon ngaake dinu bathiangga theiye. Atiga Moses na tako om lang bi kabianu kaan bi heiba phum om lang bi khatchale kabia dam make.
58007015	Anina rin ongnuwa bathiang rwe. Balangbe Melchizedek tannu takolu katei khat hung rwe.
58007016	Bating mi pum om zathang om chongtan nung suiga takolu pi to mak ngaake. Atiyeda bakalan maaknu ringnu ngam nung suiga Takolu pi to ngaake.
58007017	Balangbe Maanna rinne, “Nang Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi khwa sei Takowe.”
58007018	Balangbe khat pek lana kama om zathang ga sonnu khatle bathaang maak briakpina thangta drwe.
58007019	(Balangbe Chongtanna bapung phanu khatchale pi to mak ngaak rwe). Atiga khat pek la inkunu bachunnu khat phun hung rwe. Hei paanna anina Rikrwang khou banai hung rwe.
58007020	Maan chong karen thangnu sui makka tako pi tonu make.
58007021	Balangbe bani chong karen thangnu sui makka tako to ngaake. Atiyeda Bating be chong karen le bachamga Ba khou, “Pukraangba na chongren towe, Khatle Bachong kale make, ‘Nang nga Melchizedek na to damnu chaang bi khwa sei Tako to rwe,’ ” diga rinnu Maanna Tako pi to thang rwe.
58007022	Jisu wa sa inkunu chonghen om barit lou thangnu to rwe.
58007023	Meithaan tako tamga am ngaake. Balangbe thinu am briakpina bani atiga tako toga ong lang za mak ngaake.
58007024	Atiyeda Maan khwa seiga ring ong briakpina, kale lat maknu Tako to rwe.
58007025	Atibriakpina Bapaan bina Rikrwang khou hungnu bing ding Maanna bachang ga kanthangnu ngamme. Balangbe Maan bani lang hweicha thang lang ringga ongme.
58007026	Balangbe atinu bathiangnu, koi maaknu, to imphom maknu noh mi nun lak pina tei swaknu khatle tambaan bing lu chung bi amnu Takolu heiya ani lang khopsanuwe.
58007027	Takolu bingna kama bi bani bapum bapum om noh lang haba nung mi nun om noh lang kani bathin khaangnu danga khaang lang bakhou bathaang maak ngaake. Balangbe Maanna Bapum bahak ting bakaan bathin lang toga khaang oweiza toga khaang thang drwe.
58007028	Balangbe sonnu amnu mi nun ding Chongtanna takolu toga som thang rwe. Atiyeda khwa sei lang pi khopsa thangnu Sa Kapaisa ding chongtan nung hungnu chongrenna Takolu toga som thang nge.
58008001	Atun anina kabia ongnu chong bing om bakung tonu chong ga heiye: Tambaan la Ngam lian kataknu krwang takung riak om kut inchang la badung ongnu Takolu ani lang am rwe.
58008002	Bathiang Kataknu Riak khatle misana makka Rikrwang na bacha thou thangnu bazenu pwan in bi chwanlaang towe.
58008003	Balangbe takolu bing nga leithwan khatle rikhaang pot khaang lang som thangnuwe. Atibriakpina heiba Takolu heiya le khaang lang pot khat amnu zek swake.
58008004	Balangbe Maan talei ram bi ong ngaake dabe Chongtan nung suiga leithwan khaangnu om tako rwan am briakpina Maan tako tola dingnuwe.
58008005	Bani tambaan pot bing om bakatha le bakatap tonu chwanlaang towe. Heiya Moses na pwan in bacha thouna Rikrwang na rin thang ngaaknu ga dannuwe. Maanna rinne, “Nakhou rammwan la pi mu thang damnu nung suiga nangna pot bing ga bacha lang cheksinno.”
58008006	Atiyeda atunbe Maanna sa inkunu chongren bing lu chung bi bacha thou thangnu sa inkunu chonghen om Tabat le to briakpina Maan sarannu chwanlaang lousu rwe.
58008007	Balangbe kamanu chonghen ga koi maake dabe kaninu chonghen ga bathaang am latlanuwe,
58008008	balangbe bani om koi zongsuga, Pukraangba na rinne, “Maanna rinne, phaang ngo, bakaan ga hung nge, haba kaan bi ga Israel inkhun le Judah inkhun le chonghen kathan khat Eina bacha thangne.
58008009	Eina bani ding Egypt pina bani kut kaiga kalwang swaknu lumik pi ga Eina bani pu pa rwan le to thang damnu chonghen nung ga suilaye. Balangbe banina Aom chonghen bi ong ting ting mak ngaake atibriakpina Eina bani ding baningsu mak ngaak rwe diga Pukraangba na rinne.
58008010	Balangbe haba lumik bing nung bi, Eina Israel inkhun le to dingnu chonghen ga heiye, diga Pukraangba na rinne. Eina Aom chongtan rwan ga bani sung bi thanglune. Atiga bani sung bi le hei bing nga hiak thanglune. Eina bani om Rikrwang tolune khatle banina Ami nun tolune.
58008011	Atiga ‘Pukraangba ding theiyo’ diga mi bingna bainnai lounai rwan ding mak tabe bau banao rwan ding bachu latla rwe. Balangbe bani kasinnu bina thouga kaliannu tangga mi bingna Ating theilune.
58008012	Balangbe Eina bani om ririak se maknu bing ding ga phaangkriang thanglune. Bani om noh bing khatle chongtan thouto maknu chwan bing ga Eina baningsu latla rwe.”
58008013	Maanna “Chonghen Kathan” diga rinnu bi ga, kamanu chonghen ga baraan pi imbei drwe. Atiga baraan khatle balui ga baraan dam ding rwe.
58009001	Batakka, kamanu chonghen hakna Rikrwang ding kalum dingnu gong khatle talei ram om Bathiangnu riak amme.
58009002	Balangbe pwan in khat daan thang ngaake. Habei kamanu kaa bi thaomei, table khatle bathiangnu uilu am ngaake. Haba riak ka Bathiangnu riak tiga kouwe.
58009003	Kaninu khamthing pwan li bi ga pwan in om kaa khat, pum brum bina Bathiang Kataknu diga kounu riak amme.
58009004	Habei ga kachaak om ankam khatle kachaakna bataki bing lei thangnu chonghen tambung amme. Haba tambung sung bi ga manna thangnu kachaak ben, bazik kasat ngaaknu Aaron om sungrwan khatle chonghen lungpek kani ga am ngaake.
58009005	Haba tambung lu chung bi ga lwat liannu om Cherubim kanina phaangkriang kaong riak pi ga ong lem thang ong ngaake. Hei lang bi atun ani bathuk rintangnu ngam make.
58009006	Pot bing ga atiga daan thangnu nung tako rwanna pwan in om kamanu kaa bi ga katupka khutluga chwanlaang to ngaake.
58009007	Atiyeda kaninu kaa bi gabe Takolu baraanto zana sangwan bi khut leng oweiza khute. Bapum bahak lang khatle mi nun om thei makka to thang damnu noh bing ga kok thang lang khaang thangnu thi ga sui makka khut make.
58009008	Hei bing nga Katha Bathiangnuna pi mu thang nge, hagazo, kamanu pwan in ga am ong basaan, pum brum bina Bathiang Kataknu Riak pi khut lang lampui ga indao thang mak aang nge.
