58009009	Haba pwan in ga atun kaan bi lang badannuwe. Habei ga kalum ongnu rwan om kakoi baze theinu lungning ding pi bapung pha thang ngam maknu leithwan khatle rikhaang pot bing ding banina khaang thang nge.
58009010	Ha bing ga sa innu, kasin bathiangnu bachaat inza khatle kalenu kaan hung mak basaan to maknu za maknu misa pum om zek ka ani ding pi to ngaake. Christa om Thi
58009011	Atiyeda Christa na hung dingnu heiya sanu pot nun om Takolu toga hung rwe. Maanna kutna bacha maknu hei talei ram om maknu lian inkunu, inkuga bachang sanu pwan in bi Maan khut rwe.
58009012	Christa Maan Bathiang Kataknu Riak pi bakaan bathin lang toga khut owei za bi, ken chan khatle sen swan thi makka Bathi bahak suiga khute. Atiga ani lang khwa sei ran swak thangnu lousu rwe.
58009013	Balangbe sen chan khatle ken chan om thi khatle sen zan om tambutna imphomnu mi nun lu chung bi chai thangnuna pum ding to bathiang nge dabe,
58009014	khwa sei Katha paanna Rikrwang khou imphomnu maaknu toga Bapum bahak kat thangnu Christa om thi gana, ring ongnu Rikrwang ding anina kalum lang thinu chwan bing bina ani om kakoi baze theinu lungning ding intia lang inkuga to bathiang thanglu dingbo?
58009015	Ha lang chungna kamanu chonghen thwei bi ong ngaaknu koi maan bing bina kandwak swak thang lang thinu paanna kou thangnu nunna khwa sei rakhum om karen thangnu ga lousu lang Maan chonghen kathan om Tabat rwe.
58009016	Balangbe chonghen khat amnu bi ga, chonghen han thang ngaaknu mi om thinu le bathaang am lang rwe.
58009017	Balangbe chonghen khat heiya mi thinu nungna bakaba amme. Chonghen han thangnu mi ga ring ong basaan chonghen ga bangam maake.
58009018	Atibriakpina kamanu chonghen ga hakna thi sui makka som thang mak ngaake.
58009019	Balangbe Chongtan nung suiga Moses na chongtan bing ga mi nun khou bachu thangnu kaan bi maanna sen swan, ken chan thi ga tui le sendumnu mun le hyssop le louluga chongdip pi le mi bing khou kazin thang rwe.
58009020	Atiga rinne, “Heiya nanina zei lang Rikrwang na pi thangnu zathang om thi rwe” diga maanna rinne.
58009021	Heiza makka, pwan in bi ga le khatle chwanlaang tonu bi sizinnu pot bing bi ga le thi ga kazin thang rwe.
58009022	Chongtan nung suiga pot bing thina to bathiang nge. Atiga thi ta makka noh kok thangnu maake.
58009023	Atibriakpina tambaan la amnu pot nun om bakatha le bachamnu bing ga hei dannu bingna to bathiang lang bathaang amme atiyeda tambaan om pot bing ga hei ma sa inkunu rikhaang pot bingna to bathiang lang bathaang amme.
58009024	Balangbe bataknu om katha le, kutna bachanu bathiangnu riak pi Christa na khut tam make. Atiyeda tambaan bahak pi ani lang Rikrwang meithaan bi ani hut langna han lang Maan khut rwe.
58009025	Takoluna Bathiang Kataknu Riak pi ga sangwan bathin katei om thi louluga khutnu danga, Maan Bapum bahak ting chat makka kat thang lang khut mak ngaake.
58009026	Ati mak ngaake dabe talei ram dam thang khap pina thouga Maanna riangre khaang katup ong ngaak tingnuwe. Atiyeda atun kakhamnu bakaan tangnu bi Maanna Bapum bahak ting khaang thangnu paanna noh lou sat thang lang bakaan bathin lang toga leng oweiza toga Maan hung rwe.
58009027	Misa heiya thi leng oweinu khatle haba nung chong kasem lang ret thangnu danga,
58009028	mi taswang khak noh phun thang lang Christa ding bakaan bathin lang toga kat swak thang rwe. Maanna noh phun thang lang makka Bating ong ngaak ongnu bing lang ringriak pi thang lang leng ninu toga Maan hung latlune.
58010001	Balangbe chongtan ga batak makka, hung dingnu kasanu pot nun om bakatha to briakpina, banina sangwan bathin chat makka kat thangnu, bachaat khatchanu rikhaang pot nun om paanna kalumnu mi bing ding impha ni beida pi khopsa ngam make.
58010002	Hagana pi khopsa ngam ngaake dabe, kalumnu mi nun ding ga pi bathiang thang oweinu nung bani noh ammaang nge dinu lungning khatchale bani khou am latla ding briakpina rikhaang pot ka khaang lan dingnu makkabo?
58010003	Atiyeda rikhaang pot nunna sangwan bathin noh pi baningsu thang nge.
58010004	Balangbe sen chan le ken chan om thina noh lou sat thangnu ngam make.
58010005	Atibriakpina Maanna talei ram bi hungnu kaan bi Maanna rinne, “Rikhaang pot khatle potkat Nangna bathai make, Atiyeda Nangna Alaangna mi pum khat daan thang rwe.
58010006	Rou satnu potkat nun khatle noh lang khaang thangnu rikhaang pot bing Nangna pemlan rwe.
58010007	Habei ga Eina rinne, ‘Phaang ngo, chongdip pi Alang bi hiak thangnu danga, He Rikrwang Nangna baningnu to lang Ei hung rwe.’ ”
58010008	“Rikhaang pot khatle potkat, rou satnu potkat khatle noh lang khaangnu potkat Nangna bathai make khatle habei ga Nasung pem thang make” diga kamaga rin drwe. (Heiya chongtan nung suiga khaang thangnu gaye).
58010009	Haba nung Maanna rinne, “Phaang ngo, He Rikrwang Naom baningga to lang Ei hung rwe.” Maanna kaninu chonghen ga ling thou lang kamanu chonghen ga lou sate.
58010010	Hagana Jisu Christa om pum ding bakaan bing lang leng oweiza khaang thangnu paanna ani ding noh bina to bathiang thang rwe.
58010011	Atiyeda tako bingna lumik bathin hanluga, noh kok thangnu khatchale ngam maknu khaangnu chwan ga bachaat khatchanu rikhaang pot ka chat makka khaang nge.
58010012	Atiyeda Christa na noh lang bakaan bing lang khaang oweiza rikhaang pot khaang thangluga Rikrwang kut inchang la ongta drwe.
58010013	Habei gana thouga, Bating munanu bing ding Baket thwei bi kadim riak pi to mak basaan ngaakka ongme.
58010014	Balangbe Maanna potkat khatna to bathiang thang damnu mi nun ding ga khwa sei lang pi bapung pha thang rwe.
58010015	Katha Bathiangnuna le ani khou sake pi thang nge. Balangbe Maanna le kamaga rinne,
58010016	“Haba lumik bing nung la Eina bani le han dingnu chonghen ga heiye diga Pukraangba na rinne, ‘Eina Aom chongtan bing bani sung bi thanglune khatle bani lungning bi ha bing ga hiak thangne.’ ”
58010017	Haba nung bi Maanna rinne, “Bani noh bing khatle bani om chongtan thouto maknu bing Eina baningsu lat la rwe.”
58010018	Hei bing kok thang dam briakpina noh lang khaang lang bathaang maak rwe.
58010019	Atibriakpina unao rwan Jisu thi paan bina Bathiang Kataknu Riak pi ga khut lang ani khou sung raangnu am briakpina,
58010020	heiya khamthing pwan dinuba Bazan bahak pi ani lang kathan khatle ringnu lampui khat bacha thangnu paan bi naye.
58010021	Rikrwang in bi ani lang Takolu am briakpina,
58010022	kasianu lungning baning mak lang ani sung ding thi kazin thangluga khatle ani pum ding bathiangnu tuina kasin bathiang thang taang bi ani khou balumsa siat siatnu amlu bataknu sung le bachamga Rikrwang kim bi hungzo.
58010023	Anina rin indao ongnu bachunnu ga balumsianu maakka tipka choizo. Balangbe heiba chongren to thangnu Maan ga balumsa lang khopnuwe.
58010024	Kriangnu khatle sanu chwan bi khat khat ting sung pi thou thang lang ani kakhan rizo.
58010025	Mi kasem om chaang tonu danga, ani bacham kadoinu ga bathan sat makka ani khatna khat ting kachui thang kalezo. Lumik ka nai hungna rwe dinu nanina munu nung suiga inkuga tozo.
58010026	Balangbe anina bazenu ding lousu damnu nung anina theiga noh to late dabe noh lang rikhaang pot maak rwe.
58010027	Atiyeda chongsem om khatle munanu nun ding to braan dingnu balung pwan mei ding kachiga ong ngaak lang zung rwe.
58010028	Tudannu Moses om chongtan ding choi balanu mi ding sake pat ni pat thum om chong bina phaangkriang lousu makka thiye.
58010029	Atiyeda Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding kadim dannu mi khatle to bathiang thangnu chonghen om thi ding bathiang maknu pote diga chak thangnu khatle phaangkriang om Katha ding thou to maknu mi ding ga intia inkuga sia kataknu laak thangnu phang lang khopnubo diga nani baningbo?
58010030	Balangbe “Takhum baan thangnu Aomme, Eina baan thangne” diga Pukraangba na rinne. Atiga “Pukraangba na Bami nun ding chongsem lune” diga rin latnu Bating anina theiye.
58010031	Ringnu Rikrwang kut pi ta thangnu ga kachinu thote.
58010032	Atiyeda nani ding sung pi baan thangnu nung, nanina riangre kanang khaangnu om rakanga katwaknu khaang damnu, kama kaan om bakaan bing ga baningsuwo.
58010033	Balak lak pi nani ding khang meithaan bi rin basiat ngaake khatle to riangre ngaake khatle balak lak atiga sega tonu kadounu bing le nani badam lou bacham ngaake.
58010034	Balangbe ating qwan mi toga ong ngaak balei nanina kriang thang ngaake khatle tambaan la nani lang sa inkunu khatle kaling maknu pot amme dinu heiya nanina theiga nani om kasut sat tamnu lan bi ga karoga khaang thang ngaake.
58010035	Atibriakpina taswan lianga amnu nani om balumsat ka lou sat mako.
58010036	Balangbe nanina Rikrwang om baningnu ga to thang taangluga karen thangnu ga lousu lang nani khaang sei lang bathaang amme.
58010037	Balangbe “Atun bakaan kasem nung bi hung dingnu Maan ga hunglu rwe, Atiga Maan ngianlaye.
58010038	Atun ririak senu mi ga balumsanu paan bina ringlune. Atiyeda nung han late dabe, Akatha na balu chung bi pemnu maake.”
58010039	Atiyeda ani be braan lang nung han lat tamnu nun lak pi sui make. Atiyeda katha kanthangnu bi balumsanu nun lak pi suiye.
58011001	Balumsanu dinuwa bachunnu pot ka soilan rwe dinu bathiangga lou thangnu khatle mu maknu pot ting amme diga balumsa tipnu ding nge.
58011002	Balangbe balumsanu paan bina kama mi nun gana kasanu sake lousu rwe.
58011003	Balumsanu paan bina heiba talei ram ma Rikrwang chongna dam thang rwe dinu anina theiye. Haba om langna mu ongnu pot heiya mu maknu pot pina bacha thang nge.
58011004	Balumsanu paan bina Abel ga Cain om ma sa inkunu rikhaang pot Rikrwang khou kat ngaake. Haba paan bina Rikrwang na baom leithwan ga sake pi thangluga maan ririak senu manpaye dinu sake lousu rwe. Haba om paanna maan thi dam ngaak peida atun tangga kabia ongme.
58011005	Balumsanu paan bina Enoch na thinu dou makka bating lou thou dam ngaake. Rikrwang na bating lou thou dam briakpina bating zongsu mak ngaake. Balangbe bating lou thou mak balei meithaan maanna Rikrwang ding pi pem thang ngaake dinu baom heiba sake amme.
58011006	Balumsanu sui makka Rikrwang ding pi pem ngam make. Balangbe Rikrwang khou hungnu maanna Rikrwang amme khatle Bating zongnu bing khou rithoi pi thangnu Pa ye dinu balumsa ding gaye.
58011007	Balumsanu paan bina Noah na mu maknu chwan lang bi Rikrwang na rin chaak thangga, Rikrwang ding kachiga baningnu le bachamga bainkhun ding kan lang lipui bacha rwe. Haba om paanna maanna talei ram ding kakoinu bi pi ta thang rwe. Atiga balumsanu nung suiga ririak senu om rakhum lwaknu mi to rwe.
58011008	Balumsanu paan bina Abraham na bating kounu dat pi nung la maanna rakhum toga lousu dingnu talei la ga se lang rinnu zei ngaake. Atiga maan se ongnu ga inlampaibo dinu thei makka se swak ngaake.
58011009	Balumsanu paan bina maanna man ram la danga, karen thangnu taram la ga maan bazin mi toga, karen thang bachamnu om rakhum lwaknu mi to bachamnu Isaac le Jacob le bachamga pwan in bi lung ngaake.
58011010	Balangbe Rikrwang na rang thangnu khatle bacha thangnu, hagazo inphung amnu namlian ding maanna ngaakka ong ngaake.
58011011	Balumsanu paan bina Sarah bapum bahakna le nao phun lang nat lousu ngaake. Atiga maan nao lung lang bakaan hennu dat pi naosen khat pon thang ngaake. Balangbe bakhou chongren to thangnu Bating balumsa lang khopnuwe dinu maanna chak thang rwe.
58011012	Atibriakpina mi khat khouna, bapum thi taangnu dannu khouna mi sing tamga saangbaan la insi za tamga khatle basing sem lat ngamlanu tuipui paan lungtasi za cha swak ngaake.
58011013	Karen thangnu bing ga lou thang makka bani mi bing balumsaluga thi ngaake. Atiyeda namlaa lana haga phaangmuga khatle kadou thangga, ha ding ga kaponluga bani heiba talei ram bi bazin mi khatle manram la mi toga ongnu zung nge diga rin indao thang ngaake.
58011014	Balangbe hadannu bing ga rin thangnu banina lung dingnu bani bahak om talei khat rakanga zong ongme dinu bathiangga indao thang nge.
58011015	Batak takka, banina se swaknu talei ding ga baningsu lat ngaake dabe bani han lat lang badou chanu phang ngaak tingnuwe.
58011016	Atiyeda banina sa inkunu dinuba tambaan om talei ding bathai rwe. Atibriakpina bani om Rikrwang nge diga kounu bi Rikrwang na kazak lan rwe, balangbe Maanna bani lang namlian khat daan thang rwe.
58011017	Balumsanu paan bina Abraham na bating tamphaangnu kaan bi Isaac ting khaang thang rwe. Chongren ga lousunu maan gana khat tak khatchanu basa kapaisa ding kat thang ngaake.
58011018	Balang bi atiga rin thang ngaake, “Nakik taat Isaac khouna som thoulune.”
58011019	Rikrwang na thinu bina tangga bating pi ring thou thang ngamme dinu maanna balumsa ngaake. Chong lang ringa, maanna Isaac ting hanga phang lat ngaake.
58011020	Balumsanu paan bina Isaac na hung dingnu bing om lang bi Jacob le Esau khou rithoi thang ngaake.
58011021	Balumsanu paan bina Jacob na maan thina Joseph sa kapaisa kani khou rithoi pi thang ngaake. Baom sungrwan bi hai thangluga Rikrwang ding kalum ngaake.
58011022	Balumsanu paan bina Joseph na thina Israel sa rwan Egypt lana se swak tingnu lang bi ringa baru lang bi bachu thang ngaake.
58011023	Balumsanu paan bina Moses ting pon thangnu kaan bi bating banu bapana tha inthum inkam thang ngaake. Balangbe maan bathot baman sanu naosenne dinu banina mu ngaake. Banina krwang om zathang ding kachi mak ngaake.
58011024	Balumsanu paan bina Moses na maan mipu phanu kaan bi bating Pharaoh sa kamaisa om sa kapaisa kou thangnu ding lou nwam mak ngaake.
58011025	Haba hut lang noh om lo zaannu bi pemnu ma bakaan toiza Rikrwang mi nun le riangre khaang bachamnu ga maan ka thang ngaake.
58011026	Egypt om lan bing ma Christa langna kazaknu khaang thangnu gana sa inkunu lan ne diga chak thang ngaake. Balangbe maanna bameithaan bi amnu rithoi bi ga phaang ngaake.
58011027	Balumsanu paan bina maanna krwang om balung pwan ding kachi makka Egypt bathan thangsia ngaake. Balangbe mu maknu Bating munu danga riangre khaang ngaake.
58011028	Balumsanu paan bina natainu sa kapaisa ding athatnu gana bani ding to maan mak lang Takan Swaknu Balou khatle thi kazin thangnu ding ngaak rwe.
58011029	Balumsanu paan bina Israel sa rwanna Kasennu Tuipui ding tui paan danga takan swak ngaake. Atiyeda Egypt rwanna haga danga karamnu kaan bi tuina daan ngaake.
58011030	Balumsanu paan bina Jericho namlian om kapan ga banina ni siari se koinu nung baota ngaake.
58011031	Balumsanu paan bina taloi Rahab na inthim mi nun ding karoga lou thang briakpina maan chong zei maknu nun le suiga braan mak ngaake.
58011032	Atiga eina pa-aam inkuga rinne gabo? Balangbe Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, David, Samuel khatle thiamting rwan om lang bi rin ong lang bakaan maak rwe.
58011033	Bani yana balumsanu bina Krwang talei ding ngam ngaake, bazenu chwan to ngaake, karen thangnu bing ga lousu ngaake, takhu krwang bao thing ngaake,
58011034	mei om nat ting to mit ngaake, kachaak chemlem bina ring hung ngaake, son ong ngaak pina nat thou rwe, kraan bi natnu mi imbei ngaake, man ram om kraan mi nun ding kazun sat ngaake.
58011035	Kamaisa nunna bani kathinu pi ring thounu lousu ngaake. Katei rwan ding rai ngaake. Bani ding bathan thangnu ding za mak ngaake. Hagana bani thinu bina sa inkunu ring thounu ga lousu za lang nge.
58011036	Katei rwanna bani ding choi banuinu khatle bwei basiatnu khaang damme, O, parei ruina bang thangluga qwan in bi tangga thang damme.
58011037	Bani ding lungna sat ngaake. Bani ding kani swak ka rom ngaak rwe, bani ding bathem swak rwe, bani ding kachaak chemna athat rwe. Banina zao khatle ken munna pon naat toga sin basoiluga poise ngaake. Bani ga nangga, riangre khaangga rainu lousu ngaake.
58011038	Bani lang heiba talei ram ma khopnu make. Bani ramhaang bing bi, ching ram bi khatle chen lang khatle khun kapop pi poi se ngaake.
58011039	Bani heiba mi bing balumsanu paan bina mi nun lang bi sake phangsu ngaak peida karen thangnu gabe bani lousu mak ngaake.
58011040	Balangbe Rikrwang na ani lang sa inkunu pot khat daan thang ongme. Haga ani soi makka bani ding pi bapung pha thang mak lang nge.
58012001	Atibriakpina heitia liannu tambu dannu sake rwanna ani ding ong qwat ong briakpina, anina le karitnu bing le ani ding bai takka kabet thang ongnu noh ga asatcho. Ani meithaan bi amnu nampak pak tingnu ga khaang rakannu le suiga pakcho.
58012002	Ani om balumsanu om bapuba khatle ani ding pi khopsa thangnu Jisu ding phaangzo. Bameithaan bi am ngaaknu karo lozang sanu lang ga Maanna kazaknu ding thou to makka cross ka phun thang drwe. Atiga Rikrwang om Krwang kaong riak om kut inchang la ongta drwe.
58012003	Balangbe nani riangre mak lang khatle nani sung inkhin mak langna, Bapum bahak lu chung bi noh mi nun om heitia lang batannu khaang thang damnu Bating baning ngo.
58012004	Naniba noh om maitwang bi katwakka atun thi tanu tangga katwak mak aang nge.
58012005	Atiga sa kapaisa rwan khou danga kachui thangnu chong rin thangnu ga nani banim rwe dinuba, “Asa kapaisa, Pukraangba na laak thangnu ding thou to maknu to mako, Khatle Maanna nating tweinu kaan bi sung inkhin mako.”
58012006	“Balangbe Pukraangba na kriangnu bing ding twei thang nge, Khatle Maanna lou thangnu sa kapaisa rwan ding laak thang nge.”
58012007	Twei thangnu nanina khaang nge dabe, Rikrwang na sa kapaisa rwan khou danga, nani khou to thangnuwe. Balangbe Pa na laak thang maknu sa kapaisa tu ambo?
58012008	Atiyeda mi bing zana badam lou bacham ongnu twei thangnu ga nakhou hung thang mak tabe nani takhaisiasa rwan zung rwe khatle sa kapaisa rwan lan rwe.
58012009	Inkuga ani ding twei thangnu talei ram bi ani pa rwan am ngaake. Atiga anina bani ding takhwang towe. Ani ha ma inkuga katha om Pa thwei bi ong ga ring onglagabo?
58012010	Balangbe banina saye dinu nung suiga bakaan kasem lang ani ding twei thang ngaake. Atiyeda Baom bathiangnu ga anina badam lou lang ani lang sa lang Maanna twei thang nge.
58012011	Atun twei thang ongnu bakaan kasem bi karo lang make atiyeda sung pi soke. Ati ngaak peida twei thangnu gana bachu thang damnu bing ga bataang la ririak senu om dai bazaangnu kraa kraaye.
58012012	Atibriakpina son ongnu kut ting khatle son ongnu kekhok ka pi nat thang ngo.
58012013	Ket thoknu ga karing makka pi sa thang lang nani ket lang bazenu lampui bachawo.
58012014	Mi bingza le dai bazaangga ong lang khatle bathiangnu kum bi lung lang karammo. Balangbe bathiangnu sui makka pakhatchanale Pukraangba ding mulaye.
58012015	Tudannuna Rikrwang om phaangkriang bina se swak mak lang cheksinno. Pakhatchanale bakhou kakhaanu kamong thouluga mi nun ding pi katopnu mi to mak ting ngo. Atiga hei bing om langna mi taswang khak ting to braannu zaye.
58012016	Tudannu lungkoi lungmaanga khatle ririak se makka Esau na butheng khatcha lang baom patsonuna phang dingnu rakhum ga zwansa damnu dan mak lang cheksinno.
58012017	Balangbe nanina theiye, dinuba bataang la maan rithoi ga lou nwam lat ngaak peida bating za thang lan rwe. Balangbe maan mikthi taga zong ngaak peida sung le lat zanu lampui am dam lan rwe.
58012018	Balangbe to maan zanu mei chok ongnu rammwan bi, kabumnu bi, zingnu bi, thirwei natnu bi,
58012019	trumpet baraam bi khatle chongkaang om baraam bi nani hungnu make. Baraam ga ngaisu damnu bani khou chong rin thang lat mak lang hwei ngaake.
58012020	Balangbe “Khouring tangga rammwan ga to maanne dabe lungna satthat tingnuwe mak tabe thanna kaaptingnuwe” diga zathang pi thangnu banina khaang ngam mak ngaake.
58012021	Atiga mu ongnu ga taswang khak kachi zanu thot briakpina Moses na rin ngaake, “Ei kachi ga kathok rwe.”
58012022	Atiyeda Zion rammwan bi khatle ringnu Rikrwang om nampui tambaan Jerusalem bi basing sem ngam maknu tambaan chonglang nun khou,
58012023	tambaan la meng hiak thangnu pon kamanu om rupkathan bi khatle mi khang kadoi riak pi pum brum om Chongsempuba Rikrwang khou pi khopsa thangnu ririak senu mi nun om katha bing khou,
58012024	Chonghen Kathan om Tabat tothangnupa Jisu khou khatle Abel om pot ma sa inkunu chong rinnu kazin thangnu thi bi nani hung rwe.
58012025	Kabia ongnu Bating ga nanina ngai kaatnu to mak lang cheksinno. Balangbe talei bi ongnu bani khou rin thang ongnu Bachong ding ngai kaatnu bingna dwak make dabe, tambaan la rin ongnu Bakhouna pen swake dabe tatoga ani dwak ngamne gabo!
58012026	Haba kaan bi ga Baom baraamna talei ram ding pi kanuk ngaake. Atiyeda atunba chongren toga Maanna rinne, “Eina talei ram za ding makka tambaan ding le kanuk han latne.”
58012027	Atiga “Kanuk han latne” diga rinnu heiyana kaling lat maknu pot bing ding am ong sia lang dam thangnu pot, kaling zanu pot bing ding lou satnu ga pi muwe.
58012028	Atibriakpina ani kaling lat za maknu krwang talei lousu briakpina Rikrwang ding swankazo. Atiga anina takung tazeinu khatle Rikrwang ding kachinu le suiga Rikrwang khou lou thang zanu toga kalumzo.
58012029	Balangbe ani Rikrwang nga rou mut sat ngamnu mei zung nge.
58013001	Unao kriangga chat makka am ding ngo.
58013002	Bazin mi nun ding rangaaga loukhut thang ngo. Balangbe atiga tonu gana tudannuna thei thang makka tambaan chonglang nun ding chwanlaang to thangnu le am drwe.
58013003	Qwan in bi ongnu nun ding nani bani le diga qwan in bi ong bachamnu danga baningsuwo. Nani le pum bi ong briakpina siaga to thangnu bani ding baningsu thang ngo.
58013004	Tazwan bahwannu ding mi bing lak pi takhwang to ding ngo khatle ria ga to imphom mak ting ngo. Balangbe lungmaannu ding khatle rwan mei rwan basan laannu ding Rikrwang na chong kasemlune.
58013005	Nani kum ga raaamnu to mak ting ngo. Nani om ka amnu bi ga pemnu tuwo. Balangbe Rikrwang na rinne, “Ei nating khatchale bathan thanglaye” khatle “Khatchale asat thanglaye.”
58013006	Atibriakpina anina sung raangga rinne, “Pukraangba heiya ating paangthangnupa ye, Ei kachilaye. Misana akhou pa-aam to ngamlu ding gabo?”
58013007	Nani ding kai thang ngaaknu nun ding khatle nani khou Rikrwang chong bachu thang ngaaknu nun ding baningsuwo. Bani kum om kraa ga kakhanga bani om balumsanu ga sui bazeiyo.
58013008	Jisu Christa heiya inzaan le, aniya le khwa seiga bachamme.
58013009	Bachaat tei teinu khatle teithak thaknu zekrinna nani ding kai impei mako. Balangbe thaisaakna makka, phaangkriang gana nani sung pi nat thangnu ga sanuwe. Thaisaak pi sung khutnu bi ga bani lang tongnu maake.
58013010	Pwan in bi chwanlaang to ongnu nunna sa lang ngam maaknu ani om rikhaang riak khat amme.
58013011	Balangbe takoluna khouring om thi ga noh om khaangnu pot toga Bathiangnu riak pi phunkhut ngaake khatle banina khouring pum ga mi nun om inthi nun paan la mei thaang sate.
58013012	Atibriakpina Jisu na le Bapum bahak om Bathi paanna mi bing ding to bathiang lang kapan inkhaanmun paan la riangre khaang thang rwe.
58013013	Atibriakpina anina Baom kazaknu dam louluga inthi nun paan la Bakim la sezo.
58013014	Balangbe abeiya ani lang kaling lat maknu namlian maake. Atiyeda hung dingnu namlian ding anina rakanga zong nge.
58013015	Atibriakpina ani Bapaanna anina swankanu om rikhaang pot ka Rikrwang khou kat thang ting tingzo. Hagazo, Bameng bi swankanu, ani mun bina swaknu kraa ga katcho.
58013016	Kasanu chwan tonu khatle mi nun ding paang thangnu bi thou to maknu to mako. Balangbe heipai rikhaang pot heiyana Rikrwang ding pi pemme.
58013017	Nani ding kai thangnu nun chong ga zeiyo. Bani thwei bi ong ngo. Banina nani om katha ding phaang thang ongme. Balangbe banina bani om chwanlaang om singchak Rikrwang khou pi lune. Banina chunto riangre makka karoga to ding ngo. Banina chunto riangrega towe dabe nani lang kana bilaye.
58013018	Ani lang le hweini thang ngo. Balangbe balang bingza bi taluga lung nwamga kasanu kakoi baze theinu lungning amme dinuwa anina balumsaye.
58013019	Atiyeda Ei nani khou barapka hung lat lang heiya to thangnu Eina nani ding inkuga kachui thang nge.
58013020	Atun khwa sei chonghen thi paanna zao rwan om Kaliannu Zaosiannupa, ani Pukraangba Jisu ding thinu bina phunka thangnu dai bazaangnu Rikrwang na,
58013021	Jisu Christa paanna Bamikphaang bi pemnu ga ani sung bi to thangga, Baom baningnu to lang kasanu bing bi nani ding pi bapung pha thang ding ngo. Bakhou khwa sei lwat liannu to dingro. Amen.
58013022	Unao rwan, eina nani ding hweiye, kachui thangnu chong ga ngai chui thang ngo, balangbe eina nani khou chongkaang toiga hiak tamnuwe.
58013023	Ani unao Timothy ding qwan in bina bathan thang lat rwe dinu nanina thei thang ngo. Maan barapka hung nge dabe, ei maan le diga nani ding kadoune.
58013024	Nani ding kai thangnu nun ding khatle bathiangnu mi nun ding kalum thang ngo. Italy taram la mi nunna le nani ding kalumme.
58013025	Phaangkriang nani mi bing le ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
59001001	Rikrwang khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa om swak James eina lung imphaang thou damnu phum somga kani ding kalumme. Tamnu le Bathemnu
59001002	Au anao rwan ga, nani nun tamnu inza bi ta thang ngaaklena haga aih sanuwe diga chak thangluga karoga lou thang ngo.
59001003	Nani balumsat ting tamnu gana nani khaang thei lang nge dinu nanina theiye.
59001004	Atiyeda khaang theinu gana nani bachang sanu chwan to ding ngo khatle bachang sanu gana nani khatchale baat maknu to lang nge.
59001005	Nani lak pi tudannu pakhatna ningting baate dabe, mi bing za lang to kazak thang makka pi thang theinu Rikrwang khou hweini ding ngo; atiye dabe Maanna balaang pi thanglune.
59001006	Atiyeda maanna hweininu kaan bi balumsianu to makka, balumsaga ni ding ngo; balangbe balumsianu maan gabe thiraangna raang kanuk ongnu tuipui kabaapnu ga dannuwe.
59001007	Balangbe hadanga hweininu mi gabe Pukraangba khouna pa-aam aam lousulune diga baning mak ting ngo.
59001008	Sung khoranu maan gabe maanna tonu chwan lang bing bi han tipnu maake.
59001009	Kasonnu unao ding ga pi basaangka thangbi,
59001010	atiluga lungsanu bating pi bangiam ta thang bi, maanna swanka ding ngo; balangbe lungsanu maan ga lou paan danga braan damlune.
59001011	Balangbe lumik swakluga nisat nat kanu kaan bi lounana baowei taye, bapaan le chuntaye; atiluga basat kale braan damme. Hadanga lungsanu maan ga le bachwan le diga braan damlune.
59001012	Tamnu ding khaangnu maan ga aih sanuwe, balangbe bating tamnu ding ga maanna khaang ngamnu kaan bi Rikrwang na bating kriangnu mi bing lang pi lang karen thangnu luthop ka lousulune.
59001013	Mi khat ting bathemnu kaan bi “Rikrwang na ating bathemme” diga rin mak ting ngo, balangbe sa maknu gana Rikrwang ding bathemnu ngam make; atiluga Maanna le mi khat cha ding hakna bathem make.
59001014	Atiyeda bapumna bathainu gana kaiseluga namthangnu kaan bi mi bing ding bathemnu bi pi taye.
59001015	Pumna bathainu gana pum ritluga noh pon thang rwe khatle noh gana bakalan tangnu kaan bi thinu pi swake.
59001016	Kriangnu unao rwan ga, nani ding lampui pi kaimaan mako.
59001017	Kasanu khatle bachang sanu leithwan bing ga basaang la naye khatle ha bing ga tambaan la ongnu kabaannu Pa khou naye, Bakhou bakatha danga kalenu maake.
59001018	Ani ding Maanna baningnu khatle Baom bazenu chongkaang paan bina dam thangnu bing om kamanu kraa to lang pon thang rwe.
59001019	Atibriakpina kriangnu unao rwan ga mi bing zana ngaisunu bi barapo, kabia swaknu khatle balung pwannu bi bazaang ngo.
59001020	Balangbe misa om balung pwannuna Rikrwang om ririak senu bi pi hung tang make.
59001021	Atibriakpina imphom tanaatnu khatle kasianu khei bing ga asatluga nakatha ding kan thang ngamnu Bachong nakhou ling thang damnu ga takhwang le bachamga loukhut thang ngo.
59001022	Atiyeda chong ga ngaisu zanu to makka, chwan tonu towo khatle naraantoza ding minam mako.
59001023	Balangbe tudannu pakhatna chong ga ngaisuluga chwan to make dabe, maan ga katha an bi baman phaangnu ga le bachamme.
59001024	Balangbe maanna baman phaangluga se swak pi, maan tatonu mibo dinu ga banim nong nge.
59001025	Atiyeda tudannu mi khatna rang tonu khopsanu chongtan ding ga phaangnu khatle habei ga chat makka zeinu maan gana theinu ga banim nong make khatle bachwan towe. Haba manpa ga bachwan don bing bi aih sanu tolune.
59001026	Nani lak pi tudannu pakhatna baraanto bating ririak senuwe diluga bamun, babalei ding balak maknu maan ga baraanto bating minamnuwe, baom ririak ka bathaang maaknuwe.
59001027	Pa Rikrwang meithaan bi bathiangnu khatle tanaatnu maaknu ririak ka heiyaye, taraisiasa rwan khatle tameinu rwan ding bani om riangre kanang bing bi phaang thangnu khatle maan bazan bahak le talei ram om imphom tanaatnu riak pina impaanga ongnu heiyaye.
59002001	Unao rwan ga, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa lwat liannu Pukraangba ding kathing aih to makka balumsawo.
59002002	Balangbe nani hung karungnu kaan bi lungsanu kachaak kutthop runnu, pon naat kasanu sin basoinu pakhat atiluga lungsianu tanaatnu pon naat sin basoinu pakhat hung nge dabe,
59002003	nanina takhwang toga pon naat kasanu sin basoinu bating, “Nang abeiya kasanu kaong riak pi ong ngo” atiluga lungsianu batingna, “Nang abeiya han ong ngo” ati mak tabe, “Nang aket kim bi ongtaro” diga rinne dabe,
59002004	nani lak pi kathing aih toga kasianu sungna chong tonu makpo?
59002005	Kriangnu unao rwan ga, ngai thang ngo, talei ram bi lungsianu nun ding bani balumsat pi lungsa dam lang khatle bating kriangnu mi nun lang karen thangnu krwang talei rakhum lwak langna Rikrwang na nani ding ka thang thangnu makpo?
59002006	Atiyeda nanina lungsianu rwan ding balaaye, lungsanu rwanna nani ding gotnu khatle nani ding chongsempuba rwan meithaan bi kai thangnu makpo?
59002007	Nani ding kou thangnu kaliannu meng ding rin basiatnu ga bani nun makpo?
59002008	Bathiangnu Chongdip nung suiga, “Nangna nainnai lounai ding nazan ding danga kriang ding gaye” dinu krwang chongtan ga nanina pi hung tang nge dabe nani to chui rwe.
59002009	Atiyeda nani lak pi kathing aih tonu towe dabe nani noh to rwe, atiga chongtanna nani ding koi maan amnu mi pi to rwe.
59002010	Balangbe tudannu pakhatna chongtan bing zeiluga, khat pi ket basuiye dabe maan chongtan bing zei maknu to rwe.
59002011	Balangbe atiga rinne, “Lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to mako” diga rinnu maan gana “Mi athat mako” diga le rinne. Nangna lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to mak peida mi athate dabe nang chongtan zei maknu miye.
59002012	Atibriakpina rang tonu chongtan gana chong kasem dingnu mi nun danga nani kabiawo khatle chwan le towo.
59002013	Balangbe phaangkriang thei maknu bating ga, phaangkriang maakka chong kasemlune, phaangkriangna chongsem ding ngamme.
59002014	Unao rwan ga, tudannu pakhatna bakhou balumsat amme diga rinluga chwan to make dabe, haga pa-aam bathaang ambo? Babalumsat kana bating kannu ngambo?
59002015	Naunao pakhat mak tabe, nawa nanao pakhatna sin basoi maakka khatle ni khat munsaak maakka ongnu kaan bi
59002016	nani lak pi pakhatna bani khou, “Nang dai bazaangga sero, lum le lum dingro khatle bon le imba dingro” diga rinluga bani pum lang kanaanu to thang make dabe hagana pa-aam tongnu ambo?
59002017	Hadanga balumsat ka le chwan sui make dabe baraantoza thinuwe.
59002018	Kakhanno, mi khatna le rinlune, “Nakhou balumsat amme, akhou chwan amme, naom chwan sui maknu balumsat ka akhou pi muwo atiga eina le abalumsat ka achwanna nakhou pi mu thangne.”
59002019	Rikrwang khatcha amme dinu nangna balumsaye, haga baze rwe; ri kasia nunna le balumsaye atiga bani kachi kathoke.
59002020	Atiyeda he kapangnu mi, chwan sui maknu balumsat ka thinuwe dinu nang thei nwambo?
59002021	Ani pa Abraham na basa kapaisa Isaac ting rikhaang riak pi pi swaknu kaan bi bachwan gana bating pi baze thangnu makpo?
59002022	Babalumsat ka chwan le diga se bacham ngaake khatle chwan gana babalumsat ting pi bachang thang nge dinu nanina muwe.
59002023	Bathiangnu Chongdip ka hung tang lang naye, “Balangbe Abraham na Rikrwang ding balumsa rwe, hagana bating bazenu diga chak thang rwe” khatle bating, “Rikrwang baan” diga kou rwe.
59002024	Atibriakpina mi khat ting balumsat chana makka bachwan paan bina pi baze thang nge dinu anina muwe.
59002025	Hadanga rangwangnu Rahab na le chonglang rwan ding lou thangluga bani ding lampui katei la kai thang rwe; atiga bating pi baze thangnu makpo?
59002026	Balangbe katha maaknu pumna thinu ga danga chwan sui maknu balumsat kale thinuwe.
59003001	Aunao rwan ga, ani lu chung bi cheksinnu chongsem ta thanglune dinu theiga, nani mi taswang khakna bachu thangnu nun to mako.
59003002	Balangbe ani pum brum bariak bing bi ket basuiye. Tudannu khatna chongbiak laabiak pi ket basuiye, tudannu khatna chongbiak laabiak pi ket basui make dabe, maan bachang sanu miye; maan bapum ding raak ngamnu miye.
59003003	Phaang ngo, anina raqwan ding ga chong zei langna bani mun bi thin mun khap thang nge, hagana bani ding anina kai bariknu ngamme.
59003004	Li bing ding ga le phaang ngo, haga lian take; kanatnu thiraang raang hung beida lipui ding ga kasinnu li hwan thing gana bapuba maanna se nwamnu pek la pi seye.
59003005	Hadanga balei heiya le misa pum om kasinnu naat khate, heiyana lian toga chong tamga kabiaye; phaang ngo, kasinnu meirikna kamaang ding rou sate.
59003006	Baleiya meiye, sa maknuna sipnu talei ramme, heiyana pum naat nun lak pi khat toga pum tamun ding to tanaate atiga ani kum lampui ding rou sate khatle hei ding meina rou sate.
59003007	Balangbe khouring bachaat bing, basa, barun khatle tuipui bi khu chaat bing ding misana pi tehnu ngamme.
59003008	Atiyeda balei ding pakhatchanale laaknu ngam make; heiya laaknu ngam maknu, sa maknu khatle mi thi zanu huna sipe.
59003009	Anina ani Pa Rikrwang ding baleina swanne atiluga Rikrwang na Baman kapwaga dam thangnu mi nun ding le anina seng nge.
59003010	Mun khatcha bina swankanu khatle chongseng swake, unao rwan ga, ha bing ga ati mak ting gaye.
59003011	Tuipwak in khatcha bina kathumnu le kakhaanu tui lwang swak kabo?
59003012	Unao rwan ga, tacham kung bina talwan kraa mak tabe, drakha zem bina tacham kraa kraagabo? Hadanga tuipwak in khatcha bina bachi tui le bathiangnu tui lwang swak make.
59003013	Nani lak pi ningtingnu khatle bakaba theinu tubo? Maanna kasanu lamchat khatle ningting bina swaknu bangiamnu thotna chwan toga lung inmu ding ngo.
59003014	Atiyeda nani sung bi kakhaanu, antiamnu khatle balaangza baloinu gana lian to mako khatle bazenu maitwang bi chong karwak mako.
59003015	Haba ningting ga basaang lana tanu make atiyeda haga talei ram, zan pum khatle ri kasia khou naye.
59003016	Balangbe antiamnu khatle kae kanaanu amnu riak pi ga kahung kaba thei maknu kasianu bing amme.
59003017	Atiyeda basaang lana tanu ningting gabe kama bi bathiangnu, dai bazaangnu, sung bazaangnu, talu theinu, phaangkriangna sipnu, kasanu kraa, kathing aih to maknu khatle sathot to maknu hei bing nge.
59003018	Dai bazaang lang chwan tonu nunna dai bazaangnu tachi bwan thangnu paan bina ririak senu kraa ga lwak rwe.
59004001	Nani lak pi kraan saraan khatle kabit kamainu inlamna hungnubo? Haga nani pum om naat bingna lozaannu za ding bathai briakpina swaknu makpo?
59004002	Nani ra-aamme, lousu make, nanina mi athate, antiamme; atiyeda lousu make. Nani kabit kamaiye, kraan katwake atiyeda nani lang maake; balangbe nanina hweini make.
59004003	Nanina ni beida lou thang make, balangbe nanina nani om karo rangaa bi to braan langna baze makka niye.
59004004	Nani rwan mei rwan basan laannu mi nun ga, talei ram ding baan tonu ga Rikrwang ding munanuwe dinu nani thei makpo? Atiga tudannu talei ram ding baan tonu maan ga Rikrwang ding munanu mi towe.
59004005	Atibriakpina Bathiangnu Chongdipna rin thangnu ga bahaa bi zung nge diga nani baningbo? Atiga rinne, “Ani khou lung ongnu Katha gana ani ding antiamga ongme” dinu nani thei makpo?
59004006	Atiyeda maanna ani lang phaangkriang inkuga pi thang nge. Atibriakpina maanna rinne, “Rikrwang na phun liannu ding za make, Atiyeda sung bangiam theinu nun lang be Maanna phaangkriang pi thang nge.”
59004007	Atibriakpina nani Rikrwang thwei bi ong ngo, Diabol ding kakhang ngo; atiye dabe maan nani khouna pak tamlune.
59004008	Rikrwang khou banai hung ngo atiye dabe Maanna le nani khou banai hunglune. Noh mi nun ga, nani kut kasin bathiang ngo, sung khoranu naniga, nani sung to bathiang ngo,
59004009	kakouwo, chunto lo siawo khatle chapo, nani banuiga chunto lo sianu khatle nani karoga chuntonu bi pi gonno.
59004010	Pukraangba mikphaang bi nani bangiamtawo atiye dabe nani ding pi basaangka thanglune.
59004011	Unao rwan ga, nani khatna khat ting khanrai kale mako. Tudannu khatna bau banao ding khanrainu khatle chong kasemnu nun ga chongtan ding khanrainuwe khatle chongtan ding chong kasemnu miye. Atiga chongtan ding chong kasemme dabe nang ha ding ga zeinu make atiyeda nang chong kasemnu miye.
59004012	Atiga chongtan ga pi thangnu, kan thang ngamnu khatle to braan ngamnu Pakhatcha zung nge atiyeda mi khat ting chong kasemnu nang tubo?
59004013	Aniya mak tabe “Inswan anina ula mak tabe hala nampui laga seluga habei ga sangwan khat ongluga ani langgonne khatle siantong baloine” diga rinnu naniga phaang ngo,
59004014	inswan pa-aam swaklu dingbo dinu nani thei make. Nani kum ga pa-aambo? Nani kum ga batak khatcha phaangmuluga braan lat tamnu bakhut ka dannuwe.
59004015	Haba hut lang nanina atiga rin ding gaye, “Pukraangba na baningnuwe dabe ani ringga ongne, heiya mak tabe haga tone.”
59004016	Atiyeda atun nanina lian toga karo ongme atiga lian tonu bing ga sa maknuwe.
59004017	Atibriakpina tudannu pakhatna kasanu to lang theinu atiyeda to maknu maan ga noh to rwe.”
59005001	Ngaiyo, lungsanu rwan ga, nani lu chung bi hungnanu riangre lo siat langna nani chapo, chap brung hingga chapo.
59005002	Nani lan ga tanaat rwe, nani pon naat bing ga sum sa rwe.
59005003	Nani om kachaak tangka bing le taso sat rwe, taso gana nani maitwang bi sake tolu rwe khatle hagana nani ding meina rounu danga nani zan ding sakhutlune. Nanina kakhamnu ni lang lan khom thang rwe.
59005004	Phaang ngo, nanina nani lou bi chwantok mi nun om lo man ga rou siaga khaak thang rwe, hagana nani lu chung bi pao swak rwe. Atiga lou aat mi nunna chapnu khwan ga Kangamnu Rikrwang kana bi ngaisu hung rwe.
59005005	Nani nun talei ram bi lozaan ga, lung impham phaaga nani ding athatnu ni lang danga, nani sung ding bakot lianga lung ongme.
59005006	Nanina koi maaknu ding pi koi thang rwe khatle Bating athat sat rwe atiyeda Maanna nani ding kakhang make.
59005007	Atibriakpina unao rwan ga, Pukraangba na hung mak basaan nani khaang theiyo. Phaang ngo, lou mi gana baman kungnu talei ram tapaan langna karangnu khatle ngiannu khwasun ding ngaak ongme.
59005008	Hadanga nanina le khaang theiyo khatle nani lungning pi tipo. Balangbe Pukraangba na hung dingnu bakaan ga nai rwe.
59005009	Unao rwan ga, nani ding chong to mak lang nani khatna khat ting tu tu tam tam kale mako. Phaang ngo, Chongsempu ga inkhaanmun bi han ong rwe.
59005010	Unao rwan ga, Pukraangba meng bi chong kabia ngaaknu thiamting rwan ding baningsuwo, banina riangre khaangnu khatle khaang theinu ding ga bazeiyo.
59005011	Phaang ngo, batak takka, khaang theinu rwan ding anina aih sanu diga kouwe. Job na khaang theinu lang bi nanina ngaisu rwe khatle Pukraangba na bataang la balaang pi thang damnu lang bi le nanina ngaisu rwe; dinuba, Pukraangba heiya phaangkriangna sipnu khatle kriang theinuwe.
59005012	Unao rwan ga, hei bing chung bi nanina tambaan talei khatle katei katei ding kaisingga karen mako. Atiga chongsem bi ta thang mak lang nanina, “O” di dabe “O” diyo, “Make” di dabe “Make” diyo.
59005013	Nani lak pi tudannu riangre khaang ongnu ambo? Maan hweini ding ngo, tudannu karo ongnu ambo? Maanna swankanu laa to ding ngo.
59005014	Nani lak pi tudannu naanu suibo? Maanna rupkathan om chwan phunnu rwan ding kouluga Pukraangba meng bi bakhou thao kanun thangluga banina balaang kalum thang ding ngo.
59005015	Balumsaga hweininuna naanu ding ga pi sa thanglune khatle Pukraangba na bating pi nat thanglune khatle maanna noh inza to ngaaklena bating kok thanglune.
59005016	Nani ding naanu pi sa thang lang khat khat om koi maan indao kaleluga khatna khat lang kalum thang kaleyo. Ririak senu manpa om rakannu kalumga ngam lianne.
59005017	Elijah ani chaang le bachamnu mi ngaake khatle maanna khwa sun mak lang sung khutka hweininu kaan bi talei chung bi sangwan inthum tha karuk khwa tui ta mak ngaake.
59005018	Atiga maanna kalum lat rwe. Haba kaan bi tambaanna khwa pi suntaluga taleina bakraa pi kraa lat rwe.
59005019	Unao rwan ga, nani lak pi tudannu pakhatna bazenu bina lampui semaannu bating mi khatna pi han hung late dabe,
59005020	noh mi khat ting lampui semaannu bina pi han hung latnu maan gana, thinu bina katha khat ting kan thang rwe; atiga noh bing ding thinlem thang rwe dinu maanna thei ding ngo.
60001001	Jisu Christa om chonglang mi Peter eina Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia khatle Bithynia taram bing bi lung impaan ga man mi toga lung ongnu nun,
60001002	Pa Rikrwang na kamaga thei chaak thangnu nung suiga Katha om to bathiang thangnu bi, chong zeinu to dam lang khatle Jisu Christa om thina kazin thang lang ka thang thangnu nani khou phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu sipsaga pi thangnu to ding ngo.
60001003	Jisu Christa na thinu nun lak pina ring thou lat tamnu paan bina Baom tasiatnu phaangkriang nung suiga ani ding ringnu bachun bi pi pon kathan thang latnu Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om Pa Rikrwang ding swan ding ngo.
60001004	Rikrwang na tambaan la nani lang thang ongnu braan lat lanu, to basiat latlanu khatle baraanta latlanu rakhum ga nani lang khaak thang rwe.
60001005	Haga Maanna kakhamnu bakaan bi indao thang lang daan thang ongnu ringriak ka lousu lang balumsanu paanna Rikrwang om ngamna ani ding rakhi thang rwe.
60001006	Atun bakaan kasemza lang bathaang amnu nung suiga riangre kanangnu bachaat inzana nani ding sung pi riangre ngaak peida habei ga nani karoga ongme.
60001007	Haba riangre kanangnu ga naom balumsat ting tamphaang ongnuwe. Jisu Christa ding indao thangnu lumik pi naom balumsat ka meina tamphaang ngaak peida braan zanu kachaak ma kung inkunu swanka thangnu, takung tazeinu khatle lwat liannu toga dou lang nge.
60001008	Nanina Bating mu mak ngaak peida Bating kriang nge. Nanina Bating mu mak ngaak peida Bating balumsaye. Atibriakpina nani rin ngam maknu karo karowe khatle lwat liannuna sipe.
60001009	Balangbe nani Bakhou balumsanu kraa, nani ringriak ka lousuga nani karowe.
60001010	Heiba ringriak lang bi, nani khou hung dingnu phaangkriang lang bi kamaga rin basaam thang ngaaknu thiamting rwanna zong minga zong ngaake.
60001011	Bani khou amnu Christa om Katha gana Christa na riangre kanangnu khaang dingnu bing khatle haba nung bi lousu dingnu lwat liannu bing rin basaam thangnu ga tubo mak tabe intonu kaan bi lu dingbo dinu lang bi banina zong ngaake.
60001012	Tambaan lana langtanu Katha Bathiangnu paanna sacham kasam se ongnu nunna nani khou rin thangnu chamna bani rin basaam thangnu ga bani langza make dinu Rikrwang na bani khou indao thang ngaake. Tambaan chonglang nunna le haba chwan bing om lang bi inkuga zong nwam ngaake.
60001013	Atibriakpina nani sung ga chwan to lang daan ong ngo. Naraan to za napum ding karak theiyo. Jisu Christa ding indao thangnu kaan bi phun hung dingnu phaangkriang lang bi nani sung thang ngo.
60001014	Nani chong zeinu sa rwan danga thou damnu kaan bi nani pumna bathainu bi thei makka to thang damnu bi ga nani bazei lat lanro.
60001015	Atiyeda nani ding kou thangnu Maan ga bathiangnu danga nani lamchat bing bi bathiangnu towo.
60001016	Balangbe atiga hiak thang nge, “Nani bathiangnu to ding gaye balangbe Ei bathiangnuwe.”
60001017	Kathing aih to makka mi bing ding bani chwan nung suiga chong kasem thang ongnu Bating nanina Apa diga kouwe dabe nani man mi toga lung ong basaan nani lamchat bing bi Bating kachiga lung ngo.
60001018	Nani pu pa rwan khouna lousunu bathaang maaknu lamchat pina nani ding ran swak thangnuwa braan zanu pot, tangka mak tabe kachaak tannuna make,
60001019	atiyeda koi maaknu mak tabe bahiak maaknu zao saza dannu Christa om baman kungnu thi gana ran swak thangnuwe dinu theiga Bating kachiga lung ngo.
60001020	Talei ram dam mak baleina Christa ding kamaga thei thang ngaak rwe. Atiyeda nani lang tong langna kakhamnu dat pi indao thangnuwe.
60001021	Bating thinu bina pi ring thou thangga Balwat pi lian thangnu Rikrwang khou nani Christa paanna balumsa rwe. Hagana nani om balumsanu khatle baningnu ga Rikrwang khou amme.
60001022	Katha paan bina bazenu ding ga nanina zeinu bi nau nanao rwan ding bataknu kriang lang to bathiang thang briakpina khatna khat ting nani sung kalan lana kriang thukka kriang ngo.
60001023	Balangbe braan zanu makka baraan lat lanu mu, ringnu khatle khwa seiga am ongnu Rikrwang om chong paanna nani ding pi pon kathan thang rwe.
60001024	Balangbe “Mi bing nga thingna dannu zung nge. Bani om lwat bing ga le thingna louna paan dannuwe. Thingna le baowei taye, reipaan le paanchwei late.
60001025	Atiyeda Pukraangba chong gabe khwa seiga amme.” Heiya nani khou kasam thangnu sacham gaye.
60002001	Atibriakpina kasianu bing, rou sianu bing, sathot tonu, antiamnu khatle rwan ding nung ma khanrainu bing ga asatluga,
60002002	naosen angaa rwan danga, bathiangnu chong om bathiangnu sen kanu tui ga bathaiyo atiga hagana nani ding pi lian thou thang lang nge.
60002003	Balangbe nanina batak takka Pukraangba be phaangkriang theiye dinu batem drwe.
60002004	Mi nunna asat swak thangnu atiyeda Rikrwang na ka thang thangnu khatle kungnu ringnu lung Bakhou nanina hungluga,
60002005	nani le ringnu lung danga Jisu Christa paanna Rikrwang khou lou thang zanu katha om rikhaang pot toga kat lang bathiangnu thiamting rwan to lang nani ding katha in toga bacha ka rwe.
60002006	Balangbe Bathiangnu chongdip pi heiya amme, “Phaang ngo, Eina Zion bi kathang swak thangnu baman kungnu intaki lung pui khat som thang rwe, Khatle Bakhou balumsanu mi ga kazaknu doula rwe.”
60002007	Atibriakpina heiba lung ding balumsanu maan ga baman kungnuwe; atiyeda balumsa maknu nun lang “In tonu nunna asat swak thangnu lung gana Kungnu intaki lung imbei rwe,”
60002008	khatle “Heiya mi nun ding ket pi basui zanu lung khatle mi nun ding pi balum zanu lung puiye.” Chong ding bani zei mak briakpina bani ket basui rwe. Atiga habei ga ket basui lang Rikrwang na bani ding ka thang thang rwe.
60002009	Atiyeda nani ding zingnu bina Baom tasiatnu baan bi kou swak thangnu Rikrwang om lwat ka kasam se lang kathang swak thangnu nun, krwang om thiamting rwan, bathiangnu chaat khatle Rikrwang om bakung tonu mi nunne.
60002010	Kama meithaan nani Rikrwang mi nun mak ngaake. Atiyeda atun nani Rikrwang mi nun zung rwe. Meithaan nani phaangkriang lousu mak ngaake. Atiyeda atunbe phaangkriang ga lousu rwe.
60002011	Kriangnu nun ga, Katha om maitwang bi katwak ongnu zanti pum om bathainu bina impaan swak lang mi katei khatle bazin mi danga lung ongnu nani khou eina kachui thangnuwe.
60002012	Nani kasianu chwan tonu nun danga nani lu chung bi Gentile rwanna rin basiat ongnu bi ga nani nun om sanu chwan bing langna ha ding phaangluga Baom chongtok ni Rikrwang lwat pi lian lang nani om lamchat ka bani lak pi saga ong ngo.
60002013	Atibriakpina Pukraangba lang chungna mi nunna bachanu chongtan thwei bi ong ngo. Ngam amnu krwang thwei bi le ong ngo.
60002014	Kasianu chwan tonu nun ding laak thang lang khatle kasanu chwan tonu mi nun ding swanka thang lang lang hung thangnu taleipuba rwan thwei bi le ong ngo.
60002015	Balangbe kapangnu nunna thei maknu ding sanu tonuna nanina pi ong thiap thiap thangnuwa Rikrwang na baningnuwe.
60002016	Nani rang tonu mi nun danga lung ngo. Atiyeda nani om rang tonu ga kasianu chwan ding thinlem lang sizin mako. Atiyeda Rikrwang swak rwan danga lung ngo.
60002017	Mi bing ding takhwang towo. Unao rwan ding kriang ngo. Rikrwang ding kachiyo. Krwang ding takhwang towo.
60002018	Swak rwan, nani bapuba rwan thwei bi kachiga ong ngo. Kasanu khatle sung bazaangnu rwan thwei biza makka kasianu mi nun thwei bi le ong ngo.
60002019	Balangbe tudannu pakhatna Rikrwang meng lang chungna bazek makka riangre khaangga sung riangreye dabe haga swanka lang khopnuwe.
60002020	Balangbe nani noh to briakpina nani ding bweinu kaan bi nani khaang theiga khaang nge dabe hagana pa-aam tongnu bi basing sem thang lang amgabo? Atiyeda nanina kasanu ga to briakpina riangrenu kaan bi nani khaang theiga khaang nge dabe haga Rikrwang meithaan bi swanka lang khopnuwe.
60002021	Balangbe habei ga nani ding kou thangnuwe. Balangbe Baket kaam nung sui lang bazei zanu lampui bacha thangga Christa na le ani lang riangre kanang khaang thang rwe.
60002022	“Maan noh to make. Bamun bina chong karwaknu chong kabia dam make.”
60002023	Balu chung bi kasianu chong kabia thang beida Maan kasianu chong kabia katak thang make. Maan riangre kanang khaang damnu kaan bi Maan bani ding basi dam make. Atiyeda bazenu chongsempuba kut pi Bating bachoi thang damme.
60002024	Ani noh pek la thiluga ririak senu pek la ring dam lang cross pi Maan bahak, Bapum bahak pi ani noh phun thang rwe. Baom tazam bing paan bina nani ding pi sa thang rwe.
60002025	Balangbe nani lampui semaan damnu zao rwan dan ngaak rwe. Atiyeda atunbe nani Zaosiannupa khatle nani katha ding Sianthangnupa pam bi hung lat rwe.
60003001	Haga danga mei rwan ga, nani basan rwan bahak thwei bi ong ngo. Hagana tudannu Rikrwang chong zei maknu basan rwan bahak ting, chong kabia mak ngaak peida bani mei om lamchat paanna,
60003002	banina nani om takhwang amnu lamchat khatle bathiangnu gana bani ding kai hung thang lang nge.
60003003	Nani om tapon tonu ga langkaang om phaangsanu sam phannu, kachaak mak tabe pon naat sin basoinu za gana to mak ting ngo.
60003004	Atiyeda Rikrwang mikphaang bi baman kungnu, braan lat lanu lan, sung bazaangnu khatle thiap thiapnu katha gana nani om basungnu mi ding ga tapon towo.
60003005	Balangbe kama meithaan Rikrwang ding balumsanu bathiangnu kamaisa nunna le bani basan bahak thwei bi ongnuna tapon to damme.
60003006	Sarah na Abraham thwei bi ong ga bating Pukraangba diga kou ngaake. Nanina le sanu towe dabe khatle katei rwanna kachinu ding kachi make dabe nani le basa rwan to rwe.
60003007	Haga danga basan rwan, nani mei rwan ding bani sonnuwe khatle ringnu om phaangkriang lou bachamnu rwanne dinu thei thangga lung ngo. Mei rwan ding takhwang toga lung bachammo. Hagana nani om hweininu ding ga pi kham nam mak lang nge.
60003008	Kakhamnu bi, nani sung khatcha towo, khat khat ting kriang kaleyo. Unao rwan dan kriang ngo, kriang thang theiga khatle bangiam taga lung ngo.
60003009	Kasianu lang kasianu thun lat mako, kasianu chong kabianu lang kasianu chong kabia katak mako atiyeda haba hut lang rithoi pi thangbiyo. Balangbe Rikrwang na habei ga nani ding kou thang rwe. Hagana nani rithoi lousu lang nge.
60003010	Balangbe “Tudannu ringnu kum ding bathainu Khatle kasanu lumik ting mu nwamnu maan ga kasianu chong kabianu bina bablei karak thei ding ngo, Khatle chong karwaknu bina bamun khwam ding ngo.
60003011	Maan kasianu bina kanei hung latluga kasanu to lat ting ngo, Maan dai bazaangnu ding zong ga, dai bazaang lang karam ding gaye.
60003012	Balangbe Pukraangba na ririak senu mi nun ding phaang ongme, Khatle bani hweinik ding ga katak thang ongme, Atiyeda kasianu tonu mi nun ding Pukraangba na phaang batanne.”
60003013	Nanina kasanu lang chungna sung khutka ong nge dabe nani ding kasianu to ngam dingnu tu ambo?
60003014	Atiyeda nanina ririak senu lang chungna riangre kanangnu khaang ngaak peida nani aih sanu nunne. “Bani om basinu ding kachi mako khatle sung katop mako.”
60003015	Atiyeda Pukraangba ding Rikrwang nge diga nani sung bi tipka balumsawo. Nani sung bi amnu bachun om lang bi ngainu mi bing khou sung bazaangga khatle takhwang amga katak lang bakaan bathinza bi daan ong ngo.
60003016	Atiga nani ding kasianu tonu mi nun danga pi kazaknu kaan bi khatle nani sung bathiangga kataknu kaan bi Christa khou nani om kasanu lamchat ting rin basiatnu nun ga kazaknu dou lang nge.
60003017	Balangbe Rikrwang na baningnuwe dabe kasianu chwan tonu lang chungna riangre khaang damnu ma kasanu tonu bi riangre khaangnuna sa inku dingnuwe.
60003018	Balangbe Christa Bazenupa le baze maknu ani ding zanti pum bi pi thi thangga khatle Katha bi pi ring thangga Rikrwang khou Maanna phun hung thang lang noh bing lang chungna riangre khaang thang oweiza khaang thang rwe,
60003019	haba Katha paan bina Maanna qwan in bi amnu katha bing khou seluga bani khou rin indao thang rwe.
60003020	Haba katha bing ga Noah dat pi Rikrwang na khaang seiga ngaak ongnu kaan bi chong zei mak tamnu katha rwan gaye. Haba kaan bi Noah na lipui ga bacha ong ngaake. Haba li bi ga mi titcha ding dinuba, mi pat kariat cha ding tui bina kan thang ngaake.
60003021	Haga danga baptize to thangnuna nani ding kan thang rwe. Mi pum bina tanaatnu kasin bathiangnu dannu make atiyeda Jisu Christa ring thounu paan bina Rikrwang pek la sung bathiangga katak thangnu naye.
60003022	Jisu Christa tambaan lamang kaluga Rikrwang om kut inchang la ong ongme. Tambaan chonglang bing khatle ngam choinu bing khatle ngam amnu bing ding Ba thwei bi thang rwe.
60004001	Balangbe Christa na bapum bi riangrenu ani lang khaang thang dam briakpina nani le hadannu sung gana kraan pon naat tanga sin basoiyo. Balangbe pum bi riangre khaang damnu maan ga noh chwan tolan rwe.
60004002	Hagazo maan ga zati pum bi ring ong basaan misana zanti pum om bathainu lang lung lat makka Rikrwang na baningnu bi lung nge.
60004003	Balangbe bakaan khat pi Gentile rwan om bathainu anina toga ong ngaaknu ga khop rwe. Dinuba imbet boulaanu, pumna bathainu, zu kalonu, lung rangwangnu, zu in karungluga chongswak laswaknu khatle batannu ri katha kalumnu bi se ong ngaake.
60004004	Hei lang bi nanina bani nung lung braan basiatnu lung lung lat mak briakpina bani lang teithak thaknuwe diga baning rwe khatle nani ding rin basiat rwe.
60004005	Atiyeda ringnu khatle thinu ding chong kasem dingnu bani Bakhou singchak pi ding gaye.
60004006	Hei langna mi nunna sacham ga atun thiga ongnu nun khou le kasam thang nge. Haga mi pum bi misa om chaang nung suiga bani ding chong kasem lang nge atiyeda katha bi Rikrwang na baningnu nung suiga ring lang nge.
60004007	Pot bing om loi dingnu kaan ga nai hung rwe. Atibriakpina hweininu bi barak theiga, pum karak theiga ong ngo.
60004008	Hei bing lu chung bi nani khat khat ting inkuga kriang kaleyo. Balangbe “kriangnuna noh inza ding thinlem thang nge.”
60004009	Khatna khat ting rinrai kale makka pi sa pi in thang theiyo.
60004010	Nani mi bingna balaang balaang leithwan lousu damnu nung suiga Rikrwang om tei teinu phaangkriang om kasanu chonglang mi khat toga mi bing lang chwanlaang tonu bi sizinno.
60004011	Tudannuna chong kabiaye dabe maan Rikrwang om chong kabianu toga kabia dam ding ngo. Tudannuna chwanlaang towe dabe maan Rikrwang na pi thangnu nat paanna to dam ding ngo. Heiya lwat lianu khatle ngam khwa seiga Baom tonu Jisu Christa paan bina balang bing bi Rikrwang lwat pi lian lang nge. Amen.
60004012	Kriangnu nun, nani ding tamphaang lang nani lu chung bi mei danga tamphaangnu hungnu kaan bi haga nani khou teithak thaknu khat hungnuwe diga baning mako.
60004013	Atiyeda Christa ding lwat liannu bi indao swaknu lumik pi nani karo rangaanuna sip lang Baom riangrenu dam suilou briakpina nani karowo.
60004014	Christa meng lang chungna mi nunna nani ding pi kazak thang nge dabe nani aih sanuwe. Balangbe lwat liannu khatle Rikrwang katha ga nani khou ong thang rwe. Banina bating rin basiate; atiyeda nanina Christa lwat pi lian rwe.
60004015	Nani mi athatnu mak tabe baru sanu mak tabe kasianu chwan tonu mak tabe mi nun om lang bi mi nun ding to katopnu mi nun to briakpina riangrenu khaang mako.
60004016	Atiyeda Christian khat toga tudannu pakhatna riangre khaang nge dabe maan kazak mak ting gaye atiyeda heiba lang biya Rikrwang lwat pi lian ding ngo.
60004017	Balangbe Rikrwang om inkhun bi chong kasem thou dingnu bakaan ga hung rwe. Ani khouna kamaga chong to thouwe dabe Rikrwang sacham ding zei maknu nun om kakhamnu ga intolu dingbo?
60004018	Atiga hiak thang nge, “Ririak senu mi ding tangga kung takka kan thang nge dabe, Rikrwang ding kachi maknu khatle noh mi ga intolu dingbo?”
60004019	Atibriakpina Rikrwang baning nung suiga riangre khaang ongnu nun gana balumsa zanu Damthangnupa khou bani katha bing ding kasanu chwan toga bachoi thang dam ding ngo.
60005001	Nani lak pi chwan phunnu rwan ding, Christa na riangre khaangnu bing om sake khatle indao thang dingnu balwat liannu bi badam suilou dingnu ei le, chwan phunnu khat toga kachui thang nge.
60005002	Nani lak pi amnu Rikrwang om zao nun ding phaangsin thang ngo, to maknu za maknu danga tonu makka to nwamga towo; haga baze maknu sian bathainu lang makka sung khutka sian thang ngo.
60005003	Nani khou bachoi thang damnu nun lu chung bi nam danga tonu bapuba dan makka atiyeda zao nunna sui bazei zanu towo.
60005004	Atiga Zao siannu Balu tonu ding ga indao thangnu kaan bi braan lat lanu lwat liannu luthop ka nani lousulune.
60005005	Hadanga babwa rwan, nani le patso rwan thwei bi ong ngo. Nani talununa pon naat tanga sin basoiluga khat le khat thwei bi ong kaleyo. Balangbe “Phun liannu nun ding Rikrwang na za make, Atiyeda talu tanu mi nun khou phaangkriang pi thang nge.”
60005006	Atibriakpina nani ding bakaan chabi Maanna kai basaang ka thang lang Rikrwang om ngam amnu kut thwei bi,
60005007	nani om sung tamnu ga Bakhou bazwan thangga talu tawo. Balangbe Maan nani lang banang thang ongme.
60005008	Nani pum ding karak theiga khatle barak theiga ong ngo. Balangbe nani om munanu Diabol gana baraam ongnu takhu krwang danga tupai khat ting sa sat lang zong koi ongme.
60005009	Bathemnu ding kakhangga khatle talei ram bi amnu nani unao rwan le hei dannu riangre bing nga khaang ongme dinu theiga balumsanu bi tipka hanno.
60005010	Atiyeda Christa Jisu paan bina Baom khwa seinu lwat liannu bi nani ding kou thangnu phaangkriang bing om Rikrwang na nani bakaan titcha riangre khaangnu nung nani ding pi khopsa thanglune, pi tip thanglune, pi nat thanglune khatle bachaka thanglune.
60005011	Lwat liannu khatle ngam khwa seiga Balaang to ding ngo. Amen.
60005012	Nani ket kahan to ongnu Rikrwang om phaangkriang nga bataknuwe diga kachui thangga khatle sake pi ga eina balumsa lang khopnu unao khate diga baning ongnu Silvanus om sui paang thangnu paan bina nani khou toiga eina hiaknuwe.
60005013	Nani le diga kathang swak bacham thangnu Babylon bi ongnu kamaisa le asa kapaisa Mark na le nani ding kalumme.
60005014	Nani cham kriangnu om kaput thangnu le bachamga khat le khat kalum kaleyo. Jisu Christa khou ongnu nani mi bing khou Rikrwang na dai bazaangnu pi thang ding ngo. Amen.
61001001	Jisu Christa om swak khatle chonglang Simon Peter eina ani Rikrwang khatle Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa om ririak senu paan bina baman kungnu balumsat bachamnu lousu damnu nani khou hiaknuwe.
61001002	Rikrwang khatle ani Pukraangba Jisu ding theinu bi phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu nani khou pi inku kanu to ding ngo.
61001003	Lwat liannu khatle Basat pi ani ding kou thang damnu Bating theinu paan bina ringnu bi khatle ririak senu kum bi lung dingnu lang ani khou bathaang amnu bing ga Baom tambaan om ngam paanna pi thang rwe.
61001004	Heiba om paanna Maanna ani khou tasiatnu khatle kungnu chongren ga pi thang rwe, heiba chongren bing paan bina pum om bathainu bina swaknu talei ram bi amnu braannu bina dwak swakluga Rikrwang om chaang bi badam suilou bachamlune.
61001005	Hei langna nani karam rakanga balumsanu bi khei sanu, khei sanu bi ga theinu,
61001006	theinu bi ga pum ding karaknu, pum ding karaknu bi ga khaang theinu khatle khaang theinu bi ga ri baning chuinu,
61001007	ri baning chuinu bi ga unao kriang khatle unao kriang bi ga kriangnu pi inku kawo.
61001008	Balangbe hei bing nga nani khou amme dabe khatle nani khou inku thouwe dabe, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding theinu bi bathaang maaknu khatle baat lat maknu kraa kraa maknu tolaye.
61001009	Balangbe hei bing maaknu mi ga mik chonu miye. Maan mu namla ngam make khatle thou damnu kaan bi om banoh bi ga Rikrwang na to bathiang thang drwe dinu maan banim rwe.
61001010	Atibriakpina unao rwan, nani ding kou thangnu khatle ka thang thangnu ga bataknuwe dinu thei lang rakanga karammo. Balangbe nanina hei bing nga towe dabe nani impha ni beida ket basui lat tingnu om lan rwe.
61001011	Balangbe ani Pukraangba khatle Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa om khwa seinu krwang talei bi khut tingnu lampui ga sipsaga pi thanglune.
61001012	Atibriakpina hei bing nga nanina theiga khatle nani khou pi thang damnu bazenu bi ga nani tipka han ong ngaak peida, eina nani khou bakaan bathinza bi hei bing lang bi pi baningsu lang thou to maknu tolaye.
61001013	Heiba pwan in bi ei ring ong basaan, hei bing nga nani khou pi thei thangnuwa bazenuwe diga baning nge.
61001014	Balangbe ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa na pi mu thangnu danga aom pwan in ding bathan sat thang dingnu bakaan ga nai rwe dinu theiye.
61001015	Atiga akum loi damnu nung nanina hei bing nga bakaan bathin baningsu ong lang ei rakanga karamne.
61001016	Balangbe anina nani khou ngam khatle Pukraangba Jisu Christa na hung dingnu lang bi pi thei thangnu kaan bi anina mun theiga pwaknu meiri nung suiga rin dam make atiyeda ani Balwat liannu ding mikna munu nunne.
61001017	Balangbe basaang kataknu Lwat liannu khouna “Heiya Eina kriangnu Sa Kapaisa ye. Eina Balu chung bi pem thang rwe” diga rinnu khwan khatna hungnu kaan bi Maan Pa Rikrwang khouna takung tazeinu khatle Lwat liannu lousu ngaake.
61001018	Ani bathiangnu rammwan bi Maan le diga ongnu kaan bi tambaan lana paota damnu haba khwan bahak ka ani ngaisu rwe.
61001019	Heiya nani sung bi louthwan thouga louthwan insi than swak mak basaan zingnu riak pi baan ongnu baan ga danga nanina zei chuiga ongnu thiamting rwan om chong ga ani khou pi tip thang rwe.
61001020	Kama katak pi heiya theiyo, dinuba Bathiangnu chongdip pi rin basaam thangnu ga tudannu pakhatna baningnu nung suiga hungnu make.
61001021	Balangbe thiamting rwam om rin basaam thangnu chong ga misa om baning bina swaknu make. Atiyeda Rikrwang om bathiangnu mi nun khouna Katha Bathiangnu paan bina pi rin basaam thangnuwe.
61002001	Atiyeda kakoinu thiamting rwan mi nun lak pi am ngaake, haga danga to basiat tingnu bachu thangnu katap tonu rwan inkamga phun hung dingnu, bani ding kalei thangnu Pukraangba ding tangga za makka barapka bani raantoza lu chung bi to basiatnu phun hung dingnu kakoinu bachu thangnu mi nun nani lak pi le amlune.
61002002	Mi inzana bani om imbet boulaanu lampui ga sui bazei damlune. Bani lang chungna bazenu Lampui ding rin basiatlune.
61002003	Bani om ra-aamnu bi banina minamnu chong kabiaga nani ding sizinlune. Bani ding chong kasem lang meithaanna daan thang damnu ga bathaam braanlaye khatle bani om braan dingnu ga in onglaye.
61002004	Balangbe Rikrwang na noh chwan to damnu tambaan chonglang nun ding chongsem bina khaak thang makka tartarus pi bazwan thangga zingnu khun bi bang thangga chongsem lang thang damme dabe,
61002005	talei ram lui ding chongtok pina khaak thang makluga, ririak senu om chong kasam ongnu Noah le katei pat siari ding ga, Maanna Rikrwang ding kachi maknu talei ram lu chung bi tui lian hungnu kaan bi kan thang nge dabe,
61002006	Maanna nung la Rikrwang ding kachi makka lung dingnu nun khou badannu pi to thangga Sodom le Gomorrah namlian ding to braan sat lang chong to thangga tambut pi imbei thang nge dabe
61002007	khatle chongtan thouto maknu nun om imbet boulaanu lamchatna sung pi riangre ongnu ririak senu Lot ting Rikrwang na kan thang damme dabe,
61002008	(balangbe haba ririak senu manpa ga bani lak pi lung ga bani om chongtan thou to maknu chwan ding ga muluga kani khat khat pi baom ririak senu katha ding rai ong ngaake)
61002009	Pukraangba na ririak senu nun ding bathemnu bina into kan thang dingbo khatle ririak se maknu nun ding chongsem lumik om laak thangnu bi tatoga thang dingbo dinu Pukraangba na theiye;
61002010	bakung toga zanti pumna bathainu nung suiga se ongnu bathiang maknu kum bi lung ongnu khatle ngam choinu nun ding rin basiat ongnu nun ding nge. Bani sung raangga banina baningnu towe khatle lwat liannu nun maitwang bi kasianu chong kabia lang kachi make.
61002011	Atiyeda bani ma nat khatle ngam bi inkunu tambaan chonglang nun hakna Pukraangba meithaan bi bani maitwang bi kasianu chong ga kabia dam make.
61002012	Atiyeda bani nun ga namluga athat lang pon thangnu kakoi baze kakhan thei maknu khouring nun danga bani thei maknu lang bi siaga kabiaye. Atiga bani raan toza om kasianu bi mutka braanlune.
61002013	Bani om ririak se maknu om lo man ga barapka lousulu rwe. Banina thamlai kaan bi sa inluga gonlaang ongnu ga nungainuwe diga chak thang nge. Bani nani le diga sa in karungnu kaan bi bani om minamnu bi ga gonlaang nge, bani chu thangnu khatle hiak amnu nunne.
61002014	Bani mik ka lungkoi lungmaan nuna sipe khatle noh chwan tolan make. Ket kahan tip maknu nun ding banina bathem balumme. Bani sung ga ra-aamnu chwan bi talen rwe khatle bani ga taseng pi thangnu sa rwanne.
61002015	Bani bazenu lampui ding bathan thangsialuga lampui katei la thou drwe. Ririak se maknu om lo man ding bathainu Beor sa kapaisa Balaam om lampui la se thou drwe.
61002016	Atiyeda Balaam ding baom koi maan langna twei ngaake. Atiga gadana misa khwan bi chong kabiaga thiamting om ri basiatnu ding thing damme.
61002017	Haba mi nun ga tui maaknu tuipwak in dannuwe. Atiga thirweina phunse ongnu tambu dannuwe. Rikrwang na bani lang kazingnu om zingnu ga khwa sei lang khaak thang ongme.
61002018	Balangbe bathaang maaknu kana maknu chong lian kabialuga kakoinu bi se ongnu nun khouna dwak swaknu nun ding pum om bathainu khatle imbet boulaanuna bathemme.
61002019	Banina rang tonu karen thang nge atiyeda bani bahak braan dam dingnu om swak to ongme, balangbe misa pakhat ting ngam damnu gana bating swak pi to thang nge.
61002020	Balangbe Pukraangba khatle Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa ding theinu paan bina talei ram om tanaatnu bing bina bani dwak swaknu nung han latka ha bing bi ga man latluga khatle ha bing gana ngam late dabe, kakhamnuna kamanu ma bani lang sia inkuwe.
61002021	Balangbe banina ririak senu lampui ga theiluga bani lang pi thangnu bathiangnu zathang bina sehan latnu ma ha ding ga thei maknu gana bani lang sa inku dingnuwe.
61002022	“Ui be maanna kalei thangnu ga sa late” khatle “Bok ting tui kasin thangbada talei imphannu bi neng late” diga bazenu chongchakna rin thangnu ga bani khou hung tang rwe.
61003001	Kriangnu nun, heiya eina nani khou kaninu chamthwan toga hiaknuwe. Heiba chamthwan kani bi eina nani ding pi baningsuga nani bathiangnu lungning ding pi barak thou thangnuwe.
61003002	Hagazo, bathiangnu thiamting rwanna meithaan rin basaam thang damnu chong bing khatle chonglang nunna rin thangnu Pukraangba khatle Kanthangnupa om zathangga baningsuwo.
61003003	Kama kataknu bi heiya theiyo dinuba kakhamnu dat pi bani zanti pumna bathainu bi senu choi banuinu nun hunglune.
61003004	Banina rinlune, “Maan hung dingnu om chongren ga inlampai ambo?” Balangbe ani pu pa rwan thi damnu bi gana thouga, talei ram dam thou bi am ngaaknu ga danga pot bing ga atiga am hungnu zung rwe.
61003005	Balangbe Rikrwang chong paan bina tambaan na kamaa naa na am hung ngaak rwe khatle talei ram ma tui bina khatle tui bi am hungnu rwe dinu banina theiga theiga banim rwe.
61003006	Heiba tuina haba kaan bi am ngaaknu talei ram ding tui pi lian hungluga pi braan drwe.
61003007	Atiyeda atun am ongnu tambaan le talei ram ma meina to braan sat lang Rikrwang om chong nung suiga thang ongnuwe. Rikrwang ding kachi maknu mi nun ding chongsem dingnu lumik ni to braan sat lang thang ongnuwe.
61003008	Kriangnu nun heiba chong nga banim mako dinuba, Pukraangba lang kani khat heiya sangwan raching khat tannuwe. Atiga sangwan raching khat heiya kani khat tannuwe.
61003009	Pukraangba Maanna to thang damnu bing Bachongren pi hung tang lang bazaang rwe diga mi kasemna baningnu danga Maan bazaang make. Atiyeda pakhatcha hakna braannu ding bathai mak briakpina mi bingza sung le hungnu ding bathaiga ani langna khaang sei thang ongnuwe.
61003010	Atiyeda Pukraangba lumik ka in baruk mina zingpha hungnu danga hunglune. Habanizo tambaan na baraam basaang nule bachamga to braan sat tamlune. Tambaan bi am ongnu bing ga saanuna pi batui damlune. Atiga talei ram le habei am ongnu chwan bing ga meina rou braan satlune.
61003011	Pot bing ga atiga braan dam ding briakpina nani bathiangnu lamchat khatle ririak senu bi,
61003012	Rikrwang om lumik hung dingnu ding ga phaangga khatle pi barapka ongnu nun toga, nani tatonu mi nun to dingbo dinu kakhanno. Balangbe haba lumik pi tambaan ga meina bati braan sat tamlune khatle haba sung bi amnu pot bing ga saanuna pi batui damlune.
61003013	Atiyeda Bachongren nung suiga aniba ririak senu nunna lung ongnu tambaan kathan khatle talei ram kathan ding ong ngaak ongme.
61003014	Atibriakpina kriangnu nun, nanina hei bing swak tingnu ding nga ngaakka ong briakpina dai bazaangnu bi hiak maakka khatle koi maakka Maanna kadou lang karammo.
61003015	Ani Pukraangba na khwa sei khaang thang damnu ga ringriak lang nge dinu baning ngo. Kriangnu ani unao Paul na le Rikrwang na bakhou pi thangnu ningting nung suiga nani khou hiak tamnuwe.
61003016	Baom chamthwan bing bi le hei lang bi maanna rin thang nge. Haba chamthwan bing bi bakaba thei lang kungnu kasem amme. Atiga thei maknu khatle ket kahan tip maknu nunna, Bathiangnu Chongdip katei riak pi danga pu kabatnu danga bani raantoza lang braannu bi pu kabat ongme.
61003017	Atibriakpina kriangnu nun, nani hei bing nga kamaga thei briakpina chongtan thou to maknu mi nun om kakoinu gana kaimaanluga nani ket kahan tipnu bi gana pi balum mak lang nani cheksinno.
61003018	Atiyeda ani Pukraangba khatle Kanthangnupa Jisu Christa ding theinu bi khatle phaangkriang bi sing thou ong ngo. Lwat liannu heiya atun khatle khwa seiga Balaang to ding ngo. Amen.
62001001	Thoutan bina am ngaaknu, anina ngaisu damnu, ani mikna mu damnu, ani mikna phaang damnu khatle ani kutna banaan su damnu ringnu Chongkaang lang bi
62001002	khatle ringnu ga indao thang rwe khatle anina muluga sake pi rwe khatle Bapa le diga am bacham ngaaknu ani khou indao thang damnu khwa sei ringnu ga anina nani khou rin indao thangnuwe.
62001003	Anina mu damnu khatle ngaisu damnu ga nani ani le badam lou bacham langna anina nani khou rin indao thangnuwe. Batak takka ani badam lou bachamnu heiya Pa le Basa Kapaisa Jisu Christa le badam lou bachamnuwe.
62001004	Nani om karonu ga khopsanu to langna anina hei bing nga nani khou hiaknu rwe.
62001005	Bakhouna ngaisu damnu cham nani khou rin indao thangnuwe, dinuba Rikrwang nga baannuwe khatle Bakhou zingnu khatchale maake.
62001006	Anina Maan le diga badam lou bachamme diluga zingnu bi se ong nge dabe, ani chong karwaknuwe khatle bazenu ga to make.
62001007	Atiyeda Maan baannu bi ongnu ga danga anina le baannu bi ga se ong nge dabe, ani khat le khat badam lou bacham rwe. Basa Kapaisa Jisu Christa om thi gana ani noh bing ding to bathiang thang rwe.
62001008	Anina ani khou noh maake diga rinne dabe, ani raanto ani ding minamnuwe khatle ani khou bazenu ga maake.
62001009	Anina ani noh rin swake dabe, Maan ani noh kok thang lang khatle ani om ririak se maknu bing bina ani ding to bathiang thang lang Maan balumsa lang khopnu khatle bazenuwe.
62001010	Anina ani noh to make diga rinne dabe, Pukraangba ding chong karwaknu pi to rwe khatle Bachong ga ani khou maake.
62002001	Kasinnu asa rwan ga, nani nun noh to mak lang heiya eina nani khou hiaknuwe. Tudannu pakhatna noh towe dabe, Pa khou ani lang Hanthangnupa ririak senu Jisu Christa amme.
62002002	Atiga Maanna ani noh bing lang pi pemnu rikhaang pote, haga ani noh langza make. Atiyeda talei ram mi bing om noh lang leye.
62002003	Anina zathang bing ga zeiye dabe, hagana ani Bating theinuwe dinu anina theiye.
62002004	Tudannu pakhatna “Ei Bating theiye” diluga zathang bing ga zei make dabe maan chong karwaknuwe khatle bakhou bazenu ga maake.
62002005	Atiyeda tudannu Bachong zeinu, batak takka Rikrwang ding kriangnu bakhou ga khopsanu amme. Heiyana ani Bakhou ongme dinu theiye.
62002006	Tudannu pakhatna maan Bakhou chat makka ongme diga rinnu gana, Maanna se ong ngaaknu danga maanna le se ding gaye.
62002007	Aunao rwan ga, eina nani lang zathang kathan hiaknu make atiyeda nanina kama bina lousu damnu zathang lui gaye. Heiba zathang luiya nanina kama bina ngaisu damnu cham gaye.
62002008	Atiyeda eina nani khou zathang kathan hiak late, balangbe haga Bakhou le nani khou le bazenuwe. Balangbe zingnu ga thou drwe khatle bataknu babaan ga baan ong rwe.
62002009	Mi khatna maan baannu bi ongme diluga, bau banao ding batanne dabe atun tangga maan zingnu bi ong maang nge.
62002010	Bau banao ding kriangnu maan ga baannu bi ongnuwe. Atibriakpina ket basui dingnu lang khatchale bakhou maake.
62002011	Atiyeda bau banao ding batannu maan ga zingnu bi ong maang nge khatle zingnu bi se ongnuwe. Atiga maan inlam mang se ongnubo dinu thei make. Balangbe zingnu gana bamik pi cho rwe.
62002012	Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, eina nani khou hiaknuwe, Balangbe Bameng lang chungna nani noh bing ga kok thang rwe.
62002013	Pa rwan ga, eina nani khou hiaknuwe, Balangbe thoutan bina am ngaaknu Bating nanina thei rwe. Babwa rwan, nani khou eina hiaknuwe, Balangbe nanina sa maknu bating ngam rwe. Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, eina nani khou hiaknuwe, Balangbe nanina nani Pa ding thei rwe.
62002014	Pa rwan ga, eina nani khou hiak trwe, Balangbe thoutan bina nanina Bating thei rwe. Babwa rwan ga, eina nani khou hiak trwe, Balangbe naniba nate, Rikrwang chong ga nani khou amme, Khatle sa maknu bating nanina ngam rwe.
62002015	Talei ram ding khatle habei ga amnu pot bing ding kriang mako. Tudannuna talei ram ding kriang nge dabe bakhou Pa om kriang ga maake.
62002016	Balangbe talei ram bi amnu pot bing pumna bathainu, mikna bathainu khatle ringnu kum om phun liannu ha bing ga Pa khouna make atiyeda ha bing ga talei ram omme.
62002017	Talei ram khatle ha ding bathainu bing ga braan damlune atiyeda tudannu Rikrwang na baningnu to ongnu maan ga khwa sei ringlune.
62002018	Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, heiya kakhamnu chakrin rwe. Christa ding munanu maan ga hungna rwe dinu nanina thei rwe. Atun le Christa ding munanu taswang khak hung ong rwe, hagana kakhamnu chakrin rwe dinu nanina theiye.
62002019	Bani ga ani khouna se swak trwe atiyeda bani ga ani om mak ngaake. Balangbe bani ga ani om ngaake dabe bani ani le diga karung ngaak tingnuwe. Atiyeda bani pakhatchale ani om make dinu indao langna bani ani khouna se swak trwe.
62002020	Atiyeda nani dingba Bathiangnu Maanna thao kanun thang rwe khatle nanina pot bing ding theiye.
62002021	Nanina bazenu ding ga thei make diga eina heiya nani khou hiaknu make atiyeda nanina thei rwe khatle bazenu bi ga chong karwaknu maake diga hiaknuwe.
62002022	Jisu ding Christa ye diga za maknu maan ga makka chong karwaknu tu ambo? Pa khatle Sa Kapaisa ding za maknu maan ga Christa ding munanuwe.
62002023	Tudannu ngaakle Sa Kapaisa ding za maknu maan ga Pa ding le lou thang make. Atiyeda Sa Kapaisa ding zanu maan gana Pa ding le lousunuwe.
62002024	Atibriakpina nanina kama bina lousu damnu ga nani khou chat makka am ong ding ngo. Atiga kama bina nanina ngaisu damnu ga nani khou amme dabe, nani le Sa Kapaisa khatle Pa khou chat makka onglune.
62002025	Heiya Maanna ani khou karen thang ngaaknu khwa sei ringnu ga rwe.
62002026	Nani ding minam lang karam ongnu nun lang bi eina hei bing nga nani khou hiaknuwe.
62002027	Atiyeda nanina Bakhouna lousu damnu thao kanun thangnu ga nani khou chat makka amme. Atiga mi khatna nani ding bachu thang lat lang bathaang maak rwe. Atiyeda thao kanun thangnu lousu damnu bahak kana nani ding balang bing bi bachu thang rwe khatle heiya bazenuwe, chong karwak maknuwe khatle haga nani ding bachu thangnu danga nanina Bakhou ong lang nge.
62002028	Atun kasinnu naosen rwan ga, Bating indao thangnu kaan bi anina balumsanu am lang khatle Maan hungnu kaan bi Bameithaan bi kazak mak lang Bakhou chat makka ong ngo.
62002029	Maan ga ririak senuwe dinu nanina theiye dabe, bazenu chwan to ongnu maan ga Bakhouna ponnuwe dinu nani theiye.
62003001	Phaang ngo, ani ding Rikrwang sa rwan diga kou thangnu heiya Pa na ani ding intia lang kriang thangnubo. Atibriakpina talei ramna ani ding thei make, balangbe banina Bating thei mak ngaake.
62003002	Kriangnu rwan ga, atun ani Rikrwang sa rwan to rwe. Atun ani pa-aam to dingbo dinu indao swak mak aang nge. Atiyeda anina theiye dinuba Bating indao thangnu kaan bi ani Maan danlune. Balangbe Bating Bahak anina phaangmulune.
62003003	Bakhou heiba bachun amnu bingna Maanna bathiangnu danga baraantoza to bathiang nge.
62003004	Tudannu ngaakle noh tonu maan ga chongtan thouto maknuwe. Noh dinuwa chongtan thou to maknu ding nge.
62003005	Ani noh lou sat thang langna Bating indao thang damnuwe dinu nanina theiye. Bakhou noh dinu maake.
62003006	Tudannu Bakhou ongnu maan ga noh to make. Tudannu noh tonu maan gabe Bating mu mak aang nge, thei le thei mak aang nge.
62003007	Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, pakhatchanale nani ding minam mak ting ngo. Maan bazenu danga, ririak senu chwan tonu maan ga bazenuwe.
62003008	Noh tonu maan ga Diabol khou naye, balangbe Diabol ga thoutan bina noh to rwe. Ha langna Diabol chwan bing ding Maanna to braan lang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding indao thang rwe.
62003009	Tudannu Rikrwang khouna ponnu maan ga noh to make. Balangbe bakhou Baom bamuga amme. Atiga maan Rikrwang khouna pon briakpina noh tonu ngam make.
62003010	Heiyana bani Rikrwang sa rwan khatle Diabol sa rwanne dinu indaowe. Dinuba tudannu ririak senu chwan to maknu, baunao rwan ding kriang maknu maan ga Rikrwang khouna make.
62003011	Balangbe thoutan bina nanina ngaisu damnu sacham ga heiye, hagazo nani khat le khat kriang kale ding gaye dinu heiya rwe.
62003012	Sa maknu pa om toga banao ding athat tamnu Cain danla ding gaye. Pa-aam langna banao ding athat tamnubo? Balangbe bachwan bing ga sa mak ngaake khatle banao om chwan bingbe ririak senu chwan ngaake.
62003013	Aunao rwan ga, talei ramna nani ding batanne dabe nani loh lo mako.
62003014	Aniba thinu bina ringnu bi takan swak rwe dinu anina theiye. Balangbe anina ani unao rwan ding kriang nge. Tudannu baunao ding kriang maknu maan ga thinu bi ong maang nge.
62003015	Tudannu baunao ding kriang maknu maan ga mi athatnuwe khatle tudannu mi athatnu bakhou ga khwa sei ringnu maake dinu nanina theiye.
62003016	Heiyana kriangnu dinuwa anina bapu theiye dinuba Maanna ani lang Bakum pi swak thang rwe, atiga anina le ani unao rwan langna ani kum pi swak tingnu rwe.
62003017	Atiyeda tudannuna talei ram om tonu pot amluga, baunao lang bathaang amnu ding muluga bakhou kriangnu lungning maake dabe, bakhou Rikrwang om kriang ga tatoga am dingbo?
62003018	Kasinnu asa rwan ga, ani chongkaang mak tabe baleina kriangnu to makcho atiyeda chwan le bazenu gana kriangzo.
62003019	Heiba paanbina ani nun bazenu khou naye khatle hagana Bameithaan bi ani sung pi tip thanglune dinuwa anina theiye.
62003020	Balangbe ani sungna ani ding pi koi ngaake dabe, Rikrwang ba ani ma lian inkunuwe khatle Maanna pum brumza theiloiye.
62003021	Kriangnu nun ga, ani sungna ani ding pi koi mak tabe, Rikrwang meithaan bi ani balumsanu amme.
62003022	Anina ninu bing ga Bakhouna lousu rwe, balangbe anina Baom zathang bing ga zeiye khatle anina Bamikphaang bi pi pemnu chwan bing ga towe.
62003023	Heiya Baom zathang gaye dinuba anina Basa Kapaisa Jisu Christa meng bi balumsa ding gaye khatle Maanna ani khou zathang pi thangnu danga ani khat le khat kriang kale ding gaye.
62003024	Tudannu zathang zeinu maan ga Bakhou ongnuwe khatle Maanna le bakhou ongnuwe. Heiyana Maan ani khou ong ongme dinu anina theiye. Haga Maanna ani lang pi thangnu Katha paan bi naye.
62004001	Kriangnu nun ga, katha bing ding balumsa mako. Atiyeda katha bing ga Rikrwang khounamo dinu tamphaang ngo. Balangbe kakoinu thiamting tamga talei ram bi se swak trwe.
62004002	Heiyana nanina Rikrwang om Katha ding theiye dinuba, Jisu Christa misa pum toga hung rwe dinu ding rin indaonu katha bing ga Rikrwang khou naye.
62004003	Christa ga misa pum toga hung rwe dinu ding rin indao maknu katha bing ga Rikrwang khouna make. Haga Christa ding munanu gaye. Haga hunglune diga nanina ngaisu damnu ga atun talei ram bi hung rwe.
62004004	Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, naniba Rikrwang khou naye khatle nanina bani ding ngam rwe. Balangbe nani khou am ongnu Maan gana talei ram bi am ongnu bama lian inkuwe.
62004005	Bani ga talei ram omme atibriakpina banina talei ram om chong kabiaye khatle talei ramna bani chong ngaiye.
