62004006	Aniba Rikrwang om zung nge, Rikrwang ding theinu maan gana ani chong ding ngaiye. Rikrwang om maknu gana ani chong ngai thang make. Heiyana anina bazenu katha khatle kakoinu katha ding bapu theiye.
62004007	Kriangnu nun ga, ani khat le khat kriang kalezo, balangbe kriangnuwa Rikrwang khou naye. Kriang theinu maan ga Rikrwang khouna ponnuwe khatle maanna Rikrwang ding theiye.
62004008	Tudannu kriang thei maknu maan gana Rikrwang ding thei make, balangbe Rikrwang Maan ga kriangnuwe.
62004009	Heiyana Rikrwang om kriang ga ani khou indao thang rwe dinuba, Bapaan bina ani ring dam lang Rikrwang na Khat tak Khatchanu Basa Kapaisa ding talei ram bi lang hung thang rwe.
62004010	Kriangnu dinuwa abeiya amme, anina Rikrwang ding kriang rwe dinu make. Atiyeda Maanna ani ding kriang briakpina, Basa Kapaisa ding ani noh bing langna pi pemnu rikhaang pot to lang lang hung thang rwe dinuwe.
62004011	Kriangnu nun ga, Rikrwang na ani ding atiga kriang thang nge dabe, ani le khatna khat ting kriang kale dingnu rwe.
62004012	Pakhatchanale Rikrwang ding impha ni beida mu mak aang nge. Atiyeda anina khat le khat kriang kaleye dabe, Rikrwang na ani khou ong thang nge khatle Bakriang ga ani khou khopsanu to rwe.
62004013	Heiyana ani Bakhou ong ongme, Maanna le ani khou ong ongme dinu anina theiye. Balangbe Maanna ani khou Bakatha pi thang rwe.
62004014	Pa na Sa Kapaisa ding talei ram ding Kanthangnupa toga lang hungnu ding anina mu rwe khatle sake pi rwe.
62004015	Tudannuna Jisu wa Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye diga rin swaknu bakhou ga Rikrwang na ong thang nge khatle maan le Rikrwang khou ongnuwe.
62004016	Rikrwang na ani ding kriang thangnu ga anina thei rwe khatle balumsa rwe. Rikrwang nga kriangnu gaye, kriangnu bi ongnu maan ga Rikrwang khou ongnuwe khatle Rikrwang na le bakhou ong ongme.
62004017	Atiga chongsem ni ga ani nun dai bazaangnu am lang Bakriang ga ani khou khopsaga pi thang rwe. Balangbe Maan bahak am ongnu danga ani nun le talei ram bi am ongme.
62004018	Kriangnu bi kachinu maake. Atiyeda khopsanu kriang gana kachinu ding bathou sate. Balangbe kachinu bi ga rainu amme. Atiga kachinu maan ga kriangnu bi khopsa make.
62004019	Anina Bating kriang nge balangbe Maanna ani ding kriang kama ngaak rwe.
62004020	Mi khatna, “Ei Rikrwang ding kriang nge” diga rinluga, bau banao ding batannu maan ga chong karwaknu miye. Balangbe maanna mikna munu bau banao ding kriang make dabe, tatoga mu maknu Rikrwang ding kriangnu ngam dingbo?
62004021	Bakhouna lousunu zathang ga heiye, hagazo tu ngaakle Rikrwang ding kriangnu maan gana bau banao ding le kriang ding gaye.
62005001	Tudannu Jisu wa Christa ye diga balumsanu maan ga Rikrwang khouna ponnuwe. Tudannu Bapa ding kriangnu maan gana Maanna pon thangnu Bating le kriang nge.
62005002	Anina Rikrwang ding kriang ga Baom zathang bing zeiga ongnu heiyana anina Rikrwang sa rwan ding kriang nge dinu theiye.
62005003	Balangbe anina Baom zathang bing zeinuwa Rikrwang ding kriangnuwe. Baom zathang bing ga potrit make.
62005004	Balangbe Rikrwang khouna ponnu bing gana talei ram ding kraan ngam rwe. Talei ram ding kraan ngamnu kraan ngam ga heiye, hagazo ani om balumsat heiye.
62005005	Jisu ding Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ye diga balumsanu maan ga makka talei ram ding kraan ngamnu maan ga tubo?
62005006	Tui le thi paan bina hung ngaaknu Maan ga Jisu Christa ye. Maan tui paan zana makka, tui le thi paan bina hung rwe. Haga Katha na sake to rwe. Balangbe Katha ga bazenuwe.
62005007	Balangbe tambaan la sake tonu pat thum amme hagazo Pa, Chongkaang khatle Katha Bathiangnu gaye. Hei inthumma khatcha zwe.
62005008	Talei ram bi le sake pinu pat thum amme, hagazo Katha, tui khatle thiye, bani pat thum khatcha toga zakaleye.
62005009	Anina mi nun om sake lousuwe dabe Rikrwang om sake gana lian inkuwe. Balangbe Rikrwang om sake ga heiye dinuba, Maanna Basa Kapaisa om lang bi sake pi rwe.
62005010	Tudannu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding balumsanu bakhou ga sake amme. Tudannu Bating balumsa maknu maan gana Bating chong karwaknu pi to rwe. Balangbe Basa Kapaisa lang bi Rikrwang na sake pinu ding ga maanna balumsa make.
62005011	Atiga sake ga heiye, Rikrwang na ani lang ringzoknu kum pi thang rwe khatle ringnu ga Basa Kapaisa khou amme.
62005012	Basa Kapaisa ding lousunu maan ga ringnu lousu rwe. Atiga tudannu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ding lousu maknu bakhou ga ringnu ga maake.
62005013	Nani khou khwa sei ringnu ga am rwe dinu thei lang khatle Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa meng bi balumsanu bi nani ong dam lang Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa meng bi balumsanu nani khou eina hei bing nga hiaknuwe.
62005014	Bakhou anina balumsanu gazo heiya rwe, dinuba Maanna baningnu nung suiga anina pa-aam ngaakle niye dabe Maanna ani lang katak thang nge.
62005015	Anina ninu bing ga Maanna katak thang nge diga anina theiye dabe, anina Bakhou ninu bing ga lousu rwe dinu anina theiye.
62005016	Tudannuna banao khatna thi lang khop maknu noh tonu muwe dabe, maanna hweini thang ding gaye. Atiga thi lang khop maknu noh tonu mi nun lang Maanna ringnu ga pi thanglune. Pi thinu noh amme, hei lang bi maan hweini thang ding gaye diga eina rinnnu make.
62005017	Ririak se maknu chwan bing ga nohwe khatle thi lang khop maknu noh amme.
62005018	Tudannu Rikrwang khouna ponnu bing gana noh to make dinu anina theiye. Atiyeda Rikrwang khouna ponnu maan gana bazan ding raak theiye. Atiga kasianu gana bating banaan make.
62005019	Aniba Rikrwang khou naye khatle talei ram bing nga sa maknupa thwei bi ong rwe dinu anina theiye.
62005020	Rikrwang Sa Kapaisa ga hung rwe dinu anina theiye atiga Bazenu Bating anina thei lang ani khou bakaba theinu pi thang rwe. Basa Kapaisa Jisu Christa Bazenu Bakhou ani ong rwe. Heiya bazenu Rikrwang khatle khwa sei ringnu kum ga rwe.
62005021	Kasinnu naosen rwan ga, nani ri katha khouna impaan ga ong ngo. Amen.
63001001	Chwan phunnu eina, kathang swaknu kamaisa khatle basa rwan, bazenu bi eina kriangnu, ei zana makka bazenu ding thei damnu bingna le kriang ongnu nani khou,
63001002	ani khou am ongnu khatle khwa seiga ani le ong bacham dingnu bazenu om langna,
63001003	Pa Rikrwang khatle Pa om Sa Kapaisa Pukraangba Jisu Christa khouna bazenu khatle kriangnu bi phaangkriang, kriang thang theinu khatle dai bazaangnu ga nani le diga ong bacham thang ding ngo.
63001004	Anina Pa khouna zathang lousunu ga danga, nasa rwanna le bazenu bi se ongme dinu theiluga ei karo take.
63001005	Atun eina kamaisa, nakhou hweinuwe, zathang kathan eina nakhou hiaknu dannu make. Atiyeda anina kama bina lousu damnu ga danga, ani khat le khat kriang kale dingnuwe dinu heiya rwe.
63001006	Anina Baom zathang nung suiga senuwa kriangnu gaye. Nanina kama bina ngaisu damnu ga danga, haba nung suiga nani se dingnu rwe dinu zathang ga heiya rwe.
63001007	Balangbe Jisu Christa pum toga talei ram bi hung rwe dinu ding za maknu, minamnu mi taswang khak talei ram bi se swak trwe. Heiya minamnu khatle Christa ding munanu ga rwe.
63001008	Anina to damnu ga nanina to braannu to makka atiyeda sipsanu taswan ga lou langna nani nani raantoza barak theiga ong ngo.
63001009	Tudannu Christa om zekrin se maknu, koi maannu maan gana Rikrwang ding lou thang make. Tudannu Christa om zekrin bi ongnu maan gana Pa khatle Sa Kapaisa ding lousu rwe.
63001010	Tudannu pakhatna nakim bi hungluga heiba zekrin heiya phun hung make dabe, bating nain bi loukhut mako khatle bating takung tazei to thang mako.
63001011	Balangbe tudannu bating takungga to thangnu maan ga baom sa maknu chwan bing om badam lou bachamnuwe.
63001012	Nani khou hiak lang taswang khak am beida ei che le mukna hiakla rwe. Atiyeda ani karoga khopsanu to langna, ei hungluga ani mai le mai kadouluga chong kabia lang ei baning rwe.
63001013	Kathang swaknu nasannu sa rwanna nating kalumme. Amen.
64001001	Chwan phunnu eina bazenu bi kriangnu Gaius nakhou heiba chamthwanna hiaknuwe.
64001002	Eina kriangnu, nakatha na lian thounu ga danga, chwan lang bing bi nang lian thounu khatle napum sanu to lang eina kalumme.
64001003	Balangbe nangna bazenu bi se ongnu danga unao rwanna hungluga naom bazenu lang bi sake pi briakpina ei karo take.
64001004	Asa rwanna bazenu bi se ongme dinu eina ngaisunu kaan bi akhou ha ma karo liannu katei maake.
64001005	Eina kriangnu, nangna unao rwan khatle man nun lang banang thangnu bing bi balumsa lang khopnu chwan to rwe.
64001006	Banina rupkathan meithaan bi, naom kriangnu chwan lang bi sake pi rwe. Nangna Rikrwang lang khopsanu lung bi bani bazin lamsek pi katha swak thang nge dabe nang to chui rwe.
64001007	Balangbe banina Bameng lang chungna Gentile rwan khouna khatchale lou makka se swak tamnu rwe.
64001008	Atibriakpina anina bazenu chwan ga to bacham langna hei rwan ding nga loukhut thang dingnu rwe.
64001009	Eina rupkathan khou chong kasem hiake. Atiyeda nani lak pi balu to nwamnu Diotrephes na ani ding lou thang make.
64001010	Maanna ani lu chung bi sa maknu chong bing kabiaga to damnu bachwan bing ga ei baningsune. Ha zana pem makka, maan bahakna unao rwan ding lou thang make, hung nwamnu nun ding le khaamme. Bani ding rupkathan bina lou sate.
64001011	Eina kriangnu, kasianu ding ga bazei mako. Atiyeda kasanu ding bazeiyo. Kasanu tonu maan ga Rikrwang omme. Atiyeda kasianu tonu maan ga Rikrwang ding mu mak aang nge.
64001012	Mi bing zana Demetrius om kasanu lang bi sake pi rwe khatle bazenu gana baom sake to rwe khatle anina le sake pi rwe. Atiga ani om sake ga bazenuwe dinu nanina thei rwe.
64001013	Ei hiak lang am sip amme atiyeda eina kolom khatle mukna hiak nwam lan rwe.
64001014	Atiyeda eina nating karangga kadou lang bachun ongme. Atiga ani mai le mai pon kadou kaleluga meiri rai lang baning nge. Nakhou dai bazaangnu am ding ngo. Ani baan rwanna le nating kalumme. Baan rwan bing ding meng panga kalum thang ngo.
65001001	Jisu Christa om swak, James nao kapaisa Jude eina, kou swak thangnu nun, Pa Rikrwang na to bathiang thangnu khatle Jisu Christa khou ngaak thang ongnu nani nun khou,
65001002	phaangkriang, dai bazaangnu khatle Bakriang ga inku thounu to ding ngo.
65001003	Kriangnu nun ga, anina pum brumza phangsu damnu ringriak lang bi hiak lang karam ong bi, bathiangnu mi nun khou bakaan bing lang toga pi thang damnu balumsat langna sung khutka katwak lang nani ding kachui thang lang eina hiaknuwa twansa maknu ngaake.
65001004	Balangbe mi kasem inkamga hung tang rwe, heiba chongtok langna bani ding kamana thouga kathang swak thangnu am ngaak rwe. Ha rwan ga Rikrwang ding kachi maknu, ani Rikrwang om phaangkriang ding imbet boulaanu bi pi gon swaknu khatle khat tak khatchanu ani om Pukraangba Rikrwang khatle ani om Pukraangba Jisu Christa ding za maknu mi nunne.
65001005	Atiyeda nanina heiya thei thang owei ngaak peida eina nani ding pi baning su thang nwamme, hagazo, Pukraangba na mi nun ding Egypt talei bina kan thangluga balumsa maknu mi nun ding bataang la to braan sat tamme.
65001006	Atiga bani ong dingnu riak ting bathan sat thangnu tambaan chonglang rwan ding Maanna tasiatnu chongsem ni lang zingnu bi khwa seinu parei ruina bang thang rwe.
65001007	Hadanga Sodom le Gomorrah khatle am koinu namlian bi mi nunna le lungkoi lungmaan ongnu mi nun khatle kapaisa cham, kamaisa cham kazaknu chwan tonu nun ga khwa seinu meina chong tonu ding khaangga badan lang pi am thang rwe.
65001008	Hadanga mang mannu bing gana bani pum ding to tanaat rwe, banina ngam amnu nun khatle lwat liannu bing ding rin basiate.
65001009	Atiyeda tambaan chonglang kaliannu Michael na Diabol le diga kana kalega Moses pum lang bi kaenu kaan bi Michael na balu chung bi rin basiatnu chongtok chong rin swak raang mak ngaake atiyeda “Pukraangba na nating twei ding ngo” diga maanna rin ngaake.
65001010	Atiyeda heiba mi nunna thei maknu om lang bi rin basiate atiga bachaang toga banina theinu bi ga kakhan thei maknu khouring danga hei bing bi ya bani raanto bani ding to braan rwe.
65001011	Bani lang aih sianuweda, balangbe bani Cain lampui la thou drwe, bani nun ra-aamga sian tong baloi langna Balaam om kakoinu bi pak khut rwe khatle Korah om maitwangnu chongbiak pi ga bani braan drwe.
65001012	Heiba mi nunna nani om kriangnu thaisaak sa karungnu kaan bi kachinu maakka nani le diga sa karung ongnu kaan bi bani langza kakhannu khanpan lang amnu nunne. Bani ga thiraangna phunse ongnu tui maaknu tambu dannu bakraa kraa maknu takaan phaa thingkung, thi leng ninu, bakamong phok zok swaknu thingkung dannuwe.
65001013	Bathot sianu tuipui kabaapnu danga bani raan toza om kazaknu ga tuiphon danga phunka ongme khatle khwa sei kazingnu om zingnu ga bani lang khaak thang ongnu zwang koi ongnu insi ga dannuwe.
65001014	Adam khouna mikin siari tangnu Enoch na heiba mikin om lang bi atiga rin bachak thang nge, “Phaang ngo, Pukraangba na Baom bathiangnu rwan raching raching ding kalwangluga hung nge.
65001015	Mi bing lu chung bi chong to lang khatle Rikrwang ding kachi maknu nun om Rikrwang ding kachi maknu chwan bing, Rikrwang ding kachi maknu lung bi to thang damnu ga khatle Bamaitwang bi Rikrwang ding kachi maknu noh mi nunna kasianu chong kabia damnu bing ga indao lang hung rwe.”
65001016	Ha rwan ga tu tu tam tamnu nun, koi zongnu, bani ga bani pum om bathainu nung suiga senu mi nunne. Bani ga bani lang tong langza mi nun ding rinswanga chong lian kabiaye.
65001017	Atiyeda kriangnu nun ga, ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om chonglang rwanna kama rin thangnu chong bing ga nani baningsuwo.
65001018	Dinuba, “Kakhamnu kaan bi Rikrwang ding kachi makka bani zanna bathainu nung suiga senu choi banuinu nun amlune” diga banina nani khou rin thang ngaake.
65001019	Ha rwan ga khak lang swaknu nun, talei lungning phunnu nun khatle Rikrwang Katha maaknu mi nunne.
65001020	Atiyeda kriangnu nun ga, nani om bathiang kataknu balumsat pi nani raantoza bacha thouga, Katha Bathiangnu bi hweiniga,
65001021	ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriang khwa sei ringnu kum ding taraan ga ong ngaakka Rikrwang kriang sung bi ong ngo.
65001022	Atiga balumsia ongnu mi nun lu chung bi kriang thangbiyo.
65001023	Atiyeda mi kasem ding kachinu le suiga mei bina kai swakluga kan thang ngo khatle zan pumna to tanaatnu bani om sin basoi ding ga batanno.
65001024	Nani ding ket basui dingnu bina rakhi thang ngamnu khatle koi maan maakka tasiatnu karo le bachamga Baom lwat liannu meithaan bi pi han thang ngamnu Bakhou
65001025	khatle khat tak khatchanu ani ding Kanthangnupa, Baraantoza ningtingnu Rikrwang khou lwat liannu khatle takungnu, nat, ngam atunna thouga khwa seinu to ding ngo. Amen.
66001001	Barapnu sung bi swak tingnu om lang bing ga Christa na baswak rwan khou pi mu thang lang Rikrwang na bakhou pi thang damnu Jisu Christa om indao thangnu ga heiye. Maanna Baswak John khou baom tambaan chonglang ding lang thangluga haga pi thei thang rwe.
66001002	John na Rikrwang chong khatle Jisu Christa om sake lang bi khatle maanna mu damnu bing om lang bi sake pi rwe.
66001003	Heiba chong rin swaknu chong bing ding panu, ngaisunu khatle heiba riak pi hiak thang ongnu bing ding zeinu bani ga aih sanuwe. Balangbe bakaan ga nai rwe.
66001004	John na Asia bi amnu rupkathan siari khou, am ongnu, am ngaaknu khatle hung dingnu Bakhouna khatle Baom Krwang takung riak meithaan bi amnu Katha siari khouna
66001005	khatle balumsa zanu sake, thinu nun lak pina pon kamanu khatle talei ram krwang nun lu chung bi bapuba to ongnu Jisu Christa khouna nani khou phaangkriang khatle dai bazaangnu am ding ngo. Ani ding kriang thangnu khatle ani noh bing ding Bathi bahakna to bathiang thangnu Bakhou,
66001006	Baom Rikrwang khatle Pa khou ani ding krwang rwan khatle tako rwan pi to thangnu Bakhou lwat liannu khatle ngam khwa seiga am ding ngo. Amen.
66001007	Phaang ngo, Maan tambu le bachamga hungna rwe, mik bingna Bating mulune khatle Bating sungna chou damnu nunna tangga Bating mulune. Baom lang bina talei bi mi chaat bingna nu hweilune. O. Amen.
66001008	“Eiya Alpha khatle Omega, Thoutannu khatle Loinuwe, am ongnu, am ngaaknu khatle hung dingnu Ngam Bachangnu gaye” diga Pukraangba na rinne.
66001009	Nani unao, nani le diga riangre kanang bi, krwang talei la khatle Jisu Christa om khaang theinu bi, badam lou bacham ongnu John eiya, Rikrwang chong khatle Jisu Christa om sake langna Patmos tiga kounu tuikoi ram bi ong ngaake.
66001010	Pukraangba lumik pi ei Katha bi ong ngaake khatle anung pek la trumpet baraam dannu baraam basaangnu khat thei rwe.
66001011	Atiga rinne, “Ei Alpha khatle Omega, Kamanu khatle Kakhamnuwe” khatle “Nangna phaangmunu ga chongdip pi hiak thang ngo khatle haga Asia bi amnu rupkathan siari khou dinuba, Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamos, Thyatira, Sardis Philadelphia khatle Laodicea la bathanno.”
66001012	Akhou kabia ongnu baraam ding phaang lang eina kanei swak ngaake. Atiga eina kanei swaknu kaan bi kachaak thaomei ket siari ding mu rwe.
66001013	Thaomei ket siari lak pi ketmik tangga pon baswannu sin basoinu khatle kachaang bi kachaak khap khaaknu, Misa Sa Kapaisa dannu khat mu rwe.
66001014	Balu khatle Basam ga ngounu khouring mun danga khatle kabun danga ngou ngaake. Atiga Bamik ka mei balei dan ngaake.
66001015	Baket ka mei bi baropnu kasanu thinzin dan ngaake khatle Babaraamna tuipui baraam dan ngaake.
66001016	Bakut inchang pek la insi siari am ngaake; Bamun bina balem kani amnu kangainu kachaak chem khat swak ngaake. Bamai kum ga nat brannu lumik baan danne.
66001017	Eina Bating phaangmunu kaan bi thinu mi danga ei Baket pi in balumta rwe. Maanna Bakut inchangna alu chung bi kaising thangluga akhou rinne, “Kachi mako, Eiya Kamanu khatle Kakhamnuwe.
66001018	Eiya ring ongnu gaye. Ei thi ngaak rwe khatle phaang ngo, Ei khwa seiga ring ongme. Amen. Akhou kathi ram khatle thinu om taapthing bing amme.
66001019	“Nangna mu damnu lang bing, atun swak ongnu khatle haba nung bi swak tingnu lang bing ga hiakro.
66001020	Akut inchang pek la nangna mu damnu insi siari khatle kachaak thaomei ket siari om inthim chong ga heiye, insi siari ga rupkathan siari om tambaan chonglang gaye khatle nangna mu damnu thaomei ket siari gana rupkathan siari gaye.
66002001	“Ephesus pi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Kut inchang pek la insi siari choi ongnu, kachaak thaomei ket siari lak pi se ongnu Maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe,
66002002	“Nachwan, nangna riangre lak thangnu khatle naom khaang theinu atiluga nangna sa maknu mi nun ding khaang thangnu ngamlan rwe dinu Ei theiye. Bani zan bahakna chonglang rwanne diga rinnu atiyeda chonglang rwan maknu, bani ding nangna tamphaang rwe. Bani chong karwaknu miye dinu nanina thei rwe.
66002003	Nangna phun thang rwe, khaang thang rwe khatle Ameng lang chungna chwan to rwe khatle riangre make.
66002004	Atiyeda Eina nalu chung bi rin dingnu chong kasem amme, hagazo nangna naom kamanu kriangnu ga bathan sat rwe.
66002005	Atibriakpina nang ingai paina balumta damnubo dinu baningsuwo. Nasung leluga nangna to ngaaknu kamanu chwan bing ga towo ati make dabe Ei nakhou barapka hungne. Nang sung le make dabe Eina naom thaomei ket ka bariak pi gana lou satne.
66002006	Atiyeda nakhou heiya amme, Eina le batannu Nicolaitan rwan om chwan ding ga nangna le batanne.
66002007	“Katha gana rupkathan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo; kangamnu bakhou ga Rikrwang om Paradise om bazai bi amnu ringnu thingkung bina sa lang Eina pine.”
66002008	“Smyrna bi amnu rupkthan om cham phunnu mi khou heiya hiako, ‘Thiluga ring latnu, Kamanu khatle Kakhamnu Maanna chong bing nga rinnuwe,
66002009	“Eina nachwan bing, riangre kanang khatle nalung siatka theiye atiyeda nangba lungsaye. Jihudi rwanne dinu atiyeda Jihudi rwan maknu, Seitaan om synagogue na sa maknu chong kabianu Ei theiye.
66002010	Nangna riangre dingnu om lang bi kachi mako. Phaang ngo, nani ding tamphaang langna Diabol na nani mi kasem ding qwan in bi sat thanglune khatle nanina ni som riangre khaanglune. Thinu tangga balumsa zanu towo. Eina nakhou ringnu luthop pine.
66002011	“Katha na rupkathan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo. Kangamnu bating thi leng ninu gana pi liamlaye.” ’
66002012	“Pergamos pi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Balem kani amnu kangainu kachaak chem choinu Maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe,
66002013	“Naom chwan bing khatle nakaong riak Eina theiye. Habei ga Seitaan om krwang takung riak amme. Nangna Ameng ding tipka choiye khatle Seitaan na ongnu riak pi, nani lak pi Aom balumsa zanu sake Antipas ting athat tamnu kaan bi tangga abalumsat ting za maknu to make.
66002014	Atiyeda Israel sa rwan meithaan bi ket pi basui lang Balaam na Balak ting ri katha lang kat thangnu pot ting sa lang khatle lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to lang bachu thangnu zekrin ding choitipnu bani nun nakhou am briakpina, Eina namaitwang bi rin dingnu chong kasem amme.
66002015	Hadanga Eina batannu Nicolaitan rwan om zekrin ding choitipnu nun nakhou amme.
66002016	Sung lero ati make dabe Ei nakhou barapka hunglune khatle Eina Amun om kachaak chemna bani maitwang bi katwaklune.
66002017	“Katha na rupkathan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo. Ngam hungnu bakhou sa lang inkam thang ongnu manna kasem Eina pine. Balu chung bi meng kathan hiak thangnu lung ngou khat bakhou pine. Atiga meng ga lousunu maan ga makka pakhatchanale haga thei make.”
66002018	“Thyatira bi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Mei balei dannu mik phunnu khatle baket mei bi baropnu kasanu thinzin dannu Rikrwang Sa Kapaisana heiya rinnuwe,
66002019	“Eina nachwan, naom kriang, chwanlaang, balumsat khatle khaang theinu ga theiye. Naom kakhamnu chwan gana kamanu chwan ma inkuwe.
66002020	Atiyeda baraanto bating thiamting nge dinu Jezebel ding nangna za briakpina Eina namaitwang bi rin dingnu chong kasem amme. Maanna Aswak rwan ding lungkoi lungmaannu chwan to lang khatle ri katha lang katnu pot ting sa lang bachu thangga bani ding lampui kaimaan rwe.
66002021	Eina bating lungkoi lungmaannu chwan bina sung le lang bakaan pi ngaake atiyeda maan sung le dam make.
66002022	Phaang ngo, Eina bating kasa kanaa riak pi bazwan thangne atiga banina bani chwan bina sung le make dabe maan le diga lungkoi lungmaannu chwan tonu bani ding tasiatnu riangre kanangnu bi bazwan thangne.
66002023	Eina basa rwan ding athat satlune. Lungning khatle sung kalan ding zong swaknu Maan gabe Eiye dinu rupkathan bingna theilune. Nani om chwan nung suiga Eina nani pakhat khat lang pi thanglune.
66002024	“Eina nani khou khatle Thyatira bi ongnu katei bing dinuba heiba zekrin maknu khatle banina rinnu danga Seitaan om kathuknu chong bing ding thei maknu, nani khou Eina rinnuwe. Ei nani lu chung bi potrit katei bason thangla rwe.
66002025	Atiyeda Ei hung lat mak basaan nani khou amnu ga choitipka choiyo.
66002026	Ngam hungnu bakhou khatle kakhamnu tangga Achong bing ding zeinu balaang chaat nun lu chung bi Eina ngam pi thangne:
66002027	‘Maanna thin sungrwan choiluga bani lu chung bi paanlune; Ben bachanu mi om ben bing ding to basiatnu danga bani ding bakatup taga to basiatlune,’ heiya Eina Apa khouna ngam lousunu dannuwe.
66002028	Eina bakhou louthwan insi pi thangne.
66002029	“Katha na rupkathan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo.”
66003001	“Sardis pi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Rikrwang om Katha siari khatle insi siari amnu maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe, “Eina nachwan ga theiye, nang ring ongme dinu meng amme dinu Ei theiye atiyeda nangbe thinuwe.
66003002	Khaang rakanno, thi ding ga ongnu nun ding ga pi nat thouwo; balangbe Rikrwang meithaan bi nachwan bing ga bapungpha mak aang nge dinu Ei thei rwe.
66003003	Atibriakpina nangna tatoga lousu damnubo khatle thei damnubo dinu baningsuwo. Choitipo khatle sung leyo. Atiga nangna barak thei make dabe Ei nakhou inbrunu danga hunglune khatle Ei impei chakrin bi hunglu dingbo dinu nangna theilaye.
66003004	Sardis pi bani pon tanaat mak aangnu naom mi kasem amme. Bani ga khopsanu to briakpina bani pon kangounu sin basoiluga Ei le diga se bachamlune.
66003005	Ngam hungnu bakhou ga Eina pon kangounu sin basoi thangne. Eina bameng ga ringnu chongdip pina lou satla rwe atiyeda Eina bameng ga Apa meithaan bi khatle Baom tambaan chonglang rwan meithaan bi indao thanglune.
66003006	“Katha na rupkthan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo.”
66003007	“Philadelphia bi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Bathiangnu khatle bazenu, David om taapthing amnu Maanna inkhaan lat swak tamme dabe pakhatchanale khaan maknu, inkhaan khaan damme dabe pakhatchanale lat maknu Maanna heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe,
66003008	“Eina nachwan ga theiye; phaang ngo, Eina nameithaan bi lat swaknu inkhaan khat thang rwe, haga pakhatchanale khaannu ngam make; balangbe nanat titcha amme, Achong zeiye khatle Ameng ding za maknu to make.
66003009	Phaang ngo, Seitaan om synagogue mi nun, Jihudi rwanne diluga Jihudi rwan maknu atiyeda chong karwaknu bani ding Eina naket pi pi hung kalumne. Atiga phaang ngo, Eina nating kriang nge dinu bani khou pi thei thangne.
66003010	Nangna Aom khaang theinu chong ding zei briakpina, talei ram bi amnu mi nun lu chung bi tamphaang lang talei pumlian bi hung dingnu tamphaangnu chakrin bi gana Eina nating kan thangne.
66003011	Phang ngo, Ei barapka hunglune, naom luthop ka pakhatchanale lou mak lang naom amnu ga choitipo.
66003012	Ngam hungnu bating Eina Arikrwang om bathiangnu in inteng khat pi to thangne khatle maan khatchale se swak latla rwe, Eina balu chung bi Arikrwang om meng khatle Arikrwang om namlian meng dinuba, Arikrwang khouna tambaan lana tanu Jerusalem kathan meng hiak thangne. Eina Ameng kathan balu chung bi hiak thangne.
66003013	“Katha na rupkthan bing khou rinnu ga kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo.” ‘
66003014	“Laodicea bi amnu rupkathan om cham phunnu mi khou hiako, ‘Amen diga kounu, Balumsa zanu khatle bazenu Sake, Rikrwang na damnu bing om Hou thounu gana heiba chong bing nga rinnuwe,
66003015	“Eina nachwan ga theiye, nang dai le dai make, sa le sa make, nang dainu mak tabe sanu Ei bathaiye.
66003016	Atibriakpina nang lumbop bopnu, dai le dai mak sa le sa mak briakpina nating Eina Abao bina balwak satlune.
66003017	Balangbe nangna rinne, ‘Ei lungsaye khatle lan amme khatle alaang baatnu khatchale maake.’ Nang bachan sianu, kriang thang dingnu, lungsianu, mik chonu, pwan sin basoi lang maaknuwe dinu nang thei make.
66003018	Eina nakhou bachu thang nge, dinuba nang lungsa lang mei bi barop bathiang thangnu kachak khatle nang sin basoi lang khatle pwan basoi maknu om kazak dou mak lang pwan kangounu khatle namik mu lang namik pi tei lang mik lou Akhouna kaleiyo.
66003019	Eina kriangnu mi bing ding Eina twei thang nge khatle laak thang nge. Atibriakpina sung khuto khatle sung leyo.
66003020	Phaang ngo, Ei inkhaanmun bi han ongme khatle inkhaan bachu ongme; tudannuna Akhwan ngaisuluga inkhaan lat thang nge dabe Ei bakhou khutlune khatle maan le sa bachamlune khatle maan Ei le sa bachamlune.
66003021	Ngam hungnu maan ga Ei le diga Aom takung riak pi ong bacham lang za thanglune. Heiya Eina le ngamluga Apa le diga Batakung riak pi badung bacham damnu ga dannuwe.
66003022	“Katha gana rupkathan bing khou rinnu chong ga kana phunnu bingna ngai ding ngo.” ’ ”
66004001	Heiba nung bi eina mu rwe, atiga phaang ngo, tambaan la inkhaan khat lat thang ong ngaake khatle trumpet baraam danga akhou chong kabianu eina ngaisu kama damnu baraam gana rinne, “Abeiya ka wo khatle heiba nung bi swak tingnu ga Eina nakhou pi mu thangne.”
66004002	Haba kahan bi ei Katha bi am ngaake khatle phaang ngo, tambaan la takung riak khat am ngaake. Pakhat haba takung riak pi ga badung ong ngaake.
66004003	Badung ongnu Bating atiga phaangnu kaan bi jasper khatle sardius lung dan ngaake. Takung riak om amqwatnu bing bi emerald lung dannu tamsaipwak am ngaake.
66004004	Takung riak om amqwatnu bing bi takung riak katei somniga bali am ngaake. Takung riak bing chung bi patso somniga bali kangounu pwan sinluga badung ongnu eina mu rwe. Bani lu bi kachaak luthop thop phike.
66004005	Haba takung riak pi gana khwa bathaaknu, khwa barinu khatle khwan bing swak rwe khatle takung riak meithaan bi thaomei siari taan thang ong ngaake. Ha rwan ga Rikrwang om Katha siariye.
66004006	Takung riak meithaan bi bathing ring ringnu bathiangnu tuipui khat am ngaake. Takung riak om bazai bi khatle amqwatnu bing bi nung ma mik karwak amnu, ringnu katha amnu bali han ongme.
66004007	Kamanu katha amnu ga takhu krwang danne, kaninu ringnu katha amnu gana sen swan danne, inthumnu ringnu katha amnu gana misa mai kum danne khatle balinu ringnu katha amnu gana zwang ongnu eagle basaa danne.
66004008	Ringnu katha amnu bali ga khat khat khou batha karuk karuk amme. Bani basung bapaan mik karwak amme; banina zingpha thamlai basak makka rinne, “Bathiangnu, bathiangnu, bathiangnu, am ngaaknu, am ongnu khatle hung dingnu Ngam Bachangnu Rikrwang Pukraangba gaye.”
66004009	Takung riak pi badung ongnu khwa sei ring ongnu Bakhou ringnu katha amnu rwan gana Balwat liannu ding takung tazeiga khatle swankanu kaan bi
66004010	patso somniga balina takung riak pi badung ongnu Bameithaan bi in bakhupta rwe. Banina khwa sei ring ongnu Bating swanka rwe. Banina takung riak meithaan bi bani luthop ka bazwan taluga rinne,
66004011	“He Pukraangba, lwat liannu, takung tazeinu khatle ngam lousunu Nang khopsanuwe, Balangbe Nangna pum brum ding dam thang rwe, Nabaning bina pum brumza amnuwe Khatle pum brum ding dam thang rwe.”
66005001	Takung riak pi badung ongnu kut inchang la basung bapaan hiak thangnu seal siari nam thangnu chongdip khat eina mu rwe.
66005002	Kanatnu tambaan chonglang khatna baraam basaangga pao swaknu eina mu rwe. “Chongdip ka lat swaknu khatle seal nam thangnu ga lat swak lang khopsanu tu ambo?”
66005003	Tambaan, talei khatle talei thwei la amnu pakhatchanale Chongdip ka lat swaknu mak tabe phaangnu ngam make.
66005004	Chongdip ka lat swaknu, panu khatle ha ding ga phaangnu ngamnu khopsanu pakhatchale maak briakpina ei chap rakan takka chap ngaak rwe.
66005005	Patso rwan lak pi pakhatna akhou rinne, “Chap mako, phaang ngo, Judah inphum om Takhu krwang, David om Kamong gana Chongdip ka lat swaknu khatle seal siari ding lat swaknu ngam rwe.”
66005006	Eina mu rwe khatle phaang ngo, takung riak zai bi ringnu katha amnu bali khatle patso rwan lak pi bataki siari khatle bamik siari amnu athat tamnu dannu Zao swan khat han ongnu eina mu rwe. Ha rwan ga Rikrwang na talei ram bing bi bathan thang damnu Rikrwang om katha siari gaye.
66005007	Zao saza gana hungluga takung riak pi badung ongnu bakut inchang lana Chongdip ka lou rwe.
66005008	Maanna Chongdip ka lou damnu kaan bi ringnu katha amnu bali khatle patso rwan somniga bali Zao saza meithaan bi in bakhupta rwe. Bani pakhat khatna tara khatle bathiangnu mi nun kalumnu om parongna sipnu kachaak kam choi ngaake.
66005009	Banina laa kathan toga rinne, “Nang Chongdip ka lounu khatle haba om seal ding lat swak lang khopnuwe. Balangbe Nating banina athat trwe, Khatle Nangna ani ding phum, chong, mi sing Khatle chaat bing bina Nathina Rikrwang lang ran swak thang rwe.
66005010	Ani ding Rikrwang khou krwang nun khatle thiamting rwan pi to thang rwe. Anina talei ram bi paanlune.”
66005011	Atiga eina mu rwe, takung riak, ringnu katha amnu bing khatle patso rwan om amqwatnu bing bi am ongnu tambaan chonglang rwan baraam eina ngaisu rwe. Bani mi sing ga basing sem lat ngam maknu raching raching ngaake.
66005012	Baraam gana baraam basaangga rinne, “Athat tamnu Zao saza ga ngam, lungsanu, ningting, nat, takung tazeinu, lwat liannu khatle swan lang khopnuwe.”
66005013	Tambaan la, talei ram bi, talei ram thwei la, tuipui bi khatle tuipui sung la amnu dam thang damnu katha amnu pum brumna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe. Banina rinne, “Takung riak pi badung ongnu Bakhou Khatle Zao saza khou swankanu, takung tazeinu, lwat liannu khatle khwa sei ngam liannu to ding ngo.”
66005014	Ringnu katha amnu bali gana rinne, “Amen.” Patso somniga balina in bakhuptaluga khwa sei ringnu Bating kalum rwe.
66006001	Zao saza gana seal lak pina khat lat swaknu eina mu rwe. Ringnu katha amnu bali lak pi khatna khwa barinu baraam danga “Hung ngo khatle phaang ngo” diga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe.
66006002	Eina mu rwe khatle phaang ngo, eina kangounu raqwan khat mu rwe, raqwan twang ongnu ba khou than khat amme khatle bakhou luthop khat pi ngaake. Maanna kraan ngam ga khatle ngam langna se swak tamme.
66006003	Zao saza gana kaninu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi kaninu ringnu katha amnu gana “Hung ngo khatle phaang ngo” diga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe.
66006004	Kasennu raqwan katei khat swak tamme. Habei ga twangnu bakhou talei ram bina dai bazaangnu lou sat lang khatle bani khat le khat athat kale lang ngam pi thang ngaake. Bakhou kaliannu kachaak chem khat pi ngaake.
66006005	Zao saza gana inthumnu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi inthumnu ringnu katha amnu gana “Hung ngo khatle phaang ngo” diga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe. Atiga eina mu rwe khatle phaang ngo, kabumnu raqwan khat eina mu rwe, habei twangnu khou ga bakut pi serphala khat am ngaake.
66006006	Ringnu katha amnu bali lak pina khwan khatna rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Denari khat lang gehu badat khat, denari khat lang barley badat inthum khatle nangna thao le drakha tui ga to maan mako.”
66006007	Zao saza gana balinu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi ringnu katha amnu balinu gana “Hung ngo khatle phaang ngo” diga rinnu khwan eina ngaisu rwe.
66006008	Eina mu rwe khatle phaang ngo, inda dian diannu raqwan khat eina mu rwe. Haba chung bi twangnu meng ga Thinu diga kouwe khatle Kathi ramna banung sui seye. Talei ram badang bali om khat lu chung bi kachaak chemna, bu taangnuna, thinuna khatle talei ram khouring nunna to that lang bani khou ngam pi thang drwe.
66006009	Zao saza gana impaang nu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi Rikrwang om chong langna khatle banina pi ngaaknu sake langna athat tamnu katha bing ding rikhaang riak thwei bi eina mu rwe.
66006010	Banina baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “He Bathiangnu khatle Bazenu Pukraangba talei ram bi amnu bani ding Nangna ani thi man lang takhum baan ga chong kasem lang inchan baat maangbo?”
66006011	Bani pakhat khat khou kangounu baswannu pon pi rwe khatle bani khou rinne, “Bani ding athat tamnu ga danga bani le diga swak to bachamnu khatle bau banao rwan ding basing bachangga athat satloi mak basaan, bani bakaan kasem basak lang nge.
66006012	Zao saza gana karuknu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi eina mu rwe, atiga phaang ngo, kanatnu talei kaling kaling rwe, lumikna sam om bora pwan danga bum drwe khatle thana thi danga sen drwe.
66006013	Kanatnu thiraangna tacham kraa kung ding kanuknu kaan bi tacham kraana chuntanu danga, tambaan lana insi bing talei bi bazwanta drwe.
66006014	Atiga saangbaan na le chongdip kazwannu danga kazwanluga phun thou drwe, rammwan pui khatle tuikoi ram bing ding bakaong riak pina phun swak trwe.
66006015	Talei ram om krwang bing, kaliannu rwan, lungsanu rwan, kraan milu nun, ngam phunnu mi nun, swak tonu bing khatle rang tonu bingna chenlat khatle rammwan bing om lung lat pi inkam drwe.
66006016	Rammwan bing khou khatle lung bing khou rin ngaake, “Ani lu chung bi badan taro khatle takung riak pi badung ongnu Bamai kum bina khatle Zao saza balung pwan bina ani ding inkam thang ngo.
66006017	Balangbe Baom balung pwan liannu lumik ka hung tang rwe. Atiga tuna hannu ngam dingbo?”
66007001	Ha bing nung bi talei taki bali la tambaan chonglang bali han ongnu eina mu rwe. Talei ram bi mak tabe tuipui bi mak tabe thingkung khatcha bi hakna thiraang raang hung mak lang banina talei ram om thiraang lampui thing drwe.
66007002	Tambaan chonglang katei khatna ring ongnu Rikrwang om seal choiluga lumik swak lana kanaanu eina mu rwe khatle talei ram khatle tuipui ding to braan lang Rikrwang na ngam pi thang damnu tambaan chonglang bali khou maanna baraam basaangga paoga rinne,
66007003	“Anina Rikrwang om swak rwan ding bani bachan bi seal nam thang mak basaan, talei ram, tuipui mak tabe thingkung bing ding ga to braan mako.”
66007004	Seal nam thang damnu mi sing ga eina ngaisu rwe. Israel sa rwan phum bing bina seal nam ngaaknu mi sing ga raching raza ga sombaliga baliye.
66007005	Judah in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Reuben in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Gad in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe.
66007006	Asher in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Naphtali in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Manasseh in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe.
66007007	Simeon in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Levi in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Issachar in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe.
66007008	Zebulun in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Joseph in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe. Benjamin in phum bina mi raching somga kani ding seal nam rwe.
66007009	Ha bing nung bi eina phaangnu kaan bi ngaiyo, chaat bing, phum bing, mi nun khatle chong chaat bing bina pakhatchanale basing sem ngam maknu mi khang puina, kangounu baswannu pon sin basoinu khatle bani kut pi ruidan kachang choiluga takung riak khatle Zao saza meithaan bi hung han ngaake.
66007010	Atiga baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Ringriak ka takung riak pi badung ongnu ani Rikrwang khatle Zao saza omme.”
66007011	Tambaan chonglang rwanna, takung riak, patso rwan khatle ringnu katha amnu bali om amqwatnu bi han ong ngaake. Takung riak meithaan bi mai kum talei la kuntaluga Rikrwang ding kalum damme.
66007012	Atiga rinne, “Amen. Swannu, lwat liannu, ningting, swankanu, takung tazeinu ngam khatle nat raangnu khwa seiga ani Rikrwang khou amnu to ding ngo. Amen.”
66007013	Patso rwan lak pina pakhatna akhou rinne, “Kangounu baswannu pon sin basoinu mi nunna impei mibo? Bani inlamna hungnubo?”
66007014	Eina bakhou rinne, “Pukraangba, nangna theiye.” Maanna akhou rinne, “Bani nun ga tasiatnu riangre kanang bina hungnu nunne khatle bani om baswannu pon ga Zao saza thi bi kasin ngou rwe.
66007015	Atibriakpina banina Rikrwang takung riak meithaan bi ongluga zingpha thamlai Baom bathiangnu in bi Bating ngaakka chwanlaang to ongme. Atiga takung riak pi badung ongnu Maan ga bani lak pi onglune.
66007016	Bani chaam lat la rwe khatle taraan lat la rwe; lumikna bani ding sok lat la rwe khatle saanuna le sok lat la rwe.
66007017	Balangbe takung riak zai bi amnu Zao saza gana bani ding sian thanglune. Atiga bani ding ringnu pi thangnu tuipwak in tangga kai thanglune khatle Rikrwang na bani mik pina mikthi bing kanun sat thanglune.”
66008001	Zao saza gana siarinu seal ga lat swaknu kaan bi tambaan la chakrin baang khak thiap thiap ong ngaake.
66008002	Rikrwang meithaan bi han ongnu tambaan chonglang siari ding eina mu rwe khatle bani khou trumpet siari pi damme.
66008003	Kachaak om parong kam choinu tambaan chonglang katei khat hungluga rikhaang riak pi hung han rwe khatle bakhou parong tamga pi thang rwe. Balangbe maanna takung riak meithaan bi amnu kachaak om rikhaang riak chung bi haga bathiangnu mi bing om kalumnu le bachamga kat ting gaye.
66008004	Tambaan chonglang kut pina parong meikhut ka bathiangnu mi nun om kalum le bachamga Rikrwang meithaan bi ka rwe.
66008005	Tambaan chonglang gana parong kam ga lou rwe khatle rikhaang riak pina meithin kasennu louluga haga thangsipluga, talei ram bi bazwan ta rwe. Habei ga kasao kabaonu, khwa bathaaknu, bachek tanu khatle talei kalingnu swak trwe.
66008006	Trumpet siari choinu tambaan chonglang siari gana sem lang bani daan ong rwe.
66008007	Kamanu tambaan chonglang gana trumpet ka sem rwe khatle thi suinu thakraa khatle mei ta rwe khatle ha bing ga talei ram bi bazwanta rwe. Atiga thingkung bing badam inthum om khat ting rou sat trwe. Ba annu louna bing meina rou sat trwe.
66008008	Kaninu tambaan chonglangna trumpet ka sem rwe khatle mei chok ongnu rammwan pui khat tannu khat ting tuipui bi bazwan thang rwe; atiga tuipui badam inthum om khat thi gon drwe.
66008009	Tuipui bi amnu khouring bing badam inthum om khat thi loi drwe khatle lipui om badam inthum om khatle braan drwe.
66008010	Inthumnu tambaan chonglangna trumpet ka sem rwe khatle meilaa danga choknu kaliannu insi khat tambaan lana bazwanta rwe. Hagana tuiqwa bing om badam inthum om khat pi atiluga tuipwak in bing bi ta rwe.
66008011	Insi meng ga Kakhaanu diga kouwe; tui om badam inthum om khat khaa drwe. Tui ga pi khaa briakpina mi tamga thi drwe.
66008012	Balinu tambaan chonglangna trumpet ka sem rwe khatle lumik om badam inthum om khat, tha om badam inthum om khat khatle insi om badam inthum om khat ting bwei ta rwe. Ha bing om badam inthum om khat zing drwe. Atiga thamlai om badam inthum om khat atiluga zingpha om badam inthum om khat baanlan drwe.
66008013	Eina phaang rwe khatle tambaan chonglang khatna tambaan zai bi zwang ga baraam basaangga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe. “Tambaan chonglang inthumna sem dingnu trumpet katei inthum om baraam langna talei ram bi amnu mi nun aih sianuwe da, aih sianuwe da khatle aih sianuwe da.”
66009001	Impaangnu tambaan chonglangna trumpet ka sem rwe khatle insi khat tambaan lana talei bi bazwantanu eina mu rwe. Tambaan chonglang gana bakalan maaknu khun om taapthing bakhou pi ngaake.
66009002	Maanna khun ga lat swak rwe haba kaan bi mei pui om meikhut tannu bakalan maaknu khun bi gana ka rwe; khun bina kanu meikhut kana lumik khatle saangbaan ding pi zing drwe.
66009003	Atiga meikhut pina takhao nun swakluga talei ram bi hung rwe. Talei ram bi amnu ri aih om ngam dannu bani khou ngam pi damme.
66009004	Talei ram bi thou ongnu louna bing, ba annu thingkung bing khatle thingkung khatcha ding le sok mak lang atiyeda bani bachan bi Rikrwang om seal maaknu minun za ding sok lang zathang pi thang drwe.
66009005	Banina mi nun ding athat mak lang atiyeda bani ding tha impaang rai lang bani khou chongtan pi thang drwe. Bani riangre kanang ga mi khat ting ri aihna einu nat tan rwe.
66009006	Haba kaan bi mi nunna thi lang karamlune atiyeda ngamlaye; bani thi nwamlune atiyeda thinu ga bani khouna pak tamlune.
66009007	Takhao nun thot ka kraan lang daan ongnu raqwan nun danne; bani lu bi kachaak tannu luthop thope khatle bani mai kum ga misa danne.
66009008	Bani samna kamaisa rwan sam danne. Bani ngaa ga takhu krwang ngaa danne.
66009009	Bani thin kachaang thop tannu kachaang thop amme khatle bani batha baraam ga kraan riak pi pak khut tamnu raqwan taswang khakna kainu raqwan gari nun om baraam danne.
66009010	Bani ri aih danga kamei amme. Bani kamei bi bakasat amme, bani ngam ga mi nun ding tha impaang pi naa lang nge.
66009011	Bakalan maaknu khun om tambaan chonglang gana bani lu chung bi krwang to ngaake. Bamengna Hebrew chong la Abaddon diga kouwe. Atiyeda Greek chong la bameng Apollyon diga kouwe.
66009012	Aih sianu khat pi loi drwe, phaang ngo, heiba nung bi riangrenu kani hung naye.
66009013	Karuknu tambaan chonglang gana trumpet sem rwe. Rikrwang meithaan bi amnu kachaak om rikhaang riak bataki bali lana khwan khat eina ngaisu rwe.
66009014	Khwan gana trumpet choi ongnu karuknu tambaan chonglang khou rinne, “Kaliannu Euphrate tuiqwa bi bang thang ongnu tambaan chonglang bali ding ga bathan thangro.”
66009015	Rin ongnu chakrin, lumik, tha khatle sangwan lang daan thang ongnu tambaan chonglang bali ding mi nun om badam inthum om khat ting athat sat lang bathan thang rwe.
66009016	Raqwan kraanmi sing ga lakh raching ni ngaake, haba sing ga eina ngaisu rwe.
66009017	Pi mu thangnu khat pi raqwan nun khatle habei ga twang ongnu nun ding eina mu rwe. Banina mei danga sennu hyacinth lung danga dumnu khatle kanduk tannu bazinnu kachaang thop amme; raqwan nun lu ga takhu krwang lu danne khatle bani bao bina mei, meikhut khatle chok ongnu kanduk swake.
66009018	Bani bao bina swaknu inthum dinuba mei, meikhut khatle chok ongnu kanduk kana mi nun badam inthum om khat ting athat sat trwe.
66009019	Balangbe bani ngam ga bani bao bi khatle bani kamei bi amme. Balangbe bani kamei ga barun danne khatle balu amme atiga ha bing gana banina mi nun ding pi soke.
66009020	Ripian heiyana to that maknu am ongnu mi nunna bani chwan bina bani sung le mak ngaake. Banina ri kasia nun khatle kachaak om, tangka om, thinzin om, lung om khatle thing om ri katha ding kalumga ong ngaake. Rin ongnu ri katha bing nga munu le ngam make, ngaisunu le ngam make khatle senu le ngam make.
66009021	Banina mi athatnu bina, dwei choinu bina khatle lungkoi lungmaannu bina mak tabe baru sanu bina bani sung le mak ngaake.
66010001	Tambu na pwan danga sinnu kanatnu tambaan chonglang katei khat tambaan lana tanu eina mu rwe; balu bi tamsaipwak amme, bamai kum ga lumik tanne khatle baketna mei inteng danne.
66010002	Bakut pi lat swak thangnu kasinnu chongdip khat amme khatle baket inchangna tuipui bi khatle imbei gana talei chung bi kadimme.
66010003	Takhu krwangna baraamnu danga basaangnu baraam baraamme. Maanna baraamnu kaan bi khwa barinu siarina khwan swak ka chong kabia rwe.
66010004	Khwa barinu siari gana khwan swakka kabianu kaan bi eina hiak lang to ngaake. Atiyeda tambaan lana khwan khatna akhou atiga rinnu ngaisu rwe, “Khwa barinu siarina rin damnu ga seal nam thang ngo khatle hiak thang mako.”
66010005	Eina mu damnu tuipui khatle talei chung bi han ongnu tambaan chonglang gana tambaan la bakut kai thou ngaake.
66010006	Tambaan chonglang khatle habei ga amnu pot bing talei ram khatle basung bi amnu pot bing, tuipui khatle basung bi amnu bing ding dam thangnu, khwa sei ring ongnu Pukraangba khou maanna chong karen rwe. Hagazo, “Khwa sei la rwe.”
66010007	Atiyeda siarinu tambaan chonglang gana baom trumpet sem dingnu lumik pi ga maanna Baswak thiamting rwan khou rin damnu danga, Rikrwang om inthim chong ga pi loi thanglune.
66010008	Tambaan la eina ngaisu damnu khwan gana akhou rin late, “Tuipui bi khatle talei ram bi han ongnu tambaan chonglang khou seluga bakut pina kasinnu Chongdip ka louwo.”
66010009	Eina tambaan chonglang khou seluga rin rwe, “Kasinnu Chongdip ka akhou piyo.” Maanna akhou rinne, “Haga louwo khatle haga sawo khatle hagana nabon ding pi khaalune atiyeda namun biba khwei tui danga thumlune.”
66010010	Eina kasinnu Chongdip ka tambaan chonglang kut pina louluga sa rwe, haga amun bi khwei tui danga thumme khatle eina sanu kaan bi abon la pi khaaye.
66010011	Habei ga tambaan chonglang gana akhou rinne, “Nangna mi nun om, chaat bing om, chong chaat bing om khatle krwang bing om lang bi chong rinseyo.”
66011001	Akhou badat thing dannu thingrwa khat pi rwe khatle tambaan chonglang gana hanluga rinne, “Lon thouwo khatle Rikrwang in atiluga rikhaang riak ka badatro khatle habei ga kalum ongnu mi sing ga semmo.
66011002	Atiyeda bathiangnu in paan la inkhu gabe badat mako. Balangbe haga Gentile nun lang pi drwe. Banina bathiangnu namlian ding ga tha sombaliga kani bani ketna kadim kataalu rwe.
66011003	Eina Aom sake pat ni khou ngam pi thangne. Banina bora pwan sinluga lumik raching khat raza ni somruk ri chong rin swaklune.”
66011004	Bani ga talei ram om Rikrwang meithaan bi han ongnu talwan kraa kung kani khatle thaomei ket kani gaye.
66011005	Tudannuna barwei ding sok lang towe dabe barwei bao bina mei swakluga munanu nun ding ga rou sate; tudannuna barwei ding pi sok lang towe dabe bating hadanga athat lang nge.
66011006	Barweina chong rin swak ong bi khwa sun mak lang tambaan ding khaam lang barwei khou ngam amme. Thi gon lang tui chung bi khatle barweina bathainu kaan bing bi talei ram ding ripianna rai lang barwei khou ngam amme.
66011007	Barweina barwei om sake pi loinu kaan bi bakalan maaknu khun bina swaknu khouring gana barwei maitwang bi kraan katwaklune; atiga barwei ding ngamlune khatle athat satlune.
66011008	Barwei om kathi pum ga namlian om lampui pui bi ta thang onglune, namlian om Katha om meng ga Sodom le Egypt namlian diga kouwe. Haba riak pi ga ani Pukraangba ding cross pi athat ngaake.
66011009	Mi nun lak pina, phum rwan bina chong chaat rwan bina, chaat rwan bina hungnu mi nun gana barwei om kathi pum ding ga ni thum babaang mulune. Barwei om kathi pum ding ga thaan bi ri lang za thanglaye.
66011010	Talei ram bi amnu mi nunna haba om langbi karo lozaang salune. Atiluga banina khat le khat leithwan pi kale lune; karonu indao lune balangbe ri chong rin swaknu pat nina talei ram bi amnu mi nun ding pi riangre damme.
66011011	Ni thum babaang nung bi Rikrwang khouna ringnu kaphuk kana barwei khou khut rwe khatle barwei han thou rwe. Barwei ding munu mi nun ga kachi tak rwe.
66011012	Tambaan lana basaangnu khwan khat na, “Abeiya kawo,” diga rinnu khwan khat barweina ngaisu rwe. Barwei tambu bina tambaan tangga ka rwe khatle barwei ding munanu nun gana barwei ding mu rwe.
66011013	Haba kahan bi ga talei kaling rakan takka kaling damme khatle namlian om in som om badam khat kanuk raita rwe, atiga talei kalingnu bi ga mi raching siari thi rwe. Ring ongnu mi nun gana kachi takka tambaan Rikrwang lwat pi lian damme.
66011014	Aih sianu kani ga loi drwe. Phaang ngo inthumnu aih sianu ga barapka hunglu rwe.”
66011015	Siarinu tambaan chonglang gana baom trumpet ka sem rwe khatle tambaan lana basaangnu khwan bingna rinne, “Talei ram krwang talei bing nga ani Pukraangba khatle Baom Christa om Krwang talei to rwe khatle Maan khwa seiga Krwang toga paanlu rwe.”
66011016	Rikrwang meithaan bi bani takung riak pi badung ongnu patso somniga bali gana kuntaluga Rikrwang ding kalumluga rinne,
66011017	“He Ngam Bachangnu Pukraangba, Rikrwang anina Nating swanne, Nang atun am ongnu, am ngaaknu khatle am hung dingnu gaye. Balangbe Nangna Naom tasiatnu ngam bing louluga paan ong rwe.
66011018	Chaat nunna balung pwan rwe Khatle Naom sung sounu ga hung tang rwe, Thi damnu nun ding Nangna chong kasem dingnu, Naswak, ri chong rin swaknu nun, bathiangnu mi nun, kasinnu khatle kaliannu rwan lang nangna taswan pi lang Khatle talei ram ding to braannu nun ding Nangna to braan dingnu dat ka hung tang rwe.”
66011019	Tambaan la Rikrwang om bathiangnu in lat swak rwe khatle Baom chongren tambung ga Baom bathiangnu in bi mu rwe, habei ga khwa bathaak rwe, khwa bari rwe, bachek ta rwe, talei kaling rwe khatle kaliannu thakraa ta rwe.
66012001	Tambaan la kaliannu badan khat mu rwe. Mannu pakhatna lumik ting pwan toga basoi rwe, thana baket thwei bi amme khatle balu bi insi somga kani thangnu luthop am ngaake.
66012002	Maan pum ritnuwe, maan nao lung lang naaga pao ong ngaake.
66012003	Tambaan la badannu katei khat mu rwe; phaang ngo, kaliannu mei danga sennu dragon khat balu siari, bataki som khatle balu siari bi krwang luthop siari thope.
66012004	Bakameina tambaan la insi om badam inthum om khat ting khom hung rwe khatle insi bing ga talei la bazwan ta damme. Mannu gana nao am thang khap tinu le naosen ding ga sa sat lang dragonna nao am dingnu mannu meithaan bi han ong ngaake.
66012005	Chaat bing ding thin sungrwan choiluga sian dingnu sa kapaisa khat mannu gana pon thang rwe. Basa ding Rikrwang khatle Batakung riak la lou thou drwe.
66012006	Rikrwang na daan thangnu ramhaang la mannu ga pak thou drwe. Balangbe habei ga mi nunna bating lumik raching khat raza ni somruk pi sa pi in thanglune.
66012007	Tambaan la kraan katwak ngaake. Michael khatle baom tambaan chonglang rwanna dragon maitwang bi kraan katwak rwe. Dragon khatle baom chonglang rwanna le kraan katwak rwe.
66012008	Atiyeda dragon om mi nunna ngamlan rwe. Atibriakpina tambaan la bani lang kaong riak phang lan rwe.
66012009	Kaliannu dragon, kama meithaan barun, Diabol khatle Seitaan diga kounu, talei ram bing ding minamnu ding ga talei ram la bazwanta drwe. Atiluga maan le bachamga baom tambaan chonglang rwan ding ga bazwanta drwe.
66012010	Haba kaan bi tambaan la basaangnu khwan khatna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Atun ringriak, nat, ani Rikrwang om krwang talei khatle Baom Christa om ngam ga hung tang rwe; Balangbe ani unao rwan ding ani Rikrwang meithaan bi zingpha thamlai koi impu thangnu bating bazwanta drwe.
66012011	“Banina bating Zao saza om thi paan bina khatle bani om sake om chong paan bina ngam ngaake. Bani thinu tangga bani kum ding batai make.
66012012	Atibriakpina tambaan khatle habei amnu nani bing karowo. Talei khatle tuipui bi amnu nani nun aih sianuweda! Balangbe baom bakaan toiye dinu Diabol na theiluga maan balung pwan takka nani khou ta drwe.”
66012013	Dragon na bating talei ram bi bazwanta rwe dinu muluga sa kapaisa am thang ngaaknu mannu ding rai damme.
66012014	Mannu gana ramhaang la bakaong riak la zwang se za lang kanatnu eagle basaa batha dannu kani Rikrwang na pi thang damme. Haba riak pi ga bating barun meithaan bina sangwan inthum babaang pi sa pi in thang damme.
66012015	Mannu ding ga tui lian gana daan thou dam lang barunna babao bina kaliannu tuiqwa khat mannu nung bi balwak swak rwe.
66012016	Atiyeda talei ramna mannu ding ga paang thang ngaake khatle talei ramna babao aang thouluga dragon na balwak swaknu tuiqwa ding kadwan dam ngaake.
66012017	Atibriakpina dragon na mannu ding balung pwan tak tamme khatle maanna mannu om am thangsianu bakik taat rwan, Rikrwang om zathang zeinu rwan khatle Jisu Christa om sake choinu rwan ding kraan katwak lang thou damme.
66013001	Ei tuipui paan lung tasi daam chung bi han ong ngaake. Tuipui bina khouring khat kanu eina mu rwe. Haba khouring ga balu siari khatle bataki som amme khatle bataki bing bi luthop som khatle balu bing bi Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiatnu meng am ngaake.
66013002	Eina mu ngaaknu khouring ga takhu danne, baketna kabom ket tanne, bamunna takhu krwang mun danne. Dragonna haba khouring khou baom nat, baom takung riak khatle kaliannu ngam pi thang rwe.
66013003	Balu khat ka thi dingnu danga liamnu ga eina mu rwe; atiyeda thi dingnu danga liamnu ga sa drwe. Talei ram mi bingna loh lo rwe khatle haba khouring nung sui damme.
66013004	Khouring lang ngam pi thang damnu dragon ding banina kalum damme khatle banina khouring ding ga kalumga rinne, “Khouring dannu tu ambo? Tuna maan le diga kraan katwaknu ngamgabo?”
66013005	Bakhou chong lian kabia lang khatle Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat lang mun pi thang rwe khatle tha sombaliga kani atiga to ong lang bakhou ngam pi damme.
66013006	Khouring gana babao aang thouluga Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat rwe khatle Bameng, Baom pwan in khatle tambaan la ongnu bani lu chung bi rin basiat rwe.
66013007	Bathiangnu mi nun le kraan katwak lang khatle bani ding ngam lang heiba khouring ding za thang rwe. Bakhou phum, chong chaat khatle chaat bing lu chung bi ngam pi thang rwe.
66013008	Talei ram bi amnu mi nunna haba khouring ding ga kalumlune. Bani ga Rikrwang na talei ram ding dam thang bina athat tamnu Zao saza om ringnu chongdip pi meng hiak thang maknu nunne.
66013009	Kana phunnu maan gana ngai ding ngo.
66013010	Kraan minam toga se dingnu maan ga kraan minam toga selune; kachaak chemna athat tingnu bating ga kachaak chemna athatlune. Habei ga bathiangnu mi nun om khaang theinu khatle balumsanu amme.
66013011	Khouring katei khat talei lana kanu eina mu rwe; zao swan danga bataki kani amme khatle dragon danga kabiaye.
66013012	Maanna kamanu khouring om ngam bing ga haba khouring meithaan bi sizin ngaake. Atiluga talei ram khatle habei ga amnu mi nun ding kamanu khouring dinuba, thi dingnu danga liamnu, sa lat tamnu khouring ding ga pi kalum damme.
66013013	Maanna tasiatnu badan bing toga mi nun meithaan bi tambaan lana talei ram bi mei pi ta ngaake.
66013014	Maanna khouring meithaan bi to lang bakhou pi thang damnu badannu bing paan bina talei ram bi ongnu nun ding minam damme khatle talei ram bi ongnu mi nun khou rinne, “Kachaak chemna thi lang pi liam damnu ring ongnu khouring katha khat bachawo.”
66013015	Khouring katha bi ga ringnu kaphuk sem thang lang bakhou ngam amme. Balangbe khouring katha gana chong kabia lang khatle ha ding ga kalum maknu bing ding athat sat lang naye.
66013016	Maanna kaliannu khatle kasinnu, lungsanu khatle lungsianu, rang tonu khatle swak bing khou bani kut inchang pek la mak tabe bani bachan bi badannu khat pi thang damme.
66013017	Khouring om badan mak tabe bameng mak tabe bameng om basing lousunu maan ga makka pakhatchanale kaleinu khatle zwannu za make.
66013018	Abeiya ningting amme. Bakaba thei ngamnu maan gana heiba khouring om basing nga chak ting ngo; balangbe haga misa om basing nge khatle basing ga raza karuk somrukka karuke.
66014001	Phaang ngo, Zion rammwan bi Zao saza khat han ongnu eina mu rwe. Maan le diga bachan bi Bapa meng hiak thangnu mi lakh khat raching sombaliga bali am ngaake.
66014002	Tambaan lana tuipui baraam dannu khatle kanatnu khwa barinu baraam dannu khwan khat eina ngaisu damme khatle taraa kainu nunna bani om taraa kainu eina ngaisu damme.
66014003	Banina krwang takung riak meithaan bi, ringnu katha amnu bali meithaan bi khatle patso rwan meithaan bi laa kathan to damme. Talei ram bina kai takan thang damnu mi lakh khat raching sombaliga bali gana makka laa ga pakhatchanale bachunu ngam mak ngaake.
66014004	Haba mi nun ga kamaisa rwanna to tanaat mak aangnu nunne, balangbe bani ga bathiangnu nunne. Ha rwan ga Zao saza na senu riak pi banung suinu nunne. Ha rwan ga Rikrwang om khatle Zao saza om kamanu kraa toga mi nun khouna takan swaknu nunne.
66014005	Bani mun thei make, balangbe Rikrwang takung riak meithaan bi bani koi maaknu nunne.
66014006	Tambaan chonglang katei khatna tambaan zai bi zwang koi ongnu eina mu damme. Talei ram bi ongnu nun khou, chaat bing khou, phum bing khou, chong chaat bing khou khatle mi nun khou kasam lang khwa sei ringnu sacham bakhou amme.
66014007	Maanna baraam nat ka rinne, “Rikrwang ding kachiyo khatle Bakhou lwat liannu piyo; balangbe Maanna chong kasem dingnu chakrin ga hung tang rwe. Tambaan, talei ram, tuipui khatle tuipwak in bing ding dam thangnu Bating kalummo.”
66014008	Tambaan chonglang katei khatna banung suiga paoga rinne, “Baom lungkoi lungmaannu om taraannu zu ga maanna chaat bing ding pi in briakpina kaliannu namlian Babylon ga balum drwe, balum drwe.”
66014009	Haba nung inthumnu tambaan chonglangna bani nung suiga baraam basaangga rinne, “Tudannuna khouring ding ga khatle bakatha ding kalumme dabe khatle babachan bi mak tabe bakut pi badannu lousuwe dabe,
66014010	maanna le baom sung sounu ngai bi gana thang katwak mak aangnu Rikrwang om sung sounu zu ga inlune; atiga Rikrwang na bating bathiangnu tambaan chonglang rwan om khatle Zao saza meithaan bi mei khatle chok ongnu kanduk mei bi railune.
66014011	Bani om riangrenu meikhut ka khwa seiga amme. Khouring ding khatle bakatha ding kalumnu khatle bameng om badannu lousunu mi bing ga zingpha thamlai basaknu dou make.”
66014012	Abeiya bathiangnu mi nun om khaang theinu amme Rikrwang om zathang khatle Jisu om balumsanu ding zeinu bani ga amme.
66014013	Tambaan lana akhou khwan khatna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Hiak thangro, ‘Atunna thouga Pukraangba khou thi damnu nun ga aih saye.’ ” Katha gana rinne, “O, bani nun bani chwan bina basak lang khatle bani chwanna bani nung sui lang nge.”
66014014	Phaang ngo, kangounu tambu khat khatle haba chung bi Misa Sa Kapaisa dannu khat badung ongnu eina mu rwe. Balu bi kachaak luthop khatle Bakut pi kangainu sangkhwei khat choi ngaake.
66014015	Tambaan chonglang katei khatna bathiangnu in bina swak rwe. Maanna tambu chung bi badung ongnu Bakhou baraam basaangga pao rwe, “Naom sangkhwei ga choi thouro khatle aatro, balangbe nangna tapaan lwak lang bakaan hung rwe. Balangbe talei ram tapaan ga min rwe.”
66014016	Tambu chung bi badung ongnu Maanna talei ram bi Baom sangkhwei ga choi thou rwe khatle talei ram tapaan ga lwak rwe.
66014017	Tambaan chonglang katei khat tambaan om bathiangnu in bina swak rwe, baom le kangainu sangkhwei khat am ngaake.
66014018	Tambaan chonglang katei khatna rikhaang riak pina swak rwe. Mei chung bi bangam am ngaake. Maanna kangainu sangkhwei choinu bakhou baraam basaangga kouga rinne, “Naom kangainu sangkhwei ga choi thouro khatle talei ram drakha bom bing ga khom thouro; balangbe drakha bing ga min baran rwe.”
66014019	Atibriakpina Tambaan chonglang gana talei ram bi sangkhwei choi thouluga talei ram om drakha kraa bing khom thou rwe khatle maanna drakha kraa bing ga Rikrwang om balung pwan liannu drakha tui sumnu riak pi bazwan thang rwe.
66014020	Banina drakha bing ga namlian paan la drakha tui sumnu riak pi kadim rwe. Atiga drakha tui sumnu riak pina lwang swaknu thi ga raqwan mun khap tangga khatle mile razaga somkariat namlaaga lwang swak rwe.
66015001	Tambaan la kaliannu khatle tasiatnu badan katei khat eina mu rwe. Tambaan chonglang siari khou kakhamnu riangrenu siari amme. Riangrenu siari bi ga Rikrwang om balung pwan ga loi rwe.
66015002	Mei le thang katwaknu bathing ring ringnu tuipui dannu khatle khouring ding, bakatha ding, baom badannu ding khatle bameng sing ding ga ngamnu banina bathing ring ringnu tuipui chung bi Rikrwang om tara choiluga han ongnu eina mu rwe.
66015003	Banina Rikrwang swak Moses le Zao saza om laa toga rinne, “Ngam bachangnu Rikrwang, Pukraangba, Nachwan bingbe lianne khatle tasiate. He bathiangnu rwan om Krwang, Nalampui ga ririak senuwe khatle bazeye.
66015004	He Pukraangba, tuna Nating kachi mak tingbo? Nameng ding tuna lwat pi lian mak tingbo? Balangbe bathiangnu ga Pukraangba za zung nge; Chaat bingna hungluga Nameithaan bi kalum lang nge; Balangbe Naom ririak senu chwan ga indao swak rwe.”
66015005	Ha bing nung bi eina mu rwe phaang ngo, tambaan la sake om pwan in om bathiangnu in ga lat swak rwe.
66015006	Bathiangnu in bi gana riangrenu siari amnu tambaan chonglang siari ga swak rwe. Tambaan chonglang rwan ga bathiangnu khatle kaphingnu linen pwan sin ngaake khatle bani kachaang bi kachaak khap khaake.
66015007	Ringnu katha amnu bali lak pi pakhatna tambaan chonglang siari khou, khwa sei ring ongnu Rikrwang om balung pwanna sipnu kachaak kam siari ga pi ngaak rwe.
66015008	Haba bathiangnu in ga Rikrwang om lwat liannu khatle Baom ngam om meikhutna sip rwe. Tambaan chonglang siari om riangrenu siari ga loi dam mak basaan pakhatchanale haba bathiangnu in bi ga khutnu ngam mak ngaake.
66016001	Basaangnu khwan khatna haba bathiangnu in bi gana tambaan chonglang rwan siari khou atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Sero khatle Rikrwang balung pwan kam ga talei ram bi buntawo.”
66016002	Atibriakpina kamanu tambaan chonglangna seluga baom kam ga talei ram bi bunta rwe khatle khouring om badan amnu khatle bakatha ding kalumnu mi nun lu chung bi kasianu khatle bathak bakhweinu hung drwe.
66016003	Kaninu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga tuipui chung bi bunta rwe khatle tuipui tui ga kathinu mi om thi dan thou drwe; tuipui bi amnu ringnu khouring bing thi loi drwe.
66016004	Inthumnu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga tuiqwa bing bi khatle tuipwak bing bi bunta rwe khatle ha bing ga thi gon drwe.
66016005	Tui om tambaan chonglangna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “He Pukraangba, Nang ririak senuwe. Nangbe atun am ongnu, am ngaaknu khatle hung dingnu gaye. Balangbe Nangna hei bing nga atiga chong kasem rwe.
66016006	Balangbe banina bathiangnu mi nun khatle thiamting rwan ding thi pi ta damme. Nangna bani khou in lang thi pi rwe. Balangbe bani haga in lang khopnuwe.”
66016007	Rikhaang riak pina khwan katei khatna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “O, Ngam Bachangnu Rikrwang Pukraangba, Nachong sem gabe bazenuwe khatle ririak senuwe.”
66016008	Balinu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga lumik chung bi bunta rwe. Mi nun ding mei kaphukna pi rou lang lumik khou ngam pi thang rwe.
66016009	Kanatnu mei kaphuk kana mi nun ding rou drwe. Riangre nangnu chung bi ngam amnu Rikrwang meng ding rin basiat rwe. Balwat pi lian lang banina sung le mak ngaake.
66016010	Impaangnu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga khouring om takung riak chung bi bunta rwe. Baom krwang talei ga zing ta drwe. Mi nun ga naalai briakpina bani balei ei pat rwe.
66016011	Bani om kasa kanaa khatle bathak bakhweinu gana banina tambaan Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat rwe. Atiyeda banina bani chwan bina sung le mak ngaake.
66016012	Karuknu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga kaliannu Euphrates tuiqwa bi bunta rwe khatle tuiqwa bi tui kang drwe. Heiya lumik swak lana hungnu krwang nun lang lampui daan langna kangnuwe.
66016013	Kau thot tannu bathiang maknu katha inthum dragon bao bina khouring bao bina khatle kakoinu thiamting bao bina swaknu eina mu rwe.
66016014	Balangbe ha rwan ga tasiatnu badan to damnu ri kasia nun om katha ye. Banina talei ram krwang nun ding khatle talei ram mi bing ding kangamnu Rikrwang om kaliannu lumik om kraan lang khom thou langna bani khou se swaknuwe.
66016015	“Phaang ngo, Ei barusanu mi danga hung nge. Barak theiga baom pon naat baswannu sin basoi ongnu maan ga aih sanuwe. Ati make dabe pum tangang selune khatle mi nunna baom kazaknu ga doulune.”
66016016	Banina bani ding Hebrew chong la Armageddon diga kounu riak la khom hung kadoi rwe.
66016017	Siarinu tambaan chonglangna baom kam ga thiraang bi bunta rwe khatle tambaan om bathiangnu in bina khatle krwang takung riak pina basaangnu khwan khatna swakluga rinne, “Heiya loi rwe.”
66016018	Habei ga kasao kabao rwe, khwa bari rwe khatle khwa bathaak rwe khatle kanatnu talei kaling kaling rwe. Talei ram bi misana lung thou bina heitia liannu khatle natnu talei kaling kaling dam mak aang nge.
66016019	Namlian ga badang inthum swak rwe khatle chaat bing om namlian bing kanuk raita rwe. Rikrwang om tasiatnu balung pwan om zu ngai ga Babylon khou pi lang Rikrwang na bating baningsu rwe.
66016020	Tuikoi ram bing le pak thou drwe khatle pakhatchanale rammwan ding zongsulan rwe.
66016021	Tambaan lana kaliannu thakraa mi nun lu chung bi ta rwe. Thakraa khatna kilo somthumga impaang khak rit ngaake. Kaliannu thakraa ta briakpina mi nunna Rikrwang lu chung bi rin basiat rwe. Balangbe bani riangrek ka tasiatnu ngaake.
66017001	Kam siari amnu tambaan chonglang siari lak pi pakhatna akim bi hungluga ei le kabialuga rinne, “Abeiya hung ngo, tui chung bi badung ongnu boulaa taknu mannu lu chung bi ta dingnu chongtok ka eina nakhou pi mu thangne.
66017002	Talei ram krwang nunna maan le diga lungmaan rwe. Baom lungmaannu zu gana talei ram mi nun ding to kalo rwe.”
66017003	Atibriakpina maanna ating katha paan bina ramhaang la phun swak rwe khatle rin basiatnu mengna sipka amnu balu siari khatle bataki som amnu kasennu khouring khat chung bi badung ongnu mannu khat ting eina mu rwe.
66017004	Haba mannu ga sathum bachu khatle sen dumnu bachu pon sin basoiye, kachaak, baman kungnu lung khatle muktana tapon towe. Bakut pi batannu khatle lungkoi lungmaannu om tanaatnuna sipnu kachaak ngai khat am ngaake.
66017005	Atiga, “KALIANNU BABYLON, BOULAANU KHATLE TALEI RAM OM BATANNU NU” dinu meng babachan bi hiak thang nge.
66017006	Bathiangnu mi nun thi khatle Jisu om lang bina bakum pi swak thang damnu mi nun thi inluga kalonu mannu ding eina mu rwe; eina bating phaangmu bi rin lang thei makka loh lo ong ngaake.
66017007	Atiyeda tambaan chonglang gana akhou rin damme, “Nangna pa-aam lang loh lo ongnubo? Eina haba mannu om lang bi khatle bating phunse ongnu balu siari khatle bataki som amnu khouring om lang bi inthim chong ga nakhou rin thangne.
66017008	Nangna phaangmu damnu khouring ga am ngaake atiyeda atunba maak rwe. Maan bakalan maaknu khun bina kalune khatle maan braannu bi selune. Talei ram dam thou mak baleina bani meng ga ringnu chongdip pi hiak thang mak aangnu, talei ram bi amnu mi nunna khouring ga tatoga amnu, am ngaaknu khatle am dingnu dinu lang bi bani loh lo lune.
66017009	Abeiya ningting amnu lungning amme. Balu siari ga mannu gana badung ongnu rammwan siari gaye.
66017010	Krwang siari amme, impaang ga balum drwe, khat atun amme. Katei khat ka atun hung mak aang nge; maan hungnu kaan bi maan bakaan kasem onglune.
66017011	Am ngaaknu khatle maak tamnu khouring ga kariatnu gaye. Maan siari lak pina hungnuwe khatle braannu bi se ongme.
66017012	Nangna mu ngaaknu bataki som ga atun tangga krwang talei lousu mak aangnu krwang som gaye. Atiyeda banina krwang nun danga khouring le diga chakrin khat lang ngam lousulune.
66017013	Krwang bing ga sung chamme khatle banina bani nat khatle bani ngam khouring khou ga pilune.
66017014	“Banina Zao saza le kraan katwaklune khatle Zao sazana bani ding ngamlune. Balangbe maan pukraangba bing Pukraangba khatle krwang bing Krwang nge. Maan le bachamnu mi nun ga kou swak thangnu, kathang swaknu khatle balumsa zanu mi nunne.”
66017015	Maanna akhou rinne, “Nangna mu damnu boulaanu mannu gana badung ongnu tui ga mi nun, mi khang, chaat bing khatle chong chaat bing nge.
66017016	Khouring khou ga nangna mu damnu taki som gana boulaanu mannu ding ga batanlune khatle to braan satlune, pwan pi basoilaye, bazanti ding salune khatle bating mei rou satlune.
66017017	Balangbe Rikrwang na rin thang ngaaknu chong bing ga hung tang mak basaan sung khatcha to lang khatle bani krwang talei bing ga khouring khou ga pi lang Rikrwang na bani sung bi bathainu sung ga pi hung tang lang daan thang rwe.
66017018	Nangna mu ngaaknu mannu ga talei ram krwang nun lu chung bi paan ongnu kaliannu namlian gaye.”
66018001	Ha bing nung bi tambaan chonglang katei khat tambaan lana tanu eina mu rwe. Bakhou ngam liannu amme khatle talei ram ga balwat kana pi baan rwe.
66018002	Maanna baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Balum drwe, kaliannu Babylon balum drwe. Heiya ri kasia nun kaong riak, bathiang maknu katha bing om qwan in khatle bathiang maknu le batannu basa bing om kaong riak imbei rwe.
66018003	“Balangbe chaat bingna baom balung pwan taknu lungkoi lungmaannu om taraannu zu ga in kalo rwe. Talei ram krwang nunna maan le lungkoi lungmaan rwe. Talei ram bi langgonnu rwanna baom impham imphanu paan bina bani lungsa rwe.”
66018004	Habei gana tambaan lana khwan katei khatna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Ami nun ga, nani nunna maan le noh om badam khatle baom riangrek ka badam lou bacham mak lang bakhouna swak tro.
66018005	“Balangbe banoh ga tambaan tang rwe. Rikrwang na baom ririak se maknu chwan ga baningsu rwe.
66018006	“Maanna nani khou pi thang damnu danga bakhou le piyo khatle bachwan nung suiga bakhou badam kani pi thang ngo. Maanna nani lang thang katwak tamnu ngai bi ga balaang zana badam kani thang katwako.
66018007	“Maanna bazan ding lwat pi lian damnu khatle karo rangaa bi ong ngaaknu chaang bakhou riangre kanang bason thang ngo. Balangbe maanna balungning bi atiga kakhan ngaake, ‘Ei ramanu danga amme, tameinu make, riangrenu khatchale mulaye.’
66018008	“Atibriakpina kani khat sung bi baom riangrek bing ga: Thinu, nu hweinu khatle bu taangnu hunglune khatle bating meina roumut sat thanglune; balangbe bating chong kasemnu Rikrwang Pukraangba ga kanatnuwe.
66018009	“Bating rounu meikhut kanu banina munu kaan bi maan le lungkoi lungmaan ngaaknu khatle karo rangaa bacham ngaaknu talei ram krwang bingna balaang chungna chaplune khatle nu hweilune.
66018010	“Bariangrek ka muluga kachi briakpina banina namlaa la hanluga rinne, ‘Aih sianuweda! aih sianuweda! kaliannu namlian, kanatnu namlian Babylon; Balangbe chakrin khat sung bi naom chongsem ga hung rwe.’
66018011	“Talei ram bi langgonnu nunna balaang chungna chaplune khatle nu hweilune; balangbe pakhatchanale bani om langgon pot ka kalei thang lat lan rwe.
66018012	Bani om langgon pot ka kachaak, tangka, baman kungnu lung, mukta, kasanu linen pwan, sathum bachu pwan, muga laa, kasennu pwan khatle citron thing, rampwang ngaa ngai, baman kungnu thing ngai, thinzin, thin khatle marble lungna bachanu ngai,
66018013	tangong, prong, banamsanu thao, kunduk, zu, thao, sukdi gehu, sen, zao, raqwan, raqwan gari, swak rwan khatle mi nun om katha ha bing nge.
66018014	“Nangna bathai taknu thakraa bing ga nakhouna thou drwe khatle sasa insanu pot bing khatle baannu bathiangnu pot bing nakhouna thou drwe. Nangna ha bingba lousu latla rwe.
66018015	Napaan bina lungsa ngaaknu pot zwannu rwan gana nariangrek ka muluga kachiga namlaa la hanluga chaplune khatle nu hweilune,
66018016	atiga rinne, ‘Aih sianuweda, aih sianuweda, kasanu linen, sathum bachu, kasennu bachu pwan sinnu khatle kachaak, baman kungnu lung bing khatle muktana tapon tonu kaliannu namlian ga!
66018017	Balangbe chakrin khat sung bi heitia lang tam damnu lan bing ga khatchale bila rwe. Lipuba rwan bing, li hwanluga se ongnu nun bing, li hwannu nun khatle tuipui bi langgonnu rwanna namlaa la han ong ngaake.’
66018018	Bating meina rou ongnu meikhut ka munu kaan bi banina paoga rinne, ‘Kaliannu namlian heiya le bachamnu namlian ambo?’
66018019	Banina bani lu bi tambut bwan kaluga pao rwe, chap rwe khatle nu hweiga rinne, ‘Aih sianuweda! aih sianuweda! tuipui bi li hwannu bingna baom lan paan bina lungsa damnu kaliannu namlian ga! Balangbe nang chakrin khat sung bi braan drwe.’
66018020	He tambaan, bathiangnu mi rwan, chonglang rwan khatle thiamting rwan, nani balang bina karowo; Balangbe Rikrwang na nani langna balu chung bi takhum baan thang rwe.”
66018021	“Ngam liannu tambaan chonglang khatna barwannu saang tak lung dannu lung khat lou thouluga haga tuipui bi bazwan thangluga rinne, ‘Hei danga kaliannu namlian Babylon ding rakanga bazwantalune khatle haga am lat pila rwe.
66018022	Pakhatchanale nakhouna tara baraam, laa to theinu khwan, tamrwang semnu khwan khatle trumpet semnu khwan ngaisu lat pila rwe; kutthiam chwan nakhou am lat pila rwe; Pakhatchanale nakhouna saang taknu khwan ngaisu lat pila rwe.
66018023	Nakhouna thaomei baan baan lat pila rwe; pakhatchanale nakhouna tazwanpa tazwannu khwan ngaisu lat pila rwe. Balangbe nang le langgonnu rwan ga talei ram om kaliannu mi nunne khatle naom dweina chaat bing ding minam rwe.
66018024	“Bakhouna thiamting rwan om, bathiangnu mi rwan om khatle talei ram bi athat tamnu mi bing om thi dou rwe.” ’
66019001	Heiba nung bi tambaan la mi khang pui khat om basaangnu khwan khatna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Halleluiya, ringriak, lwat liannu, takung tazeinu khatle ngam bing ga ani Rikrwang Pukraangba omme.
66019002	Balangbe Baom chongsem ga bazenuwe khatle ririak senuwe; Balangbe Maanna kaliannu boulaa taknu mannu ding, baom lungkoi lungmaannuna talei ram ding to tanaat tamnu langna bating chong kasem rwe, Khatle maanna pi ta damnu Baswak rwan om thi man ga Pukraangba na balu chung bi takhum baan thang rwe.”
66019003	Banina rin late, “Halleluiya, Baom meikhut ka khwa seiga kaye.”
66019004	Patso somniga bali khatle ringnu katha amnu bali gana in bakhup taluga krwang takung riak pi badung ongnu Rikrwang ding kalumga rinne, “Amen, Halleluiya.”
66019005	Takung riak pina swaknu khwan gana rinne, “Baswak rwan nani bingna khatle Bating kachinu kasei kalian khatle kason kaong nani khangsung ani Rikrwang ding swanno.”
66019006	Mi khang pui khwan dannu tuipui baraam dannu khatle rakannu khwa barinu baraam dannuna atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Halleluiya, balangbe kangamnu ani Rikrwang Pukraangba na paan rwe.
66019007	“Ani karozo, lozaang sazo khatle Bating swanzo; Balangbe Zao saza om tazwan bahwannu ga hung tang rwe. Baom tazwannu gana daanga ong rwe.”
66019008	Bathiangnu khatle kaphingnu linen pwan balaang sin basoi thang lang pi thang rwe; Balangbe kasanu linen pwan ga bathiangnu mi rwan om ririak senu chwan bing gaye.”
66019009	Haba nung maanna akhou rinne, “Hiak thang ngo, ‘Zao saza om tazwan bahwan bi talot tamnu rwan ga aih saye.’ ” Maanna akhou rinne, “Rin ongnu bing heiya Rikrwang om bazenu chong nge”
66019010	Eina baket pi bating kalum lang in bakhup ta rwe. Atiyeda maanna akhou rinne, “Nang haga to mako, eile nang khatle Jisu lang bi sake pi ongnu naunao rwan le diga swak to bachamnuwe. Rikrwang ding kalummo, balangbe thiamting om bathainu ga Jisu om lang bi sake pinu gaye.”
66019011	Tambaan lat swaknu eina mu rwe. Atiga phaang ngo, kangounu raqwan khat amme; haba raqwan chung bi twangnu Bameng ga Balumsa zanu khatle Bazenu diga kou ngaake. Maanna ririak senu bi chong kasemme khatle kraan katwake.
66019012	Bamik ka mei balei danne khatle balu bi krwang luthop taswang khak am ngaake khatle Maan makka pakhatchanale thei maknu hiak thangnu meng Bakhou am ngaake.
66019013	Maan thi bi lupnu pwan sin ngaake khatle Bamengna Rikrwang Chongkaang diga kouwe.
66019014	Tambaan kraanmi nunna kangounu khatle bathiangnu banemnu linen pwan sinluga kangounu raqwan twangluga Banung suiseye.
66019015	Babao bina chaat nun ding kapak that lang kangainu kachaak chem swake khatle “Maanna bani ding thin sungrwanna sianlune;” Maanna Ngam Bachangnu Rikrwang om tasiatnu kaliannu balung pwanna drakha tui sumnu riak ting kadimme.
66019016	Bapwan bi khatle ketling bi, “KRWANG BING KRWANG, PUKRAANGBA BING PUKRAANGBA” diga hiak thangnu meng amme.
66019017	Tambaan chonglang khatna lumik pi han ongnu eina mu rwe, maanna tambaan zai bi zwang koi ongnu basaa nun khou baraam basaangga paoga rinne, “Hungro khatle basaang kataknu Rikrwang om balou bi ga hung kadoiro.
66019018	Nanina krwang nun zan, kraan milu nun zan khatle kanatnu mi nun zan, raqwan nun zan khatle haba chung bi twangnu nun zan, rang tonu khatle swak nun, kasin kalian dinuba, ha bing om zan sa lang nani hung ngo.”
66019019	Haba nung bi khouring khatle talei ram krwang nun, bani om kraanmi rwanna raqwan chung bi badung ongnu Baom kraanmi rwan le kraan katwak lang hung kadoinu eina mu rwe.
66019020	Khouring khatle bameithaan bi badannu pi mu damnu kakoinu thiamting ding nam rwe. Badannu paanna khouring badan amnu khatle bakatha ding kalumnu nun ding minam damme. Barwei pat ni ding kanduk mei bati ongnu riak pi baring bazwan thang rwe.
66019021	Raqwan chung bi badung ongnu Bamun bina swaknu kachaak chemna katei rwan bing ding athat rwe khatle basa nunna bani zan saluga bani bon imba rwe.
66020001	Tambaan lana tambaan chonglang khat tanu eina mu rwe. Bakhou bakalan maaknu khun om taapthing khatle bakut pi kaliannu parei rui khat am ngaake.
66020002	Maanna Diabol le Seitaan dinuba kama meithaan om barun, dragon, ding nam rwe khatle bating sangwan raching khat karakluga thang damme.
66020003	Maanna bating bakalan maaknu khun bi bazwanta rwe khatle sangwan raching khat loi mak basaan maanna chaat nun ding minam lat mak lang bating balakluga balu chung bi seal nam thang ngaake. Atiyeda heiba nung bi bating bakaan kasem za lang bathan swaklune.
66020004	Eina takung riak bing ga mu rwe khatle takung riak pi badung ongnu nun khou chong kasem lang ngam pi thang rwe. Jisu lang bi sake pinu langna khatle Rikrwang om chongkaang langna ring tan damnu nun om katha bing, khouring ding khatle bakatha ding kalum maknu nun khatle bani bachan bi khatle kut pi baom badan maaknu nun ding eina mu rwe. Banina ring thouluga Christa le diga sangwan raching khat paan bacham rwe.
66020005	Atiyeda thi damnu mi katei bing ga sangwan raching khat loi mak basaan ring thoulaye. Heiya ring thounu kamanu gaye.
66020006	Kamanu ring thounu bi suinu maan ga aih sanuwe khatle bathiangnuwe; thi leng ninuna heiba mi nun lu chung bi ngam am bila rwe. Atiyeda bani Rikrwang om khatle Christa om tako rwan tolune. Banina Maan le diga sangwan raching khat paan bachamlune.
66020007	Sangwan raching khat loinu kaan bi Seitaan ding baom qwan in bina bathan swaklune
66020008	khatle maanna talei taki bali la amnu chaat bing ding dinuba, Gog le Magog ting minam lang se swaklune, maanna bani ding kraan katwak lang khom karunglune; bani mi sing ga tuipui paan lungtasi za lune.
66020009	Banina talei ram bing bina swakluga bathiangnu mi nun kaong riak khatle Rikrwang na kriangnu namlian ding ga han qwat tamme khatle tambaan la Rikrwang khouna mei bathan taluga bani ding rou sat tamme.
66020010	Khouring khatle kakoinu thiamtingna ongnu riak kanduk khatle mei paat pi bani ding minamnu Diabol ding bazwan thang rwe. Habei ga bani zingpha thamlai nai makka khwa sei riangre khaanglune.
66020011	Kaliannu kangounu takung riak khat atiluga haba chung bi badung ongnu Bating eina mu rwe. Bameithaan bina tambaan le talei ram pak thou damme khatle bani lang kaong riak dou mak ngaake.
66020012	Thi damnu nun, kasinnu khatle kaliannu nunna Rikrwang meithaan bi han ongnu eina mu rwe khatle chongdip bing lat swak ngaake khatle chongdip katei dinuba, ringnu Chongdip ka lat swak ngaake. Maanna thinu nun ding chongdip pi hiak thang damnu bani chwan nung suiga chong kasem ngaake.
66020013	Tuipuina basung bi amnu thi damnu nun ding pi swak tamme khatle Thinu le Kathi ramna basung bi amnu thi damnu nun ding pi swak tamme khatle bani pakhat khat ting le bachwan nung suiga chong kasem rwe.
66020014	Thinu khatle Kathi ram ding mei paat pi bazwan thang rwe. Heiya thi leng ninu gaye.
