66020015	Ringnu Chongdip pi meng hiak thang maknu bating mei paat sung bi bazwan thang rwe.
66021001	Tambaan kathan khatle talei kathan ding eina mu rwe; balangbe kamanu tambaan khatle kamanu talei ram maak rwe khatle tuipui le maak rwe.
66021002	Babasan lang chamdaan thangnu tazwannu dannu bathiangnu namlian Jerusalem kathan Rikrwang khouna tambaan lana tanu ding John eina mu rwe.
66021003	Tambaan lana baraam basaangga atiga rinnu eina ngaisu rwe, “Phaang ngo, Rikrwang kaong riak ka mi nun lak pi amme. Maan bani le ong bachamlune khatle bani Bami nun tolune, Khatle Rikrwang Maan bahak bani le ong bachamlune, Khatle bani om Rikrwang tolune.
66021004	Rikrwang na bani mik pina mikthi bing kanun sat thanglune, Thinu, riangrenu, chapnu khatle naanu am latla rwe. Balangbe kamanu pot bing ga thou drwe.”
66021005	Takung riak pi badung ongnu Maanna rin ngaake, “Phaang ngo, eina pot bing ding kathan toga bachaye.” Maanna akhou rinne, “Hiak thangro, balangbe heiba chong bing nga bazenu khatle balumsa zanuwe.”
66021006	Maanna akhou rinne, “Pum brumza loi rwe. Ei Alpha khatle Omega, Thoutannu khatle Loinu gaye. Taraannu balaang Eina ringnu tuipwak in tui ga bathaam pi thangne.
66021007	Ngam hungnu maanna pot bingza lousulune khatle Eina baom Rikrwang tolune khatle maanna Asa kapaisa tolune.
66021008	Atiyeda kachi natnu nun, balumsa maknu nun, batannu chwan tonu nun, mi athatnu nun, lungkoi lungmaannu nun, dwei choinu nun, ri katha kalumnu nun khatle chong karwaknu nun mei le kanduk bati ongnu paat pi ga bani kaong riak to lang nge, heiya thi leng ninu gaye.”
66021009	Kakhamnu om riangrenuna sipnu kam siari choinu tambaan chonglang siari lak pi khatna hungluga ei le meiri raiga rinne, “Abeiya hung ngo, Zao saza mei to dingnu tazwannu ding eina nakhou pi mu thangne.”
66021010	Tambaan chonglangna ating katha bi basaangnu kaliannu rammwan khat om lu chung la kalwang se ngaake. Kaliannu namlian bathiangnu Jerusalem Rikrwang khouna tambaan lana tanu akhou pi mu thang rwe.
66021011	Habei ga Rikrwang om lwat liannu amme, haba om babaan ga baman kungnu lung, bathing ring ringnu bathiangnu zasper lung dannuwe.
66021012	Namlian om liannu, basaangnu, kapan khatle inkhaan pui somga kani khatle inkhaan pui bing bi tambaan chonglang pat somga kani am ngaake. Inkhaan pui bing bi Israel sa rwan phum somga kani meng hiak thang ngaake.
66021013	Namlian om lumik swak la inkhaan inthum, kasak la inkhaan inthum, kathwei la inkhaan inthum khatle lumik taak la inkhaan inthum amme.
66021014	Namlian om kapan inmun somga kani amme. Haba inmun bing bi Zao saza om chonglang somga kani meng am ngaake.
66021015	Akhou chong kabia ngaaknu bakut pi namlian ding, inkhaan bing ding khatle kapan ding badat lang kachaak thingrwa khat am ngaake.
66021016	Namlian ga bataki bali amme, basei balian bachamme. Maanna haba namlian ga badatnu kaan bi kilometer raching ni raza ni ngaake, baom basei balian basaangnu bachamme.
66021017	Maanna kapan ga badatnu kaan bi mi khatna dinuba, tambaan chonglangna badatnu nung suiga kutki raza sombaliga bali ngaake.
66021018	Namlian om kapan ga zasper lungna bachanuwe khatle namlian ga bathiangnu likli dannu bathiangnu kachaakna bachanuwe.
66021019	Namlian om kapan inmun bing ga bachaat inza om baman kungnu lungna tapon to thang nge. Kamanu inmun ga zasper lung naye, kaninuna sapphire lung naye, inthumnuna chalcedony lung naye, balinuna emerald lung naye.
66021020	Impaangnu gana sardonyx lung naye, karuknu gana sardius lung naye, siarinu gana chrysolite lung naye, kariatnu gana beryl lung naye, kaqwanu gana topaz lung naye, somnu gana chrysoprase lung naye, somga khatnu gana jacinth lung naye khatle somga kaninu gana amethyst lung naye.
66021021	Inkhaan pui somga kani ga mukta somga kani ngaake; inkhaan pui bing ga mukta khat khat ngaake. Namlian om lampui ga mu kabaan zanu likli dannu bathiangnu kachaakna ngaake.
66021022	Namlian sung bi bathiangnu in khatchale mu make, balangbe Ngam Bachangnu Rikrwang Pukraangba khatle Zao saza gana namlian om bathiangnu in gaye.
66021023	Namlian bi ga lumik, thana baan lang bathaang maake; balangbe Rikrwang om lwat lianna habei ga baan ongme khatle Zao saza gana haba om babaan gaye.
66021024	Rikrwang na kan thang damnu chaat nunna baannu bi ga se koilune. Talei ram krwang nunna bani lwat lian khatle takung tazei tonu bing habei ga phun hunglune.
66021025	Thamlai inkhaan bing ga impha ni beida khaanlaye, balangbe habei ga zingpha dinu amla rwe.
66021026	Banina chaat nun om lwat liannu khatle takung tazei tonu habei ga phun hunglune.
66021027	Atiyeda bapum ding to tanaatnu, batannu chwan tonu nun mak tabe chong karwaknu rwan habei ga khatchale khutpilaye atiyeda Zao saza om ringnu chongdip pi meng hiak thang damnu gana haba sung bi khutlune.
66022001	Rikrwang khatle Zao saza takung riak pina lwang swaknu bathing ring ringnu ringnu bathiangnu tuiqwa khat akhou pi mu thang rwe.
66022002	Habei lampui zai bi khatle tuiqwa paan kani bi ringnu thingkung thouwe, haba thingkung bi ga bachaat tei teinu thakraa bachaat somga kani, tha bathin kraa ngaake; thingkung naa bing ga chaat nun ding pi sa thang lang ngaake.
66022003	Habei ga taseng dinu amla rwe atiyeda Rikrwang om khatle Zao saza om takung riak ka habei ga amlune atiga Baswak rwanna Bating chwanlaang tolune.
66022004	Banina Baman mulune khatle Bameng bani bachan bi amlune.
66022005	Habei ga zingpha amla rwe, bani lang thaomei mak tabe lumik baan bathaang amla rwe; balangbe Rikrwang Pukraangba na bani khou baannu ga pi thang nge khatle bani khwa seiga krwang paan onglune.
66022006	Maanna akhou rin ngaake, “Heiba chong bing nga balumsa lang khopnuwe khatle bazenuwe. Barapka hung dingnu bing om lang bi Baswak rwan khou pi mu thang lang bathiangnu thiamting rwan om Pukraangba Rikrwang na Baom tambaan chonglang ding lang thang rwe.
66022007	“Phaang ngo, Ei barapka hung rwe. Chongdip pi rin chaak thangnu chong bing zeinu maan ga aih sanuwe.”
66022008	John eina ha bing ga mu rwe khatle ngaisu rwe. Eina haga munu khatle ngaisunu kaan bi ha bing akhou pi mu thang ngaaknu tambaan chonglang ket pi kalum lang kunta ngaake.
66022009	Habei ga maanna akhou rinne, “Haga ati mako, balangbe ei nang le nau nanao thiamting rwan khatle chongdipna rin thangnu ding zeinu bani le diga swak to bachamnuwe. Rikrwang ding kalummo.”
66022010	Maanna akhou rinne, “Heiba chongdipna rin chaak thangnu chong bing nga seal nam mako, balangbe bakaan ga nai hung rwe.
66022011	Baze maknu maan ga baze makka am dam dingro, tanaatnu maan ga tanaat ka am dam dingro, ririak senu maan ga ririak sega am dam dingro. Bathiangnu maan ga bathiangga am dam dingro.
66022012	Phaang ngo Ei barapka hung rwe. Mi bing lang maan maanna tonu chwan nung suiga pi thang lang Aom taswan Eina phun hung nge.
66022013	“Ei Alpha khatle Omega, Thoutannu khatle Loinu, Kamanu khatle Kakhamnu gaye.”
66022014	Baom zathang bing zeinu maan ga aih sanuwe. Bani khou ringnu thingkung bina sa lang khatle namlian om inkhaan pui bi ga khut lang bani khou ngam amlune.
66022015	Langkaang la ui nun, dwei choinu nun, lungkoi lungmaannu nun, mi athatnu nun, ri katha kalumnu nun, chong karwaknu nun amme.
66022016	“Rupkathan bing bi hei lang bi sake to lang Jisu Eina Aom tambaan chonglang rwan ding nani khou lang hung rwe. Ei David Kamong khatle bakik taate, Ei Baan chuinu khatle Louthwan Insi Thanne.”
66022017	Katha na khatle tazwannuna rinne, “Hung thang ngo.” Ngai ongnu maanna rin ding ngo, “Hung thang ngo.” Taraannu maan ga hung ding ngo. Bathainu maan gana ringnu tui ga bathaam in ding ngo.
66022018	Heiba chongdip om rin swaknu ding ga ngai ongnu bing khou eina sake pinuwe, tudannuna hei bing chung bi thanghape dabe, hei chongdip pi rin chaak thangnu riangrenu bing ga Rikrwang na bakhou hap thanglune.
66022019	Heiba chongdip pi rin chaak thangnu chong bina tudannuna lou sate dabe, Rikrwang na baom badam ga ringnu chongdip pina, bathiangnu namlian bina khatle chongdip pi hiak thang damnu bing bina lou satlune.
66022020	Hei bing lang bi sake pinu Maanna rinne, “Batak takka Ei barapka hung rwe. Amen. O, Pukraangba Jisu, hung thangro.”
66022021	Ani Pukraangba Jisu Christa om phaangkriangna nani nun bing le ong bacham thang ding ngo. Amen.
